tika-vin07t:14: Tattha kāci suvitthiṇṇā, dukkhogāhā ca ganthato;
tika-vin07t:15: Viraddhā atthato cāpi, saddato cāpi katthaci.
tika-vin07t:23_1: yo kappakoṭīhipītiādimāha. Visiṭṭhaguṇayogena hi vandanārahabhāvo, vandanārahe ca
tika-vin07t:23_2: katā vandanā yathādhippetamatthaṃ sādheti. Ettha ca saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇappayojanaṃ
tika-vin07t:23_3: tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā, mayaṃ pana idhādhippetameva payojanaṃ dassayissāma.
tika-vin07t:23_5: parisamāpanatthanti veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “tassānubhāvena hatantarāyo”ti. Ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇena
tika-vin07t:23_6: hi rāgādidosavigamato paññādiguṇapāṭavato āyuādivaḍḍhanato puññātisayabhāvādito ca
tika-vin07t:24_0: Tattha paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato vandanaṃ kattukāmo “yo kappakoṭīhipi…pe… tassā”ti
tika-vin07t:24_1: āha. Imissā pana vinayadesanāya karuṇāppadhānañāṇasamuṭṭhitatāya karuṇāppadhānameva
tika-vin07t:24_2: thomanaṃ āraddhaṃ. Esā hi ācariyassa pakati, yadidaṃ ārambhānurūpathomanā. Karuṇāggahaṇena
tika-vin07t:24_3: cettha aparimeyyappabhāvā sabbepi buddhaguṇā nayato saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā taṃmūlakattā
tika-vin07t:24_4: sesabuddhaguṇānaṃ. Tattha yoti imassa aniyamavacanassa nāthoti iminā sambandho. Kappakoṭīhipi
tika-vin07t:24_5: appameyyaṃ kālanti kappakoṭigaṇanāvasenapi “ettakā kappakoṭiyo”ti pametuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ
tika-vin07t:24_6: kālaṃ. Api-saddena pageva vassagaṇanāyāti dasseti. Appameyyaṃ kālanti ca accantasaṃyoge
tika-vin07t:24_8: pana paricchinditabbato salakkhaṃ caturasaṅkhyeyyakappakālaṃ accantameva nirantaraṃ
tika-vin07t:24_9: pañcamahāpaaccāgādiatidukkarāni karonto khedaṃ kāyikaṃ parissamaṃ pattoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:25_0: Lokahitāyāti sattalokassa hitāya. Nāthatīti nātho, veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ āsīsatīti
tika-vin07t:25_1: attho. Atha vā nāthati veneyyagate kilese upatāpeti, nāthati vā yācati veneyye attano
tika-vin07t:25_2: hitakaraṇe yācitvāpi niyojetīti nātho, lokapaṭisaraṇo lokasāmī lokanāyakoti vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:25_3: hoti. Mahākāruṇikassāti yo karuṇāya kampitahadayattā lokahitatthaṃ atidukkarakiriyāya
tika-vin07t:25_4: anekappakāraṃ tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavitvā āgato, tassa mahākāruṇikassāti attho. Tattha
tika-vin07t:25_5: kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati apanetīti attho. Dukkhitesu vā kiriyati pasāriyatīti
tika-vin07t:25_6: karuṇā. Atha vā kiṇātīti karuṇā, paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādheti, vināseti
tika-vin07t:25_7: vā parassa dukkhanti attho. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti
tika-vin07t:25_8: vā karuṇā. Atha vā kamiti sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhatīti karuṇā. Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā
tika-vin07t:25_9: attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibādheti. Karuṇāya niyutto kāruṇiko,
tika-vin07t:25_10: mahanto kāruṇiko mahākāruṇiko, tassa namo atthūti pāṭhaseso.
tika-vin07t:26_0: Evaṃ karuṇāmukhena saṅkhepato sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ thometvā idāni saddhammaṃ
tika-vin07t:26_1: thometuṃ asambudhantiādimāha. Tattha buddhanisevitaṃ yaṃ asambudhaṃ jīvaloko bhavā
tika-vin07t:26_2: bhavaṃ gacchati, tassa dhammavarassa namoti sambandho. Tattha asambudhanti asambujjhanto,
tika-vin07t:26_3: yathāsabhāvaṃ appaṭivijjhanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Hetuattho hettha antapaccayo. Yanti
tika-vin07t:26_4: aniyamato sapariyattiko navalokuttaradhammo kammabhāvena niddiṭṭho. Buddhanisevitanti
tika-vin07t:26_5: tasseva visesanaṃ, sammāsambuddhena, paccekabuddhasāvakabuddhehipi vā gocarāsevanabhāvanāsevanāhi
tika-vin07t:26_6: yathārahaṃ nisevitaṃ, ajahitanti attho. Tattha pariyattiphalanibbānāni gocarāsevanavaseneva
tika-vin07t:26_7: nisevitāni, maggo pana bhāvanāsevanavasenāpi paccavekkhaṇañāṇādivasena gocarāsevanavasenāpi
tika-vin07t:26_8: nisevito. Bhavābhavanti bhavato bhavaṃ. Atha vā hīnapaṇītādivasena khuddakaṃ mahantañca
tika-vin07t:26_9: bhavanti attho. Vuḍḍhatthopi hi a-kāro dissati asekkhā dhammātiādīsu viya. Atha vā
tika-vin07t:26_10: bhavoti vuḍḍhi, abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti vā sassatadiṭṭhi, abhavoti ucchedadiṭṭhi.
tika-vin07t:26_11: Vuttappakāro bhavo ca abhavo ca bhavābhavo, taṃ bhavābhavaṃ. Gacchatīti upagacchati.
tika-vin07t:26_12: Jīvalokoti sattaloko. Avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsinoti dhammavisesanaṃ. Tattha na
tika-vin07t:26_13: vidati dhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvaṃ na vijānātīti avijjā, aññāṇaṃ. Sā ādi yesaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ,
tika-vin07t:26_14: teyeva kilissanti etehi sattāti kilesā, teyeva ca sattānaṃ vibādhanaṭṭhena jālasadisāti
tika-vin07t:26_15: jālaṃ, taṃ viddhaṃseti sabbaso vināseti sīlenāti avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsī, tassa.
tika-vin07t:27_0: Nanu cettha sapariyattiko navalokuttaradhammo adhippeto, tattha ca maggoyeva kilese
tika-vin07t:27_1: viddhaṃseti, netareti ce? Vuccate – maggassāpi nibbānamāgamma kilesaviddhaṃsanato
tika-vin07t:27_2: nibbānampi kilese viddhaṃseti nāma, maggassa kilesaviddhaṃsanakiccaṃ phalena niṭṭhitanti
tika-vin07t:27_4: “kilesaviddhaṃsī”ti vattuṃ arahatīti na koci doso. Dhammavarassa tassāti pubbe aniyamitassa
tika-vin07t:27_5: niyāmakavacanaṃ. Tattha yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne catūsu apāyesu saṃsāradukkhe
tika-vin07t:27_6: ca apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo. Vuttappakāro dhammo eva attano uttaritarābhāvena varo
tika-vin07t:27_7: pavaro anuttaroti dhammavaro, tassa dhammavarassa namo atthūti attho.
tika-vin07t:28_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepanayeneva sabbadhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ thometvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ thometuṃ
tika-vin07t:28_1: guṇehītiādimāha. Tattha guṇehi yo yutto, tamariyasaṅghaṃ namāmīti sambandho. Sīlādayo
tika-vin07t:28_2: guṇā cettha lokiyalokuttarā adhippetā. “Vimuttivimuttiñāṇa”nti vattabbe ekadesasarūpekasesanayena
tika-vin07t:28_3: “vimuttiñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ, ādisaddapariyāyena pabhutisaddena vā vimuttiggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:28_4: Tattha vimuttīti phalaṃ. Vimuttiñāṇanti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Pabhuti-saddena chaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidādayo
tika-vin07t:28_5: guṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Kusalatthikānaṃ janānaṃ puññātisayavuḍḍhiyā khettasadisattā
tika-vin07t:28_6: khettanti āha “khettaṃ janānaṃ kusalatthikāna”nti. Khittaṃ bījaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena
tika-vin07t:28_7: tāyatīti hi khettaṃ. Ariyasaṅghanti ettha ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato,
tika-vin07t:28_8: aye ca iriyanato, sadevakena lokena “saraṇa”nti araṇīyato upagantabbato, upagatānañca
tika-vin07t:28_9: tadatthasiddhito ariyā, aṭṭha ariyapuggalā, ariyānaṃ saṅgho samūhoti ariyasaṅgho, taṃ ariyasaṅghaṃ.
tika-vin07t:29_0: Idāni ratanattayapaṇāmajanitaṃ kusalābhisandaṃ yathādhippete payojane niyojetvā attanā
tika-vin07t:29_2: sāsanamūlataṃ dassetuṃ iccevamiccādigāthādvayamāha. Puññābhisandanti puññoghaṃ, puññappavāhaṃ
tika-vin07t:29_3: puññarāsinti attho. Tassānubhāvenāti tassa yathāvuttassa puññappavāhassa ānubhāvena
tika-vin07t:30_0: Aṭṭhitassa susaṇṭhitassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ yasmiṃ ṭhite patiṭṭhitaṃ hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:30_1: Tattha yasminti yasmiṃ vinayapiṭake. Ṭhiteti pāḷito ca atthato ca anūnaṃ hutvā lajjīpuggalesu
tika-vin07t:30_2: pavattanaṭṭhena ṭhite. Sāsananti sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sāsanaṃ. Aṭṭhitassāti kāmasukhallikattakilamathānuyogasaṅkhāte
tika-vin07t:30_3: antadvaye aṭṭhitassa, “parinibbutassapi bhagavato”tipi vadanti. Susaṇṭhitassāti antadvayavirahitāya
tika-vin07t:30_4: majjhimāya paṭipadāya suṭṭhu ṭhitassa. Amissanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, nikāyantaraladdhīhi
tika-vin07t:30_5: asammissaṃ katvā anākulaṃ katvā vaṇṇayissanti vuttaṃ hoti. Nissāya pubbācariyānubhāvanti
tika-vin07t:30_6: pubbācariyehi saṃvaṇṇitaṃ aṭṭhakathaṃ nissāya, na attano balenāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:31_0: Atha porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu vijjamānāsu puna vinayasaṃvaṇṇanā kiṃpayojanāti? Āha kāmañcātiādi.
tika-vin07t:31_1: Tattha kāmanti ekantena, yathicchakaṃ vā, sabbasoti vuttaṃ hoti, tassa saṃvaṇṇitoyaṃ
tika-vin07t:31_2: vinayoti iminā sambandho. Pubbācariyāsabhehīti mahākassapattherādayo pubbācariyā
tika-vin07t:31_3: eva akampiyaṭṭhena uttamaṭṭhena ca āsabhā, tehi pubbācariyavarehīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:31_4: Kīdisā pana te pubbācariyāti? Āha ñāṇambūtiādi. Aggamaggañāṇasaṅkhātena ambunā salilena
tika-vin07t:31_5: niddhotāni nissesato āyatiṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanena dhotāni visodhitāni rāgādīni
tika-vin07t:31_6: tīṇi malāni kāmāsavādayo ca cattāro āsavā yehi te ñāṇambuniddhotamalāsavā, tehi khīṇāsavehīti
tika-vin07t:31_7: attho. Khīṇāsavabhāvepi na ete sukkhavipassakāti āha “visuddhavijjāpaṭisambhidehī”ti.
tika-vin07t:31_8: Tattha vijjāti tisso vijjā, aṭṭha vijjā vā. Paṭisambhidāppattesupi mahākassapattherādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:31_9: uccinitvā gahitatāya tesaṃ saddhammasaṃvaṇṇane sāmatthiyaṃ sātisayanti dassento āha
tika-vin07t:32_0: Kilesajātaṃ, parikkhārabāhullaṃ vā sallikhati tanuṃ karotīti sallekho, appicchatādiguṇasamūho,
tika-vin07t:32_1: idha pana khīṇāsavādhikārattā parikkhārabāhullassa sallikhanavaseneva attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:32_2: Sallekhena nibbattaṃ sallekhiyaṃ, tasmiṃ sallekhiye, dhutaṅgapariharaṇādisallekhapaapattiyanti
tika-vin07t:32_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Nosulabhūpamehīti sallekhapaṭipattiyā “asukasadisā”ti natthi sulabhā
tika-vin07t:32_4: upamā etesanti nosulabhūpamā, tehi. Mahāvihārassāti iminā nikāyantaraṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin07t:32_5: Vihārasīsena hettha tattha nivāsīnañceva tehi samaladdhikānañca sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin07t:32_6: gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tasmā tesaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ diṭṭhisīlavisuddhiyā pabhavattena
tika-vin07t:32_8: vuttā, tehi ayaṃ vinayo saṃvaṇṇito sammā anūnaṃ katvā vaṇṇito. Kathanti āha “cittehi
tika-vin07t:32_9: nayehī”ti. Vicittehi nayehi sambuddhavaranvayehi sabbaññubuddhavaraṃ anugatehi, bhagavato
tika-vin07t:33_0: Evaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāya anūnabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni attano saṃvaṇṇanāya payojanavisesaṃ
tika-vin07t:33_1: ajjhesakañca dassetuṃ saṃvaṇṇanātiādimāha. Tattha saṅkhatattāti racitattā. Na kañci
tika-vin07t:33_2: atthaṃ abhisambhuṇātīti na kañci atthaṃ sādheti.
tika-vin07t:34_0: Saṃvaṇṇanaṃ tañcātiādinā attano saṃvaṇṇanāya karaṇappakāraṃ dasseti. Tattha tañca
tika-vin07t:34_1: idāni vuccamānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ samārabhanto sakalāyapi mahāaṭṭhakathāya idha gahetabbato
tika-vin07t:34_2: mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ tassā idāni vuccamānāya saṃvaṇṇanāya sarīraṃ katvā mahāpaccariyaṃ
tika-vin07t:34_3: yo vinicchayo vutto, tatheva kurundīnāmādīsu vissutāsu aṭṭhakathāsu yo vinicchayo
tika-vin07t:34_4: vutto, tatopi vinicchayato yuttamatthaṃ apariccajanto antogadhattheravādaṃ katvā
tika-vin07t:34_5: saṃvaṇṇanaṃ sammā samārabhissanti padatthasambandho veditabbo. Ettha ca attho kathīyati
tika-vin07t:34_6: etāyāti aṭṭhakathā ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā. Mahāpaccariyanti mahāpaccarīnāmikaṃ.
tika-vin07t:34_7: Ettha ca paccarīti uḷumpaṃ vuccati, tasmiṃ nisīditvā katattā tameva nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin07t:34_8: “Kurundīvallivihāro nāma atthi, tattha katattā ‘kurundī’ti nāmaṃ jāta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:35_1: gahetvā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karissāmī”ti vutte aṭṭhakathāsu vuttattheravādānaṃ bāhirabhāvo
tika-vin07t:35_2: siyāti tepi antokattukāmo “antogadhatheravāda”nti āha, theravādepi antokatvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:36_0: Taṃ meti gāthāya sotūhi paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dasseti. Tattha dhammappadīpassāti dhammo
tika-vin07t:36_1: eva mohandhakāraviddhaṃsanato padīpasadisattā padīpo assāti dhammappadīpo, bhagavā,
tika-vin07t:36_2: tassa. Patimānayantāti pūjentā manasā garuṃ karontā nisāmentu suṇantu.
tika-vin07t:37_0: Buddhenātiādinā attano saṃvaṇṇanāya āgamanasuddhidassanamukhena pamāṇabhāvaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin07t:37_1: anusikkhitabbataṃ dasseti. Tattha yatheva buddhena yo dhammo vinayo ca vutto, so
tika-vin07t:37_2: tassa buddhassa yehi puttehi mahākassapattherādīhi tatheva ñāto, tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ
tika-vin07t:37_3: matimaccajantā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathācariyā yasmā pure aṭṭhakathā akaṃsūti sambandho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:37_4: Tattha dhammoti suttābhidhamme saṅgaṇhāti. Vinayoti sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ. Vuttoti
tika-vin07t:37_5: pāḷito ca atthato ca buddhena bhagavatā vutto. Na hi bhagavatā abyākataṃ nāma tantipadaṃ
tika-vin07t:37_6: atthi, tattha tattha bhagavatā pavattitapakiṇṇakadesanāyeva hi aṭṭhakathā. Tatheva
tika-vin07t:37_7: ñātoti yatheva buddhena vutto, tatheva ekapadampi ekakkharampi avināsetvā adhippāyañca
tika-vin07t:37_8: avikopetvā ñāto viditoti attho. Tesaṃ matimaccajantāti tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ matisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t:37_9: theraparamparāya uggahetvā ābhataṃ abbocchinnaṃ pāḷivaṇṇanāvasena ceva pāḷimuttakavasena
tika-vin07t:37_10: ca pavattaṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāvinicchayaṃ apariccajantā. Aṭṭhakathā akaṃsūti mahāaṭṭhakathāmahāpaccariādikā
tika-vin07t:38_0: Tasmāti yasmā tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ adhippāyaṃ avikopetvā pure aṭṭhakathā akaṃsu,
tika-vin07t:38_1: tasmā. Yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbampi pamāṇanti yojanā. Hīti nipātamattaṃ
tika-vin07t:38_2: hetuatthassa tasmāti imināyeva pakāsitattā, avadhāraṇattho vā, pamāṇamevāti. Yadi
tika-vin07t:38_3: aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ sabbampi pamāṇaṃ, evaṃ sati tattha pamādalekhāpi pamāṇaṃ siyāti
tika-vin07t:38_4: āha “vajjayitvāna pamādalekha”nti, aparāparaṃ likhantehi pamādena satiṃ apaccupaṭṭhapetvā
tika-vin07t:38_5: aññattha likhitabbaṃ aññattha likhanādivasena pavattitā pamādalekhā nāma, sā ca samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:38_6: tattha tattha sayameva āvibhavissati. Puna yasmāti padassa sambandhadassanavasena
tika-vin07t:38_7: ayaṃ atthayojanā – yasmā aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ idha imasmiṃ sāsane sikkhāsu sagāravānaṃ
tika-vin07t:38_8: paṇḍitānaṃ pamāṇameva, yasmā ca ayaṃ vaṇṇanāpi bhāsantarapariccāgādimattavisiṭṭhatāya
tika-vin07t:38_9: atthato abhinnā, tato eva pamāṇabhūtāva hessati, tasmā anusikkhitabbāti.
tika-vin07t:39_0: Tatoti tāhi aṭṭhakathāhi. Bhāsantarameva hitvāti sīhaḷabhāsaṃyeva apanetvā. Vitthāramaggañca
tika-vin07t:39_1: samāsayitvāti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu yathāṭhāne vattabbampi padatthavinicchayādikaṃ ativitthiṇṇena
tika-vin07t:39_2: vacanakkamena ceva vuttameva atthanayaṃ appamattakavisesena punappunaṃ kathanena
tika-vin07t:39_3: ca tattha tattha papañcitaṃ tādisaṃ vitthāramaggaṃ pahāya sallahukena atthaviññāpakena
tika-vin07t:39_4: padakkamena ceva vuttanayasadisaṃ vattabbaṃ atidisitvā ca saṅkhepanayeneva vaṇṇayissāmāti
tika-vin07t:39_5: adhippāyo. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana vinayaṭīkāyaṃ “porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu upari vuccamānampi
tika-vin07t:39_6: ānetvā tattha tattha papañcitaṃ ñatticatutthena kammena…pe… upasampannoti bhikkhūti
tika-vin07t:39_7: ettha apalokanādīnaṃ catunnampi kammānaṃ vitthārakathā viya tādisaṃ vitthāramaggaṃ
tika-vin07t:39_8: saṅkhipitvā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ tantikkamaṃ kañci avokkamitvāti ettheva vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:39_9: Aññattha pāḷiyā vattabbaṃ aññattha kathanañhi tantikkamaṃ vokkamitvā kathanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:39_10: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “tatheva vaṇṇituṃ yuttarūpaṃ hutvā anukkamena āgataṃ pāḷiṃ pariccajitvā
tika-vin07t:39_11: saṃvaṇṇanato sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu ayuttaṭṭhāne vaṇṇitaṃ yathāṭhāneyeva vaṇṇanato ca
tika-vin07t:39_12: vuttaṃ ‘tantikkamaṃ kañci avokkamitvā”’ti. Tasmā yathāvuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:39_13: Kathaṃ pana vitthāramaggassa saṅkhipane vinicchayo na hīyatīti? Āha “vinicchayaṃ
tika-vin07t:39_14: sabbamasesayitvā”ti. Saṅkhipantopi punappunaṃ vacanādimeva saṅkhipanto, vinicchayaṃ
tika-vin07t:39_15: pana aṭṭhakathāsu sabbāsupi vuttaṃ sabbampi asesayitvā, kiñcimattampi aparihāpetvāti
tika-vin07t:39_16: vuttaṃ hoti. Tantikkamaṃ kañci avokkamitvāti kañci pāḷikkamaṃ anatikkamitvā, anukkameneva
tika-vin07t:40_0: Suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthanti verañjakaṇḍādīsu āgatānaṃ jhānakathādīnaṃ suttantavacanānaṃ
tika-vin07t:40_1: sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu “suttantikānaṃ bhāro”ti vatvā avaṇṇitabbaṭṭhānaṃ atthaṃ taṃtaṃsuttānurūpaṃ
tika-vin07t:40_2: sabbaso paridīpayissāmāti adhippāyo. Hessatīti bhavissati, karīyissatīti vā attho.
tika-vin07t:40_3: Ettha ca paṭhamasmiṃ atthavikappe “bhāsantarapariccāgādikaṃ catubbidhaṃ kiccaṃ nipphādetvā
tika-vin07t:40_4: suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthaṃ paridīpayantī ayaṃ vaṇṇanā bhavissatī”ti vaṇṇanāvasena
tika-vin07t:40_5: samānakattukatā veditabbā. Pacchimasmiṃ atthavikappe pana “heṭṭhā vuttabhāsantarapariccāgādikaṃ
tika-vin07t:40_6: katvā suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthaṃ paridīpayantī ayaṃ vaṇṇanā amhehi karīyissatī”ti
tika-vin07t:43_0: Idāni saṃvaravinayapahānavinayādīsu bahūsu vinayesu attanā “taṃ vaṇṇayissaṃ vinaya”nti
tika-vin07t:43_1: evaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbabhāvena paṭiññātaṃ vinayaṃ dassento āha tatthātiādi. Tattha tatthāti
tika-vin07t:43_2: yathāvuttāsu gāthāsu. Tāva-saddo paṭhamanti imasmiṃ atthe daṭṭhabbo, tena paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin07t:43_3: vinayaṃ vavatthapetvā pacchā tassa vaṇṇanaṃ karissāmāti dīpeti. Vavatthapetabboti
tika-vin07t:43_4: niyametabbo. Tenetaṃ vuccatīti yasmā vavatthapetabbo, tena hetunā etaṃ vinayo nāmātiādikaṃ
tika-vin07t:43_5: niyāmakavacanaṃ vuccatīti attho. Assāti vinayassa. Mātikāti uddeso. So hi niddesapadānaṃ
tika-vin07t:44_0: Idāni saṃvaṇṇetabbamatthaṃ mātikaṃ paṭṭhapetvā dassento āha vuttaṃ yenātiādi. Idaṃ
tika-vin07t:44_1: vuttaṃ hoti – etaṃ tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatītiādinidānavacanapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
tika-vin07t:44_2: vinayapiṭakaṃ yena puggalena vuttaṃ, yasmiṃ kāle vuttaṃ, yasmā kāraṇā vuttaṃ, yena
tika-vin07t:44_3: dhāritaṃ, yena ca ābhataṃ, yesu patiṭṭhitaṃ, etaṃ yathāvuttavidhānaṃ vatvā tato tena
tika-vin07t:44_4: samayenātiādipāṭhassa atthaṃ anekappakārato dassento vinayassa atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmīti.
tika-vin07t:45_0: Ettha ca vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmāti idaṃ vacanaṃ tena samayena buddho bhagavātiādinidānavacanamattaṃ
tika-vin07t:45_1: apekkhitvā vattukāmopi visuṃ avatvā “nidānena ādikalyāṇaṃ, idamavocāti nigamanena
tika-vin07t:45_2: pariyosānakalyāṇa”nti vacanato nidānanigamanānipi satthudesanāya anuvidhānattā tadantogadhānevāti
tika-vin07t:45_3: nidānassāpi vinayapāḷiyaṃyeva antogadhattā vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmāti idampi vinayapiṭakasambandhaṃyeva
tika-vin07t:45_4: katvā mātikaṃ ṭhapeti. Mātikāya hi etanti vuttaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃyeva sāmaññato sabbattha
tika-vin07t:46_0: Idāni pana taṃ visuṃ nīharitvā dassento tattha vuttaṃ yenātiādimāha. Tatthāti tesu
tika-vin07t:46_1: mātikāpadesu. Idanti tena samayenātiādinidānavacanaṃ. Hi-saddo yasmāti attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin07t:46_2: yasmā buddhassa bhagavato attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hoti, tasmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Attapaccakkhavacanaṃ
tika-vin07t:46_3: na hotīti attanā paccakkhaṃ katvā vuttavacanaṃ na hoti. Atha vā attano paccakkhakāle
tika-vin07t:46_4: dharamānakāle vuttavacanaṃ na hoti. Tadubhayenāpi bhagavato vuttavacanaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-vin07t:48_0: Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cesāti ettha ca-saddo vattabbasampiṇḍanattho, upaññāsattho
tika-vin07t:48_1: vā, upaññāsoti ca vākyārambho vuccati. Esā hi ganthakārānaṃ pakati, yadidaṃ kiñci
tika-vin07t:48_2: vatvā puna aparaṃ vattumārabhantānaṃ ca-saddappayogo. Yathāpaccayaṃ tattha tattha
tika-vin07t:48_3: desitattā vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ sabhāgatthavasena saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ
tika-vin07t:48_4: saṅgīti, mahāvisayattā pūjanīyattā ca mahatī saṅgīti mahāsaṅgīti. Dutiyādiṃ upādāya
tika-vin07t:48_5: cesā “paṭhamamahāsaṅgītī”ti vuttā. Nidadāti desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ
tika-vin07t:49_0: Veneyyānaṃ maggaphaluppattihetubhūtāva kiriyā nippariyāyena buddhakiccanti āha “dhammacakkappavattanañhi
tika-vin07t:49_1: ādiṃ katvā”ti. Tattha satipaṭṭhānādidhammo eva pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ,
tika-vin07t:49_2: cakkanti vā āṇā, taṃ dhammato anapetattā dhammacakkaṃ, dhammena ñāyena cakkantipi
tika-vin07t:49_3: dhammacakkaṃ. Katabuddhakicceti niṭṭhitabuddhakicce bhagavati lokanātheti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:49_4: Kusinārāyanti samīpatthe etaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Upavattane mallānaṃ sālavaneti tassa
tika-vin07t:49_5: nagarassa upavattanabhūtaṃ mallarājūnaṃ sālavanuyyānaṃ dasseti. Tattha nagaraṃ pavisantā
tika-vin07t:49_6: uyyānato upecca vattanti gacchanti etenāti “upavattana”nti uyyānassa ca nagarassa
tika-vin07t:49_7: ca majjhe sālavanaṃ vuccati. Kusinārāya hi dakkhiṇapacchimadisāya taṃ uyyānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:49_8: tato uyyānato sālavanarājivirājito maggo pācīnābhimukho gantvā nagarassa dakkhiṇadvārābhimukho
tika-vin07t:49_9: uttarena nivatto, tena maggena manussā nagaraṃ pavisanti, tasmā taṃ “upavattana”nti
tika-vin07t:49_10: vuccati. Tattha kira upavattane aññamaññasaṃsaṭṭhaviṭapānaṃ sampannachāyānaṃ sālapantīnamantare
tika-vin07t:49_11: bhagavato parinibbānamañco paññatto, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yamakasālānamantare”ti.
tika-vin07t:49_12: Upādīyati kammakilesehīti upādi, vipākakkhandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. Tadeva kammakilesehi
tika-vin07t:49_13: sammā appahīnatāya seso, natthi ettha upādisesoti anupādisesā, nibbānadhātu, tāya.
tika-vin07t:49_14: Itthambhūtalakkhaṇe cāyaṃ karaṇaniddeso. Parinibbāneti nimittatthe bhummaṃ, parinibbānahetu
tika-vin07t:49_15: tasmiṃ ṭhāne sannipatitānanti attho. Saṅghassa thero jeṭṭho saṅghatthero. Ettha ca
tika-vin07t:49_17: yathā devadattassa garukulanti. Āyasmā mahākassapo dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin07t:50_0: Tathā ussāhaṃ jananassa kāraṇamāha sattāhaparinibbutetiādi. Satta ahāni samāhaṭāni
tika-vin07t:50_1: sattāhaṃ, sattāhaṃ parinibbutassa assāti sattāhaparinibbuto, sattāhaparinibbute subhaddena
tika-vin07t:50_2: vuḍḍhapabbajitena vuttavacanamanussarantoti sambandho. Alaṃ, āvusotiādinā tena vuttavacanaṃ
tika-vin07t:50_3: dasseti. Tattha alanti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. Tena mahāsamaṇenāti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:50_4: tato mahāsamaṇato suṭṭhu muttā mayanti attho, upaddutā ca homa tadāti adhippāyo,
tika-vin07t:50_5: homāti vā atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ, ahumhāti attho. Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjatīti
tika-vin07t:50_6: tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, hetu. Khoti avadhāraṇe, etaṃ kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:50_7: vijjateva, no na vijjatīti attho. Kiṃ taṃ kāraṇanti? Āha yaṃ pāpabhikkhūtiādi. Ettha
tika-vin07t:50_8: yanti nipātamattaṃ, kāraṇaniddeso vā, yena kāraṇena antaradhāpeyyuṃ, tadetaṃ kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:50_9: vijjatīti attho. Atīto atikkanto satthā ettha, etassāti vā atītasatthukaṃ, pāvacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:50_10: Padhānaṃ vacanaṃ pāvacanaṃ, dhammavinayanti vuttaṃ hoti. Pakkhaṃ labhitvāti alajjīpakkhaṃ
tika-vin07t:50_11: labhitvā. Na cirassevāti na cireneva. Yāva ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhatīti yattakaṃ kālaṃ
tika-vin07t:50_12: dhammo ca vinayo ca lajjīpuggalesu tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin07t:51_0: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatāti parinibbānamañce nipannena bhagavatā vuttanti attho. Desito
tika-vin07t:51_2: vinayassa ca atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā. Tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ asaṅkarato ṭhapanaṃ
tika-vin07t:51_3: paññāpanaṃ. So vo mamaccayena satthāti so dhammavinayo tumhākaṃ mamaccayena satthā
tika-vin07t:51_4: mayi parinibbute satthukiccaṃ sādhessati. Sāsananti pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhavasena
tika-vin07t:51_5: tividhaṃ sāsanaṃ, nippariyāyato pana sattattiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā. Addhaniyanti
tika-vin07t:51_6: addhānakkhamaṃ, tadeva ciraṭṭhitikaṃ assa bhaveyyāti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:52_0: Idāni sammāsambuddhena attano kataṃ anuggahavisesaṃ vibhāvento āha yañcāhaṃ bhagavatātiādi.
tika-vin07t:52_1: Tattha yañcāhanti etassa anuggahitoti etena sambandho. Tattha yanti yasmā, yena kāraṇenāti
tika-vin07t:52_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Kiriyāparāmasanaṃ vā etaṃ, tena anuggahitoti ettha anuggahaṇaṃ parāmasati.
tika-vin07t:52_3: Dhāressasītiādikaṃ bhagavatā mahākassapattherena saddhiṃ cīvaraparivattanaṃ kātukāmena
tika-vin07t:52_4: vuttavacanaṃ. Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ kassapāti “kassapa, tvaṃ imāni paribhogajiṇṇāni
tika-vin07t:52_5: paṃsukūlāni pārupituṃ sakkhissasī”ti vadati, tañca kho na kāyabalaṃ sandhāya, paṭipattipūraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:52_6: pana sandhāya evamāha. Sāṇāni paṃsukūlānīti matakaḷevaraṃ paliveṭhetvā chaḍḍitāni
tika-vin07t:52_7: tumbamatte kimayo papphoṭetvā gahitāni sāṇavākamayāni paṃsukūlacīvarāni. Rathikādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:52_8: yattha katthaci paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena tesu kūlamivāti paṃsukūlaṃ.
tika-vin07t:52_9: Atha vā paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlanti paṃsukūlasaddassa
tika-vin07t:52_10: attho daṭṭhabbo. Nibbasanānīti niṭṭhitavasanakiccāni, paribhogajiṇṇānīti attho. Ekameva
tika-vin07t:52_11: taṃ cīvaraṃ anekāvayavattā bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ. Sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti attanā samānaparibhogena,
tika-vin07t:52_12: sādhāraṇaparibhogena ca samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahitoti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:53_1: bhagavatā vuttaṃ kassapasaṃyutte āgataṃ pāḷiṃ peyyālamukhena ādiggahaṇena ca saṅkhipitvā
tika-vin07t:53_2: dassento āha ahaṃ, bhikkhavetiādi. Tattha yāvade ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmi,
tika-vin07t:53_3: yattakaṃ kālaṃ icchāmīti attho, “yāvadevā”tipi pāṭho. Navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāppabhedeti
tika-vin07t:53_4: ettha navānupubbavihāro nāma anupaṭipāṭiyā samāpajjitabbabhāvato evaṃsaññitā nirodhasamāpattiyā
tika-vin07t:53_5: saha aṭṭha rūpārūpasamāpattiyo. Chaḷabhiññā nāma āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ pañcābhiññāyo.
tika-vin07t:53_6: Attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenāti “ahaṃ yattakaṃ kālaṃ yattake samāpattivihāre abhiññāyo
tika-vin07t:53_7: ca vaḷañjemi, tathā kassapopī”ti evaṃ yathāvuttauttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṃ
tika-vin07t:53_8: katvā ṭhapanena, idañca uttarimanussadhammasāmaññena therassa pasaṃsāmattena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:53_9: na bhagavatā saddhiṃ sabbathā samatāya. Bhagavato hi guṇavisesaṃ upādāya sāvakā paccekabuddhā
tika-vin07t:53_10: ca kalampi kalabhāgampi na upenti, tassa kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissati aññatra dhammavinayasaṅgāyanāti
tika-vin07t:53_11: adhippāyo. Tattha tassāti tassa anuggahassa, tassa meti vā attho gahetabbo. Potthakesu
tika-vin07t:53_12: hi kesuci “tassa me”ti pāṭho dissati. Āṇaṇyaṃ aṇaṇabhāvo. Sakakavacaissariyānuppadānenāti
tika-vin07t:53_13: ettha cīvarassa nidassanavasena kavacasseva gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, samāpattiyā nidassanavasena issariyaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:54_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyā vibhāvento āha yathāhātiādi. Tattha ekamidāhanti ettha
tika-vin07t:54_1: idanti nipātamattaṃ. Ekaṃ samayanti ekasmiṃ samayeti attho. Pāvāyāti pāvānagarato.
tika-vin07t:54_3: Sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabbanti pañcasatikakkhandhake āgataṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin07t:55_0: Tato paranti subhaddakaṇḍato paraṃ. Sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabbanti
tika-vin07t:55_1: iminā “yaṃ na icchissāma, na taṃ karissāmā”ti etaṃ pariyantaṃ subhaddakaṇḍapāḷiṃ
tika-vin07t:55_2: dassetvā idāni avasesaṃ ussāhajananappakārappavattaṃ pāḷimeva dassento handa mayaṃ
tika-vin07t:55_3: āvusotiādimāha. Tattha pure adhammo dippatīti ettha “adhammo nāma dasakusalakammapathapaṭipakkhabhūto
tika-vin07t:55_5: pana dhammavinayānaṃ asaṅgāyanahetudosagaṇo sambhavati, so eva ettha adhammo dippati
tika-vin07t:55_6: tappaṭipakkho dhammo ca paṭibāhīyatīti vattabbaṃ. Api ca “adhammavādino balavanto
tika-vin07t:55_7: honti dhammavādino dubbalā hontī”ti vuccamānattā yena adhammena te subhaddavajjiputtakādayo
tika-vin07t:55_8: adhammavādino, yena ca dhammena itare dhammavādinova honti. Teyeva idha “adhammo”
tika-vin07t:55_9: “dhammo”ti ca vattabbā. Tasmā sīlavipattiādihetuko pāpicchatādidosagaṇo adhammo,
tika-vin07t:55_10: tappaṭipakkho sīlasampadādihetuko appicchatādiguṇasamūho dhammoti ca gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:55_11: Pure dippatīti api nāma dippati. Atha vā yāva adhammo dhammaṃ paṭibāhituṃ samattho
tika-vin07t:55_12: hoti, tato puretaramevāti attho. Dippatīti dippissati. Puresaddayogena hi anāgatatthe
tika-vin07t:55_13: ayaṃ vattamānappayogo, yathā purā vassati devoti. Avinayoti pahānavinayādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhūto avinayo.
tika-vin07t:56_0: Tena hīti uyyojanatthe nipāto. Sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapariyattidhareti sakalaṃ
tika-vin07t:56_1: suttageyyādinavaṅgaṃ ettha, etassa vā atthīti sakalanavaṅgaṃ, satthusāsanaṃ. Atthakāmena
tika-vin07t:56_3: piṭakāni vuccanti, taṃ sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanasaṅkhātaṃ pariyattiṃ dhārentīti sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapaayattidharā,
tika-vin07t:56_4: tādiseti attho. Samathabhāvanāsinehābhāvena sukkhā lūkhā asiniddhā vipassanā etesanti
tika-vin07t:56_6: tipiṭakaṃ, tadeva navaṅgādivasena anekabhedabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ pariyattippabhedaṃ dhārentīti
tika-vin07t:57_0: Kissa panāti kasmā pana. Sikkhatīti sekkho. Tamevāha “sakaraṇīyo”ti. Uparimaggattayakiccassa
tika-vin07t:57_1: apariyositattā sakiccoti attho. Assāti anena. Bahukārattāti bahupakārattā. Assāti
tika-vin07t:57_2: bhaveyya. Ativiya vissatthoti ativiya vissāsiko. Nanti ānandattheraṃ ovadatīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:57_3: Ānandattherassa kadāci asaññatāya navakāya saddhivihārikaparisāya janapadacārikācaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:57_4: tesañca saddhivihārikānaṃ ekakkhaṇe uppabbajjanañca paṭicca mahākassapatthero taṃ
tika-vin07t:57_5: niggaṇhanto evamāha “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti. Ettha ca vā-saddo padapūraṇo,
tika-vin07t:57_6: ayaṃ kumāro attano pamāṇaṃ na paṭijānātīti theraṃ tajjento āha. Tatrāti evaṃ sati.
tika-vin07t:58_0: Kiñcāpi sekkhoti idaṃ na sekkhānaṃ agatigamanasabbhāvena vuttaṃ, asekkhānaññeva pana
tika-vin07t:58_1: uccinitvā gahitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tasmā “kiñcāpi sekkho, tathāpi thero āyasmantampi
tika-vin07t:58_2: ānandaṃ uccinatū”ti evamettha sambandho veditabbo, na pana kiñcāpi sekkho, tathāpi
tika-vin07t:58_3: abhabbo agatiṃ gantunti yojetabbaṃ. Abhabbotiādi panassa sabhāvakathanaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin07t:58_4: chandāti chandena sinehena. Agatiṃ gantunti akattabbaṃ kātuṃ. Pariyattoti adhīto uggahito.
tika-vin07t:59_0: Rājagahaṃ kho mahāgocaranti ettha gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gunnaṃ gocaraṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:59_1: Gocaro viyāti gocaro, bhikkhācaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. So mahanto assāti mahāgocaraṃ, rājagahaṃ.
tika-vin07t:60_0: Sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesūti ettha saṃvegavatthuṃ kittetvā kittetvā sādhukaṃ eva
tika-vin07t:60_1: pūjāvasena kīḷanato sādhukīḷanaṃ. Upakaṭṭhāti āsannā. Vassaṃ upaneti upagacchati
tika-vin07t:61_0: Tatra sudanti tassaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ, sudanti nipātamattaṃ. Ussannadhātukanti upacitapittasemhādidhātukaṃ.
tika-vin07t:61_1: Samassāsetunti santappetuṃ. Dutiyadivaseti jetavanavihāraṃ paviṭṭhadivasato dutiyadivaseti
tika-vin07t:61_2: vadanti. Viriccati etenāti virecanaṃ. Osadhaparibhāvitaṃ khīrameva virecananti khīravirecanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:61_3: Yaṃ sandhāyāti yaṃ bhesajjapānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Bhesajjamattāti appamattakaṃ bhesajjaṃ.
tika-vin07t:61_4: Appattho hi ayaṃ mattā-saddo mattā sukhapariccāgātiādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t:62: Khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇanti ettha khaṇḍanti chinnaṃ, phullanti bhinnaṃ, tesaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ abhinavakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:63_0: Paricchedavasena vediyati dissatīti pariveṇaṃ. Tatthāti tesu vihāresu khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇanti
tika-vin07t:63_1: sambandho. Paṭhamaṃ māsanti vassānassa paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ, accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:63_2: Senāsanavattānaṃ bahūnaṃ paññattattā, senāsanakkhandhake senāsanapaṭibaddhānaṃ bahūnaṃ
tika-vin07t:64_1: Vassūpanāyikadivaseyeva te evaṃ cintesuṃ. Siriyā niketanamivāti siriyā nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:64_2: viya. Ekasmiṃ pānīyatitthe sannipatantā pakkhino viya sabbesaṃ janānaṃ cakkhūni maṇḍapeyeva
tika-vin07t:64_4: loke ramaṇīyabhāvaṃ, ramaṇaṃ arahatīti vā lokarāmaṇeyyakaṃ. Daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍanti
tika-vin07t:64_5: daṭṭhabbesu sāraṃ daṭṭhabbasāraṃ, tato vippasannanti daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍaṃ. Atha vā
tika-vin07t:64_6: daṭṭhabbo sārabhūto visiṭṭhataro maṇḍo maṇḍanaṃ alaṅkāro etassāti daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍo,
tika-vin07t:64_7: maṇḍapo. Maṇḍaṃ sūriyarasmiṃ pāti nivāretīti maṇḍapo. Vividhāni kusumadāmāni ceva
tika-vin07t:64_8: muttolambakāni ca viniggalantaṃ vamentaṃ nikkhāmentamiva cāru sobhanaṃ vitānaṃ etthāti
tika-vin07t:64_10: eva “ratanavicittamaṇikoṭṭimatalamivā”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca maṇiyo koṭṭetvā katatalaṃ
tika-vin07t:64_11: maṇikoṭṭimatalaṃ nāma, tamivāti vuttaṃ hoti. Āsanārahanti nisīdanārahaṃ. Dantakhacitanti dantehi khacitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:65: Āvajjesīti upanāmesi. Anupādāyāti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kañci dhammaṃ aggahetvā. Kathādosoti kathāya asaccaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-vin07t:66_0: Yathāvuḍḍhanti vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiṃ anatikkamitvā. Eketi majjhimabhāṇakānaṃyeva eke. Pubbe
tika-vin07t:66_1: vuttampi hi sabbaṃ majjhimabhāṇakā vadantiyevāti veditabbaṃ. Dīghabhāṇakā pana “padasāva
tika-vin07t:66_2: thero sannipātamāgato”ti vadanti. Tesu keci “ākāsenā”ti, “te sabbepi tathā tathā
tika-vin07t:66_3: āgatadivasānampi atthitāya ekamekaṃ gahetvā tathā tathā vadiṃsū”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:67_0: Kaṃ dhuraṃ katvāti kaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā. Bījaniṃ gahetvāti ettha bījanīgahaṇaṃ parisāya
tika-vin07t:67_2: āciṇṇanti veditabbaṃ. Teneva hi accantasaññatappattā buddhāpi sāvakāpi dhammakathikānaṃ
tika-vin07t:67_3: dhammatādassanatthameva cittabījaniṃ gaṇhanti. Paṭhamaṃ, āvuso upāli, pārājikaṃ kattha
tika-vin07t:67_4: paññattanti ettha kathaṃ saṅgītiyā pubbe paṭhamabhāvo siddhoti? Pātimokkhuddesānukkamādinā
tika-vin07t:67_5: pubbe paṭhamabhāvassa siddhattā. Yebhuyyena hi tīṇi piṭakāni bhagavato dharamānakāleyeva
tika-vin07t:67_6: iminā anukkamena sajjhāyitāni, teneva kamena pacchāpi saṅgītāni visesato vinayābhidhammapiṭakānīti
tika-vin07t:67_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kismiṃ vatthusminti nimittatthe bhummaṃ. Antarā ca, bhante, rājagahaṃ
tika-vin07t:67_8: antarā ca nāḷandanti rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca antarā, vivare majjheti attho. Antarā-saddena
tika-vin07t:67_9: pana yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ. Rājāgāraketi rañño kīḷanatthāya kate agārake.
tika-vin07t:67_10: Ambalaṭṭhikāyanti rañño evaṃnāmakaṃ uyyānaṃ. Kena saddhinti idha kasmā vuttanti?
tika-vin07t:67_11: Yasmā panetaṃ na bhagavatā eva vuttaṃ, raññāpi kiñci kiñci vuttamatthi, tasmā “kamārabbhā”ti
tika-vin07t:67_12: avatvā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vedehiputtenāti ayaṃ kosalarañño dhītāya putto,
tika-vin07t:67_13: na videharañño dhītāya. Yasmā mātā panassa paṇḍitā, tasmā sā vedena ñāṇena īhati
tika-vin07t:68_1: idāni tattha vavatthāpitesu dhammavinayesu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ ekavidhādibhede
tika-vin07t:68_2: dassetuṃ tadetaṃ sabbampītiādimāha. Tattha anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti ettha anāvaraṇañāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:68_4: vāti udānādivasena pavattadhammaṃ sandhāyāha. Vimuttirasanti arahattaphalassādaṃ,
tika-vin07t:68_5: vimuttisampattikaṃ vā aggaphalanipphādanato, vimuttikiccaṃ vā kilesānaṃ accantavimuttisampādanato.
tika-vin07t:68_6: Avasesaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhammoti ettha yadipi dhammo eva vinayopi pariyattiyādibhāvato,
tika-vin07t:68_7: tathāpi vinayasaddasannidhānena bhinnādhikaraṇabhāvena payutto dhamma-saddo vinayatantivirahitaṃ
tika-vin07t:69_0: Anekajātisaṃsāranti imissā gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – ahaṃ imassa attabhāvagehassa
tika-vin07t:69_1: kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ gavesanto yena ñāṇena taṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkā, taṃ bodhiñāṇaṃ anibbisaṃ
tika-vin07t:69_2: alabhanto eva abhinīhārato pabhuti ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhyaṃ imaṃ
tika-vin07t:69_3: saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ sandhāvissaṃ saṃsariṃ, yasmā jarābyādhimaraṇamissatāya jāti nāmesā
tika-vin07t:69_4: punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā, na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati, tasmā taṃ gavesanto
tika-vin07t:69_5: sandhāvissanti attho. Diṭṭhosīti idāni mayā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhantena diṭṭho
tika-vin07t:69_6: asi. Puna gehanti puna imaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ mama gehaṃ. Na kāhasīti na karissasi.
tika-vin07t:69_7: Kāraṇamāha sabbā tetiādi. Tava sabbā avasesakilesaphāsukā mayā bhaggā. Imassa tayā
tika-vin07t:69_8: katassa attabhāvagehassa avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ kūṭaṃ kaṇṇikamaṇḍalaṃ visaṅkhataṃ viddhaṃsitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:69_9: Visaṅkhāraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gataṃ mama cittaṃ. Ahañca taṇhānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t:69_10: arahattamaggaphalaṃ ajjhagā pattosmīti attho. Keci pana “visaṅkhāragataṃ cittameva
tika-vin07t:69_11: taṇhānaṃ khayaṃ ajjhagā”ti evampi atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin07t:70_0: Kecīti khandhakabhāṇakā. Pāṭipadadivaseti idaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannāti etena
tika-vin07t:70_1: sambandhitabbaṃ, na sabbaññubhāvappattassāti etena. Somanassamayañāṇenāti somanassasampayuttañāṇena.
tika-vin07t:70_2: Āmantayāmīti nivedayāmi, bodhemīti attho. Antareti antarāḷe, vemajjheti attho.
tika-vin07t:71_0: Suttantapiṭakanti yathā kammameva kammantaṃ, evaṃ suttameva suttantanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:71_1: Asaṅgītanti saṅgītikkhandhaka kathāvatthuppakaraṇādikaṃ. Soḷasahi vārehi upalakkhitattā
tika-vin07t:71_2: “soḷasa parivārā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi parivārapāḷiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattantiādinā
tika-vin07t:71_3: vuttaṃ. Paññattivāro kathāpattivāro vipattivāro saṅgahavāro samuṭṭhānavāro adhikaraṇavāro
tika-vin07t:71_4: samathavāro samuccayavāroti ime aṭṭha vārā, tadanantaraṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā
tika-vin07t:71_5: pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”nti evaṃ paccayamattavisesena puna vuttā teyeva aṭṭha vārā
tika-vin07t:71_6: cāti imesaṃ soḷasannaṃ vārānaṃ vasena bhikkhuvibhaṅgassa ca bhikkhunīvibhaṅgassa
tika-vin07t:71_7: ca pakāsitattā soḷasahi vārehi upalakkhito parivāro “soḷasaparivāro”ti vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:72_1: Saññamavelaṃ abhibhavitvā pavatto ācāro ajjhācāro, vītikkamo. Tenāti vividhanayattādihetunā.
tika-vin07t:73_0: Itaraṃ panāti suttaṃ. Attatthaparatthādibhedeti ettha ādi-saddena diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthe
tika-vin07t:73_1: lokiyalokuttarādiatthe ca saṅgaṇhāti. Veneyajjhāsayānulomena vuttattāti vinayaṃ viya
tika-vin07t:73_2: issarabhāvato āṇāpatiṭṭhāpanavasena adesetvā veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayānulomena caritānurūpaṃ
tika-vin07t:73_3: vuttattā. Anupubbasikkhādivasena adesetvā veneyyānaṃ kālantare abhinibbattiṃ dassento
tika-vin07t:73_4: āha “sassamiva phala”nti. Upāyasamaṅgīnaṃyeva nippajjanabhāvaṃ dassento “dhenu viya
tika-vin07t:73_5: khīra”nti āha. Na hi dhenuṃ visāṇādīsu, akāle vā avijātaṃ vā dohanto khīraṃ paṭilabhati.
tika-vin07t:74_0: Yanti yasmā. Etthāti abhidhamme. Abhidhammeti supinantena sukkavissaṭṭhiyā anāpattibhāvepi
tika-vin07t:74_3: Lakkhaṇīyattāti sañjānitabbattā. Yaṃ panettha avisiṭṭhanti ettha vinayapiṭakantiādīsu
tika-vin07t:74_4: tīsu saddesu yaṃ avisiṭṭhaṃ samānaṃ, taṃ piṭakasaddanti attho. Mā piṭakasampadānenāti
tika-vin07t:74_5: pāḷisampadānavasena mā gaṇhitthāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāvuttenāti evaṃ duvidhatthenātiādinā vuttappakārena.
tika-vin07t:75_0: Desanāsāsanakathābhedanti ettha desanābhedaṃ sāsanabhedaṃ kathābhedanti bhedasaddo
tika-vin07t:75_1: paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Bhedanti ca nānattanti attho. Tesūti piṭakesu. Sikkhā ca pahānāni
tika-vin07t:75_2: ca gambhīrabhāvo ca sikkhāpahānagambhīrabhāvo, tañca yathārahaṃ paridīpayeti attho.
tika-vin07t:75_3: Pariyattibhedanti pariyāpuṇanabhedaṃ vibhāvayeti sambandho. Yahiṃ yasmiṃ vinayādike
tika-vin07t:75_4: yaṃ sampattiñca vipattiñca yathā pāpuṇāti, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvayeti sambandho. Atha
tika-vin07t:75_5: vā yaṃ pariyattibhedaṃ sampattiṃ vipattiñca yahiṃ yathā pāpuṇāti, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvayeti
tika-vin07t:75_6: yojetabbaṃ. Paridīpanā vibhāvanā cāti heṭṭhā gāthāsu vuttassa anurūpato vuttaṃ, atthato pana ekameva.
tika-vin07t:76_0: Āṇārahenāti āṇaṃ paṇetuṃ arahatīti āṇāraho, bhagavā sammāsambuddhattā. So hi mahākāruṇikatāya
tika-vin07t:76_1: ca aviparītato desakabhāvena pamāṇavacanattā ca āṇaṃ paṇetuṃ arahati. Vohāraparamatthānampi
tika-vin07t:76_2: sambhavato āha “āṇābāhullato”ti. Ito paresupi eseva nayo. Paṭhamanti vinayapiṭakaṃ.
tika-vin07t:76_3: Pacurāparādhā seyyasakattherādayo. Te hi dosabāhullato “pacurāparādhā”ti vuttā. Pacuro
tika-vin07t:76_4: bahuko bahulo aparādho doso vītikkamo yesante pacurāparādhā. Anekajjhāsayātiādīsu
tika-vin07t:76_5: āsayova ajjhāsayo, so ca atthato diṭṭhi ñāṇañca. Cariyāti rāgacariyādikā cha mūlacariyā.
tika-vin07t:76_6: Atha vā cariyāti caritaṃ, taṃ sucaritaduccaritavasena duvidhaṃ. Adhimutti nāma sattānaṃ
tika-vin07t:76_7: pubbaparicayavasena abhiruci, sā duvidhā hīnapaṇītabhedena. Yathānulomanti ajjhāsayādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:77_0: Saṃvarāsaṃvaroti ettha khuddako mahanto ca saṃvaroti attho. Vuḍḍhiattho hettha a-kāro.
tika-vin07t:77_1: Diṭṭhiviniveṭhanāti diṭṭhiyā vimocanaṃ. Suttantapāḷiyaṃ vivicceva kāmehītiādinā samādhidesanābāhullato
tika-vin07t:77_3: kammakilesānaṃ vā yo kāyavacīdvārehi vītikkamo, tassa pahānaṃ. Anusayavasena santānamanuvattantā
tika-vin07t:77_4: kilesā pariyuṭṭhitāpi sīlabhedavasena vītikkamituṃ na labhantīti āha “vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā
tika-vin07t:77_5: sīlassā”ti. Pariyuṭṭhānappahānanti okāsadānavasena citte kusalappavattiṃ pariyādiyitvā
tika-vin07t:77_6: samuppattivasena ṭhānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ, tassa pahānaṃ. Anusayappahānanti ariyamaggena
tika-vin07t:77_7: appahīnabhāvena santāne kāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahā thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo satta kilesā
tika-vin07t:77_8: santāne anu anu sayanato anusayā nāma, tesaṃ pahānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:78_0: Tadaṅgappahānanti tena tena dānasīlādikusalaṅgena tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahānaṃ
tika-vin07t:78_1: tadaṅgappahānaṃ. Duccaritasaṃkilesassa pahānanti kāyavacīduccaritameva yattha uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:78_2: taṃ santānaṃ sammā kileseti upatāpetīti saṃkileso, tassa tadaṅgavasena pahānaṃ. Samādhissa
tika-vin07t:78_3: kāmacchandapaṭipakkhattā suttantapiṭake taṇhāsaṃkilesassa pahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Attādisuññasabhāvadhammappakāsanato
tika-vin07t:79_0: Ekamekasmiñcetthāti ettha etesu tīsu piṭakesu ekekasmiṃ piṭaketi attho. Dhammoti
tika-vin07t:79_1: pāḷīti ettha dhammassa sīlādivisiṭṭhatthayogato, buddhānaṃ sabhāvaniruttibhāvato
tika-vin07t:79_2: ca pakaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷi pantīti pāḷi, pariyattidhammo.
tika-vin07t:79_4: bhagavatā manasā vavatthāpito nāmapaññattippabandho pāḷidhammo nāma. Desanāya dhammassa
tika-vin07t:79_5: ca ko visesoti ce? Yathāvuttanayena manasā vavatthāpitadhammassa paresaṃ bodhanabhāvena
tika-vin07t:79_6: atisajjanā vācāya pakāsanā “desanā”ti veditabbā. Tenāha – “desanāti tassā manasā
tika-vin07t:79_7: vavatthāpitāya pāḷiyā desanā”ti. Tadubhayampi pana paramatthato saddo eva paramatthavinimuttāya
tika-vin07t:79_8: sammutiyā abhāvā. Imameva nayaṃ gahetvā keci ācariyā “dhammo ca desanā ca paramatthato
tika-vin07t:79_9: saddo evā”ti voharanti, tepi anupavajjāyeva. Yathā “kāmāvacarapaṭisandhivipākā parittārammaṇā”ti
tika-vin07t:79_10: vuccanti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi “kāmāvacarapaṭisandhivipākā nibbattitaparamatthavisayāyevā”ti
tika-vin07t:79_12: ārammaṇaṃ gahetvāpi samuppajjanato. Paramatthadhammamūlakattā panassa parikappassa
tika-vin07t:79_13: paramatthavisayatā sakkā paññapetuṃ, evamidhāpīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tīsupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhā
tika-vin07t:79_14: gambhīrāti sambandho. Ettha ca piṭakāvayavānaṃ dhammādīnaṃ vuccamāno gambhīrabhāvo
tika-vin07t:79_15: taṃsamudāyassa piṭakassāpi vutto yevāti daṭṭhabbo. Dukkhena ogayhanti, dukkho vā
tika-vin07t:79_16: ogāho ogāhanaṃ antopavisanametesūti dukkhogāhā. Etthāti etesu piṭakesu, niddhāraṇe
tika-vin07t:80_0: Hetuno phalaṃ hetuphalaṃ. Dhammābhilāpoti atthabyañjanako aviparītābhilāpo. Visayato
tika-vin07t:80_1: asammohato cāti lokiyalokuttarānaṃ yathākkamaṃ avabodhappakāradassanaṃ, etassa avabodhoti
tika-vin07t:80_2: iminā sambandho. Lokiyo hi dhammatthādiṃ ālambitvāva pavattanato visayato avabodhoti
tika-vin07t:80_3: vuccati. Lokuttaro pana nibbānārammaṇatāya taṃ anālambamānopi tabbisayamohaviddhaṃsanena
tika-vin07t:80_4: dhammādīsu pavattanato asammohato avabodhoti vuccati. Atthānurūpaṃ dhammesūti kāriyānurūpaṃ
tika-vin07t:80_5: kāraṇesūti attho. Paññattipathānurūpaṃ paññattīsūti chabbidhanāmapaññattiyā patho
tika-vin07t:81_0: Dhammajātanti kāraṇappabhedo kāraṇameva vā. Atthajātanti kāriyappabhedo, kāriyameva
tika-vin07t:81_1: vā. Yā cāyaṃ desanāti sambandho. Yo cetthāti etāsu dhammatthadesanāsu yo paṭivedhoti
tika-vin07t:82_0: Alagaddūpamāti ettha alagaddasaddena alagaddaggahaṇaṃ vuccati vīṇāvādanaṃ vīṇātiādīsu
tika-vin07t:82_1: viya, gahaṇañcettha yathā ḍaṃsati, tathā duggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, itaraggahaṇe virodhābhāvā.
tika-vin07t:82_2: Tasmā alagaddassa gahaṇaṃ upamā etissāti alagaddūpamā. Alagaddoti cettha āsiviso
tika-vin07t:82_3: vuccati. So hi alaṃ pariyatto, jīvitaharaṇasamattho vā visasaṅkhāto gado assāti “alaṃgado”ti
tika-vin07t:83_0: Vaṭṭato nissaraṇaṃ attho payojanaṃ etissāti nissaraṇatthā. Bhaṇḍāgāriko viyāti bhaṇḍāgāriko,
tika-vin07t:83_1: dhammaratanānupālako, tassa atthanirapekkhassa pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti. Duggahitānīti
tika-vin07t:83_2: duṭṭhu gahitāni. Tenāha “upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā”ti. Ettha ca upārambho nāma pariyattiṃ
tika-vin07t:83_3: nissāya paravambhanaṃ. Ādi-saddena itivādappamokkhalābhasakkārādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Yaṃ
tika-vin07t:83_4: sandhāyāti yaṃ pariyattiduggahaṇaṃ sandhāya. Vuttanti alagaddūpamasutte vuttaṃ. Tañcassa
tika-vin07t:83_5: atthaṃ nānubhontīti tañca assa dhammassa sīlaparipūraṇādisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ ete duggahitagāhino
tika-vin07t:84_0: Idāni tīsu piṭakesu yathārahaṃ sampattivipattiyo niddhāretvā dassento āha vinaye
tika-vin07t:84_1: panātiādi. Tattha tāsaṃyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ chaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidānaṃ vinaye pabhedavacanābhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:84_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Verañjakaṇḍe hi tisso vijjāva vibhattā. Dutiye tāsaṃyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:84_3: catasso paṭisambhidā apekkhitvā kataṃ tissannampi vijjānaṃ chasu abhiññāsu antopaviṭṭhattā.
tika-vin07t:84_4: Tāsañcāti ettha ca-saddena sesānampi tattha atthibhāvaṃ dīpeti. Abhidhammapiṭake
tika-vin07t:84_5: hi tisso vijjā cha abhiññā catasso paṭisambhidā ca vuttā eva. Paṭisambhidānaṃ tattheva
tika-vin07t:84_6: sammā vibhattabhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ tatthevāti avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ. Upādinnaphassoti maggena
tika-vin07t:84_7: maggapaṭipādanaphasso. Tesanti tesaṃ piṭakānaṃ. Etanti etaṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:85_0: Catuttiṃseva suttantāti gāthāya ayamatthayojanā – yassa nikāyassa suttagaṇanato catuttiṃseva
tika-vin07t:85_1: suttantā vaggasaṅgahavasena tayo vaggā yassa saṅgahassāti tivaggo saṅgaho, esa paṭhamo
tika-vin07t:85_2: nikāyo idha dīghanikāyoti. Anulomikoti apaccanīko, atthānulomanato anvatthanāmoti
tika-vin07t:85_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Ekanikāyampīti ekasamūhampi. Evaṃ cittanti evaṃ vicittaṃ. Yathayidanti
tika-vin07t:85_4: yathā ime. Poṇikacikkhallikā khattiyā, tesaṃ nivāso “poṇikanikāyo cikkhallikanikāyo”ti
tika-vin07t:85_5: vuccati. Pañcadasavaggapariggahoti pañcadasahi vaggehi pariggahito. Suttantānaṃ sahassāni
tika-vin07t:85_6: satta suttasatāni cāti pāṭhe suttantānaṃ sattasahassāni satta suttasatāni cāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:85_7: Katthaci pana “satta suttasahassāni, satta suttasatāni cā”ti pāṭho. Pubbe nidassitāti
tika-vin07t:86_0: Vedanti ñāṇaṃ. Tuṭṭhinti pītiṃ. Dhammakkhandhavasenāti dhammarāsivasena. Dvāsītisahassāni
tika-vin07t:86_1: buddhato gaṇhinti sambandho. Dve sahassāni bhikkhutoti dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin07t:86_2: santikā tehiyeva desitāni dve sahassāni gaṇhiṃ. Meti mama hadaye, iti ānandatthero
tika-vin07t:86_3: attānaṃ niddisati. Ye dhammā mama hadaye pavattino, te caturāsītisahassānīti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:86_4: Idañca bhagavato dharamānakāle uggahitadhammakkhandhavasena vuttaṃ, parinibbute pana
tika-vin07t:86_5: bhagavati ānandattherena desitānaṃ subhasutta gopakamoggallānasuttānaṃ, tatiyasaṅgītiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:87_0: Ekānusandhikaṃ suttanti satipaṭṭhānādi. Anekānusandhikanti parinibbānasuttādi. Tañhi
tika-vin07t:87_1: nānāṭhānesu nānādhammadesanānaṃ vasena pavattaṃ. Tikadukabhājanaṃ dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:87_2: nikkhepakaṇḍa aṭṭhakathākaṇḍavasena gahetabbaṃ. Cittavārabhājananti idaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍavasena
tika-vin07t:87_3: vuttaṃ. Atthi vatthūtiādīsu vatthu nāma sudinnakaṇḍādi. Mātikāti sikkhāpadaṃ. Antarāpattīti
tika-vin07t:87_4: sikkhāpadantaresu aññasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattā āpatti. Tikacchedoti tikapācittiyāditikaparicchedo.
tika-vin07t:87_5: Buddhavacanaṃ saṅgahitanti sambandho. Assāti buddhavacanassa. Saṅgītipariyosāne sādhukāraṃ
tika-vin07t:87_6: dadamānā viyāti sambandho. Accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttāni acchariyāni, pupphavassacelukkhepādīni.
tika-vin07t:87_7: Yā “pañcasatā”ti ca “therikā”ti ca pavuccati, ayaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāmāti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:91_0: Evaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassetvā yadatthaṃ sā idha dassitā, taṃ nigamanavasena dassento
tika-vin07t:91_1: imissātiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ ācariyaparamparāti tasmiṃ jambudīpe ayaṃ ācariyānaṃ paveṇī
tika-vin07t:91_3: jambusadiso sirimanto avhayo nāmaṃ yassa dīpassa, tasmiṃ jambudīpeti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:91_4: Mahantena hi jamburukkhena abhilakkhitattā dīpopi “jambū”ti vuccati. Acchijjamānaṃ
tika-vin07t:91_5: avinassamānaṃ katvā. Vinayavaṃsantiādīhi tīhi vinayapāḷiyeva kathitā pariyāyavacanattā
tika-vin07t:91_6: tesaṃ. Pakataññutanti veyyattiyaṃ, paṭubhāvanti vuttaṃ hoti. Dhuraggāhoti padhānaggāhī,
tika-vin07t:91_7: sabbesaṃ pāmokkho hutvā gaṇhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhikkhūnaṃ samudāyo samūho bhikkhusamudāyo.
tika-vin07t:92_0: Yadāti nibbāyiṃsūti sambandho. Jotayitvā ca sabbadhīti tameva saddhammaṃ sabbattha
tika-vin07t:92_1: pakāsayitvā. Jutimantoti paññājutiyā yuttā, tejavanto vā, mahānubhāvāti attho. Nibbāyiṃsūti
tika-vin07t:93_0: Athāti pacchā, yadā parinibbāyiṃsu, tato paranti attho. Kappati siṅgīloṇakappoti
tika-vin07t:93_1: ettha kappa-saddo vikappattho, tena siṅgīloṇavikappopi kappati. Idampi pakkhantaraṃ
tika-vin07t:93_2: kappatīti attho, evaṃ sabbattha. Tattha siṅgena loṇaṃ pariharitvā aloṇakapiṇḍapātena
tika-vin07t:93_3: saddhiṃ bhuñjituṃ kappati, sannidhiṃ na karotīti adhippāyo. Kappati dvaṅgulakappoti
tika-vin07t:93_4: dvaṅgulaṃ atikkantāya chāyāya vikāle bhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho. Kappati
tika-vin07t:93_6: kappatīti attho. Kappati āvāsakappoti ekasīmāya nānāsenāsanesu visuṃ visuṃ uposathādīni
tika-vin07t:93_7: saṅghakammāni kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti attho. Kappati anumatikappoti “anāgatānaṃ āgatakāle
tika-vin07t:93_8: anumatiṃ gahessāmā”ti tesu anāgatesuyeva vaggena saṅghena kammaṃ katvā pacchā anumatiṃ
tika-vin07t:93_9: gahetuṃ kappati, vaggakammaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo. Kappati āciṇṇakappoti ācariyupajjhāyehi
tika-vin07t:93_10: āciṇṇo kappatīti attho. So pana ekacco kappati dhammiko, ekacco na kappati adhammikoti
tika-vin07t:93_11: veditabbo. Kappati amathitakappoti yaṃ khīraṃ khīrabhāvaṃ vijahitaṃ dadhibhāvaṃ asampattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:93_12: taṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho. Kappati jaḷogiṃ
tika-vin07t:93_13: pātunti ettha jaḷogīti taruṇasurā, yaṃ majjasambhāraṃ ekato kataṃ majjabhāvamasampattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:93_14: taṃ pātuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. Jātarūparajatanti ettha sarasato vikāraṃ anāpajjitvā
tika-vin07t:93_15: sabbadā jātarūpameva hotīti jātaṃ rūpaṃ etassāti jātarūpaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ. Dhavalasabhāvatāya
tika-vin07t:93_16: rājatīti rajataṃ, rūpiyaṃ. Susunāgaputtoti susunāgassa putto. Kākaṇḍakaputtoti kākaṇḍakassa
tika-vin07t:93_17: brāhmaṇassa putto. Vajjīsūti janapadanāmattā bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin07t:94_0: Tadahuposatheti ettha tadahūti tasmiṃ ahani. Upavasanti etthāti uposatho, upavasantīti
tika-vin07t:94_1: ca sīlasamādānena vā anasanādinā vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho. Kaṃsapātinti suvaṇṇapātiṃ.
tika-vin07t:94_2: Māsakarūpanti māsako eva. Sabbaṃ tāva vattabbanti iminā sattasatikakkhandhake āgatā
tika-vin07t:94_3: sabbāpi pāḷi idha ānetvā vattabbāti dasseti. Saṅgāyitasadisameva saṅgāyiṃsūti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:95_0: Sā panāyaṃ saṅgītīti sambandho. Tesūti tesu saṅgītikārakesu theresu. Vissutā ete
tika-vin07t:95_1: saddhivihārikā ñeyyāti sambandho. Sāṇasambhūtoti sāṇadesavāsī sambhūtatthero. Dutiyo
tika-vin07t:96_0: Abbudanti upaddavaṃ vadanti. “Bhagavato vacanaṃ thenetvā attano vacanassa dīpanato
tika-vin07t:96_1: abbudanti corakamma”nti eke. Idanti vakkhamānanidassanaṃ. Sandissamānā mukhā sammukhā.
tika-vin07t:96_2: Bhāvitamagganti uppāditajjhānaṃ. Sādhu sappurisāti ettha sādhūti āyācanatthe nipāto,
tika-vin07t:96_3: taṃ yācāmīti attho. Haṭṭhapahaṭṭhoti punappunaṃ santuṭṭho. Udaggudaggoti sarīravikāruppādanapītivasena
tika-vin07t:96_4: udaggudaggo, pītimā hi puggalo kāyacittānaṃ uggatattā “udaggudaggo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:97_0: Tena kho pana samayenāti yasmiṃ samaye dutiyaṃ saṅgītiṃ akariṃsu, tasmiṃ samayeti
tika-vin07t:97_1: attho. Taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsūti taṃ vajjiputtakehi uppāditaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:97_2: vinicchinituṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsu nāgamiṃsu. No ahuvatthāti sambandho. Yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā
tika-vin07t:97_3: parinibbutāti sambandho. Kiṃ pana katvā therā parinibbutāti? Āha dutiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ
tika-vin07t:97_4: katvātiādi. Aniccatāvasanti aniccatādhīnataṃ. Jamminti lāmakaṃ. Durabhisambhavaṃ
tika-vin07t:97_5: anabhibhavanīyaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ aniccataṃ evaṃ ñatvāti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:100_0: Satta vassānīti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Aticchathāti atikkamitvā icchatha,
tika-vin07t:100_1: ito aññattha gantvā bhikkhaṃ pariyesathāti attho. Bhattavissaggakaraṇatthāyāti bhattassa
tika-vin07t:100_2: ajjhoharaṇakiccatthāya, bhuñjanatthāyāti attho. “Soḷasavasso”ti uddeso kathanaṃ assa
tika-vin07t:101_0: Tīsu vedesūtiādīsu iruvedayajuvedasāmavedasaṅkhātesu tīsu vedesu. Tayo eva kira vedā
tika-vin07t:101_1: aṭṭhakādīhi dhammikehi isīhi lokassa saggamaggavibhāvanatthāya katā. Teneva hi te
tika-vin07t:101_2: tehi vuccanti. Āthabbaṇavedo pana pacchā adhammikehi brāhmaṇehi pāṇavadhādiatthāya
tika-vin07t:101_3: kato. Purimesu ca tīsu vedesu teheva dhammikasākhāyo apanetvā yāgavadhādidīpikā adhammikasākhā
tika-vin07t:101_4: pakkhittāti veditabbā. Nighaṇḍūti rukkhādīnaṃ vevacanappakāsakaṃ pariyāyanāmānurūpaṃ
tika-vin07t:101_5: satthaṃ. Tañhi loke “nighaṇḍū”ti vuccati. Keṭubhanti kiṭati gameti kiriyādivibhāganti
tika-vin07t:101_6: keṭubhaṃ, kiriyākappavikappo kavīnaṃ upakārasatthaṃ. Ettha ca kiriyākappavikappoti
tika-vin07t:101_7: vacībhedādilakkhaṇā kiriyā kappīyati vikappīyati etenāti kiriyākappo, so pana vaṇṇapadabandhapadatthādivibhāgato
tika-vin07t:101_9: vuttaṃ. Saha nighaṇḍunā keṭubhena ca sanighaṇḍukeṭubhā, tayo vedā, tesu sanighaṇḍukeṭubhesu.
tika-vin07t:101_10: Ṭhānakaraṇādivibhāgato ca nibbacanavibhāgato ca akkharā pabhedīyanti etenāti akkharappabhedo,
tika-vin07t:101_11: sikkhā ca nirutti ca. Saha akkharappabhedenāti sākkharappabhedā, tesu sākkharappabhedesu.
tika-vin07t:101_12: Āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā “itiha āsa itiha āsā”ti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto porāṇakathāsaṅkhāto
tika-vin07t:101_13: itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā, tayo vedā, tesu itihāsapañcamesu.
tika-vin07t:102_0: Yassa cittantiādi pañhadvayaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ cuticittassa uppādakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:102_1: Tattha paṭhamapañhe uppajjatīti uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitāya uppajjati. Na nirujjhatīti
tika-vin07t:102_2: nirodhakkhaṇaṃ appattatāya na nirujjhati. Tassa cittanti tassa puggalassa taṃ cittaṃ
tika-vin07t:102_3: kiṃ nirujjhissati āyatiñca nuppajjissatīti pucchā, tassā ca vibhajjabyākaraṇīyatāya
tika-vin07t:102_4: evamettha vissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Arahato pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tassa cittaṃ
tika-vin07t:102_5: uppajjati, na nirujjhati, āyatiñca nuppajjissati, avassameva nirodhakkhaṇaṃ patvā
tika-vin07t:102_6: nirujjhissati, tato appaṭisandhikattā aññaṃ nuppajjissati. Ṭhapetvā pana pacchimacittasamaṅgiṃ
tika-vin07t:102_7: khīṇāsavaṃ itaresaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgicittaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitāya uppajjati bhaṅgaṃ
tika-vin07t:102_8: appattatāya na nirujjhati, bhaṅgaṃ pana patvā nirujjhissateva, aññaṃ pana tasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:102_9: vā aññasmiṃ vā attabhāve uppajjissati ceva nirujjhissati cāti. Yassa vā panātiādi
tika-vin07t:102_10: dutiyapañhe pana nirujjhissati nuppajjissatīti yassa cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitāya
tika-vin07t:102_11: bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ patvā nirujjhissati appaṭisandhikatāya nuppajjissati, tassa khīṇāsavassa
tika-vin07t:102_12: taṃ cittaṃ kiṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatīti pucchā, tassā ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyatāya “āmantā”ti
tika-vin07t:102_13: vissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Uddhaṃ vā adho vā harituṃ asakkontoti uparimapade vā heṭṭhimapadaṃ
tika-vin07t:102_14: heṭṭhimapade vā uparimapadaṃ atthato samannāharituṃ ghaṭetuṃ pubbenāparaṃ yojetvā
tika-vin07t:103_0: Sotāpannānaṃ sīlesu paripūrakāritāya samādinnasīlato natthi parihānīti āha “abhabbo
tika-vin07t:103_1: dāni sāsanato nivattitu”nti. Vaḍḍhetvāti uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā.
tika-vin07t:103_2: Dante punanti visodhenti etenāti dantaponaṃ vuccati dantakaṭṭhaṃ. Abhinavānaṃ āgantukānaṃ
tika-vin07t:103_3: lajjīsabhāvaṃ khantimettādiguṇasamaṅgitañca katipāhaṃ suṭṭhu vīmaṃsitvāva hatthakammādisampaṭicchanaṃ
tika-vin07t:103_4: saṅgahakaraṇañca yuttanti sāmaṇerassa ceva aññesañca bhikkhūnaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantānaṃ
tika-vin07t:103_5: ñāpanatthaṃ thero tassa bhabbarūpataṃ abhiññāya ñatvāpi puna sammajjanādiṃ akāsi.
tika-vin07t:103_6: “Tassa cittadamanattha”ntipi vadanti. Buddhavacanaṃ paṭṭhapesīti buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhāpetuṃ
tika-vin07t:103_8: tesaññeva anurūpanti āha “ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭaka”nti. Tassa citte ṭhapitampi buddhavacanaṃ
tika-vin07t:104_0: Ekarajjābhisekanti sakalajambudīpe ekādhipaccavasena kariyamānaṃ abhisekaṃ. Rājiddhiyoti
tika-vin07t:104_1: rājānubhāvānugatappabhāvā. Yatoti yato soḷasaghaṭato. Devatā eva divase divase āharantīti
tika-vin07t:104_2: sambandho. Devasikanti divase divase. Agadāmalakanti appakeneva sarīrasodhanādisamatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:104_4: kapparukkhato vā, tattha tādisā kapparukkhavisesā santi, tato vā āharantīti attho.
tika-vin07t:104_5: Asuttamayikanti suttehi abaddhaṃ dibbasumanapuppheheva kataṃ sumanapupphapaṭaṃ. Uṭṭhitassa
tika-vin07t:104_6: sālinoti sayaṃjātasālino, samudāyāpekkhañcettha ekavacanaṃ, sālīnanti attho. Nava
tika-vin07t:104_7: vāhasahassānīti ettha catasso muṭṭhiyo eko kuḍuvo, cattāro kuḍuvā eko pattho, cattāro
tika-vin07t:104_8: patthā eko āḷhako, cattāro āḷhakā ekaṃ doṇaṃ, cattāri doṇāni ekā mānikā, catasso
tika-vin07t:104_9: mānikā ekā khārī, vīsati khārikā eko vāho, tadeva “ekaṃ sakaṭa”nti suttanipātaṭṭhakathādīsu
tika-vin07t:104_10: vuttaṃ. Nitthusakaṇe karontīti thusakuṇḍakarahite karonti. Tena nimmitaṃ buddharūpaṃ
tika-vin07t:104_12: sadisatāya kataṃ. Vimalaketumālāti ettha ketumālā nāma sīsato nikkhamitvā uparimuddhani
tika-vin07t:105_0: Bāhirakapāsaṇḍanti bāhirakappaveditaṃ samayavādaṃ. Pariggaṇhīti vīmaṃsamāno pariggahesi.
tika-vin07t:105_1: Bhaddapīṭhakesūti vettamayapīṭhesu. Sāroti guṇasāro. Sīhapañjareti mahāvātapānasamīpe.
tika-vin07t:105_3: Khuraggeyevāti kesoropanāvasāne. Ativiya sobhatīti sambandho. Vāṇijako ahosīti madhuvāṇijako ahosi.
tika-vin07t:106_0: Pubbe va sannivāsenāti pubbe vā pubbajātiyaṃ vā sahavāsenāti attho. Paccuppannahitena
tika-vin07t:106_1: vāti vattamānabhave hitacaraṇena vā. Evaṃ imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi taṃ sinehasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t:106_2: pemaṃ jāyate. Kiṃ viyāti? Āha “uppalaṃ va yathodake”ti. Uppalaṃ vāti rassakato vā-saddo
tika-vin07t:106_3: avuttasampiṇḍanattho. Yathā-saddo upamāyaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā uppalañca sesañca
tika-vin07t:106_4: padumādi udake jāyamānaṃ dve kāraṇāni nissāya jāyati udakañceva kalalañca, evaṃ pemampīti.
tika-vin07t:107_0: Dhuvabhattānīti niccabhattāni. Vajjāvajjanti khuddakaṃ mahantañca vajjaṃ. Moggaliputtatissattherassa
tika-vin07t:107_1: bhāramakāsīti therassa mahānubhāvataṃ, tadā sāsanakiccassa nāyakabhāvena saṅghapariṇāyakatañca
tika-vin07t:107_2: rañño ñāpetuṃ saṅgho tassa bhāramakāsīti veditabbaṃ, na aññesaṃ ajānanatāya. Sāsanassa
tika-vin07t:107_3: dāyādoti sāsanassa abbhantaro ñātako homi na homīti attho. Ye sāsane pabbajituṃ puttadhītaro
tika-vin07t:107_4: pariccajanti, te buddhasāsane sālohitañātakā nāma honti, sakalasāsanadhāraṇe samatthānaṃ
tika-vin07t:107_5: attano orasaputtānaṃ pariccattattā na paccayamattadāyakāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya thero
tika-vin07t:107_6: “na kho, mahārāja, ettāvatā sāsanassa dāyādo hotī”ti āha. Kathañcarahīti ettha carahīti
tika-vin07t:107_7: nipāto akkhantiṃ dīpeti. Tissakumārassāti rañño ekamātukassa kaniṭṭhassa. Sakkhasīti
tika-vin07t:107_8: sakkhissasi. Sikkhāya patiṭṭhāpesunti pāṇātipātā veramaṇiādīsu vikālabhojanā veramaṇipariyosānāsu
tika-vin07t:107_9: chasu sikkhāsu pāṇātipātā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmītiādinā
tika-vin07t:107_10: samādānavasena sikkhāsammutidānānantaraṃ sikkhāya patiṭṭhāpesuṃ. Cha vassāni abhisekassa
tika-vin07t:108_0: Sabbaṃ theravādanti dve saṅgītiyo āruḷhā pāḷi. Sā hi mahāsaṅghikādibhinnaladdhikāhi
tika-vin07t:108_1: vivecetuṃ “theravādo”ti vuttā. Ayañhi vibhajjavādo mahākassapattherādīhi asaṅkarato
tika-vin07t:108_2: rakkhito ānīto cāti “theravādo”ti vuccati, “satheravāda”ntipi likhanti. Tattha “aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin07t:108_3: āgatatheravādasahitaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ tipiṭakasaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacana”nti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:109_0: Sabhāyanti nagaramajjhe vinicchayasālāyaṃ. Diṭṭhigatānīti diṭṭhiyova. Na kho panetaṃ
tika-vin07t:109_1: sakkā imesaṃ majjhe vasantena vūpasametunti tesañhi majjhe vasanto tesuyeva antogadhattā
tika-vin07t:109_2: ādeyyavacano na hoti, tasmā evaṃ cintesi. Ahogaṅgapabbatanti evaṃnāmakaṃ pabbataṃ.
tika-vin07t:109_3: “Adhogaṅgāpabbata”ntipi likhanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Pañcātapena tappentīti catūsu
tika-vin07t:109_4: ṭhānesu aggiṃ jāletvā majjhe ṭhatvā sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ ullokentā sūriyātapena tappenti.
tika-vin07t:109_5: Ādiccaṃ anuparivattantīti udayakālato pabhuti sūriyaṃ olokayamānā yāva atthaṅgamanā
tika-vin07t:109_6: sūriyābhimukhāva parivattanti. Vobhindissāmāti paggaṇhiṃsūti vināsessāmāti ussāhamakaṃsu.
tika-vin07t:110_0: Vissaṭṭhoti maraṇasaṅkārahito, nibbhayoti attho. Migavaṃ nikkhamitvāti araññe vicaritvā
tika-vin07t:110_1: migamāraṇakīḷā migavaṃ, taṃ uddissa nikkhamitvā migavadhatthaṃ nikkhamitvāti attho.
tika-vin07t:110_2: Ahināgādito visesanatthaṃ “hatthināgenā”ti vuttaṃ. Tassa passantassevāti anādare
tika-vin07t:110_3: sāmivacanaṃ, tasmiṃ passanteyevāti attho. Ākāse uppatitvāti ettha ayaṃ vikubbaniddhi
tika-vin07t:110_4: na hotīti gihissāpi imaṃ iddhiṃ dassesi adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā appaṭikkhittattā. Pakativaṇṇañhi
tika-vin07t:110_5: vijahitvā nāgavaṇṇādidassanaṃ vikubbaniddhi. Chaṇavesanti ussavavesaṃ. Padhānagharanti
tika-vin07t:110_6: bhāvanānuyogavasena vīriyārambhassa anurūpaṃ vivittasenāsanaṃ. Sopīti rañño bhāgineyyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:111_0: Kusalādhippāyoti manāpajjhāsayo. Dveḷhakajātoti saṃsayamāpanno. Ekekaṃ bhikkhusahassaparivāranti
tika-vin07t:111_1: ettha “gaṇhitvā āgacchathā”ti āṇākārena vuttepi therā bhikkhū sāsanahitattā gatā.
tika-vin07t:111_2: Kappiyasāsanañhetaṃ, na gihīnaṃ gihikammapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ. Thero nāgacchīti kiñcāpi
tika-vin07t:111_3: “rājā pakkosatī”ti vuttepi dhammakammatthāya āgantuṃ vaṭṭati, dvikkhattuṃ pana pesitepi
tika-vin07t:111_4: “ananurūpā yācanā”ti nāgato, “mahānubhāvo thero yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiko pamāṇabhūto”ti
tika-vin07t:111_5: rañño ceva ubhayapakkhikānañca attani bahumānuppādanavasena uddhaṃ kattabbakammasiddhiṃ
tika-vin07t:111_6: ākaṅkhanto asāruppavacanalesena nāgacchi. Ekato saṅghaṭitā nāvā nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ. Sāsanapaccatthikānaṃ
tika-vin07t:111_7: bahubhāvato āha “ārakkhaṃ saṃvidhāyā”ti. Yanti yasmā. Abbāhiṃsūti ākaḍḍhiṃsu. Bāhiratoti
tika-vin07t:111_8: uyyānassa bāhirato. Passantānaṃ atidukkarabhāvena upaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya “padesapathavīkampanaṃ
tika-vin07t:111_9: dukkara”nti āha. Adhiṭṭhāne panettha visuṃ dukkaratā nāma natthi.
tika-vin07t:112_0: Dīpakatittiroti sākuṇikehi samajātikānaṃ gahaṇatthāya posetvā sikkhetvā pāsaṭṭhāne
tika-vin07t:112_1: ṭhapanakatittiro. Na paṭicca kammaṃ phusatīti gāthāya yadi tava pāpakiriyāya mano
tika-vin07t:112_2: nappadussati, luddena taṃ nissāya katampi pāpakammaṃ taṃ na phusati. Pāpakiriyāya
tika-vin07t:112_3: hi appossukkassa nirālayassa bhadrassa sato tava taṃ pāpaṃ na upalimpati, tava cittaṃ
tika-vin07t:113_0: Kiṃ vadati sīlenāti kiṃvādī. Atha vā ko katamo vādo kiṃvādo, so etassa atthīti kiṃvādī.
tika-vin07t:113_1: Attānañca lokañca sassatoti vādo etesanti sassatavādino. Sattesu saṅkhāresu vā ekaccaṃ
tika-vin07t:113_2: sassatanti pavatto vādo ekaccasassato, tasmiṃ niyuttā ekaccasassatikā. “Anto, ananto,
tika-vin07t:113_3: antānanto, nevanto nānanto”ti evaṃ antānantaṃ ārabbha pavattā cattāro vādā antānantā,
tika-vin07t:113_4: tesu niyuttā antānantikā. Na marati na upacchijjatīti amarā, evantipi me no, tathātipi
tika-vin07t:113_5: me notiādinā pavattā diṭṭhi ceva vācā ca, tassā vikkhepo etesanti amarāvikkhepikā.
tika-vin07t:113_6: Atha vā amarā nāma macchajāti duggahā hoti, tassā amarāya viya vikkhepo etesanti
tika-vin07t:113_7: amarāvikkhepikā. Adhicca yadicchakaṃ yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā samuppanno attā
tika-vin07t:113_8: ca loko cāti vāde niyuttā adhiccasamuppannikā. Saññī attāti vādo yesante saññīvādā.
tika-vin07t:113_9: Evaṃ asaññīvādā nevasaññīnāsaññīvādāti etthāpi. “Kāyassa bhedā satto ucchijjatī”ti
tika-vin07t:113_10: evaṃ ucchedaṃ vadantīti ucchedavādā. Diṭṭhadhammoti paccakkho yathāsakaṃ attabhāvo,
tika-vin07t:113_11: tasmiṃyeva yathākāmaṃ pañcakāmaguṇaparibhogena nibbānaṃ dukkhūpasamaṃ vadantīti diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā.
tika-vin07t:113_12: Vibhajitvā vādo etassāti vibhajjavādī, bhagavā. Sabbaṃ ekarūpena avatvā yathādhammaṃ
tika-vin07t:113_13: vibhajitvā nijjaṭaṃ nigumbaṃ katvā yathā diṭṭhisandehādayo vigacchanti, sammutiparamatthā
tika-vin07t:113_14: ca dhammā asaṅkarā paṭibhanti, evaṃ ekantavibhajanasīloti vuttaṃ hoti. Parappavādaṃ
tika-vin07t:113_15: maddamānoti tasmiṃ kāle uppannaṃ, āyatiṃ uppajjanakañca sabbaṃ paravādaṃ kathāvatthumātikāvivaraṇamukhena
tika-vin07t:116_0: Kenābhatanti imaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjentena jambudīpe tāva yāva tatiyasaṅgīti, tāva dassetvā
tika-vin07t:116_1: idāni sīhaḷadīpe ācariyaparamparaṃ dassetuṃ tatiyasaṅgahato pana uddhantiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:116_2: Imaṃ dīpanti tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ. Tasmiṃ dīpe nisīditvā ācariyena aṭṭhakathāya katattā
tika-vin07t:116_3: “imaṃ dīpa”nti vuttaṃ. Kañci kālanti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ, kismiñci kāleti
tika-vin07t:116_4: attho. Porāṇāti sīhaḷadīpe sīhaḷaṭṭhakathākārakā. Bhaddanāmoti bhaddasālatthero.
tika-vin07t:116_5: Āguṃ pāpaṃ na karontīti nāgā. Vinayapiṭakaṃ vācayiṃsūti sambandho. Tambapaṇṇiyāti
tika-vin07t:116_6: bhummavacanaṃ. Nikāye pañcāti vinayābhidhammānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā tabbinimuttā pañca
tika-vin07t:116_7: nikāyā gahetabbā. Pakaraṇeti abhidhammapakaraṇe vācesunti yojanā. Tīṇi piṭakāni svāgatāni
tika-vin07t:116_9: candimā. Pupphanāmoti ettha mahāpadumatthero sumanatthero ca ñātabboti dvikkhattuṃ
tika-vin07t:117_1: vā vassaṃ. Harāpetvāti udakoghena harāpetvā. Chinnabhinnapaṭadharoti satthakena chinnaṃ
tika-vin07t:117_2: raṅgena bhinnaṃ paṭaṃ dhāraṇako. Bhaṇḍūti muṇḍako. Makkhaṃ asahamānoti therassa ānubhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:117_3: paṭicca attano uppannaṃ paresaṃ guṇamakkhanalakkhaṇaṃ makkhaṃ tathā pavattaṃ kodhaṃ
tika-vin07t:117_4: asahamāno. Asaniyo phalantīti gajjantā patanti. Me mama bhayabheravaṃ janetuṃ paṭibalo
tika-vin07t:117_5: na assa na bhaveyyāti yojanā. Aññadatthūti ekaṃsena. Kasmīragandhārāti kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhavāsino.
tika-vin07t:117_6: Isivātapaṭivātāti bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaracalanakāyacalanehi sañjanitavātehi parito samantato
tika-vin07t:117_7: bījayamānā ahesuṃ. Dhammacakkhunti heṭṭhāmaggattaye ñāṇaṃ. Anamataggiyanti anamataggasaṃyuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:117_8: Samadhikānīti sādhikāni. Pañca raṭṭhānīti pañca cinaraṭṭhāni. Vegasāti vegena. Samantato
tika-vin07t:117_9: rakkhaṃ ṭhapesīti tesaṃ appavesanatthāya adhiṭṭhānavasena rakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. Aḍḍhuḍḍhāni
tika-vin07t:117_10: sahassānīti aḍḍhena catutthāni aḍḍhuḍḍhāni, atirekapañcasatāni tīṇi sahassānīti attho.
tika-vin07t:117_11: Diyaḍḍhasahassanti aḍḍhena dutiyaṃ diyaḍḍhaṃ, atirekapañcasatikaṃ sahassanti attho.
tika-vin07t:118_0: Rājagahanagaraparivattakenāti rājagahanagaraṃ parivattetvā tato bahi taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:118_1: katvā gatamaggena, gamanena vā. Āropesīti paṭipādesi. Paḷināti ākāsaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
tika-vin07t:118_2: Naguttameti cetiyagirimāha. Puratoti pācīnadisābhāge. Puraseṭṭhassāti seṭṭhassa anurādhapurassa.
tika-vin07t:118_3: Silakūṭamhīti evaṃnāmake pabbatakūṭe. Sīhakumārassa puttoti ettha “kaliṅgarājadhītu
tika-vin07t:118_4: kucchismiṃ sīhassa jāto sīhakumāro”ti vadanti. Jeṭṭhamāsassa puṇṇamiyaṃ jeṭṭhanakkhattaṃ
tika-vin07t:118_5: vā mūlanakkhattaṃ vā hotīti āha “jeṭṭhamūlanakkhattaṃ nāma hotī”ti. Migānaṃ vānato
tika-vin07t:118_6: hiṃsanato bādhanato migavaṃ, migavijjhanakīḷā. Rohitamigarūpanti gokaṇṇamigavesaṃ.
tika-vin07t:118_7: Rathayaṭṭhippamāṇāti rathapatodappamāṇā. Ekā latāyaṭṭhi nāmāti ekā rajatamayā kañcanalatāya
tika-vin07t:118_8: paṭimaṇḍitattā evaṃ laddhanāmā. Pupphayaṭṭhiyaṃ nīlādīni pupphāni, sakuṇayaṭṭhiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:118_9: nānappakārā migapakkhino vicittakammakatā viya khāyantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Rājakakudhabhaṇḍānīti
tika-vin07t:118_10: rājārahauttamabhaṇḍāni. Saṅkhanti dakkhiṇāvaṭṭaṃ abhisekasaṅkhaṃ. Vaḍḍhamānanti alaṅkāracuṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:118_11: “nahānacuṇṇa”nti keci. Vaṭaṃsakanti kaṇṇapiḷandhanaṃ vaṭaṃsakanti vuttaṃ hoti. Nandiyāvaṭṭanti
tika-vin07t:118_12: nandiyāvaṭṭapupphākārena maṅgalatthaṃ suvaṇṇena kataṃ. Kaññanti khattiyakumāriṃ.
tika-vin07t:118_14: nāgabhavanasambhavaṃ. Vatthakoṭikanti vatthayugameva. Nāgamāhaṭanti nāgehi āhaṭaṃ.
tika-vin07t:118_15: Amatosadhanti evaṃnāmikā guḷikajāti. Amatasadisakiccattā evaṃ vuccati. Bhūmattharaṇasaṅkhepenāti
tika-vin07t:118_16: bhūmattharaṇākārena. Uppātapāṭhakāti nimittapāṭhakā. Alaṃ gacchāmāti “purassa accāsannattā
tika-vin07t:118_17: sāruppaṃ na hotī”ti paṭikkhipanto āha. Aḍḍhanavamānaṃ pāṇasahassānanti pañcasatādhikānaṃ
tika-vin07t:118_18: aṭṭhannaṃ pāṇasahassānaṃ. Appamādasuttanti aṅguttaranikāye mahāappamādasuttaṃ, rājovādasuttanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:119_0: Mahaccāti mahatā. Upasaṅkamantoti ativiya kilantarūpo hutvā upasaṅkamīti attho. Tumhe
tika-vin07t:119_1: jānanatthanti sambandho. Pañcapaṇṇāsāyāti ettha “catupaññāsāyāti vattabbaṃ. Evañhi
tika-vin07t:119_2: sati upari vuccamānaṃ dvāsaṭṭhi arahantoti vacanaṃ sametī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:119_3: Dasabhātikasamākulanti muṭasivassa puttehi devānaṃpiyatissādīhi dasahi bhātikehi
tika-vin07t:119_4: samākiṇṇaṃ. Ciradiṭṭho sammāsambuddhoti dhātuyo sandhāyāha. Sabbatāḷāvacareti sabbāni
tika-vin07t:119_5: turiyabhaṇḍāni, taṃsahacarite vā vādake. Upaṭṭhāpetvāti upahārakārāpanavasena sannipātetvā.
tika-vin07t:119_6: Vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāyāti pacchābhattaṃ. Pokkharavassanti pokkharapatte viya atemitukāmānaṃ
tika-vin07t:119_7: upari atemetvā pavattanakavassaṃ. Mahāvīroti satthuvohārena dhātu eva vuttā. Pacchimadisābhimukhova
tika-vin07t:119_8: hutvā apasakkantoti ettha puratthābhimukho ṭhitova piṭṭhito apasakkanena pacchimadisāya
tika-vin07t:120_0: Pajjarakenāti amanussasamuṭṭhāpitena pajjarakarogena. Devoti megho. Anuppavecchīti
tika-vin07t:120_1: vimucci. Vivādo hotīti ettha kiriyākālamapekkhitvā vattamānappayogo daṭṭhabbo. Evaṃ
tika-vin07t:120_2: īdisesu sabbattha. Tadetanti ṭhānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. “Channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ sambandhabhūtānaṃ
tika-vin07t:120_3: raṃsiyo cā”ti ajjhāharitabbaṃ, “channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ udakadhārā cā”ti evampettha sambandhaṃ
tika-vin07t:120_4: vadanti. Parinibbutepi bhagavati tassānubhāvena evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ ahosi evāti
tika-vin07t:120_5: dassetuṃ evaṃ acintiyātiādigāthamāha. Rakkhaṃ karontoti attanā upāyena palāpitānaṃ
tika-vin07t:120_6: yakkhānaṃ puna appavisanatthāya parittānaṃ karonto. Āvijjīti pariyāyi.
tika-vin07t:121_0: Rañño bhātāti rañño kaniṭṭhabhātā. Anuḷādevī nāma rañño jeṭṭhabhātu jāyā. Sarasaraṃsijālavissajjanakenāti
tika-vin07t:121_1: siniddhatāya rasavantaṃ ojavantaṃ raṃsijālaṃ vissajjentena. Ekadivasena agamāsīti
tika-vin07t:121_2: sambandho. Appesīti lekhasāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Udikkhatīti apekkhati pattheti. Bhāriyanti
tika-vin07t:121_3: garukaṃ, anatikkamanīyanti attho. Maṃ paṭimānetīti maṃ udikkhati. Kammāravaṇṇanti
tika-vin07t:121_5: ettha rañño idanti rajjaṃ, sakalajambudīpato uppajjanakaāyo ceva āṇādayo ca, tena
tika-vin07t:121_6: pūjemīti attho, na sakalapathavīpāsādādivatthunā tassa sattāhaṃ demītiādinā kālaparicchedaṃ
tika-vin07t:121_7: katvā dātuṃ ayuttattā. Evañhi dento tāvakālikaṃ deti nāma vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā
tika-vin07t:121_8: dānassa, pathavādivatthupariccāgena ca puna gahaṇassa ayuttattā. Niyamitakāle pana
tika-vin07t:121_9: āyādayo pariccattā evāti tato paraṃ apariccattattā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmā vuttanayenettha
tika-vin07t:121_10: ito parampi āyādidānavaseneva rajjadānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Pupphuḷakā hutvāti ketakīpārohaṅkurā
tika-vin07t:121_11: viya udakapupphuḷakākārā hutvā. Gavakkhajālasadisanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ, vātapānesu
tika-vin07t:121_12: jālākārena ṭhapitadārupaṭasadisanti attho, gavakkhena ca suttādimayajālena ca sadisanti vā attho.
tika-vin07t:122_0: Devadundubhiyoti ettha devoti megho, tassa acchasukkhatāya ākāsamiva khāyamānassa
tika-vin07t:122_1: animittagajjitaṃ devadundubhi nāma, yaṃ “ākāsadundubhī”tipi vadanti. Phaliṃsūti thaniṃsu.
tika-vin07t:122_2: Pabbatānaṃ naccehīti pathavīkampena ito cito ca bhamantānaṃ pabbatānaṃ naccehi. Vimhayajātā
tika-vin07t:122_4: attano attano sippakosallehi. Abhisekaṃ datvāti anotattadahodakena abhisekaṃ datvā.
tika-vin07t:123_0: Devatākulānīti mahābodhiṃ parivāretvā ṭhitanāgayakkhādidevatākulāni datvāti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:123_1: Gopakarājakammino tathā “taracchā”ti vadanti. Iminā parivārenāti sahatthe karaṇavacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:123_2: iminā parivārena sahāti attho. Tāmalittinti evaṃnāmakaṃ samuddatīre paṭṭanaṃ. Idamassa
tika-vin07t:123_3: tatiyanti suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitasākhābodhiyā rajjasampadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tato
tika-vin07t:123_4: pana pubbe ekavāraṃ rajjasampadānaṃ acchinnāya sākhāya mahābodhiyā eva kataṃ, tena
tika-vin07t:123_5: saddhiṃ catukkhattuṃ rājā rajjena pūjesi. Rajjena pūjitadivasesu kira sakaladīpato
tika-vin07t:124_1: apekkhitvā “paṭhamapāṭipadadivasa”nti vuttaṃ, idañca tasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe vohāraṃ
tika-vin07t:124_2: gahetvā vuttaṃ, idha pana puṇṇamito paṭṭhāya yāva aparā puṇṇamī, tāva eko māsoti
tika-vin07t:124_3: vohāro. Tasmā iminā vohārena “dutiyapāṭipadadivase”ti vattabbaṃ siyā kaṇhapakkhapāṭipadassa
tika-vin07t:124_4: idha paṭhamapāṭipadattā. Gacchati vatareti ettha areti khede. Samantāyojananti accantasaṃyoge
tika-vin07t:124_5: upayogavacanaṃ, yojanappamāṇe padese sabbatthāti attho. Supaṇṇarūpenāti mahābodhiṃ
tika-vin07t:124_6: balakkārena gahetvā nāgabhavanaṃ netukāmāni nāgarājakulāni iddhiyā gahitena garuḷarūpena
tika-vin07t:124_7: santāseti. Taṃ vibhūtiṃ passitvāti devatādīhi karīyamānaṃ pūjāmahattaṃ, mahābodhiyā
tika-vin07t:124_8: ca ānubhāvamahattaṃ disvā sayampi tathā pūjetukāmā theriṃ yācitvāti yojanā. Samuddasālavatthusminti
tika-vin07t:124_9: yasmiṃ padese ṭhatvā rājā samudde āgacchantaṃ bodhiṃ therānubhāvena addasa, yattha
tika-vin07t:124_10: ca pacchā samuddassa diṭṭhaṭṭhānanti pakāsetuṃ samuddasālaṃ nāma sālaṃ akaṃsu, tasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:124_11: samuddasālāya vatthubhūte padese. Therassāti mahāmahindattherassa. Pupphaagghiyānīti
tika-vin07t:124_12: kūṭāgārasadisāni pupphacetiyāni. Āgato vatareti ettha areti pamode. Aṭṭhahi amaccakulehi
tika-vin07t:124_13: aṭṭhahi brāhmaṇakulehi cāti soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi. Rajjaṃ vicāresīti rajjaṃ
tika-vin07t:124_16: vattabbe vibhattipariṇāmena “saha bodhipatiṭṭhānā”ti nissakkavacanaṃ kataṃ. Sati
tika-vin07t:124_17: hi sahasaddappayoge karaṇavacaneneva bhavitabbaṃ. Dassiṃsūti paññāyiṃsu. Mahāāsanaṭṭhāneti
tika-vin07t:124_18: pubbapasse mahāsilāsanena patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne. Pūjetvā vandīti āgāminaṃ mahācetiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:124_19: vandi. Purime pana mahāvihāraṭṭhāne pūjāmattasseva katattā anāgate saṅghassapi navakatā
tika-vin07t:124_20: avanditabbatā ca pakāsitāti veditabbā. Anāgate pana metteyyādibuddhā paccekabuddhā
tika-vin07t:124_21: ca buddhabhāvakkhaṇaṃ uddissa vanditabbāva sabhāvena visiṭṭhapuggalattāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:125_0: Mahāariṭṭhoti pañcapaññāsāya bhātukehi saddhiṃ cetiyagirimhi pabbajitaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin07t:125_1: vuttaṃ. Meghavaṇṇābhayaamaccassa pariveṇaṭṭhāneti meghavaṇṇaabhayassa rañño amaccena
tika-vin07t:125_2: kattabbassa pariveṇassa vatthubhūte ṭhāne. Maṅgalanimittabhāvena ākāse samuppanno
tika-vin07t:125_3: manoharasaddo ākāsassa ravo viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ākāsaṃ mahāviravaṃ ravī”ti. Na hi
tika-vin07t:125_4: ākāso nāma koci dhammo atthi, yo saddaṃ samuṭṭhāpeyya, ākāsagatautuvisesasamuṭṭhitova
tika-vin07t:125_5: so saddoti gahetabbo. Paṭhamakattikapavāraṇadivase…pe… vinayapiṭakaṃ pakāsesīti idaṃ
tika-vin07t:125_6: vinayaṃ vācetuṃ āraddhadivasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anusiṭṭhikarānanti anusāsanīkarānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:125_7: Rājinoti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ, devānaṃpiyatissarājānanti attho. Aññepīti mahindādīhi
tika-vin07t:125_8: aṭṭhasaṭṭhimahātherehi aññepi, tesaṃ sarūpaṃ dassento āha tesaṃ therānantiādi. Tattha
tika-vin07t:125_9: tesaṃ therānaṃ antevāsikāti mahindattherādīnaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhimahātherānaṃ ariṭṭhādayo
tika-vin07t:125_10: antevāsikā ca mahāariṭṭhattherassa antevāsikā tissadattakāḷasumanādayo cāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:125_11: Antevāsikānaṃ antevāsikāti ubhayattha vuttaantevāsikānaṃ antevāsikaparamparā cāti
tika-vin07t:125_12: attho. Pubbe vuttappakārāti mahindo iṭṭiyo uttiyotiādigāthāhi pakāsitā ācariyaparamparā.
tika-vin07t:126_0: Na paggharatīti na gaḷati, na pamussatīti attho. Satigatidhitimantesūti ettha satīti
tika-vin07t:126_1: uggahadhāraṇe sati. Gatīti saddatthavibhāgaggahaṇe ñāṇaṃ. Dhitīti uggahapariharaṇādīsu
tika-vin07t:126_2: vīriyaṃ. Kukkuccakesūti “kappati na kappatī”ti vīmaṃsakukkuccakārīsu. Mātāpituṭṭhāniyoti
tika-vin07t:126_3: vatvā tamevatthaṃ samatthetuṃ āha tadāyattāhītiādi. Vinayapariyattiṃ nissāyāti vinayapiṭakapariyāpuṇanaṃ
tika-vin07t:126_4: nissāya. Attano sīlakkhandho suguttoti lajjino vinayadhāraṇassa alajjiaññāṇatādīhi
tika-vin07t:126_5: chahi ākārehi āpattiyā anāpajjanato attano sīlakkhandho khaṇḍādidosavirahito sugutto
tika-vin07t:126_6: surakkhito hoti. Kukkuccapakatānanti kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya uppannena kukkuccena
tika-vin07t:126_7: pakatānaṃ upaddutānaṃ abhibhūtānaṃ yathāvinayaṃ kukkuccaṃ vinodetvā suddhante patiṭṭhāpanena
tika-vin07t:126_8: paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti. Vigato sārado bhayametassāti visārado. “Evaṃ kathentassa doso evaṃ
tika-vin07t:126_9: na doso”ti ñatvāva kathanato nibbhayova saṅghamajjhe voharati. Paccatthiketi attapaccatthike
tika-vin07t:126_10: ceva vajjiputtakādisāsanapaccatthike ca. Sahadhammenāti sakāraṇena vacanena sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin07t:126_11: dassetvā yathā te asaddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkonti, evaṃ suniggahitaṃ katvā
tika-vin07t:127_0: Vinayo saṃvaratthāyātiādīsu vinayapariyāpuṇanaṃ vinayo, vinayapaññatti vā kāyavacīdvārasaṃvaratthāya.
tika-vin07t:127_1: Avippaṭisāroti katākataṃ nissāya vippaṭisārābhāvo santāpābhāvo. Pāmojjaṃ taruṇapīti.
tika-vin07t:127_2: Pīti nāma balavapīti. Passaddhīti kāyacittapassaddhi. Yathābhūtañāṇadassananti sappaccayanāmarūpapariggaho.
tika-vin07t:127_3: Nibbidāti vipassanā. Virāgoti ariyamaggo. Vimuttīti aggaphalaṃ. Vimuttiñāṇadassananti
tika-vin07t:127_4: paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Anupādāti kañci dhammaṃ anupādiyitvā pariccajitvā. Parinibbānatthāyāti
tika-vin07t:127_5: paccavekkhaṇañāṇe anuppanne antarā parinibbānābhāvena taṃparinibbānatthāyāti paccayattena
tika-vin07t:127_6: vuttaṃ anantarādipaccayattā. Etadatthā kathāti ayaṃ vinayakathā nāma etassa anupādāparinibbānassa
tika-vin07t:127_7: atthāyāti attho. Mantanāti vinayamantanāyeva, bhikkhūnaṃ “evaṃ karissāma, evaṃ na
tika-vin07t:127_8: karissāmā”ti vinayapaṭibaddhamantanā. Upanisāti upanisīdati ettha phalanti upanisā,
tika-vin07t:127_9: kāraṇaṃ. Vinayo saṃvaratthāyātiādikāraṇaparamparāpi etadatthāti attho. Sotāvadhānanti
tika-vin07t:127_10: imissā paramparapaccayakathāya attānaṃ samanatthāya sotāvadhānaṃ, tampi etamatthaṃ.
tika-vin07t:127_11: Yadidanti nipāto. Yo ayaṃ catūhi upādānehi anupādiyitvā cittassa arahattamaggasaṅkhāto,
tika-vin07t:127_12: tapphalasaṅkhāto vā vimokkho, sopi etadatthāya anupādāparinibbānatthāya. Atha vā
tika-vin07t:127_13: yo ayaṃ kañci dhammaṃ anupādācittassa vimokkho vimuccanaṃ vigamo parinibbānaṃ etadatthā
tika-vin07t:127_14: kathāti evaṃ upasaṃharaṇavasena yojetumpi vaṭṭati maggaphalavimokkhassa pubbe vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:132_0: Seyyathidanti taṃ katamaṃ, taṃ kathanti vā attho. Aniyamaniddesavacananti attano
tika-vin07t:132_1: atthaṃ sarūpena niyametvā niddisatīti niyamaniddeso, na niyamaniddeso aniyamaniddeso.
tika-vin07t:132_2: Sova vuccate anenāti vacananti aniyamaniddesavacanaṃ. Tassāti tenātipadassa. Parivitakkoti
tika-vin07t:132_3: “katamesānaṃ kho buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”tiādinā
tika-vin07t:132_4: pavatto. Pubbe vā pacchā vāti tenātipadato heṭṭhā vuttapāṭhe vā upari vakkhamānapāṭhe
tika-vin07t:132_5: vāti attho. Atthato siddhenāti sāmatthiyato siddhena. Tatridaṃ mukhamattanidassananti
tika-vin07t:132_6: tassā yathāvuttayuttiyā paridīpane idaṃ upāyamattanidassanaṃ. Mukhaṃ dvāraṃ upāyoti hi atthato ekaṃ.
tika-vin07t:133_0: Samayasaddo dissatīti sambandho. Assāti samayasaddassa samavāyo atthoti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:133_1: Kālañca samayañca upādāyāti ettha kālo nāma upasaṅkamanassa yuttakālo, samayo nāma
tika-vin07t:133_2: sarīrabalādikāraṇasamavāyo, te upādāya paṭiccāti attho. Khaṇoti okāso. Buddhuppādādayo
tika-vin07t:133_3: hi maggabrahmacariyassa okāso. So eva samayo. Teneva “ekovā”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāsamayoti
tika-vin07t:133_4: mahāsamūho. Pavanasminti vanasaṇḍe. Samayopi kho te bhaddālīti ettha samayoti sikkhāpadāvilaṅghanassa
tika-vin07t:133_5: hetu, ko so? Attano vippaṭipattiyā bhagavato jānanaṃ, so samayasaṅkhāto hetu tassā
tika-vin07t:133_6: appaṭividdhoti attho. Bhagavātiādi tassa paṭivijjhanākāradassanaṃ. Uggahamānoti kiñci
tika-vin07t:133_7: kiñci uggahetuṃ samatthatāya uggahamāno, sumanaparibbājakassevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Samayaṃ
tika-vin07t:133_8: diṭṭhiṃ pavadanti etthāti samayappavādako, mallikāya ārāmo. Sveva tindukācīrasaṅkhātāya
tika-vin07t:133_9: timbarurukkhapantiyā parikkhittattā “tindukācīra”nti ca, ekāva nivāsā sālā etthāti
tika-vin07t:133_11: atthassa hitassa paṭilābhato. Mānābhisamayāti mānappahānā. Pīḷanaṭṭhoti pīḷanaṃ taṃsamaṅgino
tika-vin07t:133_12: hiṃsanaṃ, avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ, pīḷanameva attho pīḷanaṭṭho. Santāpoti dukkhadukkhatādivasena
