tika-vin07t:133_13: santāpanaṃ. Vipariṇāmoti jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā abhisametabbo
tika-vin07t:134_0: Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ jotakamattattā samayasaddassa atthuddhārepi saupasaggo abhisamayasaddo
tika-vin07t:134_1: uddhaṭo. Tattha saṅgamavasena paccayānaṃ phaluppādanaṃ paṭi ayanaṃ ekato pavatti
tika-vin07t:134_2: etthāti samayo, samavāyo. Vivaṭṭūpanissayasaṅgame sati enti ettha sattā pavattantīti
tika-vin07t:134_3: samayo, khaṇo. Sameti ettha saṅkhatadhammo, sayaṃ vā eti āgacchati vigacchati cāti
tika-vin07t:134_4: samayo, kālo. Samenti avayavā etasmiṃ, sayaṃ vā tesūti samayo, samūho. Paccayantarasaṅgame
tika-vin07t:134_5: eti āgacchati etasmā phalanti samayo, hetu. Saññāvasena vipallāsato dhammesu eti
tika-vin07t:134_6: abhinivisatīti samayo, diṭṭhi. Samīpaṃ ayanaṃ upagamanaṃ samayo, paṭilābho. Sammadeva
tika-vin07t:134_7: sahitānaṃ vācānaṃ ayanaṃ vigamoti samayo, pahānaṃ. Sammadeva, sahitānaṃ vā saccānaṃ
tika-vin07t:134_8: ayanaṃ jānananti samayo, paṭivedho. Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:135_0: Ettha ca samayasaddassa sāmaññena anekatthatā vuttā. Na hi ekasmiṃ atthavisese vattamāno
tika-vin07t:135_1: saddo tadaññepi vattati. Tasmā atthā viya taṃtaṃvācakā samayasaddāpi bhinnā evāti
tika-vin07t:136_0: Tattha tathāti tesu suttābhidhammesu upayogabhummavacanehi. Idhāti vinaye, aññathāti
tika-vin07t:136_1: karaṇavacanena. Accantamevāti nirantarameva. Bhāvo nāma kiriyā, kiriyāya kiriyantarūpalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:136_2: bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ, yathā udaye sati cande jāto rājaputtoti. Adhikaraṇañhītiādi
tika-vin07t:136_3: abhidhamme samayasaddo kālasamūhakhaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātesu pañcasu atthesu vattati,
tika-vin07t:136_4: na vinaye viya kāle eva, tesu ca kālasamūhatthā dve tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ
tika-vin07t:136_5: adhikaraṇabhāvena niddisituṃ yuttā. Khaṇasamavāyahetuatthā pana tayopi attano bhāvena
tika-vin07t:136_6: phassādīnaṃ bhāvassa upalakkhaṇabhāvena niddisituṃ yuttāti vibhāvanamukhena yathāvuttamatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:136_7: samatthetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha yasmiñhi kāle, dhammasamūhe vā samaye adhikaraṇabhūte
tika-vin07t:136_8: kusalaṃ uppannaṃ, tasmiññeva kāle, dhammasamūhe vā samaye phassādayo hontīti evaṃ
tika-vin07t:136_9: adhikaraṇatthayojanā, yasmiṃ pana khaṇe, samavāye hetumhi vā samaye sati vijjamāne
tika-vin07t:136_10: kusalaṃ uppannaṃ, tasmiññeva khaṇādimhi samayepi vijjamāne phassādayo hontīti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇatthayojanā ca veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:137: Hoti cetthāti ettha yathāvuttaatthavisaye saṅgahagāthā hoti. Aññatrāti suttābhidhammesu. Abhilāpamattabhedoti desanāvilāsato saddamatteneva bhedo, na atthato.
tika-vin07t:138_0: Avisesenāti sāmaññena. Iriyāpathotiādīsu iriyāya sabbadvārikakiriyāya patho pavattanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:138_1: tabbinimuttakammassa abhāvāti ṭhānādayo iriyāpatho, sova vihāro. Brahmabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtā
tika-vin07t:138_2: parahitacittādivasappavattito mettādayo brahmavihāro nāma. Tadavasesā pana mahaggatā
tika-vin07t:138_4: visuṃ gahitattā mettādayo idha asaṅgahitā. Ariyānameva vihāroti phalasamāpattiyo ariyavihāro nāma.
tika-vin07t:139_0: Rukkhādimūleyeva mūlasaddassa niruḷhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ aparena mūlasaddena visesetvā
tika-vin07t:140_0: Tattha siyāti tattha verañjāyantiādīsu padesu kassaci codanā siyāti attho. Ubhayathā
tika-vin07t:140_1: nidānakittanassa pana kiṃ payojananti? Āha gocaragāmanidassanatthantiādi. Tattha assāti bhagavato.
tika-vin07t:141_0: Kilamova kilamatho, attano attabhāvassa kilamatho attakilamatho, tassa anu anu yogo
tika-vin07t:141_1: punappunaṃ pavattanaṃ attakilamathānuyogo. Vatthukāmārammaṇe sukhe sampayogavasena
tika-vin07t:141_2: līnā yuttā, kāmataṇhā, taṃsahacarite kāme sukhe vā ārammaṇabhūte allīnā pavattatīti
tika-vin07t:141_3: kāmasukhallikā taṇhā, tassā kāmasukhallikāya anu anu yogo kāmasukhallikānuyogo. Loke
tika-vin07t:141_4: saṃvaḍḍhabhāvanti āmisopabhogena saṃvaḍḍhitabhāvaṃ. Uppajjamāno bahujanahitādiatthāyeva uppajjatīti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:142_0: Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatattā saṅghoti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento āha diṭṭhītiādi. Ettha
tika-vin07t:142_1: ca “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya, tathārūpāya
tika-vin07t:142_2: diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā. “Yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni…pe…
tika-vin07t:142_3: samādhisaṃvattanikāni, tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttānañca
tika-vin07t:142_4: sīlānaṃ sāmaññasaṅkhātena saṅghāto saṅghaṭito samaṇagaṇo, tenāti attho. “Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅghātasaṅghātenā”ti
tika-vin07t:142_5: vā pāṭhenettha bhavitabbaṃ, tassa diṭṭhisīlasāmaññabhūtena saṃhananena saṅghāto samaṇagaṇo,
tika-vin07t:142_6: tenāti attho. Evañhi pāṭhe saddato attho yuttataro hoti. Assāti mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa.
tika-vin07t:143_0: Brahmaṃ aṇatīti ettha brahma-saddena vedo vuccati, so mantabrahmakappavasena tividho.
tika-vin07t:143_1: Tattha iruvedādayo tayo vedā mantā, te ca padhānā, itare pana sannissitā, tena padhānasseva
tika-vin07t:143_2: gahaṇaṃ. Mante sajjhāyatīti iruvedādike mantasatthe sajjhāyatīti attho. Iruvedādayo
tika-vin07t:143_4: samaṇo”ti yathāvuttamatthadvayaṃ udāharaṇadvayena vibhāvetuṃ vuttañhetantiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:143_5: “Samitattā hi pāpānaṃ ‘samaṇo’ti pavuccatī”ti hi idaṃ vacanaṃ gahetvā “samitapāpattā
tika-vin07t:143_6: ‘samaṇo’ti vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ, bāhitapāpoti idaṃ pana aññasmiṃ gāthābandhe vuttavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:144_0: Gottavasenāti ettha gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ, go-saddena cettha abhidhānaṃ buddhi ca vuccati.
tika-vin07t:144_1: Kenaci pārijuññenāti ñātipārijuññādinā kenaci pārijuññena, parihāniyāti attho. Tato
tika-vin07t:144_2: paranti verañjāyantiādivacanaṃ. Itthambhūtākhyānatthe upayogavacananti itthaṃ imaṃ
tika-vin07t:144_3: pakāraṃ bhūto āpannoti itthambhūto, tassa ākhyānaṃ itthambhūtākhyānaṃ, soyevattho
tika-vin07t:144_4: itthambhūtākhyānattho. Atha vā “itthaṃ evaṃpakāro bhūto jāto”ti evaṃ kathanattho
tika-vin07t:144_5: itthambhūtākhyānattho, tasmiṃ upayogavacananti attho. Ettha ca abbhuggatoti ettha
tika-vin07t:144_7: tena yogato taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamanti idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ sāmiatthepi samāne
tika-vin07t:145_0: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā sādhu devadatto mātaramabhīti ettha abhisaddayogato itthambhūtākhyāne
tika-vin07t:145_1: upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ, evamidhāpi taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ abhi evaṃ kalyāṇo
tika-vin07t:145_2: kittisaddo uggatoti abhisaddayogato itthambhūtākhyāne upayogavacananti. Sādhu devadatto
tika-vin07t:145_3: mātaramabhīti ettha hi “devadatto mātaramabhi mātari visaye mātuyā vā sādhū”ti evaṃ
tika-vin07t:145_4: adhikaraṇatthe vā sāmiatthe vā bhummavacanassa sāmivacanassa vā pasaṅge itthambhūtākhyānatthajotakena
tika-vin07t:145_5: abhisaddena yoge upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ, yathā cettha devadatto mātuvisaye mātusambandhī
tika-vin07t:145_6: vā so vuttappakārappattoti ayamattho viññāyati, evamidhāpi bhoto gotamassa sambandhī
tika-vin07t:145_7: kittisaddo abbhuggato abhibhavitvā uggamanapakārappattoti ayamattho viññāyati. Tattha
tika-vin07t:145_8: hi devadattaggahaṇaṃ viya idha kittisaddaggahaṇaṃ, tattha mātaranti vacanaṃ viya
tika-vin07t:145_9: idha taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamanti vacanaṃ, tattha sādhusaddaggahaṇaṃ viya idha
tika-vin07t:145_10: uggatasaddaggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kittisaddoti kittibhūto saddo, na kevaloti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:145_11: visesitanti āha “kitti evā”ti. Tato kittīti thuti, tassā pakāsako saddo kittisaddoti
tika-vin07t:146_0: So bhagavāti ettha soti pasiddhiyaṃ, yo so samattiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese
tika-vin07t:146_1: bhañjitvā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ kampento anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
tika-vin07t:146_2: so loke atipākaṭoti “so bhagavā”ti vuttaṃ. Bhagavāti ca idaṃ satthu nāmakittanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:146_3: na guṇakittanaṃ. Parato pana bhagavāti guṇakittanameva. Iminā ca iminā cāti etena
tika-vin07t:146_4: arahantiādipadānaṃ paccekaṃ anekaguṇagaṇaṃ paṭicca pavattabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:147_0: Suvidūravidūreti dvīhi saddehi ativiya dūreti dasseti, suvidūratā eva hi vidūratā.
tika-vin07t:147_1: Savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattāti iminā paccekabuddhādīhi asādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato
tika-vin07t:147_2: arahattanti dasseti tesaṃ vāsanāya appahīnattā, vāsanā ca nāma nikkilesassāpi sakalañeyyānavabodhādidvārattayappayogaviguṇatāhetubhūto
tika-vin07t:147_3: kilesanihito ākāro ciranigaḷitapādānaṃ nigaḷamokkhepi saṅkucitatāgamanahetuko nigaḷanihito
tika-vin07t:147_4: ākāro viya. Yāya pilindavacchādīnaṃ vasalavohārādiviguṇatā hoti, ayaṃ vāsanāti gahetabbā.
tika-vin07t:147_5: Ārakāti ettha ākārassa rassattaṃ ka-kārassa ca ha-kāraṃ sānussaraṃ katvā niruttinayena
tika-vin07t:147_6: “araha”nti padasiddhi veditabbā. Evaṃ uparipi yathārahaṃ niruttinayena padasiddhi
tika-vin07t:147_7: veditabbā. Yañcetaṃ saṃsāracakkanti sambandho. Puññādīti ādi-saddena apuññābhisaṅkhāraāneñjābhisaṅkhāre
tika-vin07t:147_8: saṅgaṇhāti. Āsavā eva avijjādīnaṃ kāraṇattā samudayoti āha “āsavasamudayamayenā”ti.
tika-vin07t:147_9: “Āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti hi vuttaṃ. Vipākakaṭattārūpappabhedo tibhavo eva
tika-vin07t:150_0: Evaṃ vutto saṃsārova cakkaṃ viya paribbhamanato cakkaṃ, tassa cakkassa sabbe arā
tika-vin07t:150_1: hatāti sambandho. Anenāti bhagavatā. Bodhīti ñāṇaṃ, taṃ ettha maṇḍaṃ pasannaṃ jātanti
tika-vin07t:150_2: bodhimaṇḍo. Kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇapharasunti arahattamaggañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ chinditabbaṃ
tika-vin07t:151_0: Evaṃ katipayaṅgehi saṃsāracakkaṃ tadavasesaṅgehi phalabhūtanāmarūpadhammehi tibhavarathañca
tika-vin07t:151_1: tasmiṃ rathe yojitasaṃsāracakkārānaṃ hananappakārañca dassetvā idāni sabbehipi dvādasahi
tika-vin07t:151_2: paṭiccasamuppādaṅgehi rathavirahitameva kevalaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ, tassa araghātanappakārabhedañca
tika-vin07t:151_3: dassetuṃ athavātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha anamatagganti anu anu amataggaṃ, sabbathā anugacchantehipi
tika-vin07t:151_4: aviññātakoṭikanti attho. Avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyosānattāti idaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:151_5: dasannaṃ arabhāvena ekattaṃ samāropetvāti vuttaṃ. Na hi tesaṃ paccekaṃ avijjāmūlakatā
tika-vin07t:151_6: jarāmaraṇapariyosānatā ca atthi tathā paṭiccasamuppādapāḷiyaṃ avuttattā. Atha vā
tika-vin07t:151_7: tesampi yathārahaṃ atthato avijjāmūlakattaṃ, attano attano lakkhaṇabhūtakhaṇikajarāmaraṇavasena
tika-vin07t:151_8: tappariyosānatañca sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Evañca tesaṃ paccekaṃ arabhāvo siddho hoti.
tika-vin07t:152_0: Evaṃ sabbākāraṃ saṃsāracakkameva dassetvā idāni yena ñāṇena imassa saṃsāracakkassa
tika-vin07t:152_1: arānaṃ chedo bhagavato siddho, tassa dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇassa “paccayapariggahe paññā
tika-vin07t:152_2: dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti mātikā vuttattā bhavacakkāvayavesu avijjādīsu paccayapaccayuppannattā
tika-vin07t:152_3: pariggahavasena pavattiākāraṃ dassetvā parato tassa atthassa nigamanavasena vuttena
tika-vin07t:152_4: evamayaṃ avijjāhetūtiādikena paṭisambhidāpāḷisahitena pāṭhena sarūpato dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:152_5: tassa ca tesuyeva avijjādīsu catusaṅkhepādivasena pavattivibhāgañca dassetvā tato
tika-vin07t:152_6: paraṃ iti bhagavātiādipāṭhena bhagavato tena dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena paṭiccasamuppādassa
tika-vin07t:152_7: sabbākārato paṭividdhabhāvaṃ dassetvā puna iminā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇenātiādinā bhagavato
tika-vin07t:152_8: tena ñāṇena saṃsāracakkārānaṃ viddhaṃsitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ tattha dukkhādīsu aññāṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:152_9: avijjātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānanti cakkhusotamanāyatanānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ. Esa
tika-vin07t:152_10: nayo tiṇṇaṃ phassānantiādīsupi. Rūpataṇhādivasena cha taṇhākāyā eva veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:153_0: Saggasampattinti kāmasugatīsu sampattiṃ. Tathevāti kāmupādānapaccayā eva. Brahmalokasampattinti
tika-vin07t:153_2: bhavarāgopi kāmupādānamevāti āha “kāmupādānapaccayāyeva mettaṃ bhāvetī”ti. Sesupādānamūlikāsupīti
tika-vin07t:153_4: – idhekacco “natthi paraloko ucchijjati attā”ti diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, so diṭṭhupādānapaccayā
tika-vin07t:153_5: kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādinā, aparo “asukasmiṃ bhave attā ucchijjatī”ti diṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin07t:153_6: gahetvā kāmarūpārūpabhavūpapattiyā taṃ taṃ kusalaṃ karotītiādinā ca diṭṭhupādānamūlikā
tika-vin07t:153_7: yojanā, imināva nayena attavādupādānamūlikā yojanā veditabbā. Aparo “sīlena suddhi
tika-vin07t:153_9: kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādinā sabbabhavesu sīlabbatupādānamūlikā yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:154_0: Idāni yassa saṃsāracakkārānaṃ ghātanasamatthassa dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇassa avijjādipaccayapaaggahākāraṃ
tika-vin07t:154_1: dassetuṃ kāmabhave ca avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hotītiādinā avijjādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:154_2: paccayapaccayuppannabhāvo dassito, tameva ñāṇaṃ avijjādīsu pavattiākārena saddhiṃ
tika-vin07t:154_3: paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ ānetvā nigamanavasena dassento evamayantiādimāha. Visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:154_4: pana “idāni yvāyaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ dassentena kāmabhave avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-vin07t:154_5: paccayo hotītiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayabhāvo saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayuppannabhāvo dassito,
tika-vin07t:154_6: tameva paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ ānetvā nigamanavasena dassento evamayantiādimāhā”ti
tika-vin07t:154_7: vuttaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyā vinayaṭīkāyapi ayameva pāṭho likhito. Tattha ca kāmabhave
tika-vin07t:154_8: ca avijjātiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāvo saṃsāracakkaṃ dassentena vutto
tika-vin07t:154_9: na hoti tassa ca avijjā nābhi, mūlattātiādinā pubbeva dassitattā upari cakkarūpato
tika-vin07t:154_10: payogattena upasaṃhārābhāvā ca. “Api ca tameva paccayapaccayuppannabhāvaṃ nigamanavasena
tika-vin07t:154_11: dassento”ti ca vuttaṃ, na cettha paccayapaccayuppannabhāvo nigamanavasena padhānattena
tika-vin07t:154_12: dassito, atha kho paccayapariggahavasappavattaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇameva yathāvuttapaccayapariggahākārassa
tika-vin07t:154_13: nigamanavasena dassitaṃ. Tathā hi “evamayaṃ avijjā hetu, saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā,
tika-vin07t:154_14: ubhopete dhammā hetusamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ. Atītampi
tika-vin07t:154_15: addhānaṃ. Anāgatampi addhānaṃ avijjā hetu…pe… dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇameva
tika-vin07t:154_16: padhānattena dassitaṃ. “Avijjā hetu, saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā”tiādi pana paccayapariggahe
tika-vin07t:155_0: Ayañhettha attho – evanti anantare vuttanayena ayaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ hetu, saṅkhārā
tika-vin07t:155_1: ca tena hetunā samuppannā. Ubhopeteti yasmā ayaṃ avijjā paraparikappitapakatiissarādi
tika-vin07t:155_2: viya ahetukā niccā dhuvā na hoti, atha kho “āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti vacanato
tika-vin07t:155_3: sayampi sahetukā saṅkhatā aniccāyeva hoti, tasmā ubhopete avijjāsaṅkhārā hetusamuppannāyeva.
tika-vin07t:155_4: Itīti evaṃ yathāvuttanayena paccayapariggaṇhane yā paññā, taṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitisaṅkhāte
tika-vin07t:156_0: Ettha hi ñāṇassa visayavibhāvanavaseneva avijjādīnaṃ paccayādibhāvo vutto, na padhānattena,
tika-vin07t:156_1: ñāṇameva panettha padhānato vuttaṃ, tasmā etassa ñāṇassa paccayapariggahākāradassanatthameva
tika-vin07t:156_2: heṭṭhāpi kāmabhave ca avijjātiādinā avijjādīnaṃ paccayādibhāvo vutto, idhāpi nigamanavasena
tika-vin07t:156_3: upasaṃhaṭo, na bhavacakkadassanatthanti ayamettha attano mati.
tika-vin07t:157_0: Tattha ca paccayuppannadhammesu adiṭṭhesu hetūnaṃ paccayabhāvopi na sakkā daṭṭhunti
tika-vin07t:157_2: gahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ. Etena nayenāti avijjāyaṃ vuttanayena saṅkhārā hetu, viññāṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:158_0: Evaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiyā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇassa avijjādīsu pavattiākāraṃ dassetvā
tika-vin07t:158_1: idāni tassa tesu paccayesu aññehipi ākārehi pavattiākāraṃ dassetuṃ tatthātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:158_2: Tattha tatthāti tesu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu. Saṅkhippanti ettha avijjādayo hetusāmaññena
tika-vin07t:158_3: phalasāmaññena vāti saṅkhepo, saṅgaho, koṭṭhāso rāsīti attho. So pana jātito duvidhopi
tika-vin07t:158_4: kālabhedavasena catubbidho jāto. Paccuppanno addhāti anuvattati. Taṇhupādānabhavā
tika-vin07t:158_5: gahitā kilesakammasāmaññato tadavinābhāvato ca. Avijjādikilesavaṭṭampi vipākadhammadhammatāsarikkhatāya
tika-vin07t:158_6: idha kammavaṭṭamevāti āha ime pañca dhammātiādi. Vipākā dhammātiādīsu kammajaarūpakkhandhānameva
tika-vin07t:158_8: ca tabbahulatāya ca “vipākavaṭṭa”nti vuttaṃ. Vipākappadhānaṃ vaṭṭaṃ, vipākabahulaṃ
tika-vin07t:158_9: vā vaṭṭanti attho. Kammajapariyāyo vā ettha vipāka-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Jātijarāmaraṇāpadesenāti
tika-vin07t:158_10: paramatthadhammavinimuttajātijarāmaraṇaṃ nāma natthīti tadapadesena tesaṃ kathanena
tika-vin07t:158_11: taṃmukhenāti attho. Ākirīyanti pakāsīyantīti ākārā, avijjādisarūpā, tato paccayākāratoti
tika-vin07t:158_12: attho. Eko sandhīti avicchedappavattihetubhūto hetuphalasandhi, dutiyo phalahetusandhi,
tika-vin07t:159_0: Evaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇassa avijjādīsu anekehi pakārehi pavattiākāraṃ dassetvā idāni
tika-vin07t:159_1: tehi, avuttehi ca sabbehi ākārehi bhagavato paṭiccasamuppādassa paṭividdhabhāvaṃ,
tika-vin07t:159_2: tassa ca ñāṇassa dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇasaddappavattinimittataṃ paṭisambhidāpāḷinayena dassetuṃ
tika-vin07t:159_3: upasaṃhāravasena iti bhagavātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ, tenāha
tika-vin07t:159_4: catusaṅkhepantiādi. Sabbākāratoti idha kāmabhave ca avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-vin07t:159_5: paccayotiādinā idha vuttehi ca avuttehi ca paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgādīsu āgatehi sabbehi
tika-vin07t:159_6: pakārehi paṭivijjhati. Tanti yena ñāṇena bhagavā evaṃ jānāti, taṃ ñāṇaṃ. Ñātaṭṭhenāti
tika-vin07t:160_0: Idāni yamidaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ paccayapariggahākārabhedehi saddhiṃ papañcato dassitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:160_1: tasmiṃ araghāte etassa upayogitaṃ dassetuṃ iminā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇenātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:160_2: Tattha dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena are hanīti sambandho. Kathanti? Āha “te dhamme”tiādi. Te
tika-vin07t:160_3: avijjādike dhamme mahāvajirañāṇāvudhena tena dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā
tika-vin07t:160_4: tena balavavipassanāvudhena nibbindanto ariyamaggāvudhena virajjanto vimuccanto are
tika-vin07t:160_5: hanīti yojanā. Ariyamaggañāṇampi hi kiccato samudayasaccādibodhato “dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:161_0: Ekekaṃ dhammakkhandhaṃ ekekavihārena pūjemīti dhammakkhandhaṃ ārabbha pavattāpi vihārakaraṇapūjā
tika-vin07t:161_1: bhagavati pemeneva pavattattā sadhātukādicetiyapaṭimaṇḍitattā ca bhagavatova pūjāti
tika-vin07t:161_2: āha bhagavantaṃ uddissātiādi. Kilesārīna so munīti ettha niggahītalopo, kilesārīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:161_3: hatattāti attho. Paccayādīna cārahoti etthāpi niggahītalopo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:162_0: Sammāsambuddhoti ettha saṃ-saddo sayanti atthe pavattatīti āha “sāma”nti, aparaneyyo
tika-vin07t:162_1: hutvāti attho. Sabbadhammānanti idaṃ kassaci visayavisesassa aggahitattā siddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:162_2: Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati, yathā dikkhito na dadātīti.
tika-vin07t:162_3: Evañca katvā atthavisesānapekkhā kattariyeva buddha-saddasiddhi veditabbā kammavacanicchāya
tika-vin07t:162_4: abhāvato. “Sammā sāmaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho”ti ettakameva hi idha saddato labbhati.
tika-vin07t:162_5: Sabbadhammānanti idaṃ pana atthato labbhamānaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ, na hi bujjhanakiriyā
tika-vin07t:162_6: avisayā yujjati. Abhiññeyyeti lakkhaṇādito aniccādito ca abhivisiṭṭhena lokiyalokuttarañāṇena
tika-vin07t:162_7: jānitabbe catusaccadhamme. Pariññeyyeti aniccādivasena paricchinditvā jānitabbaṃ
tika-vin07t:162_8: dukkhaṃ ariyasaccamāha. Pahātabbeti samudayasaccaṃ. Sacchikātabbeti nirodhasaccaṃ.
tika-vin07t:162_9: Bahuvacananiddeso panettha sopādisesādikaṃ pariyāyasiddhaṃ bhedaṃ apekkhitvā kato.
tika-vin07t:163_1: gahaṇeneva tapphalānaṃ dukkhasaccanirodhasaccānampi siddhito pariññātabbañca pariññātaṃ
tika-vin07t:163_2: sacchikātabbañca sacchikatanti idampettha saṅgahitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tenāha “tasmā
tika-vin07t:163_3: buddhosmī”ti. Yasmā cattāripi saccāni mayā buddhāni, tasmā sabbampi ñeyyaṃ buddhosmi,
tika-vin07t:164_1: “mūlakāraṇabhāvenā”ti. Ubhinnanti cakkhussa taṃsamudayassa ca. Appavattīti appavattinimittaṃ,
tika-vin07t:164_2: na abhāvamattaṃ. Tassa avatthuttā sappaccayattādianekabhedā sabbasaṅgahitā. Nirodhappajānanāti
tika-vin07t:164_6: dassetuṃ “cha taṇhākāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ pana attabhāve sā uppajjati, tassa mūlakāraṇabhāvena
tika-vin07t:164_7: samuṭṭhāpikā purimabhavasiddhā taṇhā samudayasaccanti gahetabbā. Kasiṇānīti kasiṇārammaṇāni
tika-vin07t:164_8: jhānāni. Dvattiṃsākārāti kesādayo tadārammaṇajjhānāni ca. Nava bhavāti kāmabhavādayo
tika-vin07t:164_9: tayo saññībhavādayo tayo ekavokārabhavādayo tayo cāti nava bhavā. Cattāri jhānānīti
tika-vin07t:164_10: ārammaṇavisesaṃ anapekkhitvā sāmaññato cattāri jhānāni vuttāni. Vipākakiriyānampi
tika-vin07t:164_11: yathārahaṃ sabbattha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Ettha ca kusaladhammānaṃ upanissayabhūtā
tika-vin07t:164_12: taṇhāsamuṭṭhāpikāti veditabbā, kiriyadhammānaṃ pana tassa attabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtā
tika-vin07t:164_13: taṇhā. Anulomatoti ettha avijjā dukkhasaccaṃ, taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā āsavā samudayasaccanti
tika-vin07t:164_14: yojetabbaṃ. Saṅkhārādīsu pana avijjādayova samudayasaccabhāvena yojetabbā. Tenāti tasmā.
tika-vin07t:165_0: Vijjāti attano visayaṃ viditaṃ karotīti vijjā. Sampannattāti samannāgatattā, sampuṇṇattā
tika-vin07t:165_1: vā. Tatrāti ambaṭṭhasutte. Manomayiddhiyāti ettha “idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ
tika-vin07t:165_2: kāyaṃ abhinimminātī”ti vuttattā sarīrabbhantarajhānamanena aññassa sarīrassa nibbattivasena
tika-vin07t:165_3: pavattā manomayiddhi nāma, sā atthato jhānasampayuttā paññāyeva. Satta saddhammā
tika-vin07t:165_4: nāma saddhā hirī ottappaṃ bāhusaccaṃ vīriyaṃ sati paññā ca. Gacchati amataṃ disanti
tika-vin07t:165_5: dukkhanittharaṇatthikehi daṭṭhabbato amataṃ nibbānameva disaṃ gacchati, iminā ca
tika-vin07t:165_7: dasseti. Idānissā vijjācaraṇasampadāya sāvakādiasādhāraṇataṃ dassetuṃ tattha vijjāsampadātiādi
tika-vin07t:165_8: vuttaṃ. Tattha āsavakkhayavijjāvasena sabbaññutā sijjhati, caraṇadhammabhūtesu jhānesu
tika-vin07t:165_9: antogadhāya mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā vasena mahākāruṇikatā sijjhatīti āha “vijjā…pe…
tika-vin07t:165_10: mahākāruṇikata”nti. Yathā tanti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ, yathā aññopi vijjācaraṇasampanno
tika-vin07t:165_11: buddho niyojeti, tathā ayampīti attho. Tenāti anatthaparivajjanaatthaniyojanena.
tika-vin07t:165_12: Attantapādayoti ādi-saddena parantapaubhayantapā gahitā. Asajjamāno bhavesu apaccāgacchantoti
tika-vin07t:166_0: Tatrāti yuttavācābhāsane sādhetabbe cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Abhūtanti abhūtatthaṃ. Atacchanti
tika-vin07t:166_1: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Anatthasaṃhitanti pisuṇādidosayuttaṃ. Sammāgadattāti sundaravacanattā,
tika-vin07t:166_2: gadanaṃ gado, kathananti attho. Sundaro gado vacanamassāti “sugado”ti vattabbe niruttinayena
tika-vin07t:167_0: Sabhāvatoti dukkhasabhāvato. Lokanti khandhādilokaṃ. Yathāvuttamatthaṃ suttato āha
tika-vin07t:167_1: yatthātiādi. Tattha yatthāti yasmiṃ lokantasaṅkhāte nibbāne. Tanti lokassantaṃ, okāsaloke
tika-vin07t:167_2: kāyagamanena ñātabbaṃ pattabbanti nāhaṃ vadāmīti yojanā. Idañca rohitadevaputtena
tika-vin07t:167_3: lokassa kāyagativasena antagamanassa pucchitattā vuttaṃ. Appatvā lokassantanti khandhādilokaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:168_0: Kinte padasā okāsalokaparibbhamanena, parimitaṭṭhāne eva taṃ ñāṇagamanena gacchantānaṃ
tika-vin07t:168_1: dassemīti dassento api cātiādimāha. Tattha byāmamatte kaḷevareti sarīre. Tena rūpakkhandhaṃ
tika-vin07t:168_2: dasseti. Sasaññimhīti saññāsīsena vedanādayo tayo khandhe. Samanaketi viññāṇakkhandhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:168_3: Lokanti khandhādilokaṃ, dukkhanti attho. Lokanirodhanti nibbānena lokassa nirujjhanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:168_4: nibbānameva vā. Adesampi hi nibbānaṃ yesaṃ nirodhāya hoti, upacārato tannissitaṃ
tika-vin07t:168_5: viya hotīti “byāmamatte kaḷevare lokanirodhampi paññapemī”ti vuttaṃ, cakkhu loke
tika-vin07t:168_6: piyarūpaṃ, sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā nirujjhamānā nirujjhatītiādīsu viya. Kudācananti
tika-vin07t:168_7: kadācipi. Appatvāti aggamaggena anadhigantvā. Tasmāti yasmā taṃ gamanena pattuṃ na
tika-vin07t:168_8: sakkā, tasmā. Haveti nipātamattaṃ, ekaṃsatthe vā. Lokavidūti sabhāvādito khandhādijānanako.
tika-vin07t:168_9: Catusaccadhammānaṃ abhisamitattā samitāvī, samitakilesoti vā attho. Nāsīsati na pattheti appaṭisandhikattā.
tika-vin07t:169_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepato lokaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato taṃ dassetuṃ api ca tayo lokātiādi
tika-vin07t:169_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha indriyabaddhānaṃ khandhānaṃ samūhasantānabhūto sattaloko. So hi rūpādīsu
tika-vin07t:169_2: sattavisattatāya “satto”ti ca, lokiyanti ettha kammakilesā tabbipākā cāti “loko”ti
tika-vin07t:169_3: ca vuccati. Anindriyabaddhānaṃ utujarūpānaṃ samūhasantānabhūto okāsaloko. So hi sattasaṅkhārānaṃ
tika-vin07t:169_4: ādhārato “okāso”ti ca, lokiyanti ettha tassādhārā ca ādheyyabhūtāti “loko”ti ca pavuccati.
tika-vin07t:169_5: Indriyānindriyabaddhā pana sabbeva upādānakkhandhā paccayehi saṅkhataṭṭhena lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena
tika-vin07t:169_6: ca “saṅkhāraloko”ti ca vuccati. Āharati attano phalanti āhāro, paccayo. Tena tiṭṭhanasīlā
tika-vin07t:169_7: uppajjitvā yāva bhaṅgā pavattanasīlāti āhāraṭṭhitikā, sabbe saṅkhatadhammā. Sabbe
tika-vin07t:169_8: sattāti ca imināpi veneyyānurūpato puggalādhiṭṭhānattā desanāya saṅkhārāva gahitā.
tika-vin07t:170_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti pavattanti.
tika-vin07t:170_1: Virocanāti tesaṃ virocanahetu obhāsanahetūti hetumhi nissakkavacanaṃ. Disā bhantīti
tika-vin07t:170_2: sabbā disā yāvatā vigatandhakārā paññāyanti. Atha vā disāti upayogabahuvacanaṃ. Tasmā
tika-vin07t:170_3: virocamānā candimasūriyā yattakā disā bhanti obhāsentīti attho. Tāva sahassadhā lokoti
tika-vin07t:170_4: tattakena pamāṇena sahassappakāro okāsaloko, sahassacakkavāḷānīti attho. Etthāti
tika-vin07t:170_5: sahassacakkavāḷe. Vasoti iddhisaṅkhāto vaso vattatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:171_0: Tampīti tividhampi lokaṃ. Assāti anena bhagavatā saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā viditoti
tika-vin07t:171_1: sambandho. Eko lokoti yvāyaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbasaṅkhatānaṃ paccayāyattavuttito
tika-vin07t:171_2: tena sāmaññena saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho, esa nayo sesesupi. Sabbatthāpi lokiyadhammāva
tika-vin07t:171_3: lokoti adhippetā lokuttarānaṃ pariññeyyattābhāvā. Upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā
tika-vin07t:171_4: upādānakkhandhā. Satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyoti tathā tathā samuppannā pajāyeva vuccanti.
tika-vin07t:171_5: Nānattakāyā nānattasaññino, nānattakāyā ekattasaññino, ekattakāyā nānattasaññino,
tika-vin07t:171_6: ekattakāyā ekattasaññino, heṭṭhimā ca tayo āruppāti imā sattavidhā pajāyeva viññāṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:171_7: tiṭṭhati etthāti viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nāma. Tattha nānattaṃ kāyo etesamatthīti nānattakāyā.
tika-vin07t:171_8: Nānattaṃ saññā etesanti nānattasaññino. Saññāsīsenettha paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ gahitaṃ, esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-vin07t:172_0: Tattha sabbamanussā ca cha kāmāvacaradevā ca nānattakāyā nānattasaññino nāma. Tesañhi
tika-vin07t:172_1: aññamaññaṃ visadisatāya nānā kāyo, paṭisandhisaññā ca navavidhatāya nānā. Tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu
tika-vin07t:172_2: brahmakāyikā ceva catūsu apāyesu sattā ca nānattakāyā ekattasaññino nāma. Tesu hi
tika-vin07t:172_3: brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi sarīraṃ aññamaññaṃ visadisaṃ, paṭisandhisaññā pana
tika-vin07t:172_4: paṭhamajjhānavipākavasena ekāva, tathā āpāyikānampi, tesaṃ pana sabbesaṃ akusalavipākāhetukāva
tika-vin07t:172_5: paṭisandhisaññā. Dutiyajjhānabhūmikā ca parittābha appamāṇābha ābhassarā ekattakāyā
tika-vin07t:172_6: nānattasaññino nāma. Tesañhi sabbesaṃ ekappamāṇova kāyo, paṭisandhisaññā pana dutiyatatiyajjhānavipākavasena
tika-vin07t:172_7: nānā hoti. Tatiyajjhānabhūmiyaṃ parittasubhādayo tayo, catutthajjhānabhūmiyaṃ asaññasattavajjitā
tika-vin07t:172_8: vehapphalā, pañca ca suddhāvāsāti navasu bhūmīsu sattā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino nāma.
tika-vin07t:172_9: Ābhānānattena pana sabbattha kāyanānattaṃ na gayhati, saṇṭhānanānatteneva gayhatīti.
tika-vin07t:172_10: Asaññasattā viññāṇābhāvena viññāṇaṭṭhitisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchanti. Nevasaññā nāsaññāyatanaṃ
tika-vin07t:172_11: pana yathā saññāya, evaṃ viññāṇassāpi sukhumattā nevaviññāṇaṃ nāviññāṇaṃ, tasmā paribyattaviññāṇakiccavantesu
tika-vin07t:172_12: viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu na gayhati. Tasmā sesāni ākāsānañcāyatanādīni tīṇiyeva gahitāni,
tika-vin07t:172_13: tehi saddhiṃ imā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyoti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:173_0: Aṭṭha lokadhammāti lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṃsā sukhaṃ dukkhanti ime aṭṭha
tika-vin07t:173_1: lokassa sabhāvattā lokadhammā. Lābhālābhādipaccayā uppajjanakā panettha anurodhavirodhā
tika-vin07t:173_2: vā lābhādisaddehi vuttāti veditabbā. Nava sattāvāsāti heṭṭhā vuttā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo
tika-vin07t:173_3: eva asaññasattacatutthāruppehi saddhiṃ “nava sattāvāsā”ti vuccanti. Sattā āvasanti
tika-vin07t:173_4: etthāti sattāvāsā, sattanikāyo, atthato tathā pavattā pajā eva idha saṅkhāralokabhāvena
tika-vin07t:174_0: Ettha ca tīsu bhavesu assādadassanavasena tisso vedanāva lokabhāvena vuttā, tathā
tika-vin07t:174_1: paccayadassanavasena cattārova āhārā. Attaggāhanimittadassanavasena cha ajjhattikāneva
tika-vin07t:174_3: aṭṭha lokadhammā vā, thūlāyatanadassanavasena dasāyatanāneva lokabhāvena vuttāni.
tika-vin07t:174_4: Tesaṃ gahaṇeneva tannissayatappaṭibaddhā tadārammaṇā sabbe tebhūmakā nāmarūpadhammā
tika-vin07t:174_5: atthato gahitā eva honti. Sesehi pana ekavidhādikoṭṭhāsehi sarūpeneva te gahitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:175_0: Āsayaṃ jānātītiādīsu āhacca cittaṃ ettha setīti āsayo, aññasmiṃ visaye pavattitvāpi
tika-vin07t:175_1: cittaṃ yattha sarasena pavisitvā tiṭṭhati, so vaṭṭāsayo vivaṭṭāsayoti duvidho. Tattha
tika-vin07t:175_2: vaṭṭāsayopi sassatucchedadiṭṭhivasena duvidho. Vivaṭṭāsayo pana vipassanāsaṅkhātā
tika-vin07t:175_3: anulomikā khanti, maggasaṅkhātaṃ yathābhūtañāṇañcāti duvidho. Yathāha –
tika-vin07t:178_0: Etaṃ duvidhampi āsayaṃ sattānaṃ appavattikkhaṇeyeva bhagavā sabbathā jānāti. Anusayanti
tika-vin07t:178_2: vuttaṃ. Atha vā caritanti cariyā, te rāgādayo cha mūlacariyā, saṃsaggasannipātavasena
tika-vin07t:178_3: anekavidhā honti. Adhimuttinti ajjhāsayadhātuṃ, tattha tattha cittassa abhirucivasena
tika-vin07t:178_4: ninnatā, sā duvidhā hīnādhimutti paṇītādhimuttīti. Yāya dussīlādike hīnādhimuttike
tika-vin07t:178_5: sevanti, sā hīnādhimutti. Yāya paṇītādhimuttike sevanti, sā paṇītādhimutti. Taṃ duvidhampi
tika-vin07t:178_6: adhimuttiṃ bhagavā sabbākārato jānāti. Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ etesanti apparajakkhā, anussadarāgādidosā.
tika-vin07t:178_7: Ussadarāgādidosā mahārajakkhā. Upanissayabhūtehi tikkhehi saddhādiindriyehi mudukehi
tika-vin07t:178_8: ca samannāgatā tikkhindriyā mudindriyā ca. Heṭṭhā vuttehi āsayādīhi sundarehi asundarehi
tika-vin07t:178_9: ca samannāgatā svākārā dvākārā ca veditabbā. Sammattaniyāmaṃ viññāpetuṃ sukarā suviññāpayā,
tika-vin07t:178_10: viparītā duviññāpayā. Maggaphalapaṭivedhāya upanissayasampannā bhabbā, viparītā abhabbā.
tika-vin07t:179_0: Ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ…pe… paññāsañca yojanānīti ettha hotīti seso. Parikkhepato pamāṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:179_1: vuccatīti seso. Cakkavāḷassa sabbaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ chattiṃsa satasahassāni…pe… satāni
tika-vin07t:179_2: ca hontīti yojetabbaṃ. Tatthāti cakkavāḷe, dve satasahassāni cattāri nahutāni ca
tika-vin07t:179_3: yojanāni yāni ettakaṃ ettakappamāṇaṃ bahalattena ayaṃ vasundharā saṅkhātāti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:179_4: Tattha ettakanti kiriyāvisesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sandhārakaṃ jalaṃ ettakaṃ ettakappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:179_5: hutvā patiṭṭhitanti yojanā. Etthāti cakkavāḷe. Ajjhogāḷhuggatāti ajjhogāḷhā ca uggatā
tika-vin07t:179_6: ca. Brahāti mahantā. Yojanānaṃ satānucco, himavā pañcāti yojanānaṃ pañcasatāni ucco
tika-vin07t:179_8: Nagavhayāti rukkhābhidhānā jambūti yojanā. Samantatoti sabbasobhāgena, āyāmato ca
tika-vin07t:179_9: vitthārato ca satayojanavitthārāti attho. Yassānubhāvenāti yassā mahantatākappaṭṭhāyikādippakārena
tika-vin07t:179_10: pabhāvena. Parikkhipitvā taṃ sabbaṃ, lokadhātumayaṃ ṭhitoti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ sabbampi
tika-vin07t:179_11: taṃ parikkhipitvā cakkavāḷasiluccayo ṭhito, ayaṃ ekā lokadhātu nāmāti attho, ma-kāro
tika-vin07t:179_12: padasandhivasena vutto. Atha vā taṃ sabbaṃ lokadhātuṃ parikkhipitvā ayaṃ cakkavāḷasiluccayo ṭhitoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:180_0: Tatthāti tassaṃ lokadhātuyaṃ. Tāvatiṃsabhavananti tidasapuraṃ. Asurabhavananti asurapuraṃ.
tika-vin07t:180_1: Avīcimahānirayo ca tathā dasasahassayojano, so pana catunnaṃ lohabhittīnamantarā
tika-vin07t:180_2: yojanasatāyāmavitthāropi samantā soḷasahi ussadanirayehi saddhiṃ dasasahassayojano
tika-vin07t:180_3: vuttoti veditabbo. Tadanantaresūti tesaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antaresu. Lokānaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ
tika-vin07t:180_4: antare vivare bhavattā lokantarikā. Tiṇṇañhi sakaṭacakkānaṃ pattānaṃ vā āsannaṭṭhapitānaṃ
tika-vin07t:180_5: antarasadise tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antaresu ekeko lokantarikanirayo aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇo
tika-vin07t:180_6: sītanarako sattānaṃ akusalavipākena nibbattati. Anantānīti tiriyaṃ aṭṭhasu disāsu
tika-vin07t:180_7: cakkavāḷāni ākāso viya anantāni. Uddhaṃ pana adho ca antāneva. Anantena buddhañāṇenāti
tika-vin07t:181_0: Attanoti nissakke sāmivacanametaṃ, attatoti attho. Guṇehi attano visiṭṭhatarassāti
tika-vin07t:181_1: sambandho, taraggahaṇañcettha anuttaroti padassa atthaniddesavasena kataṃ, na visiṭṭhassa
tika-vin07t:181_2: kassaci atthitāya. Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi,
tika-vin07t:181_3: kuto sadiso, tenāha sīlaguṇenāpi asamotiādi. Tattha asamehi sammāsambuddhehi samo
tika-vin07t:181_4: asamasamo. Natthi paṭimā etassāti appaṭimo. Esa nayo sesesupi. Tattha upamāmattaṃ
tika-vin07t:181_5: paṭimā, sadisūpamā paṭibhāgo. Yugaggāhavasena ṭhito paṭimo puggaloti veditabbo. Attanāti
tika-vin07t:181_6: attato. Purisadammetiādīsu damitabbā dammā, “dammapurisā”ti vattabbe visesanassa
tika-vin07t:181_7: paranipātaṃ katvā “purisadammā”ti vuttaṃ, purisaggahaṇañcettha ukkaṭṭhavasena itthīnampi
tika-vin07t:181_8: dametabbato. Nibbisā katā dosavisassa vinodanena. Atthapadanti atthābhibyañjanakaṃ
tika-vin07t:181_9: padaṃ, vākyanti attho. Ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo
tika-vin07t:181_10: dassito hoti, tenāha bhagavā hītiādi. Aṭṭha disāti aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Asajjamānāti
tika-vin07t:182_0: Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha niyuttoti diṭṭhadhammiko, idhalokattho.
tika-vin07t:182_1: Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato samāgantabbato samparāyo, paraloko, tattha niyuttoti
tika-vin07t:182_2: samparāyiko, paralokattho. Paramo uttamo attho paramattho, nibbānaṃ. Saha atthena
tika-vin07t:182_3: vattatīti sattho, bhaṇḍamūlena vāṇijjāya desantaraṃ gacchanto janasamūho. So assa
tika-vin07t:182_4: atthīti satthā, satthavāhoti niruttinayena. So viya bhagavāti āha “satthā, bhagavā
tika-vin07t:182_5: satthavāho”ti. Idāni tamatthaṃ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṃ yathā satthavāhotiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:182_6: Tattha sattheti satthike jane. Kaṃ udakaṃ tārenti etthāti kantāro, nirudako araññappadeso.
tika-vin07t:182_7: Corādīhi adhiṭṭhitaaraññappadesāpi duggamanaṭṭhena taṃsadisatāya kantārātveva niruḷhāti
tika-vin07t:182_8: sāmaññato “kantāraṃ tāretī”ti vatvā taṃ vivaranto corakantārantiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:183_0: Bhagavatoti nissakke sāmivacanaṃ, bhagavantato dhammassavanenāti attho. Yathā “upajjhāyato
tika-vin07t:183_1: ajjhetī”ti, bhagavato santiketi vā attho. Sare nimittaṃ aggahesīti pubbabuddhuppādesu
tika-vin07t:183_2: saddhammassavanaparicayena “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti sare ākāraṃ gaṇhi. Pubbābhiyogavaseneva
tika-vin07t:183_3: hi īdisānaṃ tiracchānānaṃ dhammassavanādīsu pasādo uppajjati vagguliādīnaṃ viya.
tika-vin07t:183_4: Itarathā sabbatiracchānānampi tathā pasāduppattippasaṅgato. Yadi hi uppajjeyya, bhagavā
tika-vin07t:183_5: anantacakkavāḷesu sabbasattānampi ekakkhaṇe sappāṭihāriyadhammaṃ sāvetuṃ sakkotīti
tika-vin07t:183_6: sabbasattānampi ito pubbeva vimuttippasaṅgo siyā. Ye pana devamanussanāgasupaṇṇādayo
tika-vin07t:183_7: pakatiyāva kammassakataññāṇādiyuttā honti, teyeva pubbe anupanissayāpi bhagavato
tika-vin07t:183_8: saddhammassavanādinā paṭhamaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ pasādaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkonti, na itareti
tika-vin07t:183_9: gahetabbaṃ. Are ahampi nāmāti ettha “kutohaṃ idha nibbattoti oloketvā maṇḍūkabhāvatoti
tika-vin07t:183_10: ñatvā”ti idaṃ ettakampi are ahampi nāmāti vimhayavacaneneva sijjhatīti avuttanti
tika-vin07t:183_11: veditabbaṃ. Jalanti jalanto vijjotamāno. Maṇḍūkohanti gāthāya udaketi sañjātaṭṭhānadassanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:183_12: tena thalamaṇḍūkatā nivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti. Udake jātānampi kacchapādīnaṃ thalagocaratāpi
tika-vin07t:183_13: atthīti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “vārigocaro”ti vuttaṃ, udakasañcārīti attho.
tika-vin07t:184_0: Vimokkhantikañāṇavasenāti ettha sabbaso kilesehi vimuccatīti vimokkho, aggamaggo,
tika-vin07t:184_1: tassa anto, aggaphalaṃ, tattha bhavaṃ vimokkhantikaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ sabbampi
tika-vin07t:184_2: buddhañāṇaṃ. Idāni sammāsambuddhapadato buddhapadassa visesaṃ dassetuṃ yasmā vātiādi
tika-vin07t:184_3: vuttaṃ. Sammāsambuddhapadena hi satthu paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvo vutto, iminā pana buddhapadena
tika-vin07t:185_1: eva sabbasattehi uttamassa garuno gāravavasena vuccamānavacanamidaṃ bhagavāti. Seṭṭhanti
tika-vin07t:185_2: seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato. Atha vā vuccatīti vacanaṃ, attho, so
tika-vin07t:185_3: seṭṭhoti attho. Uttamanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Garugāravayuttoti ettha garubhāvo gāravaṃ,
tika-vin07t:185_4: garuguṇayogato garukaraṇaṃ vā gāravaṃ, tena sāvakādīnaṃ asādhāraṇatāya garubhūtena
tika-vin07t:185_5: mahantena gāravena yuttoti garugāravayutto. Atha vā garu ca sabbalokassa sikkhakattā
tika-vin07t:186_0: Avatthāya viditaṃ āvatthikaṃ. Evaṃ liṅgikaṃ. Nimittato āgataṃ nemittikaṃ. Adhicca
tika-vin07t:186_1: yaṃkiñci nimittaṃ adhivacanavasena anapekkhitvā pavattaṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ, tenāha
tika-vin07t:186_2: “vacanatthamanapekkhitvā”ti. Yadicchāya āgataṃ yādicchakaṃ. Ettha ca bāhiraṃ daṇḍādi
tika-vin07t:186_3: liṅgaṃ, abbhantaraṃ tevijjādi nimittaṃ. Pacurajanavisayaṃ vā dissamānaṃ liṅgaṃ, tabbiparītaṃ
tika-vin07t:186_4: nimittanti veditabbaṃ. Sacchikāpaññattīti sabbadhammānaṃ sacchikiriyānimittā paññatti.
tika-vin07t:186_5: Atha vā sacchikāpaññattīti paccakkhasiddhā paññatti. Yaṃguṇanimittā hi sā, te guṇā
tika-vin07t:186_6: satthu paccakkhabhūtāti guṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā eva nāma hoti, na paresaṃ, vohāramattenāti
tika-vin07t:186_7: adhippāyo. Yaṃguṇanemittikanti yehi guṇehi nimittabhūtehi etaṃ nāmaṃ nemittikañca
tika-vin07t:186_8: jātaṃ. Vadantīti dhammasenāpatissa garubhāvato bahuvacanenāha, saṅgītikārehi vā katamanuvādaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin07t:187_0: Issariyādibhedo bhago assa atthīti bhagī. Maggaphalādiariyaguṇaṃ araññādivivekaṭṭhānañca
tika-vin07t:187_1: bhaji sevi sīlenāti bhajī. Cīvarādipaccayānaṃ attharasādīnañca sīlādiguṇānañca bhāgī,
tika-vin07t:187_2: dāyādoti attho. Vibhaji uddesaniddesādippakārehi dhammaratanaṃ pavibhajīti vibhattavā.
tika-vin07t:187_3: Rāgādipāpadhammaṃ bhaggaṃ akāsīti bhagavāti vuccatīti sabbattha sambandho. Garupi
tika-vin07t:187_4: loke bhagavāti vuccatīti āha “garū”ti, yasmā garu, tasmāpi bhagavāti attho. Pāramitāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t:187_5: bhagyamassa atthīti bhagyavā. Bahūhi ñāyehīti kāyabhāvanādikehi anekehi bhāvanākkamehi.
tika-vin07t:187_6: Subhāvitattanoti paccatte etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, tena subhāvitasabhāvoti attho. Bhavānaṃ
tika-vin07t:187_7: antaṃ nibbānaṃ gatoti bhavantago. Tattha tattha bhagavāti saddasiddhi niruttinayeneva veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:188_0: Idāni bhagī bhajīti niddesagāthāya navahi padehi dassitamatthaṃ bhagyavāti gāthāya
tika-vin07t:188_1: chahi padehi saṅgahetvā padasiddhiṃ atthayojanānayabhedehi saddhiṃ dassetuṃ ayaṃ
tika-vin07t:188_2: pana aparo nayotiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha vaṇṇavipariyayoti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, teneva
tika-vin07t:188_3: vaṇṇavikāro vaṇṇalopo dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṃ tividhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin07t:188_4: Saddanayenāti saddalakkhaṇanayena. Pisodarādīnaṃ saddānaṃ ākatigaṇabhāvato vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:189_0: Lobhādayo cattāro dosā ekakavasena gahitā. Ahirikādayo dukavasena. Akkocchimantiādinā
tika-vin07t:189_1: punappunaṃ kujjhanavasena cittapariyonandhano kodhova upanāho. Paresaṃ pubbakāritālakkhaṇassa
tika-vin07t:189_2: guṇassa nipuñchano makkho nāma. Bahussutādīhi saddhiṃ yugaggāho attano samakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:189_3: palāso. Attano vijjamānadosapaṭicchādanā māyā. Avijjamānaguṇappakāsanaṃ sāṭheyyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:189_4: Garūsupi thaddhatā anonatatā thambho. Taduttarikaraṇalakkhaṇo sārambho. Jātiādiṃ
tika-vin07t:189_5: nissāya unnatilakkhaṇo māno. Abbhunnatilakkhaṇo atimāno. Jātiādiṃ nissāya majjanākārappatto
tika-vin07t:189_6: mānova mado nāma. So sattavīsatividho. Kāmaguṇesu cittassa vossaggo pamādo. Kāyaduccaritādīni
tika-vin07t:189_8: Teyeva kāyaduccaritādayo ca tividhavisamāni. Kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāsaññā tividhasaññā
tika-vin07t:189_9: nāma. Teyeva vitakkā. Taṇhādiṭṭhimānā papañcā. Subhasukhaniccaattavipariyesā catubbidhavipariyesā.
tika-vin07t:189_10: Chandādayo agati. Cīvarādīsu paccayesu lobhā cattāro taṇhupādā. Buddhadhammasaṅghasikkhāsu
tika-vin07t:189_11: kaṅkhā, sabrahmacārīsu kopo ca pañca cetokhīlā. Kāme kāye rūpe ca avītarāgatā, yāvadatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:189_12: bhuñjitvā seyyasukhādianuyogo, aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyacaraṇañca
tika-vin07t:189_14: cha vivādamūlāni. Rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā. Micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭhamaggaṅgapaṭipakkhā
tika-vin07t:189_15: micchattā. Taṇhaṃ paṭicca pariyesanā, pariyesanaṃ paṭicca lābho, lābhaṃ paṭicca vinicchayo,
tika-vin07t:189_16: taṃ paṭicca chandarāgo, taṃ paṭicca ajjhosānaṃ, taṃ paṭicca pariggaho, taṃ paṭicca
tika-vin07t:189_17: macchariyaṃ, taṃ paṭicca ārakkhā, ārakkhādhikaraṇaṃ daṇḍādānādianekākusalarāsīti
tika-vin07t:189_18: nava taṇhāmūlakā dhammā. Pāṇātipātādayo dasa akusalakammapathā. Cattāro sassatavādā
tika-vin07t:189_19: tathā ekaccasassatavādā antānantikā amarāvikkhepikā dve adhiccasamuppannikā soḷasa
tika-vin07t:189_20: saññīvādā aṭṭha asaññīvādā aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā satta ucchedavādā pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti
tika-vin07t:189_21: etāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni. Rūpataṇhādichataṇhā eva paccekaṃ kāmataṇhābhavataṇhāvibhavataṇhāvasena
tika-vin07t:189_22: aṭṭhārasa honti, tā ajjhattabahiddharūpādīsu pavattivasena chattiṃsa, puna kālattayavasena
tika-vin07t:189_23: aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritāni honti. Pabheda-saddaṃ paccekaṃ sambandhitvā lobhappabhedotiādinā
tika-vin07t:189_25: kilesānaṃ anekāni satasahassāni, ārammaṇādivibhāgato pavattiākāravibhāgato ca nesaṃ
tika-vin07t:189_26: evaṃ pabhedo veditabbo. Pañca māre abhañjīti sambandho. Parissayānanti upaddavānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:190_0: Evaṃ bhagyavā bhaggavāti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ vibhajitvā idāni tehi dvīhi gahitamatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:190_1: dassetuṃ bhagyavantatāya cassātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha satapuññajalakkhaṇadharassāti
tika-vin07t:190_3: paṭikkūlādīsu appaṭikkūlasaññitādivasappavattiyā ceva cetosamādhivasena ca attano
tika-vin07t:190_4: cittassa vasībhāvāpādanameva. Aṇimā laghimādikanti ādi-saddena mahimā patti pākammaṃ
tika-vin07t:190_5: īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti ime chapi saṅgahitā. Tattha kāyassa aṇubhāvakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:190_6: aṇimā. Ākāse padasā gamanādiarahabhāvena lahubhāvo laghimā. Kāyassa mahantatāpādanaṃ
tika-vin07t:190_7: mahimā. Iṭṭhadesassa pāpuṇanaṃ patti. Adhiṭṭhānādivasena icchitatthanipphādanaṃ pākammaṃ.
tika-vin07t:190_8: Sayaṃvasitā issarabhāvo īsitā. Iddhividhe vasībhāvo vasitā. Ākāsena vā gacchato,
tika-vin07t:190_9: aññaṃ vā kiñci karoto yattha katthaci vosānappatti yatthakāmāvasāyitā, “kumārakarūpādidassana”ntipi
tika-vin07t:190_10: vadanti. Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgasirīti sabbesaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ sobhā. Atthīti anuvattati.
tika-vin07t:190_11: Lahusādhanaṃ taṃ taṃ kālikaṃ icchitaṃ, garusādhanaṃ cirakālikaṃ buddhattādipatthitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:190_12: Bhagā assa santīti bhagavāti idaṃ saddasatthanayena siddhaṃ, sesaṃ sabbaṃ niruttinayena
tika-vin07t:191_1: paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Tattha attano sabhāvena pīḷanalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhaṃ. Tassa yo pīḷanameva
tika-vin07t:191_2: attho “pīḷanaṭṭho”ti vuccati, so sabhāvo. Yasmā pana taṃsamudayena saṅkhataṃ, tasmā
tika-vin07t:191_3: saṅkhataṭṭho samudayadassanena āvibhūto. Yasmā ca maggo kilesasantāpaharattā susītalo,
tika-vin07t:191_4: tasmāssa maggadassanena santāpaṭṭho āvibhūto tappaṭiyogattā. Avipariṇāmadhammassa
tika-vin07t:191_5: pana nirodhassa dassanena vipariṇāmaṭṭho āvibhūtoti. Ekasseva sabhāvadhammassa sakabhāvato
tika-vin07t:191_6: itarasaccattayanivattito ca parikappetabbattā cattāro atthā vuttā. Samudayassa pana
tika-vin07t:191_7: rāsikaraṇato āyūhanaṭṭho sabhāvo, tasseva dukkhadassanena nidānaṭṭho āvibhūto. Visaṃyogabhūtassa
tika-vin07t:191_8: nirodhassa dassanena saṃyogaṭṭho. Niyyānabhūtassa maggassa dassanena palibodhaṭṭho āvibhūto.
tika-vin07t:192_0: Nirodhassa pana nissaraṇaṭṭho sabhāvo, tasseva samudayadassanena vivekaṭṭho āvibhūto.
tika-vin07t:192_1: Saṅkhatassa maggassa dassanena asaṅkhataṭṭho, visayabhūtassa maraṇadhammassa vā dukkhassa
tika-vin07t:192_2: dassanena amataṭṭho. Maggassa pana niyyānaṭṭho sabhāvo, tasseva samudayadassanena
tika-vin07t:192_3: dukkhassevāyaṃ hetu, nibbānappattiyā pana ayameva hetūti hetvaṭṭho, atisukhumanirodhadassanena
tika-vin07t:192_4: idhameva dassananti dassanaṭṭho, adhikapaṇassa dukkhassa dassanena adhipateyyaṭṭho
tika-vin07t:192_5: āvibhūto. Ete eva ca pīḷanādayo soḷasa ākārāti vuccanti.
tika-vin07t:193_0: Kāmehi vivekaṭṭhakāyatā kāyaviveko. Nīvaraṇādīhi vivittā aṭṭha samāpattiyo cittaviveko.
tika-vin07t:193_2: tehi catūhi vivittaṃ nibbānaṃ upadhiviveko nāma.
tika-vin07t:194_0: Anattānupassanāya paṭiladdho dukkhāniccānupassanāhi ca paṭiladdho ariyamaggo āgamanavasena
tika-vin07t:194_1: yathākkamaṃ suññataappaṇihitaanimittavimokkhasaññaṃ paṭilabhati, kilesehi vimuttattā hi esa vimokkhoti.
tika-vin07t:195: Yathā loke ekekapadato ekekamakkharaṃ gahetvā “mekhalā”ti vuttaṃ, evamidhāpīti attho. Mehanassāti guyhappadesassa. Khassāti okāsassa.
tika-vin07t:196_0: Saha devehītiādīsu saha devehi vattatīti sadevako loko. Taṃ sadevakantiādinā yojanā
tika-vin07t:196_1: veditabbā. Sadevakavacanenāti sadevaka-sadde visesanabhāvena ṭhitadevavacanena. Tassāpi
tika-vin07t:196_2: sadevakapade antobhūtattā avayave samudāyopacāravasena vohāro kato. Itarathā tena
tika-vin07t:196_3: devavisiṭṭhalokasseva gahaṇato pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ na siyā, evaṃ uparipi.
tika-vin07t:196_4: Samārakavacanena mārasaddena tena sahacaritā sabbe vasavattidevā ca gahitāti āha
tika-vin07t:196_6: yesaṃ āruppapariyantānaṃ brahmānaṃ tesaṃ brahmānaṃ gahaṇaṃ brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:196_7: Loka-saddassa okāsalokādīnampi sādhāraṇattā sattalokāveṇikameva pajāgahaṇaṃ katanti
tika-vin07t:196_10: Tattha sammutidevā rājāno, avasesamanussā sammutidevasamaṇabrāhmaṇehi avasiṭṭhā.
tika-vin07t:196_11: Sattalokāveṇikassa pajāsaddassa visuṃ gahitattā sadevakaṃ lokanti ettha lokasaddaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:196_12: okāsalokameva niyametīti āha “tīhi padehi okāsaloko”ti. Idañca sadevakādipadattayavacanīyassa
tika-vin07t:196_13: padhānatthassa vasena vuttaṃ. Okāsalokavisesanassa panettha devamārādisattalokassāpi
tika-vin07t:196_14: gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ sāmatthiyato gamyamānattā saputto āgatotiādīsu puttādīnaṃ viya.
tika-vin07t:196_15: Imasmiñca naye sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ okāsalokaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ sadevamanussaṃ
tika-vin07t:196_16: pajañcāti ca-kāraṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ, okāsasattalokānaṃ gahaṇena cettha tadubhayasammutinimittabhūto
tika-vin07t:196_17: saṅkhāralokopi tadavinābhāvato gahito evāti daṭṭhabbo. Apare pana “sadevakantiādīhi
tika-vin07t:196_18: pañcahi padehi sattalokova attano avayavabhūtadevādivisesanehi visesetvā gahito,
tika-vin07t:196_19: taggahaṇena tadādhāro okāsaloko, tadubhayapaññattivisayo saṅkhāraloko ca gahitā eva
tika-vin07t:196_20: hontī”ti vadanti. Tesañca pajanti idaṃ lokasaddassa visesanaṃ katvā sadevakaṃ pajaṃ
tika-vin07t:197_0: Arūpāvacaraloko gahito pārisesañāyena itaresaṃ padantarehi gahitattā. Māraggahaṇena
tika-vin07t:197_1: tappadhānā taṃsadisā ca upapattidevā saṅgayhantīti āha “chakāmāvacaradevaloko”ti.
tika-vin07t:197_3: aṭṭhasu parisāsu cātumahārājikādīnaṃ catunnaṃ parisānaṃ sadevakādipadehi saṅgahitattā
tika-vin07t:197_4: idha sassamaṇabrāhmaṇinti iminā samaṇaparisā brāhmaṇaparisā ca, sadevamanussanti
tika-vin07t:197_5: iminā khattiyaparisā gahapatiparisā ca vuttāti āha “catuparisavasenā”ti. Tassa manussaloko
tika-vin07t:197_6: gahitoti iminā sambandho. Tattha manussalokoti manussasamūho, tenāha “avasesasabbasattaloko vā”ti.
tika-vin07t:198_0: Vikappantaraṃ dassento āha “sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko”ti. Devapadena sammutidevā,
tika-vin07t:198_1: samaṇabrāhmaṇamanussapadehi sesamanussā ca gahitāti evaṃ vikappadvayepi manussaṃ
tika-vin07t:198_2: pajaṃ manussiṃ pajanti pajā-saddaṃ manussa-saddena visesetvā taṃ puna saha devehi
tika-vin07t:198_3: vattatīti sadevā, pajā. Sadevā ca sā manussā cāti sadevamanussā, taṃ sadevamanussaṃ
tika-vin07t:198_4: pajaṃ. Puna kiṃ bhūtaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇinti evaṃ yathā pajāsaddena manussānaññeva
tika-vin07t:198_5: gahaṇaṃ siyā, tathā nibbacanaṃ kātabbaṃ, itarathā manussānaññeva gahaṇaṃ na sampajjati
tika-vin07t:198_6: sabbamanussānaṃ visesanabhāvena gahitattā aññapadatthabhūtassa kassaci manussassa
tika-vin07t:198_7: abhāvā. Idāni pajanti iminā avasesanāgādisattepi saṅgahetvā dassetukāmo āha “avasesasabbasattaloko
tika-vin07t:198_8: vā”ti. Etthāpi catuparisavasena avasesasabbasattaloko sammutidevamanussehi vā saha
tika-vin07t:199_0: Ettāvatā bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni ekekapadena abhāgaso sabbalokānaṃ
tika-vin07t:199_1: gahaṇapakkhepi tassa tassa visesanassa sapphalataṃ dassetuṃ api cetthātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:199_3: kittisaddo sayaṃ attano avayavabhūtena sadevakavacanena taṃ suṇantānaṃ sāvento abbhuggatoti
tika-vin07t:199_4: yojanā. Anusandhikkamoti atthānañceva padānañca anusandhānakkamo, jānanakkamoti attho.
tika-vin07t:200_0: Abhiññāti ya-kāralopena niddesoti āha “abhiññāyā”ti. Samantabhadrakattāti sabbabhāgehi
tika-vin07t:200_2: Buddhasubodhitatāyāti idaṃ tikaṃ dhammassa hetusarūpaphalavasena vuttaṃ, tathā nāthapabhavattikampi.
tika-vin07t:200_3: Majjhe tikadvayaṃ phalavaseneva vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Kiccasuddhiyāti dhammaṃ sutvā
tika-vin07t:201_0: Idāni ādikalyāṇādippakārameva dhammaṃ desento bhagavā sotūnaṃ yaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ
tika-vin07t:201_2: padāni visesanabhāvena vuttāni, na dhammapadassāti dassanamukhena nānappakārato atthaṃ
tika-vin07t:201_3: vivaritukāmo sātthaṃ sabyañjananti evamādīsu panātiādimāha. Tattha tisso sikkhā sakalo
tika-vin07t:201_4: ca tantidhammo sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ nāma. Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento sīlādike viya
tika-vin07t:201_5: tappakāsakaṃ tantidhammampi pakāseti eva saddatthasamudāyattā pariyattidhammassa.
tika-vin07t:201_8: ca saha atthena payojanena vattatīti sātthameva, na tu sabyañjanaṃ, tantidhammasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t:201_9: sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ yathāvuttena atthena sātthaṃ sabyañjanañca. Kirātādimilakkhavacanānampi
tika-vin07t:201_10: sātthasabyañjanatte samānepi visiṭṭhatthabyañjanayogaṃ sandhāya sahattho devadatto
tika-vin07t:201_11: savittotiādi viya “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”nti vuttanti āha “atthasampattiyā sātthaṃ,
tika-vin07t:201_12: byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjana”nti. Tattha yaṃ atthaṃ sutvā tathā paṭipajjantā sabbadukkhakkhayaṃ
tika-vin07t:201_13: pāpuṇanti, tassa tādisasampatti atthasampatti nāma, sampannatthatāti attho. Byañjanasampatti
tika-vin07t:201_15: atthaṃ uttānaṃ katvā dassanasamatthatā sampannabyañjanatāti attho.
tika-vin07t:202_0: Idāni nettippakaraṇanayenāpi (netti 4 dvādasapada) atthaṃ dassetuṃ saṅkāsanātiādi
tika-vin07t:202_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha saṅkhepato kāsīyati dīpīyatīti saṅkāsananti kammasādhanavasena attho
tika-vin07t:202_2: daṭṭhabbo, evaṃ sesesupi. Paṭhamaṃ kāsanaṃ pakāsanaṃ. Ubhayampetaṃ uddesatthavacanasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin07t:202_3: vitthāravacanaṃ. Sakiṃ vuttassa puna vacanañca vivaraṇavibhajanāni. Ubhayampetaṃ
tika-vin07t:202_4: niddesatthavacanaṃ. Vivaṭassa vitthāratarābhidhānaṃ vibhattassa ca pakārehi ñāpanaṃ
tika-vin07t:202_6: Atthapadasamāyogatoti yathāvuttāni eva cha padāni pariyattiyā atthavibhāgattā atthapadāni,
tika-vin07t:202_7: tehi sahitatāya atthakoṭṭhāsayuttattāti attho. Apariyosite pade ādimajjhagatavaṇṇo
tika-vin07t:202_8: akkharaṃ, ekakkharaṃ, padaṃ vā akkharaṃ. Vibhattiyantaṃ padaṃ. Padābhihitaṃ atthaṃ
tika-vin07t:202_9: byañjetīti byañjanaṃ, vākyaṃ. Kathitassevatthassa anekavidhena vibhāgakaraṇaṃ ākāro
tika-vin07t:202_10: nāma. Ākārābhihitassa nibbacanaṃ nirutti. Nibbacanatthavitthāro niddeso. Atha vā
tika-vin07t:202_11: “akkharehi saṅkāseti, padehi pakāseti, byañjanehi vivarati, ākārehi vibhajati, niruttīhi
tika-vin07t:203_0: Atthagambhīratātiādīsu attho nāma tantiattho, hetuphalaṃ vā. Dhammo nāma tanti, hetu
tika-vin07t:203_1: vā. Desanā nāma yathādhammaṃ dhammābhilāpo. Paṭivedho nāma yathāvuttaatthādīnaṃ aviparītāvabodho.
tika-vin07t:203_2: Te panete atthādayo yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā
tika-vin07t:203_3: ca, tasmā gambhīrā. Tesu paṭivedhassāpi atthasannissitattā atthasabhāgattā ca vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:203_6: Yathāvuttaatthādīsu pabhedagatāni ñāṇāni atthapaṭisambhidādayo. Tattha niruttīti
tika-vin07t:203_7: tantipadānaṃ niddhāretvā vacanaṃ, nibbacananti attho. Tīsu paṭisambhidāsu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.
tika-vin07t:203_8: Lokiyā saddheyyavacanamukheneva atthesu pasīdanti, na atthamukhenāti āha saddheyyatotiādi.
tika-vin07t:203_10: idha sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ dīpetīti āha sikkhattayapariggahitattātiādi.
tika-vin07t:204_0: Yathāvuttamevatthaṃ aparenāpi pariyāyena dassetuṃ api cātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sanidānanti
tika-vin07t:204_2: Tatrāyaṃ pāḷiyojanākkamo – “verañjo brāhmaṇo samaṇo khalu bho…pe… viharatī”ti ca,
tika-vin07t:204_3: “taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ ‘itipi so…pe… pavedetī’ti evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo
tika-vin07t:204_4: abbhuggato”ti ca, “so dhammaṃ deseti…pe… pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, desento ca sātthasabyañjanādiguṇasaṃyuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:204_5: brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī”ti ca, “sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti
tika-vin07t:204_6: ca assosi, sutvā ca atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti.
tika-vin07t:205_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kiñcāpi “dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvā atha
tika-vin07t:205_1: kho verañjo…pe… upasaṅkamī”ti evaṃ sādhu kho panātiādipāṭhassa brāhmaṇassa parivitakkanabhāvena
tika-vin07t:205_2: vuttattā brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti padānantarameva assosīti padaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ
tika-vin07t:205_3: viya paññāyati, tathāpi “sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ
tika-vin07t:205_4: yathāvuttanidassanatthena iti-saddena paricchinditvā vuttattā pana aññattha iti-saddassa
tika-vin07t:205_5: adassanato ca atha kho verañjotiādinā kattabbantaradassanamukhena pāḷiyā pakārantare
tika-vin07t:205_6: pavattito ca yathāvuttavaseneva “sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti
tika-vin07t:205_7: vacanānantarameva assosīti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhanaṃ yuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathācariyena hi
tika-vin07t:205_8: brāhmaṇassa attanā sutavaseneva ajjhāsayo uppajjatīti upasaṅkamanahetudassanamukhena
tika-vin07t:205_9: dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvātiādi vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:206_0: 2. Sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakenāti idaṃ ukkamena mukhāruḷhavasena vuttaṃ, anupasantasabhāvatāya
tika-vin07t:206_1: brāhmaṇasseva uṇhodakaṃ viya sītodakenāti attho gahetabbo, ñāṇatejayuttatāya vā bhagavā
tika-vin07t:206_2: uṇhodakopamoti katvā tabbirahitaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ sītodakaṃ viya katvā tathā vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:206_3: Ekībhāvanti sammodanakiriyāya ekarūpataṃ. Yāyātiādīsu yāya kathāya sammodi brāhmaṇo,
tika-vin07t:206_4: taṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathanti yojanā. Tattha khamanīyanti dukkhabahulaṃ idaṃ sarīraṃ,
tika-vin07t:206_5: kacci khamituṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Yāpanīyanti cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya yāpetuṃ
tika-vin07t:206_6: sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Rogābhāvena appābādhaṃ. Dukkhajīvitābhāvena appātaṅkaṃ. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇatthāya
tika-vin07t:206_7: lahuṃ akicchena uṭṭhātuṃ yoggatāya lahuṭṭhānaṃ. Balanti sarīrassa sabbakiccakkhamaṃ
tika-vin07t:206_8: balaṃ kacci atthīti pucchati. Phāsuvihāroti sukhavihāro. Saraṇīyameva dīghaṃ katvā
tika-vin07t:206_9: “sāraṇīya”nti vuttanti āha “saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīya”nti. Pariyāyehīti kāraṇehi.
tika-vin07t:207_0: Bhāvoti kiriyā, tasmiṃ vattamāno napuṃsaka-saddo bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso nāma, kiriyāvisesanasaddoti
tika-vin07t:207_1: attho. Ekamante ekasmiṃ ante yuttappadeseti attho. Khaṇḍiccādibhāvanti khaṇḍitadantapalitakesādibhāvaṃ.
tika-vin07t:207_2: Rājaparivaṭṭeti rājūnaṃ parivattanaṃ, paṭipāṭiyoti attho. Purātanuccakulappasutatāya
tika-vin07t:207_3: jiṇṇatā, na vayasāti āha “cirakālappavattakulanvaye”ti. Vibhavānaṃ mahantattaṃ lāti
tika-vin07t:207_4: gaṇhātīti mahallakoti āha “vibhavamahattatāya samannāgate”ti. Vibhāvane nāma attheti
tika-vin07t:207_5: pakativibhāvanasaṅkhāte atthe. Na abhivādeti vāti abhivādetabbanti na sallakkheti,
tika-vin07t:207_6: evaṃ asallakkhaṇapakatikoti vuttaṃ hoti. Rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti etthāpi niccapakatikaṃ
tika-vin07t:207_7: aniccapakatikaṃ vāti attho. Aniccaṃ vāti ettha vā-saddo avadhāraṇattho.
tika-vin07t:208_0: Sampatijātoti muhuttajāto, jātasamanantaramevāti attho. Sattapadavītihārena gantvā…pe…
tika-vin07t:208_1: olokesīti ettha dvāraṃ pidhāya nikkhantotiādīsu viya gamanato pure katampi olokanaṃ
tika-vin07t:208_2: pacchā kataṃ viya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Olokesinti ca lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriye jāte
tika-vin07t:208_3: maṃsacakkhunā volokesīti attho. Seṭṭhoti pasatthataro. Patimānesīti pūjesi. Āsabhinti uttamaṃ.
tika-vin07t:209_0: 3. Taṃ vacananti nāhaṃ taṃ brāhmaṇātiādivacanaṃ. Aññāya saṇṭhaheyyāti arahatte patiṭṭhaheyya.
tika-vin07t:209_1: Jātivasenāti khattiyādijātivasena. Upapattivasenāti devesu upapattivasena. Āviñchantīti
tika-vin07t:209_2: ākaḍḍhanti. Yassa abhivādādikaraṇasaṅkhātassa sāmaggirasassa bhagavati abhāvaṃ maññamāno
tika-vin07t:209_3: brāhmaṇo “arasarūpo”ti āha, tabbidhurassa rūpataṇhādikasseva sāmaggirasassa abhāvena
tika-vin07t:209_4: bhagavā “arasarūpo”ti dassetuṃ sāmaggirasasaddassa rūparasādīsu vattanappakāraṃ dassento
tika-vin07t:210_0: Tālāvatthukatāti ucchinnamūlānaṃ tālānaṃ vatthu viya nesaṃ rūparasādīnaṃ vatthu cittasantānaṃ
tika-vin07t:210_1: katanti imasmiṃ atthe majjhepadalopaṃ dīghañca katvā niddesoti āha tālavatthu viyātiādi.
tika-vin07t:210_2: Tālavatthu viya yesaṃ vatthu kataṃ te tālāvatthukatāti visesanassa paranipāto daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin07t:210_3: katatālavatthukāti attho. Matthakacchinnatāloyeva pattaphalādīnaṃ akāraṇatāya avatthūti
tika-vin07t:210_4: tālāvatthu, taṃ viya yesaṃ vatthu kataṃ te rūparasādayo tālāvatthukatā, ayaṃ aññapadatthavasena
tika-vin07t:210_5: atthaggāho heṭṭhā vuttanayena sugamoti visesamatthaṃ dassento āha “matthakacchinnatālo
tika-vin07t:210_6: viya katā”ti. Evañca matthakasadisesu rūparasādīsu rāgesu chinnesupi tabbatthubhūtassa
tika-vin07t:210_7: tālāvatthusadisassa cittasantānassa yāva parinibbānaṭṭhānaṃ upapannameva hoti. Yathārutato
tika-vin07t:210_8: pana visesanasamāsavasena atthe gayhamāne rūparasādīnaṃ tālāvatthusadisatāya ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:210_9: āpajjati. Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ etaṃ dosaṃ pariharituṃ rūparasādīnaṃ kusalākusalattaṃ
tika-vin07t:210_10: vuttaṃ, taṃ te tathāgatassa pahīnātiādipāḷiyā, kāmasukhassādasaṅkhātā rūparasātiādiaṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin07t:210_11: ca na sameti, khīṇāsavānampi yāva parinibbānā kusalākusalānaṃ phaluppattito tesaṃ
tika-vin07t:210_12: matthakacchinnatālasadisatāpi na yuttāti gahetabbaṃ. Atha vā matthakacchinnatālassa
tika-vin07t:210_13: ṭhitaṃ aṭṭhitañca amanasikatvā puna anuppattidhammatāsadisamattaṃ upametvā tālāvatthu
tika-vin07t:210_14: viya katāti visesanasamāsavasena atthaggahaṇepi na koci doso. Anu-saddo pacchāti
tika-vin07t:210_15: atthe vattatīti āha pacchābhāvo na hotītiādi. Anu abhāvaṃ gatāti pacchā anuppattidhammatāvasena
tika-vin07t:210_16: abhāvaṃ gatā. Anacchariyāti anu anu uparūpari vimhayakatāti attho. Yañca kho tvaṃ
tika-vin07t:210_17: vadesīti yaṃ vandanādisāmaggīrasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ arasarūpatāya vadesi, taṃ
tika-vin07t:211: 4. Sandhāya bhāsitamatthanti yaṃ atthaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇo nibbhogo bhavaṃ gotamotiādimāha, bhagavā ca yaṃ sandhāya nibbhogatādiṃ attani anujānāti, taṃ sandhāya bhāsitamatthaṃ.
tika-vin07t:212: 5. Kulasamudācārakammanti kulācārakammaṃ. Kāyato kāyadvārato pavattaṃ duccaritaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ. Anekavihitāti anekappakārā.
tika-vin07t:213_0: 6. Pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassāti rūpādīsu pañcasu kāmakoṭṭhāsesu ativiya saṅgavasena niyuttassa
tika-vin07t:213_1: kāmarāgassa, etena anāgāmīnaṃ vatthābharaṇādīsu saṅganikantivasena uppajjanakāmarāgassa
tika-vin07t:213_2: kāmarāgatābhāvaṃ dasseti tassa rūparāgādīsu saṅgahato. Avasesānanti ettha sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ
tika-vin07t:213_3: paṭhamena maggena, sesānaṃ catūhipi ucchedaṃ vadati, tenāha “yathānurūpa”nti.
tika-vin07t:214: 7. Jigucchati maññeti jigucchati viya, “jigucchatī”ti vā sallakkhemi. Akosallasambhūtaṭṭhenāti aññāṇasambhūtaṭṭhena.
tika-vin07t:215_0: 8-10. Tatrāti yathāvuttesu dvīsu atthavikappesu. Paṭisandhipariyāyopi idha gabbhasaddoti
tika-vin07t:216_0: 11. Dhammadhātunti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Tañhi dhamme yāthāvato dhāreti upadhāretīti
tika-vin07t:216_2: samatthatā desanāvilāso, taṃ patto. Karuṇāvipphāranti sabbasattesu mahākaruṇāya pharaṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:216_3: Tādiguṇalakkhaṇameva upamāya vibhāvento āha “pathavīsamacittata”nti. Tatoyeva akujjhanasabhāvato
tika-vin07t:216_4: akuppadhammatā. Jātiyā anugatanti jātiyā anubaddhaṃ. Jarāya anusaṭanti jarāya paliveṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin07t:216_5: Vaṭṭakhāṇubhūtanti vaṭṭato uddharituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya vaṭṭe niccalabhāvena ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin07t:216_6: khāṇu viya bhūtaṃ. Jātānaṃ maccānaṃ niccaṃ maraṇato bhayanti āha ajja maritvātiādi.
tika-vin07t:216_7: Appaṭisamaṃ purejātabhāvanti asadisaṃ ariyāya jātiyā paṭhamajātabhāvaṃ, sabbajeṭṭhabhāvanti attho.
tika-vin07t:217_0: “Apī”ti avatvā “pī”ti vadanto pi-saddo visuṃ atthi nipātoti dasseti. Sammā adhisayitānīti
tika-vin07t:217_1: pādādīhi upaghātaṃ akarontiyā sammadeva upari sayitāni, akammakassāpi sayatidhātuno
tika-vin07t:217_2: adhipubbatāya sakammakatā daṭṭhabbā. Nakhasikhāti nakhaggāni. Sakuṇānaṃ pakkhā hatthapādaṭṭhāniyāti
tika-vin07t:218_0: Lokoyeva lokasannivāso. Abujjhi etthāti rukkho bodhi, sayaṃ bujjhati, bujjhanti vā
tika-vin07t:218_1: tenāti maggopi sabbaññutaññāṇampi bodhi. Bujjhīyatīti nibbānaṃ bodhi. Antarā ca bodhinti
tika-vin07t:218_3: Varabhūrimedhasoti mahāpathavī viya patthaṭapaññoti attho. Tisso vijjāti arahattamaggo
tika-vin07t:218_4: attanā saha vattamānaṃ sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇañceva itarā dve mahaggatavijjā
tika-vin07t:218_5: ca tabbinibandhakakilesaviddhaṃsanavasena uppādanato “tisso vijjā”ti vuccati. Cha
tika-vin07t:218_6: abhiññāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sāvakapāramīñāṇanti aggasāvakehi paṭilabhitabbaṃ sabbameva
tika-vin07t:219_0: Opammasampaṭipādananti opammatthassa upameyyena samaṃ paṭipādanaṃ. Atthenāti upameyyatthena.
tika-vin07t:219_2: Pariṇāmakāloti iminā vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvāpattiṃ. Tadā ca sā maggañāṇagabbhaṃ dhārentī
tika-vin07t:219_4: adhigatena. Caturaṅgasamannāgatanti “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
tika-vin07t:219_5: sarīre upasussatu maṃsalohita”nti evaṃ vuttacaturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:220_0: Chando kāmotiādīsu patthanākārena pavatto dubbalo lobho icchanaṭṭhena chando. Tato
tika-vin07t:220_1: balavā rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo. Tatopi balavataro chandarāgo. Nimittānubyañjanasaṅkappavasena
tika-vin07t:220_2: pavatto saṅkappo. Tatopi balavasaṅkappavaseneva pavatto rāgo. Tatopi balavataro saṅkapparāgo.
tika-vin07t:220_3: Svāyaṃ pabhedo ekasseva lobhassa pavattiākārabhedena avatthābhedena ca vutto.
tika-vin07t:222_0: Seyyathidanti taṃ kathanti attho. Etanti pubbapadeyeva avadhāraṇakaraṇaṃ, etaṃ atthajātaṃ
tika-vin07t:222_1: vā. Tannissaraṇatoti tesaṃ kāmānaṃ nissaraṇattā. Esāti eva-kāro. Kāmadhātu nāma kāmabhavo,
tika-vin07t:222_3: tadaṅgavivekādayo. Kāyacittaupadhivivekā kāyavivekādayo, tayo eva idha jhānakathāya,
tika-vin07t:222_4: samucchedavivekādīnaṃ asambhavā. Niddeseti mahāniddese. Tatthevāti mahāniddese eva.
tika-vin07t:222_5: Vibhaṅgeti jhānavibhaṅge. Evañhi satīti ubhayesampi kāmānaṃ saṅgahe sati.
tika-vin07t:223_0: Purimenāti kāyavivekena. Etthāti etasmiṃ kāyacittavivekadvaye. Dutiyenāti cittavivekena.
tika-vin07t:223_2: kāmehi vivicca akusalehīti imesaṃ padānaṃ, niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Bālabhāvassa
tika-vin07t:223_3: hetupariccāgoti anuvattati. Akusaladhammo hi bālabhāvassa hetu. Āsayaposananti āsayassa
tika-vin07t:223_4: visodhanaṃ vaḍḍhanañca. Vibhaṅge nīvaraṇāneva vuttānīti sambandho. Tattha kāraṇamāha
tika-vin07t:223_6: vuccamānāni jhānaṅgāni, tesaṃ attano paccanīkānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvadassanatoti attho.
tika-vin07t:223_7: Uparijhānaṅgānaṃ paccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvassa dassanatotipi pāṭho. Tattha “upari vuccamānajhānaṅgānaṃ
tika-vin07t:223_9: atthaṃ vadanti. Peṭaketi mahākaccāyanattherena kataṃ nettippakaraṇanayānusāripakaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:223_10: taṃ pana piṭakānaṃ vaṇṇanābhūtattā “peṭaka”nti vuttaṃ, tasminti attho.
tika-vin07t:224_0: Vitakkanaṃ nāma ārammaṇaparikappananti āha “ūhana”nti. Rūpaṃ rūpantiādinā visaye
tika-vin07t:224_1: ākoṭentassa visayappavattiāhananaṃ upari āhanananti veditabbaṃ. Ārammaṇe cittassa
tika-vin07t:224_2: ānayanaṃ nāma ārammaṇābhimukhakaraṇaṃ. Anusañcaraṇanti anuparibbhamanaṃ, tañca khaṇantarassa
tika-vin07t:224_3: tathākārena uppādanameva, na hi paramatthato ekassa sañcaraṇamatthi, evamaññatthāpi
tika-vin07t:224_4: īdisesu. Anumajjananti parimajjanaṃ. Tatthāti ārammaṇe. Sahajātānuyojanaṃ sakiccānuvattitākaraṇena.
tika-vin07t:224_5: Katthacīti dutiyajjhānavirahitesu savicāracittesu sabbatthāti attho. Vicārena saha
tika-vin07t:224_6: uppajjamānopi vitakko ārammaṇe abhiniropanākārena pavattiṃ sandhāya “paṭhamābhinipāto”ti
tika-vin07t:224_7: vutto. Vipphāravāti avūpasantasabhāvatāya vegavā, tenevesa dutiyajjhāne pahānaṅgaṃ
tika-vin07t:224_8: jātaṃ. Paṭhamadutiyajjhānesūti pañcakanayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aṅgavinimuttassa jhānassa
tika-vin07t:225_0: Viveka-saddassa bhāvasādhanapakkhe “tasmā vivekā”ti vuttaṃ, itarapakkhe “tasmiṃ viveke”ti.
tika-vin07t:225_1: Pinayatīti tappeti, vaḍḍheti vā. Pharaṇarasāti paṇītarūpehi kāye byāpanarasā. Sātalakkhaṇanti
tika-vin07t:225_2: iṭṭhasabhāvaṃ, madhuranti attho. Sampayuttānaṃ pīḷanajjhupekkhanaṃ akatvā anu anu
tika-vin07t:225_3: gaṇhanaṃ upakāritā vā anuggaho. Vanameva vanantaṃ. Udakameva udakantaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:225_4: samaye pākaṭabhāvatoti iminā iṭṭhārammaṇādipaṭilābhasamayepi sukhaṃ vijjamānampi
tika-vin07t:225_5: apākaṭaṃ, pītiyeva tattha pākaṭā, paṭiladdharasānubhavanasamaye ca vijjamānapītitopi
tika-vin07t:225_6: sukhameva pākaṭataranti dasseti. Ettha ca cetasikasukhavaseneva paṭiladdharasānubhavanaṃ
tika-vin07t:225_7: veditabbaṃ, na kāyikasukhavasena tassa pītisampayogasseva abhāvena idhānadhippetattā.
tika-vin07t:225_9: vā. Dutiyavikappena aññapadatthasamāsavaseneva “vivekajaṃ pītisukha”nti idaṃ ekaṃ
tika-vin07t:226_0: Gaṇanānupubbatāti desanākkamaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ samāpajjatīti idaṃ ādikammikavasena
tika-vin07t:226_1: vuttaṃ, ciṇṇavasīnaṃ pana yogīnaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyāpi jhānaṃ uppajjateva. Jhāpetīti dahati.
tika-vin07t:226_2: Aniccādilakkhaṇavisayāya vipassanāya upanijjhāyanaṃ kathaṃ nibbānālambanassa maggassa
tika-vin07t:226_3: hotīti āha vipassanāyātiādi. Tattha maggena sijjhatīti niccādivipallāsappahāyakena
tika-vin07t:226_4: saha maggeneva taṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ asammohato attano sijjhati. Atha vā maggenāti
tika-vin07t:227: Aññoti satto. Avuttattāti “sacittekaggata”nti jhānapāḷiyaṃ avuttattā. Vuttattāti tassā jhānapāḷiyā vibhaṅge vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:229_0: Ajjhattanti jhānavisesanattā vuttaṃ “idha niyakajjhattamadhippeta”nti. Jhānañhi ajjhattajjhattaṃ
tika-vin07t:229_1: na hoti chaḷindriyānameva tabbhāvato. Khuddakā ūmiyo vīciyo. Mahatiyo taraṅgā. Santā
tika-vin07t:229_2: honti samitātiādīni aññamaññavevacanāni, jhānabalena samatikkantāti adhippāyo. Appitāti
tika-vin07t:229_3: gamitā vināsaṃ pāpitā. Pariyāyoti jhānaparikkhāre jhānavohārattā aparamatthato.
tika-vin07t:231_0: Tadadhigamāyāti tatiyamaggādhigamāya. Upapattito ikkhatīti paññāya sahacaraṇaparicayena
tika-vin07t:231_1: yathā samavāhibhāvo hoti, evaṃ yuttito passati. Vipulāyāti mahaggatabhāvappattāya.
tika-vin07t:231_3: anabhibhūtattā”tiādi.. Upekkhābhedaṃ dassetvā idhādhippetaṃ upekkhaṃ pakāsetuṃ upekkhā
tika-vin07t:231_4: panātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatramajjhattatāva khīṇāsavānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe
tika-vin07t:231_8: aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātabhūtā “jhānupekkhā”ti ca, catutthajjhānasahagatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhitāya
tika-vin07t:231_9: “pārisuddhupekkhā”ti ca tena tena avatthābhedena chadhā vuttā.
tika-vin07t:232_0: Vīriyameva pana anaccāraddhaanatisithilesu sahajātesu saṅkhāresu upekkhanākārena
tika-vin07t:232_1: pavattaṃ “vīriyupekkhā”ti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhannaṃ rūpārūpajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhato pubbabhāge
tika-vin07t:232_2: eva nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādīnaṃ pahānābhimukhībhūtattā tesaṃ pahānepi abyāpārabhāvūpagamanena
tika-vin07t:232_3: majjhattākārappavattā samādhivasena uppannā aṭṭha paññā ceva upādānakkhandhabhūtesu
tika-vin07t:232_4: saṅkhāresu ajjhupekkhanākārappavattā vipassanāvasena uppannā catunnaṃ maggānaṃ pubbabhāge
tika-vin07t:232_5: tassa tassa adhigamāya catasso catunnaṃ phalasamāpattīnaṃ pubbabhāge tassa tassa
tika-vin07t:232_7: dveti dasa paññā cāti ime aṭṭhārasa paññā saṅkhārupekkhā nāma. Yathāvuttavipassanāpaññāva
tika-vin07t:232_8: lakkhaṇavicinanepi majjhattabhūtā vipassanupekkhā nāma. Adukkhamasukhavedanā vedanupekkhā
tika-vin07t:232_9: nāma. Imāsaṃ pana dasannampi upekkhānaṃ “tattha tattha āgatanayato vibhāgo dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:232_10: vuttanayena veditabbo”ti dassento āha evamayaṃ dasavidhāpītiādi. Tattha tattha āgatanayatoti
tika-vin07t:232_11: idampi hi tāsaṃ vibhāgadassanassa bhūmipuggalādipadaṃ viya visuṃ mātikāpadavasena
tika-vin07t:232_12: vuttaṃ, na pana bhūmipuggalādivasena vibhāgadassanassa āgataṭṭhānaparāmasanaṃ āgataṭṭhānassa
tika-vin07t:232_13: aṭṭhasāliniyātiādinā vuttattā, tasmā sāratthadīpaniyaṃ yaṃ vuttaṃ “imāsaṃ pana dasannampi
tika-vin07t:232_14: upekkhānaṃ bhūmipuggalādivasena vibhāgo tattha tattha vuttanayeneva veditabboti dassento
tika-vin07t:232_15: āha evamayaṃ dasavidhātiādī”ti, taṃ amanasikatvā vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Tattha tattha
tika-vin07t:232_16: āgatanayatoti “idha (khīṇāsavo) bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti, na
tika-vin07t:232_17: dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno”tiādinā chaḷaṅgupekkhā āgatā, “upekkhāsahagatena
tika-vin07t:232_18: cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evaṃ brahmavihārupekkhā āgatāti iminā nayena
tika-vin07t:232_19: dasannampi upekkhānaṃ tattha tattha vuttapadesesu āgatanayadassanato ca ayaṃ dasavidhāpi
tika-vin07t:233_0: Bhūmītiādīsu pana chaḷaṅgupekkhā kāmāvacarā, brahmavihārupekkhā rūpāvacarātiādinā
tika-vin07t:233_1: bhūmito ca, chaḷaṅgupekkhā asekkhānameva, brahmavihārupekkhā puthujjanādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi
tika-vin07t:233_3: cittato ca, chaḷaṅgupekkhā chaḷārammaṇātiādinā ārammaṇato ca, “vedanupekkhā vedanākkhandhena
tika-vin07t:233_4: saṅgahitā, itarā nava saṅkhārakkhandhenā”ti khandhasaṅgahavasena ca, “chaḷaṅgupekkhā
tika-vin07t:233_5: brahmavihārabojjhaṅgajhāna pārisuddhitatramajjhattupekkhā ca atthato ekā. Tasmā ekakkhaṇe
tika-vin07t:233_6: ca tāsu ekāya sati itarā na uppajjanti, tathā saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanupekkhāpi veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:233_8: abyākatā brahmavihārupekkhā kusalābyākatā, tathā sesā. Vedanupekkhā pana siyā akusalāpī”ti
tika-vin07t:233_9: evaṃ kusalattikavasena ca, “saṅkhepato cattāro ca dhammā vīriyavedanātatramajjhattatāñāṇavasenā”ti
tika-vin07t:233_10: evaṃ saṅkhepavasena ca ayaṃ dasavidhāpi upekkhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:234_0: Ettha cetā kiñcāpi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ bhūmipuggalādivasena sarūpato uddharitvā na vuttā,
tika-vin07t:234_1: tathāpi tattha vuttappakāreheva tāsaṃ bhūmipuggalādivibhāgo nayato uddharitvā sakkā
tika-vin07t:234_2: ñātunti tattha sarūpato vuttañca avuttañca ekato saṅgahetvā tattha tattha āgatanayatotiādīhi
tika-vin07t:234_3: navahi pakārehi atideso kato, teneva “dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavasenā”ti avatvā
tika-vin07t:234_4: “vuttanayenevā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathāhi khīṇāsavo bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti ādimhi
tika-vin07t:234_5: vutte chaḷaṅgupekkhā rūpādiārammaṇatāya bhūmito kāmāvacarā ca puggalato asekkhānameva
tika-vin07t:234_6: ca uppajjati, cittato somanassupekkhācittasampayuttā, ārammaṇato chaḷārammaṇā, kusalattikato
tika-vin07t:234_7: abyākatā cāti paṇḍitehi sakkā ñātuṃ, tathā chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca
tika-vin07t:234_8: tatramajjhattupekkhā ca jhānupekkhā ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekātiādimhi vutte
tika-vin07t:234_9: panassa saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahitattā brahmavihārupekkhādīhi saha ekakkhaṇe anuppattiādayo
tika-vin07t:234_10: ca sakkā ñātuṃ, yathā ca chaḷaṅgupekkhā, evaṃ sesānampi yathārahaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ
tika-vin07t:234_11: vuttanayato bhūmiādivibhāguddhāranayo ñātabbo. Anābhogarasāti paṇītasukhepi tasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:235_0: Puggalenāti puggalādhiṭṭhānena. Kilesehi sampayuttānaṃ ārakkhā. Tīraṇaṃ kiccassa
tika-vin07t:235_1: pāragamanaṃ. Pavicayo vīmaṃsā. Idanti satisampajaññaṃ. Yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:235_2: sukhanti imassa tasmā etamatthantiādinā sambandho. Tassāti jhānasamaṅgino. Taṃsamuṭṭhānenāti
tika-vin07t:235_3: taṃ yathāvuttanāmakāyasampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ yassa rūpassa tena taṃsamuṭṭhānena
tika-vin07t:235_4: rūpena. Assāti yogino. Yassāti rūpakāyassa. Phuṭattāti atipaṇītena rūpena phuṭattā.
tika-vin07t:235_6: eva jhānasamaṅgitākaraṇe kāriyopacārato “sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī”ti vuccatīti
tika-vin07t:235_7: imamatthaṃ dassentoti attho. Yanti hetuatthe nipātoti āha “yaṃjhānahetū”ti. Sukhapāramippatteti
tika-vin07t:235_8: sukhassa ukkaṃsapariyantaṃ patte. Evametesaṃ pahānaṃ veditabbanti sambandho. Atha
tika-vin07t:237_0: Kattha cuppannanti ettha katthāti hetumhi bhummaṃ, kasmiṃ hetumhi satīti attho. Nānāvajjaneti
tika-vin07t:237_1: appanāvīthiāvajjanato nānā bhinnaṃ purimavīthīsu āvajjanaṃ yassa upacārassa, tasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:237_2: nānāvajjane. Visamanisajjāya uppannakilamatho visamāsanupatāpo. Upacāre vātiādi pakkhantaradassanaṃ
tika-vin07t:237_3: ekāvajjanūpacārepi vāti attho. Pītipharaṇenāti iminā appanāvīthiyā viya ekavīthiyampi
tika-vin07t:237_4: kāmāvacarapītiyā pharaṇamattassa abhāvaṃ dasseti. Domanassindriyassa assa siyā uppattīti
tika-vin07t:237_5: sambandho. Etanti domanassindriyaṃ uppajjatīti sambandho. Vitakkavicārappaccayepīti
tika-vin07t:237_6: pi-saddo aṭṭhānappayutto. So “pahīnassā”ti heṭṭhā vuttapadānantaraṃ yojetabbo “pahīnassāpi
tika-vin07t:237_8: ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummaṃ, vitakkavicārabhāvahetūti attho.
tika-vin07t:237_9: Vitakkavicārāti ettha iti-saddo tasmāti etasmiṃ atthe daṭṭhabbo, tena yasmā etaṃ
tika-vin07t:237_10: domanassindriyaṃ vitakkavicārapaccaye…pe… neva uppajjati, yattha pana uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:237_11: tattha vitakkavicārabhāveyeva uppajjati. Yasmā ca appahīnāyeva dutiyajjhānūpacāre
tika-vin07t:237_12: vitakkavicārā, tasmā tatthassa siyā uppattīti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:238_0: Tatthāti dutiyajjhānūpacāre. Assāti domanassindriyassa. Siyā uppattīti idañca paccayamattadassanena
tika-vin07t:238_1: sambhāvanamattato vuttaṃ. Domanassuppattisambhāvanāpi hi upacārakkhaṇeyeva kātuṃ
tika-vin07t:238_2: yuttā, vitakkavicārarahite pana dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe taduppattisambhāvanāpi na yuttā
tika-vin07t:238_4: siyā uppattī”ti na vattabbaṃ siyā. Samīpatthe vā etaṃ bhummaṃ, upacārajjhānānantaravīthīsūti
tika-vin07t:238_5: attho. Dutiyajjhāneti etthāpi anantaravīthīsupi na tveva uppajjatīti attho, evaṃ
tika-vin07t:238_6: upari sukhindriyepi. Somanassindriyassa uppattīti sambandho. Pahīnāti vuttāti idaṃ
tika-vin07t:238_7: “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā”ti vuttattā vuttaṃ. Dukkhābhāvenāti
tika-vin07t:238_8: dukkhatābhāvena. Evaṃ sukhābhāvenāti etthāpi. Etenāti dukkhasukhapaṭikkhepavacanena.
tika-vin07t:238_10: anubhavanalakkhaṇā, majjhattārammaṇampi hi iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu eva paviṭṭhaṃ tabbinimuttassa abhāvā.
tika-vin07t:241_0: 12. Arūpajjhānānampi aṅgasamatāya catutthajjhāne saṅgahoti āha kesañci abhiññāpādakānītiādi,
tika-vin07t:241_1: teneva vakkhati “aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā”tiādi. Tesu ca catutthajjhānameva
tika-vin07t:241_2: abhiññāpādakaṃ nirodhapādakaṃ hoti, na itarāni. Dūrakāraṇataṃ pana sandhāya “cattāri
tika-vin07t:241_3: jhānānī”ti nesampi ekato gahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Cittekaggatatthānīti idaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ
tika-vin07t:241_4: sandhāya vuttanti āha khīṇāsavānantiādi. Sabbakiccasādhakanti dibbavihārādisabbabuddhakiccasādhakaṃ.
tika-vin07t:241_6: Idañhi jhānaṃ bhagavato sabbabuddhaguṇadāyakassa maggañāṇassa padaṭṭhānattā evaṃ
tika-vin07t:241_7: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathayidanti yathā idaṃ. Abhinīhārakkhamanti iddhividhādiatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:242_1: Pāpakānanti lāmakānaṃ. Icchāvacarānanti icchāya vasena otiṇṇānaṃ nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ tadekaṭṭhatañca
tika-vin07t:242_2: appattānaṃ attukkaṃsanādivasappavattānaṃ aho vata mameva satthā paṭipucchitvā bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin07t:242_3: evarūpaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyātiādinayappavattānaṃ mānādīnaṃ. Potthakesu pana “jhānappaṭilābhapaccanīkāna”ntipi
tika-vin07t:242_4: pāṭhaṃ likhanti, so pamādapāṭhoti gahetabbo “jhānappaṭilābhapaccanīkānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ
tika-vin07t:242_5: abhāvassa nīvaraṇadūrībhāvena parisuddho”ti evaṃ pubbe parisuddhapadeyeva vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:242_6: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ
tika-vin07t:242_7: pavattānaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kopaappaccayānanti atthoti ayampi pāṭho ayutto evāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:242_8: Tato eva ca visuddhimagge ayaṃ pāṭho sabbena sabbaṃ na dassito”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin07t:242_9: ca nānappakārānaṃ kopaappaccayānanti evaṃ nīvaraṇabhāvappattadosānaṃ parāmaṭṭhattā
tika-vin07t:243_0: Abhijjhādīnanti ettha abhijjhā-saddena ca anīvaraṇasabhāvasseva lobhassa mānādīnañca
tika-vin07t:243_1: gahaṇaṃ jhānappaṭilābhapaccayānanti anuvattamānattā. Ubhayampīti anaṅgaṇattaṃ vigatūpakkilesattañcāti
tika-vin07t:243_2: etaṃ ubhayampi yathākkamaṃ anaṅgaṇasuttavatthasuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ. Tesu ca
tika-vin07t:243_3: suttesu kiñcāpi nīvaraṇasabhāvappattā thūladosāpi vuttā, tathāpi adhigatacatautthajjhānassa
tika-vin07t:243_4: vasena vuttattā idha sukhumā eva te gahitā. Aṅgaṇupakkilesasāmaññena panettha suttānaṃ
tika-vin07t:243_5: apadisanaṃ. Tathā hi “suttānusārenā”ti vuttaṃ, na pana suttavasenāti.
tika-vin07t:244_0: Pubbenivāsānussatiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇanti nibbacanaṃ dassento āha pubbenivāsānussatimhītiādi.
tika-vin07t:244_1: Idāni pubbenivāsaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiṃ tattha ñāṇañca vibhāgato dassetuṃ tatthātiādi
tika-vin07t:244_2: vuttaṃ. Pubba-saddo atītabhavavisayo, nivāsa-saddo ca kammasādhanoti āha “pubbe atītajātīsu
tika-vin07t:244_3: nivutthakkhandhā”ti. Nivutthatā cettha sakasantāne pavattatā, tenāha anubhūtātiādi.
tika-vin07t:244_5: vā nivutthā”ti vatvā taṃ vivarituṃ gocaranivāsenātiādi vuttaṃ. Gocarabhūtāpi hi dhammā
tika-vin07t:244_6: ñāṇena nivutthā nāma honti, te pana saparaviññāṇagocaratāya duvidhāti dassetuṃ attanotiādi
tika-vin07t:244_7: vuttaṃ. Paraviññāṇaviññātāpi vā nivutthāti sambandho. Idhāpi paricchinnāti padaṃ
tika-vin07t:244_8: ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Anamataggepi hi saṃsāre attanā aviññātapubbānaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-vin07t:244_9: khandhā pareheva kehici viññātattā paraviññāṇaviññātā nāma vuttā, tesaṃ anussaraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:244_10: purimato dukkaraṃ yehi parehi viññātatāya te paraviññāṇaviññātā nāma jātā, tesaṃ
tika-vin07t:244_11: vattamānasantānānusārena viññātabbato. Te ca paraviññāṇaviññātā duvidhā parinibbutā
tika-vin07t:244_12: aparinibbutāti. Tesu ca parinibbutānussaraṇaṃ dukkaraṃ sabbaso susamucchinnasantānattā.
tika-vin07t:244_14: vuttaṃ. Tattha chinnavaṭumakā atīte parinibbutā khīṇāsavā chinnasaṃsāramaggattā.
tika-vin07t:244_16: gahitaṃ. Yāya satiyā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, sā pubbenivāsānussatīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:245_1: attho. Vihitanti vā payuttaṃ vaṇṇitanti atthaṃ gahetvā “anekehi pakārehi vihita”nti
tika-vin07t:245_2: vattabbe majjhepadalopaṃ katvā niddiṭṭhanti āha “anekehi…pe… saṃvaṇṇita”nti. Pakārehīti
tika-vin07t:245_3: nāmagottādipakārehi. Saṃvaṇṇitanti buddhādīhi kathitaṃ. Anu-saddo anantaratthadīpakoti
tika-vin07t:245_4: āha “abhininnāmitamatte evā”ti, etena ca parikammassa āraddhataṃ dasseti. Pūritapāramīnañhītiādinā
tika-vin07t:246_0: Āraddhappakāradassanattheti anussarituṃ āraddhānaṃ pubbe nivutthakkhandhānaṃ dassanatthe.
tika-vin07t:246_1: Jāyatīti jāti, bhavo. So ekakammamūlako ādānanikkhepaparicchinno khandhappabandho
tika-vin07t:246_2: idha “jātī”ti adhippetoti āha ekampītiādi. Kappoti asaṅkhyeyyakappo, so pana atthato
tika-vin07t:246_3: kālo tathāpavattadhammamupādāya paññatto, tesaṃ vasenassa parihāni ca vaḍḍhi ca veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:246_4: Saṃvaṭṭo saṃvaṭṭanaṃ vināso assa atthīti saṃvaṭṭo, asaṅkhyeyyakappo. Saṃvaṭṭena vināsena
