tika-vin07t:347_0: Yenāti kāraṇena. Asaṃvāsoti idaṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve kenacipi pariyāyena bhikkhu hutvā
tika-vin07t:347_1: bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ nārahatīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha “asaṃvāso”ti.
tika-vin07t:347_2: Paññattaṃ samūhaneyyāti “so āgato na pabbājetabbo”ti avatvā “na upasampādetabbo”ti
tika-vin07t:347_3: ettakasseva vuttattā pārājikassa sāmaṇerabhūmi anuññātāti viññāyati, tenāha sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:347_4: pana ṭhitotiādi. “Yo pana bhikkhū”ti vuttattā paccakkhātasikkho yasmā bhikkhu na
tika-vin07t:347_5: hoti, methunasevane ca pārājikaṃ nāpajjati, tasmāssa “āgato upasampādetabbo”ti upasampadaṃ
tika-vin07t:347_6: anujānanto pārājikaṃ na samūhanati nāma, tenāha “bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā avipannasīlatāyā”ti.
tika-vin07t:349_0: 45. Nīharitvāti pāḷito uddharitvā, tathā hi “pañcahupāli, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā
tika-vin07t:349_1: nānuyuñjitabbaṃ. Katamehi pañcahi? Suttaṃ na jānāti, suttānulomaṃ na jānātī”tiādipāḷito
tika-vin07t:349_2: suttaṃ suttānulomañca nīhariṃsu. “Anāpatti evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho paripucchāti
tika-vin07t:349_3: bhaṇatī”ti evamādito ācariyavādaṃ. “Āyasmā upāli evamāha – ‘anāpatti, āvuso, supinantenā’ti”
tika-vin07t:349_4: evamādito attano matiṃ nīhariṃsu, sā ca therassa attanomati suttena saṅgahitattā
tika-vin07t:349_5: suttaṃ jātaṃ, evamaññāpi suttādīhi saṅgahitāva gahetabbā, netarāti veditabbaṃ. Atha
tika-vin07t:349_6: vā nīharitvāti vibhajitvā sāṭṭhakathaṃ sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ suttādīsu catūsu padesesu
tika-vin07t:349_7: pakkhipitvā catudhā vibhajitvā vinayaṃ pakāsesuṃ tabbinimuttassa abhāvāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:349_9: āharitvā attano vacīviññattiyāva bhāsitavacanaṃ āhaccapadaṃ. Rasoti sāro “pattaraso”tiādīsu
tika-vin07t:349_10: viya, paṭikkhittaanuññātasuttasāroti attho, rasoti vā lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivatthukaṃ anuddharitvā
tika-vin07t:349_11: lakkhaṇānulomena vuttattā. Dhammasaṅgāhakādiācariyavaṃsena ābhatā aṭṭhakathā ācariyavaṃsoti
tika-vin07t:350_0: Vinayapiṭake pāḷīti idha adhikāravasena vuttaṃ. Sesapiṭakesupi suttādicatunayā yathānurūpaṃ
tika-vin07t:350_1: labbhanteva. Mahāpadesāti mahāokāsā mahāvisayā, te atthato “yaṃ, bhikkhave”tiādipāḷivasena
tika-vin07t:350_2: akappiyānulomato kappiyānulomato ca puggalehi nayato tathā tathā gayhamānā atthanayā
tika-vin07t:350_3: eva. Te hi bhagavatā sarūpato avuttesupi paṭikkhittānulomesu, anuññātānulomesu ca
tika-vin07t:350_4: sesesu kiccesu nivattipavattihetutāya mahāgocarāti “mahāpadesā”ti vuttā, na pana
tika-vin07t:350_5: “yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā idaṃ na kappatī”tiādinā vuttā sādhippāyā pāḷiyeva tassā sutte
tika-vin07t:350_6: paviṭṭhattā. “Suttānulomampi sutte otāretabbaṃ…pe… suttameva balavatara”nti hi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:350_7: na hesā sādhippāyā pāḷi sutte otāretabbā, na gahetabbā vā hoti, yenāyaṃ suttānulomaṃ
tika-vin07t:350_8: siyā. Tasmā imaṃ pāḷiadhippāyaṃ nissāya puggalehi gahitā yathāvuttaatthāva suttānulomaṃ.
tika-vin07t:350_9: Tappakāsakattā pana ayaṃ pāḷipi suttānulomanti gahetabbaṃ, tenāha ye bhagavatā evaṃ
tika-vin07t:350_10: vuttātiādi. Yaṃ bhikkhavetiādipāḷinayena hi puggalehi gahetabbā ye akappiyānulomādayo
tika-vin07t:351_0: Bhagavato pakiṇṇakadesanābhūtā ca suttānulomabhūtā ca aṭṭhakathā. Yasmā dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi
tika-vin07t:351_1: pāḷivaṇṇanākkamena saṅgahetvā vuttā, tasmā “ācariyavādo”ti vuttā, etena ca aṭṭhakathā
tika-vin07t:351_2: suttasuttānulomesu atthato saṅgayhatīti veditabbā. Yathā ca esā, evaṃ attanomatipi
tika-vin07t:351_3: pamāṇabhūtā. Na hi bhagavato vacanaṃ vacanānulomañca anissāya aggasāvakādayopi attano
tika-vin07t:351_4: ñāṇabalena suttābhidhammavinayesu kañci sammutiparamatthabhedaṃ atthaṃ vattuṃ sakkonti,
tika-vin07t:351_5: tasmā sabbampi vacanaṃ sutte suttānulome ca saṅgayhati. Visuṃ pana aṭṭhakathādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:351_6: saṅgahitattā tadavasesaṃ suttasuttānulomato gahetvā catudhā vinayo niddiṭṭho. Suttādayo
tika-vin07t:351_7: nissāyeva pavattāpi attanomati tesu sarūpena anāgatattā vuttaṃ “suttasuttānulomaācariyavāde
tika-vin07t:351_8: muñcitvā”ti, tenāha “anubuddhiyā nayaggāhenā”ti. Tattha suttādīni anugatāya eva buddhiyā
tika-vin07t:352_0: Theravādoti mahāsumattherādīnaṃ gāho. Suttādiṃ nissāyeva viparītatopi attanomati
tika-vin07t:352_1: uppajjatīti āha taṃ panātiādi. Atthenāti attanā nayaggahitena atthena. Pāḷinti attano
tika-vin07t:352_2: gāhassa nissayabhūtaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷiṃ. Pāḷiyāti tappaṭikkhepatthaṃ parenāhaṭāya
tika-vin07t:352_3: sāṭṭhakathāya pāḷiyā, attanā gahitaṃ atthaṃ nissāya pāḷiñca saṃsanditvāti attho.
tika-vin07t:352_4: Ācariyavādeti attanā parena ca samuddhaṭaaṭṭhakathāya. Otarati ceva sameti cāti attanā
tika-vin07t:352_5: uddhaṭehi saṃsandanavasena otarati, parena uddhaṭena sameti. Sabbadubbalāti asabbaññupuggalassa
tika-vin07t:352_6: dosavāsanāya yāthāvato atthasampaṭipattiabhāvato vuttaṃ. Pamādapāṭhavasena ācariyavādassa
tika-vin07t:352_7: suttānulomena asaṃsandanāpi siyāti āha “itaro na gahetabbo”ti.
tika-vin07t:353_0: Samentameva gahetabbanti ye suttena saṃsandanti, evarūpāva atthā mahāpadesato uddharitabbāti
tika-vin07t:353_1: dasseti tathā tathā uddhaṭaatthānameva suttānulomattā, tenāha “suttānulomato hi suttameva
tika-vin07t:353_2: balavatara”nti. Appaṭivattiyanti appaṭibāhiyaṃ. Kārakasaṅghasadisanti pamāṇattā saṅgītikārakasaṅghasadisaṃ.
tika-vin07t:353_3: Buddhānaṃ ṭhitakālasadisanti dharamānakabuddhasadisanti attho. Sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin07t:353_4: kathetītiādīsu yo yathābhūtamatthaṃ gahetvā kathanasīlo, so sakavādī. Suttanti saṅgītittayāruḷhaṃ
tika-vin07t:353_5: pāḷivacanaṃ. Paravādīti mahāvihāravāsī vā hotu aññanikāyavāsī vā, yo viparītato atthaṃ
tika-vin07t:353_6: gahetvā kathanasīlo, sova idha “paravādī”ti vutto. Suttānulomanti saṅgītittayāruḷhaṃ
tika-vin07t:353_7: vā anāruḷhaṃ vā yaṃkiñci vipallāsato vā vañcanāya vā “saṅgītittayāgatamida”nti dassiyamānaṃ
tika-vin07t:353_8: suttānulomaṃ. Keci “aññanikāye suttānuloma”nti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ sakavādīparavādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:353_9: ubhinnampi saṅgītittayāruḷhasuttādīnaṃ eva gahetabbato. Tathā hi vakkhati “tisso
tika-vin07t:353_10: saṅgītiyo āruḷhaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyati, gahetabba”ntiādi. Na hi sakavādī aññanikāyasuttādiṃ
tika-vin07t:353_11: pamāṇato gaṇhāti, yena tesu suttādīsu dassitesu tattha ṭhātabbaṃ bhaveyya, vakkhati
tika-vin07t:353_12: ca “paro tassa akappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti…pe…
tika-vin07t:353_13: ‘sādhū’ti sampaṭicchitvā akappiyeyeva ṭhātabba”nti. Tasmā paravādināpi saṅgītittaye
tika-vin07t:353_14: anāruḷhampi anāruḷhamicceva dassīyati, kevalaṃ tassa tassa suttādino saṅgītittaye
tika-vin07t:353_15: anāgatassa kūṭatā, āgatassa ca byañjanacchāyāya aññathā adhippāyayojanā ca viseso.
tika-vin07t:353_16: Tattha ca yaṃ kūṭaṃ, taṃ apanīyati. Yaṃ aññathā yojitaṃ, tassa viparītatāsandassanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:353_17: tadaññena suttādinā saṃsandanā karīyati. Yo pana paravādinā gahito adhippāyo suttantādinā
tika-vin07t:353_18: saṃsandati, so sakavādināpi attano gāhaṃ vissajjetvā gahetabboti ubhinnampi saṅgītittayāgatameva
tika-vin07t:353_19: suttādipamāṇanti veditabbaṃ. Teneva kathāvatthuppakaraṇe sakavāde pañca suttasatāni
tika-vin07t:353_20: paravāde pañcāti suttasahassampi adhippāyaggahaṇanānattena saṅgītittayāgatameva gahitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:354_0: Khepanti “kiṃ iminā”ti paṭikkhepaṃ chaḍḍanaṃ. Garahanti “kimesa bālo jānātī”ti nindanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:354_1: Sutte otāretabbanti yassa suttassa anulomanato idaṃ suttānulomaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ, tadanurūpe
tika-vin07t:354_2: vā aññatarasmiṃ sutte attanā gahitaṃ suttānulomaṃ atthato saṃsandanavasena otāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:354_3: “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena imasmiṃ sutte saṃsandatī”ti saṃsanditvā dassetabbanti
tika-vin07t:354_4: attho. Ayanti sakavādī. Paroti paravādī. Ācariyavādo sutte otāretabboti yassa suttassa
tika-vin07t:354_5: vaṇṇanāvasena ayaṃ ācariyavādo pavatto, tasmiṃ, tādise ca aññatarasmiṃ sutte pubbāparaatthasaṃsandanavasena
tika-vin07t:354_6: otāretabbaṃ. Gārayhācariyavādoti pamādalikhito, bhinnaladdhikehi vā ṭhapito, esa nayo sabbattha.
tika-vin07t:355_0: Yaṃ kiñci kūṭasuttaṃ bāhirakasuttādivacanaṃ na gahetabbanti dassetuṃ suttaṃ suttānulome
tika-vin07t:355_2: Ādi-saddena guḷhaummaggādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā katheti, paravādīpi
tika-vin07t:355_3: suttantiādinā aññepi vādālambanā vuttanayena sakkā ñātunti idha na vuttā.
tika-vin07t:356_0: Evaṃ suttasuttānulomādimukhena sāmaññato vivādaṃ dassetvā idāni visesato vivādavatthuṃ
tika-vin07t:356_1: tabbinicchayamukhena suttādīnañca dassetuṃ atha panāyaṃ kappiyantiādi vuttaṃ. Sutte
tika-vin07t:356_2: ca suttānulome cāti ettha ca-kāro vikappattho, tena ācariyavādādīnampi saṅgaho, tenāha
tika-vin07t:356_3: “kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dassetī”ti. Tattha kāraṇanti suttādinayaṃ nissāya attanomatiyā
tika-vin07t:356_4: uddhaṭaṃ hetuṃ. Vinicchayanti aṭṭhakathāvinicchayaṃ. Kāraṇacchāyāti suttādīsu “kappiya”nti
tika-vin07t:356_5: gāhassa, “akappiya”nti gāhassa ca nimittabhūtaṃ kicchena paṭipādanīyaṃ avibhūtakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:356_6: kāraṇacchāyā, kāraṇapatirūpakanti attho. Vinayañhi patvāti imassa vivaraṇaṃ kappiyākappiyavicāraṇamāgammāti.
tika-vin07t:356_7: Rundhitabbanti kappiyasaññāya vītikkamakaraṇaṃ rundhitabbaṃ, taṃnivāraṇacittaṃ daḷhataraṃ
tika-vin07t:356_8: kātabbaṃ. Sotaṃ pacchinditabbanti tattha vītikkamappavatti pacchinditabbā. Garukabhāveti
tika-vin07t:356_9: akappiyabhāve. Suttavinicchayakāraṇehīti suttena aṭṭhakathāvinicchayena ca laddhakāraṇehi.
tika-vin07t:356_10: Evantiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa nigamanavacanaṃ. Atirekakāraṇanti suttādīsu purimaṃ
tika-vin07t:357_0: Vācuggatanti vācāya uggataṃ, tattha nirantaraṃ ṭhitanti attho. “Suttaṃ nāma sakalaṃ
tika-vin07t:357_1: vinayapiṭaka”nti vuttattā puna suttatoti tadatthapaṭipādakaṃ suttābhidhammapāḷivacanaṃ
tika-vin07t:357_2: adhippetaṃ. Anubyañjanatoti imassa vivaraṇaṃ paripucchato ca aṭṭhakathāto cāti. Tattha
tika-vin07t:357_3: paripucchāti ācariyassa santikā pāḷiyā atthasavanaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāti pāḷimuttakavinicchayo.
tika-vin07t:357_4: Tadubhayampi hi pāḷiṃ anugantvā atthassa byañjanato “anubyañjana”nti vuttaṃ. Vinayeti
tika-vin07t:357_5: vinayācāre, teneva vakkhati vinayaṃ avijahanto avokkamantotiādi. Tattha patiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:357_6: nāma sañcicca āpattiyā anāpajjanādi hotīti āha “lajjībhāvena patiṭṭhito”ti, tena
tika-vin07t:357_7: lajjī hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Vinayadharassa lakkhaṇe vattabbe kiṃ iminā lajjībhāvenāti
tika-vin07t:357_8: āha alajjī hītiādi. Tattha bahussutopīti iminā paṭhamalakkhaṇasamannāgamaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:357_9: Lābhagarutāyātiādinā vinaye ṭhitatāya abhāve paṭhamalakkhaṇayogo kiccakaro na hoti,
tika-vin07t:357_10: atha kho akiccakaro anatthakaro evāti dasseti. Saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāgo kalaho saṅgharāji.
tika-vin07t:358_0: Vitthunatīti vitthambhati, nitthunati vā santiṭṭhituṃ na sakkoti, tenāha yaṃ yantiādi.
tika-vin07t:358_1: Ācariyaparamparāti ācariyānaṃ vinicchayaparamparā, teneva vakkhati “attano matiṃ
tika-vin07t:358_2: pahāya…pe… yathā ācariyo ca ācariyācariyo ca pāḷiñca paripucchañca vadanti, tathā
tika-vin07t:358_3: ñātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Na hi ācariyānaṃ nāmamattato paramparājānane payojanamatthi. Pubbāparānusandhitoti
tika-vin07t:358_4: pubbavacanassa aparavacanena saha atthasambandhajānanato. Atthatoti padatthapiṇḍatthaadhippetatthādito.
tika-vin07t:358_5: Kāraṇatoti tadatthupapattito. Theravādaṅganti theravādapaṭipāṭiṃ, tesaṃ vinicchayapaṭipāṭinti attho.
tika-vin07t:359_0: Imehi ca pana tīhi lakkhaṇehīti ettha paṭhamena lakkhaṇena vinayassa suṭṭhu uggahitabhāvo
tika-vin07t:359_1: vutto. Dutiyenassa lajjībhāvena ceva acalatāya ca patiṭṭhitatā. Tatiyena pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin07t:359_2: anurūpena anāgatampi tadanulomato ācariyehi dinnanayato vinicchinituṃ samatthatā.
tika-vin07t:359_3: Otiṇṇe vatthusminti codanāvasena vītikkamavatthusmiṃ saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇe. Codakena
tika-vin07t:359_4: cuditakena ca vutte vattabbeti evaṃ otiṇṇe vatthuṃ nissāya codakena “diṭṭhaṃ suta”ntiādinā
tika-vin07t:359_5: cuditakena “atthi natthī”tiādinā ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ, tasmiṃ vattabbe vutteti attho.
tika-vin07t:359_6: Thullaccayadubbhāsitānaṃ mātikāya anāgatattā “pañcannaṃ āpattīna”nti vuttaṃ. Tikadukkaṭanti
tika-vin07t:359_7: “anupasampanne upasampannasaññī ujjhāyati vā khīyati vā āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādinā
tika-vin07t:359_8: āgataṃ tikadukkaṭaṃ. Aññataraṃ vā āpattinti “kāle vikālasaññī āpatti dukkaṭassa,
tika-vin07t:359_9: kāle vematiko āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādikaṃ dukadukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Antarāpattinti
tika-vin07t:359_10: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade āgatavatthuvītikkamaṃ vinā aññasmiṃ vatthuvītikkame nidānato
tika-vin07t:359_11: pabhuti vinītavatthupariyosānā antarantarā vuttaṃ āpattiṃ. Idha pana “vatthuṃ oloketī”ti
tika-vin07t:359_12: visuṃ gahitattā tadavasesā antarāpattīti gahitā. Paṭilātaṃ ukkhipatīti idaṃ visibbanasikkhāpade
tika-vin07t:359_13: āgataṃ. Tattha ḍayhamānaṃ alātaṃ aggikapālādito bahi patitaṃ avijjhātameva paṭiukkhipati,
tika-vin07t:359_14: puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetīti attho. Vijjhātaṃ pana pakkhipantassa pācittiyameva. Anāpattinti
tika-vin07t:359_15: ettha antarantarā vuttā anāpattipi atthi, “anāpatti, bhikkhave, iddhimassa iddhivisaye”tiādi
tika-vin07t:360_0: Pārājikāpattīti na tāva vattabbanti idaṃ āpannapuggalena lajjīdhamme ṭhatvā yathābhūtaṃ
tika-vin07t:360_1: āvikaraṇepi dubbinicchayaṃ adinnādānādiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana methunādīsu vijānanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:360_2: taṃ vattabbameva, tenāha methunadhammavītikkamo hītiādi. Yo pana alajjitāya paṭiññaṃ
tika-vin07t:360_3: adatvā vikkhepaṃ karoti, tassa āpatti na sakkā oḷārikāpi vinicchinituṃ, yāva so yathābhūtaṃ
tika-vin07t:360_4: nāvi karoti, saṅghassa ca āpattisandeho na vigacchati, tāva nāsitakova bhavissati.
tika-vin07t:360_5: Sukhumāti cittaparivattiyā sukhumatāya sukhumā. Tenāha “cittalahukā”ti, cittaṃ tassa
tika-vin07t:360_6: lahukanti attho. Teti vītikkame. Taṃvatthukanti adinnādānādimūlakaṃ. Yaṃ ācariyo
tika-vin07t:360_7: bhaṇati, taṃ karohītiādi sabbaṃ lajjīpesalaṃ kukkuccakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yo yāthāvato
tika-vin07t:360_8: pakāsetvā suddhimeva gavesati, tenāpi, pārājikosīti na vattabboti anāpattikoṭiyāpi
tika-vin07t:360_9: saṅkiyamānattā vuttaṃ, teneva “pārājikacchāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Sīlāni sodhetvāti yasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:360_10: vītikkame pārājikāsaṅkā vattati, tattha pārājikābhāvapakkhaṃ gahetvā desanāvuṭṭhānagāminīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:360_11: āpattīnaṃ sodhanavasena sīlāni sodhetvā. Dvattiṃsākāranti pākaṭabhāvato upalakkhaṇavasena
tika-vin07t:360_12: vuttaṃ, yaṃ kiñci abhirucitaṃ manasikātuṃ vaṭṭateva. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭiyatīti vippaṭisāramūlakena
tika-vin07t:360_13: vikkhepena antarantarā khaṇḍaṃ adassetvā pabandhavasena cittena saṅghaṭiyati. Saṅkhārāti
tika-vin07t:360_14: vipassanākammaṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ. Sāpattikassa hi paguṇampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ na suṭṭhu
tika-vin07t:360_15: upaṭṭhāti, pageva pārājikassa. Tassa hi vippaṭisāraninnatāya cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin07t:360_16: Ekassa pana vitakkavikkhepādibahulassa suddhasīlassapi cittaṃ na samādhiyati, taṃ
tika-vin07t:360_17: idha pārājikamūlakanti na gahetabbaṃ. Katapāpamūlakena vippaṭisārenevettha cittassa
tika-vin07t:360_18: asamādhiyanaṃ sandhāya “kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ghaṭiyatī”ti vuttaṃ, tenāha vippaṭisāragginātiādi.
tika-vin07t:360_19: Attanāti cittena karaṇabhūtena puggalo kattā jānāti, paccatte vā karaṇavacanaṃ, attā
tika-vin07t:363_0: Yo viya dissatīti yādiso, yaṃ-saddatthe yathā-saddo vattatīti āha “yena vā tena vā
tika-vin07t:363_1: yutto”ti. Yena tenāti hi padadvayena aniyamato yaṃ-saddatthova dassito. Vāsadhurayuttoti
tika-vin07t:363_2: vipassanādhurayutto. Yā jāti assāti yaṃjāti, puggalo, sova yaṃjacco sakatthe yapaccayaṃ
tika-vin07t:363_3: katvā. Gottavasena yena vā tena vā gottena yathāgotto vā tathāgotto vā hotūti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:363_4: Sīlesūti pakatīsu. Atha khoti idaṃ kintūti imasmiṃ atthe. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin07t:363_5: Imasmiṃ attheti imasmiṃ pārājikavisaye. Esoti yathāvuttehi pakārehi yutto. Ariyāyāti
tika-vin07t:363_6: “uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyānaṃ yācanā”ti evaṃ vuttāya, na, “dehi me”ti kapaṇāya.
tika-vin07t:363_8: sampaṭicchanena. Kājabhattanti kājehi ānītabhattaṃ. Adhammikāyāti adhisīlasikkhādibhikkhuguṇābhāvato
tika-vin07t:363_9: vuttaṃ, tenāha “abhūtāyā”ti. “Mayaṃ bhikkhū”ti vadantā paṭiññāmatteneva bhikkhū,
tika-vin07t:363_10: na atthatoti attho. Idañca “mayaṃ bhikkhū”ti paṭijānanassāpi sambhavato vuttaṃ. “Mayaṃ
tika-vin07t:363_11: bhikkhū”ti appaṭijānantāpi hi bhikkhuvohāranimittassa liṅgassa gahaṇena ceva bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin07t:363_12: dinnapaccayabhāgaggahaṇādinā ca bhikkhupaṭiññā eva nāma honti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ puggalapaññattiaṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
tika-vin07t:364_0: “‘Abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño’ti aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe supārute sumbhakapattadhare
tika-vin07t:364_1: gāmanigamajanapadarājadhānīsu piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappente disvā sayampi tādisena
tika-vin07t:364_2: ākārena tathā paṭipajjanato ‘ahaṃ brahmacārī’ti paṭiññaṃ dento viya hoti. ‘Ahaṃ bhikkhū’ti
tika-vin07t:364_3: vatvā uposathaggādīni pavisanto pana brahmacāripaṭiñño hotiyeva, tathā saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ gaṇhanto”ti.
tika-vin07t:365_0: Tasmā evarūpehi paṭiññāya bhikkhūhi gotrabhupariyosānehi saddhiṃ sambhogaparibhogo
tika-vin07t:365_1: na vaṭṭati, alajjīparibhogova hoti. Sañcicca āpattiāpajjanādialajjīlakkhaṇaṃ pana
tika-vin07t:365_2: ukkaṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ sāmaṇerādīnampi alajjīvohāradassanato. “Alajjīsāmaṇerehi
tika-vin07t:365_3: hatthakammampi na kāretabba”nti hi vuttaṃ. Yathāvihitapaṭipattiyaṃ atiṭṭhanañhi sabbasādhāraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:365_4: alajjīlakkhaṇaṃ. Dussīlā liṅgaggahaṇato paṭṭhāya yathāvihitapaṭipattiyā abhāvato
tika-vin07t:365_5: ekantā lajjinova mahāsaṅghikādinikāyantarikā viya, liṅgatthenakādayo viya, ca. Yāva
tika-vin07t:365_6: 11 ca tesaṃ bhikkhupaṭiññā anuvattati, tāva bhikkhu eva, tehi ca paribhogo alajjipaabhogova,
tika-vin07t:365_7: tesañca bhikkhusaṅghasaññāya dinnaṃ saṅghe dinnaṃ nāma hoti. Vuttañhi bhagavatā –
tika-vin07t:366_0: “Bhavissanti kho panānanda, anāgatamaddhānaṃ gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā,
tika-vin07t:366_1: tesu dussīlesu saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dassanti, tadāpāhaṃ, ānanda, saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:367_0: Bhagavato saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnattā dakkhiṇā asaṅkhyeyyā appameyyā jātā. Dussīlānaṃ
tika-vin07t:367_1: dinnattā nāti ce? Na, tesu saṅghaṃ uddissāti gotrabhūnaṃ paṭiggāhakattena parāmaṭṭhattā,
tika-vin07t:367_2: itarathā “yesu kesuci gahaṭṭhesu vā pabbajitesu vā saṅghaṃ uddissā”ti vattabbatāpasaṅgato,
tika-vin07t:367_3: tathā ca “tadāpāhaṃ, ānandā”ti heṭṭhimakoṭidassanassa payojanaṃ na siyā. Tasmā gotrabhūnampi
tika-vin07t:367_4: abhāve saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ natthi, heṭṭhimakoṭiyā tesupi dinnā saṅghagatā dakkhiṇā
tika-vin07t:367_5: asaṅkhyeyyā, na tato paraṃ sijjhatīti tepi paṭiññāya bhikkhu evāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:368_0: Brahmaghosanti uttamaghosaṃ, brahmuno ghosasadisaṃ vā ghosaṃ. Ehi bhikkhūti “bhikkhū”tisambodhanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:368_1: Saṃsāre bhayaikkhaka tassa bhayassa sabbaso vināsanatthaṃ tisaraṇaṃ, sāsanaṃ vā ehi
tika-vin07t:368_2: manasā “tāṇaṃ leṇa”nti pavisa upagaccha. Upagantvāpi cara brahmacariyanti sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ
tika-vin07t:368_3: maggabrahmacariyañca carassu. Bhaṇḍūti muṇḍitakeso. Vāsīti dantakaṭṭhādicchedanavāsi.
tika-vin07t:368_4: Bandhananti kāyabandhanaṃ. Yutto yogo samādhipaññāvasena so yuttayogo, tassa aṭṭhete
tika-vin07t:368_5: parikkhārāti seso. Sarīre paṭimukkehiyeva upalakkhitoti seso. “Tīṇi satānī”ti vattabbe
tika-vin07t:369_0: Tasmāti bhagavā heṭṭhā vuttaṃ parāmasati. Heṭṭhā hi “ahaṃ kho pana, kassapa, jānaññeva
tika-vin07t:369_1: vadāmi ‘jānāmī’ti, passaññeva vadāmi ‘passāmī”’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ parāmasati, yasmā ahaṃ
tika-vin07t:369_2: jānaṃ vadāmi, tasmāti attho. Ihāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Tibbanti mahantaṃ. Paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
tika-vin07t:369_3: bhavissatīti therādiupasaṅkamanato puretarameva tesu yaṃnūna me hirottappaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ
tika-vin07t:369_4: bhavissatīti attho. Kusalūpasaṃhitanti anavajjadhammanissitaṃ. Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti attānaṃ
tika-vin07t:369_5: tena dhammena aṭṭhikaṃ katvā, taṃ vā dhammaṃ “esa me attho”ti atthaṃ katvā. Ohitasototi
tika-vin07t:369_6: dhamme nihitasoto. Evañhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabbanti ñāṇasotañca pasādasotañca odahitvā
tika-vin07t:369_7: “dhammaṃ sakkaccameva suṇissāmī”ti evameva tayā sikkhitabbaṃ. Sātasahagatā ca me
tika-vin07t:369_8: kāyagatāsatīti asubhesu ceva ānāpāne ca paṭhamajjhānavasena sukhasampayuttakāyagatāsati.
tika-vin07t:369_9: Yaṃ panetassa ovādassa sakkaccapaṭiggahaṇaṃ, ayameva therassa pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi.
tika-vin07t:370_1: rūpasaññā. Imeti saññāsīsena niddiṭṭhā ime dve jhānadhammā. Sopāko ca bhagavatā puṭṭho
tika-vin07t:370_2: “rūpāvacarabhāvena ekatthā, byañjanameva nāna”nti āha. Āraddhacittoti ārādhitacitto.
tika-vin07t:371_0: Sabbantimena pariyāyenāti sabbantimena paricchedena. Ñatticatutthā kammavācā upasampadākammassa
tika-vin07t:371_1: kāraṇattā ṭhānaṃ, tassa ṭhānassa arahaṃ anucchavikanti vatthudosādivinimuttakammaṃ
tika-vin07t:371_3: Atha vā ṭhānanti nibbānappattihetuto sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanaṃ vuccati, tassa anucchavikaṃ
tika-vin07t:371_4: kammaṃ ṭhānārahaṃ. Yathāvihitalakkhaṇena hi kammena upasampannova sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ
tika-vin07t:371_5: samādāya paripūretumarahati. Tasmā parisuddhakammavācāpariyosānaṃ sabbaṃ saṅghakiccaṃ
tika-vin07t:371_7: attho. Ayaṃ imasmiṃ attheti ñatticatutthakammena upasampannasseva sabbasikkhāpadesu
tika-vin07t:371_8: vuttattā kiñcāpi ehibhikkhūpasampadādīhi upasampannānaṃ suddhasattānaṃ paṇṇattivajjasikkhāpadavītikkamepi
tika-vin07t:371_9: abhabbatā vā dosābhāvo vā saddato paññāyati, tathāpi atthato tesampi paṇṇattivajjesu,
tika-vin07t:371_10: lokavajjesupi vā surāpānādilahukesu magguppattito pubbe asañciccādinā āpattiāpajjanaṃ
tika-vin07t:371_11: sijjhatiyeva. Tathā hi “dve puggalā abhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ buddhā ca paccekabuddhā
tika-vin07t:371_12: ca. Dve puggalā bhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo cā”ti vuttaṃ. Ñatticatutthena
tika-vin07t:371_13: kammena upasampannoti idaṃ pana sabbasikkhāpadavītikkamārahe sabbakālike ca bhikkhū
tika-vin07t:371_14: gahetvā yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. Niruttivasenāti nibbacanavasena. Abhilāpavasenāti
tika-vin07t:373_0: Vivaṭṭūpanissayā sīlādayo lokiyehi abhivisiṭṭhattā adhisīlādivohārena vuttāti dassetuṃ
tika-vin07t:373_1: katamaṃ panātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha pañcaṅgadasaṅgasīlanti abuddhuppādakāle sīlaṃ
tika-vin07t:373_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ tassa vivaṭṭūpanissayattābhāvā. Yaṃ pana buddhuppāde ratanattayaguṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:373_3: tathato ñatvā sāsane suniviṭṭhasaddhāhi upāsakopāsikāhi ceva sāmaṇerasikkhamānāhi
tika-vin07t:373_4: ca rakkhiyamānaṃ pañcaṅgaaṭṭhaṅgadasaṅgasīlaṃ, tampi adhisīlameva magguppattihetuto.
tika-vin07t:373_5: Vipassanāmagguppattinimittatāya hi pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ lokiyānaṃ sīlehi adhisīlaṃ
tika-vin07t:373_6: jātaṃ adhicittaṃ viya. Na hi vipassanāmagganimittataṃ muñcitvā lokiyacittato adhicittassa
tika-vin07t:373_7: añño koci viseso upalabbhati, tadubhayañca anādimato saṃsāravaṭṭassa attādisāravirahitatāya
tika-vin07t:373_10: tassa saṃsāravaṭṭassa vigamañca, tadupadesakassa sammāsambuddhassa sabbaññutādiaparimitaguṇagaṇayogena
tika-vin07t:373_11: aviparītasaddhammadesakattañca yāthāvato ñatvā paṭipannena samādāya sikkhitabbatāya
tika-vin07t:373_12: vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ jātaṃ, na aññena kāraṇena, tañca vivaṭṭūpanissayattaṃ yadi sāsane
tika-vin07t:373_13: pañcasīlādissāpi samānaṃ, kimidaṃ adhisīlaṃ na siyā. Pañcasīlādimatte ṭhitānañhi
tika-vin07t:373_14: anāthapiṇḍikādīnaṃ gahaṭṭhānampi maggo uppajjati. Na hi adhisīlādhicittaṃ vinā magguppatti
tika-vin07t:373_15: hoti, tañca kiñcāpi kesañci anupanissayatāya tasmiṃ attabhāve magguppattiyā hetu
tika-vin07t:373_16: na hoti, tathāpi bhavantare avassaṃ hotevāti adhisīlameva kālaṃ karontānaṃ kalyāṇaputhujjanānaṃ
tika-vin07t:373_17: pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ viya, tenāha buddhuppādeyeva ca pavattatītiādi. Vivaṭṭaṃ patthetvā
tika-vin07t:373_18: rakkhiyamānampi pañcasīlādi buddhuppādeyeva pavattati. Na hi taṃ paññattintiādi pana
tika-vin07t:373_19: ukkaṭṭhavasena sabbaṃ pātimokkhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tadekadesabhūtampi hi pāṇātipātādinnādānādigahaṭṭhasīlampi.
tika-vin07t:373_20: Buddhāyeva vinaye pārājikasuttavibhaṅgādīsu āgatavasena sabbaso kāyavacīdvāresu magguppattiyā
tika-vin07t:373_22: sakkonti, na aññe. Magguppattiṃ sandhāya hissa adhisīlatā vuttā. Tenāha “pātimokkhasaṃvaratopi
tika-vin07t:373_23: ca maggaphalasampayuttameva sīlaṃ adhisīla”nti. Tasseva hi adhisīlanti abyavadhānena
tika-vin07t:373_24: maggādhiṭṭhānāti. Idha anadhippetanti imasmiṃ paṭhamapārājikavisaye “sikkhā”ti anadhippetaṃ.
tika-vin07t:374_1: aṭṭha rūpārūpajjhānasampayuttacittāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi mahaggatesu lokiyalokuttarabhedo
tika-vin07t:374_2: atthi, yena lokiyavisesanaṃ lokuttaranivattanaṃ siyā. Tasmā sāsanikehi samāpajjitabbamahaggatajjhānanivattanameva
tika-vin07t:374_3: lokiyavisesanaṃ kataṃ. Yathā cettha, evaṃ kāmāvacarāni pana aṭṭha kusalacittānīti
tika-vin07t:374_4: etthāpi lokiyavisesanaṃ kātabbameva. Ayameva hi adhicittato cittassa bhedo, yaṃ sāsanaṃ
tika-vin07t:374_5: ajānantassa puggalassa samuppajjanaṃ. Evañca abuddhuppādepi sāsanasabhāvaṃ jānantānaṃ
tika-vin07t:374_6: paccekabuddhādīnampi sīlacittānaṃ adhisīlādhicittatā samatthitā hoti. Na vinā buddhuppādāti
tika-vin07t:374_7: idaṃ pana aññesaṃ abhisamayahetubhāvena paccekabuddhabodhisattādīnaṃ desanāsāmatthiyābhāvato
tika-vin07t:374_8: vuttaṃ. Āyatiṃ vāsanāhetuṃ pana sīlacittaṃ tepi desentiyeva, tañca maggahetutāya
tika-vin07t:374_10: “buddhuppādeyevā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ. Na hi taṃsamāpannotiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanehi
tika-vin07t:374_12: paṭikkhepato lokiyādhicittādhipaññānaṃ idha adhippetatā, taṃ dvayaṃ samāpannassāpi
tika-vin07t:374_13: methunadhammasamāpajjanasabhāvo ca viññāyati, pāḷiyaṃ pana “yāyaṃ adhisīlasikkhā,
tika-vin07t:374_14: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti vuttattā lokiyāpi adhicittādhipaññā anadhippetāti
tika-vin07t:374_15: viññāyati. Tasmā pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca evamadhippāyo veditabbo – “methunaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin07t:374_16: paṭisevissāmī”ti citte uppannamatte lokiyaṃ adhicittaṃ adhipaññā ca parihāyati, adhisīlaṃ
tika-vin07t:374_17: pana cittuppādamattena na parihāyatīti pāḷiyaṃ adhisīlasikkhāva vuttā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:374_18: pana paṭiladdhalokuttaramaggassa bhikkhuno “methunaṃ paṭisevissāmī”ti cittampi na
tika-vin07t:374_19: uppajjati sabbaso akuppadhammattā, puthujjanānaṃ samāpattilābhīnampi kenaci kāraṇena
tika-vin07t:374_20: uppajjati kuppadhammattāti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “na hi taṃsamāpanno”ti lokuttarāva
tika-vin07t:375_0: Atthi dinnanti ettha dinnanti dānacetanā adhippetā, tassa dinnassa phalaṃ atthīti
tika-vin07t:375_1: attho. Esa nayo atthi yiṭṭhanti etthāpi. Ādi-saddena hutādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Tattha yiṭṭhanti
tika-vin07t:375_2: mahāyāgo sabbasādhāraṇaṃ mahādānameva. Hutanti pahonakasakkāro, attano vā hotu, paresaṃ
tika-vin07t:375_3: vā dasa akusalakammapathā, sabbepi vā akusalā dhammā anatthuppādanato na sakaṃ kammaṃ
tika-vin07t:375_4: nāma, tabbiparītā kusalā dhammā sakaṃ nāma, tadubhayampi vā kusalākusalaṃ kammassakomhītiādivacanato
tika-vin07t:375_5: sati saṃsārappavattiyaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭhena sattānaṃ sakanti evaṃ kammassakatāya sakabhāve
tika-vin07t:375_6: attano santakatāya uppajjanakañāṇaṃ kammassakataññāṇaṃ, upalakkhaṇamattañcetaṃ. Sāsananissitā
tika-vin07t:375_7: pana sabbāpi vaṭṭagāminikusalapaññā kammassakataññāṇe paviṭṭhā. Sāsananissitā hi
tika-vin07t:375_8: vivaṭṭagāminī sabbāpi paññā “saccānulomikañāṇa”nti vuccati. Sā eva ca adhipaññā tadavasesaṃ
tika-vin07t:375_9: sabbaṃ kammassakataññāṇanti veditabbaṃ, teneva bhagavā “kammassakataññāṇaṃ saccānulomikañāṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:375_10: maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ phalasamaṅgissa ñāṇa”nti sabbampi ñāṇacatukkeyeva saṅgahesi.
tika-vin07t:375_11: Tilakkhaṇākāraparicchedakaṃ pana vipassanāñāṇanti idaṃ pana maggassa āsannapaccayatāya
tika-vin07t:378_0: Dubbalye āvikateti yaṃnūnāhaṃ buddhaṃ paccakkheyyantiādinā dubbalabhāve pakāsite.
tika-vin07t:378_1: Mukhāruḷhatāti lokajanānaṃ sattaṭṭhātiādīsu mukhāruḷhañāyenāti adhippāyo. Dirattatirattanti
tika-vin07t:378_2: ettha yathā antarantarā sahaseyyāvasena tirattaṃ aggahetvā nirantarameva tisso rattiyo
tika-vin07t:378_4: abyavadhānena vuttanti dirattaggahaṇassa payojanampi sakkā gahetuṃ, evamidhāpi dubbalyaṃ
tika-vin07t:378_5: anāvikatvāti imassāpi gahaṇassa payojanamatthevāti dassetuṃ yasmā vā sikkhāpaccakkhānassātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:379_0: Idāni dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti imassa purimapadasseva vivaraṇabhāvaṃ vināpi visuṃ atthasabbhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:379_1: dassetuṃ apicātiādi vuttaṃ. Visesāvisesanti ettha yena vākyena dubbalyāvikammameva
tika-vin07t:379_2: hoti, na sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ, tattha sikkhāpaccakkhānadubbalyāvikammānaṃ aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin07t:379_3: viseso hoti. Yena pana vacanena tadubhayampi hoti, tattha nevatthi viseso avisesopi,
tika-vin07t:379_4: taṃ visesāvisesaṃ. “Kaṭha kicchajīvane”ti dhātūsu paṭhitattā vuttaṃ “kicchajīvikappatto”ti.
tika-vin07t:379_5: Ukkaṇṭhanañhi ukkaṇṭhā, taṃ ito gatoti ukkaṇṭhito, kicchajīvikaṃ pattoti attho. Uddhaṃ
tika-vin07t:379_6: gato kaṇṭho etissāti ukkaṇṭhā, anabhiratiyā vaje niruddhagogaṇo viya gamanamaggaṃ
tika-vin07t:379_7: gavesanto puggalo ukkaṇṭho hoti, taṃ ukkaṇṭhaṃ. Anabhiratiṃ itotipi ukkaṇṭhitoti
tika-vin07t:379_8: atthaṃ dassento āha – “uddhaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ katvā viharamāno”ti. Sā ca ukkaṇṭhatā vikkhepenevāti
tika-vin07t:380_0: Samaṇabhāvatoti upasampadato. Bhāvavikappākārenāti bhikkhubhāvato cavitvā yaṃ yaṃ
tika-vin07t:380_1: gihiādibhāvaṃ pattukāmo “ahaṃ assa”nti attano bhavanaṃ vikappeti, tena tena gihiādiākārena,
tika-vin07t:381_0: 46. Pāḷiyaṃ yadi panāhanti ahaṃ yadi buddhaṃ paccakkheyyaṃ, sādhu vatassāti attho.
tika-vin07t:381_1: Apāhaṃ, handāhanti etthāpi vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo. “Hoti me buddhaṃ paccakkheyya”nti
tika-vin07t:382: 50. Na ramāmīti pabbajjāya dukkhabahulatāya sukhābhāvaṃ dasseti. Nābhiramāmīti pabbajjāya vijjamānepi anavajjasukhe attano abhiratiabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:383_0: 51. Teneva vacībhedenāti vacībhedaṃ katvāpi aññena kāyappayogena viññāpanaṃ nivatteti.
tika-vin07t:383_1: Ayaṃ sāsanaṃ jahitukāmotiādinā bhāsākosallābhāvena sabbaso padatthāvabodhābhāvepi
tika-vin07t:383_2: “ayaṃ attano pabbajitabhāvaṃ jahitukāmo imaṃ vākyabhedaṃ karotī”ti ettakaṃ adhippetatthamattaṃ
tika-vin07t:383_3: cepi so tāva jānāti, paccakkhānameva hotīti dasseti. Tenāha “ettakamattampi jānātī”ti.
tika-vin07t:383_4: Padapacchābhaṭṭhanti padaparāvatti, māgadhabhāsato avasiṭṭhā sabbāpi bhāsā “milakkhabhāsā”ti
tika-vin07t:383_5: veditabbā. Khettameva otiṇṇanti sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ruhanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ khettameva otiṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:384_0: Dūtanti mukhasāsanaṃ. Sāsananti paṇṇasāsanaṃ, bhittithambhādīsu akkharaṃ vā chinditvā
tika-vin07t:384_2: vuttaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānanti attho. Niyamitāniyamitavasena vijānanabhedaṃ dassetumāha
tika-vin07t:384_3: yadi ayameva jānātūtiādi. Ayañca vibhāgo vadati viññāpetīti ettha yassa vadati, tasseva
tika-vin07t:384_4: vijānanaṃ adhippetanti iminā vuttanayena laddhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ, na hettha ekassa vadati
tika-vin07t:384_5: aññassa viññāpetīti ayamattho sambhavati. “Tesu ekasmiṃ jānantepī”ti vuttattā “dveyeva
tika-vin07t:384_6: jānantu eko mā jānātū”ti evaṃ dvinnampi janānaṃ niyametvā ārocitepi tesu ekasmimpi
tika-vin07t:384_7: jānante paccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti gahetabbaṃ. Parisaṅkamānoti “vāressantī”ti āsaṅkamāno.
tika-vin07t:384_8: Samayaññūti sāsanasaṅketaññū, idha pana adhippāyamattajānanenāpi samayaññū nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:384_9: tenāha ukkaṇṭhitotiādi. Tasmā buddhaṃ paccakkhāmītiādikhettapadānaṃ sabbaso atthaṃ
tika-vin07t:384_10: ñatvāpi sace “bhikkhubhāvato cavitukāmatāya esa vadatī”ti adhippāyaṃ na jānāti, appaccakkhātāva
tika-vin07t:384_11: hoti sikkhā. Atthaṃ pana ajānitvāpi “ukkaṇṭhito vadatī”ti taṃ jānāti, paccakkhātāva
tika-vin07t:384_12: hoti sikkhā. Sotaviññāṇavīthiyā saddamattaggahaṇameva, atthaggahaṇaṃ pana manoviññāṇavīthiparamparāyāti
tika-vin07t:385_1: upāligahapatinā dhīrassa vigatamohassātiādinā vuttagāthāsu. Yathārutanti pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:385_2: vuttamevāti attho. Anantabuddhītiādīni vaṇṇapaṭṭhāne āgatanāmāni. Dhīrantiādīni pana
tika-vin07t:385_3: upāligāthāsu. Tattha bodhi vuccati sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, sā jānanahetuttā paññāṇaṃ etassāti
tika-vin07t:385_4: bodhipaññāṇo. Svākkhātaṃ dhammantiādīsu dhamma-saddo svākkhātādipadānaṃ dhammavevacanabhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:385_5: dassetuṃ vutto. Tasmā svākkhātaṃ paccakkhāmītiādinā vutteyeva vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:385_6: nāma hoti. Dhamma-saddena saha yojetvā vutte pana yathārutavasena paccakkhānanti
tika-vin07t:385_7: veditabbaṃ. Suppaṭipannaṃ saṅghantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Kusalaṃ dhammantiādīnipi kusalā
tika-vin07t:385_8: dhammā akusalā dhammātiādidhammameva sandhāya vuttanāmāni, itarathā akusaladhammapaccakkhāne
tika-vin07t:386_0: Yassa mūlenāti yassa santike. Ācariyavevacanesu yo upajjhaṃ adatvā ācariyova hutvā
tika-vin07t:386_1: pabbājesi, taṃ sandhāya “yo maṃ pabbājesī”ti vuttaṃ. Tassa mūlenāti tassa santike.
tika-vin07t:386_3: Moḷibaddhoti baddhakesakalāpo gahaṭṭho. Kumārakoti kumārāvattho ativiya daharo sāmaṇero.
tika-vin07t:386_4: Cellakoti tato kiñci mahanto. Ceṭakoti majjhimo. Moḷigalloti mahāsāmaṇero. Samaṇuddesoti
tika-vin07t:386_5: avisesato sāmaṇerādhivacanaṃ. Asucisaṅkassarasamācāroti asuci hutvā “mayā kataṃ pare
tika-vin07t:386_6: jānanti nu kho, na nu kho”ti attanā, “asukena nu kho idaṃ kata”nti parehi ca saṅkāya
tika-vin07t:386_7: saritabbena anussaritabbena samācārena yutto. Sañjātarāgādikacavarattā kasambujāto.
tika-vin07t:387_0: 54. Tihetukapaṭisandhikāti atikhippaṃ jānanasamatthe sandhāya vuttaṃ, na duhetukānaṃ
tika-vin07t:387_1: tattha asambhavato. Sabhāgassāti purisassa. Visabhāgassāti mātugāmassa. Potthakarūpasadisassāti
tika-vin07t:387_2: mattikādīhi katarūpasadisassa. Garumedhassāti ārammaṇesu lahuppavattiyā abhāvato
tika-vin07t:388_0: Idānettha sikkhāpaccakkhānavārassa pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca vuttanayānaṃ sampiṇḍanatthavasena
tika-vin07t:388_1: evaṃ vinicchayo veditabbo – tattha hi sāmaññā cavitukāmotiādīhi padehi cittaniyamaṃ
tika-vin07t:388_2: dasseti. Buddhantiādīhi padehi khettaniyamaṃ, paccakkhāmi dhāretīti etena kālaniyamaṃ,
tika-vin07t:388_3: vadatīti iminā payoganiyamaṃ, alaṃ me buddhena, kiṃ nu me, na mamattho, sumuttāhantiādīhi
tika-vin07t:388_4: anāmaṭṭhakālavasenapi paccakkhānaṃ hotīti dasseti, viññāpetīti iminā vijānananiyamaṃ,
tika-vin07t:388_5: ummattako sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti ummattakassa santiketiādīhi puggalaniyamaṃ, so ca nappaṭivijānātītiādīhi
tika-vin07t:388_7: sāvetukāmo na sāvetīti iminā payoganiyamābhāvena, aviññussa sāveti viññussa na sāvetīti
tika-vin07t:388_8: etehi yaṃ puggalaṃ uddissa sāveti, tasseva savane sīsaṃ eti, nāññassāti. Sabbaso
tika-vin07t:388_9: vā pana na sāveti appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhāti idaṃ pana cittādiniyameneva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:388_10: hoti, na aññathāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā cittakhettakālapayogapuggalavijānanavasena
tika-vin07t:388_11: sikkhāya paccakkhānaṃ ñatvā tadabhāvena appaccakkhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:389_0: Kathaṃ? Upasampannabhāvato cavitukāmatācitteneva hi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na davā
tika-vin07t:389_1: vā ravā vā bhaṇantassa. Evaṃ cittavasena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.
tika-vin07t:389_2: Tathā buddhaṃ paccakkhāmītiādinā vuttānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ sabrahmacāripariyosānānaṃ catuddasannañceva
tika-vin07t:389_3: gihīti maṃ dhārehītiādinā vuttānaṃ gihiādīnaṃ asakyaputtiyapariyosānānaṃ aṭṭhannañcāti
tika-vin07t:389_4: imesaṃ dvāvīsatiyā khettapadānaṃ yassa kassaci savevacanassa vasena tesu yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin07t:389_5: vattukāmassa yaṃ kiñci vadatopi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti. Evaṃ khettavasena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:389_6: hoti, na tadabhāvena. Tattha yadetaṃ “paccakkhāmīti ca maṃ dhārehīti cā”ti vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:389_7: vattamānakālavacanaṃ, yāni ca “alaṃ me buddhena, kiṃ nu me buddhena, na mamattho
tika-vin07t:389_8: buddhena, sumuttāhaṃ buddhenā”tiādinā nayena ākhyātavasena kālaṃ anāmasitvā purimehi
tika-vin07t:389_9: cuddasahi padehi saddhiṃ yojetvā vuttāni alaṃ metiādīni cattāri padāni, tesaṃyeva
tika-vin07t:389_10: ca savevacanānaṃ vasena paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na pana “paccakkhāsi”nti vā, “paccakkhissa”nti
tika-vin07t:389_11: vā, “maṃ dhāresī”ti vā, “maṃ dhāressasī”ti vā, “yaṃnūna paccakkheyya”nti vātiādīni
tika-vin07t:389_12: atītānāgataparikappavacanāni bhaṇantassa. Evaṃ vattamānakālavasena ceva anāmaṭṭhakālavasena
tika-vin07t:389_13: ca paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena. Payogo pana duvidho kāyiko vācasiko, tattha
tika-vin07t:389_14: buddhaṃ paccakkhāmītiādinā nayena yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vacībhedaṃ katvā vācasikapayogeneva
tika-vin07t:389_15: paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na akkharalikhanaṃ vā hatthamuddādidassanaṃ vā kāyapayogaṃ karontassa.
tika-vin07t:389_16: Evaṃ vācasikapayogeneva paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.
tika-vin07t:390_0: Puggalo pana duvidho yo ca paccakkhāti, yassa ca paccakkhāti, tattha yo paccakkhāti,
tika-vin07t:390_1: so sace ummattakakhittacittavedanaṭṭānaṃ aññataro na hoti, yassa pana paccakkhāti,
tika-vin07t:390_2: so sace manussajātiko hoti, na ca ummattakādīnaṃ aññataro sammukhībhūto ca, sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:390_3: hoti. Na hi asammukhībhūtassa dūtena vā paṇṇena vā ārocanaṃ ruhati. Evaṃ yathāvuttapuggalavasena
tika-vin07t:390_4: paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena. Vijānanampi niyamitāniyamitavasena duvidhaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin07t:390_5: yassa yesaṃ vā niyametvā imassa imesaṃ vā ārocemīti vadati, sace te yathā pakatiyā
tika-vin07t:390_6: loke manussā vacanaṃ sutvā āvajjanasamaye jānanti, evaṃ tassa vacanānantarameva “ayaṃ
tika-vin07t:390_7: ukkaṇṭhito”ti vā, “gihibhāvaṃ patthayatī”ti vā yena kenaci ākārena manussajātiko
tika-vin07t:390_8: vacanatthaṃ jānāti, paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Atha aparabhāge “kiṃ iminā vutta”nti
tika-vin07t:390_9: cintetvā jānanti, aññe vā jānanti, appaccakkhātāva hoti. Aniyametvā ārocentassa pana
tika-vin07t:390_10: sace vuttanayena yo koci manussajātiko vacanatthaṃ jānāti, paccakkhātā hoti sikkhā,
tika-vin07t:390_11: evaṃ jānanavasena paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena. Iti imesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ cittādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:390_12: vaseneva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na aññathāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:393_0: 55. Ito paṭṭhāyāti duṭṭhullapadato paṭṭhāya. Methunadhammo yathā sarūpeneva duṭṭhullaṃ,
tika-vin07t:393_1: evaṃ dassanādiduṭṭhulladhammaparivārattāpi duṭṭhullanti dassetuṃ yasmātiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:393_2: Avassutānanti methunarāgena tintānaṃ. Pariyuṭṭhitānanti methunarāgena abhibhūtacittānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:393_4: attho. Idañca yebhuyyato vuttaṃ ubhosu aññatarassa rāgābhāvepi itarassa methunasevanasaṃsiddhito.
tika-vin07t:393_5: Methuna-saddo vā ubhayasaddapaayāyo, methunaṃ yugaḷaṃ yamakaṃ ubhayanti hi atthato
tika-vin07t:393_6: ekaṃ, tenāha “ubhinnaṃ rattāna”nti. “Dvayaṃdvayasamāpattī”ti hi pāḷiyampi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:393_7: Nimittenāti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, itthinimitte attano nimittaṃ pavesetīti attho.
tika-vin07t:393_8: Nimittaṃ aṅgajātanti atthato ekaṃ. Tilaphalanti sāsapamattaṃ tilabījaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin07t:393_9: na kosasahitaṃ phalanti āha “tilabījamattampī”ti. Allokāseti sabhāvena pihitassa
tika-vin07t:393_10: nimittassa pakativātena asamphuṭṭhe tintappadese. Tādiso padeso sacepi kenaci vātādivikārena
tika-vin07t:394_0: Vemajjhanti yathā cattāri passāni aphusanto paveseti, evaṃ katavivarassa itthinimittassa
tika-vin07t:394_1: abbhantaratalaṃ vuccati. Purisanimitte pana majjhanti aggakoṭiṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:394_2: Uparīti majjhimapabbena samiñjitvā pavesiyamānassa aṅgajātassa samiñjitaṅguliyā majjhimapabbapiṭṭhisadisaaggakoṭiyeva.
tika-vin07t:394_3: Heṭṭhā pavesentoti itthinimittassa heṭṭhābhāgena chupiyamānaṃ pavesento, yathā itthinimittassa
tika-vin07t:394_4: allokāsaṃ heṭṭhimatalaṃ tilabījamattampi attano nimittena chupati, evaṃ pavesentoti
tika-vin07t:394_5: attho. Chupanameva hettha pavesanaṃ, evaṃ sesesupi. Majjhena pavesentoti abbhantaratalena
tika-vin07t:394_6: chupiyamānaṃ pavesento, yathā abbhantaratalaṃ chupati, evaṃ pavesentoti attho. Katthaci
tika-vin07t:394_7: acchupantaṃ pavesetvā ākāsagatameva nīharantassa natthi pārājikaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ pana
tika-vin07t:394_8: hoti chinnasīsavatthusmiṃ viya. Majjheneva chupantaṃ pavesentoti aggakoṭiyā chupantaṃ
tika-vin07t:394_9: pavesento. Majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā saṅkocetvāti nimittaṃ attano majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā
tika-vin07t:394_10: samiñjitvā uparibhāgena chupantaṃ pavesentopi. Kiṃ viya? Samiñjitaṅguli viyāti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:394_11: Atha vā majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā samiñjitaṅguli viyāti sambandho, samiñjitaṅguliṃ vā
tika-vin07t:394_12: majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā pavesento viyātipi yojetabbaṃ. Uparibhāgenāti saṅkocitassa
tika-vin07t:395_0: Idāni purisanimittassa heṭṭhā vuttesu chasu “uparī”ti vuttassa chaṭṭhassa ṭhānassa
tika-vin07t:395_1: vasena visuṃ cattāri passāni gahetvā purisanimitte dasaṭṭhānabhedaṃ dassento tatthātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:395_2: Heṭṭhā pana agahitaggahaṇavasena cha ṭhānāni vuttāni. Tulādaṇḍasadisaṃ pavesentassāpīti
tika-vin07t:395_3: asamiñjitvā ujukaṃ pavesentassa. Cammakhīlanti eḷakādīnaṃ gīvāya viya nimitte jātaṃ
tika-vin07t:395_5: vacanena upādinnabhāve sati kenaci paccayena upahatepi kāyappasāde upahatindriyavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin07t:395_6: viya pārājikamevāti dasseti. Itthinimittassa pana naṭṭhepi upādinnabhāve sati matasarīre
tika-vin07t:395_7: viya pārājikakkhettatā na vijahatīti veditabbā. Methunassādenāti idaṃ kāyasaṃsaggarāge
tika-vin07t:395_8: sati saṅghādiseso hotīti vuttaṃ. Bījānīti aṇḍāni.
tika-vin07t:396_0: Mukhaṃ apidhāyāti pamādena samuppannampi hāsaṃ bījaniyā paṭicchādanampi akatvā nisīdanaṃ
tika-vin07t:396_1: agāravanti vuttaṃ. Atha vā apidhāyāti pidahitvā, bījaniyā mukhaṃ paṭicchādetvā hasamānena
tika-vin07t:396_2: na nisīditabbanti attho. Dantavidaṃsakanti dante dassetvā. Gabbhitenāti “ayuttakathā”ti
tika-vin07t:398_0: Pārājikavatthubhūtāti yesaṃ tīsu maggesu tilabījamattampi nimittassa pavesokāso hoti,
tika-vin07t:398_1: te itthipurisādibhedā sabbe saṅgayhanti, na itare. Idha pana tiracchānagatāyāti-pāḷipadānurūpato
tika-vin07t:398_2: na sabbātiādinā itthiliṅgavasena vuttaṃ. Gonasāti sappavisesā, yesaṃ piṭṭhīsu mahantamahantāni
tika-vin07t:398_3: maṇḍalāni honti. Kacchapamaṇḍūkānaṃ catuppadattepi odakatāsāmaññena apadehi saha
tika-vin07t:398_4: gahaṇaṃ. Mukhasaṇṭhānanti oṭṭhacammasaṇṭhānaṃ. Vaṇasaṅkhepanti vaṇasaṅgahaṃ. Vaṇe
tika-vin07t:398_5: thullaccayañca “amaggena amaggaṃ paveseti, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti imassa suttassa
tika-vin07t:398_6: vasena veditabbaṃ. Maṅgusāti nakulā. Etameva hi atthanti yo naṃ ajjhāpajjati, taṃ
tika-vin07t:398_7: parājetīti imamatthaṃ vuttānaṃyeva pārājikādisaddānaṃ nibbacanappasaṅge imissā parivāragāthāya
tika-vin07t:398_8: pavattattā. Bhaṭṭhoti sāsanato parihīno. Niraṅkatoti nirākato. Etanti āpattirūpaṃ
tika-vin07t:399_0: Pakatattehi bhikkhūhīti ettha pakatattā nāma pārājikaṃ anāpannā anukkhittā ca. Keci
tika-vin07t:399_1: pana “pakatattehi bhikkhūhi ekato kattabbattāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pakatattabhūtehi
tika-vin07t:399_2: alajjīhipi saddhiṃ uposathādisaṅghakammakaraṇe doso natthī”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:399_3: iminā vacanena tassa atthassa asijjhanato. Yadi hi saṅghakammaṃ karīyati, pakatatteheva
tika-vin07t:399_4: karīyati, na apakatattehīti evaṃ apakatattehi sahasaṃvāsapaṭikkhepaparaṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:399_5: na pana pakatattehi sabbehi alajjīādīhi ekato saṅghakammaṃ kattabbamevāti. Evaṃ saṃvāsavidhānaparaṃ
tika-vin07t:399_6: pakatattesupi sabhāgāpattiṃ āpannehi aññamaññañca alajjīhi ca saddhiṃ ekato kammakaraṇassa
tika-vin07t:399_7: paṭikkhittattā. Vuttañhi “sace sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāpattiyā sati vuttavidhiṃ akatvā
tika-vin07t:399_8: uposathaṃ karoti, vuttanayeneva sabbo saṅgho āpattiṃ āpajjatī”tiādi. “Yattha āmisaparibhogo
tika-vin07t:399_9: vaṭṭati, dhammaparibhogopi tattha vaṭṭatī”ti alajjīhi saha paribhogo ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:399_10: paṭikkhitto ekato kammakaraṇassāpi dhammaparibhogattā. Tasmā yathā hi pāḷiyaṃ pārājikāpattiāpajjanakapuggalaniyamatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:399_11: yvāyaṃ ñatticatutthena kammena…pe… upasampanno, ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti
tika-vin07t:399_12: imasmiṃ vacane sabbepi ñatticatutthakammena upasampannā pārājikāpajjanakapuggalāyevāti
tika-vin07t:399_13: niyamo na sijjhati pārājikānāpajjanakānampi sekkhādīnaṃ sambhavā, atha kho ñatticatutthakammena
tika-vin07t:399_14: upasampannesuyeva pārājikāpattiāpajjanakā alajjī bālaputhujjanā labbhanti, na pana
tika-vin07t:399_15: ehibhikkhuādīsūti evaṃ niyamo sijjhati, evamidhāpi pakatattesuyeva ekato kammakaraṇārahā
tika-vin07t:399_16: anāpattikā lajjī kukkuccakā sikkhākāmā upalabbhanti, na apakatattesūti evameva niyamo
tika-vin07t:399_17: sijjhati apakatattānaṃ gaṇapūraṇattābhāvena asaṃvāsikattaniyamato. Alajjino pana
tika-vin07t:399_18: gaṇapūrakā hutvā kammassa sādhanato asaṃvāsikesu na gahitā kattabbavidhiṃ akatvā
tika-vin07t:399_19: tehi saha madditvā kammaṃ karontānaṃ āpatti alajjitā ca na vigacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:399_20: “Eko alajjī alajjīsatampi karotī”ti hi vuttaṃ, teneva vakkhati “sabbepi lajjino etesu
tika-vin07t:399_21: kammādīsu saha vasantī”tiādi. Ayañcattho upari vitthārato āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin07t:400_1: bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasikkhanaṃ samasikkhatā nāma, tañca lajjīheva samaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:400_2: na alajjīhīti dassetuṃ “paññattaṃ pana…pe… samasikkhatā nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha anatikkamanavasena
tika-vin07t:400_3: uggahaparipucchādivasena ca lajjīpuggalehi samaṃ ekato sikkhitabbā samasikkhāti sikkhāpadāni
tika-vin07t:400_4: vuttāni, tāsaṃ samasikkhanaṃ yathāvuttanayena lajjīhi sikkhitabbabhāvo samasikkhatā
tika-vin07t:400_5: nāmāti adhippāyo. Yathāvuttesu ekakammādīsu alajjīnaṃ lajjidhamme anokkante lajjīhi
tika-vin07t:400_6: saha saṃvāso natthi, tato bahiyeva te sandissantīti āha sabbepi lajjinotiādi.
tika-vin07t:401_0: 56. Yaṃ taṃ vuttanti sambandho. Vatthumeva na hotīti suvaṇṇādīhi kataitthirūpānaṃ
tika-vin07t:401_1: aṅgajātesupi nimittavohāradassanato tattha pārājikāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Teneva
tika-vin07t:401_2: vinītavatthūsu lepacittādivatthūsu sañjātakukkuccassa pārājikena anāpatti vuttā.
tika-vin07t:403: 57. Assāti ākhyātapadanti tassa atthaṃ dassento “hotī”ti āha, bhaveyyāti attho, hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Dutiye atthavikappe “hotī”ti idaṃ vacanaseso.
tika-vin07t:404_0: 58. Sādiyantassevāti ettha sādiyanaṃ nāma sevetukāmatācittassa uppādanamevāti āha
tika-vin07t:404_2: bhikkhupaccatthikā”ti vutte upari vuccamānā rājapaccatthikādayopi idheva pavisantīti
tika-vin07t:404_3: taṃ nivattanatthaṃ bhikkhū eva paccatthikāti rājapaccatthikānurūpena attho dassito.
tika-vin07t:404_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇeti pavesanakkhaṇe. Aggato hi yāva mūlā pavesanakiriyāya vattamānakālo
tika-vin07t:404_5: pavesanakkhaṇo nāma. Paviṭṭhakāleti aṅgajātassa yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pavesanārahaṃ, tattakaṃ
tika-vin07t:404_6: anavasesato paviṭṭhakāle, pavesanakiriyāya niṭṭhitakkhaṇeti attho. Evaṃ paviṭṭhassa
tika-vin07t:404_7: uddharaṇārambhato antarā ṭhitakāle ṭhitaṃ aṅgajātaṃ, tassa ṭhiti vā ṭhitaṃ nāma,
tika-vin07t:404_8: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mātugāmassa sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ patvā sabbathā vāyāmato oramitvā ṭhitakālaṃ
tika-vin07t:404_9: sandhāya “sukkavissaṭṭhisamaye”ti vuttaṃ, tadubhayampi ṭhitamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Uddharaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:404_10: nāma yāva aggā nīharaṇakiriyāya vattamānakāloti āha “nīharaṇakāle paṭisevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī”ti.
tika-vin07t:405_0: Ettha ca yasmā parehi upakkamiyamānassa aṅgajātādikāyacalanassa vijjamānattā sevanacitte
tika-vin07t:405_1: upaṭṭhitamatte tasmiṃ khaṇe cittajarūpena sañjāyamānaṃ aṅgajātādicalanaṃ iminā sevanacittena
tika-vin07t:405_2: uppāditameva hoti. Apica sevanacitte uppanne parehi anupakkamiyamānassāpi aṅgajāte
tika-vin07t:405_3: calanaṃ hoteva, tañca tena kataṃ nāma hoti, tasmā kāyacittato samuṭṭhitaṃ pārājikāpattiṃ
tika-vin07t:405_4: so āpajjatiyeva ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalikā viya. Tatthāpi hi “adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin07t:405_5: āmasanaṃ vā…pe… paṭipīḷanaṃ vā sādiyeyyā”ti sādiyanamatteyeva āpatti vuttā, bhikkhuno
tika-vin07t:405_6: kāyasaṃsagge pana “kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyā”ti attano upakkamassa āpattinimittabhāvena
tika-vin07t:405_7: vuttattā itthiyā phusiyamānassa kāyasaṃsaggarāge ca itthiyā sañjanitakāyacalane ca
tika-vin07t:405_8: vijjamānepi attano payogābhāvena anāpattiyeva vuttāti gahetabbaṃ. Keci pana “paṭhamasaṅghādisesavisayepi
tika-vin07t:405_9: parehi balakkārena hatthādīhi upakkamiyamānassa mocanassādo ca uppajjati, tena ca
tika-vin07t:405_10: asucimhi mutte saṅghādiseso, amutte thullaccayaṃ evā”ti vadanti. Aṅgārakāsunti aṅgārarāsiṃ,
tika-vin07t:405_11: aṅgārapuṇṇāvāṭaṃ vā. Itthiyā upakkamiyamāne asādiyanaṃ nāma na sabbesaṃ visayoti
tika-vin07t:405_13: ekādasaggīhi. Assāti asādiyantassa. Catukkaṃ nīharitvā ṭhapesīti ettha ekapuggalavisayatāya
tika-vin07t:405_15: “catukka”nti vutto. Paṭhamacatukkakathāti ettha pana anāpattivārena saddhiṃ pañcannaṃ
tika-vin07t:405_16: vārānaṃ vuttanayena “pañca catukkā”ti vattabbepi ekamaggavisayatāya tesaṃ ekattaṃ
tika-vin07t:405_17: āropetvā paṭhamacatukkatā vuttā. Teneva vakkhati tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vasena tīṇi suddhikacatukkānītiādi.
tika-vin07t:407_0: 59-60. Mattanti surādīhi mattaṃ. Akkhāyitanimittā idha uttarapadalopena akkhāyitasaddena
tika-vin07t:407_2: vuttaṃ. Samānācariyakātherāti ekācariyassa uddesantevāsikā. Gaṅgāya aparabhāgo aparagaṅgaṃ.
tika-vin07t:407_3: Vatareti garahatthe nipāto. Evaṃ vinayagarukānanti iminā upari upatissattherena vuccamānavinicchayassa
tika-vin07t:407_4: garukaraṇīyatāya kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbaṃ pariyādiyitvāti sabbaṃ pārājikakhettaṃ anavasesato
tika-vin07t:407_5: gahetvā. Yadi hi sāvasesaṃ katvā paññapeyya, alajjīnaṃ tattha lesena ajjhācārasoto
tika-vin07t:407_7: katvāpi paññāpanaṃ sambhavati, na lokavajjesūti āha idañhītiādi. Sahaseyyasikkhāpade
tika-vin07t:407_8: hi kiñcāpi yebhuyyacchanne yebhuyyaparicchanne heṭṭhimaparicchedato pācittiyaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:407_9: upaḍḍhacchanne upaḍḍhaparicchanne dukkaṭaṃ, tathāpi sāvasesattā paññattiyā yebhuyyacchannaupaḍḍhaparicchannādīsupi
tika-vin07t:407_10: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pācittiyameva dassitaṃ. Idha pana niravasesattā paññattiyā bhagavatā
tika-vin07t:407_11: dassitaṃ yebhuyyena akkhāyitanimittato heṭṭhā pārājikakkhettaṃ natthi, thullaccayādimeva tattha labbhati.
tika-vin07t:408_0: Upatissattherena vuttasseva vinicchayassa aññampi upatthambhakāraṇaṃ dassento apicātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:408_1: Nimitte appamattikāpi maṃsarāji sace avasiṭṭhā hoti, taṃ yebhuyyakkhāyitameva hoti,
tika-vin07t:408_2: tato paraṃ pana sabbaso khāyite nimitte dukkaṭamevāti dassento āha “tato paraṃ thullaccayaṃ
tika-vin07t:408_3: natthī”ti. Keci panettha vaccamaggādiṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā “tesu dve koṭṭhāse
tika-vin07t:408_4: atikkamma yāva tatiyakoṭṭhāsassa pariyosānā khāyitaṃ yebhuyyakkhāyitaṃ nāma, tato
tika-vin07t:408_5: paraṃ thullaccayaṃ natthi, yāva catutthakoṭṭhāsassa pariyosānā khāyitaṃ, tampi dukkaṭavatthuyevā”ti
tika-vin07t:408_6: ca vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Matasarīrasmiṃyeva veditabbanti mataṃ yebhuyyena akkhāyitantiādivacanato
tika-vin07t:408_7: vuttaṃ. Yadipi nimittantiādi jīvamānakasarīrameva sandhāya vuttaṃ tasseva adhikatattā.
tika-vin07t:408_8: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “jīvamānakasarīrassa vuttappakāre magge sacepi tacādīni
tika-vin07t:408_9: anavasesetvā sabbaso chinne”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sabbaso khāyitanti nimittamaṃsaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-vin07t:408_10: chinnanti attho. Nimittasaṇṭhānanti chinnamaṃsassa anto yāva muttavatthikosā chiddākāro
tika-vin07t:408_13: Etena yāva paveso labbhati, tāva maggoyevāti dasseti. Nimittato patitāya maṃsapesiyāti
tika-vin07t:408_14: idaṃ nimittasaṇṭhānavirahitaṃ abbhantaramaṃsakhaṇḍaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Nimittasaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:408_15: akopetvā samantato chinditvā uddhaṭamaṃsapesiyā pana matasarīre yebhuyyena akkhāyitanimitte
tika-vin07t:409_0: Evaṃ jīvamānakamanussasarīre labbhamānavisesaṃ dassetvā idāni matasarīre dassetuṃ
tika-vin07t:409_2: mahāvaṇo”tiādi vacanato manussānaṃ akkhināsādīni vaṇasaṅkhepena thullaccayakkhettānīti
tika-vin07t:409_3: tesupi thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ manussānaṃ matasarīrepi, tenāha mate allasarīretiādi.
tika-vin07t:409_4: Tattha allasarīreti akuthitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pārājikakkhetteti yebhuyyena akkhāyitampi
tika-vin07t:409_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Thullaccayakkhetteti upaḍḍhakkhāyitādimpi sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ettha
tika-vin07t:409_6: ca akkhināsādithullaccayakkhettesu yebhuyyena akkhāyitesupi thullaccayaṃ, upaḍḍhakkhāyitādīsu
tika-vin07t:409_7: dukkaṭanti veditabbaṃ. Sabbesampīti yathāvuttahatthiādīhi aññesaṃ tiracchānānaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:409_8: vuttaṃ. Tiracchānagatānaṃ akkhikaṇṇavaṇesu dukkaṭaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāppamāṇena gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:409_9: “amaggena amaggaṃ paveseti, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti hi sāmaññato vuttaṃ, na pana
tika-vin07t:409_10: manussānanti visesetvā. Yadi hi manussānaññeva vaṇesu thullaccayaṃ siyā, hatthiassādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:409_11: nāsavatthikosesupi paṭaṅgamukhamaṇḍūkassa mukhasaṇṭhānepi ca vaṇasaṅkhepato thullaccayaṃ
tika-vin07t:409_12: na vattabbaṃ siyā, vuttañca. Tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyā evettha pamāṇaṃ. Matānaṃ tiracchānagatānanti matakena sambandho.
tika-vin07t:410_0: Methunarāgena vatthikosaṃ pavesentassa thullaccayaṃ vuttanti āha “vatthikosaṃ appavesento”ti.
tika-vin07t:410_1: Methunarāgo ca nāma kāyasaṃsaggarāgaṃ mocanassādañca muñcitvā visuṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiyā
tika-vin07t:410_2: rāgo, so ca purisādīsupi uppajjati, tena ca apārājikakkhette itthisarīrepi upakkamantassa
tika-vin07t:410_3: asucimhi muttepi saṅghādiseso na hoti, khettānurūpaṃ thullaccayadukkaṭameva hotīti
tika-vin07t:410_4: veditabbaṃ. Appavesentoti iminā tīsu maggesu pavesanādhippāye asatipi methunarāgena
tika-vin07t:410_5: bahi ghaṭṭanaṃ sambhavatīti dasseti, teneva thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, itarathā pavesanādhippāyena
tika-vin07t:410_6: bahi chupantassa methunassa pubbapayogattā dukkaṭameva vattabbaṃ siyā. Nimittena
tika-vin07t:410_7: nimittaṃ chupati thullaccayanti idañca “na ca, bhikkhave, rattacittena aṅgajātaṃ
tika-vin07t:410_8: chupitabbaṃ, yo chupeyya, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti imassa cammakkhandhake āgatassa
tika-vin07t:410_9: suttassa vasena vuttaṃ. Tattha ca kesañci aññathāpi atthavikappassa bījaṃ dassento
tika-vin07t:410_10: mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ panātiādimāha. Mukheneva chupanaṃ sandhāyāti oṭṭhajivhādimukhāvayavena
tika-vin07t:410_11: chupanaṃ sandhāya. Oḷārikattāti ajjhācārassa thullattā. Taṃ sandhāyabhāsitanti taṃ
tika-vin07t:410_12: yathāvuttasuttaṃ. Suttañhi ajjhācāraṃ sandhāya paṭicca vuttattā “sandhāyabhāsita”nti
tika-vin07t:410_13: vuccati. Suṭṭhusallakkhetvāti piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhantānaṃ aṅgajātamukheneva nimittachupanassa
tika-vin07t:410_14: sambhavaṃ methunarāgīnañca aṅgajātena chupanasseva anurūpatañca sutte ca “mukhenā”ti
tika-vin07t:410_15: avuttatañca aññañca nayaṃ yathābalaṃ suṭṭhu sallakkhetvāti attho. Saṅghādisesoti
tika-vin07t:410_16: manussitthiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Passāvamagganti idaṃ cammakkhandhake nidānavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:410_17: Itaramaggadvayaṃ pana nimittamukhena chupantassa vaṇasaṅkhepena thullaccayameva.
tika-vin07t:410_18: Vuttanayenevāti methunarāgeneva. Nimittamukhena pana vinā methunarāgena manussitthiyā
tika-vin07t:410_19: vā tiracchānagatitthiyā vā passāvamaggaṃ pakatimukhena chupantassa dukkaṭameva pakatimukhena
tika-vin07t:410_20: pakatimukhachupane viya, itarathā tatthāpi thullaccayena bhavitabbaṃ, tañca na yuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:410_21: khandhakasuttepi tathā avuttattā. Kāyasaṃsaggarāgena dukkaṭanti nimittamukhena vā
tika-vin07t:410_22: pakatimukhādiṃ itarakāyena vā kāyasaṃsaggarāgena chupantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin07t:411_0: Ettha ca kāyasaṃsaggarāgena bahinimitte upakkamato ajānantasseva aṅgajātaṃ yadi pārājikakkhettaṃ
tika-vin07t:411_1: chupati, tattha kiṃ hotīti? Keci tāva “methunarāgassa abhāvā manussitthiyā saṅghādiseso,
tika-vin07t:411_2: sesesu vatthuvasena thullaccayadukkaṭānī”ti vadanti. Aññe pana “pavesanakkhaṇe phassassa
tika-vin07t:411_3: sādiyanasambhavato balakkārena upakkamanakkhaṇe viya pārājikamevā”ti vadanti, idameva
tika-vin07t:411_4: yuttataraṃ. Maggattayato hi aññasmiṃ padeseyeva kāyasaṃsaggādirāgabhedato āpattibhedo
tika-vin07t:411_5: labbhati, na maggattaye. Tattha pana yena kenaci ākārena phassassa sādiyanakkhaṇe
tika-vin07t:411_6: pārājikameva, teneva paropakkamena pavesanādīsu rāgabhedaṃ anuddharitvā sādiyanamattena pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:413_0: 61-2. Paṭipannakassāti āraddhavipassakassa. Upādinnakanti kāyindriyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:413_1: Upādinnakena phusatīti upādinnakasarīrena phusīyatīti kammasādhanena attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:413_2: Atha vā evaṃ karonto bhikkhu kiñci upādinnakaṃ upādinnakena na phusatīti attho. Lesaṃ
tika-vin07t:413_3: oḍḍessantīti lesaṃ ṭhapessanti, parikappessantīti attho. Santhatādibhedehi bhinditvāti
tika-vin07t:413_4: santhatādivisesanehi visesetvā. Santhatāyāti samudāye ekadesavohāro daḍḍhassa paṭassa
tika-vin07t:413_5: chiddantiādīsu viya. Yathā hi paṭassa ekadesova vatthato daḍḍhoti vuccati, taṃ ekadesavohāraṃ
tika-vin07t:413_6: samudāye paṭe upacārato āropetvā puna taṃ samudāyaṃ daḍḍhappadesasaṅkhātachiddasambandhībhāvena
tika-vin07t:413_7: “daḍḍhassa paṭassa chidda”nti voharanti, evamidhāpi itthiyā maggappadesavohāraṃ samudāyabhūtāya
tika-vin07t:413_8: itthiyā āropetvā puna taṃ itthiṃ santhatamaggasambandhiniṃ katvā santhatāya itthiyā
tika-vin07t:413_9: vaccamaggenātiādi vuttaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ panettha “ekadese samudāyavohāro”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:413_10: taṃ na yuttaṃ avayavavohārena samudāyasseva patīyamānattā. Itarathā hi santhatāya
tika-vin07t:413_11: vaccamaggenāti itthiliṅgatā maggasambandhitā ca na siyā, ekadese samudāyopacārassa
tika-vin07t:413_12: pana ekadesova attho sākhāya chijjamānāya rukkho chijjatītiādīsu viya.
tika-vin07t:414_0: Vatthādīni maggassa anto appavesetvā bahiyeva veṭhanaṃ sandhāya “paliveṭhetvā”ti
tika-vin07t:414_1: vuttaṃ. Samudāye avayavūpacāreneva bhikkhupi santhato nāmātiādi vuttaṃ. Yattake paviṭṭheti
tika-vin07t:414_2: tilabījamatte paviṭṭhe. Akkhināsādīnaṃ santhatattepi yathāvatthukamevāti āha thullaccayakkhette
tika-vin07t:414_3: thullaccayantiādi. Khāṇuṃ ghaṭṭentassa dukkaṭanti itthinimittassa anto khāṇuṃ pavesetvā
tika-vin07t:414_4: samatalaṃ, atirittaṃ vā ṭhitaṃ khāṇuṃ sace ghaṭṭeti, ghaṭṭentassa dukkaṭaṃ pavesābhāvato.
tika-vin07t:414_5: Sace pana īsakaṃ anto allokāse pavesetvā ṭhitaṃ anupādinnameva khāṇusīsaṃ aṅgajātena
tika-vin07t:414_6: chupati, pārājikameva. Tassa talanti veḷunaḷādikassa antotalaṃ. Bahiddhā khāṇuketi
tika-vin07t:414_7: anto pavesitaveḷupabbādikassa bahi nikkhantasīsaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yathā ca itthinimittetiādīsu
tika-vin07t:414_8: yathā itthiyā passāvamagge khāṇuṃ katvā ghaṭṭanādikaṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ sabbattha vaccamaggādīsupi
tika-vin07t:416: 65. Kerāṭikāti vañcakā. Paṭhamaṃ itthidhuttameva dassetvā idāni itaradhuttepi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “itthidhuttasurādhuttādayo vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:418_0: 66. Paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ natthi sevetukāmatā maggena maggappaṭipattīti dvinnaṃ aṅgānaṃ
tika-vin07t:418_1: siddhattā. Dūsitassa pana maggena maggappaṭipatti evamekaṃ aṅgaṃ siddhaṃ, sevetukāmatāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t:418_2: sādiyanaṃ asiddhaṃ. Tasmā so pucchitvā “sādiyi”nti vuttapaṭiññāya nāsetabbo. Tatthevāti
tika-vin07t:418_3: vesāliyaṃ mahāvane eva. Sabbaṅgagatanti sabbakāyagataṃ. “Lohitaṃ viyā”ti vuttattā
tika-vin07t:418_4: kesādīnaṃ vinimuttaṭṭhāne sabbatthāti gahetabbaṃ. Niccameva ummattako hotīti yassa
tika-vin07t:418_5: pittakosato pittaṃ calitvā sabbadā bahi nikkhantaṃ hoti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yassa
tika-vin07t:418_6: pana pittaṃ calitvā pittakoseyeva ṭhitaṃ hoti, kadāci vā nikkhantaṃ puna nikkhamati,
tika-vin07t:418_7: sopi antarantarā saññaṃ paṭilabhati bhesajjena ca pakatiārogyaṃ paṭilabhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:421_0: Pakiṇṇakanti vomissakanayaṃ. Samuṭṭhānanti uppattikāraṇaṃ. Kiriyātiādi nidassanamattaṃ
tika-vin07t:421_1: akiriyādīnampi saṅgahato. Vedanāya saha kusalañca veditabbanti yojetabbaṃ. Sabbasaṅgāhakavasenāti
tika-vin07t:421_2: sabbesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ saṅgāhakavasena “kāyo vācā kāyavācā kāyacittaṃ vācācittaṃ
tika-vin07t:421_3: kāyavācācitta”nti evaṃ vuttāni cha āpattisamuṭṭhānāni. Samuṭṭhānādayo hi āpattiyā
tika-vin07t:421_4: eva honti, na sikkhāpadassa. Taṃtaṃsikkhāpadassa niyataāpattiyā eva gahaṇatthaṃ pana
tika-vin07t:421_5: sikkhāpadasīsena samuṭṭhānādīnaṃ kathanaṃ. Evañhi āpattiviseso paññāyati āpatti-saddassa
tika-vin07t:421_6: sabbāpattisādhāraṇattā, imesu pana chasu samuṭṭhānesu purimāni tīṇi acittakāni, pacchimāni
tika-vin07t:421_7: sacittakāni. Samāsato taṃ imaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ viditvā veditabbanti sambandho. Cha samuṭṭhānāni
tika-vin07t:422_1: dassanaṃ. Terasa hi samuṭṭhānasīsāni paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:422_5: atthi chasamuṭṭhānanti iminā sañcarittasamuṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ, pañcasamuṭṭhānassa abhāvato
tika-vin07t:422_6: “atthi pañcasamuṭṭhāna”nti avatvā “atthi catusamuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ, iminā ca addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:422_8: samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ pana dutiyatatiyapañcamachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin07t:422_9: idaṃ ananuññātasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Atthi tisamuṭṭhānanti iminā adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānañca
tika-vin07t:422_10: saṅgahitaṃ. Yañhi sacittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ pana
tika-vin07t:422_11: acittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Atthi kathinasamuṭṭhānantiādinā
tika-vin07t:422_12: pana avasesasamauṭṭhānasīsavasena dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānañca saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha
tika-vin07t:422_13: hi yaṃ tatiyachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana paṭhamacatutthehi
tika-vin07t:422_14: samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ chaṭṭheneva samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:422_15: “samanubhāsanasamauṭṭhāna”ntipi tasseva nāmaṃ. Iti sarūpena aṭṭha āpattisīsāni dassitāni.
tika-vin07t:422_17: pañcapi samuṭṭhānasīsāni saṅgahitāni. Tattha yaṃ kāyacittato samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:422_18: Yaṃ dutiyapañcamehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ padasodhammasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ catutthachaṭṭhehi
tika-vin07t:422_19: samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ pañcameneva samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ dhammadesanāsamauṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:422_20: Yaṃ pañcamachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ corīvuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Ettha ca pacchimesu
tika-vin07t:422_21: tīsu sacittakasamuṭṭhānesu ekekasamuṭṭhānavasena ekasamuṭṭhānāni tividhāni. Dvisamuṭṭhānāni
tika-vin07t:422_22: pana paṭhamacatutthehi vā dutiyapañcamehi vā tatiyachaṭṭhehi vā catutthachaṭṭhehi
tika-vin07t:422_23: vā pañcamachaṭṭhehi vā samuṭṭhānavasena pañcavidhānīti veditabbāni.
tika-vin07t:423_0: Evaṃ samuṭṭhānavasena sabbasikkhāpadāni terasadhā dassetvā idāni kiriyāvasena pañcadhā
tika-vin07t:423_1: dassetuṃ tatrāpītiādi vuttaṃ. Kiñcīti sikkhāpadaṃ. Kiriyatoti pathavīkhaṇanādi viya
tika-vin07t:423_2: kāyavacīviññattijanitakammato. Akiriyatoti paṭhamakathinādi viya kattabbassa akaraṇeneva.
tika-vin07t:423_3: Kiriyākiriyatoti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvarapaṭiggahaṇādi viya. Siyā kiriyato,
tika-vin07t:423_4: siyā akiriyato rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇādi viya, siyā kiriyato, siyā kiriyākiriyato kuṭikārādi
tika-vin07t:423_5: viya. Vītikkamasaññāya abhāvena vimokkho assāti saññāvimokkhanti majjhepadalopīsamāso
tika-vin07t:423_6: daṭṭhabbo. Cittaṅgaṃ labhati sacittakasamuṭṭhāneheva samuṭṭhahanato. Itaranti yassa
tika-vin07t:423_7: cittaṅganiyamo natthi, taṃ, anāpattimukhena cetaṃ saññādukaṃ vuttaṃ, āpattimukhena
tika-vin07t:424_0: Kāyavacīdvārehi āpajjitabbampi kāyakamme vā vacīkamme vā saṅgayhati. Tattha bāhullavuttito
tika-vin07t:424_1: adinnādānamusāvādādayo viyāti atthi sikkhāpadaṃ kāyakammantiādinā kāyakammaṃ vacīkammañcāti
tika-vin07t:424_2: dukameva vuttaṃ, vibhāgato pana kāyavacīkammena saddhiṃ tikameva hoti. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:424_3: vuttaṃ “sabbā ca kāyakammavacīkammatadubhayavasena tividhā hontī”ti. Tatoyeva idhāpi
tika-vin07t:424_4: adinnādānādīsu kāyakammavacīkammanti tadubhayavasena dassitaṃ. Atthi pana sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin07t:424_5: kusalantiādi āpattisamuṭṭhāpakacittavasena kāriye kāraṇopacārena vuttaṃ, na pana
tika-vin07t:424_7: upādāya hi bhagavatā āpattisammuti paññattā. Vakkhati hi “yaṃ kusalacittena āpajjati,
tika-vin07t:424_8: taṃ kusala”ntiādi. Na hi bhagavato āṇāyattā āpatti kusalādiparamatthasabhāvā hoti
tika-vin07t:424_9: anupasampannānaṃ ādikammikānañca āpattippasaṅgato, tassā desanādīhi visuddhiabhāvappasaṅgato
tika-vin07t:424_10: ca. Na hi kāraṇabalena uppajjamānā kusalādisabhāvā āpatti anupasampannādīsu nivattati,
tika-vin07t:424_11: uppannāya ca tassā kenaci vināso na sambhavati. Sarasavināsato desanādinā ca āpatti
tika-vin07t:424_12: vigacchatīti vacanamatthi, na pana tena akusalādi vigacchati. Pitughātādikammena
tika-vin07t:424_13: hi pārājikaṃ āpannassa bhikkhuno gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā bhikkhubhāvapariccāgena pārājikāpatti
tika-vin07t:424_14: vigacchati, na pāṇātipātādiakusalaṃ ānantariyādibhāvato. Tasmā dummaṅkūnaṃ niggahādidasaatthavase
tika-vin07t:424_15: paṭicca bhagavatā yathāpaccayaṃ samuppajjamāne kusalākusalādināmarūpadhamme upādāya
tika-vin07t:424_16: paññattā sammutiyeva āpatti, sā ca yathāvidhipaṭikammakaraṇena vigatā nāma hotīti
tika-vin07t:424_17: veditabbaṃ, tenāha dvattiṃseva hi āpattisamuṭṭhāpakacittānītiādi. Āpattisamuṭṭhāpakatteneva
tika-vin07t:424_18: hettha kusalādīnaṃ āpattito bhedo siddho. Na hi taṃsamuṭṭhitassa tato abhedo yutto
tika-vin07t:424_20: paramatthato kusalattameva na sambhavati “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ,
tika-vin07t:424_21: natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti vacanato, “akusalattaṃ pana abyākatattañca āpattiyā
tika-vin07t:424_22: sambhavatī”ti saññāya kusalacittasamuṭṭhānakkhaṇepi rūpābyākatattaṃ āpattiyā samatthetuṃ
tika-vin07t:424_23: yaṃ kusalacittena āpajjati, taṃ kusalaṃ, itarehi itaranti imaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ
tika-vin07t:424_24: nissāya vuttaṃ “yaṃ kusalacittena āpajjatīti yaṃ sikkhāpadasīse gahitaṃ āpattiṃ kusalacittasamaṅgī
tika-vin07t:424_25: āpajjati, iminā pana vacanena taṃ kusalanti āpattiyā vuccamāno kusalabhāvo pariyāyato,
tika-vin07t:424_26: na paramatthatoti dasseti. Kusalacittena hi āpattiṃ āpajjanto saviññattikaṃ aviññattikaṃ
tika-vin07t:424_28: Tattha yaṃ kusalacittena āpajjatīti imaṃ vacanaṃ uddissa “iminā pana vacanena taṃ
tika-vin07t:424_29: kusalanti āpattiyā vuccamāno kusalabhāvo pariyāyato, na paramatthatoti dassetī”ti
tika-vin07t:424_30: vuttaṃ, evaṃ itarehi itaranti vacanena “yaṃ akusalacittena āpajjahi, taṃ akusalaṃ,
tika-vin07t:424_31: yaṃ abyākatacittena āpajjati, taṃ abyākata”nti imassa atthassa vuttattā itarehīti
tika-vin07t:424_32: vacanaṃ uddissa “imināpi vacanena itaranti āpattiyā vuccamāno akusalabhāvo abyākatabhāvo
tika-vin07t:424_33: ca pariyāyato dassetī”ti vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ avatvā kusalapakkhe eva kathanassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:424_34: na passāma. Yaṃ pana āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalantiādivacanaṃ kāraṇattena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:424_35: tampi akāraṇaṃ yaṃ akusalacittena āpajjati, taṃ akusalantiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena
tika-vin07t:424_36: akusalādibhāvassa pariyāyadesitattā, āpattiyā kusalavohārassa ayuttatāya natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:424_37: kusalanti vuttattā ca. Āpattiyā hi kusalacittasamuṭṭhitattepi bhagavatā paṭikkhittabhāvena
tika-vin07t:424_38: sāvajjadhammattā kāraṇūpacārenāpi anavajjakusalavohāro na yutto sāvajjānavajjānaṃ
tika-vin07t:424_39: aññamaññaviruddhattā. Yathā ākāsādisammutisaccānaṃ uppannatādivohāro viya jātijarābhaṅgānaṃ
tika-vin07t:424_40: uppannatādivohāro anavaṭṭhānādidesato ayutto, evamidhāpi kusalavohāro ayutto viruddhattā.
tika-vin07t:424_41: Akusalādivohāro pana yutto, kāraṇūpacārena pana akusalādisabhāvatā yathāvuttadosānativattanato.
tika-vin07t:424_42: Suttassāpi hi yathā suttasuttānulomādīhi virodho na hoti, tatheva attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:425_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “kusalacittena hi āpattiṃ āpajjanto…pe… rūpakkhandhasaṅkhātaṃ abyākatāpattiṃ
tika-vin07t:425_1: āpajjatī”ti, taṃ ayuttameva rūpakkhandhassa khaṇikatāya āpattiyāpi desanādipaṭikammaṃ
tika-vin07t:425_2: vināva paṭipassaddhippasaṅgato. Rūpaparamparā āpattīti ce? Tanna, paṭikammenāpi avigamappasaṅgato.
tika-vin07t:425_3: Na hi rūpasantatidesanādīhi vigacchati sakāraṇāyattattā, iti sabbathā āpattiyā paramatthatā
tika-vin07t:425_4: ayuttā, eteneva yaṃ vuttaṃ “nipajjitvā nirodhasamāpannassa sahaseyyavasena tathākārappavattarūpadhammasseva
tika-vin07t:425_5: āpattibhāvato”tiādi, tampi paṭisiddhanti veditabbaṃ. Idha pana nirodhasamāpannānaṃ
tika-vin07t:425_6: rūpadhammameva paṭicca uppannattā āpatti acittā avedanā, aññattha pana sacittā savedanāva,
tika-vin07t:425_9: paṇṇattimattameva āpattādhikaraṇanti veditabba”nti sayameva vakkhati, tasmā “taṃtaṃkusalādidhammasamuppattiyā
tika-vin07t:425_10: bhagavatā paññattā āpattisammuti samuṭṭhitā”ti ca, “yāva paṭippassaddhikāraṇā tiṭṭhatī”ti
tika-vin07t:425_11: ca, “paṭippassaddhikāraṇehi vinassatī”ti ca voharīyati. Āpattiyā ca sammutisabhāvattepi
tika-vin07t:425_12: hi sañcicca taṃ āpajjantassa, paṭikiriyaṃ akarontassa ca anādare akusalarāsi ceva
tika-vin07t:425_13: saggamaggantarāyo ca hotīti lajjino yathāvidhiṃ nātikkamanti, anatikkamanappaccayā
tika-vin07t:425_14: ca tesaṃ anantappabhedā sīlādayo dhammā parivaḍḍhantīti gahetabbaṃ. Dvattiṃsevāti
tika-vin07t:425_15: niyamo āpattinimittānaṃ kāyavacīviññattīnaṃ eteheva samuppajjanato kato, na pana
tika-vin07t:425_16: sabbāpattīnampi eteheva samuppajjanato. Nipajjitvā niddāyantānañhi jhānanirodhasamāpannānañca
tika-vin07t:425_17: aviññattijanakehi vipākaappanācittehi ceva rūpadhammehi ca sahaseyyādiāpatti sambhavati.
tika-vin07t:426_0: Dasāti kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātudvayena saha aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni. Paññattiṃ
tika-vin07t:426_1: ajānitvā iddhivikubbanādīsu abhiññānaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhāpakattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca
tika-vin07t:426_2: kiñci sikkhāpadaṃ akusalacittameva, kiñci kusalābyākatavasena dvicittaṃ, kiñci ticittanti
tika-vin07t:426_3: ayameva bhedo labbhati, nāññoti veditabbaṃ. Kiriyāsamuṭṭhānanti parūpakkamena jāyamānaṃ
tika-vin07t:426_4: aṅgajātādicalanaṃ sādiyanacittasaṅkhāte sevanacitte uppanne tena cittena samuppāditameva
tika-vin07t:426_5: hotīti vuttaṃ itarathā “siyā kiriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ, siyā akiriyasamuṭṭhāna”nti vattabbato.
tika-vin07t:427_0: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ “kiriyasamuṭṭhānanti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:427_1: parūpakkame sati sādiyantassa akiriyasamuṭṭhānabhāvato”tiādi, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ paṭhamapārājikassa
tika-vin07t:427_2: akiriyasamuṭṭhānatāya pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu avuttattā. “Manodvāre āpatti nāma natthī”ti
tika-vin07t:427_3: hi vuttaṃ. Kathañhi nāma parūpakkamena methunaṃ sādiyanto attano aṅgajātādikāyacalanaṃ
tika-vin07t:427_4: na sādiyeyya, sādiyanacittānuguṇameva pana sakalasarīre cittajarūpasamuppattiyā viññattipi
tika-vin07t:427_5: sukhumā samuppannā eva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tenāha kāyadvāreneva samuṭṭhānato kāyakammantiādi.
tika-vin07t:427_6: Cittaṃ panettha aṅgamattaṃ hotīti kāyaviññatti eva kāyakammabhāve kāraṇaṃ, na cittaṃ.
tika-vin07t:427_7: Taṃ panettha kāyasaṅkhātāya viññattiyāyeva aṅgamattaṃ, na kāyakammabhāvassa, itarathā
tika-vin07t:427_8: methunassa “manokamma”nti vattabbato, tenāha “na tassa vasena kammabhāvo labbhatī”ti.
tika-vin07t:427_9: Kammabhāvoti kāyakammabhāvo. Sabbañcetanti etaṃ samuṭṭhānādikaṃ. Sikkhāpadasīsenāti
tika-vin07t:430_0: Idaṃ kinti kathetukāmatāpucchā. Imātiādi vissajjanaṃ. Vinītāni āpattiṃ tvaṃ bhikkhu
tika-vin07t:430_1: āpannotiādinā bhagavatā vinicchinitāni vatthūni vinītavatthūni. Taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ uddharitvā
tika-vin07t:430_2: dānato dassanato uddānabhūtā gāthā uddānagāthā, saṅgahagāthā, uddesagāthāti vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:430_3: hoti. Vatthu gāthāti tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhūtiādikā vinītavatthupāḷiyeva
tika-vin07t:430_4: tesaṃ tesaṃ vinītavatthūnaṃ ganthanato “vatthugāthā”ti vuttā, na chandovicitilakkhaṇena.
tika-vin07t:430_5: Uddānagāthānaṃ vatthu vatthugāthāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Etthāti vinītavatthūsu.
tika-vin07t:430_6: Dutiyādīnanti dutiyapārājikādīnaṃ. Yaṃ passitvā cittakārādayo sippikā cittakammādīni
tika-vin07t:431_0: 67. Purimāni dveti makkaṭīvajjiputtakavatthūni dve. Tānipi bhagavatā vinītabhāvena
tika-vin07t:431_1: puna vinītavatthūsu pakkhittāni. Tattha tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosītiādi pana kiñcāpi tesaṃ
tika-vin07t:431_2: paṭhamaṃ kukkuccaṃ na uppannaṃ, bhikkhūhi pana bhagavatā ca garahitvā vuttavacanaṃ
tika-vin07t:431_3: sandhāya pacchā uppannattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuntiādi ca
tika-vin07t:431_4: bhikkhūhi ānandattherena ca paṭhamaṃ bhagavato ārocite, bhagavatā ca tesaṃ pārājikatte
tika-vin07t:431_5: pakāsite bhītā te sayampi gantvā attano kukkuccaṃ pacchā ārocenti eva. “Saccaṃ kira
tika-vin07t:431_6: tva”ntiādinā bhagavatā puṭṭhā pana “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti paṭijānanavasenāpi ārocenti.
tika-vin07t:431_7: Bhagavāpi āpattiṃ tvantiādinā tesaṃ pārājikattaṃ vinicchinoti eva. Anupaññattikathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:431_8: pana taṃ sabbaṃ avatvā anupaññattiyā anuguṇameva kiñcimattaṃ vuttaṃ, idhāpi tesaṃ
tika-vin07t:431_9: vatthūnaṃ bhagavatā vinītabhāvadassanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Keci imaṃ adhippāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:431_10: amanasikatvā “aññānevetāni vatthūnī”ti vadanti. Kuseti kusatiṇāni. Kesehīti manussakesehi.
tika-vin07t:432_0: 68. Vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti ettha pokkhalaṃ nāma samiddhaṃ sundarañca, tassa bhāvo “pokkharatā”ti
tika-vin07t:432_1: ra-kāraṃ katvā vutto, samiddhatā sundaratāti attho. Padhaṃsesīti abhibhavi. Na limpatīti na allīyati.
tika-vin07t:433_0: 69. Evarūpā parivattaliṅgā bhikkhuniyo atthato ekato upasampannāpi ubhatosaṅghe upasampannāsuyeva
tika-vin07t:433_2: āpattīhi anāpatti”nti upayogavacanaṃ katvā anujānāmīti padena sambandhitabbaṃ. Itthiliṅganti
tika-vin07t:433_3: thanādikaṃ itthisaṇṭhānaṃ vuttanti āha – “purisa…pe… itthisaṇṭhānaṃ uppanna”nti.
tika-vin07t:433_4: Taṃ nānantarikato pana “purisindriyampi antarahitaṃ, itthindriyañca uppanna”nti vuttameva
tika-vin07t:433_5: hoti, evaṃ uparipi liṅgaggahaṇeneva itthindriyādiggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tāti āpattiyo,
tika-vin07t:433_6: tassa vuṭṭhātunti iminā sambandho, tāhi āpattīhi vuṭṭhāpetunti attho. Kathanti āha
tika-vin07t:433_7: tā sabbāpi bhikkhunīhi kātabbantiādi. Tena paṭicchannāyapi appaṭicchannāyapi garukāpattiyā
tika-vin07t:434_1: Dubbalakusalenāti yathāvuttabalavākusalopahatasattinā tato eva dubbalabhūtena kusalena.
tika-vin07t:434_3: eva dubbalabhūtena paradārikādiakusalena. Sugatiyaṃ bhāvadvayassa kusalakammajattā
tika-vin07t:434_4: akusaleneva vināso kusaleneva uppattīti āha ubhayampītiādi. Duggatiyaṃ pana akusaleneva
tika-vin07t:434_5: ubhinnampi uppatti ca vināso ca, tattha dubbalabalavabhāvova viseso.
tika-vin07t:435_0: “Ehi mayaṃ gamissāmā”ti bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānagamane pācittiyāpattiparihāratthaṃ
tika-vin07t:435_1: vuttaṃ “saṃvidahanaṃ parimocetvā”ti. Tena ekagāmakkhettepi bahigāmato antaragharaṃ
tika-vin07t:435_2: saṃvidhāya gamanampi āpattikaramevāti dasseti. Parimocanavidhiṃ dassento āha mayantiādi.
tika-vin07t:435_3: Bahigāmeti gāmantare. Dutiyikā bhikkhunī pakkantā vā hotītiādinā vuttaanāpattilakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:435_4: anulometīti vuttaṃ “gāmantara…pe… anāpattī”ti. Kopetvāti pariccajitvā. Lajjiniyo…pe…
tika-vin07t:435_5: labbhatīti liṅgaparivattanadukkhapīḷitassa saṅgahepi asati hīnāyāvattanampi bhaveyyāti
tika-vin07t:435_6: “āpadāsū”ti vuttaanāpattianulomena vuttaṃ. Tāya dutiyikaṃ gahetvāva gantabbaṃ. Alajjiniyo…pe…
tika-vin07t:435_7: labbhatīti alajjinīhi saddhiṃ ekakammādisaṃvāse āpattisambhavato tā asantapakkhaṃ
tika-vin07t:435_8: bhajantīti vuttaṃ, imināpetaṃ veditabbaṃ “alajjinīhi saddhiṃ paribhogo na vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin07t:435_9: Yadi hi vaṭṭeyya, tatopi dutiyikaṃ vinā gāmantaragamanādīsu āpatti eva siyā saṅgāhikattā
tika-vin07t:435_10: tāsaṃ saṅgāhikalajjinigaṇato viya. Ñātikā na honti…pe… vaṭṭatīti vadantīti iminā
tika-vin07t:435_11: aṭṭhakathāsu anāgatabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Tatthāpi vissāsikañātikabhikkhuniyo vinā bhikkhunibhāve
tika-vin07t:435_12: aramantassa mānapakatikassa āpadāṭṭhānasambhavena taṃ vacanaṃ appaṭikkhittampi tadaññesaṃ
tika-vin07t:435_13: na vaṭṭatiyevāti gahetabbaṃ. Bhikkhubhāvepīti bhikkhukālepi. Taṃ nissāyāti taṃ nissayācariyaṃ
tika-vin07t:435_14: katvā. Upajjhā gahetabbāti upasampadāgahaṇatthaṃ upajjhā gahetabbā.
tika-vin07t:436_0: Vinayakammanti vikappanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Puna kātabbanti puna vikappetabbaṃ. Puna
tika-vin07t:436_1: paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṃ sannidhiṃ bhikkhūhi,
tika-vin07t:436_2: bhikkhūnaṃ sannidhiṃ bhikkhunīhi ca paṭiggāhāpetvā paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato puna
tika-vin07t:436_3: paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sattame divaseti idañca
tika-vin07t:436_4: nissaggiyaṃ anāpajjitvāva punapi sattāhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:436_5: Pakatattoti aparivattaliṅgo. Rakkhatīti taṃ paṭiggahaṇavijahanato rakkhati, avibhattatāya
tika-vin07t:437: Sāmaṃ gahetvāna nikkhipeyyāti sahatthena paṭiggahetvāna nikkhipeyya. Paribhuñjantassa āpattīti liṅgaparivatte jāte puna appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa āpatti.
tika-vin07t:438_0: Hīnāyāvattanenāti ettha keci “pakatattassa bhikkhuno sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya ‘gihī
tika-vin07t:438_1: bhavissāmī’ti gihiliṅgaggahaṇaṃ hīnāyāvattana”nti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ tattakena
tika-vin07t:438_2: bhikkhubhāvassa avijahanato. Aññe pana “pārājikaṃ āpannassa bhikkhupaṭiññaṃ pahāya
tika-vin07t:438_3: gihiliṅgabhāvūpagamanampi hīnāyāvattana”nti vadanti, taṃ yuttameva. Pārājikaṃ āpanno
tika-vin07t:438_4: hi taṃ paṭicchādetvā yāva bhikkhupaṭiñño hoti, tāva bhikkhu eva hoti bhikkhūnameva
tika-vin07t:438_5: pārājikassa paññattattā. “Yo pana bhikkhū”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tathā hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi
tika-vin07t:438_6: theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti, sahaseyyādiāpattiñca na janeti, attānaṃ omasantassa pācittiyañca janeti. Vuttañhi –
tika-vin07t:439: “Asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno, tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassā”ti.
tika-vin07t:440_0: Eke pana “pārājikaṃ āpannānaṃ dosaṃ paṭijānitvā gihiliṅgaggahaṇaṃ nāma sikkhāpaccakkhāne
tika-vin07t:440_1: samodhānaṃ gacchati tenāpi paṭiññāya bhikkhubhāvassa vijahanato. Teneva vinayavinicchayādīsu
tika-vin07t:440_2: hīnāyāvattanaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhāne samodhānetvā visuṃ taṃ na vuttaṃ. Tasmā bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:440_3: vibbhamitukāmatāya gihiliṅgaggahaṇaṃ idha hīnāyāvattanaṃ tāsaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānassa
tika-vin07t:440_4: abhāvato. Tāsaṃ paṭiggahaṇavijahanassāpi sabbaso vattabbattā”ti vadanti, tampi appaṭibāhiyameva.
tika-vin07t:440_6: gahetabbaṃ. Vibbhamotipi etasseva nāmaṃ, teneva taṃ khuddasikkhāyaṃ “acchedavissajjanagāhavibbhamā”ti
tika-vin07t:441_0: Anapekkhavissajjanenāti aññassa adatvāva anatthikasseva paṭiggahitavatthūnaṃ bahi
tika-vin07t:441_1: chaḍḍanena. Keci “paṭiggahitavatthūsu sāpekkhassa pure paṭiggahitabhāvato parimocanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:441_3: viyā”ti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ tathāvacanābhāvā. Yatheva hi cīvarādīsu anapekkhavissajjanena
tika-vin07t:441_4: adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ vatvāpi visuṃ paccuddhāro ca vutto, evamidhāpi vattabbaṃ, yathā
tika-vin07t:441_5: ca cīvarādīsu kāyapaṭibaddhesupi paccuddhārena adhiṭṭhānaṃ vigacchati, na evamidha.
tika-vin07t:441_6: Idha pana paṭiggahitavatthusmiṃ anapekkhassāpi kāyato mutteyeva tasmiṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:441_7: vijahati. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “satakkhattumpi pariccajatu, yāva attano hatthagataṃ paṭiggahitamevā”ti.
tika-vin07t:441_8: Anapekkhavissajjanenāti ettha ca “anapekkhāyā”ti ettakameva vattabbaṃ anapekkhataṃ
tika-vin07t:441_9: muñcitvā idha visuṃ vissajjanassa abhāvā. Na hettha paccuddhāre viya vissajjanavidhānamatthi.
tika-vin07t:441_10: Apica paṭiggahaṇamattavissajjane sati pure paṭiggahitopi āhāro bhuñjitukamyatāya
tika-vin07t:441_11: uppannāya paṭiggahaṇamattaṃ vissajjetvā puna paṭiggahetvā yathāsukhaṃ bhuñjitabbo
tika-vin07t:441_12: siyāti, tathā ca sannidhikārakasikkhāpade vuttā sabbāpi vinicchayabhedā niratthakā
tika-vin07t:442: “Gaṇṭhikapattassa vā gaṇṭhikantare sneho paviṭṭho hoti…pe… tādise pattepi punadivase bhuñjantassa pācittiya”ntiādi.
tika-vin07t:443_0: Tattha pana “paṭiggahaṇaṃ anapekkhacittena vissajjetvā bhuñjitabba”nti ettakameva
tika-vin07t:443_1: vattabbaṃ, na ca vuttaṃ. Katthaci īdisesu ca gaṇṭhikapattādīsu paṭiggahaṇe apekkhā
tika-vin07t:443_2: kassacipi nattheva tappahānāya vāyāmato, tathāpi tatthagataāmise paṭiggahaṇaṃ na
tika-vin07t:443_3: vigacchati. Kasmā? Bhikkhussa patte puna bhuñjitukāmatāpekkhāya vijjamānattā pattagatike
tika-vin07t:443_4: āhārepi tassā vattanato. Na hi pattaṃ avissajjetvā taggatikaṃ āhāraṃ vissajjetuṃ
tika-vin07t:443_5: sakkā, nāpi āhāraṃ avissajjetvā taggatikaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ vissajjetuṃ. Tasmā vatthuno
tika-vin07t:443_6: vissajjanameva anapekkhavissajjanaṃ, na paṭiggahaṇassāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:444_0: “Antosattāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, ḍayhati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti,
