tika-vin07t:571_8: bhaṇḍaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ yutti sabbatthāti heṭṭhā vuttesu upari vakkhamānesu ca sabbattha
tika-vin07t:571_9: āṇattippasaṅgesu āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pārājikādīnaṃ bhāvasaṅkhātā vinayayutti, sā ca
tika-vin07t:571_10: āṇattassa kiriyāniṭṭhāpanakkhaṇe āṇāpakassa payoge theyyacittānaṃ abhāvā āṇattikkhaṇe
tika-vin07t:571_11: ekā eva āpatti hotīti evaṃ upapattiyā pavattattā yuttīti vuttā. “Mūlaṭṭhassa thullaccaya”nti
tika-vin07t:571_13: kasmā panettha ācariyassa thullaccayanti āha “mahājano hī”tiādi. Mahājanoti ca buddharakkhitadhammarakkhitasaṅgharakkhite
tika-vin07t:571_14: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Mūlaṭṭhasseva dukkaṭanti buddharakkhitassa dukkaṭaṃ. Idañca mūlaṭṭhassa
tika-vin07t:571_15: thullaccayābhāvadassanatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ āṇattikkhaṇe dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana
tika-vin07t:571_16: saṅgharakkhitassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā puna dukkaṭasambhavaṃ sandhāya. Na hi so ekapayogena
tika-vin07t:571_17: dukkaṭadvayaṃ āpajjati. Keci pana “visaṅketattā pāḷiyaṃ ‘mūlaṭṭhassā’ti avatvā ‘paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t:571_18: āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti sāmaññena vuttattā idaṃ saṅgharakkhitassa dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin07t:571_19: vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ kiñcāpi aṭṭhakathāya na sameti, pāḷito pana yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin07t:571_20: Na hi tassa paṭiggahaṇappayoge anāpatti hotīti. Imināva heṭṭhā āgatavāresupi paṭiggaṇhantānaṃ
tika-vin07t:571_21: dukkaṭaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Paṇṇe vā silādīsu vā ‘coriyaṃ kātabba’nti likhitvā ṭhapite
tika-vin07t:571_22: pārājikamevā”ti keci vadanti, taṃ pana “asukassa gehe bhaṇḍa”nti evaṃ niyametvā likhite
tika-vin07t:571_23: yujjati, na aniyametvā likhiteti vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Maggānantaraphalasadisāti iminā yathā
tika-vin07t:571_24: ariyapuggalānaṃ maggānantare phale uppanne kilesapaṭippassaddhipariyosānaṃ bhāvanākiccaṃ
tika-vin07t:571_25: nipphannaṃ nāma hoti, evametissā atthasādhakacetanāya uppannāya āṇattikiccaṃ nipphannamevāti
tika-vin07t:574_0: 122. Tattha tatthāti bhūmaṭṭhathalaṭṭhādīsu. Pāḷiyaṃ manussapariggahitaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin07t:574_1: “parapariggahita”nti vuttaṃ. Āmasati phandāpeti ṭhānā cāvetīti imehi tīhi padehi
tika-vin07t:574_2: pubbapayogasahitaṃ pañcamaṃ avahāraṅgaṃ vuttaṃ, ṭhānā cāvetīti ca idaṃ upalakkhaṇamattaṃ.
tika-vin07t:574_3: Āṇattikādayo sabbepi payogā dhuranikkhepo ca idha saṅgahetabbāvāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:575_0: 125. Ṭhānācāvananti idaṃ pāḷianusārato vuttaṃ dhuranikkhepassāpi saṅgahetabbato.
tika-vin07t:575_1: Esa nayo uparipi sabbattha. Tattha hi na ca sakasaññīti iminā parapariggahitatā vuttā,
tika-vin07t:575_2: na ca vissāsaggāhī na ca tāvakālikanti imehi parapariggahitasaññitā, tīhi vā etehi
tika-vin07t:575_3: parapariggahitatā parapariggahitasaññitā ca vuttāti veditabbā. Anajjhāvutthakanti
tika-vin07t:575_5: paṭhamaṃ pariggahetvā pacchā anatthikatāya chaḍḍitaṃ yaṃ kiñci. Chinnamūlakanti naṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin07t:575_6: pariyesitvā ālayasaṅkhātassa mūlassa chinnattā chinnamūlakaṃ. Assāmikanti anajjhāvutthakādīhi
tika-vin07t:575_7: tīhi ākārehi dassitaṃ assāmikavatthu. Ubhayampīti assāmikaṃ attano santakañca.
tika-vin07t:577_0: 131. Tasmiṃyeva attabhāve nibbattāti tasmiṃyeva matasarīre petattabhāvena nibbattā.
tika-vin07t:577_1: Rukkhādīsu laggitasāṭake vattabbameva natthīti manussehi agopitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:577_2: sace panetaṃ devālayacetiyarukkhādīsu niyuttehi purisehi rakkhitagopitaṃ hoti, gahetuṃ
tika-vin07t:577_3: na vaṭṭati. Thoke khāyite…pe… gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti idaṃ adinnādānābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:577_4: Jighacchitapāṇinā khādiyamānamaṃsassa acchinditvā khādanaṃ nāma kāruññahānito lolabhāvato
tika-vin07t:577_5: ca asāruppameva. Teneva hi ariyavaṃsikā attano patte bhattaṃ khādantampi sunakhādiṃ
tika-vin07t:577_6: tajjetvā na vārenti, tiracchānānaṃ āmisadāne kusalaṃ viya tesaṃ āmisassa acchindanepi
tika-vin07t:577_7: akusalamevāti gahetabbaṃ, teneva vakkhati “parānuddayatāya ca na gahetabba”nti.
tika-vin07t:579_0: Bahu ekato dāruādibhāriyassa ekassa bhaṇḍassa ukkhipanakāle “gaṇhatha ukkhipathā”ti
tika-vin07t:579_2: “Tvaṃ etaṃ vatthuṃ gaṇha, ahaṃ añña”nti evaṃ pavatte pana avahāre attanā gahitaṃ
tika-vin07t:579_3: sāhatthikameva, parena gāhāpitaṃ āṇattikameva, teneva tadubhayagghena pañcamāsepi
tika-vin07t:579_4: pārājikaṃ na hoti, ekekabhaṇḍagghavasena thullaccayādimeva hoti. Vuttañhi “sāhatthikaṃ
tika-vin07t:579_5: vā āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hotī”tiādi. Upanikkhittabhaṇḍaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyañca adātukāmatāya
tika-vin07t:579_6: “demi dammī”ti vikkhipanto tuṇhībhāvena viheṭhentopi tena tena kāyavikārādikiriyāya
tika-vin07t:582_0: 135. Vinītavatthūsu niruttiyeva taṃtaṃatthaggahaṇassa upāyatāya pathoti niruttipatho,
tika-vin07t:582_1: tenevāha “vohāravacanamatte”ti. Yathākammaṃ gatoti tato petattabhāvato matabhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:582_2: dasseti. Abbhuṇheti āsannamaraṇatāya sarīrassa uṇhasamaṅgitaṃ dasseti, tenevāha “allasarīre”ti.
tika-vin07t:582_3: Kuṇapabhāvaṃ upagatampi bhinnameva allabhāvato bhinnattā. Visabhāgasarīreti itthisarīre.
tika-vin07t:582_4: Sīse vātiādi adhakkhake ubbhajāṇumaṇḍale padese cittavikārappattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:582_5: yattha katthaci anāmasantena kataṃ sukatameva. Matasarīrampi hi yena kenaci ākārena
tika-vin07t:582_6: sañcicca phusantassa anāmāsadukkaṭamevāti vadanti, taṃ yuttameva. Na hi apārājikavatthukepi
tika-vin07t:582_7: cittādiitthirūpe bhavantaṃ dukkaṭaṃ pārājikavatthubhūte matitthisarīre nivattati.
tika-vin07t:584_0: 138. Balasāti balena. Sāṭako bhavissati, gaṇhissāmīti anāgatavacanaṃ pasibbakaggahaṇato
tika-vin07t:584_1: puretaraṃ samuppannaparikappadassanavasena vuttaṃ. Gahaṇakkhaṇe pana “sāṭako ce,
tika-vin07t:584_2: gaṇhāmī”ti pasibbakaṃ gaṇhātīti evamettha adhippāyo gahetabbo, na pana bahi nīharitvā
tika-vin07t:584_3: sāṭakabhāvaṃ ñatvā gahessāmīti, tenāha “uddhāreyeva pārājika”nti. Itarathā “idāni
tika-vin07t:584_4: na gaṇhāmi, pacchā andhakāre jāte vijānanakāle vā gaṇhissāmi, idāni olokento viya
tika-vin07t:584_5: hatthagataṃ karomī”ti gaṇhantassāpi gahaṇakkhaṇe avahāro bhaveyya, na ca taṃ yuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:584_6: tadā gahaṇe sanniṭṭhānābhāvā. Sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya eva hi pāṇātipātādiakusalaṃ viya.
tika-vin07t:584_7: Na hi “pacchā vadhissāmī”ti pāṇaṃ gaṇhantassa tadeva tasmiṃ matepi pāṇātipāto hoti
tika-vin07t:584_8: vadhakacetanāya payogassa akatattā, evamidhāpi atthaṅgate sūriye avaharissāmītiādinā
tika-vin07t:584_9: kālaparikappanavasena ṭhānā cāvitepi tadāpi avahāro na hoti okāsaparikappe viya,
tika-vin07t:584_10: tasmiṃ pana yathāparikappitaṭṭhāne kāle āgate bhaṇḍaṃ bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvāpi theyyacittena
tika-vin07t:584_11: gacchato padavārena avahāroti khāyati. Tasmā bhaṇḍaparikappo okāsaparikappo kālaparikappoti
tika-vin07t:584_12: tividhopi parikappo gahetabbo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana okāsaparikappe samodhānetvā kālaparikappo
tika-vin07t:584_13: visuṃ na vuttoti amhākaṃ khanti, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Padavārena kāretabboti bhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:585_0: Parikappo dissatīti gahaṇakkhaṇe parikappo dissati, na tadā tesaṃ matena avahāroti
tika-vin07t:585_1: dasseti. Disvā haṭattā parikappāvahāro na dissatīti pacchā pana bahi vīmaṃsitvā sāṭakabhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:585_2: ñatvā tato pacchā theyyacittena haṭattā pubbe katassa parikappassa avahārānaṅgattā
tika-vin07t:585_3: “sutta”nti ñatvā haraṇe viya theyyāvahāro eva siyā. Tasmā parikappāvahāro na dissati.
tika-vin07t:585_4: Sāṭako ce bhavissatītiādikassa parikappassa tadā avijjamānattā kevalaṃ avahāro eva,
tika-vin07t:585_5: na parikappāvahāroti adhippāyo, tena bhaṇḍaparikappāvahārassa “sāṭako ce bhavissati,
tika-vin07t:585_6: gahessāmī”ti evaṃ bhaṇḍasanniṭṭhānābhāvakkhaṇeyeva pavattiṃ dasseti, tenāha “yaṃ
tika-vin07t:585_7: parikappitaṃ, taṃ adiṭṭhaṃ parikappitabhāve ṭhitaṃyeva uddharantassa avahāro”ti.
tika-vin07t:585_8: Yadi evaṃ kasmā okāsapaappāvahāro bhaṇḍaṃ disvā avaharantassa parikappāvahāro siyāti?
tika-vin07t:585_9: Nāyaṃ doso abhaṇḍavisayattā tassa parikappassa, pubbeva disvā ñātabhaṇḍasseva hi
tika-vin07t:585_10: okāsaparikappo vutto. Taṃ maññamāno taṃ avaharīti idaṃ suttaṃ kiñcāpi “taññeveta”nti
tika-vin07t:585_11: niyametvā gaṇhantassa vasena vuttaṃ, tathāpi “tañce gaṇhissāmī”ti evaṃ pavatte imasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:585_12: parikappepi “gaṇhissāmī”ti gahaṇe niyamasabbhāvā avahāratthasādhakaṃ hotīti uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:586: Kecīti mahāaṭṭhakathāyameva ekacce ācariyā. Mahāpaccariyaṃ panātiādināpi kecivādo gārayho, mahāaṭṭhakathāvādova yuttataroti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:587_0: Alaṅkārabhaṇḍanti aṅgulimuddikādi. Kusaṃ pātetvāti vilīvamayaṃ vā tālapaṇṇādimayaṃ
tika-vin07t:587_1: vā katasaññāṇaṃ pātetvā. Parakoṭṭhāsato kuse uddhaṭepi na tāva kusassa parivattanaṃ
tika-vin07t:587_2: jātanti vuttaṃ “uddhāre rakkhatī”ti. Hatthato muttamatte pārājikanti iminā ṭhānācāvanaṃ
tika-vin07t:587_3: dhuranikkhepañca vinā kusasaṅkāmanaṃ nāma visuṃ ekoyaṃ avahāroti dasseti. Sabbepi
tika-vin07t:587_4: hi avahārā sāhatthikāṇattikādhippāyayogehi nipphādiyamānā atthato ṭhānācāvanadhuranikkhepakusasaṅkāmanesu
tika-vin07t:587_5: tīsu samosarantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itaro tassa bhāgaṃ uddharati, uddhāre pārājikanti
tika-vin07t:587_6: purimassa attano koṭṭhāse ālayassa avigatattā vuttaṃ, ālaye pana sabbathā asati avahāro
tika-vin07t:587_7: na hoti, tenāha “vicinitāvasesaṃ gaṇhantassāpi avahāro natthevā”ti.
tika-vin07t:588: Nāyaṃ mamāti jānantopīti ettha pi-saddena tattha vematikopi hutvā theyyacittena gaṇhantopi saṅgayhati. Siveyyakanti siviraṭṭhe jātaṃ.
tika-vin07t:589_0: 140-1. Kappiyaṃ kārāpetvāti pacāpetvā. Tasmiṃ pācittiyanti adinnādānabhāvena sahapayogassāpi
tika-vin07t:589_1: abhāvā dukkaṭaṃ na vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Āṇattehīti sammatena āṇattehi. Āṇattenāti
tika-vin07t:589_2: sāmikehi āṇattena. Bhaṇḍadeyyanti sammatādīhi dinnattā na parājikaṃ jātaṃ, asantaṃ
tika-vin07t:589_3: puggalaṃ vatvā gahitattā pana bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññena diyyamānanti sammatādīhi
tika-vin07t:589_4: catūhi aññena diyyamānaṃ. Gaṇhantoti “aparassa bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā gaṇhanto. Aparassāti
tika-vin07t:589_5: asantaṃ puggalaṃ adassetvā pana “aparaṃ bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā
tika-vin07t:589_6: gaṇhato gihisantake sāminā ca “imassa dehī”ti evaṃ āṇattena ca dinne bhaṇḍadeyyampi
tika-vin07t:589_7: na hoti, saṅghasantake pana hotīti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ asammatena vā anāṇattena
tika-vin07t:589_8: vātiādi puna vuttaṃ. Itarehi diyyamānanti sammatena āṇattena vā diyyamānaṃ. Evaṃ
tika-vin07t:589_9: gaṇhatoti “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhato. Sāmikena
tika-vin07t:589_10: panāti ettha pana-saddo visesatthajotako, tena “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vā kūṭavassāni
tika-vin07t:589_11: gaṇetvā vā gaṇhante sāmikena sayaṃ dente vā dāpente vā viseso atthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:589_12: Sudinnanti bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo. Heṭṭhā pana sāmikena tena āṇattena vā
tika-vin07t:589_13: diyyamānaṃ gihisantakaṃ “aparassa bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā gaṇhato aparassa abhāvato
tika-vin07t:589_14: sāmisantakameva hotīti bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ jātaṃ, idha pana tehiyeva diyyamānaṃ “aparampi
tika-vin07t:589_15: bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhato “dehī”ti vuttattā aññātakaviññattimattaṃ
tika-vin07t:589_16: ṭhapetvā bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ na hotīti sudinnamevāti vuttaṃ. Assāmikena pana āṇattena dinnaṃ
tika-vin07t:589_17: bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhato bhaṇḍadeyyamevāti vadanti, pattacatukke viya avahāratāvettha yuttā,
tika-vin07t:589_18: saṅghasantake pana “dehī”ti vuttepi sāmikassa kassaci abhāvā sammatena dinnepi bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ
tika-vin07t:590_0: 146-9. Āharāpentesu bhaṇḍadeyyanti “gahite attamano hotī”ti vacanato anattamanassa
tika-vin07t:590_1: santakaṃ gahitampi puna dātabbamevāti vuttaṃ. “Sammukhībhūtehi bhājetabba”nti vacanato
tika-vin07t:590_3: gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Bhaṇḍadeyyanti ubhinnaṃ sālayabhāvepi corassa adatvā sāmikasseva
tika-vin07t:590_4: dātabbaṃ corenāpi sāmikasseva dātabbato. Eseva nayoti paṃsukūlasaññāya gahite bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ,
tika-vin07t:591_0: Vuṭṭhahantesūti gāmaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyantesu. Avisesenāti saussāhatādivisesaṃ aparāmasitvā
tika-vin07t:591_1: sāmaññato. Saussāhamattameva āpattibhāvassa pamāṇaṃ sāmikānaṃ paricchinnabhāvato.
tika-vin07t:591_2: Tatoti gaṇasantakādito. Kulasaṅgahaṇatthāya detīti paṃsukūlavissāsikādisaññāya gahetvā
tika-vin07t:591_3: deti, tadā kulasaṅgahapaccayā ca dukkaṭaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyañca, theyyacitte pana sati kulasaṅgahaṇatthāya
tika-vin07t:591_4: gaṇhatopi pārājikameva. Ūnapañcamāsakādīsu kuladūsakadukkaṭena saddhiṃ thullaccayadukkaṭāni.
tika-vin07t:591_5: Senāsanatthāya niyamitanti idaṃ issaravatāya dadato thullaccayadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:591_6: Itarapaccayatthāya dinnampi atheyyacittena issaravatāya kulasaṅgahaṇatthāya vā ñātakādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:591_7: vā dadato dukkaṭaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyañca hoteva. Issaravatāyāti “mayi dente ko nivāressati,
tika-vin07t:591_8: ahamevettha pamāṇa”nti evaṃ attano issariyabhāvena. Thullaccayanti kulasaṅgahaṇatthāya
tika-vin07t:591_9: vā aññathā vā kāraṇena dadato senāsanatthāya niyamitassa garubhaṇḍatāya thullaccayaṃ
tika-vin07t:591_10: bhaṇḍadeyyañca. Gīvāti ettha senāsanatthāya niyamite thullaccayena saddhiṃ gīvā,
tika-vin07t:591_11: itarasmiṃ dukkaṭena saddhinti veditabbaṃ. Sukhāditamevāti antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā
tika-vin07t:591_12: bhājetvā attano santakaṃ katvā khāditattā vuttaṃ. Saṅghikañhi vihārapaṭibaddhaṃ vebhaṅgiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:591_13: bahiupacārasīmaṭṭhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ antoupacāraṭṭhehi bhikkhūhi eva bhājetabbaṃ, na bahi
tika-vin07t:592_0: 150. “Vutto vajjemī”ti vuttabhikkhusmiṃ “vutto vajjehī”ti vuttassa pacchā uppajjanakapārājikādidosāropanato,
tika-vin07t:592_1: gahaṭṭhānaṃ vā “bhadantā aparicchedaṃ katvā vadantī”ti evaṃ dosāropanato.
tika-vin07t:593_0: 153-5. Chātajjhattanti tena chātena jighacchāya udaragginā jhattaṃ, daḍḍhaṃ pīḷitanti
tika-vin07t:593_1: attho. Dhanukanti khuddakadhanusaṇṭhānaṃ lagganakadaṇḍaṃ. Maddanto gacchati, bhaṇḍadeyyanti
tika-vin07t:593_2: ettha ekasūkaragghanakabhaṇḍaṃ dātabbaṃ ekasmiṃ bandhe aññesaṃ tattha abajjhanato.
tika-vin07t:593_3: Adūhalanti yantapāsāṇo, yena ajjhotthaṭattā migā palāyituṃ na sakkonti. Pacchā gacchatīti
tika-vin07t:593_4: tena katapayogena agantvā pacchā sayameva gacchati, heṭṭhā vuttesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu
tika-vin07t:593_5: eseva nayo. Rakkhaṃ yācitvāti rājapurisānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā anuddissa rakkhaṃ yācitvā.
tika-vin07t:594_1: saṅghike kattabbavidhiṃ katvā paribhuñjanatthāya. Gahaṇeti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo. Yatthāti
tika-vin07t:594_2: yasmiṃ āvāse. Aññesanti aññesaṃ āgantukānaṃ. Tesupi āgantukā anissarāti senāsane
tika-vin07t:594_3: nirantaraṃ vasantānaṃ cīvaratthāya dāyakehi bhikkhūhi vā niyametvā dinnattā bhājetvā
tika-vin07t:594_4: khādituṃ anissarā, āgantukehipi icchantehi tasmiṃ vihāre vassānādīsu pavisitvā cīvaratthāya
tika-vin07t:594_5: gahetabbaṃ. Tesaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbanti sabbāni phalāphalāni abhājetvā “ettakesu rukkhesu
tika-vin07t:594_6: phalāni bhājetvā paribhuñjissāma, aññesu phalāphalehi senāsanāni paṭijaggissāmā”ti
tika-vin07t:594_8: upanemā”ti vā evaṃ sammā upanentānaṃ āvāsikānaṃ katikāya āgantukehi ṭhātabbaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:594_9: “anissarā”ti vacanena dīpito eva attho, mahāpaccariyaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānantiādinā
tika-vin07t:594_10: vitthāretvā dassito. Paribhogavasenevāti ettha eva-saddo aṭṭhānappayutto, paribhogavasena
tika-vin07t:594_11: tameva bhājetvāti yojetabbaṃ. Etthāti etasmiṃ vihāre, raṭṭhe vā.
tika-vin07t:595_0: Senāsanapaccayanti senāsanañca tadatthāya niyametvā ṭhapitañca. Ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni
tika-vin07t:595_1: ṭhapetvāti vuttamevatthaṃ puna byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ “mūlavatthucchedaṃ pana
tika-vin07t:595_2: katvā na upanetabba”nti vuttaṃ, senāsanasaṅkhātavatthuno mūlacchedaṃ katvā sabbāni
tika-vin07t:595_3: senāsanāni na vissajjetabbānīti attho. Keci panettha “ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni
tika-vin07t:595_4: ṭhapetvā lāmakato paṭṭhāya vissajjentehipi senāsanabhūmiyo na vissajjetabbāti ayamattho
tika-vin07t:595_5: vutto”ti vadanti, tampi yuttameva imassāpi atthassa avassaṃ vattabbato, itarathā
tika-vin07t:596_0: Paṇṇaṃ āropetvāti “ettake rukkhe rakkhitvā tato ettakaṃ gahetabba”nti paṇṇaṃ āropetvā.
tika-vin07t:596_1: Nimittasaññaṃ katvāti saṅketaṃ katvā. Dārakāti tesaṃ puttanattādayo ye keci gopenti,
tika-vin07t:596_2: te sabbepi idha “dārakā”ti vuttā. Tatoti yathāvuttadārusambhārato. Āpucchitvāti kārakasaṅghaṃ
tika-vin07t:596_3: āpucchitvā. Taṃ sabbampi āharitvāti anāpucchitvāpi tāvakālikaṃ āharitvā. Ayameva
tika-vin07t:596_4: bhikkhu issarotiādito paṭṭhāya attano santakehi dārusambhārādīhi ca kārāpitattā paṭijaggitattā
tika-vin07t:596_5: ca saṅghikasenāsane bhāgitāya ca ayameva issaro, na ca so tato vuṭṭhāpetabboti vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:596_6: hoti. Udakapūjanti cetiyaṅgaṇe siñcanādipūjaṃ. Vattasīsenāti kevalaṃ saddhāya, na
tika-vin07t:596_7: vetanādiatthāya. Savatthukanti saha bhūmiyā. Kuṭṭanti gehabhittiṃ. Pākāranti parikkhepapākāraṃ.
tika-vin07t:596_8: Tatoti chaḍḍitavihārato. Tato āharitvā senāsanaṃ kataṃ hotīti sāmantagāmavāsīhi bhikkhūhi
tika-vin07t:596_9: chaḍḍitavihārato dārusambhārādiṃ āharitvā senāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:597_1: vuḍḍhatarānaṃ na detī”ti vuttaṃ. Catubhāgaudakasambhinneti catutthabhāgena sambhinne.
tika-vin07t:597_2: Pāḷiyaṃ “anāpatti, bhikkhave, pārājikassā”ti sāmikehi thullanandaṃ uddissa etissā
tika-vin07t:597_3: hatthe dinnattā, atheyyacittena paribhuñjitattā ca vuttaṃ. Theyyacittena paribhuttepi
tika-vin07t:598_0: 159. Tassa kulassa anukampāya pasādānurakkhaṇatthāyātiādinā kulasaṅgahatthaṃ nākāsīti
tika-vin07t:598_1: dasseti. “Yāva dārakā pāsādaṃ ārohanti, tāva pāsādo tesaṃ santike hotū”ti pubbe kālaparicchedaṃ
tika-vin07t:598_2: katvā adhiṭṭhitattā eva yathākālaparicchedameva tattha tiṭṭhati, tato paraṃ pāsādo
tika-vin07t:598_3: sayameva yathāṭhānaṃ gacchati, tathāgamanañca iddhivissajjanena sañjātaṃ viya hotīti
tika-vin07t:598_4: vuttaṃ “thero iddhiṃ paṭisaṃharī”ti. Yasmā evaṃ iddhividhañāṇena karontassa kāyavacīpayogā
tika-vin07t:598_5: na santi theyyacittañca natthi pāsādasseva vicāritattā, tasmā “ettha avahāro natthī”ti
tika-vin07t:598_6: thero evamakāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā dārakesu anukampāya ānayanatthameva pāsāde
tika-vin07t:598_7: upanīte pāse baddhasūkarādīnaṃ āmisaṃ dassetvā ṭhānācāvanaṃ viya karamarānītesu dārakesu
tika-vin07t:598_8: pāsādaṃ āruḷhesupi puna paṭisaṃharaṇe ca idha avahāro natthi kāruññādhippāyattā,
tika-vin07t:598_9: bhaṇḍadeyyampi na hoti kāyavacīpayogābhāvā. Kāyavacīpayoge satiyeva hi āpatti bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ
tika-vin07t:598_10: vā hoti, teneva bhagavā “anāpatti, bhikkhave, atheyyacittassā”tiādiṃ avatvā “anāpatti,
tika-vin07t:598_11: bhikkhave, iddhimassa iddhivisaye”ti ettakameva avoca. Iddhivisayeti cettha parabhaṇḍādāyakakāyavacīpayogāsamuṭṭhāpakassa
tika-vin07t:598_12: kevalaṃ manodvārikassa atheyyacittabhūtassa iddhicittassa visaye āpatti nāma natthīti
tika-vin07t:598_13: adhippāyo gahetabbo. Kiṃ pana paṭikkhittaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti codanaṃ
tika-vin07t:598_15: iddhivisaye”ti hi imināyeva suttena adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā appaṭikkhittabhāvo sijjhati.
tika-vin07t:598_16: Attano pakativaṇṇaṃ avijahitvā bahiddhā hatthiādidassanaṃ, “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”ti
tika-vin07t:598_17: āgatañca adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannattā adhiṭṭhāniddhi nāma, “so pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā
tika-vin07t:598_18: kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, nāgavaṇṇaṃ…pe… vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti evaṃ āgatā
tika-vin07t:598_19: iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattattā vikubbaniddhi nāma. Attano pana
tika-vin07t:598_20: pakatirūpaṃ yathāsabhāvena ṭhapetvāva bahi hatthiādidassanaṃ vikubbaniddhi nāma na
tika-vin07t:598_21: hoti, attano rūpameva hatthiādirūpena nimmānaṃ vikubbaniddhīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:599_0: Parājitakilesenāti vijitakilesena, nikkilesenāti attho. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane, tena
tika-vin07t:599_2: kiñci sikkhāpadaṃ na vijjatīti yojanā. Tattha attho nāma pāḷiattho, vinicchayo pāḷimuttakavinicchayo,
tika-vin07t:599_3: te gambhīrā yasmiṃ, taṃ gambhīratthavinicchayaṃ. Vatthumhi otiṇṇeti codanāvasena
tika-vin07t:599_4: vā attanāva attano vītikkamārocanavasena vā saṅghamajjhe adinnādānavatthusmiṃ otiṇṇe.
tika-vin07t:599_5: Etthāti otiṇṇavatthumhi. Vinicchayoti āpattānāpattiniyamanaṃ. Kappiyepi ca vatthusminti
tika-vin07t:605_0: 162. Yā ayaṃ heṭṭhā taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hotītiādinā
tika-vin07t:605_1: rājagahassa buddhuppādeyeva vepullappatti vuttā, sā etthāpi samānāti dassetuṃ “idampi
tika-vin07t:605_2: ca nagara”nti vuttaṃ, tena ca na kevalaṃ rājagahādayo evāti dasseti. Mahāvanaṃ nāmātiādi
tika-vin07t:605_3: majjhimabhāṇakasaṃyuttabhāṇakānaṃ matena vuttaṃ, dīghabhāṇakā pana “himavantena saddhiṃ
tika-vin07t:605_4: ekābaddhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ mahāvana”nti vadanti. Haṃsavaṭṭakacchadanenāti haṃsavaṭṭakapaṭicchannena,
tika-vin07t:605_6: Chandoti dubbalarāgo. Rāgoti balavarāgo. “Kesalomādi”nti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:605_7: vibhāgena dassetuṃ yepi hītiādi vuttaṃ. Pañcapañcappabhedenāti ettha pañca pañca
tika-vin07t:605_8: pabhedā etassa pariyāyassāti pañcapañcappabhedo, tena pañcapañcappabhedenāti evaṃ
tika-vin07t:606_0: Asubhāyāti asubhamātikāya. Vaṇṇetabbamātikañhi apekkhitvā itthiliṅge sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:606_1: tenāha mātikaṃ nikkhipitvātiādi. Taṃ vibhajantoti mātikaṃ vibhajanto. Phātikammanti
tika-vin07t:606_4: Tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannanti ettha pana jhānassa ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ
tika-vin07t:606_5: vasena tividhakalyāṇatā, tesaṃyeva ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ lakkhaṇavasena dasalakkhaṇasampannatā
tika-vin07t:606_6: ca veditabbā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “dasalakkhaṇavibhāvaneneva tannissayabhūtā tividhakalyāṇatāpi
tika-vin07t:607_0: Tatrāyaṃ pāḷīti tasmiṃ dasalakkhaṇavibhāvanavisaye ayaṃ pāḷi. Paṭipadāvisuddhīti
tika-vin07t:607_2: sāyaṃ yasmā upekkhānubrūhanādīnampi paccayattena padhānā purimakāraṇasiddhā ca, tasmā
tika-vin07t:607_4: tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccanipphattiyā anubrūhanā, sā pana paribandhavisuddhisamakālavibhāvinīpi
tika-vin07t:607_7: sā pana yasmā kattabbassa sabbakiccassa nipphattiyāva siddhā nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:607_8: “sampahaṃsanā pariyosāna”nti. Tīṇipi cetāni kalyāṇāni ekakkhaṇe labbhamānānipi paccayapaccayuppannatādivasena
tika-vin07t:607_9: pavattantīti dassanatthaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānabhāvena vuttāni, na pana jhānassa uppādādikkhaṇattaye
tika-vin07t:607_10: yathākkamaṃ labbhamānattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Majjhimaṃ samādhinimittaṃ paṭipajjatītiādīsu
tika-vin07t:607_11: majjhimaṃ samādhinimittaṃ nāma samappavatto appanāsamādhiyeva. So hi līnuddhaccasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-vin07t:607_12: ubhinnaṃ antānaṃ anupagamanena majjhimo, savisesaṃ cittassa ekattārammaṇe ṭhapanato
tika-vin07t:607_13: samādhiyeva uparivisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato “samādhinimitta”nti vuccati, taṃ paṭipajjati
tika-vin07t:607_14: paṭilabbhatīti attho. Evaṃ paṭipannattā majjhimena samādhinimittena tattha ekattārammaṇe
tika-vin07t:607_15: appanāgocare pakkhandati upatiṭṭhati, evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa cittassa puna visodhetabbābhāvato
tika-vin07t:607_16: visodhane byāpāraṃ akaronto puggalo visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma. Samathabhāvūpagamanena
tika-vin07t:607_17: samathapaṭipannassa puna samādhāne byāpāraṃ akaronto samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
tika-vin07t:607_18: samathapaṭipannabhāvato evamassa kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassa puna
tika-vin07t:607_19: ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpāraṃ akaronto ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma.
tika-vin07t:608_0: Tattha jātānantiādīsu ye pana te evaṃ upekkhānubrūhite tasmiṃ jhānacitte jātā samādhipaññāsaṅkhātā
tika-vin07t:608_1: yuganaddhadhammā, tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ anativattanasabhāvena sampahaṃsanā visodhanā pariyodapanā
tika-vin07t:608_2: ca, saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ kilesehi vimuttattā vimuttirasena ekarasatāya sampahaṃsanā
tika-vin07t:608_3: ca, yañcetaṃ tadupagaṃ tesaṃ anativattanaekarasabhāvānaṃ anucchavikaṃ vīriyaṃ, tassa
tika-vin07t:608_4: tadupagavīriyassa vāhanaṭṭhena pavattanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā ca, tasmiṃ khaṇe yathāvuttadhammānaṃ
tika-vin07t:608_5: āsevanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā ca, pariyodapanā ca pariyodapanakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivaseneva
tika-vin07t:608_6: ijjhatīti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ tividhattagataṃ cittantiādīni tasseva cittassa thomanavacanāni.
tika-vin07t:608_8: tasmiññeva ārammaṇe cittassa nirantarappavattisaṅkhātena samādhinā sampannaṃ, idaṃ
tika-vin07t:608_9: jhānaṅgavasena vuttaṃ. Samādhisampannanti idaṃ pana indriyavasenāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:609_0: Paṭikuṭatīti saṅkucati. Paṭivaṭṭatīti paṭinivaṭṭati. Nhārudaddulanti nhārukhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin07t:610_1: lokikā “mudā”ti vohariṃsūti dassento āha “vaggumatā”ti. “Vaggū”ti matā, suddhasammatāti
tika-vin07t:610_2: attho, tenāha “puññasammatā”ti. Sattānaṃ pāpunanena sodhanena sā puññasammatā.
tika-vin07t:611_0: 163. Mārassa dheyyaṃ ṭhānaṃ, vatthu vā nivāso māradheyyaṃ, so atthato tebhūmakadhammā
tika-vin07t:611_1: eva, idha pana pañca kāmaguṇā adhippetā, taṃ māradheyyaṃ. “Ayaṃ samaṇakuttako yathāsamuppannasaṃvegamūlakena
tika-vin07t:611_2: samaṇabhāvūpagamanena atikkamituṃ sakkhissatī”ti cintetvā avoca, na pana “arahattappattiyā
tika-vin07t:611_3: tīsu bhavesu appaṭisandhikatāya taṃ atikkamituṃ sakkhissatī”ti maraṇeneva sattānaṃ
tika-vin07t:611_4: saṃsāramocanaladdhikattā devatāya. Na hi matānaṃ katthaci paṭisandhi gacchati. Iminā
tika-vin07t:611_5: atthena evameva bhavitabbanti iminā paresaṃ jīvitā voropanatthena evameva saṃsāramocanasabhāveneva
tika-vin07t:611_6: bhavitabbaṃ. “Attanāpi attānaṃ jīvitā voropenti, aññamaññampi jīvitā voropentī”ti
tika-vin07t:611_7: vuttattā sabbānipi tāni pañcabhikkhusatāni jīvitā voropesīti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena
tika-vin07t:611_8: vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Tasmā ye attanāpi attānaṃ aññamaññañca jīvitā voropesuṃ, te
tika-vin07t:611_9: puthujjanabhikkhū ṭhapetvā tadavasese ca puthujjanabhikkhū, sabbe ca ariye ayaṃ jīvitā
tika-vin07t:612_0: 164. Ekībhāvatoti pavivekato. Uddesaṃ paripucchaṃ gaṇhantīti attano attano ācariyānaṃ
tika-vin07t:612_1: santike gaṇhanti, gahetvā ca ācariyehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahanti. Tadā pana
tika-vin07t:612_2: uddesādidāyakā tanubhūtehi bhikkhūhi bhagavantaṃ upagatā, taṃ sandhāya bhagavā pucchati.
tika-vin07t:614_0: 165. Dasānussatīsu antogadhāpi ānāpānassati tadā bhikkhūnaṃ bahūnaṃ sappāyataṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin07t:614_1: puna gahitā. Tathā hi taṃ bhagavā tesaṃ desesi. Āhāre paṭikkūlasaññā asubhakammaṭṭhānasadisā,
tika-vin07t:614_2: cattāro pana āruppā ādikammikānaṃ ananurūpāti tesaṃ idha aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññaṃ
tika-vin07t:614_3: pariyāyanti arahattādhigamatthāya aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Atthayojanākkamanti atthañca yojanākkamañca.
tika-vin07t:614_4: Assāsavasenāti assāsaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti appamussanatāya
tika-vin07t:614_5: tameva assāsaṃ passāsañca upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, tathā tiṭṭhanakadhammo sati nāmāti attho.
tika-vin07t:614_6: Idāni sativaseneva puggalaṃ niddisitukāmena yo assasatītiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yo assasati,
tika-vin07t:614_7: tassa sati assāsaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatītiādinā attho gahetabbo. Akosallasambhūteti
tika-vin07t:614_8: avijjāsambhūte. Khaṇenevāti attano pavattikkhaṇeneva. Ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ
tika-vin07t:614_9: samādhi anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā ariyamaggabhāvaṃ upagato viya hotīti āha “ariyamaggavuḍḍhippatto”ti.
tika-vin07t:614_10: Opammanidassananti ettha upamāva opammaṃ, tassa nidassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:615_0: Bāhirakā ānāpānassatiṃ jānantā ādito catuppakārameva jānanti, na sabbaṃ soḷasappakāranti
tika-vin07t:615_1: āha sabbappakāraiccādi. Evamassetaṃ senāsananti ettha evanti bhāvanāsatiyā yathāvuttanayena
tika-vin07t:615_2: ārammaṇe cittassa nibandhane satiyeva, nāsatīti attho, tena muṭṭhassatissa araññavāso
tika-vin07t:615_3: niratthako ananurūpoti dasseti. Avasesasattavidhasenāsananti “pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ
tika-vin07t:615_4: susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñja”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ututtayānukūlaṃ dhātucariyānukūlanti
tika-vin07t:615_5: gimhānādiututtayassa semhādidhātuttayassa mohādicariyattayassa ca anukūlaṃ. Nisajjāya
tika-vin07t:615_7: ujukaṃ ṭhapanena, ārammaṇapariggahūpāyaṃ parimukhaṃ satiyā ṭhapanena upadisanto.
tika-vin07t:615_8: Na paṇamantīti na oṇamanti. Pariggahitaniyyānaṃ satinti sabbathā gahitaṃ sammosapaṭipakkhato
tika-vin07t:615_9: niggamanasaṅkhātaṃ satiṃ katvā, paramaṃ satinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti attho.
tika-vin07t:616_0: Satovāti satiyā samannāgato eva. Bāttiṃsāya ākārehīti catūsu catukkesu āgatāni dīgharassādīni
tika-vin07t:616_1: soḷasa padāni assāsapassāsavasena dvidhā vibhajitvā vuttehi dvattiṃsākārehi. Dīghaṃassāsavasenāti
tika-vin07t:616_2: dīghaassāsavasena, vibhattialopaṃ katvā niddeso, dīghanti vā bhagavatā vuttaassāsavasena.
tika-vin07t:616_4: cittassa ekaggabhāvaṃ pajānato. Paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasenāti paṭinissaggānupassī
tika-vin07t:616_5: hutvā assāsavasena, “paṭinissaggānupassiassāsanavasenā”ti vā pāṭho, tassa paṭinissaggānupassino
tika-vin07t:616_6: assāsavasenāti attho. Ā paṭhamaṃ bahimukhaṃ sasanaṃ assāso, tato antomukhaṃ paṭisasanaṃ
tika-vin07t:616_7: passāsoti āha assāsoti bahinikkhamanavātotiādi, suttantaṭṭhakathāsu pana ākaḍḍhanavasena
tika-vin07t:616_8: anto sasanaṃ assāso, bahi paṭisasanaṃ passāsoti katvā uppaṭipāṭiyā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:617_0: Tatthāti bahinikkhamanaantopavisanavātesu, tassa ca paṭhamaṃ abbhantaravāto nikkhamatīti
tika-vin07t:617_1: iminā sambandho. “Sabbesampi gabbhaseyyakānantiādinā dārakānaṃ pavattikkamena assāso
tika-vin07t:617_2: bahinikkhamanavātoti gahetabbanti dīpetī”ti keci vadanti. Suttanayo eva cettha “assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ
tika-vin07t:617_3: satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti
tika-vin07t:617_4: iñjitā ca phanditā ca passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena
tika-vin07t:617_5: cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti imāya pāḷiyā sametīti
tika-vin07t:617_6: gahetabbaṃ. Addhānavasenāti kāladdhānavasena. Ayañhi addhāna-saddo kālassa desassa
tika-vin07t:617_7: ca vācako. Tattha yathā hītiādinā desaddhānaṃ upamāvasena dassitaṃ. Idāni tabbisiṭṭhakāladdhānavasena
tika-vin07t:617_8: assāsapassāsānaṃ dīgharassataṃ upameyyavasena vibhāvetuṃ evantiādi vuttaṃ. Cuṇṇavicuṇṇā
tika-vin07t:617_9: anekakalāpabhāvena. Ettha ca hatthiādisarīre sunakhādisarīre ca assāsapassāsānaṃ
tika-vin07t:617_11: dīghaṃ addhānaṃ saṇikaṃ pūretvātiādivacanato. Tesanti sattānaṃ. Teti assāsapassāsā.
tika-vin07t:617_12: Ittaramaddhānanti appakaṃ kālaṃ. Navahākārehīti bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa pubbenāparaṃ
tika-vin07t:617_13: aladdhavisesassa kevalaṃ addhānavasena ādito vuttā tayo ākārā, te ca kassaci assāsova,
tika-vin07t:617_14: kassaci passāsova, kassaci tadubhayampi upaṭṭhātīti tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena vuttā,
tika-vin07t:617_15: tathā chandavasena tayo, tathā pāmojjavasenāti imehi navahi ākārehi. Ekenākārenāti
tika-vin07t:618_0: Addhānasaṅkhāteti dīghe okāsaddhānasaṅkhāte attabhāve kāladdhānepi vā, evaṃ upari
tika-vin07t:618_1: ittarasaṅkhāteti etthāpi. Chando uppajjatīti bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantiyā
tika-vin07t:618_2: laddhassādattā tattha sātisayo kattukāmatālakkhaṇo kusalacchando uppajjati. Chandavasenāti
tika-vin07t:618_3: tathāpavattachandassa vasena. Pāmojjaṃ uppajjatīti assāsapassāsānaṃ sukhumatarabhāve
tika-vin07t:618_4: ārammaṇassa santataratāya, kammaṭṭhānassa ca vīthipaṭipannatāya bhāvanācittasahagato
tika-vin07t:618_5: pamodo khuddakādibhedā taruṇā pīti uppajjati. Cittaṃ vivattatīti paṭibhāganimitte
tika-vin07t:618_6: uppanne pakatiassāsapassāsato cittaṃ nivattati. Upekkhā saṇṭhātīti tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte
tika-vin07t:618_7: upacārappanābhede samādhimhi uppanne puna jhānanibbattanatthaṃ byāpārābhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṃ
tika-vin07t:618_8: hoti, sā panāyaṃ upekkhā tatramajjhattupekkhāti veditabbā. Anupassanāñāṇanti samathavasena
tika-vin07t:618_10: anupassanā ca ñāṇaṃ. Kāyo upaṭṭhānanti assāsapassāsasaṅkhāto kāyo upagantvā tiṭṭhati
tika-vin07t:618_11: ettha satīti upaṭṭhānaṃ, no sati, sati pana sarasato upatiṭṭhanaṭṭhena saraṇaṭṭhena
tika-vin07t:618_12: ca upaṭṭhānañceva sati ca. Tena vuccatītiādīsu yā ayaṃ yathāvuttaassāsapassāsakāye,
tika-vin07t:618_13: tannissayabhūte karajakāye ca kāyasseva anupassanā niccādibhāvaṃ vā itthipurisasattajīvādibhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:618_14: vā ananupassitvā assāsapassāsakāyamattasseva aniccādibhāvassa ca anupassanā, tāya
tika-vin07t:618_15: kāyānupassanāya satisaṅkhātassa paṭṭhānassa bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā kāye kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho.
tika-vin07t:619_0: Ittaravasenāti parittakālavasena. Tādisoti dīgho rasso ca. Vaṇṇāti dīghādiākārā.
tika-vin07t:619_1: Nāsikaggeva bhikkhunoti nāsikagge vā, vā-saddena uttaroṭṭhe vāti attho. Tasmāti yasmā
tika-vin07t:619_3: pubbe pavattaābhogavasena pacchā tathā samuppannena ñāṇasampayuttacittena taṃ assāsapassāsakāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:619_4: evaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto assasati ceva passasati ca, tasmā evaṃbhūto sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī
tika-vin07t:619_5: assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati nāma, na pana “anāgate evaṃ karissāmī”ti cintanamattena
tika-vin07t:619_6: so evaṃ vuccatīti adhippāyo. Tathābhūtassāti ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ viditaṃ karontassa.
tika-vin07t:619_7: Saṃvaroti sati vīriyampi vā. Na aññaṃ kiñcīti sabbakāyaṃ viditaṃ karissāmītiādikaṃ
tika-vin07t:619_9: saṅgaṇhāti. Kāyasaṅkhāranti assāsapassāsaṃ. So hi cittasamuṭṭhānopi samāno karajakāyapaṭibaddhavuttitāya
tika-vin07t:619_10: tena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāroti vuccati. Apariggahitakāleti kammaṭṭhānassa anāraddhakāle,
tika-vin07t:619_11: tadārambhatthāya kāyacittānampi apariggahitakāleti attho. Nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
tika-vin07t:619_12: ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti hi iminā kāyapariggaho, parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti iminā
tika-vin07t:619_13: cittapariggaho vutto. Adhimattanti balavaṃ oḷārikaṃ, liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ. Kāyasaṅkhāro
tika-vin07t:619_14: hi adhippeto. Adhimattaṃ hutvā pavattatīti kiriyāvisesanaṃ vā etaṃ. Sabbesaṃyevāti ubhayesampi.
tika-vin07t:620_0: Mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumoti catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:620_2: tato oraṃ dubbalavipassanā. Pubbe vuttanayenāti apariggahitakāletiādinā samathanaye vuttanayena.
tika-vin07t:621_0: Codanāsodhanāhīti anuyogaparihārehi. Kathantiādi paṭisambhidāpāḷi, tattha kathaṃ
tika-vin07t:621_1: sikkhatīti sambandho. Iti kirātiādi codakavacanaṃ. Iti kirāti evañceti attho. Assāsapassāso
tika-vin07t:621_2: sabbathā abhāvaṃ upaneti ceti codakassa adhippāyo. Vātūpaladdhiyāti assāsapassāsavātassa
tika-vin07t:621_3: abhāvena tabbisayāya upaladdhiyā bhāvanācittassa uppādo vaḍḍhi ca na hotīti attho.
tika-vin07t:621_4: Na ca nanti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ. Puna iti kirātiādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā,
tika-vin07t:621_5: tattha iti kira sikkhatīti mayā vuttākārena yadi sikkhatīti attho. Pabhāvanā hotīti
tika-vin07t:621_6: yadipi oḷārikā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassambhanti, sukhumā pana atthevāti bhāvanāyapi
tika-vin07t:621_7: vaḍḍhi hotevāti adhippāyo. Kaṃseti kaṃsabhājane. Nimittanti nimittassa, tesaṃ saddānaṃ
tika-vin07t:621_8: pavattiākārassāti attho. Sukhumakā saddāti anurave āha. Sukhumasaddanimittārammaṇatāpīti
tika-vin07t:622_0: Ābhisamācārikasīlanti ettha abhisamācāroti uttamasamācāro, tadeva ābhisamācārikaṃ
tika-vin07t:622_1: sīlaṃ, khandhakavattapariyāpannassa sīlassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ahaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhāmīti
tika-vin07t:622_2: ubhatovibhaṅgapariyāpannaṃ sīlaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Āvāsoti āvāsapalibodho. Kulantiādīsupi
tika-vin07t:622_3: eseva nayo. Kammanti navakammaṃ. Iddhīti pothujjanikā iddhi, sā vipassanāya palibodho.
tika-vin07t:622_4: So upacchinditabboti visuddhimagge vuttena tassa tassa palibodhassa upacchedappakārena
tika-vin07t:622_5: upacchinditabbo. Yogānuyogoti yogassa bhāvanāya anuyuñjanaṃ. Aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesūti
tika-vin07t:622_6: ālokākāsakasiṇadvayaṃ vajjetvā pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ kasiṇānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:622_7: cattārīsaññeva pana kammaṭṭhānāni. Yathāvutteneva nayenāti yogānuyogakammassa padaṭṭhānattāti
tika-vin07t:622_8: imamatthaṃ atidisati. Imināva kammaṭṭhānenāti iminā ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānena. Mahāhatthipathaṃ
tika-vin07t:622_9: nīharanto viyāti kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ mahāhatthimaggaṃ katvā dassento viya.
tika-vin07t:623_1: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattassā”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttappakāraṃ ācariyaṃ. “Piyo garu bhāvanīyo”tiādinā
tika-vin07t:623_2: visuddhimagge vuttappakāramācariyantipi vadanti. Pañcasandhikanti pañcapabbaṃ, pañcabhāganti
tika-vin07t:623_3: attho. Kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhananti kammaṭṭhānaganthassa uggaṇhanaṃ. Tadatthaparipucchā
tika-vin07t:623_4: kammaṭṭhānassa paripucchā, tattha saṃsayaparipucchā vā. Kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhānanti
tika-vin07t:623_5: evaṃ bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa evamidha nimittaṃ upatiṭṭhatīti upadhāraṇaṃ. Tathā kammaṭṭhānappanā
tika-vin07t:623_6: evaṃ jhānamappetīti. Kammaṭṭhānassa lakkhaṇanti gaṇanānubandhanāphusanānaṃ vasena
tika-vin07t:623_7: bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ṭhapanāvasena matthakappatti idha bhāvanāti kammaṭṭhānasabhāvassa
tika-vin07t:624_0: Aṭṭhārasasenāsanadosavivajjitanti mahattaṃ navattaṃ jiṇṇattaṃ panthanissitattaṃ soṇḍipaṇṇapupphaphalayuttatā
tika-vin07t:624_1: patthanīyatā nagaradārukhettasannissitatā visabhāgānaṃ puggalānaṃ atthitā paṭṭanasannissitatā
tika-vin07t:624_2: paccantasannissitatā rajjasīmasannissitatā asappāyatā kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābhoti imehi
tika-vin07t:625_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ nātidūraṃ hoti nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ divā
tika-vin07t:625_2: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa appakasirena uppajjanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā,
tika-vin07t:625_3: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti …pe… evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ
tika-vin07t:626_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā vuttehi pañcahi senāsanaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, ettha ca nātidūratādi
tika-vin07t:626_1: ekaṃ, divā appākiṇṇatādi ekaṃ, appaḍaṃsāditā ekaṃ, cīvarādilābho ekaṃ, therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin07t:627_0: Upacchinnakhuddakapalibodhenāti dīghānaṃ kesādīnaṃ haraṇena pattacīvarādīnaṃ pacanatunnakaraṇarajanādikaraṇehi
tika-vin07t:627_1: ca upacchinnā khuddakā palibodhā yena, tena. Bhattasammadanti bhojananimittaṃ parissamaṃ.
tika-vin07t:627_2: Ācariyato uggaho ācariyuggaho, sabbopi kammaṭṭhānavidhi, na pubbe vuttauggahamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:628_0: Anuvahanāti assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanavasena satiyā nirantaraṃ anuppavattanā. Yasmā
tika-vin07t:628_1: pana gaṇanādivasena viya phusanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi, phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāne
tika-vin07t:628_2: eva gaṇanādi kātabbanti dassetuṃ idha phusanāgahaṇanti dīpento “phusanāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāna”nti
tika-vin07t:628_3: āha. Ṭhapanāti samādhānaṃ, samādhippadhānā pana appanāti āha “ṭhapanāti appanā”ti.
tika-vin07t:628_4: Aniccatādīnaṃ lakkhaṇato sallakkhaṇā vipassanā. Pavattato nimittato ca vinivaṭṭanato
tika-vin07t:628_5: vinivaṭṭanā maggo. Kilesapaṭippassaddhibhāvato pārisuddhi phalaṃ. Tesanti vinivaṭṭanāpārisuddhīnaṃ.
tika-vin07t:628_6: Khaṇḍanti “ekaṃ tīṇi pañcā”ti ekantarikādibhāvena gaṇanāya khaṇḍanaṃ. Atha vā khaṇḍanti
tika-vin07t:628_7: antarantarā katipayakālaṃ agaṇetvā puna gaṇanavasena antarā odhiparicchedo na dassetabbo.
tika-vin07t:628_8: Tathā khaṇḍaṃ dassentassa hi “kammaṭṭhānaninnaṃ pavattati nu kho me cittaṃ, no”ti
tika-vin07t:628_9: vīmaṃsuppattiyā vikkhepo hoti, tenāha sikhāppattaṃ nu kho metiādi, idañca evaṃ khaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin07t:628_10: dassetvā cirataraṃ gaṇanāya manasikarontassa vasena vuttaṃ. So hi tathā laddhaṃ avikkhepamattaṃ
tika-vin07t:628_11: nissāya evaṃ maññeyya. Yo upaṭṭhāti, taṃ gahetvāti idaṃ assāsapassāsesu yassa ekova
tika-vin07t:628_12: paṭhamaṃ upaṭṭhāti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, yassa pana ubhopi upaṭṭhahanti, tena ubhayampi
tika-vin07t:628_13: gahetvā gaṇitabbaṃ. Yo upaṭṭhātīti imināva dvīsu nāsāpuṭavātesu yo pākaṭo hoti, so
tika-vin07t:628_14: gahetabboti ayampi attho dīpitoti gahetabbaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ ekekasmiṃ upaṭṭhitepi upalakkhetvā
tika-vin07t:628_15: gaṇantasseva kamena ubhopi pākaṭā hontīti āha “assāsapassāsā pākaṭā hontī”ti. Evaṃ
tika-vin07t:628_16: sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇetabbamevāti sambandho. Evaṃ sīghagaṇanārambhassa okāsaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin07t:628_17: imassāpi purimanayena gaṇayatotiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha purimanayenāti dandhagaṇanāya,
tika-vin07t:628_18: pākaṭā hutvāti iminā dandhagaṇanāya āraddhakāle cittassa avisadatāya sukhumassāsādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:628_19: apākaṭataṃ, pacchā visadakāle pākaṭatañca tesu ca pākaṭesu dandhagaṇanaṃ pahāya sīghagaṇanā
tika-vin07t:628_20: kātabbāti dasseti. Sīghagaṇanāya nippariyāyato nirantarappavatti appanāvīthiyameva,
tika-vin07t:628_21: na kāmāvacare bhavaṅgantarikattāti āha “nirantarappavattaṃ viyā”ti. Purimanayenevāti
tika-vin07t:628_22: sīghagaṇanāya. Anto pavisantaṃ vātaṃ manasikaronto anto cittaṃ paveseti nāma.
tika-vin07t:629_0: Etanti etaṃ assāsapassāsajātaṃ. Anugamananti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāne manasikaraṇameva, na assāsapassāsānaṃ
tika-vin07t:629_1: anuvattanaṃ, tenāha – “tañca kho na ādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasenā”ti. Phusanāṭhapanāvasena
tika-vin07t:629_2: visuṃ manasikāro natthīti iminā yathā gaṇanāya phusanāya ca manasikaroti, evaṃ anubandhanaṃ
tika-vin07t:629_3: vinā kevalaṃ ṭhapanāya ca phusanāya ca manasikāropi natthīti dassentena gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā
tika-vin07t:629_4: yāva appanā uppajjati, tāva anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca manasikaroti, appanāya
tika-vin07t:629_5: pana uppannāya anubandhanāya ṭhapanāya ca manasikaroti nāmāti dīpitaṃ hoti, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:629_6: pana anubandhanāya vinā ṭhapanāya manasikāro natthīti dassanatthaṃ “anubandhanāya
tika-vin07t:629_7: ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasikarotīti vuccatī”ti ettakameva vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:629_8: Yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchanati, sā mānassa samīpeti upamānaṃ siddhasādisena
tika-vin07t:629_9: sādhyasādhanaṃ yathā go viya gavayoti. Paṅguḷoti pīṭhasappī. Dolāti peṅkholo. Kīḷatanti
tika-vin07t:629_10: kīḷantānaṃ. Upanibandhanatthambhamūleti nāsikaggaṃ mukhanimittañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:629_11: Ādito pabhutīti upameyyatthadassanato paṭṭhāya. Nimittanti upanibandhananimittaṃ
tika-vin07t:629_12: nāsikaggaṃ, mukhanimittaṃ vā. Anārammaṇamekacittassāti assāsapassāsānaṃ ekakkhaṇe
tika-vin07t:629_13: appavattanato ekassa cittassa tayopi ārammaṇaṃ na honti, nimittena saha assāso passāso
tika-vin07t:629_14: vāti dveyeva ekakkhaṇe ārammaṇaṃ hontīti attho. Ajānato ca tayo dhammeti nimittaṃ
tika-vin07t:629_15: assāso passāsoti ime tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇavasena avindantassa, ca-saddo byatireko,
tika-vin07t:629_16: tena evañca sati ayaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgoti byatirekaṃ dasseti. Bhāvanāti ānāpānassatibhāvanā.
tika-vin07t:630_0: Kathaṃ ime…pe… visesamadhigacchatīti idaṃ parihāragāthāya vuttamevatthaṃ kakacopamāya
tika-vin07t:630_1: vivarituṃ pucchāṭhapanaṃ. Tattha kathaṃ-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo “kathamime aviditā…pe…
tika-vin07t:630_2: kathaṃ visesamadhigacchatī”ti. Padhānanti bhāvanānipphādakaṃ vīriyaṃ. Payoganti nīvaraṇavikkhambhakaṃ
tika-vin07t:630_3: bhāvanānuyogaṃ. Visesanti arahattapariyosānavisesaṃ. Padhānanti rukkhassa chedanavīriyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:630_5: na vuttaṃ, tathāpi atthato yojetabbameva. Yathā rukkhotiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Nāsikagge
tika-vin07t:630_6: vā mukhanimitte vāti dīghanāsiko nāsikagge, itaro mukhaṃ nimiyati chādiyati etenāti
tika-vin07t:631_0: Idaṃ padhānanti yena vīriyārambhena kāyopi cittampi bhāvanākammassa arahaṃ idha padhānanti
tika-vin07t:631_1: phalena hetuṃ dasseti. Upakkilesāti nīvaraṇā. Vitakkāti kāmavitakkādimicchāvitakkā,
tika-vin07t:631_2: nīvaraṇappahānena vā paṭhamajjhānādhigamaṃ dassetvā vitakkūpasamāpadesena dutiyajjhānādīnamadhigamamāha.
tika-vin07t:631_3: Ayaṃ payogoti ayaṃ jhānādhigamassa hetubhūto kammaṭṭhānānuyogasaṅkhāto payogo. Saṃyojanā
tika-vin07t:631_4: pahīyantīti dasapi saṃyojanāni maggapaapāṭiyā samucchedavasena pahīyanti. Byantī
tika-vin07t:631_5: hontīti tathā sattapi anusayā bhaṅgamattassapi anavasesato vigatantā honti. Ayaṃ
tika-vin07t:631_6: visesoti imaṃ samādhiṃ nissāya anukkamena labbhamāno ayaṃ saṃyojanappahānādiko imassa
tika-vin07t:631_7: samādhissa visesoti attho. Evaṃ ime tayo dhammātiādi nigamanavacanaṃ. Paripuṇṇāti
tika-vin07t:631_8: soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ pāripūriyā sabbaso puṇṇā. Anupubbanti anukkamena. Paricitāti
tika-vin07t:631_9: pariciṇṇā. Imaṃ lokanti khandhādilokaṃ paññāpabhāsena pabhāseti.
tika-vin07t:632_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ ṭhāne. Assāti upamābhūtassa kakacassa. Ānayane payojananti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:632_2: vadanti. Vicārādīhīti pana vattabbaṃ nippariyāyena vitakkassa appanābhāvato. So hi
tika-vin07t:632_3: “appanā byappanā”ti niddiṭṭho. Evañhi sati avasesa-saddo upapanno hoti, vitakkasampayogato
tika-vin07t:632_4: vā jhānaṅgesu padhānabhūto samādhi appanāti katvā “avasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā appanāsaṅkhātā
tika-vin07t:632_5: ṭhapanā ca sampajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato pabhutīti
tika-vin07t:632_6: ettha “anukkamato…pe… pattaṃ viya hotī”ti upari vakkhamāno gantho purāṇapotthakesu
tika-vin07t:632_7: dissati, tasmā ayaṃ pāṭho etthāpi likhitabbo, lekhakānaṃ pana dosena gaḷitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:633_0: Oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhetiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayampi vicetabbākārappattassa kāyasaṅkhārassa
tika-vin07t:633_1: vicayanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ānītaṃ. Desatoti pubbe phusanavasena gahitaṭṭhānato. Nimittaṃ
tika-vin07t:633_2: paṭṭhapetabbanti pubbe gahitākāranimittaggāhikā saññā phusanaṭṭhāne paṭṭhapetabbā.
tika-vin07t:633_3: Imameva hi atthavasanti imaṃ anupaṭṭhahantassa ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānavidhisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t:633_4: kāraṇaṃ paṭicca. Itoti ānāpānakammaṭṭhānato. Garukatā ca bhāvanādukkaratāyāti āha
tika-vin07t:633_5: “garukabhāvana”nti. Caritvāti gocaraṃ gahetvā. Nimittanti uggahanimittaṃ, paṭibhāganimittaṃ
tika-vin07t:633_6: vā. Ubhayampi hi idha ekajjhaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā hi tūlapicuādiupamattayaṃ uggahe yujjati, sesaṃ ubhayattha.
tika-vin07t:634_0: Tārakarūpaṃ viyāti tārakāya sarūpaṃ viya. Saññānānatāyāti nimittupaṭṭhānato pubbe
tika-vin07t:634_1: pavattasaññānaṃ nānatāya. Saññajanti bhāvanāsaññāya parikappitaṃ, na uppāditaṃ avijjamānattā,
tika-vin07t:634_2: tenāha “nānato upaṭṭhātī”ti. Evaṃ hotīti bhāvanamanuyuttassa evaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Evanti
tika-vin07t:634_3: evaṃ sati, yathāvuttanayena nimitte eva cittassa ṭhapane satīti attho. Ito pabhutīti
tika-vin07t:634_4: ito paṭibhāganimittuppattito paṭṭhāya. Nimitteti paṭibhāganimitte. Ṭhapayanti ṭhapanāvasena
tika-vin07t:634_5: cittaṃ ṭhapanto. Nānākāranti “cattāro vaṇṇā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ nānākāraṃ. Vibhāvayanti
tika-vin07t:634_6: vibhāvento antaradhāpento. Nimittuppattito paṭṭhāya hi te ākārā amanasikaroto antarahitā
tika-vin07t:634_7: viya honti. Assāsapassāseti assāse passāse ca yo nānākāro, taṃ vibhāvayaṃ assāsapassāsasambhūte
tika-vin07t:634_8: vā nimitte cittaṃ ṭhapayaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati nāmāti yojanā. Keci pana vibhāvayanti
tika-vin07t:634_9: etassa vibhāvento viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karontoti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ pubbabhāgavasena
tika-vin07t:634_10: yujjeyya. Ayañhettha attho – assāsapassāse nānākāraṃ vibhāvento pajānanto tattha
tika-vin07t:634_11: yaṃ laddhaṃ nimittaṃ, tasmiṃ cittaṃ ṭhapento anukkamena sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati appetīti.
tika-vin07t:635_0: Kilesāti avasesakilesā. Sannisinnāyevāti aladdhanīvaraṇasahāyā olīnāyeva. Upacārabhūmiyanti
tika-vin07t:635_1: upacārāvatthāyaṃ. Lakkhaṇatoti vikkhambhanādisabhāvato vā aniccādisabhāvato vā. Gocaroti
tika-vin07t:635_2: bhikkhācāragāmo. Yattha dullabhā sappāyabhikkhā, so asappāyo, itaro sappāyo. Bhassanti
tika-vin07t:635_3: dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ bhassaṃ, taṃ sappāyaṃ, itaramasappāyaṃ. Sesesu āvāsādīsu
tika-vin07t:635_4: yattha yattha asamāhitaṃ cittaṃ samādhiyati, taṃ taṃ sappāyaṃ, itaramasappāyanti
tika-vin07t:635_5: gahetabbaṃ. Yassa pana evaṃ sattavidhaṃ asappāyaṃ vajjetvā sappāyameva sevantassapi
tika-vin07t:635_6: appanā na hoti, tena sampādetabbaṃ dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ dassento vatthuvisadakiriyātiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:635_7: Tattha vatthuvisadakiriyā nāma kesanakhacchedanādīhi ajjhattikassa sarīravatthussa,
tika-vin07t:635_9: ñāṇampi visadakiccanipphattikaraṃ hoti. Indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā nāma saddhādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:635_10: indriyānaṃ samabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Nimittakusalatā nāma bhāvanāya laddhanimittassa rakkhaṇakosallaṃ.
tika-vin07t:635_11: Yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbantiādīsu yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ accāraddhatādīhi kāraṇehi
tika-vin07t:635_12: uddhatatāya niggahetabbaṃ, tadā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā passaddhādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:635_13: tiṇṇaṃ bhāvanena cittassa niggaṇhanā hoti. Yadāssa cittaṃ atisithilavīriyatādīhi
tika-vin07t:635_14: līnatāya paggahetabbaṃ, tadā passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā dhammavicayādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:635_15: tiṇṇaṃ bhāvanena cittassa paggaṇhanaṃ hoti. Yadāssa paññāpayogamandatādīhi nirassādaṃ
tika-vin07t:635_16: cittaṃ hoti, tadā tassa cittassa aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇādinā sampahaṃsanasaṅkhātā
tika-vin07t:635_17: saṃvejanā hoti. Yadā panassa evaṃ paṭipajjanato alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe
tika-vin07t:635_18: samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannañca cittaṃ hoti, tadā tassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
tika-vin07t:636: Tadadhimuttatā nāma samādhiadhimuttatā, samādhininnapoṇapabbhāratāti attho. Etthāti etissaṃ kāyānupassanāyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:637_0: Pārisuddhiṃ pattukāmoti phalaṃ adhigantukāmo samāpajjitukāmo ca. Tattha sallakkhaṇāvivaṭṭanāvasena
tika-vin07t:637_1: paṭhamaṃ maggānantaraphalaṃ adhigantukāmo. Tato paraṃ sallakkhaṇavasena phalasamāpattiṃ
tika-vin07t:637_2: samāpajjitukāmopīti evamattho gahetabbo. Āvajjanasamāpajjana…pe… vasippattanti ettha
tika-vin07t:637_3: paṭiladdhajhānato vuṭṭhāya vitakkādīsu jhānaṅgesu ekekaṃ āvajjayato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā
tika-vin07t:637_5: bhavaṅgantaritāni yadā nirantaraṃ pavattanti, athassa āvajjanavasī siddhā hoti. Taṃ
tika-vin07t:637_6: pana jhānaṃ samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī
tika-vin07t:637_7: nāma. Accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī
tika-vin07t:637_8: nāma. Tatheva lahuṃ khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato bhavaṅguppattivasena vuṭṭhātuṃ
tika-vin07t:637_9: samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī nāma. “Ettakameva khaṇaṃ samāpajjissāmī”ti, “ettakameva khaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:637_10: jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti ca pavattapubbaparikammabhedenettha adhiṭṭhānavuṭṭhānavasiyo
tika-vin07t:637_11: bhinnā, na sarūpabhedena, yā “samāpattikusalatā, vuṭṭhānakusalatā”ti vuccanti. Paccavekkhaṇavasī
tika-vin07t:637_12: pana āvajjanavasiyā eva vuttā. Paccavekkhaṇavīthiyañhi sīghaṃ āvajjanuppattiyā āvajjanavasī
tika-vin07t:637_14: paccavekkhaṇavasī siddhā eva hotīti veditabbā. Jhānaṅgāni pariggahetvāti jhānacittasampayuttāni
tika-vin07t:637_15: jhānaṅgāni lakkhaṇādivasena pariggahetvā. Tesañca nissayanti tesaṃ vatthunissayānaṃ
tika-vin07t:637_16: bhūtānaṃ nissayaṃ. Idañca karajakāyassa vatthudasakassa bhūtanissayattā suttantanayena
tika-vin07t:637_17: vuttaṃ, na paṭṭhānanayena. Na hi kalāpantaragatāni bhūtāni kalāpantaragatānaṃ bhūtānaṃ
tika-vin07t:637_18: nissayapaccayā honti, suttantanayena pana upanissayapaccayoti veditabbāni. Paṭṭhāne
tika-vin07t:637_19: hi asaṅgahitā sabbe paccayā suttantikanayena upanissayapaccaye saṅgayhantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:637_23: kammārānaṃ aggidhamanabhastā. Tajjanti tadanurūpaṃ. Tassāti nāmarūpassa. Taṃ disvāti
tika-vin07t:637_24: avijjātaṇhādipaccayaṃ disvā. Kaṅkhaṃ vitaratīti ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānantiādinayappavattaṃ
tika-vin07t:637_25: soḷasavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ atikkamati. Kalāpasammasanavasenāti yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannantiādinā
tika-vin07t:637_26: pañcasu khandhesu atītādikoṭṭhāsaṃ ekekakalāpato gahetvā aniccādivasena sammasanaṃ
tika-vin07t:637_28: udayabbayānupassanāya pubbabhāge. Obhāsādayoti obhāso ñāṇaṃ pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ
tika-vin07t:637_29: adhimokkho paggaho upekkhā upaṭṭhānaṃ nikanti ca. Tattha adhimokkhoti saddhā. Upaṭṭhānanti
tika-vin07t:637_30: sati. Upekkhāti tatramajjhattatā. Ettha ca obhāsādayo nava nikantisaṅkhātataṇhupakkilesavatthutāya
tika-vin07t:637_31: upakkilesā vuttā, nikanti pana upakkilesatāya tabbatthutāya ca. Nibbindanto ādīnavānupassanāpubbaṅgamāya
tika-vin07t:637_34: virajjanto vimuccanto. Phalakkhaṇe hi vimutto nāma vuccati, maggakkhaṇe vimuccantoti.
tika-vin07t:637_35: Ekūnavīsatibhedassāti catunnaṃ maggavīthīnaṃ anantaraṃ paccekaṃ uppajjantassa maggaphalanibbānapahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesānaṃ
tika-vin07t:637_36: pañcannaṃ paccavekkhitabbānaṃ vasena ekūnavīsatibhedassa. Arahato hi avasiṭṭhakilesābhāvena
tika-vin07t:638_0: Sappītike dve jhāneti pītisahagatāni catukkanaye dve paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni. Tassāti
tika-vin07t:638_1: tena yoginā. Samāpattikkhaṇeti samāpannakkhaṇe. Ārammaṇatoti paṭibhāgārammaṇaggahaṇamukhena
tika-vin07t:638_2: pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti, ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā. Ārammaṇe hi vidite tabbisayā
tika-vin07t:638_3: cittacetasikā dhammā sayaṃ attano paṭisaṃviditā nāma hoti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato
tika-vin07t:638_4: ca pacchā gahaṇe sandehābhāvato. Vipassanākkhaṇeti vipassanāpaññāya visayato dassanakkhaṇe.
tika-vin07t:638_5: Evaṃ pītiṃ aniccādivasena gahaṇameva asammohato pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:639_0: Dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena, pajānato sā pīti
tika-vin07t:639_1: paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho. Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti jhānapariyāpannaṃ
tika-vin07t:639_2: avikkhepāpannaṃ nāma cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato. Yatheva hi
tika-vin07t:639_3: ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi paṭisaṃviditā
tika-vin07t:639_4: eva hontīti. Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti dīghaṃ assāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tassa
tika-vin07t:639_5: ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā tadārammaṇajjhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma hotīti. Dīghaṃ passāsavasenātiādīsupi
tika-vin07t:639_6: imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Evaṃ dassitaṃ pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ ārammaṇato asammohato
tika-vin07t:639_7: ca vibhāgato dassetuṃ āvajjatotiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āvajjatoti jhānaṃ āvajjantassa.
tika-vin07t:639_8: Sā pītīti sā jhānapariyāpannā pīti. Jānatoti samāpannakkhaṇe ārammaṇamukhena jānato,
tika-vin07t:639_9: tassa sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho. Passatoti dassanabhūtena ñāṇena jhānato
tika-vin07t:639_10: vuṭṭhāya passantassa. Paccavekkhatoti jhānaṃ paccavekkhantassa. Cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahatoti
tika-vin07t:639_11: “ettakaṃ velaṃ jhānasamaṅgī bhavissāmī”ti jhānacittaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa. Evaṃ pañcannaṃ
tika-vin07t:639_12: vasibhāvānaṃ vasena jhānassa pajānanamukhena ārammaṇato pītiyā paṭisaṃvedanā dassitā.
tika-vin07t:639_13: Adhimuccatoti saddahantassa, samathavipassanāvasenāti adhippāyo. Vīriyaṃ paggaṇhatotiādīsupi
tika-vin07t:639_14: eseva nayo. Abhiññeyyanti visiṭṭhāya paññāya jānitabbaṃ catusaccaṃ vipassanāpaññāpubbaṅgamāya
tika-vin07t:639_15: maggapaññāya abhijānatotiādi yojanā. Evaṃ pariññeyyantiādīsupi parijānatotiādinā
tika-vin07t:639_16: yojanā veditabbā. Tattha pariññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṃ. Avasesapadānīti sukhapaṭisaṃvedī
tika-vin07t:640_0: Vedanādayoti ādi-saddena saññā gahitā, tenāha “dve khandhā”ti. Vipassanābhūmidassanatthanti
tika-vin07t:640_2: Soti passambhanapariyāyena vutto nirodho. Vuttanayenāti imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe
tika-vin07t:640_3: apariggahitakāletiādinā kāyasaṅkhāre vuttanayena. Pītisīsena vedanā vuttāti pītiapadesena
tika-vin07t:640_4: vedanā vuttā, sukhaggahaṇato vedanānupassanāpasaṅgatoti adhippāyo. Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesūti
tika-vin07t:640_6: Saññāsampayuttā vedanāti vedanānupassanābhāvato vuttaṃ. Cittapaṭisaṃveditā veditabbāti
tika-vin07t:640_7: ārammaṇato asammohatotiādinā vuttanayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Cittanti jhānasampayuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:640_8: vipassanāsampayuttañca cittaṃ. Āmodetīti sampayuttāya pītiyā jhānavisayāya modeti.
tika-vin07t:642_0: 167. Yadipi ariyā neva attanāva attānaṃ aññamaññaṃ vā jīvitā voropenti, nāpi parehi
tika-vin07t:642_1: samādapenti, tathāpi yathāvuttehi tīhi pakārehi matānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ antare migalaṇḍikena
tika-vin07t:642_2: māritānaṃ ariyapuggalānampi atthitāya “ariyapuggalamissakattā”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā
tika-vin07t:642_3: puthujjanakāle attanāva attānaṃ ghātetvā maraṇasamaye vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggaṃ
tika-vin07t:642_4: paṭilabhitvā matānampi sabbhāvato evaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:644_0: 172. Byañjane ādaraṃ akatvāti jānitvā sañjānitvātiādinā byañjanānurūpaṃ avuttattā
tika-vin07t:644_1: vuttaṃ. Pāṇoti jānantoti idaṃ manussoti ajānitvāpi kevalaṃ sattasaññāya eva pārājikabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:644_2: vuttaṃ. Vadhakacetanāvasena cetetvāti “imaṃ māremī”ti vadhakacetanāya cintetvā. Pakappetvāti
tika-vin07t:644_3: “vadhāmi na”nti evaṃ cittena paricchinditvā. Abhivitaritvāti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā,
tika-vin07t:644_4: tenāha “nirāsaṅkacittaṃ pesetvā”ti. Sikhāppatto atthoti sañciccāti pubbakālakiriyāvasena
tika-vin07t:644_5: vuttassapi vītikkamabhūtassa aparakālakiriyāyuttadassanena koṭippatto attho. Jātiuṇṇā
tika-vin07t:644_6: nāma tadahujātaeḷakassa lomaṃ. Evaṃ vaṇṇappaṭibhāganti evaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānaṃ. Tato
tika-vin07t:644_7: vā uddhanti dutiyasattāhādīsu abbudādibhāvappattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Parihīnavegassa
tika-vin07t:644_8: santānassa paccayo hotīti sahakārīpaccayo hoti, na janako. Kammameva hi khaṇe khaṇe
tika-vin07t:644_9: uppajjamānānaṃ kammajarūpānaṃ janakapaccayo, tañca pavattiyaṃ pubbe uppajjitvā ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin07t:644_10: anupahataṃ catusantatirūpaṃ sahakārīpaccayaṃ labhitvāva kātuṃ sakkoti, na aññathā,
tika-vin07t:644_11: yena kenaci virodhipaccayena niruddhacakkhādippasādānaṃ puggalānaṃ vijjamānampi kammaṃ
tika-vin07t:644_12: cakkhādikaṃ janetuṃ na sakkotīti siddhameva hoti.
tika-vin07t:645_1: vuttappakārameva. Saraseneva patanasabhāvassa saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā atīva pātanaṃ
tika-vin07t:645_2: sīghapātanaṃ atipāto, pāṇassa atipāto pāṇātipāto. Āthabbaṇikāti athabbaṇavedino.
tika-vin07t:645_4: payogehi mantaṃ parivattenti, tena yathicchitapāṇavadhādiphalaṃ upapajjati, tasmā
tika-vin07t:645_5: taṃ kāyavacīkammesu paviṭṭhaṃ. Ītinti pīḷaṃ. Upaddavanti tato adhikataraṃ pīḷaṃ.
tika-vin07t:645_6: Pajjarakanti visamajjaraṃ. Sūcikanti sūcīhi viya vijjhamānaṃ sūlaṃ. Visūcikanti sasūlaṃ
tika-vin07t:645_7: āmātisāraṃ. Pakkhandiyanti rattātisāraṃ. Vijjaṃ parivattetvāti gandhāravijjādikaṃ
tika-vin07t:645_8: attano vijjaṃ katūpacāraṃ mantapaṭhanakkamena parijappitvā. Tehīti tehi vatthūhi.
tika-vin07t:645_9: Payojananti pavattanaṃ. Aho vatāyanti ayaṃ taṃ kucchigataṃ. Gabbhanti idaṃ kucchigataṃ
tika-vin07t:645_10: gabbhaṃ. Kulumbassāti gabbhassa, kulasseva vā, kuṭumbassāti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhāvanāmayiddhiyāti
tika-vin07t:645_11: adhiṭṭhāniddhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Taṃ tesaṃ icchāmattanti suttatthato na sametīti
tika-vin07t:645_12: adhippāyo. Athabbaṇiddhivaseneva hi sutte “iddhimā cetovasippatto”ti vuttaṃ, na bhāvanāmayiddhivasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:646_0: Itarathāti pariyeseyyāti padassa gavesanamattameva yathārutavasena attho siyā, tadā
tika-vin07t:646_1: pariyiṭṭhamattena pariyesitvā satthādīnaṃ laddhamattenāti attho. Sasanti hiṃsanti
tika-vin07t:646_2: etenāti satthanti vadhopakaraṇassa pāsāṇarajjuādino sabbassāpi nāmanti āha laguḷātiādi.
tika-vin07t:646_3: Laguḷanti muggarassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Satthasaṅgahoti mātikāyaṃ satthahārakanti ettha
tika-vin07t:646_4: vuttasatthasaṅgaho. Parato vuttanayattāti parato nigamanavasena vuttassa dutiyapadassa
tika-vin07t:646_5: padabhājane vuttanayattā. Cittasaddassa atthadīpanatthaṃ vuttoti citta-saddassa vicittādianekatthavisayattā
tika-vin07t:647_0: 174. Kammunā bajjhatīti pāṇātipātakammunā bajjhati, taṃ kammamassa siddhanti attho.
tika-vin07t:647_1: Ubhayathāpīti uddisakānuddisakavasena. Pacchā vā tena rogenāti etena anāgatampi jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-vin07t:647_2: ārabbha pāṇātipātassa pavattiṃ dasseti. Evañca “yadā sakkoti, tadā taṃ jīvitā voropehī”ti
tika-vin07t:647_3: āṇattiyā cirena samiddhiyampi āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pāṇātipāto. Opātakhaṇanādithāvarapayogesu
tika-vin07t:647_4: payogakaraṇato pacchā gahitapaṭisandhikassāpi sattassa maraṇe pāṇātipāto ca anāgatārammaṇo
tika-vin07t:647_5: upapanno hoti. Yaṃ pana sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “pañca sikkhāpadāni paccuppannārammaṇāyevā”ti
tika-vin07t:647_6: vuttaṃ, taṃ pāṇātipātādito viratiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pāṇātipātādinti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:647_7: Aññacittenāti amāretukāmatācittena. Dutiyappahārena maratīti paṭhamappahāraṃ vinā
tika-vin07t:647_9: attho. Kiñcāpi paṭhamappahāro sayameva na sakkoti māretuṃ, dutiyaṃ pana labhitvā
tika-vin07t:647_10: sakkonto jīvitavināsahetu hoti, tasmā paṭhamappahāraṃ vinā maraṇassa asiddhattā “payogo
tika-vin07t:647_11: tena ca maraṇa”nti iminā saṃsandanato paṭhamappahāreneva kammabaddho yutto, na dutiyena
tika-vin07t:647_12: tassa aññacittena dinnattā. Yathā cettha, evaṃ aññena puggalena dutiyappahāradānādīsu
tika-vin07t:647_13: viya. Yadi pana dutiyappahāradāyakassāpi puggalassa vadhakacetanā atthi, tassāpi
tika-vin07t:647_14: attano payogenāpi matattā payogakkhaṇe pāṇātipātoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:648_2: paramatthato gahitattā yathāvatthukaṃ kammabaddho hotiyevāti āha imaṃ vatthuntiādi.
tika-vin07t:648_3: Ghātako ca hotīti pāṇātipātakammena baddhoti attho. Mātādiguṇamahante ārabbha pavattavadhakacetanāya
tika-vin07t:648_4: mahāsāvajjatāya vuttaṃ “idha pana cetanā dāruṇā hotī”ti.
tika-vin07t:649_0: Lohitakanti lohitamakkhitaṃ. Kammaṃ karonteti yuddhakammaṃ karonte. Yathādhippāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:649_1: gateti yodhaṃ vijjhitvā pitari viddhe, yodhaṃ pana avijjhitvā kevalaṃ pitari viddhepi
tika-vin07t:649_2: visaṅketo natthiyeva pitaripi vadhakacittassa atthitāya, kevalaṃ yodhe viddhepi eseva
tika-vin07t:649_3: nayo. Ānantariyaṃ pana natthīti pituvisayaṃ pāṇātipātakammaṃ natthīti attho.
tika-vin07t:650_0: Evaṃ vijjhāti evaṃ pādehi bhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā evaṃ dhanuṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvātiādinā vijjhanappakārasikkhāpanamukhena
tika-vin07t:650_1: āṇāpetīti attho. Evaṃ paharāti daḷhaṃ asiṃ gahetvā evaṃ pahara. Evaṃ ghātehīti evaṃ
tika-vin07t:650_2: kammakāraṇaṃ katvā mārehi. Tattakā ubhinnaṃ pāṇātipātāti anuddisitvā yesaṃ kesañci
tika-vin07t:650_3: māraṇatthāya ubhohi payogassa katattā vuttaṃ. Sace hi āṇāpako “evaṃ viddhe asuko
tika-vin07t:650_4: evaṃ maratī”ti saññāya “evaṃ vijjhā”ti āṇāpeti, niyamitasseva maraṇe āṇāpakassa kammabaddhoti
tika-vin07t:650_5: vadanti. Sace āṇatto “asuka”nti niyametvā uddissa saraṃ khipati, āṇāpako aniyametvā
tika-vin07t:650_6: āṇāpeti, āṇāpakassa yesaṃ kesañci maraṇepi kammabaddho, āṇattassa pana niyamitamaraṇeyevāti
tika-vin07t:650_7: veditabbaṃ. Majjheti hatthino piṭṭhino majjhe. Etenāti adhiṭṭhahitvā āṇāpetītiādipāḷivacanena.
tika-vin07t:651_0: Kiñcāpi kiriyāviseso aṭṭhakathāsu anāgato, pāḷiyaṃ pana “evaṃ vijjha, evaṃ pahara,
tika-vin07t:651_1: evaṃ ghātehī”ti kiriyāvisesassa parāmaṭṭhattā ācariyaparamparā āgataṃ kiriyāvisesampi
tika-vin07t:651_2: pāḷisaṃsandanato gahetvā dassento aparo nayotiādimāha. Vijjhananti ususattiādīhi
tika-vin07t:651_3: vijjhanaṃ. Chedananti asiādīhi hatthapādādicchedanaṃ. Bhedananti muggarādīhi sīsādibhedanaṃ
tika-vin07t:651_4: dvidhākaraṇaṃ. Saṅkhamuṇḍakanti sīsakaṭāhe cammaṃ saha kesehi uppāṭetvā thūlasakkharāhi
tika-vin07t:651_6: ādi-saddena biḷaṅgathālikādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Ure paharitvā piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā gīvāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:651_8: saṅgayhati aṭṭhakathāsu saṅkhamuṇḍakādisarīrappadesavisayāyapi ghātanāya tattha pavesitattā,
tika-vin07t:651_9: yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ purato paharitvā mārehītiādikassa aṭṭhakathāpāṭhassa “purimapassādīnampi
tika-vin07t:651_10: vatthusabhāgato vatthuggahaṇeneva gahaṇanti āha purato paharitvātiādī”ti evamadhippāyakathanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:651_11: taṃ saṅkhamuṇḍakādikassa sarīrappadese kammakāraṇākaraṇassa aṭṭhakathāya kiriyāvisesavisaye
tika-vin07t:651_12: vuttattā na yujjati. Yathāṇattaṃ muñcitvā puggalantaramāraṇameva hi vatthuvisaṃvādo,
tika-vin07t:651_13: na paharituṃ āṇattaṃ sarīrappadesavisaṃvādanaṃ, tenāha “vatthuṃ visaṃ vādetvā…pe…
tika-vin07t:651_14: tato aññaṃ māreti. Purato paharitvā mārehīti vā…pe… natthi kammabaddho”ti, idaṃ pana
tika-vin07t:651_16: paññāyati. Tena “vatthuṃ avisaṃvādetvā mārentī”ti ettakameva avatvā “yathāṇattiyā”ti
tika-vin07t:651_17: kiriyāvisesaniyamopi dassito, itarathā yathāṇattiyāti vacanassa niratthakatāpattito.
tika-vin07t:651_18: Vatthuniddese ca “vatthūti māretabbo satto”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ, na pana “yathāṇattassa
tika-vin07t:651_19: paharitabbasarīrappadesopī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā purato paharaṇādipi kiriyāvisese eva
tika-vin07t:651_20: saṅgayhatīti amhākaṃ khanti, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Vatthuvisesenāti mātuādimatasattavisesena.
tika-vin07t:652_0: Yadā kadāci pubbaṇheti āṇattadivasato aññassapi yassa kassaci divasassa pubbaṇhe.
tika-vin07t:652_1: Etaṃ gāme ṭhitanti gāmo puggalaniyamanatthaṃ vutto, na okāsaniyamanatthaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin07t:652_2: “yattha katthaci māreti, natthi visaṅketo”ti vuttaṃ, etena kālokāsaāvudhaiayāpathakiriyāvisesānaṃ
tika-vin07t:652_3: niyamicchāya asati yena kenaci pakārena maraṇameva icchantassa āṇāpakassa mukhāruḷhavasena
tika-vin07t:652_4: vuttassa desakālādiniyamassa visaṅketepi kammabaddhoyevāti ñāpitaṃ hoti. Yo pana
tika-vin07t:652_5: cittena yattha katthaci yadā kadāci yena kenaci pakārena maraṇameva icchantopi kālādivisaṅketena
tika-vin07t:652_6: akusalato codanato vā muccitukāmo lesena kālādiniyamaṃ karoti, tassa manussaviggahapārājikato
tika-vin07t:652_7: pariyāyena amuccanato kālādivisaṅketepi kammabaddhovāti gahetvā vicāraṇato gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:652_8: keci panetaṃ na icchanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Tuṇḍenāti aggakoṭiyā. Tharunāti khaggamuṭṭhinā.
tika-vin07t:652_9: Etaṃ gacchantanti gamanena puggalova niyamito, na iriyāpatho, tenāha “natthi visaṅketa”nti.
tika-vin07t:653_0: “Dīghaṃ mārehī”ti vuttepi dīghasaṇṭhānānaṃ bahubhāvato “itthannāmaṃ evarūpañca dīgha”nti
tika-vin07t:653_1: aññesaṃ asādhāraṇalakkhaṇena aniddiṭṭhattā “aniyametvā āṇāpetī”ti vuttaṃ, tenevāha
tika-vin07t:653_2: “yaṃ kiñci tādisaṃ māremī”ti. Ettha ca cittena bahūsu dīghasaṇṭhānesu ekaṃ niyametvā
tika-vin07t:653_3: vuttepi vācāya aniyamitattā aññasmiṃ tādise mārite natthi visaṅketoti vadanti. Attānaṃ
tika-vin07t:653_4: muñcitvā parapāṇimhi pāṇasaññitālakkhaṇassa aṅgassa abhāvato nevatthi pāṇātipātoti
tika-vin07t:653_5: āha “āṇāpako muccatī”ti. Attānaṃ uddissa “asukaṭṭhāne nisinna”nti okāsaniyame tasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:653_6: padese nisinnassa yassa kassaci jīvitindriyaṃ ārabbha vadhakacittaṃ uppajjatīti vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:653_7: “neva vadhako muccati na āṇāpako”ti. Okāsañhi niyametvā niddisanto tasmiṃ okāse nisinnaṃ
tika-vin07t:653_8: māretukāmo hoti, sayaṃ pana tadā tattha natthi, tasmā okāsena saha tattha nisinnasseva
tika-vin07t:653_9: jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, na attanoti gahetabbaṃ. Sace pana sayaṃ tattheva nisīditvā
tika-vin07t:653_10: attano nisinnaṭṭhānameva niyametvā “mārehī”ti vuttepi añño tattha nisinno māriyati,
tika-vin07t:653_11: tassāpi attanopi jīvitaṃ ārabbha vadhakacetanā pavattati, parasmiṃ tattha mārite
tika-vin07t:653_12: āṇāpakassa kammabaddhoti gahetabbaṃ. Evarūpe ṭhāne cittappavattiniyamo buddhavisayo,
tika-vin07t:653_13: na aññesaṃ visayoti āha “tasmā ettha na anādariyaṃ kātabba”nti.
tika-vin07t:654_0: Evaṃ āṇāpentassa ācariyassa tāva dukkaṭanti sace āṇattiko yathādhippāyaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin07t:654_1: ācariyassa āṇattikkhaṇe dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana so yathādhippāyaṃ gacchati, yaṃ parato
tika-vin07t:654_2: thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, āṇattikkhaṇe tadeva hoti. Atha so avassaṃ ghāteti, yaṃ parato
tika-vin07t:654_3: “āpatti sabbesaṃ pārājikassā”ti vuttaṃ, tato imassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ hoti,
tika-vin07t:654_4: na dukkaṭathullaccayānīti gahetabbaṃ. Tesampi dukkaṭanti buddharakkhitādīnampi ārocanapaccayā
tika-vin07t:654_5: dukkaṭaṃ, idañca yathāṇattivasena saṅgharakkhitassa jīvitā voropane asati yujjati,
tika-vin07t:654_6: voropane sati tesampi ārocanakkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ. Paṭiggahitamatteti idaṃ avassaṃ
tika-vin07t:654_7: paṭiggahaṇasabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na paṭiggahitakkhaṇeyeva thullaccayanti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin07t:654_8: Sace hi so avassaṃ paṭiggahessati, kammaṃ pana na nipphādessati, tadā ācariyassa
tika-vin07t:655_0: Mūlaṭṭhasseva dukkaṭanti idaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayadassanamattaṃ, na panetaṃ
tika-vin07t:655_1: attanā adhippetaṃ, tenāha evaṃ santetiādi, evaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena atthe
tika-vin07t:655_2: satīti attho. Paṭiggahaṇe āpattiyeva na siyāti vadhakassa “sādhu suṭṭhū”ti maraṇapaṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin07t:655_3: dukkaṭāpatti neva siyā, evaṃ anoḷārikavisayepi tāva dukkaṭaṃ, kimaṅgaṃ pana maraṇapaṭiggahaṇeti
tika-vin07t:655_4: dassanatthaṃ sañcarittapaṭiggahaṇādi nidassitaṃ. “Aho vata itthannāmo hato assā”ti
tika-vin07t:655_6: pageva “ahaṃ taṃ māressāmī”ti maraṇapaṭiggahaṇeti adhippāyo. Paṭiggaṇhantassevetaṃ
tika-vin07t:655_7: dukkaṭanti avadhāraṇena saṅgharakkhitassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā mūlaṭṭhassa nattheva
tika-vin07t:655_8: āpattīti dasseti, visaṅketattā paṭhamaṃ āṇattadukkaṭamevassa hoti. Keci pana “mūlaṭṭhassāpi
tika-vin07t:655_9: dukkaṭamevā”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ ekena payogena dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ asambhavā.
tika-vin07t:655_10: Purimanayeti samanantarātīte avisakkiyadūtaniddese. Etanti dukkaṭaṃ. Okāsābhāvenāti
tika-vin07t:655_11: mūlaṭṭhassa thullaccayassa vuccamānattā paṭiggaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ na vuttaṃ okāsābhāvena,
tika-vin07t:656_0: 175. Sayaṃ saṅghattherattā “upaṭṭhānakāle”ti vuttaṃ. Vācāya vācāya dukkaṭanti “yo
tika-vin07t:656_1: koci mama vacanaṃ sutvā imaṃ māretū”ti iminā adhippāyena avatvā kevalaṃ maraṇābhinandanavaseneva
tika-vin07t:656_2: vuttattā corāpi nāma taṃ na hanantītiādivācāyapi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ. Dvinnaṃ uddissāti
tika-vin07t:656_3: dve uddissa, dvinnaṃ vā maraṇaṃ uddissa. Ubho uddissa maraṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇentassa payogasamuṭṭhāpikāya
tika-vin07t:656_4: cetanāya ekattepi “dve pāṇātipātā”ti vattabbatāsaṅkhātaṃ balavabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā paṭisandhipavattīsu
tika-vin07t:656_5: mahāvipākattā “akusalarāsī”ti vuttaṃ, bahū uddissa maraṇasaṃvaṇṇanepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t:656_6: Tattakā pāṇātipātāti yattakā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ sutvā marissanti, tattakānampi vattamānaṃ
tika-vin07t:656_7: anāgatañca jīvitindriyaṃ sabbaṃ ālambitvāva cetanāya pavattanato tattakā pāṇātipātā
tika-vin07t:656_8: honti, tattakāhi cetanāhi dātabbaṃ pavattivipākaṃ ekāva sā cetanā dātuṃ sakkotīti
tika-vin07t:656_9: attho, paṭisandhivipākaṃ pana sayañca pubbāparacetanā ca ekekameva dātuṃ sakkotīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:657_0: 176. Yesaṃ hatthatoti yesaṃ ñātakapavāritādīnaṃ hatthato, idañca bhikkhuno rūpiyamūlassa
tika-vin07t:657_1: abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, attanova dhanañce, sayameva mūlaṃ gahetvā muñcati, mūlaṃ
tika-vin07t:657_2: pana aggahetvāpi potthakassa potthakasāmino santakattāpādanamevettha pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:657_3: Lekhādassanakotūhalakāti sundarakkharaṃ disvā vā “kīdisaṃ nu kho potthaka”nti vā oloketukāmā.
tika-vin07t:658_0: Pāṇātipātassa payogattāti sarīrato pāṇaviyojanassa niṭṭhāpakapayogattā. Opātakhaṇanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:658_1: pana kudālādiatthāya ayobījasamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ akappiyapathaviṃ vā kudāladaṇḍādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:658_2: atthāya bhūtagāmaṃ vikopentassa pācittiyameva. Pāṇātipātapayogattābhāvā adinnādānapubbapayaoge
tika-vin07t:658_3: viya dutiyapariyesanādīsupi ettha dukkaṭaṭṭhāne dukkaṭaṃ, musāvādādipācittiyaṭṭhāne
tika-vin07t:658_4: pācittiyamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Pamāṇeti attanā sallakkhite pamāṇe. Tacchetvāti unnatappadesaṃ
tika-vin07t:658_5: tacchetvā. Paṃsupacchinti sabbantimaṃ paṃsupacchiṃ. Ettakaṃ alanti niṭṭhāpetukāmatāya
tika-vin07t:658_7: avūpasanteneva payogena khaṇitvā niṭṭhāpentaṃ sandhāya sabbantimā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā
tika-vin07t:658_8: vuttā, itarāsu pana aṭṭhakathāsu “imasmiṃ patitvā marantū”ti adhippāyena ekasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:658_9: divase kiñci khaṇitvā aparasmimpi divase tato kiñci kiñci khaṇitvā niṭṭhāpentaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin07t:658_10: vuttanti evaṃ aṭṭhakathānaṃ aññamaññavirodho ñātabbo. Attano dhammatāyāti ajānitvā,
tika-vin07t:658_11: pakkhalitvā vā. Arahantāpi saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti aññehi pātiyamānānaṃ amaritukāmānampi
tika-vin07t:658_12: arahantānaṃ maraṇaṃ sambhavatīti vuttaṃ. Purimanayeti “maritukāmā idha marissantī”ti
tika-vin07t:658_13: vuttanaye. Visaṅketoti maritukāmānaṃ māretukāmānañca uddissa khatattā amaritukāmānaṃ
tika-vin07t:659_0: Tattha patitaṃ bahi nīharitvāti idaṃ tattha patanapaccayā maraṇassa pavattattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:659_1: Āvāṭe patitvā thokaṃ cirāyitvā gacchantaṃ gahetvā mārite tattha patitarogena pīḷitassa
tika-vin07t:659_2: gacchato pakkhalitvā pāsāṇādīsu patanenāpi maraṇepi opātakhaṇako na muccatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:659_3: Amaritukāmā vāti adhippāyassa sambhavato opapātike uttarituṃ asakkuṇitvā matepi pārājikaṃ
tika-vin07t:659_4: vuttaṃ. “Nibbattitvā”ti vuttattā patanaṃ na dissatīti ce? Tatthassa nibbattiyeva
tika-vin07t:659_5: patananti natthi virodho. Yasmā mātuyā patitvā parivattitaliṅgāya matāya so mātughātako
tika-vin07t:659_6: hoti, na kevalaṃ manussapurisaghātako, tasmā patitasseva vasena āpattīti adhippāyena
tika-vin07t:659_7: “patanarūpaṃ pamāṇa”nti vuttaṃ, idaṃ pana akāraṇaṃ “liṅge parivattepi ekasantānattassa
tika-vin07t:659_8: avigatattā. Manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā api parivattaliṅgaṃ jīvitā voropentassa
tika-vin07t:659_9: kammaṃ ānantariya”nti hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yena pana sabhāvena sattā jāyanti,
tika-vin07t:659_10: teneva maranti, sova tesaṃ rūpantaraggahaṇepi sabhāvoti “maraṇarūpameva pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:659_11: tasmā pācittiya”nti vutto. Pacchimo vādo pamāṇaṃ, evaṃ sante pāḷiyaṃ “yakkho vā peto
tika-vin07t:659_12: vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho vā tasmiṃ patati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Patite dukkhā
tika-vin07t:659_13: vedanā uppajjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Marati, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti kasmā vuttanti
tika-vin07t:659_14: ce? Nāyaṃ doso. “Yakkho vā peto vā”ti hi paṭhamaṃ sakarūpaṃ dassetvā rūpantaraṃ gahetvāpi
tika-vin07t:659_15: ṭhiteyeva yakkhapete dassetuṃ “tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho vā”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā tiracchānagataviggaho
tika-vin07t:659_16: manussaviggaho vā yakkho vā peto vāti evamettha yojanā kātabbā. Keci pana “manussaviggahena
tika-vin07t:659_17: ṭhitatiracchānagatānaṃ āveṇikaṃ katvā thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ viya dissatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:659_18: taṃ na yuttaṃ tiracchāno vā manussaviggahoti vattabbato, aṭṭhakathāsu ca imassa visesassa
tika-vin07t:659_19: avuttattā. Yakkhapetarūpena matepi eseva nayoti iminā maraṇarūpasseva pamāṇattā thullaccayaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin07t:660_0: Mudhāti amūlena. So niddosoti tena tattha katapayogassa abhāvato, yadi pana sopi
tika-vin07t:660_1: tattha kiñci karoti, na muccati evāti dassento evaṃ patitātiādimāha. Tattha evanti
tika-vin07t:660_2: evaṃ mayā kateti attho. Na nassissantīti adassanaṃ na gamissanti, na palāyissantīti
tika-vin07t:660_3: adhippāyo. Suuddharā vā bhavissantīti idaṃ gambhīrassa opātassa pūraṇe payojanadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:660_4: Uttāne kate opāte sīghaṃ amhehi gahetvā māretuṃ suuddharā bhavissantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:660_5: Vippaṭisāre uppanneti mūlaṭṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yadi pana pacchimopi labhitvā tattha
tika-vin07t:660_6: vuttappakāraṃ kiñci katvā puna vippaṭisāre uppanne evaṃ karoti, tassāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t:660_7: Jātapathavī jātāti īdise puna aññena opāte khate tadā muccatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:660_8: jātapathavīsadisaṃ katvā puna suṭṭhu koṭṭetvā daḷhataraṃ pūritepi muccatiyevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:661_0: Thaddhataranti thirakaraṇatthaṃ aparāparāya pāsayaṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ bandhitvā vā tameva
tika-vin07t:661_1: vā sithilabhūtapāsaṃ thaddhataraṃ bandhitvā ṭhapeti. Khāṇukanti pāsayaṭṭhibandhanakhāṇukaṃ.
tika-vin07t:661_2: Tatthajātakayaṭṭhiṃ chinditvā muccatīti idaṃ araññe yathāṭhitameva daṇḍaṃ mūle acchinditvā
tika-vin07t:661_3: pāsabandhanayoggaṃ katvā ṭhapitattā tattha aññopi koci pāsaṃ bandheyya, mūlaṭṭho
tika-vin07t:661_4: na muccati, taṃ pana mūlepi chinditvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ katvā muccatīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:661_5: vuttaṃ. Rajjuketi vākehi ekavāraṃ vaṭṭitarajjuke. Sayaṃ vaṭṭitanti tanukavaṭṭitaṃ
tika-vin07t:661_6: diguṇatiguṇatāpādanena attanā vaṭṭitaṃ. Ubbaṭṭetvāti pākatikaṃ katvā. Gopentopīti
tika-vin07t:662_0: 177. Ālambanarukkho vāti tatthajātakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tadatthameva katvāti māraṇatthameva
tika-vin07t:662_1: ayobījasamuṭṭhāpanādinā vāsiādiṃ satthaṃ kāretvā. Pākatikanti aññehi kataṃ pakatisatthameva
tika-vin07t:662_2: labhitvā mūlaṭṭhena ṭhapitaṃ hotīti attho. Muccatīti mūlaṭṭho muccati. Visamaṇḍalanti
tika-vin07t:663_0: Vatvā asiṃ upanikkhipatīti ettha mukhena avatvā manasāva cintetvā upanikkhipanepi
tika-vin07t:663_1: eseva nayo. Purimanayenāti yesaṃ hatthato mūlaṃ gahitantiādinā. Visabhāgarogo nāma
tika-vin07t:664_0: 178. Manāpiyepi eseva nayoti etena manāpiyaṃ rūpaṃ upasaṃharatīti ettha yaṃ vā manāparūpaṃ,
tika-vin07t:664_1: tassa samīpe ṭhapeti, attanā vā manāpiyena rūpena samannāgato tiṭṭhatītiādi yojetabbanti
tika-vin07t:664_2: dasseti. Alaṅkaritvā upasaṃharatīti “alābhakena sussitvā maratū”ti iminā adhippāyena
tika-vin07t:664_3: upasaṃharati, teneva “sace uttasitvā marati, visaṅketo”ti vuttaṃ. Alābhakena sussitvā
tika-vin07t:664_4: maratīti ettha pārājikoti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo. Mahākacchu nāma valliphalaviseso,
tika-vin07t:664_5: yassa majjārapādasseva saṇṭhānaṃ dukkhasamphassāni sukhumalomāni ca honti. Haṃsapupphanti
tika-vin07t:664_6: haṃsādīnaṃ pakkhalomaṃ sandhāya vadanti. Attano dhammatāya marati, anāpattīti pārājikaṃ
tika-vin07t:665_0: 179. Asañciccāti idaṃ maraṇasaṃvattanikaupakkamassa asallakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttanti
tika-vin07t:665_1: āha iminā upakkamenātiādi. Ajānantassāti idaṃ pana maraṇasaṃvattanikavisādiupakkamakaraṇassa
tika-vin07t:665_2: ajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha iminā ayaṃ marissatītiādi. Na maraṇādhippāyassāti
tika-vin07t:665_3: idaṃ dukkhuppādakaṃ upakkamanti jānantassāpi maraṇādhippāyassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti
tika-vin07t:665_4: āha maraṇaṃ anicchantassātiādi. Anuppabandhābhāvāti domanassavīthīnaṃ nirantarappavattiabhāvā.
tika-vin07t:668_1: karuṇāya abhāvato kāruññena pāse baddhasūkaramocanaṃ viya na hotīti adhippāyo. “Yathāyunā”ti
tika-vin07t:668_2: vuttamevatthaṃ “yathānusandhinā”ti pariyāyantarena vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhā kismiñci vijjamāne
tika-vin07t:668_3: sāṭakaṃ valiṃ gaṇhātīti āha “yasmiṃ vali na paññāyatī”ti. Paṭivekkhaṇañcetaṃ gihīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:668_4: santake evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ musale ussiteti aññamaññaṃ upatthambhetvā dvīsu
tika-vin07t:668_5: musalesu bhittiṃ apassāya ṭhapitesūti attho. Udukkhalabhaṇḍikanti udukkhalatthāya
tika-vin07t:668_6: ānītaṃ dārubhaṇḍaṃ. Paribandhanti bhojanaparibandhaṃ, bhojanantarāyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:669_0: 181. Aggakārikanti ettha kārika-saddassa bhāvavacanattā “aggakiriya”nti atthaṃ vatvāpi
tika-vin07t:669_1: yasmā kiriyaṃ dātuṃ na sakkā, tasmā dānasaṅkhātāya aggakiriyāya yuttapiṇḍapātameva
tika-vin07t:669_2: idha upacārayuttiyā aggakiriyāti gahetabbanti āha paṭhamaṃ laddhapiṇḍapātantiādi.
tika-vin07t:670_0: 182-3. Daṇḍamuggaranikhādanavemādīnaṃ vasenāti ettha daṇḍo nāma dīghadaṇḍo. Muggaro
tika-vin07t:670_1: nāma rasso. Vemaṃ nāma tantavāyānaṃ vatthavāyanaupakaraṇaṃ, yena vītaṃ tantaṃ ghaṭṭenti.
tika-vin07t:670_2: Vibhattibyattayenāti vibhattivipariṇāmena. Visesādhigamoti samādhi vipassanā ca.
tika-vin07t:670_3: Visesādhigamanti lokuttaradhammapaṭilābhaṃ. Byākaritvāti ārocetvā, idañca visesassa
tika-vin07t:670_4: adhigatabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Adhigatavisesā hi diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanatthaṃ lajjībhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin07t:670_5: avassaṃ adhigamaṃ byākaronti, adhigatavisesena pana abyākaritvāpi āhāraṃ upacchindituṃ
tika-vin07t:670_6: na vaṭṭati, adhigamantarāyavinodanatthameva āhārūpacchedassa anuññātattā tadadhigame
tika-vin07t:670_7: so na kātabbova. Kiṃ panādhigamaṃ ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha sabhāgānantiādi. Bhaṇḍakaṃ
tika-vin07t:670_8: vā dhovantāti cīvaraṃ vā dhovantā. Dhovanadaṇḍakanti cīvaradhovanadaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin07t:671_0: 185. Maddāpetvā pāteti, visaṅketoti yathāṇattiyā akatattā vuttaṃ, yadi pana āṇāpako
tika-vin07t:671_1: maddanampi maddāpanampi sandhāya vohāravasena “madditvā pātehī”ti vadati, visaṅketo
tika-vin07t:671_2: natthīti veditabbaṃ. “Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyyā”ti vuttattā āha “pariyāyo nāma
tika-vin07t:671_3: natthī”ti, pariyāyena āpattimokkho na hotīti adhippāyo. Avijāyanatthāya gabbhaggahaṇato
tika-vin07t:671_4: puretarameva bhesajjaṃ dentassa kucchiyaṃ uppajjitvā gabbho vinassatīti iminā adhippāyena
tika-vin07t:671_5: dinne tathāmarantānaṃ vasena kammabaddho, kucchiyaṃ na uppajjissatīti iminā adhippāyena
tika-vin07t:671_6: dinne uppajjitvā maratu vā mā vā, nevatthi kammabaddho.
tika-vin07t:672_0: Sahadhammikānanti ekassa satthu sāsane sahasikkhamānadhammānaṃ, sahadhamme vā sikkhāpade
tika-vin07t:672_2: akātumpi labbhatīti dasseti. Ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānatoti attano tesaṃ vā ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato.
tika-vin07t:672_3: Ariyehi akatā ayuttavasena akatapubbā viññatti akataviññatti.
tika-vin07t:673_0: Paṭiyādiyatīti sampādiyati. Akātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha dukkaṭaṃ vadanti, ayuttatāvaseneva
tika-vin07t:673_1: panettha akaraṇapaṭikkhepo yutto, na āpattivasenāti gahetabbaṃ. Yāva ñātakā passantīti
tika-vin07t:674_0: Pitubhaginī pitucchā. Mātubhātā mātulo. Nappahontīti kātuṃ na sakkonti. Na yācantīti
tika-vin07t:674_1: lajjāya na yācanti. “Ābhogaṃ katvā”ti vuttattā aññathā dentassa āpattiyeva. Keci
tika-vin07t:674_2: pana “ābhogaṃ akatvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ bhesajjakaraṇassa
tika-vin07t:674_3: pāḷiyaṃ “anāpatti bhikkhu pārājikassa, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ antarāpattidassanavasena
