tika-vin07t:833_0: Antolepeneva niṭṭhāpetukāmaṃ sandhāya “antolepe vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bahilepe vāti etthāpi
tika-vin07t:833_1: eseva nayo. Tasminti dvārabandhe vā vātapāne vā ṭhapiteti yojetabbaṃ. Tassokāsanti
tika-vin07t:833_2: tassa dvārabandhādissa okāsabhūtaṃ chiddaṃ. Puna vaḍḍhetvāti pubbe ṭhapitokāsaṃ khuddakaṃ
tika-vin07t:833_3: ce, taṃ dvāravātapānacchiddabhedanena puna vaḍḍhetvā. Ṭhapiteti dvārabandhe vā gavakkhasaṅghāṭe
tika-vin07t:833_4: vā ānetvā tasmiṃ vaḍḍhite vā avaḍḍhite vā chidde patiṭṭhāpite. Lepo na ghaṭīyatīti
tika-vin07t:833_5: samantato dinno lepo tathā ṭhapitena dvārabandhanena vā vātapānena vā saddhiṃ na
tika-vin07t:833_6: ghaṭīyati, ekābaddhaṃ na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tanti dvārabandhaṃ vā vātapānaṃ vā.
tika-vin07t:833_7: Paṭhamameva saṅghādisesoti tesaṃ samantato pubbeva lepassa ghaṭetvā niṭṭhāpitattā
tika-vin07t:834_0: Lepaghaṭanenevāti iṭṭhakāhi katavātapānādīni vinā samantā lepaghaṭaneneva āpatti
tika-vin07t:834_1: vātapānādīnaṃ alepokāsattā, iṭṭhakāhi katattā vā, vātapānādīsupi lepassa bhittilepena
tika-vin07t:834_2: saddhiṃ ghaṭanenevātipi atthaṃ vadanti. Tatthāti paṇṇasālāyaṃ. Ālokatthāya aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ
tika-vin07t:834_3: ṭhapetvā limpatīti dārukuṭṭassa dārūnamantarā aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ vivaraṃ yāva limpati,
tika-vin07t:834_4: tāva ālokatthāya ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ sakuṭṭacchadanaṃ limpati, pacchā etaṃ vivaraṃ
tika-vin07t:834_5: limpissāmīti evaṃ ṭhapane anāpattīti adhippāyo. Sace pana evaṃ akatvā sabbadāpi ālokatthāya
tika-vin07t:834_6: vātapānavasena ṭhapeti, vātapānadvārasaṅghāṭe ghaṭite lepo ca ghaṭīyati, paṭhamameva
tika-vin07t:834_7: saṅghādisesoti dassento āha “sace”tiādi. Mattikākuṭṭameva mattikālepasaṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti
tika-vin07t:834_8: āha “sace mattikāya kuṭṭaṃ karoti, chadanalepena saddhiṃ ghaṭane āpattī”ti. Ubhinnaṃ
tika-vin07t:834_9: anāpattīti purimassa lepassa aghaṭitattā dutiyassa attuddesikatāya asambhavato.
tika-vin07t:835: 354. Āpattibhedadassanatthanti tattha “sārambhe ca aparikkamane ca dukkaṭaṃ adesitavatthukatāya, pamāṇātikkantatāya ca saṅghādiseso”ti evaṃ āpattiyeva vibhāgadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin07t:836_0: 361. Aniṭṭhite kuṭikammeti lepapariyosāne kuṭikamme ekapiṇḍamattenapi aniṭṭhite.
tika-vin07t:836_1: “Aññassa puggalassa vā”ti idaṃ mūlaṭṭhassa anāpattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yena pana
tika-vin07t:836_2: laddhaṃ, tassāpi taṃ niṭṭhāpentassa “parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti
tika-vin07t:836_3: saṅghādisesassā”tiādivacanato āpattiyeva. Pubbe katakammampi laddhakālato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin07t:836_4: attano atthāyeva kataṃ nāma hoti, tasmā tenāpi saṅghassa vā sāmaṇerādīnaṃ vā datvā
tika-vin07t:836_5: niṭṭhāpetabbaṃ. “Aññassa vā”ti idaṃ anupasampannaṃyeva sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:836_6: keci pana “parato laddhāya kuṭiyā niṭṭhāpane anāpattiādito paṭṭhāya attano atthāya
tika-vin07t:836_7: akatattā”ti vadanti. Apacinitabbāti yāva pācinā viddhaṃsetabbā. Bhūmisamaṃ katvāti
tika-vin07t:837_0: 364. Leṇanti pabbataleṇaṃ. Na hettha lepo ghaṭīyatīti chadanalepassa abhāvato vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:837_1: visuṃ eva vā anuññātattā. Sace leṇassa anto uparibhāge cittakammādikaraṇatthaṃ lepaṃ
tika-vin07t:837_2: denti, ullittakuṭisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati, vaṭṭati eva. Iṭṭhakādīhi kataṃ caturassakūṭāgārasaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:837_3: ekakaṇṇikābaddhaṃ nātiuccaṃ paṭissayavisesaṃ “guhā”ti vadanti, tādisaṃ mahantampi
tika-vin07t:838_1: vatvā puna taṃ vivarantehi aṭṭhakathācariyehi chadanaṃ daṇḍakehi…pe… vuttāti yojanā
tika-vin07t:838_2: daṭṭhabbā. Tattha daṇḍakehi jālabaddhaṃ katvāti dīghato, tiriyato ca ṭhapetvā valliyādīhi
tika-vin07t:838_3: baddhadaṇḍakehi jālaṃ viya katvā. So cāti ullittādibhāvo. Chadanameva sandhāya vuttoti
tika-vin07t:838_4: chadanassa anto ca bahi ca limpanameva sandhāya vutto. Mattikākuṭṭe bhittilepaṃ vināpi
tika-vin07t:838_5: bhittiyā saddhiṃ chadanalepassa ghaṭanamattenāpi āpattisambhavato chadanalepova padhānanti
tika-vin07t:838_6: veditabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi evaṃ, atha kho “upacikāmocanatthameva heṭṭhā pāsāṇakuṭṭaṃ katvā
tika-vin07t:838_7: taṃ alimpitvā upari limpati, lepo na ghaṭīyati nāma, anāpattiyevā”tiādivacanato pana
tika-vin07t:838_8: chadanalepaghaṭanatthaṃ sakalāyapi bhittiyā lepo avassaṃ icchitabbova tassā ekadesassa
tika-vin07t:838_9: alepepi chadanalepassa aghaṭanato. Tenāha “lepo na ghaṭīyatī”ti. Etthāti tiṇakuṭikāyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:838_10: Na kevalañca tiṇakuṭikāyaṃ eva, leṇaguhādīsupi sārambhāparikkamanapaccayāpi anāpatti
tika-vin07t:838_11: eva, iminā pana nayena aññassatthāya kuṭiṃ karontassāpi sārambhādipaccayāpi anāpattibhāvo
tika-vin07t:839_0: Tattha pāḷivirodhaṃ pariharituṃ “yaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – aññassa
tika-vin07t:839_1: upajjhāyādino atthāya karontassa sārambhādipaccayāpi anāpatti eva, yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:839_2: “āpattikārukānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭāna”ntiādivacanaṃ, taṃ aññassatthāya karontassa, na
tika-vin07t:839_3: sārambhādipaccayā āpattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcarahi yathāsamādiṭṭhāya kuṭiyā akaraṇapaccayā
tika-vin07t:839_5: ‘kuṭiṃ me karothā’ti samādisati ca, desitavatthukā ca hotu anārambhā ca saparikkamanā
tika-vin07t:839_6: cā”ti evaṃ kārāpakena āṇattikkamaṃ muñcitvā karaṇapaccayāti adhippāyo. Katthaci pana
tika-vin07t:839_7: potthake “kuṭilakkhaṇappattampi kuṭiṃ aññassa…pe… karontassa anāpattī”ti imassa pāṭhassa
tika-vin07t:839_8: anantaraṃ “yaṃ pana āpatti kārukāna”ntiādipāṭho dissati, sova yuttataro. Evañhi sati
tika-vin07t:840_0: Anāpattīti vatvāti vāsāgāratthāya eva aniyamitattā anāpattīti vatvā. Adesāpetvā karototi
tika-vin07t:840_1: pamāṇayuttampi karoto. Acittakanti paṇṇattiajānanacittena acittakaṃ. Ullittādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:840_3: vāsāgāratā, lepaghaṭanāti satta vā pamāṇayuttaṅgādīsu cha vā aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:843_0: 365. Sattame pūjāvacanappayoge kattari sāmivacanassapi icchitattā “gāmassa vā pūjita”nti
tika-vin07t:843_1: vuttaṃ. Rūpindriyesu vijjamānaṃ sandhāya ekindriyatā vuccatīti āha “kāyindriyaṃ sandhāyā”ti.
tika-vin07t:844_0: 366. Kiriyato samuṭṭhānābhāvoti vatthuno adesanāsaṅkhātaṃ akiriyaṃ vinā na kevalaṃ
tika-vin07t:844_1: kiriyāya samuṭṭhānabhāvo. Kiriyākiriyato hi idaṃ samuṭṭhāti. Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade bhikkhū
tika-vin07t:844_2: vā anabhineyyāti ettha vā-saddo samuccayattho, tena “mahallakañca vihāraṃ kareyya,
tika-vin07t:844_3: bhikkhū ca anabhineyyā”ti kiriyañca akiriyañca samuccinoti.
tika-vin07t:847: 380. Aṭṭhame pākārena ca parikkhittanti sambandho. Gopuraṭṭālakayuttanti ettha pākāresu yuddhatthāya kato vaṅkasaṇṭhāno sarakkhepachiddasahito patissayaviseso aṭṭālako nāma.
tika-vin07t:848_0: Soḷasavidhassāti catūhi maggehi paccekaṃ catūsu saccesu kattabbassa pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāsaṅkhātassa
tika-vin07t:848_1: soḷasavidhassa. Te gāravenāti te kilantarūpā bhikkhū bhattuddesakaṭṭhāne sannipatitānaṃ
tika-vin07t:848_2: bhikkhūnaṃ purato attano kilantasarīraṃ dassetvā uddisāpane gāravena, lajjāyāti attho.
tika-vin07t:849_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “apisū”ti idaṃ “apicā”ti iminā samānattho nipāto. Evaṃ sabbapadesūti pīṭhādīsu
tika-vin07t:849_1: senāsanasādhāraṇesu, katikasaṇṭhānapavesanikkhamanakālādīsu pana visuṃ visuṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin07t:849_2: kathāpetīti veditabbaṃ. Ayañhi nimmitānaṃ dhammatāti aniyametvā nimmitānaṃ vasena
tika-vin07t:849_3: vuttaṃ, niyametvā pana “ettakā idañcidañca kathentu, ettakā tuṇhī bhavantu, nānāppakāraṃ
tika-vin07t:849_4: iriyāpathaṃ, kiriyañca kappentu, nānāvaṇṇasaṇṭhānavayoniyamā ca hontū”ti parikammaṃ
tika-vin07t:849_5: katvā samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhite icchiticchitappakārā aññamaññampi visadisāva
tika-vin07t:850_0: 383. Ekacārikabhattanti atimanāpattā sabbesampi paṭilābhatthāya visuṃ ṭhitikāya pāpetabbabhattaṃ.
tika-vin07t:850_1: Taddhitavohārenāti cattāri pamāṇamassa catukkanti evaṃ taddhitavohārena. Bhavoti
tika-vin07t:850_2: bhavitabbo. Atītaṃ divasabhāganti tasmiññeva divase salākadānakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:850_3: Hiyyoti imassa ajja icceva attho. Tenevāhaṃsu “sve amhe”tiādi. Padhūpāyantāti punappunaṃ
tika-vin07t:850_4: uppajjanakodhavasena padhūpāyantā. Pāḷiyaṃ kissa manti kena kāraṇena mayāti attho.
tika-vin07t:851_0: 384. “Sarasi tva”nti idaṃ ekaṃ vākyaṃ katvā, “kattā”ti idañca kattari ritupaccayantaṃ
tika-vin07t:851_1: katvā, “asī”ti ajjhāhārapadena saha ekavākyaṃ katvā, “evarūpa”nti idaṃ, “yathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:851_2: bhikkhunī āhā”ti idañca dvīsu vākyesu paccekaṃ yojetabbanti dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:851_3: Ujukamevāti tvā-paccayantavasena paṭhamaṃ atthaggahaṇaṃ ujukanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:852_0: Dutiyo dabba-saddo paṇḍitādivacanoti āha “na kho dabba dabbā paṇḍitā”ti. Nibbeṭhentīti
tika-vin07t:852_1: dosato mocenti. Vinayalakkhaṇe tantinti vinayavinicchayalakkhaṇavisaye āgamaṃ ṭhapento.
tika-vin07t:852_2: Pāḷiyaṃ yato ahantiādīsu yasmiṃ kāle ahaṃ jāto, tato pabhuti supinantenapi methunaṃ
tika-vin07t:852_3: dhammaṃ nābhijānāmi, na ca tassa methunadhammassa paṭisevitā ahosinti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:852_4: Tenāha “supinantenapī”tiādi. Idāni ekavākyavasena yojanaṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi
tika-vin07t:852_5: vuttaṃ. Na ghaṭatīti yasmā khīṇāsavassa vacanena etissā vacanaṃ na sameti, tañca
tika-vin07t:852_6: na ghaṭanaṃ yasmā pubbe bhikkhūsu pasiddhāya eva accantadussīlatāya eva ahosi, tasmā
tika-vin07t:853_0: Cara pireti cara gaccha pire para amāmaka tvaṃ. Vinassāti adassanaṃ gaccha. Akārikāti
tika-vin07t:853_1: amūlakena codanāya na kārikā. Kārako hotīti “ayyenamhi dūsitā”ti imāya paṭiññāya
tika-vin07t:853_2: yadi nāsitā, tadā thero bhikkhunīdūsakattasiddhito tassa dosassa kārako hoti. Akārako
tika-vin07t:853_3: hotīti tāya katapaṭiññaṃ anapekkhitvā sāmaññato “mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā”ti bhagavatā
tika-vin07t:853_4: vuttattā akārako hoti. Yadi hi thero kārako bhaveyya, avassaṃ tameva dosaṃ apadisitvā
tika-vin07t:853_5: iminā nāma kāraṇena “mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, tathā avuttattā,
tika-vin07t:853_6: “dabbañca anuyuñjathā”ti avatvā “ime ca bhikkhū anuyuñjathā”ti vuttattā ca sāmatthiyato
tika-vin07t:853_7: mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā aññena dosena nāsanārahatā, vatthussa ca amūlakabhāvo, therassa
tika-vin07t:854_0: Attano suttanti “sakāya paṭiññāyā”ti iminā pakkhepavacanena sahitaṃ kūṭasuttaṃ. Thero
tika-vin07t:854_1: kārako hotīti ettha ayamadhippāyo – “sakāya paṭiññāyā”ti avatvā sāmaññato “mettiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:854_2: bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā”ti otiṇṇavatthusmiṃyeva tassā nāsanā vihitāti tumhākaṃ vāde thero
tika-vin07t:854_3: kārako hoti, “sakāya paṭiññāyā”ti pana vutte pubbeyeva siddhassa pārājikassa sucikāya
tika-vin07t:854_4: assā sakāya paṭiññāya nāsethāti sijjhanato amhākaṃ vāde thero akārako hotīti. Mahāvihāravāsīnampi
tika-vin07t:854_5: pana “sakāya paṭiññāyā”ti vutte otiṇṇavatthusmiṃyeva tassā nāsanā vihitā hoti, na
tika-vin07t:854_6: sāmaññatoti adhippāyo. Etthāti imesu dvīsu vādesu, suttesu vā. Yaṃ pacchā vuttanti
tika-vin07t:854_7: mahāvihāravāsīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttanti attho. Vicāritaṃ hetanti etaṃ pacchimassa
tika-vin07t:854_8: yuttattaṃ vicāritaṃ, “tatra saṅghādiseso vuṭṭhānagāminī…pe… asuddhatāyeva nāsesī”ti
tika-vin07t:854_9: vakkhamānanayena vinicchitanti attho. “Bhikkhuniṃ anuddhaṃseti dukkaṭa”nti iminā
tika-vin07t:855_0: Tatrāti tesu dukkaṭapācittiyesu. Dukkaṭanti vuttamahāaṭṭhakathāvādassa adhippāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:855_2: vuttaṃ. Vacanappamāṇatoti visaṃvādanādhippāye samānepi anuddhaṃsanādivisese saṅghādisesādino
tika-vin07t:855_3: vidhāyakavacanabalenāti attho. Bhikkhussa pana bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭanti bhikkhuniṃ
tika-vin07t:856_0: Evaṃ dvīsupi aṭṭhakathāvacanesu adhippāyaṃ vibhāvetvā idāni pacchime pācittiyavāde
tika-vin07t:856_1: dosaṃ dassetvā purimadukkaṭavādameva patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “tatra panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin07t:856_2: visunti sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyato visuṃ pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha anantogadhabhāvāti
tika-vin07t:856_3: adhippāyo. Tasmāti yasmā amūlakānuddhaṃsane visuññeva pācittiyaṃ paññattaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin07t:856_4: purimanayoti dukkaṭavādo. Evaṃ antarā paviṭṭhaṃ dukkaṭapācittiyavādaṃ dassetvā idāni
tika-vin07t:856_5: pākaṭameva atthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tathā bhikkhunī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha tathāti yathā
tika-vin07t:856_6: bhikkhussa bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhuniñca anuddhaṃsentassa saṅghādisesadukkaṭāni vuttāni,
tika-vin07t:856_7: tathāti attho. Etehi nāsanā natthīti sāmaññato vuttaṃ, dukkaṭena imissā pana nāsanā
tika-vin07t:857_0: 386. Ākāranānattenāti dūsitākārassa, dūsakākārassa ca nānattena. Anabhiraddhoti atuṭṭho.
tika-vin07t:857_1: Tenāha “na sukhito”ti. Na pasāditoti anuppāditappasādo. Khīla-saddo thaddhabhāvavacano,
tika-vin07t:857_2: kacavarapariyāyo ca hotīti āha “citta…pe… khīla”nti. Nappatītoti pītisukhādīhi na
tika-vin07t:858_0: Yena duṭṭhoti ca kupitoti ca vuttoti ettha yena duṭṭhoti ca vutto yena kupitoti ca
tika-vin07t:858_1: vutto, taṃ mātikāyañca padabhājane ca vuttaṃ ubhayampetanti yojetabbaṃ. Dvīhīti “tena
tika-vin07t:858_2: ca kopena, tena ca dosenā”ti vuttakopadosapadehi dvīhi, atthato pana dvīhipi dosova
tika-vin07t:859_0: Na cuditakavasenāti yadi cuditakavasenāpi amūlakaṃ adhippetaṃ siyā, amūlakaṃ nāma
tika-vin07t:859_1: anajjhāpannanti padabhājanaṃ vadeyyāti adhippāyo. Yaṃ pārājikanti bhikkhuno anurūpesu
tika-vin07t:859_2: ekūnavīsatiyā pārājikesu aññataraṃ. Padabhājane pana bhikkhuvibhaṅge āgatāneva gahetvā
tika-vin07t:859_3: “catunnaṃ aññatarenā”ti vuttaṃ. Etaṃ idha appamāṇanti etaṃ āpannānāpannataṃ idhānuddhaṃsane
tika-vin07t:859_4: āpattiyā anaṅgaṃ, āpattiṃ pana āpanne vā anāpanne vā puggale “anāpanno eso suddho”ti
tika-vin07t:859_5: suddhasaññāya vā vimatiyā vā cāvanādhippāyova idha aṅganti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:860_0: Tathevāti pasādasotena, dibbasotena vāti imamatthaṃ atidisati. Diṭṭhānusāreneva samuppannā
tika-vin07t:860_1: parisaṅkāva diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ nāma. Evaṃ sesesupi. “Adisvā vā”ti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena
tika-vin07t:860_2: vuttaṃ, disvā pakkantesupi doso natthiyeva. Imesanti imehi. Karissantīti tasmiṃ khaṇe
tika-vin07t:860_3: uppajjanākāradassanaṃ, pacchā pana ettakena kālena kataṃ vāti saṅkāya codeti. Na
tika-vin07t:860_4: hi karissantīti codanā atthi. “Ariṭṭhaṃ pīta”nti idaṃ mukhe surāgandhavāyananimittadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:861_0: Diṭṭhaṃ atthi samūlakantiādīsu ajjhācārassa sambhavāsambhavānaṃ mūlāmūlabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:861_1: Atthi saññāsamūlakantiādi pana diṭṭhasaññāya sambhavāsambhavānaṃ mūlāmūlabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:861_2: Disvāva diṭṭhasaññī hutvā codetīti ettha yaṃ codeti, tato aññaṃ puggalaṃ vītikkamantaṃ,
tika-vin07t:861_3: paṭicchannokāsato nikkhamantaṃ vā disvā “ayaṃ so”ti saññāya codentopi saṅgayhati.
tika-vin07t:861_4: Esa nayo sutādīsupi. Samūlakena vā saññāsamūlakena vāti ettha pārājikamāpannaṃ diṭṭhādimūlakena
tika-vin07t:861_5: ca “ayaṃ āpanno”ti asuddhasaññāya codento samūlakena codeti nāma. Saññāsamūlakatte
tika-vin07t:861_6: eva anāpattisambhavato āpanne vā anāpanne vā puggale āpannasaññī diṭṭhādīsu, adiṭṭhādīsu
tika-vin07t:861_7: vā mūlesu diṭṭhasutādisaññī tena diṭṭhādimūlakena taṃ puggalaṃ codento saññāsamūlakena
tika-vin07t:861_8: codeti nāma. Imesaṃ anāpatti, vuttavipariyāyena āpattivāre attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:862_0: Samīpe ṭhatvāti hatthavikāravacīghosānaṃ codanāvasena pavattiyamānānaṃ dassanasavanūpacāre
tika-vin07t:862_1: ṭhatvāti attho. Keci pana “dvādasahatthabbhantare ṭhatvā”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:862_2: Parato byatirekato anāpattiṃ dassentena “dūtaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā pesetvā”ti
tika-vin07t:862_3: ettakameva vuttaṃ, na pana “dvādasahatthaṃ muñcitvā codentassa sīsaṃ na etī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:862_4: Vācāya vācāyāti sakiṃ āṇattassa sakalampi divasaṃ vadato vācāya vācāya codāpakasseva
tika-vin07t:862_5: āpatti. Sopīti āṇattopi. Tassa ca “mayāpi diṭṭha”ntiādiṃ avatvāpi “amūlaka”nti saññāya
tika-vin07t:862_6: cāvanādhippāyena “tvaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosī”ti idameva vācaṃ parassa vacanaṃ
tika-vin07t:862_7: viya akatvā sāmaññato vadantassāpi saṅghādiseso eva. Satipi pana anuddhaṃsanādhippāye
tika-vin07t:862_8: “asukena evaṃ vutta”nti parena vuttameva vadantassa natthi saṅghādiseso. Sace pana
tika-vin07t:862_9: parena avuttampi vuttanti vadati, āpatti eva.
tika-vin07t:863_0: Sambahulā sambahule sambahulehi vatthūhīti ettha sambahuleti cuditakabahuttaniddesena
tika-vin07t:863_1: purimesu tīsu vāresu cuditakabahuttenāpi vārabhedasabbhāvaṃ ñāpeti. Ekasmiñhi cuditakavatthucodakabhedena
tika-vin07t:863_2: idaṃ catukkaṃ vuttaṃ, cuditakabahuttenāpi catukkantaraṃ labbhatīti aṭṭhakaṃ hoti eva.
tika-vin07t:864_0: Amūlakacodanāpasaṅgena samūlakacodanālakkhaṇādiṃ dassetuṃ “codetuṃ pana ko labhatī”tiādi
tika-vin07t:864_1: āraddhaṃ. Bhikkhussa sutvā codetītiādi suttaṃ yasmā ye codakassa aññesaṃ vipattiṃ
tika-vin07t:864_2: pakāsenti, tepi tasmiṃ khaṇe codakabhāve ṭhatvāva pakāsenti, tesañca vacanaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin07t:864_3: itaropi yasmā codetuñca asampaṭicchantaṃ tehi titthiyasāvakapariyosānehi paṭhamacodakehi
tika-vin07t:864_4: sampaṭicchāpetuñca labhati, tasmā idha sāvakabhāvena uddhaṭanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:865: Dūtaṃ vātiādīsu “tvaṃ evaṃ gantvā codehī”ti dūtaṃ vā pesetvā yo codetuṃ sakkoti, tassa paṇṇaṃ, mūlasāsanaṃ vā pesetvā. Samayenāti pakatiyā jānanakkhaṇe.
tika-vin07t:866_0: Garukānaṃ dvinnanti pārājikasaṅghādisesānaṃ. Micchādiṭṭhi nāma “natthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattā
tika-vin07t:866_1: dasavatthukā diṭṭhi, sassatucchedasaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ gaṇhāpakadiṭṭhi antaggāhikā nāma.
tika-vin07t:866_2: Ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channanti ājīvahetupi āpajjitabbānaṃ uttarimanussadhammapārājikaṃ,
tika-vin07t:866_3: sañcaritte saṅghādiseso, “yo te vihāre vasati, so arahā”ti pariyāyena thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin07t:866_5: pāṭidesanīyaṃ, sūpodanaviññattiyā dukkaṭanti imesaṃ parivāre vuttānaṃ channaṃ. Na
tika-vin07t:866_6: hetā āpattiyo ājīvahetu eva paññattā sañcarittādīnaṃ aññathāpi āpajjitabbato. Ājīvahetupi
tika-vin07t:866_7: etāsaṃ āpajjanaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ, ājīvahetupi paññattānanti attho. Na kevalañca
tika-vin07t:866_9: santi, tā pana āpattisabhaāgatāya pārājikādīsu chasu eva saṅgayhantīti visuṃ na vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:867_0: Ettāvatā pana sīsaṃ na etīti saṅghādisesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, codanā pana katā eva
tika-vin07t:867_1: hoti. Tiṃsānīti tiṃsaṃ etesamatthīti tiṃsāni, tiṃsādhikānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Navutānīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t:868_0: Attādānaṃ ādātukāmenāti ettha attanā ādātabbato diṭṭhādimūlakehi gahetabbato parassa
tika-vin07t:868_1: vipphandituṃ adatvā paggaṇhanato attādānanti codanā vuccati, taṃ ādātukāmena, codanaṃ
tika-vin07t:869_0: Ubbāhikāyāti ubbahanti viyojenti etāya alajjīnaṃ tajjaniṃ vā kalahaṃ vāti ubbāhikā,
tika-vin07t:869_1: saṅghasammuti, tāya. Vinicchinanaṃ nāma tāya sammatabhikkhūhi vinicchananameva. Alajjussannāya
tika-vin07t:869_2: hi parisāya samathakkhandhake āgatehi dasaṅgehi samannāgatā dve tayo bhikkhū tattheva
tika-vin07t:869_3: vuttāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya sammannitabbā, tehi ca sammatehi visuṃ vā nisīditvā,
tika-vin07t:869_4: tassā eva vā parisāya “aññehi na kiñci kathetabba”nti sāvetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:870_0: Kimhīti kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ, kataravipattiyanti attho. “Kimhi naṃ nāmā”ti idaṃ “katarāya
tika-vin07t:870_1: vipattiyā etaṃ codesī”ti yāya kāyaci viññāyamānāya bhāsāya vuttepi codakassa vinaye
tika-vin07t:870_2: apakataññutāya “sīlācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattīsu katarāyāti maṃ pucchatī”ti ñātuṃ asakkontassa
tika-vin07t:870_3: pucchā, na pana kimhītiādipadatthamattaṃ ajānantassa. Na hi anuvijjako codakaṃ bālaṃ
tika-vin07t:870_4: aparicitabhāsāya “kimhi na”nti pucchati. “Kimhi nampi na jānāsī”ti idampi vacanamattaṃ
tika-vin07t:870_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ na hoti, “kataravipattiyā”ti vutte “asukāya vipattiyā”ti vattumpi
tika-vin07t:870_6: na jānāsīti vacanassa adhippāyameva sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Teneva vakkhati
tika-vin07t:870_7: “bālassa lajjissa nayo dātabbo”ti vatvā ca “kimhi naṃ codesīti sīlavipattiyā”tiādi
tika-vin07t:870_8: adhippāyappakāsanameva nayadānaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana kimhi-naṃ-padānaṃ pariyāyamattadassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:870_9: Na hi bālo “kataravipattiyaṃ naṃ codesī”ti imassa vacanassa atthe ñātepi vipattippabhedanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:870_10: attanā codiyamānaṃ vipattisarūpañca jānituṃ sakkoti, tasmā teneva ajānanena alajjī
tika-vin07t:870_11: apasādetabbo. “Kimhi na”nti idampi upalakkhaṇamattaṃ, aññena vā yena kenaci ākārena
tika-vin07t:871_1: vuttaṃ. Ehitīti hi-kāro ettha āgamo daṭṭhabbo, āgamissatīti attho. Diṭṭhasantānenāti
tika-vin07t:871_2: diṭṭhaniyāmena. Alajjissa paṭiññāya eva kātabbanti vacanapaṭivacanakkameneva dose
tika-vin07t:871_3: āvibhūtepi alajjissa “asuddhoha”nti dosasampaṭicchanapaaññāya eva āpattiyā kātabbanti
tika-vin07t:871_4: attho. Keci pana “alajjissa etaṃ natthīti suddhapaṭiññāya eva anāpattiyā kātabbanti
tika-vin07t:871_5: ayamettha attho saṅgahito”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ anuvijjakasseva niratthakattāpattito
tika-vin07t:871_6: codakeneva alajjipaṭiññāya ṭhātabbato. Dosāpagamapaṭiññā eva hi idha paṭiññāti adhippetā.
tika-vin07t:871_7: Teneva vakkhati “etampi natthīti paṭiññaṃ na detī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:872_0: Tadatthadīpanatthanti alajjissa dose āvibhūtepi tassa dosāpagamapaṭiññāya eva kātabbatādīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin07t:872_1: Vivādavatthusaṅkhāte atthe paccatthikā atthapaccatthikā. Saññaṃ datvāti nesaṃ kathāpacchedatthaṃ,
tika-vin07t:872_2: abhimukhakaraṇatthañca saddaṃ katvā. Vinicchinituṃ ananucchavikoti “asuddho”ti saññāya
tika-vin07t:872_3: codakapakkhe paviṭṭhattā anuvijjakabhāvato bahibhūtattā anuvijjituṃ asakkuṇeyyataṃ
tika-vin07t:872_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sandehe eva hi sati anuvijjituṃ sakkā, asuddhadiṭṭhiyā pana sati
tika-vin07t:872_5: cuditakena vuttaṃ sabbaṃ asaccatopi paṭibhāti, kathaṃ tattha anuvijjanā siyāti.
tika-vin07t:873_0: “Tathā nāsitakova bhavissatī”ti iminā vinicchayaṃ adatvā saṅghato viyojanaṃ nāma
tika-vin07t:873_1: liṅganāsanā viya ayampi eko nāsanappakāroti dasseti. Viraddhaṃ hotīti sañcicca āpattiṃ
tika-vin07t:873_2: sahasā āpanno hoti. “Ādito paṭṭhāya alajjī nāma natthī”ti idaṃ “pakkhānurakkhaṇatthāya
tika-vin07t:873_3: paṭiññaṃ na detī”ti imassa alajjilakkhaṇasambhavassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Paṭicchāditakālato
tika-vin07t:873_4: paṭṭhāya alajjī nāma eva, purimo lajjibhāvo na rakkhatīti attho. Paṭiññaṃ na detīti
tika-vin07t:873_5: sace mayā katadosaṃ vakkhāmi, mayhaṃ anuvattakā bhijjissantīti paṭiññaṃ na deti.
tika-vin07t:873_6: Ṭhāne na tiṭṭhatīti lajjiṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati, kāyavācāsu vītikkamo hoti evāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:873_7: Tenāha “vinicchayo na dātabbo”ti, pubbe pakkhikānaṃ paṭiññāya vūpasamitassāpi adhikaraṇassa
tika-vin07t:873_8: duvūpasantatāya ayampi tathā nāsitakova bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:874_0: Cuditakacodakesu paṭipattiṃ ñatvāti “tumhe amhākaṃ vinicchayena tuṭṭhā bhavissathā”tiādinā
tika-vin07t:874_1: vuttaṃ cuditakacodakesu anuvijjakena paṭipajjitabbakammaṃ ñatvā. Vinicchayo majjheti
tika-vin07t:874_2: āpattīti vā anāpattīti vā vinicchayapariyosānaanuvijjanānaṃ majjhaṃ nāmāti attho.
tika-vin07t:875_0: Amūlakampi samūlakaṃ katvā vadantīti āha “dve mūlānī”ti. Kālena vakkhāmītiādīsu okāsaṃ
tika-vin07t:875_1: kārāpetvā vadanto kālena vadati nāma. Salākaggayāguaggabhikkhācāraṭṭhānādīsu codento
tika-vin07t:875_2: akālena vadati nāma. Dosato vuṭṭhāpetukāmatāya vadanto atthasaṃhitena vadati nāma.
tika-vin07t:875_3: Dosantaroti dosacitto. Pannarasasu dhammesūti “parisuddhakāyasamaācāratā, tathā vacīsamācāratā,
tika-vin07t:875_4: sabrahmacārīsu mettacittatā, bahussutatā, ubhinnaṃ pātimokkhānaṃ svāgatāditā, kālena
tika-vin07t:875_5: vakkhāmī”tiādinā vuttapañcadhammā ca kāruññatā, hitesitā, anukampatā, āpattivuṭṭhānatā,
tika-vin07t:875_6: vinayapurekkhāratāti imesu pannarasasu. Tattha “kāruññatā”ti iminā karuṇā dassitā.
tika-vin07t:875_7: Hitesitāti hitagavesanatā. Anukampatāti tena hitena saṃyojanatā, imehi dvīhipi mettā
tika-vin07t:875_8: dassitā. Āpattivuṭṭhānatāti suddhante patiṭṭhāpanatā. Vatthuṃ codetvā sāretvā paṭiññaṃ
tika-vin07t:876_0: Adhikaraṇaṭṭhenāti adhikātabbaṭṭhena, samathehi vūpasametabbaṭṭhenāti attho. Taṃ
tika-vin07t:876_1: nānattaṃ dassetunti idha anadhippetampi atthuddhāravasena taṃ nānattaṃ dassetunti
tika-vin07t:876_2: adhippāyo. Teneva vakkhati “sesāni atthuddhāravasena vuttānī”ti. Yaṃ adhikiccātiādinā
tika-vin07t:877_0: Gāhanti “asukaṃ codessāmī”ti manasā codanākārassa gahaṇaṃ. Cetananti “codessāmī”ti
tika-vin07t:877_1: uppannacittabyāpārasaṅkhātaṃ cittakammaṃ. Akkhantinti cuditakassa vipattiṃ disvā
tika-vin07t:877_2: uppannaṃ kodhaṃ asahanaṃ, tathā pavattaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci cittacetasikarāsiṃ. Vohāranti
tika-vin07t:877_3: codanāvasappavattavacanaṃ. Paṇṇattinti codanāvasappavattaṃ manasā parikappitaṃ nāmapaṇṇattiṃ.
tika-vin07t:877_4: Attādānaṃ gahetvāti codanaṃ manasā gahetvā. Taṃ adhikaraṇanti taṃ gāhalakkhaṇaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:877_5: Nirujjhati cetanāya khaṇikattā, sā ca samathappattā hotīti evamettha aniṭṭhappasaṅgo
tika-vin07t:877_6: veditabbo. Evaṃ uparipi “tuṇhī hotī”ti iminā vohāravacanassa nirodhaṃ dasseti. Tenāha
tika-vin07t:877_7: “taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samathappattaṃ bhavissatī”ti. “Tasmā paṇṇatti adhikaraṇa”nti aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin07t:877_8: katasanniṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni tassāpi ekaccehi paṭikkhittabhāvaṃ dassetvā puna
tika-vin07t:877_9: tampi paṭisedhetvā aṭṭhakathāsu vuttapaṇṇattiyā eva adhikaraṇataṃ samatthetuṃ “taṃ
tika-vin07t:877_10: paneta”ntiādimāha. Tattha taṃ panetanti paṇṇatti adhikaraṇanti etaṃ gahaṇaṃ virujjhatīti
tika-vin07t:877_11: sambandho. Pārājikādiāpatti ekantaakusalasabhāvā vā abyākatasabhāvā vā hotīti saññāya
tika-vin07t:877_13: dassetuṃ uddhaṭaṃ. Tenāha “na hi te…pe… accantaakusalattā”tiādi. Teti aṭṭhakathācariyā.
tika-vin07t:878_0: Amūlakañceva taṃ adhikaraṇanti ettha amūlakapārājikameva adhikaraṇa-saddena adhippetanti
tika-vin07t:878_1: dassetuṃ “yañceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmā panātiādi pana idhādhippetāya amūlakapārājikāpattiyā
tika-vin07t:878_2: eva paṇṇattibhāvo yujjatīti dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Tattha yāya paṇṇattiyāti sabhāvato
tika-vin07t:878_3: parisuddhepi puggale “pārājiko”tiādinā codakena pavattitaṃ nāmapaṇṇattiṃ sandhāya
tika-vin07t:878_4: vadati. Paññattoti kathito. Adhikaraṇe pavattattāti avijjamānepi manasā āropitamatte
tika-vin07t:879_0: Evaṃ nāmapaṇṇattivasena imasmiṃ sikkhāpade āpattādhikaraṇassa paññattibhāvaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin07t:879_1: idāni atthapaṇṇattivasenāpi dassetuṃ “yasmā vāya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Paññattimattamevāti
tika-vin07t:879_2: avijjamānassa vijjamānākārena manasā āropitaatthapaṇṇattimattamevāti attho. Tañca
tika-vin07t:879_3: kho idhevāti tañca yathāvuttapariyāyena paṇṇattiyā adhikaraṇattaṃ idheva imasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:879_4: eva sikkhāpade. Eketi keci. Taṃ na yuttanti yaṃ ekaccehi aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ, adhikaraṇassa
tika-vin07t:879_5: paṇṇattibhāvaṃ nisedhetvā kusalādiparamatthabhāvaṃ sādhetuṃ “taṃ panetaṃ methunadhammapārājikāpattī”tiādinā
tika-vin07t:879_6: papañcato dassito, taṃ na yuttanti attho. Tattha kāraṇamāha “ādikammikassā”tiādinā,
tika-vin07t:879_7: tena ca tasmiṃ vāde yadi āpatti nāma akusalā vā abyākatā vā bhaveyya, kathaṃ ādikammikassa
tika-vin07t:879_8: anāpatti bhaveyya? Tassāpi akusalādīnaṃ uppannattā bhagavato sikkhāpadapaññattito
tika-vin07t:879_9: paṭṭhāya yāva āpattītipi na sakkā vattuṃ, methunādīsu akusalādīnaṃ sikkhāpadapaññattito
tika-vin07t:879_10: pubbepi samuppattito. Tato eva anupasampannānampi āpattippasaṅgo, gilānādīnaṃ uppannattā
tika-vin07t:879_11: anupaññattiyāpi anāpattiabhāvappasaṅgo ca siyā. Atha mataṃ “na kevalaṃ akusalādi
tika-vin07t:879_12: eva, atha kho bhagavatā paṭikkhittabhāvaṃ jānantassa samuppajjamānā eva akusalādayo
tika-vin07t:879_13: āpattī”ti, tampi asāraṃ, sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ ajānitvā vītikkamantassa methunādīsu
tika-vin07t:879_14: anāpattippasaṅgato, akusalādisabhāvāya ca āpattiyā ekapayogādīsu ekattādipi na siyā.
tika-vin07t:879_15: Na hi sakalampi divasaṃ itthiṃ kāyato amocetvā phusantassa ekamevākusalaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin07t:879_16: bahū vā itthiyo phusitvā apagacchantassa bahūni, yenāpattiyā ekattaṃ, bahuttaṃ vā
tika-vin07t:879_17: siyāti evamādikaṃ ayuttiṃ saṅgahetvā dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:880_0: Tattha vatthuñcāti vītikkamo. Tañhi āpattisammutipaññāpanassa okāsaṭṭhena “vatthū”ti
tika-vin07t:880_2: gottaṃ. Nāmanti avijjamānanāmapaññatti. Tassa pana pārājikanti nāmassa atthabhūtā
tika-vin07t:880_3: āpatti atthapaññatti evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana “vivādādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusala”ntiādi,
tika-vin07t:880_4: “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusala”ntiādi ca suttaṃ tehi samuddhaṭaṃ, tampi na vivādādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:880_5: kusalādibhāvassa pariyāyadesitattāti yaṃ ettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānādivaṇṇanāya
tika-vin07t:880_6: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ viraddhaṭṭhānasodhanatthaṃ vitthārato vuttanti tattheva taṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:880_7: sāratthadīpanīkārakassa akusalādirūpāva āpattīti laddhi, teneva so idhāpi “tasmā
tika-vin07t:880_8: paṇṇattiadhikaraṇanti aṭṭhakathāsu katasanniṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni tampi na yuttanti
tika-vin07t:880_9: dassetuṃ ‘taṃ paneta’ntiādimāhā”ti evaṃ attano laddhiṃ aṭṭhakathācariyassapi laddhiṃ
tika-vin07t:880_10: katvā ganthavirodhampi anoloketvā dassesi. Na hettha buddhaghosācariyo aṭṭhakathāvādaṃ
tika-vin07t:880_12: veditabba”nti sayameva upari kathanato, atha kho dulladdhikānaṃ ekaccānaṃ tattha
tika-vin07t:880_13: vippaṭipattiṃ dassetvā puna taṃ paṭisedhetukāmo ārabhi, teneva ante “eke”ti vuttanti
tika-vin07t:880_14: veditabbaṃ. Vivādādīnaṃ kusalādikatte taṃsamathānampi tabbhāvo āpajjati paramatthesu
tika-vin07t:880_16: adhikaraṇānaṃ samathehi adhikaraṇīyatā, na pana kusalādiparamattharūpānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ
tika-vin07t:880_17: khaṇikatāya sayameva samathappattitoti heṭṭhā samatthitamatthaṃ nigamanavasena dassentena
tika-vin07t:880_18: “iti iminā adhikaraṇaṭṭhenā”ti vuttaṃ, tassa yathāvuttanayena samathehi adhikaraṇīyatāyāti
tika-vin07t:881_0: Anuvādoti vipattīhi upavadanā ceva codanā ca. Tattha upavadanā nāma garahā, akkoso
tika-vin07t:881_1: ca. Pañcapīti mātikāpariyāpannāpattiyo sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kiccayatāti kattabbatā. Sapadānukkamaniddesassāti
tika-vin07t:881_2: ettha padānukkamaniddesoti padabhājanaṃ vuccati, tena sahitassa sikkhāpadassāti attho.
tika-vin07t:882_0: 387. Assāti kattuatthe sāmivacananti āha “etena codakenā”tiādi. Diṭṭhamūlake panāti
tika-vin07t:882_1: “diṭṭhassa hoti pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto”tiādi pāḷivāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:882_2: Tattha itthiyā saddhiṃ rahonisajjādidassanamattavasena pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto
tika-vin07t:882_3: puggalo tena diṭṭho, na pana maggena maggappaṭipādanādidassanavasena. Yadi hi tena
tika-vin07t:882_4: so tathā diṭṭho bhaveyya, asuddhasaññī evāyaṃ tasmiṃ puggale siyā, asuddhasaññāya
tika-vin07t:882_5: ca suddhaṃ vā asuddhaṃ vā codentassa saṅghādiseso na siyā “anāpatti suddhe asuddhadiṭṭhissa,
tika-vin07t:882_6: asuddhe asuddhadiṭṭhissā”tiādivacanato. Tasmā itthiyā saddhiṃ rahonisajjādimattameva
tika-vin07t:882_7: disvāpi “saddho kulaputto, nāyaṃ pārājikaṃ āpajjatī”ti tasmiṃ suddhasaññissa vā vematikassa
tika-vin07t:882_8: vā “suto mayā pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto”tiādinā niyametvā codentasseva saṅghādiseso,
tika-vin07t:882_9: na asuddhasaññissa, tassa pana diṭṭhaṃ sutanti musāvādādipaccayā lahukāpatti evāti
tika-vin07t:882_10: veditabbaṃ. Yadi pana so tasmiṃ suddhadiṭṭhicāvanādhippāyopi diṭṭhaṃ rahonisajjādimattameva
tika-vin07t:882_12: vā na vadati, tassa anāpatti. Adhikaṃ vadantassa pana āpattiyeva “adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭha”nti
tika-vin07t:882_13: vuttattā. Yo pana diṭṭhena rahonisajjādinā paṭhamapārājikena asuddhasaññī hutvā cāvanādhippāyo
tika-vin07t:882_14: adinnādānaṃ ajjhāpajjanto “diṭṭho”ti vā “suto”ti vā ādiṃ vadati, tassāpi na saṅghādiseso
tika-vin07t:882_15: asuddhe asuddhadiṭṭhitāyāti keci vadanti. Aññe pana “yena pārājikena codeti, tena
tika-vin07t:882_16: suddhasaññābhāvā āpattiyevā”ti vadanti, idaṃ yuttaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:882_17: “yena pārājikena codeti, taṃ ‘ayaṃ anajjhāpanno’ti ñatvā cāvanādhippāyena…pe… saṅghādiseso”ti.
tika-vin07t:882_18: Iminā nayena sutādimūlakesupi vinicchayo veditabbo. Aññatra āgatesūti omasavādādīsu
tika-vin07t:882_19: āgatesu. Avassutoti tīhipi dvārehi pārājikavatthubhūtaduccaritānuvassanena tinto.
tika-vin07t:883_0: Koṇṭhoti coro, dussīloti attho. Jeṭṭhabbatikoti kāḷakaṇṇidevīvate niyutto titthiyoti
tika-vin07t:883_1: vadati, sā kira kāḷakaṇṇisirideviyā jeṭṭhāti vuttā. Yadaggenāti yena kāraṇena, yattakenāti
tika-vin07t:883_2: attho. Tadaggenāti etthāpi eseva nayo. No kappetītiādi vematikabhāvadīpanatthameva
tika-vin07t:884_0: 389. Etthāti codanāyaṃ. Tajjanīyādikammaṃ karissāmītiāpattiyā codentassa adhippāyo
tika-vin07t:884_1: kammādhippāyo nāma. Parivāsadānādikkamena āpattito vuṭṭhāpetuṃ āpattiyā codentassa
tika-vin07t:884_2: adhippāyo vuṭṭhānādhippāyo. Uposathaṃ, pavāraṇaṃ vā saṅghe kātuṃ adānatthāya āpattiyā
tika-vin07t:884_3: codayato adhippāyo uposathapavāraṇaṭṭhapanādhippāyo. Asammukhā…pe… dukkaṭanti anuddhaṃsentassapi
tika-vin07t:885_0: Sabbatthevāti sabbāsu aṭṭhakathāsu. Uposathapavāraṇānaṃ ñattikammabhāvato ñattiyā
tika-vin07t:885_1: vattamānāya eva uposathapavāraṇaṭṭhapanaṃ hoti, na niṭṭhitāya, sā ca yya-kāre patte
tika-vin07t:885_2: niṭṭhitā nāma hotīti āha “yya-kāre patte na labbhatī”ti.
tika-vin07t:886_0: Anupāsakoti upāsakopi so bhikkhu na hoti saraṇagamanassāpi paṭippassaddhattāti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:886_1: “Anodissa dhammaṃ kathentassā”ti iminā odissa kathentena okāsaṃ kāretabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:886_2: Āpattiṃ desetvāti okāsākārāpanāpattiṃ desetvā. Yaṃ codeti, tassa upasampannoti saṅkhyupagamanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:886_3: tasmiṃ suddhasaññitā vematikatā vā, yena pārājikena codeti, tassa diṭṭhādivasena
tika-vin07t:886_4: amūlakatā, cāvanādhippāyena “tvaṃ pārājiko”tiādinā niyametvā sammukhā codanā codāpanā,
tika-vin07t:889_0: 391. Navame mettiyaṃ bhikkhuninti liṅganāsanāya nāsitāyapi tassā bhūtapubbavohāraṃ
tika-vin07t:889_1: gahetvā vuttaṃ. Aññabhāgassāti therassa manussajātibhikkhubhāvato aññassa tiracchānajātichagalakabhāvasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin07t:889_2: koṭṭhāsassa. Idanti sāmaññato napuṃsakaliṅgena vuttaṃ, ayaṃ chagalakoti attho. Aññabhāgoti
tika-vin07t:889_4: aññabhāgiyanti paṭhamaviggahassa attho, aññabhāgamatthīti dutiyaviggahassa, dvīhipi
tika-vin07t:889_5: chagalakova vutto. Idāni dvīhipi viggahehi vuttamevatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “yo
tika-vin07t:889_6: hi so”tiādimāha. Tattha yo hi so chagalako vutto, so aññassa bhāgassa hotīti ca aññabhāgiyasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin07t:889_7: labhatīti ca yojanā. Dutiyaviggahassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ “so vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Adhikaraṇanti
tika-vin07t:889_8: veditabboti etthāpi yo hi so “dabbo mallaputto nāmā”ti chagalako vutto, soti ānetvā
tika-vin07t:889_9: sambandhitabbaṃ. Tañhi sandhāyāti “dabbo”ti nāmakaraṇassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ chagalakaṃ
tika-vin07t:889_10: sandhāya. Te bhikkhūti te anuyuñjantā bhikkhū. Āpattiyāpi puggalādhiṭṭhānattā “puggalānaṃyeva lesā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:890_0: 393. Yā ca sā avasāne…pe… codanā vuttāti “bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho
tika-vin07t:890_1: hoti saṅghādisese saṅghādisesadiṭṭhi hoti, tañce pārājikena codetī”tiādiṃ codanābhedaṃ
tika-vin07t:890_2: sandhāya vadati. Sattannampi āpattīnaṃ paccekaṃ pārājikattādisāmaññepi methunādinnādānādivatthuto,
tika-vin07t:890_3: rāgadosattādisabhāvato ca visabhāgatāpi atthīti āha “yasmā pana…pe… na hotī”ti.
tika-vin07t:891_1: ca avipannakammassa nimittato phalūpacārena kammanti vuccatīti āha “taṃ nissāya uppajjanato”ti.
tika-vin07t:891_2: Parivāsādiṃ nissāya mānattādīnaṃ uppajjanato “purimaṃ purima”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:892: 395. Savatthukaṃ katvāti puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā. Dīghādinoti dīgharassādiliṅgassa. Diṭṭhādinoti diṭṭhapubbādino.
tika-vin07t:893: 408. Evaṃ tathāsaññīti aññassa methunādikiriyaṃ disvā “ayaṃ so”ti evaṃ tathāsaññī. Aṅgāni paṭhamaduṭṭhadose vuttasadisāni, idha pana kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādiyanā adhikā.
tika-vin07t:896_0: 410. Dasame bahūnanti dubbalatāya araññādisevāya cittaṃ samāhitaṃ kātuṃ asakkontānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:896_2: paramaṃ assa, na maggalābhoti padaparamo. Abhisambhuṇitvāti nipphādetvā. Dhammato
tika-vin07t:896_3: apetaṃ uddhammaṃ. Paṭikkhittamevāti “na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba”nti
tika-vin07t:896_4: vacanato vuttaṃ, idameva vacanaṃ sandhāya pāḷiyampi “aṭṭha māse”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:897_0: Tīhi koṭīhīti asuddhamūlehi. Ettha ca bhikkhūnaṃ catūsu kulesu pakkapiṇḍiyālopabhojananissitatāya,
tika-vin07t:897_1: macchamaṃsabhojanavirahitassa ca kulassa dullabhatāya tattha laddhesu bhattabyañjanesu
tika-vin07t:897_2: macchamaṃsasaṃsaggasaṅkāya, dunnivāraṇatāya ca bhikkhūnaṃ sarīrayāpanampi na siyāti
tika-vin07t:897_3: bhagavatā macchamaṃsaṃ sabbathā appaṭikkhipitvā tīhi koṭīhi aparisuddhameva paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-vin07t:897_4: Yadi hi taṃ bhagavā sabbathā paṭikkhipeyya, bhikkhū maramānāpi macchādisaṃsaggasaṅkitaṃ
tika-vin07t:897_5: bhattaṃ na bhuñjeyyuṃ, tato taṇḍuladhaññādiṃ paṭiggahetvā nidahitvā sayaṃ pacitvā
tika-vin07t:897_6: bhuñjituṃ tadupakaraṇabhūtaṃ dāsidāsaṃ, udukkhalamusalādikañca bhikkhūnaṃ pattādi
tika-vin07t:897_7: viya avassaṃ gahetuṃ anujānitabbaṃ siyāti titthiyānaṃ viya gahaṭṭhāvāso eva siyā,
tika-vin07t:897_8: na bhikkhuāvāsoti veditabbaṃ. Jālaṃ macchabandhanaṃ. Vāgurā migabandhanī. Kappatīti
tika-vin07t:897_9: yadi tesaṃ vacanena saṅkā na vattati, vaṭṭati, na taṃ vacanaṃ lesakappaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:897_10: Teneva vakkhati “yattha ca nibbematiko hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ kappatī”ti.
tika-vin07t:898_0: Pavattamaṃsanti āpaṇādīsu pavattaṃ vikkāyikaṃ matamaṃsaṃ. Bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāya
tika-vin07t:898_1: akatanti ettha aṭṭhānappayutto eva-saddo, bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya akatamevāti sambandhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:898_2: tasmā bhikkhūnañca maṅgalādīnañcāti missetvā katampi na vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Keci
tika-vin07t:898_3: pana yathāṭhitavasena avadhāraṇaṃ gahetvā “vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. “Vatta”nti
tika-vin07t:899_0: Kappanti asaṅkheyyakappaṃ, “āyukappa”ntipi keci. Mahākappassa hi catutthabhāgo asaṅkheyyakappo,
tika-vin07t:899_1: tato vīsatimo bhāgo saṅghabhedakassa āyukappanti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu kappaṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin07t:899_2: na sameti “kappavināse eva muccatī”tiādi vacanato. Brahmaṃ puññanti seṭṭhaṃ puññaṃ.
tika-vin07t:899_3: Kappaṃ saggamhīti ettha paṭisandhiparamparāya kappaṭṭhatā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:900_1: Kammanānāsaṃvāsakenāti ukkhittabhāvena. “Bhedāya parakkameyyā”ti visuṃ vuttattā bhedanasaṃvattanikassa
tika-vin07t:900_2: adhikaraṇassa samādāya paggaṇhanato pubbepi pakkhapariyesanādivasena saṅghabhedāya
tika-vin07t:900_3: parakkamantassa samanubhāsanakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Yopi cāyaṃ saṅghabhedo hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:901_0: Kammenāti apalokanādinā. Uddesenāti pātimokkhuddesena. Vohārenāti tāhi tāhi upapattīhi
tika-vin07t:901_1: “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādinā vohārena, paresaṃ paññāpanenāti attho. Anusāvanāyāti attano
tika-vin07t:901_2: laddhiyā gahaṇatthameva anu punappunaṃ kaṇṇamūle mantasāvanāya, kathanenāti attho.
tika-vin07t:901_3: Salākaggāhenāti evaṃ anusāvanāya tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā attano pakkhe paviṭṭhabhāvassa
tika-vin07t:901_4: saññāṇatthaṃ “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena. Ettha ca kammameva, uddeso
tika-vin07t:901_5: vā saṅghabhede padhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ, vohārādayo pana saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāgāti veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:902_0: “Lajjī rakkhissatī”ti vacanato āpattibhayena ārocanaṃ lajjīnaṃ eva bhāroti āha “lajjīhi
tika-vin07t:902_1: bhikkhūhī”ti, alajjissapi anārocentassa āpattiyeva. Appaṭinissajjato dukkaṭanti visuṃ
tika-vin07t:902_2: visuṃ vadantānaṃ gaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ. Pahontenāti gantuṃ samatthena, icchantenāti attho.
tika-vin07t:902_3: Āpatti pana aḍḍhayojanabbhantareneva agilānassa vasena veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:903_1: Assāti devadattassa. Apaññatte sikkhāpade samanubhāsanakammasseva abhāvato “na hi
tika-vin07t:903_2: paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamantassā”ti vuttaṃ. Sikkhāpadaṃ paññapenteneva hi samanubhāsanakammaṃ
tika-vin07t:903_3: anuññātaṃ. Uddissa anuññātatoti “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, romanthakassa romanthana”ntiādiṃ
tika-vin07t:903_4: uddissānuññātaṃ sandhāya vadati. Anāpattiyanti anāpattivāre. Āpattiṃ ropetabboti
tika-vin07t:903_5: samanubhāsanāya pācittiyaāpattiṃ ropetabbo. Āpattiyeva na jātāti saṅghādisesāpatti na jātā eva.
tika-vin07t:904_0: “Na paṭinissajjāmī”ti saññāya abhāvena muccanato saññāvimokkhaṃ. Sacittakanti “na
tika-vin07t:904_1: paṭinissajjāmī”ti jānanacittena sacittakaṃ. Yo visaññī vā bhīto vā vikkhitto vā “paṭinissajjitabba”ntipi,
tika-vin07t:904_2: “kammaṃ karissatī”ti vā na jānāti, tassa anāpatti. Bhedāya parakkamanaṃ, dhammakammena
tika-vin07t:904_3: samanubhāsanaṃ, kammavācāpariyosānaṃ, na paṭinissajjāmīti cittena appaṭinissajjananti
tika-vin07t:907_0: 418. Ekādasame yasmā ubbāhikādisammutikammaṃ bahūnampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā “na hi
tika-vin07t:907_1: saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ karotī”ti idaṃ niggahavasena kattabbakammaṃ sandhāya vuttanti
tika-vin07t:907_2: veditabbaṃ. Aṅgāni panettha bhedāya parakkamanaṃ pahāya anuvattanaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā
tika-vin07t:910_0: 424. Dvādasame vambhanavacananti garahavacanaṃ. Saṭa-saddo patitasaddena samānattho,
tika-vin07t:910_1: tassa ca visesanassa paranipātoti āha “tattha tattha patitaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhapaṇṇa”nti.
tika-vin07t:911_0: 426. Cittapariyonāho daḷhakodhova upanāho. Tatopi balavataro dummocanīyo kodhābhisaṅgo.
tika-vin07t:911_1: Codakaṃ paṭippharaṇatāti codakassa paṭiviruddho hutvā avaṭṭhānaṃ. Codakaṃ apasādanāti
tika-vin07t:911_2: vācāya ghaṭṭanā. Paccāropanāti “tvampi sāpattiko”ti codakassa āpattiāropanā. Paṭicaraṇatāti
tika-vin07t:911_3: paṭicchādanatā. Apadānenāti attano cariyāya. Na sampāyanatāti “yaṃ tvaṃ codako vadesi
tika-vin07t:911_4: ‘mayā esa āpattiṃ āpanno diṭṭho’ti, tvaṃ tasmiṃ samaye kiṃ karosi, ayaṃ kiṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t:911_5: kattha ca tvaṃ ahosi, kattha aya”ntiādinā nayena cariyaṃ puṭṭhena sampādetvā akathanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:912_0: “Yassa siyā āpattī”ti iminā nidānavacanena sabbāpi āpattiyo saṅgahitāti āha “yassa
tika-vin07t:912_1: siyā”tiādi. Aṅgāni cettha paṭhamasaṅghabhedasadisāni, ayaṃ pana viseso yathā tattha
tika-vin07t:915_0: 431. Terasame kīṭāgirīti tassa nigamassa nāmaṃ. Tañhi sandhāya parato “na assajipunabbasukehi
tika-vin07t:915_1: bhikkhūhi kīṭāgirismiṃ vatthabba”nti vuttaṃ, gāmanigamato ca pabbājanaṃ, na janapadato.
tika-vin07t:915_2: Tena pana yogato janapadopi “kīṭāgiri”icceva saṅkhyaṃ gatoti āha “evaṃnāmake janapade”ti.
tika-vin07t:916_0: Tatrāti sāvatthiyaṃ. Dhuraṭṭhāneti abhimukhaṭṭhāne, jetavanadvārasamīpeti attho.
tika-vin07t:916_1: Dvīhi meghehīti vassikena, hemantikena cāti dvīhi meghehi. Gaṇācariyehi chahi adhikatāya
tika-vin07t:917_1: rukkharopane akappiyavohāresupi kappiyaudakasiñcanādi vaṭṭatī”ti vakkhamānattā idhāpi
tika-vin07t:917_2: vibhāgaṃ katvā kappiyaudakasiñcanādi visuṃ dassitaṃ. Yathā koṭṭanakhaṇanādikāyikakiriyāpi
tika-vin07t:917_4: ujukaraṇa”nti. Ettha purāṇapaṇṇādiharaṇampi saṅgayhati. Mahāpaccariyavādova pamāṇattā
tika-vin07t:917_5: pacchā vutto. Akappiyavohārepi ekaccaṃ vaṭṭatīti dassetuṃ “na kevalañca sesa”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:917_6: Yaṃkiñci mātikanti sukkhaṃ vā asukkhaṃ vā. Tatthāti ārāmādiatthāya rukkharopane.
tika-vin07t:917_7: Tathāti kappiyavohārapariyāyādīhi ganthāpanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Iminā ca kulasaṅgahatthāya
tika-vin07t:918_0: Vatthupūjanatthāya sayaṃ ganthanaṃ kasmā na vaṭṭatīti codento “nanu cā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:918_1: Yathā ārāmādiatthaṃ kappiyapathaviyaṃ sayaṃ ropetumpi vaṭṭati, tathā vatthupūjanatthāya
tika-vin07t:918_2: sayaṃ ganthanampi kasmā na vaṭṭatīti codakassa adhippāyo. Vuttantiādi parihāro. Atha
tika-vin07t:918_3: “na pana mahāaṭṭhakathāya”nti kasmā vadati? Mahāpaccariādīsu vuttampi hi pamāṇamevāti
tika-vin07t:918_4: nāyaṃ virodho, mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ avuttassa sayaṃ ropanassa tattheva vuttena udakasiñcanena
tika-vin07t:918_6: padaṃ “taṃ katha”nti iminā sambandhitabbaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ adhippāyo – kiñcāpi mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:918_7: sayaṃ ropanaṃ na vuttaṃ, kappiyaudakassa sayaṃ āsiñcanaṃ vuttameva, tasmā yathā ārāmādiatthāya
tika-vin07t:918_8: kappiyaudakaṃ sayaṃ siñcitumpi vaṭṭati, tathā vatthupūjanatthāya ganthanampi kasmā
tika-vin07t:918_9: na vaṭṭatīti. Tampi na virujjhatīti yadetaṃ vatthupūjanatthāyapi ganthanādiṃ paṭikkhipitvā
tika-vin07t:918_10: ārāmādiatthāya sayaṃ ropanasiñcanaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi pāḷiyā saṃsandanato pubbāparaṃ na virujjhati.
tika-vin07t:919_0: Taṃ kathaṃ na virujjhatīti āha “tatra hī”tiādi. Tatrāti ropanasiñcanavisaye. Pupphādīhi
tika-vin07t:919_2: viññāyatīti āha “mālāvacchanti vadanto”tiādi. Etaṃ vuttanti “mālāvacchaṃ ropentipi
tika-vin07t:919_3: ropāpentipi, siñcantipi siñcāpentipī”ti etaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññatra panāti ārāmādiatthāya
tika-vin07t:919_4: mālāvacchādīnaṃ ropane pana. Pariyāyoti sayaṃkaraṇakārāpanasaṅkhāto pariyāyo vohāro
tika-vin07t:919_5: atthavisesoti attho atthi upalabbhati, kulasaṅgahatthattābhāvāti adhippāyo. Evamettha
tika-vin07t:919_7: pāḷiyaṃ paṭikkhittaganthanaganthāpanaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ parato “evaṃ jāna, evaṃ kate
tika-vin07t:919_8: sobheyyā”tiādikappiyavacanehi ganthāpanaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha dosābhāvo samatthito hoti,
tika-vin07t:919_9: “ganthehī”ti āṇattiyā kārāpanasseva ganthāpananti adhippetattā. Tattha pariyāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:919_10: idha ca pariyāyābhāvaṃ ñatvāti tattha “mālāvacchaṃ ropentī”tiādīsu “mālāvaccha”nti
tika-vin07t:920: Sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti aṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayeneva ropanādi, ganthāpanādi ca sabbaṃ veditabbaṃ. Na hettha sandeho kātabboti nigameti.
tika-vin07t:921_0: Haraṇādīsūti vatthupūjanatthāya haraṇādīsu. Kulitthiādīnaṃ atthāya haraṇatoti kulitthiādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:921_1: haraṇasseva visesetvā paṭikkhittattāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “haraṇādhikāre hī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:921_2: Mañjarīti pupphagocchaṃ. Vaṭaṃsakoti kaṇṇassa upari piḷandhanatthaṃ katapupphavikati,
tika-vin07t:921_3: so ca “vaṭaṃso”ti vuccati. Kaṇṇikāti bahūnaṃ pupphānaṃ vā mālānaṃ vā ekato bandhitassa
tika-vin07t:922_0: Kappiyenāti kappiyaudakena. Tesaṃyeva dvinnanti kuladūsanaparibhogānaṃ dvinnaṃ. Dukkaṭanti
tika-vin07t:922_1: kulasaṅgahatthāya sayaṃ siñcane, kappiyavohārena vā akappiyavohārena vā siñcāpane
tika-vin07t:922_2: ca dukkaṭaṃ, paribhogatthāya pana sayaṃ siñcane, akappiyavohārena siñcāpane ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin07t:922_3: Payogabahulatāyāti sayaṃ karaṇe, kāyapayogassa kārāpane ca vacīpayogassa ca bahuttena.
tika-vin07t:923_0: Ganthena nibbattaṃ dāmaṃ ganthimaṃ. Eseva nayo sesesupi. Na vaṭṭatīti vatthupūjanatthāyapi
tika-vin07t:923_1: na vaṭṭati, dukkaṭanti attho. Vaṭṭatīti vatthupūjanatthāya vaṭṭati, kulasaṅgahatthāya
tika-vin07t:924: Nīpapupphaṃ nāma kadambapupphaṃ. Purimanayenevāti “bhikkhussa vā”tiādinā vuttanayena.
tika-vin07t:925_0: Kadalikkhandhamhītiādinā vuttaṃ sabbameva sandhāya “taṃ atioḷārikamevā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:925_1: sabbattha karaṇe, akappiyavacanena kārāpane ca dukkaṭamevāti attho. “Pupphavijjhanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:925_2: kaṇṭakaṃ bandhitumpi na vaṭṭatī”ti imassa upalakkhaṇattā pupphadāmolambanādiatthāya
tika-vin07t:925_3: rajjubandhanādipi na vaṭṭatīti keci vadanti, aññe pana “pupphavijjhanatthaṃ kaṇṭakanti
tika-vin07t:925_4: visesitattā tadatthaṃ kaṇṭakameva bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati, tañca aṭṭhakathāpamāṇenā”ti
tika-vin07t:925_5: vadanti, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Pupphapaṭicchakaṃ nāma daṇḍādīhi kataṃ pupphādhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:925_6: etampi nāgadantakampi sachiddakameva gahetabbaṃ. Asokapiṇḍiyāti asokasākhānaṃ, pupphānaṃ
tika-vin07t:925_7: vā samūhe. Dhammarajju nāma cetiyādīni parikkhipitvā tesañca rajjuyā ca antarā pupphappavesanatthāya
tika-vin07t:925_8: bandharajju. “Sithilavaṭṭitā vā rajjuvaṭṭiantare pupphappavesanatthāya evaṃ bandhā”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin07t:926_0: Matthakadāmanti dhammāsanādimatthakalambakadāmaṃ. Tesaṃyevāti uppalādīnaṃ eva. Vākena
tika-vin07t:926_1: vā daṇḍakena vāti pupphanāḷaṃ phāletvā pupphena ekābaddhaṃ ṭhitavākena, daṇḍakena
tika-vin07t:926_2: ca ekabandhaneneva, etena pupphaṃ bījagāme saṅgahaṃ na gacchati pañcasu bījesu appaviṭṭhattā
tika-vin07t:926_3: paṇṇaṃ viya, tasmā kappiyaṃ akārāpetvāpi kopane doso natthi. Yañca chinnassāpi makuḷassa
tika-vin07t:926_4: vikasanaṃ, tampi atitaruṇassa abhāvā vuḍḍhilakkhaṇaṃ na hoti, pariṇatassa pana makuḷassa
tika-vin07t:926_5: pattānaṃ sinehe pariyādānaṃ gate visuṃbhāvo eva vikāso, teneva chinnamakuḷavikāso
tika-vin07t:926_6: acchinnamakuḷavikāsato parihīno, milātayutto vā dissati. Yañca milātassa udakasaññoge
tika-vin07t:926_7: amilānatāpajjanaṃ, tampi tambulapaṇṇādīsu samānanti vuḍḍhilakkhaṇaṃ na hoti, pāḷiaṭṭhakathādīsu
tika-vin07t:926_8: ca na katthaci pupphānaṃ kappiyakaraṇaṃ āgataṃ, tasmā pupphaṃ sabbathā abījamevāti
tika-vin07t:926_9: viññāyati, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. “Pasibbake viyā”ti vuttattā pupphapasibbake vā
tika-vin07t:926_10: pasibbakasadisabandhe vā yattha katthaci cīvare vā pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:926_11: Bandhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti rajjuādīhi bandhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, pupphasseva pana acchinnadaṇḍavākehi
tika-vin07t:927_0: Pupphapaṭe ca daṭṭhabbanti pupphapaṭaṃ karontassa dīghato pupphadāmassa haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena
tika-vin07t:927_1: pūraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tiriyato haraṇaṃ pana vāyimaṃ nāma hoti, na pūrimaṃ. “Purimaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:927_2: atikkāmetī”ti sāmaññato vuttattā purimaṃ pupphakoṭiṃ phusāpetvā vā aphusāpetvā vā
tika-vin07t:927_3: parikkhipanavasena pana atikkamantassa āpattiyeva. Bandhituṃ vaṭṭatīti puppharahitāya
tika-vin07t:927_4: suttavākakoṭiyā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. “Ekavāraṃ haritvā vā parikkhipitvā vā”ti idaṃ
tika-vin07t:928_0: Parehi pūritanti dīghato pasāritaṃ. Vāyitunti tiriyato harituṃ, taṃ pana ekavārampi
tika-vin07t:928_1: na labbhati. Pupphāni ṭhapentenāti aganthitapupphāni aññamaññaṃ phusāpetvāpi ṭhapentena.
tika-vin07t:928_2: Ghaṭikadāmaolambakoti heṭṭhābhāge ghaṭikākārayutto, dārughaṭikākāro vā olambako.
tika-vin07t:928_3: Suttamayaṃ geṇḍukaṃ nāma. Sabbatthāti ganthimādīsu sabbattha.
tika-vin07t:929_0: Recakanti abhinayaṃ, “evaṃ naccāhī”ti naṭanākāradassananti attho, “cakkaṃ viya attānaṃ
tika-vin07t:929_1: bhamāpana”ntipi keci. Ākāseyeva kīḷantīti “ayaṃ sārī asukapadaṃ mayā nītā”ti evaṃ
tika-vin07t:929_2: mukheneva ubhopi vadantā kīḷanti. Jūtaphalaketi jūtamaṇḍale. Pāsakakīḷāyāti dvinnaṃ
tika-vin07t:929_3: tivaṅgulappamāṇānaṃ dārudantādimayānaṃ pāsakānaṃ catūsu passesu ekakādivasena bindūni
tika-vin07t:929_4: katvā phalake khipitvā uparibhāge diṭṭhabindūnaṃ vasena sāriyo apanetvā kīḷanakajūtakīḷāya.
tika-vin07t:930_0: Mañjaṭṭhi nāma mañjaṭṭharukkhasārakasāvaṃ. Salākahatthanti nāḷikerahīrādīnaṃ kalāpassetaṃ
tika-vin07t:930_1: nāmaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ tharusminti khagge. Usseḷentīti mukhena usseḷanasaddaṃ pamuñcanti,
tika-vin07t:930_2: mahantaṃ abyattasaddaṃ pavattentīti attho. Apphoṭentīti dviguṇitavāmahatthe dakkhiṇahatthena
tika-vin07t:931: 432. Tesanti samāse guṇībhūtāni pabbānipi parāmasati. Bondoti lolo, mandadhātukoti attho. Bhakuṭiṃ katvāti bhamukabhedaṃ katvā. Nelāti niddosā.
tika-vin07t:932: 433. Pāḷiyaṃ “sāriputtā”ti idaṃ ekasesanayena sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ ubhinnaṃ ālapanaṃ, teneva bahuvacananiddeso kato.
tika-vin07t:933_1: pariyosānāni kammakkhandhake āgatāni aṭṭhārasa vattāni. Na pannalomāti na patitamānalomā,
tika-vin07t:934: 437. Parasantakaṃ deti dukkaṭamevāti vissāsagāhena dānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Thullaccayanti ettha bhaṇḍadeyyampi hoti eva.
tika-vin07t:935_0: Tañca kho vatthupūjanatthāyāti mātāpitūnampi pupphaṃ dentena vatthupūjanatthāyeva
tika-vin07t:935_1: dātabbanti dasseti. Maṇḍanatthāya pana sivaliṅgādipūjanatthāyāti ettakameva vuttattā
tika-vin07t:935_2: “imaṃ vikkiṇitvā jīvissantī”ti mātāpitūnaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati, sesañātīnaṃ pana tāvakālikameva
tika-vin07t:935_3: dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Ñātisāmaṇerehevāti tesaṃ gihikammaparimocanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Itareti
tika-vin07t:935_4: aññātakā, tehipi sāmaṇerehi ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vattasīsena haritabbaṃ. Cūḷakanti
tika-vin07t:936_0: Sāmaṇerā…pe… ṭhapentīti arakkhitāgopitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti magge vā
tika-vin07t:936_1: cetiyaṅgaṇe vā. “Sāmaṇerehi dāpetuṃ na labhantī”ti idaṃ sāmaṇerehi gihīnaṃ kammaṃ
tika-vin07t:936_2: kāritaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ, na pana pupphadānaṃ hotīti sāmaṇerānampi na vaṭṭanato.
tika-vin07t:936_3: Vuttañca “sayamevā”tiādi. “Avisesena vutta”nti iminā sabbesampi na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:937: Khīṇaparibbayānanti āgantuke sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paricchinnesupi rukkhesu “idha phalāni sundarānī”tiādiṃ vadantena kulasaṅgaho kato nāma hotīti āha “evaṃ pana na vattabba”nti.
tika-vin07t:938: Rukkhacchallīti rukkhattaco. Abhājanīyattā garubhaṇḍaṃ vuttaṃ. Vuttanayenāti paṇṇadānampi pupphaphalādīsu vuttanayena kulasaṅgaho hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:939_0: Pubbe vuttappakāranti mama vacanena bhagavato pāde vandathātiādinā vuttappakārasikkhāpade
tika-vin07t:939_1: paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ. “Pakkamatāyasmā”ti idaṃ pabbājanīyakammavasena vuttaṃ. Puna “pakkamatāyasmā”ti
tika-vin07t:939_2: idampi pabbājanīyakammakatassa vattavasena vuttaṃ. Ettha ca assajipunabbasukehi ācariyesu
tika-vin07t:939_3: anekavidhesu anācāresu paññapetabbā āpattiyo sikkhāpadantaresu paññattā evāti tā
tika-vin07t:939_4: idha apaññapetvā kuladūsakānaṃ pabbājanīyakammavasena niggahaṃ kātuṃ tattheva sammā
tika-vin07t:939_5: avattitvā kārakasaṅghaṃ chandagāmitādīhi pāpentānaṃ samanubhāsanāya saṅghādisesaṃ
tika-vin07t:939_6: āropitañca idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti veditabbaṃ. Paṭhamasaṅghabhedasadisānevāti
tika-vin07t:939_7: ettha aṅgesupi yathā tattha parakkamanaṃ, evamidha chandādīhi pāpanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
tika-vin07t:942_0: 442. Itare pana yāvatatiyakāti veditabbāti sambandho. Yo hi jaro ekasmiṃ divase āgantvāpi
tika-vin07t:942_1: gato anantaresu dvīsu divasesu anuppajjitvā tatiye divase uppajjati, so tatiyako.
tika-vin07t:942_2: Yo pana tatiyepi anuppajjitvā catutthe eva divase uppajjati, so catutthako cāti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:942_3: Taṃ sandhāyāha “yathā tatiye”tiādi. “Akāmena avasenā”ti iminā appaṭikammakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:942_4: nāma yasmā alajjilakkhaṇaṃ, saggamokkhāvaraṇañca, tasmā āpanno puggalo “pacchā parivasissāmī”ti
tika-vin07t:942_5: vikkhipituṃ na labhati, saṅghena ca anicchantasseva parivāso dātabboti dasseti. Pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:942_6: ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu…pe… abbhetabboti ettha yo bhikkhu ciṇṇamānatto, so bhikkhu abbhetabboti
tika-vin07t:942_7: evaṃ bhikkhusaddadvayassa yojanā veditabbā. Te ca bhikkhū gārayhāti ūnabhāvaṃ ñatvā
tika-vin07t:947: 443. Puttasaddena sāmaññaniddesato, ekasesanayena vā puttīpi gahitāti āha “bahū dhītaro cā”ti. Tadanantaranti bhikkhūnaṃ bhojanānantaraṃ.
tika-vin07t:948_0: 444-5. Taṃ kammanti taṃ methunādiajjhācārakammaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ “sotassa raho”ti idaṃ atthuddhāravasena
tika-vin07t:948_1: vuttaṃ, upari sikkhāpade “na heva kho pana paṭicchanna”ntiādinā etassa sikkhāpadassa
tika-vin07t:948_2: visayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “alañca kho hoti mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsitu”nti
tika-vin07t:948_3: visayantarabhūtasotarahassa visuṃ vakkhamānattā, idha pana cakkhurahova adhippeto
tika-vin07t:948_4: “paṭicchanne āsane”tiādivacanato, “sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti vuttattā
tika-vin07t:949_0: Idāni cakkhuraheneva āpattiṃ paricchinditvā dassento “sacepi hī”tiādimāha. “Pihitakavāṭassā”ti
tika-vin07t:949_1: iminā paṭicchannabhāvato cakkhussa rahova adhippeto, na sotassa rahoti dasseti. Tenāha
tika-vin07t:949_2: “apihitakavāṭassa…pe… anāpatti”nti. Na hi kavāṭapidahanena sotassa raho vigacchati,
tika-vin07t:949_3: cakkhussa raho eva pana vigacchati. “Antodvādasahatthepī”ti idaṃ dutiyasikkhāpade
tika-vin07t:949_4: āgatasotassa rahena āpajjitabbaduṭṭhullavācāpattiyā sabbathā anāpattibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin07t:949_5: vuttaṃ. Dvādasahatthato bahi nisinno hi tattha sotassa rahasabbhāvato duṭṭhullavācāpattiyā
tika-vin07t:949_6: anāpattiṃ na karoti, tathā ca “anāpattiṃ na karotī”ti sāmaññato na vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin07t:949_7: “methunakāyasaṃsaggāpattīhi anāpattiṃ karotī”ti visesetvā vattabbaṃ bhaveyya. Tasmā
tika-vin07t:949_8: tathā taṃ avatvā sabbathā anāpattiṃ dassetumeva “dvādasahatthe”ti vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:949_9: Yadi hi cakkhusseva rahabhāvaṃ sandhāya vadeyya, “antodvādasahatthe”ti na vadeyya
tika-vin07t:949_10: appaṭicchanne tato dūre nisinnepi cakkhussa rahāsambhavato. Yasmā nisīditvā niddāyanto
tika-vin07t:949_11: kapimiddhapareto kiñci kālaṃ cakkhūni ummīleti, kiñci kālaṃ nimmīleti. Tasmā “niddāyantopi
tika-vin07t:950_0: Paṭiladdhasotāpattiphalāti antimaparicchedato vuttaṃ. Nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānoti methunakāyasaṃsaggādivasena
tika-vin07t:950_1: raho nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānoti attho. Tenāha “pārājikena vā”tiādi. Na appaṭijānamānoti
tika-vin07t:950_2: alajjīpi appaṭijānamāno āpattiyā na kāretabbova. So hi yāva dosaṃ na paṭijānāti,
tika-vin07t:950_3: tāva “neva suddho, nāsuddho”ti vā vattabbo, vattānusandhinā pana kāretabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin07t:951: “Paṭiññā lajjīsu katā, alajjīsu evaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin07t:953: Nisajjādīsu…pe… paṭijānamānova tena so bhikkhu kāretabboti ettha paṭijānamānoti pāḷiyaṃ anāgatampi adhikārato āgatamevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:954_0: Vadāpethāti tassa iddhiyā vigatāsaṅkopi taṃ ovadanto āha, anupaparikkhitvā adese
tika-vin07t:954_1: nisinnā “mātugāmena saddhiṃ ekāsane thero raho nisinno”ti evaṃ mādisehipi tumhe tumhākaṃ
tika-vin07t:954_2: avaṇṇaṃ vadāpetha kathāpayittha, mā puna evaṃ karitthāti adhippāyo. Evamakāsinti
tika-vin07t:954_3: nigūhitabbampi imaṃ visesādhigamaṃ pakāsento taṃ saddhāpetumeva evamakāsinti attho.
tika-vin07t:954_4: Rakkheyyāsimanti imaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ aññesaṃ mā pakāsayi.
tika-vin07t:955_0: 451. Nisajjāya pācittiyanti rahonisajjassāde vattamāne pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana so rahonisajjassādaṃ
tika-vin07t:955_1: paṭivinodetvā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārādinā aññavihito, niddūpagato vā anāpatti eva.
tika-vin07t:955_2: Tenāha “assāde uppanne”ti. “Nisinnāya itthiyā”ti iminā nisīdanakkhaṇe assādābhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:955_3: dasseti. Yadi hi nisīdanakkhaṇe assādo uppajjeyya, tena uṭṭhātabbaṃ. Itarathā āpatti
tika-vin07t:955_4: eva itthiyā uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya punappunaṃ nisīdane viya, tatthāpi bhikkhussa uṭṭhahato
tika-vin07t:955_5: anāpatti, tena rahonisajjāpatti akiriyasamuṭṭhānāpi hotīti vadanti. Idaṃ pana aniyatasikkhāpadaṃ,
tika-vin07t:955_6: anantarañcāti dvepi visuṃ āpattipaññāpanavasena paññattāni na honti rahonisajjādīsu
tika-vin07t:955_7: āpattiyā sikkhāpadantaresu paññattattā. Pārājikādiāpattīhi pana kenaci coditassa
tika-vin07t:955_8: anuvijjakehi vinicchayakāraṇanayadassanatthaṃ evaṃ vatthuvasena dvidhā vibhajitvā
tika-vin07t:955_9: paññattāni, imāneva ca yasmā bhikkhunīnampi vinicchayanayaggahaṇāya alaṃ, tasmā tāsaṃ
tika-vin07t:955_10: visuṃ na vuttānīti veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana āpattiṃ paṭijānāti, tassa vasenettha aṅgabhedo
tika-vin07t:956: Idha aniyatavasena vuttānaṃ pārājikasaṅghādisesapācittiyānaṃ tiṇṇampi aññamaññaṃ sadisasamuṭṭhānāditāya vuttaṃ “samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisānevā”ti.
tika-vin07t:959_0: 452. “Na labhati mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya…pe… nisajjaṃ kappetu”nti avatvā “paṭikkhittaṃ
tika-vin07t:959_1: mātugāmenā”tiādinā vuttattā “eko”ti paccattapadaṃ paṭikkhittapadena na sameti, “ekassā”ti
tika-vin07t:960_0: 453. Pariveṇaṅgaṇādīti pariveṇassa māḷakaṃ. Ādi-saddena pākārādiparikkhittaṃ cetiyamāḷakādiṃ
tika-vin07t:960_1: saṅgaṇhāti. Antogadhanti appaṭicchannaṭṭhāne eva pariyāpannaṃ. Idha itthīpi anāpattiṃ
tika-vin07t:960_2: karotīti sambandho. Kasmā pana itthī idheva anāpattiṃ karoti, na purimasikkhāpadeti?
tika-vin07t:960_3: Imassa sikkhāpadassa methunaṃ vinā duṭṭhullavācāya vasena āgatattā. Methunameva hi
tika-vin07t:960_4: itthiyo aññamaññaṃ paṭicchādenti mahāvane dvāraṃ vivaritvā niddūpagatamhi bhikkhumhi
tika-vin07t:960_5: viya. Duṭṭhullaṃ pana na paṭicchādenti, teneva duṭṭhullavācāsikkhāpade “yā tā itthiyo
tika-vin07t:960_6: hirimanā, tā nikkhamitvā bhikkhū ujjhāpesu”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā “itthīpi anāpattiṃ karotī”ti
tika-vin07t:961_0: Kāyenāpi duṭṭhullobhāsasambhavato imasmiṃ sikkhāpade cakkhussa raho, sotassa raho
tika-vin07t:961_1: ca adhippetoti āha “anandho abadhiro”tiādi. Keci pana vibhaṅge “nālaṃ kammaniyanti
tika-vin07t:961_2: na sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu’nti ettakameva vatvā ‘na sakkā hoti kāyasaṃsaggaṃ
tika-vin07t:961_3: samāpajjitu’nti avuttattā appaṭicchannepi ṭhāne raho aññesaṃ abhāvaṃ disvā ekāya
tika-vin07t:961_4: itthiyā kāyasaṃsaggopi sakkā āpajjitunti antodvādasahatthe savanūpacāre ṭhito abadhiropi
tika-vin07t:961_5: andho kāyasaṃsaggassāpi sabbhāvābhāvaṃ na jānātīti kāyena duṭṭhullobhāsanasabbhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:961_6: amanasikatvāpi kāyasaṃsaggāpattiyāpi parihārāya anandho abadhirotiādi vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:961_7: Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “kāyasaṃsaggavasena anandho vutto”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana
tika-vin07t:961_8: kāyena duṭṭhullobhāsanasambhavaṃ amanasikatvā vuttaṃ, kāyasaṃsaggavasenāpīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:961_9: Teneva “imasmiṃ sikkhāpade sotassa raho eva adhippeto…pe… kenaci pana ‘dvepi rahā
tika-vin07t:961_10: idha adhippetā’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana cakkhussa rahābhāvasādhanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:961_11: “na hi appaṭicchanne okāse cakkhussa raho sambhavatī”tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ na yuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:961_12: atidūratare ṭhitassa kāyena obhāsanampi hatthaggāhādīnipi sallakkhetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-vin07t:961_13: Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “cakkhussa raho”ti vuttaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ appaṭikkhittaṃ. Na kevalañca
tika-vin07t:961_14: appaṭikkhittaṃ, atha kho “anandho badhiroti ca andho vā abadhiropi na karotī”ti ca
tika-vin07t:961_15: vuttaṃ, tasmā dvepi rahā idha gahetabbā. “Antodvādasahatthe”tiiminā sotassa raho
tika-vin07t:961_16: dvādasahatthena paricchinnoti idaṃ dasseti. Cakkhussa raho pana yattha ṭhitassa kāyavikārādayo
tika-vin07t:961_17: na paññāyanti, tena paricchinditabboti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Badhiro pana cakkhumāpīti duṭṭhullavācāsaṅghādisesaṃ
tika-vin07t:961_18: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Duṭṭhullāpatti vuttāti purimasikkhāpade vuttehi adhikavasena duṭṭhullāpatti
tika-vin07t:961_19: ca vuttāti evamattho gahetabbo, na pana duṭṭhullāpatti evāti kāyasaṃsaggassāpi idha
tika-vin07t:961_20: gahetabbato. Teneva “pārājikāpattiñca parihāpetvā”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ, itarathā
tika-vin07t:962_0: Tisamuṭṭhānantiādi pana purimasikkhāpade āgatehi adhikassa duṭṭhullavācāsaṅghādisesassa
tika-vin07t:962_1: vasena vuttaṃ kāyasaṃsaggādīnampi purimasikkhāpade eva vuttattā, idha pana na vuttantipi
tika-vin07t:968: 459. Samitāvināti samitapāpena. Gotamakacetiyaṃ nāma gotamayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāne katavihāro vuccati.
tika-vin07t:969_0: 461. Navamaṃ vā dasamaṃ vāti bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ. Sace bhaveyyāti sace kassaci
tika-vin07t:969_1: kaṅkhā bhaveyya. Vuttasadisanti dasamaṃ vāti vuttasadisaṃ paricchedasadisaṃ, “vuttasadisamevā”tipi
tika-vin07t:969_2: likhanti. Dhāretunti ettha āhāti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:970_0: 463. Sūciyā paṭisāmananti sūcighare saṃgopanaṃ, idañca sūcikammassa sabbassa pariniṭṭhitabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:970_1: vuttaṃ. Etanti naṭṭhacīvaraṃ. Etesampīti naṭṭhacīvarādīni parāmasati, tena cīvarapalibodhābhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:970_2: dasseti. Dutiyassa palibodhassāti āvāsapalibodhassa. Ettha ca niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ,
tika-vin07t:970_3: ubbhatasmiṃ kathineti dvīhi padehi dvinnaṃ palibodhānaṃ abhāvadassanena atthatakathinassa
tika-vin07t:970_4: pañcamāsabbhantare yāva cīvarapalibodhaāvāsapalibodhesu aññataraṃ na upacchijjati,
tika-vin07t:970_5: tāva atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Pakkamanaṃ anto assāti pakkamanantikā,
tika-vin07t:970_6: evaṃ sesāpi veditabbā. Vitthāro panettha āgataṭṭhāne āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin07t:971_0: Dasāhaparamaṃ kālanti accantasaṃyogavacanaṃ. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti…pe… dasāhaparamabhāvoti
tika-vin07t:971_1: idaṃ dasāhaparamatāpadassa atthamattadassanaṃ, dasāhaparamabhāvoti idañhi vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:971_2: hotīti evamettha yojanā veditabbā. Ayamatthotiādi dasāhaparamapadasseva adhippetatthadassanavasena
tika-vin07t:971_3: vuttaṃ. Tattha ettako kāloti “dasāhaparamatā”ti vutto yo kālo, so ettako kāloti attho.
tika-vin07t:972_0: Khomanti khomasuttehi vāyitaṃ khomapaṭacīvaraṃ, taṃ vākamayanti vadanti. Kappāsasuttehi
tika-vin07t:972_1: vāyitaṃ kappāsikaṃ, evaṃ sesānipi. Kambalanti eḷakādīnaṃ lomamayasuttena vāyitapaṭaṃ.
tika-vin07t:972_2: Bhaṅganti khomasuttādīni sabbāni, ekaccāni vā missetvā vāyitaṃ cīvaraṃ. Bhaṅgampi
tika-vin07t:972_3: vākamayamevāti keci. Dukūlaṃ pattuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭaṃ cīnapaṭaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnanti
tika-vin07t:972_4: imāni pana cha cīvarāni etesaññeva anulomānīti visuṃ na vuttāni. Dukūlañhi sāṇassa
tika-vin07t:972_5: anulomaṃ vākamayattā. “Pattuṇṇaṃ koseyyaviseso”ti abhidhānakose vuttaṃ. Somāradese,
tika-vin07t:972_6: cīnadese ca jātavatthāni somāracīnapaṭāni. Pattuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni
tika-vin07t:972_7: pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā. Iddhijanti ehibhikkhūnaṃ puññiddhiyā nibbattacīvaraṃ.
tika-vin07t:972_8: Kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ, devadinnañca khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃ sabbesaṃ anulomāni.
tika-vin07t:972_9: Manussānaṃ pakatividatthiṃ sandhāya “dve vidatthiyo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Iminā dīghato vaḍḍhakīhatthappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:972_10: vitthārato tato upaḍḍhappamāṇaṃ vikappanupaganti dasseti. Tathā hi “sugatavidatthi
tika-vin07t:972_11: nāma idāni majjhimassa purisassa tisso vidatthiyo, vaḍḍhakīhatthena diyaḍḍho hattho
tika-vin07t:972_12: hotī”ti kuṭikārasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā sugataṅgulena dvādasaṅgulā sugatavidatthi
tika-vin07t:972_13: vaḍḍhakīhatthena diyaḍḍho hatthoti siddhaṃ. Evañca katvā “sugataṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ
tika-vin07t:973_0: Taṃ atikkāmayatoti ettha tanti cīvaraṃ, kālaṃ vā parāmasati. Tassa yo aruṇoti cīvaruppādadivasassa
tika-vin07t:973_1: yo atikkanto aruṇo. Cīvaruppādadivasena saddhinti cīvaruppādadivasassa ādibhūtena
tika-vin07t:973_2: atikkantaaruṇena saddhinti attho, idañca bhagavatā “dasāhaparama”nti vatvā puna “ekādase
tika-vin07t:973_4: saddhi”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ. “Dasame aruṇe”ti vutte eva hi dasāhaparamena saddhiṃ sameti.
tika-vin07t:973_5: Divasapariyosānassa avadhibhūtaanāgatāruṇavasena hi divasaṃ atikkantaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin07t:973_6: na pana divasassa ādibhūtāruṇavasena parivāsādīsu tathā aggahaṇato, idha pana bhagavatā
tika-vin07t:973_7: divasassa ādiantaparicchedadassanavasena “ekādase aruṇuggamane”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:973_8: divasassa ādibhūtaṃ taṃdivasanissitampi aruṇaṃ gahetvā “ekādase aruṇuggamane nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:973_9: hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Aruṇoti cettha sūriyuggamanassa purecaro vaḍḍhanaghanaratto pabhāvisesoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:974: Vacanīyoti saṅghāpekkho. Vacanabhedoti “ñattiyaṃ dve āpattiyo saratī”tiādinā vattabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:975_0: 468. “Na idha saññā rakkhatī”ti idaṃ vematikañca anatikkantasaññañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:975_1: Yopi evaṃsaññī tassapīti yo anatikkantasaññī, vematiko vā, tassapīti attho. Anaṭṭhato
tika-vin07t:975_2: aviluttassa visesamāha “pasayhāvahāravasenā”ti. Theyyāvahāravasena gahitampi idha naṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:976_0: Anāpatti aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvātiādi nisīdanasanthataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yena hi
tika-vin07t:976_1: purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ anādiyitvā navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin07t:976_2: tassa taṃ nissaggiyampi tato aññassa paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjantassa anāpattikaranti
tika-vin07t:977_0: 469. Ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātunti saṅghāṭiādināmena adhiṭṭhātuṃ. “Na vikappetu”nti iminā
tika-vin07t:977_1: nāmena na vikappetuṃ, etena vikappitaticīvaro tecīvariko na hoti. Tassa tasmiṃ adhiṭṭhitaticīvare
tika-vin07t:977_2: viya avippavāsādinā kattabbavidhi na kātabboti dasseti, na pana vikappane dosoti.
tika-vin07t:977_3: Tato paranti catumāsato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhuñjituṃ anuññātanti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t:977_4: aññe pana “vikappetvā yāva āgāmivassānaṃ, tāva ṭhapetumeva vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, apare
tika-vin07t:977_5: pana “vikappane na doso, tathā vikappitaṃ parikkhārādināmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:978_0: Muṭṭhipañcakanti muṭṭhiyā upalakkhitaṃ pañcakaṃ, catuhatthe minitvā pañcamaṃ hatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:978_1: muṭṭhiṃ katvā minitabbanti adhippāyo. Keci pana “muṭṭhihatthānaṃ pañcakaṃ muṭṭhipañcakaṃ,
tika-vin07t:978_2: tasmā pañcapi hatthe muṭṭhiṃ katvāva minitabbā”ti vadanti. Muṭṭhittikanti etthāpi
tika-vin07t:978_3: eseva nayo. Dvihatthena antaravāsakena timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ sakkāti āha “pārupanenā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:978_4: Atirekanti sugatacīvarappamāṇato adhikaṃ. Ūnakanti muṭṭhipañcakādito ūnakaṃ, tena
tika-vin07t:978_5: ca tesu ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:979_0: Imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmīti imaṃ saṅghāṭiadhiṭṭhānaṃ ukkhipāmi pariccajāmīti attho.
tika-vin07t:979_1: Kāyavikāraṃ karontenāti hatthena cīvaraṃ parāmasantena, cālentena vā. Vācāya adhiṭṭhātabbāti
tika-vin07t:979_2: ettha kāyenapi cāletvā vācampi bhinditvā kāyavācāhi adhiṭṭhānampi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ
tika-vin07t:979_3: “kāyena aphusitvā”ti vuttattā. Duvidhanti ahatthapāsahatthapāsavasena duvidhaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin07t:979_4: hatthapāso nāma aḍḍhateyyahattho vuccati. Dvādasahatthanti keci vadanti, taṃ idha
tika-vin07t:979_5: na sameti. “Sāmantavihāre”ti idaṃ ṭhapitaṭṭhānasallakkhaṇayogge ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:979_6: Tato dūre ṭhitampi ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhentena adhiṭṭhātabbameva. Tatthapi cīvarassa
tika-vin07t:979_7: ṭhapitabhāvasallakkhaṇameva pamāṇaṃ. Na hi sakkā sabbathā ṭhānaṃ sallakkhetuṃ. Ekasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:979_8: vihāre ṭhapetvā tato aññasmiṃ ṭhapitanti adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Keci pana “tathāpi
tika-vin07t:979_9: adhiṭṭhite na doso”ti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin07t:979_11: paccuddharāmī”ti parikkhāracoḷassa paccuddhāraṃ dasseti. Etena ca tecīvaradhutaṅgaṃ
tika-vin07t:979_12: pariharantena paṃsukūlādivasena laddhaṃ vatthaṃ dasāhabbhantare katvā rajitvā pārupituṃ
tika-vin07t:979_13: asakkontena parikkhāracoḷavasena adhiṭṭhahitvāva dasāhaṃ atikkametabbaṃ, itarathā
tika-vin07t:979_14: nissaggiyaṃ hotīti dasseti. Teneva “rajitakālato pana paṭṭhāya nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:979_15: dhutaṅgacoro nāma hotī”ti visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. “Puna adhiṭṭhātabbānī”ti idañca saṅghāṭiāditicīvaranāmena
tika-vin07t:979_16: adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitukāmassa vasena vuttaṃ, itarassa pana purimādhiṭṭhānameva
tika-vin07t:979_17: alanti veditabbaṃ. “Puna adhiṭṭhātabba”nti iminā kappabindupi dātabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:980: Baddhasīmāyaṃ avippavāsasīmāsammutisambhavato na tattha dupparihāratāti āha “abaddhasīmāyaṃ dupparihāra”nti.
tika-vin07t:981_0: Atirittappamāṇāya chedanakaṃ pācittiyanti āha “anatirittappamāṇā”ti. Tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā
tika-vin07t:981_1: vikappetabbāti vassikamāsato paraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā, iminā
tika-vin07t:981_2: catunnaṃ vassikamāsānaṃ upari adhiṭṭhānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti viññāyati tato paccuddharāyogā.
tika-vin07t:981_4: adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ natthi. Parivāraṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin07t:981_5: “atthāpatti hemante āpajjati, no gimhe”ti ettha idaṃ vuttaṃ “kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchime
tika-vin07t:981_6: pāṭipadadivase vikappetvā ṭhapitaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsento hemante āpajjati, kurundiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:981_7: pana ‘kattikapuṇṇamadivase apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī’ti vuttaṃ, tampi suvuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:981_8: ‘catumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetu’nti hi vutta”nti. Tattha mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:981_9: nivāsanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana apaccuddhārapaccayā, tasmā
tika-vin07t:981_10: kurundiyaṃ vuttanayenāpi vassikasāṭikā vassānamāsātikkamepi adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti
tika-vin07t:981_11: paññāyati. Adhiṭṭhānavijahanesu ca vassānamāsaābādhānaṃ vigamena vijahanaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin07t:981_12: na uddhaṭaṃ, tasmā samantapāsādikāyaṃ āgatanayena yāva paccuddhārā adhiṭṭhānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti
tika-vin07t:981_13: gahetabbaṃ. Nahānatthāya anuññātattā “vaṇṇabhedamattarattāpi cesā vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:981_14: “Dve pana na vaṭṭantī”ti iminā saṅghāṭiādīsu viya dutiye adhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhati, atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin07t:981_15: hotīti dasseti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ cīvaravasena paribhogakiccassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya anāpatti
tika-vin07t:981_16: vuttā senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇe viya. Yaṃ pana “paccattharaṇampi
tika-vin07t:981_17: adhiṭṭhātabba”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ senāsanatthāyevāti niyamitaṃ na hoti navasu cīvaresu
tika-vin07t:981_18: gahitattā, tasmā attano nāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā nidahitvā parikkhāracoḷaṃ viya yathā
tika-vin07t:981_19: tathā viniyujjitabbamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Pāvāro kojavoti imesampi paccattharaṇādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:981_20: lokepi voharaṇato senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇato visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin07t:982_0: “Hīnāyāvattanenā”ti idaṃ antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpajjitvā bhikkhupaṭiññāya ṭhitassa ceva
tika-vin07t:982_1: titthiyapakkantassa ca bhikkhuniyā ca bhikkhunibhāve nirapekkhatāya gihiliṅgatitthiyaliṅgaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:982_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya gihibhāvūpagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti keci vadanti,
tika-vin07t:982_3: taṃ na yuttaṃ tadāpissa upasampannattā, cīvarassa ca tassa santakattāvijahanato.
tika-vin07t:982_4: Pamāṇacīvarassāti pacchimappamāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dve cīvarāni pārupantassāti gāmappavese
tika-vin07t:982_5: diguṇaṃ katvā saṅghāṭiyo pārupanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Esa nayo”ti iminā pamāṇayuttesu
tika-vin07t:982_6: yattha katthaci chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatītiādiatthaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin07t:983_0: Aññaṃ pacchimappamāṇaṃ nāma natthīti sutte āgataṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Idāni tameva
tika-vin07t:983_1: vibhāvetuṃ “yañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ na sameti, saṅghāṭiādīnaṃ muṭṭhipañcakādiheṭṭhimappamāṇassa
tika-vin07t:984_0: Mahantaṃ vā khuddakaṃ karotīti ettha atimahantaṃ cīvaraṃ muṭṭhipañcakādipacchimappamāṇayuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:984_1: katvā samantato chindanenāpi vicchindanakāle chijjamānaṭṭhānaṃ chiddasaṅkhyaṃ na
tika-vin07t:984_2: gacchati adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati evāti sijjhati, “ghaṭetvā chindati, na bhijjatī”ti
tika-vin07t:984_3: vacanena ca sameti. Parikkhāracoḷaṃ pana vikappanupagapacchimappamāṇato ūnaṃ katvā
tika-vin07t:984_4: chinnaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati adhiṭṭhānassa anissayattā. Tāni puna baddhāni ghaṭitāni
tika-vin07t:984_5: adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti veditabbaṃ. Keci pana “vassikasāṭikacīvare dvidhā chinne yadipi
tika-vin07t:984_6: ekekaṃ khaṇḍaṃ pacchimapacchimappamāṇaṃ pahoti, ekasmiṃyeva khaṇḍe adhiṭṭhānaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin07t:984_7: na itare, “dve pana na vaṭṭantī”ti vuttattā. Nisīdanakaṇḍuppaṭicchādīsupi eseva nayoti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:985_0: Sammukhe pavattā sammukhāti paccattavacanaṃ, tañca vikappanavisesanaṃ, tasmā “sammukhe”ti
tika-vin07t:985_1: bhummatthe nissakkavacanaṃ katvāpi atthaṃ vadanti, abhimukheti attho. Atha vā sammukhena
tika-vin07t:985_2: attano vācāya eva vikappanā sammukhāvikappanā. Parammukhena vikappanā parammukhāvikappanāti
tika-vin07t:985_3: karaṇatthenāpi attho daṭṭhabbo, ayameva pāḷiyā sameti. Sannihitāsannihitabhāvanti
tika-vin07t:985_4: āsannadūrabhāvaṃ. Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettakeneva vikappanākiccassa niṭṭhitattā,
tika-vin07t:985_5: atirekacīvaraṃ na hotīti dasāhātikkame na nissaggiyaṃ janetīti adhippāyo. Paribhuñjituṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:985_6: na vaṭṭatīti sayaṃ apaccuddharaṇaṃ paribhuñjane pācittiyaṃ, adhiṭṭhāne paresaṃ vissajjane
tika-vin07t:986_1: vaṭṭatīti attho, etena ca paccuddhārepi kate cīvarampi vikappitacīvarameva hoti,
tika-vin07t:986_2: na atirekacīvaraṃ. Taṃ pana ticīvarādināmena adhiṭṭhātukāmena adhiṭṭhahitabbaṃ, itarena
tika-vin07t:986_3: vikappitacīvarameva katvā paribhuñjitabbanti dasseti. Keci pana “yaṃ vikappitacīvaraṃ,
tika-vin07t:986_4: taṃ yāva aparibhogakālā apaccuddharāpetvāva nidahitabbaṃ, paribhogakāle pana sampatte
tika-vin07t:986_5: paccuddharāpetvā adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Yadi hi tato purepi paccuddharāpeyya,
tika-vin07t:986_6: paccuddhāreneva vikappanāya vigatattā atirekacīvaraṃ nāma hoti, dasāhātikkame ca
tika-vin07t:986_7: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ aparibhuñjitvāva ṭhapetabbaṃ, tadeva vikappetabbaṃ,
tika-vin07t:986_8: paccuddhāre ca kate antodasāheyeva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Yañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘tato pabhuti
tika-vin07t:986_9: paribhogādayopi vaṭṭantī’tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ pāḷiyā virujjhatī”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ
tika-vin07t:986_10: matimattameva. Pāḷiyañhi “antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vikappetī”ti ca “sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin07t:986_11: vikappetvā apaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjeyya pācittiya”nti ca “anāpatti so vā deti, tassa
tika-vin07t:986_12: vā vissāsanto paribhuñjatī”ti ca sāmaññato vuttattā, aṭṭhakathāyañca “imaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin07t:986_13: vā vikappanaṃ vā paccuddharāmī”tiādinā paccuddhāraṃ adassetvā “mayhaṃ santakaṃ paribhuñja
tika-vin07t:986_14: vā vissajjehi vā”ti evaṃ attano santakattaṃ amocetvāva paribhogādivaseneva paccuddhārassa
tika-vin07t:986_15: vuttattā, “tato pabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭantī”ti adhiṭṭhānaṃ vināpi visuṃ paribhogassa,
tika-vin07t:986_16: nidahanassa ca vuttattā vikappanānantarameva paccuddharāpetvā anadhiṭṭhahitvā eva
tika-vin07t:986_17: ticīvaravirahitaṃ vikappanārahaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjituṃ, nidahituñca idaṃ pāṭekkaṃ
tika-vin07t:986_18: vinayakammanti khāyati. Apica bahūnaṃ pattānaṃ vikappetuṃ, paccuddhāretuñca vuttattā
tika-vin07t:986_19: paccuddhārena tesaṃ atirekapattatā dassitāti sijjhati tesu ekasseva adhiṭṭhātabbato.
tika-vin07t:987_0: Paññattikovido na hotīti evaṃ vikappite “anantarameva evaṃ paccuddharitabba”nti vinayakammaṃ
tika-vin07t:987_1: na jānāti. Tenāha “na jānāti paccuddharitu”nti, imināpi cetaṃ veditabbaṃ “vikappanānantarameva
tika-vin07t:988_0: Avisesena vuttavacananti ticīvarādīnaṃ sādhāraṇavacanena vuttavacanaṃ. Yaṃ panettha
tika-vin07t:988_1: “viruddhaṃ viya dissatī”ti vatvā taṃ virodhāsaṅkaṃ nivattetuṃ “ticīvarasaṅkhepena…pe…
tika-vin07t:988_2: vikappanāya okāso dinno hotī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ “adhiṭṭheti vikappetī”ti sāmaññato vuttepi
tika-vin07t:988_3: ticīvarampi vikappetīti ayamattho na sijjhati, “ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti
tika-vin07t:988_4: visesetvā vuttattā. Yaṃ pana adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, taṃ adhiṭṭhāti. Yaṃ ticīvaravirahitaṃ,
tika-vin07t:988_5: taṃ vikappetabbaṃ, taṃ vikappetīti evamattho sijjhatīti. Tasmā ettha pubbāparavirodho
tika-vin07t:988_6: na dissati sāmaññavacanassa vuttāvaseseyeva avatiṭṭhanato. Yaṃ panettha ticīvarassāpi
tika-vin07t:988_7: vikappanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “ticīvaraṃ ticīvarasaṅkhepenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ticīvarasaṅkhepena
tika-vin07t:988_8: parihariyamānesu ekampi paccuddharitvā vikappetuṃ na vaṭṭati, ticīvarato pana ekaṃ
tika-vin07t:988_9: vā sakalameva vā apanetvā aparaṃ ticīvaraṃ ticīvarasaṅkhepena pariharitukāmassa vā
tika-vin07t:988_11: vā purimaṃ adhiṭṭhitacīvaraṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetuṃ vaṭṭatīti evamadhippāyena
tika-vin07t:988_12: “ticīvare ekena cīvarena vippavasitukāmo hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ siyā, iccetaṃ pāḷiyā saddhiṃ
tika-vin07t:988_13: sameti. Atha punapi tadeva ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhātukāmo hutvā vippavāsasukhatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:988_14: paccuddharitvā vikappetīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ siyā, taṃ “ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ
tika-vin07t:988_15: na vikappetu”nti iminā vacanena na sameti. Yadi hi sesacīvarāni viya ticīvarampi
tika-vin07t:988_16: paccuddharitvā vikappetabbaṃ siyā, “ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti idaṃ vacanameva
tika-vin07t:988_17: niratthakaṃ siyā sesacīvarehi ticīvarassa visesābhāvā. Tasmā “vikappetī”ti idaṃ ticīvaravirahitameva
tika-vin07t:988_18: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ticīvaraṃ pana vikappetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti viññāyati, teneva dutiyakathinasikkhāpadassa
tika-vin07t:988_19: anāpattivāre “vikappetī”ti idaṃ na vuttaṃ, vīmaṃsitvā yathā pāḷiyā saddhiṃ na virujjhati,
tika-vin07t:989_0: Tuyhaṃ demītiādīsu pariccattattā manasā asampaṭicchantepi sampadānabhūtasseva santakaṃ
tika-vin07t:989_1: hoti, so icchitakkhaṇe gahetuṃ labhati. Itthannāmassāti parammukhe ṭhitaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin07t:989_2: vadati. Yassa pana ruccatītiādi ubhohipi pariccattatāya assāmikataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:990_0: “Taṃ na yujjatī”ti idaṃ antodasāhe eva vissāsaggahaṇaṃ sandhāya anāpattivārassa āgatattā,
tika-vin07t:990_1: idha nissaggiyacīvarassa kappiyabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ lesena gahitattā ca vuttaṃ, keci
tika-vin07t:990_2: pana “parehi sabhāgena acchinne, vissāsaggahite ca puna laddhe doso na dissatī”ti
tika-vin07t:990_3: vadanti. Anadhiṭṭhānenāti kāyavācāhi kattabbassa akaraṇenāti adhippāyo. Cīvarassa
tika-vin07t:990_4: attano santakatā, jātipamāṇayuttatā, chinnapalibodhabhāvo, atirekacīvaratā, dasāhātikkamoti
tika-vin07t:993: 473. Dutiye avippavāseti avippavāse nipphādetabbe, vippavāsadosābhāve sādhetabbe kattabbā sammutīti attho.
tika-vin07t:994: 475. Paṭisiddhapariyāpannenāti vippavasituṃ paṭisiddhesu tīsu cīvaresu antogadhena, ekena ca avayave samudāyopacāraṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:995_1: vatvā puna sayampi “sabhāye”ti iminā voharanto sabhā-saddassa pariyāyo sabhāya-saddo
tika-vin07t:995_2: napuṃsakaliṅgayutto atthīti dasseti. “Sabhāyanti liṅgabyattayena sabhā vuttā”ti vā
tika-vin07t:995_3: pāṭho. Liṅgabyattayena sabhāti ca liṅgantarayutto sabhāsaddapariyāyo sabhāyasaddoti attho.
tika-vin07t:996_0: Sabhāyaṃ gacchatīti sabhaṃ gacchati. Vasitabbaṃ natthīti cīvarahatthapāseyeva vasitabbaṃ
tika-vin07t:996_1: natthīti attho. Tassāti vīthiyā. Sabhāyassa ca dvārassa ca hatthapāsā na vijahitabbanti
tika-vin07t:996_2: ettha sabhāyadvārānamantare vīthi gehāpi gahitā eva honti ādipariyosānānaṃ gahitattā.
