tika-vin07t:996_3: Ettha ca dvāravīthigharesu vasantena gāmappavesanasahaseyyādidosaṃ pariharitvā supaṭicchannatādiyutteneva
tika-vin07t:996_4: bhavitabbaṃ, sabhā pana yadi sabbesaṃ vasanatthāya sālāsadisā katā, antarārāme viya
tika-vin07t:996_5: yathāsukhaṃ vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Parikkhittatāya ca ekūpacārataṃ, aparikkhittatāya
tika-vin07t:996_7: bahigāmato sanniviṭṭhāni gahitāni antogāme ṭhitānaṃ gāmaggahaṇeneva gahitattā. Sabbatthāti
tika-vin07t:996_8: gāmanigamanivesanādīsu pannarasasu. Parikkhepādīti ādi-saddena aparikkhepasseva gahaṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:996_9: na ekakulādīnampi tesaṃ ekūpacāratānānūpacāratānimittatābhāvā. Ettha ca satthassa
tika-vin07t:996_10: katipāhaṃ katthaci niviṭṭhasseva parikkhepo hoti, na gacchantassa.
tika-vin07t:997: 482-7. Gāmato bahi issarānaṃ samuddatīrādīsu katabhaṇḍasālā udositoti āha “yānādīna”ntiādi. Muṇḍacchadanapāsādoti nātiucco candikaṅgaṇayutto sikharakūṭamālādivirahito pāsādo.
tika-vin07t:998_0: 489. Pariyādiyitvāti ajjhottharitvā. Nadīparihāroti visuṃgāmādīnaṃ viya nadīparihārassa
tika-vin07t:998_1: avuttattā cīvarahatthapāso evāti vadanti, aññe pana “iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena nadīparihāropi
tika-vin07t:998_2: visuṃ siddho, nadiyā hatthapāso na vijahitabbo”ti vadanti. Vihārasīmanti avippavāsasīmaṃ
tika-vin07t:998_3: sandhāyāha. Ettha ca vihārassa nānākulasantakabhāvepi avippavāsasīmāparicchedabbhantare
tika-vin07t:998_4: sabbattha cīvaraavippavāsasambhavato tassā padhānattā tattha satthaparihāro na labbhatīti
tika-vin07t:998_5: “vihāraṃ gantvā vasitabba”nti vuttaṃ. “Satthasamīpe”ti idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ abbhantaraparicchedavasena
tika-vin07t:998_6: vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ nānākulassa sattho hoti, satthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā hatthapāsā na
tika-vin07t:1000_0: 491-4. Vihāro nāma upacārasīmā. Tattha yasmiṃ vihāreti tassa antopariveṇādiṃ sandhāya
tika-vin07t:1000_1: vuttaṃ, ekakulādisantakatā cettha kārāpakānaṃ vasena. Chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsassāti ujukaṃ
tika-vin07t:1001_0: Agamanapatheti tadaheva gantvā nivattetuṃ na sakkuṇeyyake samuddamajjhe ye dīpakā,
tika-vin07t:1001_1: tesūti yojanā. Itarasminti puratthimadisāya cīvare. “Uposathakāle…pe… vaḍḍhatī”ti
tika-vin07t:1001_3: dasseti. Tathā hi bahūsu bhikkhūsu ekato nisīditvā samantā sattabbhantaraparicchedesu
tika-vin07t:1001_4: yathāsakaṃ cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā pariharantesu ekekassa bhikkhuno nisinnokāsato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin07t:1001_5: paccekaṃ sattabbhantarassa paricchedo aññamaññavisadiso anekavidho hoti, na eko parisapariyantato
tika-vin07t:1001_6: paṭṭhāya animitabbattā. Teneva tattha parisavasena vuḍḍhi, hāni vā na hoti, na evaṃ
tika-vin07t:1001_7: sattabbhantarasīmāya. Sā hi yojanikāyapi parisapariyantatova paṭṭhāya samantā sattabbhantarapaacchinnā
tika-vin07t:1001_8: ekāva hoti. Teneva sā parisavasena vaḍḍhati, hāyati ca, tasmā aññāva sattabbhantarasīmā
tika-vin07t:1001_9: añño sattabbhantarato paricchinno cīvaravippavāsaparihāro abbhokāsoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1001_10: Yañcettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ khandhake sīmākathāyameva vakkhāma.
tika-vin07t:1002_0: 495. Nadiṃ otaratīti hatthapāsaṃ muñcitvā otarati. Bahigāme ṭhapetvāti apārupitabbatāya
tika-vin07t:1002_1: vuttaṃ. Vinayakammaṃ kātabbanti uttarāsaṅge ca bahigāme ṭhapitasaṅghāṭiyañca paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin07t:1002_2: vinayakammaṃ katvā pacchā uttarāsaṅgaṃ nivāsetvā antaravāsake kātabbaṃ. Ettha ca
tika-vin07t:1002_3: bahigāme ṭhapitassāpi vinayakammavacanato parammukhāpi ṭhitaṃ vissajjituṃ, nissaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin07t:1002_4: dātuñca vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Daharānaṃ gamane saussāhattā “nissayo pana na paṭippassambhatī”ti
tika-vin07t:1002_5: vuttaṃ. Muhuttaṃ…pe… paṭippassambhatīti saussāhatte gamanassa upacchinnattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1002_6: Tesaṃ pana purāruṇāva uṭṭhahitvā saussāhena gacchantānaṃ aruṇe antarā uṭṭhitepi na
tika-vin07t:1002_7: paṭippassambhati “yāva aruṇuggamanā sayantī”ti vuttattā. Teneva “gāmaṃ pavisitvā…pe…
tika-vin07t:1002_8: na paṭippassambhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Aññamaññassa vacanaṃ aggahetvātiādimhi saussāhattā
tika-vin07t:1002_9: gamanakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhi na vuttā. Dhenubhayenāti taruṇavacchagāvīnaṃ abhidhāvitvā
tika-vin07t:1002_10: siṅgena paharaṇabhayena. Nissayo ca paṭippassambhatīti ettha dhenubhayādīhi ṭhitānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1002_11: yāva bhayavūpasamā ṭhātabbato “antoaruṇeyeva gamissāmī”ti niyametuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā
tika-vin07t:1002_12: vuttaṃ. Yattha pana evaṃ niyametuṃ sakkā, tattha antarāruṇe uggatepi nissayo na paṭippassambhati
tika-vin07t:1002_13: bhesajjatthāya gāmappaviṭṭhadaharānaṃ viya. Antosīmāyaṃ gāmanti avippavāsasīmāsammutito
tika-vin07t:1002_14: pacchā patiṭṭhāpitagāmaṃ sandhāya vadati gāmañca gāmūpacārañca ṭhapetvā sammannitabbato.
tika-vin07t:1002_15: Paviṭṭhānanti ācariyantevāsikānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ gatānaṃ avippavāsasīmattā neva cīvarāni
tika-vin07t:1002_16: nissaggiyāni honti, saussāhatāya nissayo na paṭippassambhati. Antarāmaggeti dhammaṃ
tika-vin07t:1003_0: “Idha apaccuddharaṇa”nti iminā adhiṭṭhānavikappanāni viya paccuddharaṇampi kāyena
tika-vin07t:1003_1: vā vācāya vā kattabbanti dasseti. Kāyavācāhi kattabbassa akaraṇatoti idaṃ kāyavācāsamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1006_0: 497. Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ cīvarapaccāsā nikkhipitunti cīvarapaccāsāya satiyā nikkhipitunti
tika-vin07t:1006_1: attho. Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunāti ettha dutiyakathine viya sāmivaseneva karaṇavacanassa attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:1007_0: 499-500. Tuyhaṃ dammīti dinnanti “tuyhaṃ, bhante, akālacīvaraṃ dammī”ti evaṃ dinnaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1007_1: etampi kāle ādissa dinnaṃ nāma hotīti adhippāyo. Idaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1007_2: “kālepi ādissa dinna”nti idañca “akālacīvara”nti vacanasāmaññato labbhamānaṃ sabbampi
tika-vin07t:1007_3: dassetuṃ atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ paṭhamaaniyate sotassa raho viya. Saṅghassa hi
tika-vin07t:1007_4: kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ akāle uppannacīvaraṃ viya sammukhībhūtehi vutthavassehi, avutthavassehi
tika-vin07t:1007_5: ca sabbehipi bhājetabbatāsāmaññena akālacīvaraṃ nāma hotīti dassanatthaṃ atthuddhāravasena
tika-vin07t:1007_6: pāḷiyaṃ “kālepi ādissa dinna”nti vuttaṃ, na pana “tato bhājetvā laddhacīvarampi akāle
tika-vin07t:1007_7: laddhacīvarampi vutthavassānaṃ ekamāsaparihāraṃ, pañcamāsaparihāraṃ vā na labhati,
tika-vin07t:1007_8: paccāsācīvare asati dasāhaparihārameva labhatī”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin07t:1007_9: “ādissa dinna”nti vacanasāmaññato labbhamānaṃ sabbaṃ atthuddhāravasena dassetuṃ “ekapuggalassa
tika-vin07t:1007_10: vā idaṃ tuyhaṃ dammīti dinna”nti vuttaṃ, na pana tathāladdhaṃ vā akāle laddhaṃ vā
tika-vin07t:1007_11: anatthatakathinānaṃ dasāhabbhantare adhiṭṭhātabbanti dassetunti veditabbaṃ itarathā
tika-vin07t:1007_12: pāḷiaṭṭhakathāhi virujjhanato. Tathā hi accekacīvarasikkhāpade akāle uppannampi accekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin07t:1007_14: juṇhapakkhapañcamiyaṃ uppannassa accekacīvarassa anatthate kathine ekādasadivasādhiko
tika-vin07t:1007_15: māso, atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañca māsā ca parihāro vutto, tameva parihāraṃ
tika-vin07t:1007_16: sandhāya ‘chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi paccuddharitvā ṭhapitacīvarampi
tika-vin07t:1007_17: etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyevā’ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā kālepi akālepi ca yathātathā laddhaṃ
tika-vin07t:1007_18: atirekacīvaraṃ vutthavassānaṃ ekamāsaṃ, pañcamāsaṃ vā yathārahaṃ parihāraṃ labhati evāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1008_0: Evaṃ pana avatvā padabhājanaṃ vuttanti sambandho. Tattha evanti yaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1008_1: “tato ce uttarī”ti imassa māsaparamato uttarīti attho vutto, taṃ parāmasati. Padabhājaniyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1008_2: evamatthaṃ avatvā aññathā attho vuttoti adhippāyo. Tāva uppannaṃ paccāsācīvaranti
tika-vin07t:1008_3: paccattavacanaṃ. “Mūlacīvara”nti idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Attano gatikaṃ karotīti anantarā
tika-vin07t:1008_4: dutiyadivasādīsu uppannaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ māsaparamaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ ṭhapetuṃ adatvā
tika-vin07t:1008_5: attano dasāhaparamatāya eva patiṭṭhāpetīti attano gatikaṃ karotīti. Tato uddhaṃ mūlacīvaranti
tika-vin07t:1008_6: ettha pana mūlacīvaranti paccattavacanaṃ. Tañhi vīsatimadivasato uddhaṃ dvāvīsatimadivasādīsu
tika-vin07t:1008_7: uppannaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ attanā saddhiṃ ekato sibbetvā ghaṭitaṃ dasāhaparamaṃ gantuṃ
tika-vin07t:1008_8: adatvā navāhaparamatādivasena attano gatikaṃ karoti, ekato asibbetvā visuṃ ṭhapitaṃ
tika-vin07t:1009_0: Pāḷiyaṃ dasāhāti dasāhena. Ekādase uppannetiādīsu ekādasāhe uppannetiādinā attho,
tika-vin07t:1009_1: ayameva vā pāṭho gahetabbo. Ekavīse uppanne…pe… navāhā kāretabbantiādi paccāsācīvarassa
tika-vin07t:1009_2: uppannadivasaṃ ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ. Teneva “tiṃse…pe… tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1009_3: “Aññaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ…pe… kāretabba”nti idaṃ satiyā eva paccāsāya vuttaṃ. Sace pana
tika-vin07t:1009_4: “ito paṭṭhāya cīvaraṃ na labhissāmī”ti icchitaṭṭhānato paccāsāya upacchinnāya aññatthāpi
tika-vin07t:1009_5: yena kenaci upāyena paccāsaṃ uppādeti, mūlacīvaraṃ na adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, sabbathā paccāsāya
tika-vin07t:1009_6: upacchinnāya dasāhātikkantaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Paccāsācīvarampi
tika-vin07t:1009_7: parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbanti paṭhamataraṃ uppannaṃ visabhāgaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:1009_8: Aññamaññanti aññaṃ aññaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Aṅgaṃ panettha paṭhamakathine vuttasadisameva.
tika-vin07t:1009_9: Kevalañhi tattha dasāhātikkamo, idha māsātikkamoti ayaṃ viseso.
tika-vin07t:1012_0: 503-5. Catutthe pāḷiyaṃ bhattavissagganti bhattassa udare vissajjanaṃ, pavesanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1012_1: ajjhoharaṇaṃ bhattakiccanti attho, bhojanapariyosānena bhattassa vissajjanantipi
tika-vin07t:1012_2: vadanti. Tattha nāma tvanti so nāma tvaṃ, tāya nāma tvanti vā attho. Pitā ca mātā
tika-vin07t:1012_3: ca pitaro, pitūnaṃ pitā ca mātā ca pitāmahā, te eva yugaḷaṭṭhena yugo, tasmā yāva
tika-vin07t:1012_4: sattamā pitāmahayugā pitāmahāvaṭṭāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Evañhi pitāmahaggahaṇena
tika-vin07t:1012_5: mātāmaho ca pitāmahī mātāmahī ca gahitāva honti. Sattamayugato paraṃ “aññātakā”ti
tika-vin07t:1012_6: veditabbaṃ. Yāti bhikkhunī. Pitu mātā pitāmahī, mātu pitā mātāmaho.
tika-vin07t:1013: Payoge payoge bhikkhussa dukkaṭanti “dhovā”ti āṇāpanavācāya ekāya eva tadanuguṇassa sabbassāpi payogassa āṇattattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1014_1: vuttattā kāyena dhovāpetukāmataṃ appakāsetvā dānakhipanapesanādiṃ karontassa ca dvādasahatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:1014_2: upacāraṃ muñcitvā bahi ṭhatvā kāyavācāhi āṇāpetvā khipanapesanādiṃ karontassa ca anāpatti eva.
tika-vin07t:1015: Ekena vatthunāti paṭhamakatena. Pañcasatāni pamāṇaṃ etāsanti pañcasatā. Bhikkhubhāvato parivattaliṅgāpi bhikkhunī bhikkhūnaṃ santike ekatoupasampannā eva.
tika-vin07t:1016_0: 507. Tāvakālikaṃ gahetvāti attanā katipāhaṃ pārupanādiatthāya tāvakālikaṃ yācitvā.
tika-vin07t:1016_1: Purāṇacīvaratā, upacāre ṭhatvā aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā āṇāpanaṃ, tassā dhovāpanādīni
tika-vin07t:1019_0: 508. Pañcame apaññatte sikkhāpadeti gaṇamhā ohīyanasikkhāpade apaññatte. Koṭṭhāsasampattīti
tika-vin07t:1019_1: kesādipañcakoṭṭhāsānaṃ kalyāṇatā. Hatthataleyeva dassetvāti hatthatalato sesakāyassa adassanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin07t:1020_0: 510. Vihatthatāyāti vihatatāya, amissitatāya apaṭisaraṇatāyāti attho. Tenāha “samabhitunnattā”ti,
tika-vin07t:1020_1: byadhitattāti attho. Parivattetabbaṃ parivattaṃ, tadeva pārivattakaṃ, parivattetvā diyyamānanti attho.
tika-vin07t:1021_0: Purimasikkhāpade viya idha dvādasahattho upacāraniyamo natthīti āha “upacāraṃ muñcitvā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1021_1: Aññatra pārivattakāti yaṃ antamaso harīṭakakhaṇḍampi datvā vā “dassāmī”ti ābhogaṃ
tika-vin07t:1021_2: katvā vā parivattakaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ ṭhapetvā. “Taṃ acittakabhāvena na sametī”ti iminā
tika-vin07t:1022_0: 513-4. Tikañca taṃ pācittiyañcāti tikapācittiyaṃ, pācittiyatikanti attho. Pattatthavikādīti
tika-vin07t:1022_1: anadhiṭṭhānupagaṃ sandhāya vadati. Ko pana vādo pattatthavikādīsūti mahatiyāpi tāva
tika-vin07t:1022_3: anadhiṭṭhātabbesu kimeva vattabbanti dasseti. Pattatthavikādīni pana vikappanupagapacchimāni
tika-vin07t:1022_4: gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭati eva. Paṭiggahaṇaṃ kiriyā, aparivattanaṃ akiriyā. Vikappanupagacīvaratā,
tika-vin07t:1022_5: pārivattakābhāvo, aññātikāya hatthato gahaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1025_0: 515. Chaṭṭhe paṭu eva paṭṭo. Pāḷiyaṃ dhammanimantanāti samaṇesu vattabbācāradhammamattavasena
tika-vin07t:1025_1: nimantanā, dātukāmatāya katanimantanā na hotīti attho. Teneva “viññāpessatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1026_0: 517. “Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabba”nti iminā bhūtagāmavikopanaṃ anuññātanti
tika-vin07t:1026_1: āha “neva bhūtagāmapātabyatāyā”tiādi. Paṭhamaṃ suddhacittena liṅgaṃ gahetvā pacchā
tika-vin07t:1026_2: laddhiṃ gaṇhantopi titthiyapakkantako evāti āha “nivāsetvāpi laddhi na gahetabbā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1027_0: Yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ upagacchatīti etthāpi vihāracīvarādiatthāya pavisantenapi tiṇādīhi
tika-vin07t:1027_1: paṭicchādetvāva gantabbaṃ, na tveva naggena āgantabbanti sāmaññato dukkaṭassa vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1027_2: Cimilikāhīti paṭapilotikāhi. Paribhogenevāti aññaṃ cīvaraṃ alabhitvā paribhuñjanena.
tika-vin07t:1027_3: Paribhogajiṇṇanti yathā taṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjiyamānaṃ obhaggavibhaggatāya asāruppaṃ hoti, evaṃ jiṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1028_0: 521. Aññassatthāyāti etthāpi “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti idaṃ anuvattati evāti āha
tika-vin07t:1028_1: “attano ñātakapavārite”tiādi. Idha pana aññassa acchinnanaṭṭhacīvarassa atthāya aññātakaappavārite
tika-vin07t:1028_2: viññāpentassa nissaggiyena anāpattīti attho gahetabbo, itarathā “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti
tika-vin07t:1028_3: iminā viseso na bhaveyya. Teneva anantarasikkhāpade vakkhati “aṭṭhakathāsu pana ñātakaparivātaṭṭhāne…pe…
tika-vin07t:1028_4: pamāṇameva vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ, taṃ pāḷiyā na sametī”ti ca “yasmā panidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin07t:1028_5: aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃyeva paññattaṃ, tasmā idha ‘aññassatthāyā’ti na
tika-vin07t:1028_6: vutta”nti ca. Vikappanupagacīvaratā, samayābhāvo, aññātakaviññatti, tāya paṭilābhoti
tika-vin07t:1031_0: 522-524. Sattame pāḷiyaṃ paggāhikasālanti dussāpaṇaṃ. Tañhi vāṇijakehi dussāni paggahetvā
tika-vin07t:1031_2: “Ticīvarikenā”ti iminā acchinnaticīvarato aññassa vihārādīsu nihitassa cīvarassa
tika-vin07t:1031_3: abhāvaṃ dasseti. Yadi bhaveyya, viññāpetuṃ na vaṭṭeyya. Tāvakālikaṃ nivāsetvā attano
tika-vin07t:1031_4: cīvaraṃ gāhetabbaṃ, tāvakālikampi alabhantassa bhūtagāmavikopanaṃ katvā tiṇapaṇṇehi
tika-vin07t:1031_5: chadanaṃ viya viññāpanampi vaṭṭati eva. Aññenāti acchinnaasabbacīvarena. Dve naṭṭhānīti
tika-vin07t:1032_0: 526. Pāḷiyā na sametīti “anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti imāya pāḷiyā na sameti
tika-vin07t:1032_1: tatuttariviññāpanaāpattippasaṅge eva vuttattā. “Aññassatthāyāti na vutta”nti idaṃ
tika-vin07t:1032_2: aññassatthāya tatuttari viññāpane nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ hotīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin07t:1032_3: tañca pācittiyaṃ yesaṃ atthāya viññāpeti, tesaṃ vā siyā, viññāpakasseva vā, na tāva
tika-vin07t:1032_4: tesaṃ tehi aviññāpitattā, nāpi viññāpakassa attānaṃ uddissa aviññāpitattā. Tasmā
tika-vin07t:1032_5: aññassatthāya viññāpentassāpi nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ na dissati. Pāḷiyaṃ pana imassa
tika-vin07t:1032_7: na vuttanti vadanti, tañca yuttaṃ viya dissati, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Tatuttaricīvaratā,
tika-vin07t:1032_8: acchinnādikāraṇatā, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1035_0: 528-531. Aṭṭhame yo kattāti dāyakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paṭo eva paṭako. “Appagghaṃ
tika-vin07t:1035_1: cetāpetī”ti idaṃ nissaggiyapācittiyā anāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, viññattipaccayā pana
tika-vin07t:1035_2: dukkaṭameva. “Pubbe appavārito”ti hi sutte viññattikāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin07t:1035_3: “cīvare bhiyyokamyatā, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgānī”ti
tika-vin07t:1035_4: aññātakaviññattitā pakāsitā, keci pana “dāyakena dātukāmomhīti attano santike avuttepi
tika-vin07t:1035_5: yadagghanakaṃ so dātukāmo, tadagghanakaṃ āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati evā”ti vadanti, taṃ rājasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyapi
tika-vin07t:1035_6: na sameti, dūtena vā dāyakena vā “āyasmantaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhata”nti
tika-vin07t:1035_7: ārocitepi mukhavevaṭiyakappiyakārakādīnaṃ santikā āharāpanassa tattha paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t:1035_8: Vuttañhi tattha “ime dve aniddiṭṭhakappiyakārakā nāma, etesu aññātakaappavāritesu
tika-vin07t:1035_9: viya paṭipajjitabbaṃ…pe… na kiñci vattabbā. Desanāmattameva cetaṃ ‘dūtena cīvaracetāpannaṃ
tika-vin07t:1035_10: pahiṇeyyā’ti sayaṃ āharitvāpi piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya dadantesupi eseva nayo”ti. Mukhavevaṭiyakappiyakārakādayo
tika-vin07t:1035_11: hi dāyakena pariccattepi vatthumhi “asukassa santike cīvarapiṇḍapātādiṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin07t:1035_12: aniddiṭṭhattā eva “na kiñci vattabbā”ti vuttaṃ, na pana tassa vatthuno mukhavevaṭiyādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1035_13: santakattā, tasmā idhāpi dāyakena vā dūtena vā “yaṃ icchatha, taṃ vadathā”ti appavāritassa
tika-vin07t:1035_14: vadato dukkaṭameva. Agghavaḍḍhanakanti cīvare agghavaḍḍhanakaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ idaṃ
tika-vin07t:1035_15: sikkhāpadaṃ, na piṇḍapātādīsu tesu agghavaḍḍhanassa dukkaṭamattattā, paṇītapiṇḍapāte
tika-vin07t:1035_16: suddhikapācittiyattā cāti gahetabbaṃ. Teneva “cīvare bhiyyokamyatā”ti aṅgaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1038_0: 533. Navame pāḷiyaṃ paccekacīvaracetāpannāti paccekaṃ niyametvā cīvaracetāpannā,
tika-vin07t:1038_1: ekekena visuṃ visuṃ niyamitā cīvaracetāpannāti attho. Ubhova santā ekenāti ubho ekatova
tika-vin07t:1041: 537. Dasame “ajjaṇho”ti “ajja no”ti vattabbe ha-kārāgamaṃ, na-kārassa ca ṇa-kāraṃ katvā vuttoti āha “ajja ekadivasaṃ amhāka”nti.
tika-vin07t:1042_0: 538-9. Yaṃ vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin07t:1042_1: bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehīti idaṃ āgamanasuddhiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, sace hi ‘idaṃ
tika-vin07t:1042_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī’ti peseyya, āgamanassa asuddhattā akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbha
tika-vin07t:1042_3: bhikkhunā kappiyakārakopi niddisitabbo na bhaveyyā”ti, taṃ nissaggiyavatthudukkaṭavatthubhūtaṃ
tika-vin07t:1042_4: akappiyacīvaracetāpannaṃ “asukassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti evaṃ āgamanasuddhiyā asati,
tika-vin07t:1042_5: sikkhāpade āgatanayena dūtavacane ca asuddhe sabbathā paṭikkhepo eva kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin07t:1042_6: na pana “cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti vattuṃ, tadanusārena na veyyāvaccakarañca
tika-vin07t:1042_7: niddisituṃ āgamanadūtavacanānaṃ ubhinnaṃ asuddhattā. Pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena pana āgamanasuddhiyā
tika-vin07t:1042_8: sati dūtavacane asuddhepi sikkhāpade āgatanayena sabbaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:1042_9: vuttaṃ. Tena ca yathā dūtavacanāsuddhiyampi āgamane suddhe veyyāvaccakarampi niddisituṃ
tika-vin07t:1042_10: vaṭṭati, evaṃ āgamanāsuddhiyampi dūtavacane suddhe vaṭṭati evāti ayamattho atthato
tika-vin07t:1042_11: siddhova hoti, ubhayasuddhiyaṃ vattabbameva natthīti ubhayāsuddhipakkhameva sandhāya
tika-vin07t:1042_12: mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kappiyakārakopi niddisitabbo na bhaveyyā”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1043_0: Yaṃ panettha sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “āgamanassa suddhiyā vā asuddhiyā vā visesappayojanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1043_1: na dissatī”tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāvacanassa adhippāyaṃ asallakkhetvā vuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:1043_2: yathāvuttanayena āgamanasuddhiādinā sappayojanattā. Yo panettha “mūlasāmikena kappiyavohāravasena,
tika-vin07t:1043_3: pesitassa dūtassa akappiyavohāravasena ca vadatopi kappiyakārako niddisitabbo bhaveyyā”ti
tika-vin07t:1043_4: aniṭṭhappasaṅgo vutto, so aniṭṭhappasaṅgo eva na hoti abhimatattā. Tathā hi sikkhāpade
tika-vin07t:1043_5: eva “paṭiggaṇhātu āyasmā cīvaracetāpanna”nti akappiyavohārena vadato dūtassa kappiyena
tika-vin07t:1043_6: kammena veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo vutto āgamanassa suddhattā, āgamanassāpi asuddhiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1043_7: pana kappiyenāpi kammena veyyāvaccakaro na niddisitabboti attheva āgamanassa suddhiasuddhīsu
tika-vin07t:1043_8: payojanaṃ. Kathaṃ pana dūtavacanena āgamanasuddhi viññāyatīti? Nāyaṃ bhāro. Dūtena
tika-vin07t:1043_9: hi akappiyavohāreneva vutte eva āgamanasuddhi gavesitabbā, na itarathā, tattha ca
tika-vin07t:1043_10: tassa vacanakkamena pucchitvā ca yuttiādīhi ca sakkā viññātuṃ. Idhāpi hi sikkhāpade
tika-vin07t:1043_11: “cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhata”nti dūtavacaneneva cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dātuṃ pesitabhāvo viññāyati.
tika-vin07t:1043_12: Yadi hi sabbathā āgamanasuddhi na viññāyati, paṭikkhepo eva kattabboti.
tika-vin07t:1044_0: Pāḷiyañca “cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”tiādi dūtavacanassa akappiyattepi āgamanasuddhiyā
tika-vin07t:1044_1: sati paṭipajjanavidhidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. “Eso kho…pe… na vattabbo ‘tassa dehī”’tiādi
tika-vin07t:1044_3: eva codetuṃ vaṭṭati, na itarathā”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. “Na vattabbo ‘dehi me cīvaraṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:1044_4: cetāpehi me cīvara”’nti idaṃ dūtenābhatarūpiyaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ attanā niddiṭṭhakappiyakārakattāva
tika-vin07t:1044_5: “dehi me cīvaraṃ…pe… cetāpehi me cīvara”nti vadanto rūpiyassa pakatattā tena rūpiyena
tika-vin07t:1044_6: parivattetvā “dehi cetāpehī”ti rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjanto nāma hotīti taṃ dosaṃ
tika-vin07t:1044_7: dūrato parivajjetuṃ vuttaṃ rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇena saṅghamajjhe nissaṭṭharūpiye viya.
tika-vin07t:1044_8: Vuttañhi tattha “na vattabbo imaṃ vā imaṃ vā āharā”ti. Tasmā na idaṃ viññattidosaṃ
tika-vin07t:1044_9: parivajjetuṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ, “attho me, āvuso, cīvarenā”tipi avattabbatāpasaṅgato,
tika-vin07t:1044_10: teneva dūtaniddiṭṭhesu rūpiyasaṃvohārasaṅkābhāvato aññaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetvāpi
tika-vin07t:1044_11: āharāpetabbanti vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi “dūtena ṭhapitarūpiyena cetāpetvā cīvaraṃ āharāpehī”ti
tika-vin07t:1044_12: avatvā kevalaṃ “cīvaraṃ āharāpehī”ti evaṃ āharāpetabbanti adhippāyo gahetabbo. Ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1044_13: bhañjatīti ettha ṭhānanti ṭhitiyā ca kāraṇassa ca nāmaṃ, tasmā āsane nisīdanena ṭhānampi
tika-vin07t:1044_14: kuppati, āgatakāraṇampi tesaṃ na viññāyati. Ṭhitaṃ pana akopetvā āmisapaṭiggahaṇādīsu
tika-vin07t:1044_15: āgatakāraṇameva bhañjati, na ṭhānaṃ. Tenāha “āgatakāraṇaṃ bhañjatī”ti. Keci pana
tika-vin07t:1044_16: “āmisapaṭiggahaṇādinā ṭhānampi bhañjatī”ti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
tika-vin07t:1045_0: Yatassa cīvaracetāpannantiādi yena attanā veyyāvaccakaro niddiṭṭho, cīvarañca anipphāditaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1045_1: tassa kattabbavidhidassanaṃ. Evaṃ bhikkhunā vatthusāmikānaṃ vutte te codetvā denti,
tika-vin07t:1045_2: vaṭṭati “sāmikā codetvā dentī”ti anāpattiyaṃ vuttattā. Tena ca yo sayaṃ acodetvā
tika-vin07t:1045_3: upāsakādīhi pariyāyena vatvā codāpeti, tesu sattakkhattumpi codetvā cīvaraṃ dāpentesu
tika-vin07t:1045_4: tassa anāpatti siddhā hoti sikkhāpadassa anāṇattikattā.
tika-vin07t:1046_0: Kenaci aniddiṭṭho attano mukheneva byāvaṭabhāvaṃ veyyāvaccakarattaṃ patto mukhavevaṭiko.
tika-vin07t:1046_1: “Avicāretukāmatāyā”ti iminā vijjamānampi dātuṃ anicchantā ariyāpi vañcanādhippāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1046_2: vinā vohārato natthīti vadantīti dasseti. Bhesajjakkhandhake meṇḍakaseṭṭhivatthumhi
tika-vin07t:1046_4: hattheti dūtena niddiṭṭhakappiyakārake sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhe,
tika-vin07t:1046_5: aniddiṭṭhe vāti. Tenāha “ettha ca codanāya pamāṇaṃ natthī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1047_0: Sayaṃ āharitvā dadantesūti sambandho. “Piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāyā”ti iminā cīvaratthāyeva
tika-vin07t:1047_1: na hotīti dasseti. “Eseva nayo”ti iminā vatthusāminā niddiṭṭhakappiyakārakabhedesupi
tika-vin07t:1047_2: piṇḍapātādīnampi atthāya dinne ca ṭhānacodanādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva kātabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1048_0: “Saṅghaṃ vā…pe… anāmasitvā”ti vuttattā “saṅghassa vihāratthāya demā”tiādinā āmasitvā
tika-vin07t:1048_1: vadantesu paṭikkhipitabbameva. “Saṅgho sampaṭicchatī”ti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1048_2: gaṇādīsupi saṅghassatthāya sampaṭicchantesupi paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin07t:1048_3: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “paṭiggahaṇe pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ na yuttaṃ saṅghacetiyādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1048_4: atthāya dukkaṭassa vuttattā. Codetīti tassa dosābhāvaṃ ñatvāpi kodhena vā lobhena
tika-vin07t:1048_5: vā bhaṇḍadeyyanti codeti. So eva hi musāvādādipaccayā pācittiyadukkaṭādiāpattīhi
tika-vin07t:1048_6: sāpattiko hoti, gīvātisaññāya pana vatvā niddosabhāvaṃ ñatvā viramantassa natthi āpatti.
tika-vin07t:1049_0: Taḷākaṃ khette paviṭṭhattā “na sampaṭicchitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Cattāro paccaye saṅgho
tika-vin07t:1049_2: taḷākaṃ dammī”ti vā “bhikkhusaṅgho cattāro paccaye paribhuñjituṃ taḷākaṃ dammī”ti
tika-vin07t:1049_3: vā “ito taḷākato uppanne cattāro paccaye dammī”ti vā vattumpi vaṭṭati, idañca saṅghassa
tika-vin07t:1049_4: paribhogatthāya diyyamānaññeva sandhāya vuttaṃ, puggalassa pana evampi dinnaṃ taḷākakhettādi
tika-vin07t:1049_5: na vaṭṭati. Suddhacittassa pana udakaparibhogatthaṃ kūpapokkharaṇīādayo vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin07t:1049_6: “Saṅghassa taḷākaṃ atthi, taṃ katha”nti hi ādinā sabbattha saṅghavaseneva vuttaṃ. Hattheti vase.
tika-vin07t:1050_0: “Ṭhapethāti vutte”ti idaṃ sāmīcivasena vuttaṃ, avuttepi ṭhapentassa doso natthi.
tika-vin07t:1050_1: Tenāha “udakaṃ vāretuṃ labbhatī”ti. Sassakālepi tāsetvā muñcituṃ vaṭṭati, amuñcato
tika-vin07t:1050_2: pana bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Puna detīti acchinditvā puna deti, evampi vaṭṭatīti sambandho.
tika-vin07t:1050_3: Iminā “yena kenaci issarena ‘pariccattamidaṃ bhikkhūhi, assāmika’ntisaññāya attanā
tika-vin07t:1050_4: gahetvā dinnaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dasseti. Kappiyavohārepi vinicchayaṃ vakkhāmāti pāṭhaseso.
tika-vin07t:1051_0: Udakavasenāti udakaparibhogatthaṃ. “Suddhacittāna”nti idaṃ sahatthena ca akappiyavohārena
tika-vin07t:1051_1: ca karonte sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sassasampādanatthanti evaṃ asuddhacittānampi pana sayaṃ
tika-vin07t:1051_2: akatvā kappiyavohārena āṇāpetuṃ vaṭṭati eva. “Kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin07t:1051_3: idaṃ sahatthādinā katataḷākattā “asāruppa”nti vuttaṃ, ṭhapentassa, pana taṃ paccayaṃ
tika-vin07t:1051_4: paribhuñjantassapi vā saṅghassa āpatti na viññāyati, aṭṭhakathāpamāṇena vā ettha
tika-vin07t:1051_5: āpatti gahetabbā. Lajjibhikkhunāti lajjināpi, pageva alajjinā mattikuddharaṇādīsu
tika-vin07t:1051_6: kārāpitesūti adhippāyo. Navasasseti akatapubbe kedāre. “Kahāpaṇe”ti iminā dhaññuṭṭhāpane
tika-vin07t:1051_7: tasseva akappiyanti dasseti, dhaññuṭṭhāpane cassa payogepi dukkaṭameva, na kahāpaṇuṭṭhāpane viya.
tika-vin07t:1052_0: “Kasatha vapathā”ti vacane sabbesampi akappiyaṃ siyāti āha “avatvā”ti. Ettako nāma
tika-vin07t:1052_1: bhāgoti ettha ettako kahāpaṇoti idampi sandhāya vadati. Tathā vuttepi hi tadā kahāpaṇānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1052_2: avijjamānattā āyatiṃ uppannaṃ aññesaṃ vaṭṭati eva. Tenāha “tasseva taṃ akappiya”nti.
tika-vin07t:1052_3: Tassa pana sabbapayogesu, paribhogesupi dukkaṭaṃ. Keci pana “dhaññaparibhoge eva
tika-vin07t:1052_4: āpatti, na pubbapayoge”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ, yena minanarakkhaṇādipayogena pacchā
tika-vin07t:1052_5: dhaññaparibhoge āpatti hoti, tassa payogassa karaṇe anāpattiyā ayuttattā. Pariyāyakathāya
tika-vin07t:1052_6: pana sabbattha anāpatti. Teneva “ettakehi vīhīhi idañcidañca āharathā”ti niyamavacane
tika-vin07t:1052_7: akappiyaṃ vuttaṃ, kahāpaṇavicāraṇepi eseva nayo. Vatthu ca evarūpaṃ nāma saṃvijjati,
tika-vin07t:1053: Vanaṃ dammi…pe… vaṭṭatīti ettha nivāsaṭṭhānattā puggalassāpi suddhacittena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sīmaṃ demāti vihārasīmādisādhāraṇavacanena vuttattā “vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1054_0: “Veyyāvaccakara”ntiādinā vuttepi puggalassapi dāsaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin07t:1054_1: ārāmika”nti visesetvā anuññātattā, tañca kho pilindavacchena gahitaparibhuttakkamena,
tika-vin07t:1054_2: na gahaṭṭhānaṃ dāsaparibhogakkamena. Khettādayo pana sabbe saṅghasseva vaṭṭanti pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1054_3: puggalikavasena gahetuṃ ananuññātattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vihārassa demāti saṅghikavihāraṃ
tika-vin07t:1054_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ, “khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”tiādinā suttantesu āgatapaṭikkhepo
tika-vin07t:1054_5: bhagavatā āpattiyāpi hetubhāvena katoti bhagavato adhippāyaṃ jānantehi saṅgītimahātherehi
tika-vin07t:1054_6: khettapaṭiggahaṇādinissito ayaṃ sabbopi pāḷimuttavinicchayo vuttoti gahetabbo. Kappiyakārakassa
tika-vin07t:1054_7: niddiṭṭhabhāvo, dūtena appitatā, tatuttari vāyāmo, tena paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1059: 542. Dutiyassa paṭhame pāḷiyaṃ kosiyakāraketi kosakārakapāṇānaṃ kosato nibbattattā kosiyena suttena vatthādiṃ karonte. Saṅghātanti vināsaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1060_0: 544. “Avāyima”nti vuttattā vāyitvā karaṇe anāpatti. Missetvāti eḷakalomehi missetvā.
tika-vin07t:1060_2: attano atthāya santhatassa karaṇakārāpanaṃ, paṭilābho cāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1062_0: 547-552. Dutiyañca tatiyañca uttānameva. Tattha pana odātādimissakasaññāya suddhakāḷakānaññeva
tika-vin07t:1062_1: santhatassa karaṇavasena cettha dvebhāgato adhikesu suddhakāḷakesu anadhikasaññāya
tika-vin07t:1064: 557. Catutthe hada karīsussagge, miha secaneti dhātuatthaṃ sandhāyāha “vaccampi passāvampi karontī”ti. Ūnakachabbassesu atirekachabbassasaṅkitādivasenettha acittakatā veditabbā.
tika-vin07t:1067_0: 565. Pañcame tattha sandississatīti sakāya katikāya ayuttakāritāvasena viññūhi sandississatīti
tika-vin07t:1067_1: attho. Araññakaṅgādīni tīṇi pāḷiyaṃ senāsanādipaccayattayassa ādiaṅgavasena vuttāni,
tika-vin07t:1068_0: 566. Pihayantāti patthayantā. Santhatassa avāyimattā, senāsanaparikkhārattā ca cīvaratā,
tika-vin07t:1068_1: adhiṭṭhātabbatā ca natthīti āha “catutthacīvarasaññitāyā”ti, vipallāsasaññāyāti attho.
tika-vin07t:1068_2: Keci pana “idaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ nāma navasu cīvaresu nisīdanacīvarameva, nāññaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1068_3: Nisīdanasikkhāpadepi imasmiṃ sikkhāpade viya ‘nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī’ti ca
tika-vin07t:1068_4: aṭṭhakathāyañcassa ‘santhatasadisaṃ santharitvā ekasmiṃ ante sugatavidatthiyā vidatthimatte
tika-vin07t:1068_5: padese dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā tisso dasā karīyanti, tāhi dasāhi sadasaṃ nāma vuccatī’ti
tika-vin07t:1068_6: ca vuttattā”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ idha pamāṇaniyamassa avuttattā, santhatassa
tika-vin07t:1068_7: ca avāyimacīvarattā, adhiṭṭhānupagattābhāvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avuttattā ca. Nisīdanacīvaraṃ
tika-vin07t:1068_8: pana channaṃ cīvarānaṃ khaṇḍapilotikāni pamāṇayuttameva santharitvā santhataṃ viya
tika-vin07t:1068_9: karonti. Teneva “santhatasadisa”nti sadisaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, tasmā tadeva cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhānupagañca,
tika-vin07t:1069_1: ca vasenettha acittakatā veditabbā. Vitānādīnaññeva atthāya karaṇe anāpattivacanato
tika-vin07t:1069_2: nipajjanatthāya karotopi āpatti eva. Paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti kosiyesu suddhakāḷakānañca
tika-vin07t:1069_3: vatthūnaṃ akappiyattā vuttaṃ. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati,
tika-vin07t:1069_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti tattha tattha vuttaṃ, itaresu pana dvīsu “anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1069_5: Tattha catutthe aññassatthāya karaṇepi anāpatti, pañcame tattha dukkaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1069_6: Nissaṭṭhadānavacanato pana gahaṇe doso natthi, paribhuñjane ca vijaṭetvā kappiyavasena kate na doso.
tika-vin07t:1072_0: 572. Chaṭṭhe pāḷiyaṃ “addhānamaggappaṭipannassā”ti idaṃ vatthuvasena vuttaṃ. Nivāsaṭṭhāne
tika-vin07t:1072_1: laddhānipi tiyojanato paraṃ harituṃ na vaṭṭati eva. Asante hāraketi anurūpato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1072_2: Santepi hārake harato natthi doso. Āpattiyevāti anāṇattena haṭattā. Pakkhadvayassapi
tika-vin07t:1072_4: kāraṇamāha “acittakattā”ti. Na sametīti “anāpatti, aññaṃ harāpetī”ti ettakasseva
tika-vin07t:1072_5: pariharaṇe vuttattā. Agacchanteti ṭhite. Heṭṭhāti bhūmiyā.
tika-vin07t:1073_0: 575. Taṃ harantassāti paṭhamaṃ paṭilābhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya tiyojanato uddhaṃ harantassāti
tika-vin07t:1073_1: attho. Tathā harantassa hi corehi acchinditvā puna dinnaṭṭhānato tiyojanaṃ harituṃ
tika-vin07t:1073_2: vaṭṭati. Keci pana “mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ aṅgesu ‘paṭhamappaṭilābho’ti vuttattā dutiyapaṭilābhaṭṭhānato
tika-vin07t:1073_3: tiyojanātikkamepi anāpattī”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ, dutiyapaṭilābhassāpi paṭilābhaṭṭhāne
tika-vin07t:1073_4: pavisanato vāsatthāya gamanaṭṭhānato puna gamane viya. Kāyabandhanādīnanti dvipaṭalakāyabandhanādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1073_5: antare pakkhittaṃ pasibbake pakkhittasadisaṃ, na katabhaṇḍanti vuttaṃ, tathā nidhānamukhanti.
tika-vin07t:1076_0: 581. Sattame pāḷiyaṃ anāpattivāre aparibhuttaṃ katabhaṇḍaṃ dhovāpetīti ettha paribhuttassa
tika-vin07t:1079_0: 583-4. Aṭṭhame suvaṇṇamayakahāpaṇena kahāpaṇopi rajate eva saṅgayhatīti āha “sovaṇṇamayo
tika-vin07t:1079_1: vā”ti. Rūpiyamayo vāti rajatena rūpaṃ samuṭṭhapetvā katakahāpaṇo. Pākatiko nāma etarahi pakatikahāpaṇo.
tika-vin07t:1080_0: Iccetaṃ sabbampīti sikkhāpadena, vibhaṅgena ca vuttaṃ sabbampi nidasseti. Tassa catubbidhaṃ
tika-vin07t:1080_1: nissaggiyavatthūti imināva sambandho, na pana anantarena “rajata”nti padena. Idāni
tika-vin07t:1080_2: taṃ catubbidhaṃ nissaggiyavatthuṃ sarūpato dassento “rajata”ntiādimāha. Tattha kiñcāpi
tika-vin07t:1080_3: heṭṭhā rajatamāsakova vutto, na kevalaṃ rajataṃ, tathāpi sikkhāpade “jātarūparajata”nti
tika-vin07t:1080_4: padeneva vuttanti tampi dassetuṃ “rajata”nti idaṃ visuṃ vuttaṃ. Padabhājane pana
tika-vin07t:1080_5: mātikāpadeneva siddhattā taṃ avatvā tena saha saṅgayhamānameva dassetuṃ “rajataṃ
tika-vin07t:1080_6: nāma kahāpaṇo”tiādi vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Jātarūpamāsakoti suvaṇṇamayakahāpaṇo. Vuttappabhedoti
tika-vin07t:1080_7: “rūpiyamayo vā pākatiko vā”tiādinā vuttappabhedo. Paṭova paṭako, vatthaṃ. Dukkaṭamevāti
tika-vin07t:1080_8: paṭiggāhakasseva paṭiggahaṇapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ, paribhoge pana pañcasahadhammikehi
tika-vin07t:1080_9: paṭiggahitānaṃ dhaññavirahitamuttādīnaṃ kāraṇā uppannapaccayaṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ sabbesampi
tika-vin07t:1080_10: dukkaṭameva. Keci pana “dhaññampi pañcasahadhammikehi paṭiggahitaṃ muttādikhettādi
tika-vin07t:1080_11: viya sabbesampi paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati, kevalaṃ saṅghikabhūmiyaṃ kappiyavohārena
tika-vin07t:1080_12: ca uppannassa dhaññassa vicāraṇameva sandhāya ‘tassevetaṃ akappiya’nti vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1081_0: Eko sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vātiādi rūpiye heṭṭhimakoṭiyā pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1081_1: na pana “evaṃ paṭipajjitabbamevā”ti dassetuṃ. “Idha nikkhipāhī”ti vutte uggaṇhāpanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1081_2: hotīti āha “idha nikkhipāhīti na vattabba”nti. Kappiyañca…pe… hotīti yasmā asāditattā
tika-vin07t:1081_3: tato uppannapaccayā vaṭṭanti, tasmā kappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. Yasmā pana dubbicāraṇāya
tika-vin07t:1081_4: sati tato uppannampi na kappati, tasmā akappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1082_0: “Na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpita”nti iminā cetāpitaṃ ce, natthi paribhogūpāyo
tika-vin07t:1082_1: uggahetvā anissaṭṭharūpiyena cetāpitattā. Īdisañhi saṅghamajjhe nissajjanaṃ katvāva
tika-vin07t:1082_2: chaḍḍetvā pācittiyaṃ desetabbanti dasseti. Keci pana “yasmā nissaggiyavatthuṃ paṭiggahetvāpi
tika-vin07t:1082_3: cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghe nissaṭṭhaṃ kappiyakārakehi nissaṭṭharūpiyaṃ parivattetvā
tika-vin07t:1082_4: ānītakappiyabhaṇḍasadisaṃ hoti, tasmā vināva upāyaṃ bhājetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin07t:1082_5: vadanti, taṃ pattacatukkādikathāya na sameti. Tattha rūpiyena parivattitapattassa
tika-vin07t:1082_6: aparibhogova dassito, na nissajjanavidhānanti. Upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvāti kappiyakārakehi
tika-vin07t:1082_7: vaḍḍhiyā payojanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Akappiyanti tena vatthunā gahitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1083_1: Asantasambhāvanāyāti pariyāyādinā abhūtārocanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Theyyaparibhogoti
tika-vin07t:1083_2: paccayasāminā bhagavatā ananuññātattā vuttaṃ. Iṇaparibhogoti bhagavatā anuññātampi
tika-vin07t:1083_3: kattabbaṃ akatvā paribhuñjanato vuttaṃ, tena ca paccayasannissitasīlaṃ vipajjatīti
tika-vin07t:1083_4: dasseti. Paribhoge paribhogeti kāyato mocetvā mocetvā paribhoge. Pacchimayāmesu paccavekkhitabbanti
tika-vin07t:1083_5: yojanā. Iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti ettha “hiyyo yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhutta”ntiādināpi
tika-vin07t:1083_6: atītapaccavekkhaṇā vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Paribhoge paribhogeti udakapatanaṭṭhānato antopavesanesu,
tika-vin07t:1083_7: nisīdanasayanesu ca. Satipaccayatā vaṭṭatīti paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayattaṃ laddhuṃ
tika-vin07t:1083_8: vaṭṭati. Paṭiggahaṇe ca paribhoge ca paccavekkhaṇāsati avassaṃ laddhabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1083_9: Tenāha “satiṃ katvā”tiādi. Keci pana “satipaccayatā paccaye sati bhesajjaparibhogassa
tika-vin07t:1083_10: kāraṇe satī”ti evampi atthaṃ vadanti, tesampi paccaye satīti paccayasabbhāvasallakkhaṇe
tika-vin07t:1083_11: satīti evamattho gahetabbo paccayasabbhāvamattena sīlassa asujjhanato. “Paribhoge
tika-vin07t:1083_12: akarontasseva āpattī”ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassa bhedo dassito, na paccayasannisssisīlassa,
tika-vin07t:1083_13: tassa atītapaccavekkhaṇāya visujjhanato. Etasmiṃ, pana sesapaccayesu ca iṇaparibhogādivacanena
tika-vin07t:1084_0: Evaṃ paccayasannissitasīlassa visuddhiṃ dassetvā teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi visuddhiyo
tika-vin07t:1084_1: dassetuṃ “catubbidhā hi suddhī”tiādimāha. Tattha sujjhati desanādīhi, sodhīyatīti
tika-vin07t:1084_2: vā suddhi, catubbidhasīlaṃ. Tenāha “desanāya sujjhanato”tiādi. Ettha desanāggahaṇena
tika-vin07t:1084_3: vuṭṭhānampi chinnamūlānaṃ abhikkhutāpaṭiññāpi saṅgahitā. Chinnamūlānampi hi pārājikāpattivuṭṭhānena
tika-vin07t:1084_4: heṭṭhā parirakkhitaṃ bhikkhusīlaṃ visuddhaṃ nāma hoti, tena tesaṃ maggapaṭilābhopi sampajjati.
tika-vin07t:1085_0: Dātabbaṭṭhena dāyaṃ, taṃ ādiyantīti dāyādā. Sattannaṃ sekkhānanti ettha kalyāṇaputhujjanāpi
tika-vin07t:1085_1: saṅgahitā tesaṃ āṇaṇyaparibhogassa dāyajjaparibhoge saṅgahitattāti veditabbaṃ. Dhammadāyādasuttanti
tika-vin07t:1085_2: “dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā”tiādinā pavattaṃ suttaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin07t:1085_3: mā me āmisadāyādāti evaṃ me-saddaṃ ānetvā attho gahetabbo. Evañhi tathā vuttatthasādhakaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:1086_0: Lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogoti dhammāmisavasena missabhāvo. Alajjinā saddhinti etthāpi
tika-vin07t:1086_1: eseva nayo. “Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthī”ti iminā diṭṭhadiṭṭhesu āsaṅkā
tika-vin07t:1086_2: nāma na kātabbā, diṭṭhasutādikāraṇe sati eva kātabbāti dasseti. Attano bhārabhūtā
tika-vin07t:1086_3: saddhivihārikādayo. Sace na oramatīti agatigamanena dhammāmisaparibhogato na oramati.
tika-vin07t:1086_4: “Āpatti nāma natthī”ti idaṃ alajjīnaṃ dhammena uppannapaccayaṃ, dhammakammañca sandhāya
tika-vin07t:1086_5: vuttaṃ. Tesampi hi kuladūsanādisamuppannapaccayaṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ, vaggakammādiṃ
tika-vin07t:1087_1: paccayavasena ca ekakammādivasena ca vutto evāti veditabbaṃ. Teneva duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1087_2: codakacuditakabhāve ṭhitā dve alajjino dhammaparibhogampi sandhāya “ekasambhogaparibhogā
tika-vin07t:1087_3: hutvā jīvathā”ti vuttā tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ dhammāmisaparibhoge virodhābhāvā. Lajjīnameva
tika-vin07t:1087_4: hi alajjinā saha tadubhayaparibhogā na vaṭṭantīti.
tika-vin07t:1088_1: sabbo nirāmisaparibhogo ca veditabbo. “Na so āpattiyā kāretabbo”ti vuttattā lajjino
tika-vin07t:1088_2: alajjipaggahe āpattīti veditabbaṃ. Itaropīti lajjīpi. Tassāpi attānaṃ paggaṇhantassa
tika-vin07t:1088_3: alajjino, iminā ca lajjino vaṇṇabhaṇanādilābhaṃ paṭicca āmisagarukatāya vā gehasitapemena
tika-vin07t:1088_4: vā taṃ alajjiṃ paggaṇhanto lajjī sāsanaṃ antaradhāpeti nāmāti dasseti. Evaṃ gahaṭṭhādīsu
tika-vin07t:1088_5: upatthambhito alajjī balaṃ labhitvā pesale abhibhavitvā nacirasseva sāsanaṃ uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ karotīti.
tika-vin07t:1089_0: “Dhammaparibhogopi tattha vaṭṭatī”ti iminā āmisaparibhogato dhammaparibhogova garuko,
tika-vin07t:1089_1: tasmā ativiya alajjivivekena kātabboti dasseti. “Dhammānuggahena uggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin07t:1089_2: vuttattā alajjussannatāya sāsane osakkante, lajjīsu ca appahontesu alajjimpi pakatattaṃ
tika-vin07t:1089_3: gaṇapūrakaṃ gahetvā upasampadādikaraṇena ceva keci alajjino dhammāmisaparibhogena
tika-vin07t:1089_4: saṅgahetvā sesālajjigaṇassa niggahena ca sāsanaṃ paggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1090_0: Keci pana “koṭiyaṃ ṭhito ganthoti vuttattā ganthapariyāpuṇanameva dhammaparibhogo,
tika-vin07t:1090_1: na ekakammādi. Tasmā alajjīhipi saddhiṃ uposathādikaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, āpatti
tika-vin07t:1090_2: natthī”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ, ekakammādīsu bahūsu dhammaparibhogesu alajjināpi
tika-vin07t:1090_3: saddhiṃ kattabbāvatthāyuttaṃ dhammaparibhogaṃ dassetuṃ idha nidassanavasena ganthasseva
tika-vin07t:1090_4: samuddhaṭattā. Na hi ekakammādiko vidhi dhammaparibhogo na hotīti sakkā vattuṃ anāmisattā
tika-vin07t:1090_5: dhammāmisesu apariyāpannassa kassaci abhāvā. Teneva aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ dhammapaṭisandhārakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1090_7: pabbajjāraho pabbājetabbo, upasampadāraho upasampādetabbo…pe… ayaṃ dhammapaṭisandhāro
tika-vin07t:1090_8: nāmā”ti evaṃ saṅghakammādipi dhammakoṭṭhāse dassitaṃ. Tesu pana dhammakoṭṭhāsesu
tika-vin07t:1090_9: yaṃ gaṇapūraṇādivasena alajjino apekkhitvā uposathādi vā tesaṃ santikā dhammuggahaṇanissayaggahaṇādi
tika-vin07t:1090_10: vā karīyati, taṃ dhammo ceva paribhogo cāti dhammaparibhogoti vuccati, etaṃ tathārūpapaccayaṃ
tika-vin07t:1090_11: vinā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, karontassa alajjiparibhogo ca hoti dukkaṭañca. Yaṃ pana alajjisataṃ
tika-vin07t:1090_12: anapekkhitvā tajjanīyādiniggahakammaṃ vā parivāsādiupakārakammaṃ vā uggahaparipucchādānādi
tika-vin07t:1090_13: vā karīyati, taṃ dhammo eva, no paribhogo. Etaṃ anurūpānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, āmisadānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1090_14: viya āpatti natthi. Nissayadānampi terasasammutidānādi ca vattapaṭivattasādiyanādiparibhogassāpi hetuttā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1091_0: Yo pana mahāalajjī uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ karoti, tassa saddhivihārikādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1091_1: upasampadādiupakārakammampi uggahaparipucchādānādi ca kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, āpatti eva
tika-vin07t:1091_2: hoti, niggahakammameva kātabbaṃ. Teneva alajjipaggahopi paṭikkhitto. Dhammāmisaparibhogavivajjanenāpi
tika-vin07t:1091_3: hi dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggaho adhippeto, so ca pesalānaṃ phāsuvihārasaddhammaṭṭhitivinayānuggahādiatthāya
tika-vin07t:1091_4: etadatthattā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā. Tasmā yaṃ yaṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ upatthambhāya pesalānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1091_5: aphāsuvihārāya saddhammaparihānādiatthāya hoti, taṃ sabbampi paribhogo vā hotu aparibhogo
tika-vin07t:1091_6: vā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, evaṃ karontā sāsanaṃ antaradhāpenti, āpattiñca āpajjanti. Dhammāmisaparibhogesu
tika-vin07t:1091_7: cettha alajjīhi ekakammādidhammaparibhogo eva pesalānaṃ aphāsuvihārasaddhammaparihānādiatthāya
tika-vin07t:1091_8: hoti, na tathā āmisaparibhogo. Na hi alajjīnaṃ paccayaparibhogamattena pesalānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1091_9: aphāsuvihārādi hoti, yathāvuttadhammaparibhogena pana hoti, tapparivajjanena ca phāsuvihārādayo.
tika-vin07t:1091_10: Tathā hi katasikkhāpadavītikkamā alajjipuggalā uposathādīsu paviṭṭhā “tumhe kāyadvāre,
tika-vin07t:1091_11: vacīdvāre ca vītikkamaṃ karothā”tiādinā bhikkhūhi vattabbā honti, yathā vinayañca
tika-vin07t:1091_12: atiṭṭhantā saṅghato bahikaraṇādivasena suṭṭhu niggahetabbā, tathā akatvā tehi saha
tika-vin07t:1091_13: saṃvasantāpi alajjinova honti “ekopi alajjī alajjisatampi karotī”tiādivacanato. Yadi
tika-vin07t:1091_14: hi te evaṃ na niggahitā siyuṃ, saṅghe kalahādiṃ vaḍḍhetvā uposathādisāmaggīkammapaṭibāhanādinā
tika-vin07t:1091_15: pesalānaṃ aphāsuṃ katvā kamena te devadattavajjiputtakādayo viya parisaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
tika-vin07t:1091_16: attano vippaṭipattiṃ dhammato vinayato dīpentā saṅghabhedādimpi katvā nacirasseva
tika-vin07t:1091_17: sāsanaṃ antaradhāpeyyuṃ, tesu pana saṅghato bahikaraṇādivasena niggahitesu sabbopāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1092_0: “Dussīlapuggale nissāya uposatho na tiṭṭhati, pavāraṇā na tiṭṭhati, saṅghakammāni
tika-vin07t:1092_1: nappavattanti, sāmaggī na hoti…pe… dussīlesu pana niggahitesu sabbopi ayaṃ upaddavo
tika-vin07t:1092_2: na hoti, tato pesalā bhikkhū phāsu viharantī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1093: Tasmā ekakammādidhammaparibhogova āmisaparibhogatopi ativiya alajjivivekena kātabbo, āpattikaro ca saddhammaparihānihetuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1094_0: Apica uposatho na tiṭṭhati, pavāraṇā na tiṭṭhati, saṅghakammāni nappavattantīti evaṃ
tika-vin07t:1094_1: alajjīhi saddhiṃ saṅghakammākaraṇassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsitattāpi cetaṃ sijjhati,
tika-vin07t:1094_2: tathā parivattaliṅgassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunupassayaṃ gacchantassa paṭipattikathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1094_3: “ārādhikā ca honti saṅgāhikā lajjiniyo, tā kopetvā aññattha na gantabbaṃ. Gacchati
tika-vin07t:1094_5: saṅgahaṃ pana karonti, tāpi pariccajitvā aññattha gantuṃ labbhatī”ti evaṃ alajjinīsu
tika-vin07t:1094_7: tatopi alajjisaṃvāsāpatti eva saddhammaparihānihetuto garukatarāti viññāyati. Na
tika-vin07t:1094_8: hi lahukāpattiṭṭhānaṃ, anāpattiṭṭhānaṃ vā pariharituṃ garukāpattiṭṭhānavītikkamaṃ
tika-vin07t:1094_9: ācariyā anujānanti, tathā asaṃvāsapadassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbehipi lajjipuggalehi
tika-vin07t:1094_10: samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato samasikkhātā nāma. Ettha yasmā sabbepi lajjino etesu kammādīsu
tika-vin07t:1094_11: saha vasanti, na ekopi tato bahiddhā sandissati, tasmā tāni sabbānipi gahetvā eso
tika-vin07t:1094_12: saṃvāso nāmā”ti evaṃ lajjīheva ekakammādisaṃvāso vaṭṭatīti pakāsito.
tika-vin07t:1095_0: Yadi evaṃ, kasmā asaṃvāsikesu alajjī na gaṇitoti? Nāyaṃ virodho, ye gaṇapūrake katvā
tika-vin07t:1095_1: kataṃ kammaṃ kuppati, tesaṃ pārājikādiapakatattānaññeva asaṃvāsikatte gahitattā.
tika-vin07t:1095_2: Alajjino pana pakatattabhūtāpi santi, te ce gaṇapūraṇā hutvā kammaṃ sādhenti, kevalaṃ
tika-vin07t:1095_3: katvā agatigamanena karontānaṃ āpattikarā honti sabhāgāpattiāpannā viya aññamaññaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1095_4: Yasmā alajjitañca lajjitañca puthujjanānaṃ cittakkhaṇapaṭibaddhaṃ, na sabbakālikaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1095_5: Sañcicca hi vītikkamacitte uppanne alajjino “na puna īdisaṃ karissāmī”ti cittena
tika-vin07t:1095_6: lajjino ca honti, tesu ca ye pesalehi ovadiyamānāpi na oramanti, punappunaṃ vītikkamanti,
tika-vin07t:1095_7: te eva asaṃvasitabbā, na itare lajjidhamme okkantattā. Tasmāpi alajjino asaṃvāsikesu
tika-vin07t:1095_8: agaṇetvā tapparivajjanatthaṃ sodhetvāva uposathādikaraṇaṃ anuññātaṃ. Tathā hi “pārisuddhiṃ
tika-vin07t:1095_9: āyasmanto ārocetha, pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”tiādinā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathakaraṇassa
tika-vin07t:1095_10: ayuttatā pakāsitā, “yassa siyā āpatti so āvikareyya…pe… phāsu hotī”ti evaṃ alajjimpi
tika-vin07t:1095_11: lajjidhamme patiṭṭhāpetvā uposathakaraṇappakāro ca vutto, “kaccittha parisuddhā…pe…
tika-vin07t:1095_12: parisuddhetthāyasmanto”ti ca pārisuddhiuposathe “parisuddho ahaṃ bhante, parisuddhoti
tika-vin07t:1095_13: maṃ dhārethā”ti ca evaṃ uposathaṃ karontānaṃ parisuddhatā ca pakāsitā, vacanamattena
tika-vin07t:1095_14: anoramantānañca uposathapavaāraṇaṭṭhapanavidhi ca vuttā, sabbathā lajjidhammaṃ anokkamantehi
tika-vin07t:1095_17: ca vuttā. Tasmā yathāvuttehi suttanayehi, aṭṭhakathāvacanehi ca pakatattehipi apakatattehipi
tika-vin07t:1095_18: sabbehi alajjīhi ekakammādisaṃvāso na vaṭṭati, karontānaṃ āpatti eva dummaṅkūnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1095_19: puggalānaṃ niggahatthāyeva sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ paññattattāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1095_20: Teneva dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ pakatattāpi alajjino vajjiputtakā yasattherādīhi mahantena
tika-vin07t:1095_21: vāyāmena saṅghato viyojitā. Na hi tesu pārājikādiasaṃvāsikā atthi tehi dīpitānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1096_0: Tassa pana santiketi mahārakkhitattherassa santike. Kharapattanti kharasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t:1096_1: suvaṇṇapatirūpakaṃ vatthu. Dāyakehi asatiyā dinnaṃ rūpiyaṃ tehi puna sakasaññāya
tika-vin07t:1096_2: gaṇhante adātuṃ, nissaggiyavatthuṃ gaṇhāhīti dātuñca na vaṭṭatīti āha “tava coḷakaṃ
tika-vin07t:1096_3: passāhī”ti. Evaṃ vatvāpi pana naṭṭhavatthusmiṃ viya nissajjitabbābhāvepi āpatti desetabbāva.
tika-vin07t:1096_4: Asatiyāpi hi taṃ vatthuṃ vatthādinā sahatthena gahetvā “idaṃ demī”ti dinnaṃ, tadā
tika-vin07t:1096_5: pariccāgasabbhāvato dānameva hoti “appagghaṃ dassāmī”ti mahagghassa dāne viya. Paṭiggaṇhantassa
tika-vin07t:1096_6: ca asatiyā diyyamānatte ñātepi adinnādānaṃ na hoti dāyakehi dinnattā, tasmā rūpiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1096_7: nissaggiyameva hoti. Keci pana “īdisaṃ nāma na hoti, teneva cettha ‘tava coḷakaṃ
tika-vin07t:1096_8: passā’ti vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ no nakkhamati, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1097: 586. Ekaparicchedānīti siyā kiriyattaṃ, siyā akiriyattañca sandhāya vuttaṃ. Jātarūparajatabhāvo, attuddesikatā, gahaṇādīsu aññatarabhāvoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1101_0: 589. Pāḷiyaṃ ghanakatanti iṭṭhakādi. Rūpiyaṃ nāma satthuvaṇṇotiādīsu kiñcāpi kevalaṃ
tika-vin07t:1101_1: rajataṃ na gahitaṃ, tathāpi rūpiyapadeneva taṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Suddho rūpiyasaṃvohāro
tika-vin07t:1101_2: eva vuttoti ajjhāharitabbaṃ. Rūpiye rūpiyasaññītiādimhi vinicchayaṃ vakkhāmāti pāṭhaseso.
tika-vin07t:1102_0: 591. Pāḷiyaṃ rūpiye rūpiyasaññīti attanā diyyamānaṃ sakasantakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1102_1: Rūpiyaṃ cetāpetīti parasantakaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Tattha arūpiya-saddena dukkaṭavatthumpi
tika-vin07t:1102_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Pacchime pana tike “arūpiye rūpiyasaññī arūpiyaṃ cetāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin07t:1102_3: iminā nayena sabbattha yojanā veditabbā. Imasmiñca tike arūpiya-saddena kappiyavatthuyeva
tika-vin07t:1102_4: gahitaṃ, na muttādidukkaṭavatthu ante “pañcannaṃ saha anāpattī”ti vuttattā. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin07t:1102_5: dukkaṭavatthu na gahitaṃ, tathāpi dukkaṭavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuṃ, kappiyavatthunā
tika-vin07t:1102_6: dukkaṭavatthuñca parivattayato dukkaṭaṃ, nayato siddhameva hoti. Tañca dukkaṭavatthumhi
tika-vin07t:1102_7: tathasaññāya vā atathasaññāya vā vimatiyā vā parivattentassapi hotiyeva acittakattā
tika-vin07t:1102_8: imassa sikkhāpadassa. Pañcannaṃ sahāti pañcahi sahadhammikehi saha.
tika-vin07t:1103_0: Idāni “nissaggiyavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuṃ vā”tiādinā vuttassa atthassa pāḷiyaṃ sarūpena
tika-vin07t:1103_1: anāgatattepi nayato labbhamānataṃ dassetuṃ “yo hi aya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca yasmā
tika-vin07t:1103_2: rūpiyena parivattitaṃ arūpiyaṃ nissaṭṭhampi sabbesampi akappiyattā nissaggiyameva
tika-vin07t:1103_3: na hoti nissajjitvā paribhuñjitabbasseva nissajjitabbato, kevalaṃ pana idaṃ chaḍḍetvā
tika-vin07t:1103_4: pācittiyameva parivattakena desetabbaṃ, tasmā “rūpiye rūpiyasaññī arūpiyaṃ cetāpeti,
tika-vin07t:1103_5: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”ntiādi tiko bhagavatā na vutto, tīsupi padesu parivattiyamānassa
tika-vin07t:1103_6: arūpiyattena nissaggiyavacanāyogā rūpiyasseva nissajjitabbato. Rūpiyasseva hi nissaṭṭhassa
tika-vin07t:1103_7: ārāmikādīhi paṭipajjanavidhi pāḷiyaṃ dassito, na arūpiyassa. Tasmā pācittiyamattasambhavadassanatthameva
tika-vin07t:1103_8: panettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “avuttopi ayaṃ…pe… tiko veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ, na pana tassa
tika-vin07t:1103_9: vatthuno nissaggiyatādassanatthaṃ. Teneva pattacatukke “na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1103_10: kātu”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ amhākaṃ khanti. Attano vā hītiādi dutiyatikānulomeneva tatiyattikassa
tika-vin07t:1103_11: sijjhanappakāraṃ samatthetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – yasmā hi yathā attano arūpiyena
tika-vin07t:1103_12: parassa rūpiyaṃ cetāpentassa ekasmiṃ ante rūpiyasambhavato “rūpiyasaṃvohāro kato
tika-vin07t:1103_13: eva hotī”ti dutiyattiko vutto, evaṃ attano rūpiyena parassa arūpiyaṃ cetāpentassāpi
tika-vin07t:1103_14: hotīti tatiyo tiko vattabbo bhaveyya, so pana dutiyattikeneva ekato rūpiyapakkhasāmaññena
tika-vin07t:1103_15: sijjhatīti pāḷiyaṃ na vuttoti. Tattha ekantena rūpiyapakkheti ekena antena rūpiyapakkhe,
tika-vin07t:1104_0: Idāni dutiyattike arūpiyapadassa atthabhūtesu dukkaṭavatthukappiyavatthūsu dukkaṭavatthunā
tika-vin07t:1104_2: dukkaṭavatthuntiādi pana dukkaṭavatthunā parivattanappasaṅge pāḷiyaṃ avuttassāpi
tika-vin07t:1104_3: atthassa nayato labbhamānataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha imināti rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpadena,
tika-vin07t:1104_4: tena ca dukkaṭassa acittakatampi dasseti. Aññatra sahadhammikehīti “pañcannaṃ saha
tika-vin07t:1104_5: anāpattī”ti vacanato vuttaṃ, tenāpi kayavikkayasikkhāpadassa kappiyavatthunissitataṃ
tika-vin07t:1104_6: eva sādheti. Imaṃ…pe… rūpiyacetāpanañca sandhāya vuttanti pakatena sambandho. Idhāti
tika-vin07t:1105_0: Evaṃ dukkaṭavatthunā rūpiyādiparivattane āpattibhedaṃ dassetvā idāni kappiyavatthunāpi
tika-vin07t:1105_1: dassetuṃ “kappiyavatthunā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha tenevāti kappiyavatthunā eva.
tika-vin07t:1105_2: “Rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā”ti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ. Muttādidukkaṭavatthumpi uggahetvā
tika-vin07t:1105_3: kāritampi pañcannampi na vaṭṭati eva. Samuṭṭhāpetīti sayaṃ gantvā, “imaṃ kahāpaṇādiṃ
tika-vin07t:1105_4: kammakārānaṃ datvā bījaṃ samuṭṭhāpehī”ti evaṃ aññaṃ āṇāpetvā vā samuṭṭhāpeti. Mahāakappiyoti
tika-vin07t:1105_5: attanāva bījato paṭṭhāya dūsitattā aññassa mūlasāmikassa abhāvato vuttaṃ. So hi corehi
tika-vin07t:1105_6: acchinnopi puna laddho jānantassa kassacipi na vaṭṭati. Yadi hi vaṭṭeyya, taḷākādīsu
tika-vin07t:1105_7: viya acchinno vaṭṭatīti ācariyā vadeyyuṃ. Na sakkā kenaci upāyenāti saṅghe nissajjanena,
tika-vin07t:1105_8: corādiacchindanādinā ca kappiyaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā, idañca tena rūpena ṭhitaṃ, tammūlikena
tika-vin07t:1105_9: vatthumuttādirūpena ṭhitañca sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dukkaṭavatthumpi hi tammūlikakappiyavatthuñca
tika-vin07t:1105_10: na sakkā kenaci upāyena tena rūpena kappiyaṃ kātuṃ. Yadi pana so bhikkhu tena kappiyavatthudukkaṭavatthunā
tika-vin07t:1105_11: puna rūpiyaṃ cetāpeyya, taṃ rūpiyaṃ nissajjāpetvā aññesaṃ kappiyaṃ kātumpi sakkā
tika-vin07t:1106_0: Pattaṃ kiṇātīti ettha “iminā kahāpaṇādinā kammārakulato pattaṃ kiṇitvā ehī”ti ārāmikādīhi
tika-vin07t:1106_2: kahāpaṇehi sāṭake āhara, ettakehi yāguādīni sampādehīti vadati, yaṃ te āharanti,
tika-vin07t:1106_3: sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ. Kasmā? Kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā”ti vuttaṃ. Iminā pana vacanena
tika-vin07t:1106_4: yaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpadaṃ “anāṇattika”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ na
tika-vin07t:1106_5: sameti. Na kevalañca iminā, pāḷiyāpi taṃ na sameti. Pāḷiyañhi nissaṭṭharūpiyena ārāmikādīhi
tika-vin07t:1106_6: sappiyādiṃ parivattāpetuṃ “so vattabbo ‘āvuso, imaṃ jānāhī’ti. Sace so bhaṇati ‘iminā
tika-vin07t:1106_7: kiṃ āharīyatū’ti, na vattabbo ‘imaṃ vā imaṃ vā āharā’ti. Kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ ‘sappi
tika-vin07t:1106_8: vā”’tiādinā rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ parimocetvāva vuttaṃ. “Iminā rūpiyena kiṃ āharīyatū”ti
tika-vin07t:1106_9: pucchanto “imaṃ āharā”ti vuttepi adhikārato “iminā rūpiyena imaṃ āharā”ti bhikkhūhi
tika-vin07t:1106_10: āṇatto eva hotīti taṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ parivajjetuṃ “na vattabbo ‘imaṃ vā imaṃ vā
tika-vin07t:1106_11: āharā”’ti paṭikkhepo kato, anāpattivārepi “kappiyakārakassa ācikkhatī”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1106_12: Kayavikkayasikkhāpade pana tathā vuttaṃ, tasmā idaṃ sāṇattikaṃ kayavikkayameva anāṇattikanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1107_0: Mūlassa anissaṭṭhattāti yena uggahitamūlena patto kīto, tassa mūlassa saṅghamajjhe
tika-vin07t:1107_1: anissaṭṭhattā, etena rūpiyameva nissajjitabbaṃ, na tammūlikaṃ arūpiyanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1107_2: Yadi hi tena rūpiyena aññaṃ rūpiyaṃ cetāpeyya, taṃ rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpade āgatanayeneva
tika-vin07t:1107_3: nissajjāpetvā sesehi paribhuñjitabbaṃ bhaveyyāti. “Mūlassa asampaṭicchitattā”ti iminā
tika-vin07t:1107_4: mūlassa gihisantakattaṃ, teneva pattassa rūpiyasaṃvohārānuppannatañca dasseti. Pañcasahadhammikasantakeneva
tika-vin07t:1107_5: hi rūpiyasaṃvohāradoso. Tattha ca attano santake pācittiyaṃ, itarattha dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1108_0: Nissajjīti dānavasena vuttaṃ, na vinayakammavasena. Teneva “sappissa pūretvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1108_1: Yaṃ attano dhanena parivatteti, tassa vā dhanassa rūpiyabhāvo, parivattanaparivattāpanesu
tika-vin07t:1111_0: 593-5. Dasame pāḷiyaṃ jānāhīti idāneva upadhārehi, idaṃ pacchā chaḍḍetuṃ na sakkāti
tika-vin07t:1111_1: adhippāyo. Imināti bhikkhunā diyyamānaṃ vuttaṃ. Imanti parena paṭidiyyamānaṃ. Sesañātakesu
tika-vin07t:1111_2: saddhādeyyavinipātasambhavato tadabhāvaṭṭhānampi dassetuṃ “mātaraṃ pana pitaraṃ vā”ti
tika-vin07t:1111_3: vuttaṃ. Na sakkā taṃ paṭikkhipitunti ettha yathā rūpiyaṃ bhatakānaṃ datvā assāmikabhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1111_4: ayobījasamuṭṭhāpane bhatiyā khaṇantānaṃ santikā gahitabhaṇḍakabhāvepi pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1111_5: hoti, evamidhāpīti keci vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Yañhi assāmikabhūmiṃ khaṇitvā samuṭṭhāpitaṃ
tika-vin07t:1111_6: ayobījaṃ, taṃ bhatakānaṃ santakaṃ nāma hoti, tadatthañca tesaṃ rūpiyaṃ dentassa rūpiyasaṃvohārova
tika-vin07t:1111_7: hoti akappiyavohārena rajanacchalliādīnaṃ āharāpane kayavikkayo viya, tādisampi parabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin07t:1111_8: idha vatthadhovanādīsu natthi, tasmā aṭṭhakathāpamāṇenevettha pācittiyaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1112_0: 597. Puññaṃ bhavissatīti detīti ettha sace bhikkhu attano bhaṇḍassa appagghataṃ ñatvāpi
tika-vin07t:1112_1: akathetvā “idāneva upaparikkhitvā gaṇha, mā pacchā vippaṭisārī hohī”ti vadati, itaro
tika-vin07t:1112_2: ca attano diyyamānassa mahagghataṃ ajānanto “ūnaṃ vā adhikaṃ vā tumhākamevā”ti datvā
tika-vin07t:1112_3: gacchati, bhikkhussa anāpatti upanandassa viya paribbājakavatthuggahaṇe. Vippaṭisārissa
tika-vin07t:1112_4: puna sakasaññāya āgatassa yaṃ adhikaṃ gahitaṃ, taṃ dātabbaṃ. Yena yaṃ parivatteti,
tika-vin07t:1112_5: tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ kappiyavatthutā, asahadhammikatā, kayavikkayāpajjanañcāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1117_0: 602. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame aḍḍhaterasapalāti māgadhikāya mānatulāya aḍḍhaterasapalaparimitaṃ
tika-vin07t:1117_1: udakaṃ gaṇhantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tathā parimitaṃ yavamāsādiṃ gaṇhantiṃ sandhāyāti
tika-vin07t:1117_2: keci. Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “pakaticatumuṭṭhikaṃ kuḍuvaṃ, catukuḍuvaṃ nāḷi,
tika-vin07t:1117_3: tāya nāḷiyā soḷasa nāḷiyo doṇaṃ, taṃ pana magadhanāḷiyā dvādasa nāḷiyo hontīti vadantī”ti
tika-vin07t:1117_4: vuttaṃ. Damiḷanāḷīti purāṇanāḷiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sā ca catumuṭṭhikehi kuḍuvehi aṭṭha
tika-vin07t:1117_5: kuḍuvā, tāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo magadhanāḷiṃ gaṇhāti. Purāṇā pana “sīhaḷanāḷi tisso
tika-vin07t:1117_6: nāḷiyo gaṇhātī”ti vadanti, tesaṃ matena magadhanāḷi idāni pavattamānāya catukuḍuvāya
tika-vin07t:1117_7: damiḷanāḷiyā catunāḷikā hoti, tato magadhanāḷito upaḍḍhañca purāṇadamiḷanāḷisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t:1117_8: patthaṃ nāma hoti, etena ca “omako nāma patto patthodanaṃ gaṇhātī”ti pāḷivacanañca
tika-vin07t:1120_0: Evaṃ loke nāḷiyā magadhanāḷi diguṇāti dassitā, evañca gayhamāne omakapattassa ca
tika-vin07t:1120_1: yāpanamattodanagāhikā ca siddhā hoti. Na hi sakkā aṭṭhakuḍuvato ūnodanagāhinā pattena
tika-vin07t:1120_2: athūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariyesitvā yāpetuṃ. Teneva verañjakaṇḍaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pattho
tika-vin07t:1120_3: nāma nāḷimattaṃ hoti ekassa purisassa alaṃ yāpanāya. Vuttampi hetaṃ ‘patthodano nālamayaṃ
tika-vin07t:1120_4: duvinna”’nti vuttaṃ, “ekekassa dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pahotī”ti ca āgahaṃ, tasmā idha vuttanayānusāreneva gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1121_0: Ālopassa anurūpanti ettha “byañjanassa mattā nāma odanato catutthabhāgo”ti brahmāyusuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1121_1: vuttattā ālopassa catutthabhāgameva byañjanaṃ anurūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Odanagatikānevāti
tika-vin07t:1121_2: odanassa anto eva pavisanasīlāni siyuṃ, attano okāsaṃ na gavesantīti attho. Nāmamatteti
tika-vin07t:1122_0: 607-8. Evaṃ payoge payogeti pariyosānālopajjhoharaṇapayoge payoge, ālope ālopeti
tika-vin07t:1122_1: attho. Katvāti pākapariyosānaṃ katvā. Pacitvā ṭhapessāmīti kāḷavaṇṇapākaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin07t:1122_2: vuttaṃ. Chiddanti mukhavaṭṭito dvaṅgulassa heṭṭhāchiddaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ paṭhamakathine vuttanayameva.
tika-vin07t:1125_0: 609-613. Dutiye pāḷiyaṃ ahaṃ pattena te bhikkhū santapessāmīti seso. “Apatto”ti iminā
tika-vin07t:1125_1: adhiṭṭhānavijahanampi dasseti. Pañcabandhanepi patte aparipuṇṇapāke patte viya adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1125_2: na ruhati. “Tipupaṭṭakena vā”ti vuttattā tambalohādīhi kappiyalohehi ayopattassa
tika-vin07t:1125_3: chiddaṃ chādetuṃ vaṭṭati. Teneva “lohamaṇḍalakenā”ti vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade akāḷavaṇṇampi
tika-vin07t:1125_4: kappiyapattaṃ viññāpentassa āpatti evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānupagapattassa ūnapañcabandhanatā,
tika-vin07t:1125_5: attuddesikatā, akataviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1128_0: 618-621. Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ pilindavacchattherena “na kho, mahārāja, bhagavatā ārāmiko
tika-vin07t:1128_1: anuññāto”ti paṭhamaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ārāmika”nti puggalānampi
tika-vin07t:1128_2: ārāmikanāmena dāsaggahaṇe anuññāte eva ārāmikānaṃ gahitattā khettavatthādīni kappiyavohārenapi
tika-vin07t:1128_3: puggalānaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati, tathā ananuññātattāti viññāyati. “Khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā
tika-vin07t:1128_4: paṭivirato hotī”tiādinā hi paṭikkhittesu ekasseva puggalikavasena gahaṇe anuññāte
tika-vin07t:1128_5: itarītarānaṃ tathā na gahetabbatā siddhāva hoti. Yañca pilindavacchattherena dāyakakulassa
tika-vin07t:1128_6: dārikāya suvaṇṇamālāvasena tiṇaṇḍupakassa nimmānaṃ, taṃ “anāpatti, bhikkhave, iddhimassa
tika-vin07t:1128_7: iddhivisaye”ti vacanato kulasaṅgahādi na hotīti katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, keci pana “khīṇāsavānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1128_8: lābhicchāya abhāvato kulasaṅgahepi ājīvakopo natthī”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ khīṇāsavānampi
tika-vin07t:1128_10: bhindeyyamājīvaṃ, cajamānopi jīvita”nti. Bhagavatā ca “gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojanīya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1129_0: 622. Uggahitakanti paribhogatthāya sayaṃ gahitaṃ. Sayaṃ karotīti pacitvā karoti.
tika-vin07t:1129_2: khīranavanītaṃ pacitvā kataṃ. Nirāmisamevāti tadahupurebhattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ajja
tika-vin07t:1129_3: sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva bhuñjantassa kasmā sāmapāko na hotīti āha “navanītaṃ tāpentassā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1129_4: Paṭiggahitehīti khīradadhīni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Uggahitakehi kataṃ abbhañjanādīsu upanetabbanti
tika-vin07t:1129_5: yojanā. Eseva nayoti nissaggiyāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Akappiyamaṃsasappimhīti hatthiādīnaṃ sappimhi.
tika-vin07t:1130: Ettha panāti navanīte viseso atthīti attho. Dhotaṃ vaṭṭatīti dhotameva paṭiggahitumpi na vaṭṭati, itarathā savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ hotīti therānaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1131_0: Mahāsivattherassa pana vatthuno viyojitattā dadhiguḷikādīhi yuttatāmattena savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin07t:1131_1: nāma na hoti, tasmā takkato uddhaṭamattameva paṭiggahetvā dhovitvā, pacitvā vā nirāmisameva
tika-vin07t:1131_2: katvā paribhuñjiṃsūti adhippāyo, na pana dadhiguḷikādīhi saha vikāle bhuñjiṃsu. Tenāha
tika-vin07t:1131_3: “tasmā navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena…pe… savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotī”ti. Tattha
tika-vin07t:1131_4: adhotaṃ paṭiggahetvāpi taṃ navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena dadhiādīni apanetvā paribhuñjitabbanti
tika-vin07t:1131_5: attho. Khayaṃ gamissatīti nirāmisaṃ hoti, tasmā vikālepi vaṭṭatīti attho. Ettāvatāti
tika-vin07t:1131_6: navanīte laggamattena visuṃ dadhiādivohāraṃ aladdhena appamattena dadhiādināti attho,
tika-vin07t:1131_7: etena visuṃ paṭiggahitadadhiādīhi saha pakkaṃ savatthukapaṭiggahitasaṅkhyameva gacchatīti
tika-vin07t:1131_8: dasseti. Tasmimpīti nirāmisabhūtepi. Kukkuccakānaṃ pana ayaṃ adhippāyo – paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin07t:1131_9: tāva dadhiādīhi asambhinnarasattā bhattena sahitena guḷapiṇḍādi viya savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin07t:1131_10: nāma na hoti, taṃ pana pacantena dhovitvāva pacitabbaṃ, itarathā pacanakkhaṇe paccamānadadhiguḷikādīhi
tika-vin07t:1131_11: sambhinnarasatāya sāmaṃpakkaṃ jātaṃ, tesu khīṇesu sāmaṃpakkameva hoti, tasmā nirāmisameva
tika-vin07t:1131_12: pacitabbanti. Teneva “āmisena saha pakkattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1132_0: Ettha cāyaṃ vicāraṇā – savatthukapaṭiggahitattābhāve āmisena saha bhikkhunā pakkassa
tika-vin07t:1132_1: sayaṃpākadoso vā parisaṅkīyati yāvakālikatā vā, tattha na tāva sayaṃpākadoso ettha
tika-vin07t:1132_2: sambhavati sattāhakālikattā. Yañhi tattha dadhiādi āmisagataṃ, taṃ parikkhīṇanti.
tika-vin07t:1132_3: Atha paṭiggahitadadhiguḷikādinā saha attanā pakkattā savatthukapakkaṃ viya bhaveyyāti
tika-vin07t:1132_4: parisaṅkīyati, tadā āmisena saha paṭiggahitattāti kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ, na pana pakkattāti.
tika-vin07t:1132_5: Tathā ca upaḍḍhattherānaṃ matameva aṅgī kataṃ siyā. Tattha ca sāmaṇerādīhi pakkampi
tika-vin07t:1132_6: yāvakālikameva siyā paṭiggahitakhīrādiṃ pacitvā anupasampannehi katasappiādi viya
tika-vin07t:1132_7: ca, na ca taṃ yuttaṃ, bhikkhācārena laddhanavanītādīnaṃ takkādiāmisasaṃsaggasambhavena
tika-vin07t:1132_8: aparibhuñjitabbatāpasaṅgato. Na hi gahaṭṭhā dhovitvā, sodhetvā vā patte ākirantīti
tika-vin07t:1132_9: niyamo atthi, aṭṭhakathāyañca “yathā tattha patitataṇḍulakaṇādayo na paccanti, evaṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:1132_10: puna pacitvā deti, purimanayeneva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā vacanenapetaṃ virujjhati,
tika-vin07t:1132_11: tasmā idha kukkuccakānaṃ kukkuccuppattiyā nimittameva na dissati. Yathā cettha, evaṃ
tika-vin07t:1132_12: “lajjī sāmaṇero yathā tattha patitataṇḍulakaṇādayo na paccanti, evaṃ sāmisapākaṃ
tika-vin07t:1132_13: mocento aggimhi vilīyāpetvā…pe… vaṭṭatī”ti vacanassāpi nimittaṃ na dissati. Yadi
tika-vin07t:1132_14: hi etaṃ yāvakālikasaṃsaggaparihārāya vuttaṃ siyā, attanāpi tathā kātabbaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin07t:1132_15: Gahaṭṭhehi dinnasappiādīsu ca āmisasaṃsaggasaṅkā na vigaccheyya. Na hi gahaṭṭhā evaṃ
tika-vin07t:1132_16: vilīyāpetvā pana taṇḍulādiṃ apanetvā puna pacanti, apica bhesajjehi saddhiṃ khīrādiṃ
tika-vin07t:1132_17: pakkhipitvā yathā khīrādi khayaṃ gacchati, evaṃ parehi pakkabhesajjatelādipi yāvakālikameva
tika-vin07t:1132_18: siyā, na ca tampi yuttaṃ dadhiādikhayakaraṇatthaṃ “puna pacitvā detī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1132_19: Tasmā mahāsivattheravāde kukkuccaṃ akatvā adhotampi navanītaṃ tadahupi punadivasādīsupi
tika-vin07t:1132_20: pacituṃ, taṇḍulādimissaṃ sappiādiṃ attanāpi aggimhi vilīyāpetvā parissāvetvā puna
tika-vin07t:1133_0: Tattha vijjamānassapi paccamānakkhaṇe sambhinnarasassa yāvakālikassa abbohārikattena
tika-vin07t:1133_2: Teneva “ettāvatā savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Visuṃ paṭiggahitena
tika-vin07t:1133_3: pana khīrādiāmisena navanītādiṃ missetvā bhikkhunā vā aññehi vā pakkatelādibhesajjaṃ
tika-vin07t:1133_5: Yaṃ pana purepariggahitabhesajjehi appaṭiggahitaṃ khīrādiṃ pakkhipitvā pakkatelādikaṃ
tika-vin07t:1133_6: anupasampanneheva pakkampi savatthukapaṭiggahitampi sannidhipi na hoti, tattha pakkhittakhīrādikassapi
tika-vin07t:1133_7: tasmiṃ khaṇe sambhinnarasatāya purepaṭiggahitattāpattito. Sace pana appaṭiggahiteheva,
tika-vin07t:1133_8: aññehi vā pakkatelādīsupi sace āmisaraso paññāyati, taṃ yāvakālikameva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1134_0: Parissāvetvā gahitanti taṇḍulādivigamatthaṃ parissāvetvā, takkādivigamatthaṃ puna
tika-vin07t:1134_1: pacitvā gahitanti attho. Paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitabhesajjehīti atirekasattāhapaṭiggahitehi,
tika-vin07t:1134_2: etena tehi yuttampi sappiādi atirekasattāhapaṭiggahitaṃ na hotīti dasseti. Vaddalisamayeti
tika-vin07t:1135_0: Nibbaṭṭitattāti yāvakālikavatthuto vivecitattā, etena tele sabhāvato yāvakālikattābhāvaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1135_1: bhikkhuno savatthukapaṭiggahaṇena yāvakālikattupagamanañca dasseti. Ubhayampīti attanā, aññehi ca kataṃ.
tika-vin07t:1136_1: Saṃsaṭṭhanti parissāvitaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānanti ajjhohāre ajjhohāre tīṇi dukkaṭāni
tika-vin07t:1136_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi paribhogatthāya vikāle paṭiggahaṇapacanaparissāvanādīsu
tika-vin07t:1136_3: pubbapayogesu pāḷiyaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyañca āpatti na vuttā, tathāpi ettha āpattiyā eva
tika-vin07t:1136_4: bhavitabbaṃ paṭikkhittassa karaṇato āhāratthāya vikāle yāmakālikādīnaṃ paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin07t:1136_5: viya. Yasmā khīrādiṃ pakkhipitvā pakkabhesajjatele kasaṭaṃ āmisagatikaṃ, tena saha
tika-vin07t:1136_6: telaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ, pacituṃ vā bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati. Tasmā vuttaṃ “pakkatelakasaṭe
tika-vin07t:1136_7: viya kukkuccāyatī”ti. Sace vasāya saha pakkattā na vaṭṭati, idaṃ kasmā na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin07t:1136_8: pucchantā “bhante …pe… vaṭṭatī”ti āhaṃsu. Thero atikukkuccatāya ca “etampi, āvuso,
tika-vin07t:1136_9: na vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Roganiggahatthāya eva vasāya anuññātattaṃ sallakkhetvā pacchā
tika-vin07t:1137_0: “Madhukarīhi nāma madhumakkhikāhī”ti idaṃ khuddakabhamarānaṃ dvinnaṃ eva visesananti
tika-vin07t:1137_1: keci vadanti, aññe pana “daṇḍakesu madhukārikā madhukarīmakkhikā nāma, tāhi saha
tika-vin07t:1137_2: tisso madhumakkhikājātiyo”ti vadanti. Bhamaramakkhikāti mahāpaṭalakārikā. Silesasadisanti
tika-vin07t:1137_3: sukkhatāya vā pakkatāya vā ghanībhūtaṃ. Itaranti tanukamadhu.
tika-vin07t:1138_0: Ucchurasaṃ upādāyāti nikkasaṭarasassapi sattāhakālikataṃ dasseti “ucchumhā nibbatta”nti
tika-vin07t:1138_1: pāḷiyaṃ sāmaññato vuttattā. Yaṃ pana suttantaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ucchu ce, yāvakāliko.
tika-vin07t:1138_2: Ucchuraso ce, yāmakāliko. Phāṇitaṃ ce, sattāhakālikaṃ. Taco ce, yāvajīvako”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1138_3: taṃ ambaphalarasādimissatāya yāmakālikattaṃ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ, avinayavacanattā
tika-vin07t:1138_5: vuttaṃ. Nirāmisameva vaṭṭati tattha paviṭṭhayāvakālikassa abbohārikattāti idaṃ guḷe
tika-vin07t:1138_6: kate tattha vijjamānampi kasaṭaṃ pākena sukkhatāya yāvajīvikattaṃ bhajatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1138_7: Tassa yāvakālikatte hi sāmaṃpākena purebhattepi anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ siyāti. “Savatthukapaṭiggahitattā”ti
tika-vin07t:1138_8: idaṃ ucchurase cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hutvā ṭhitakasaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tena ca aparissāvitena
tika-vin07t:1138_9: appaṭiggahitena anupasampannehi kataṃ sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Jhāmaucchuphāṇitanti
tika-vin07t:1138_10: aggimhi ucchuṃ tāpetvā kataṃ. Koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitanti khuddānukhuddakaṃ chinditvā
tika-vin07t:1139_0: Taṃ tattha vijjamānampi kasaṭaṃ pakkakāle yāvakālikattaṃ vijahatīti āha “taṃ yutta”nti.
tika-vin07t:1139_1: Sītodakena katanti madhukapupphāni sītodakena madditvā parissāvetvā pacitvā kataṃ,
tika-vin07t:1139_2: amadditvā katanti keci, tattha kāraṇaṃ na dissati. Khīrajallikanti khīrapheṇaṃ. Madhukapupphaṃ
tika-vin07t:1139_3: panātiādi yāvakālikarūpena ṭhitassapi avaṭṭanakamerayabījavatthuṃ dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1140_0: Sabbānipīti sappiādīni pañcapi. Āhārakiccaṃ karontāni etāni kasmā evaṃ paribhuñjitabbānīti
tika-vin07t:1140_1: codanāparihārāya bhesajjodissaṃ dassentena tappasaṅgena sabbānipi odissakāni ekato
tika-vin07t:1140_2: dassetuṃ “sattavidhaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Apakatibhesajjattā vikaṭāni virūpāni visaharaṇato
tika-vin07t:1140_3: mahāvisayattā mahantāni cāti mahāvikaṭāni. Upasampadādīnīti ādi-saddena gaṇaṅgaṇūpāhanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin07t:1141_0: Adhiṭṭhetīti bāhiraparibhogatthametanti cittaṃ uppādeti, evaṃ paribhoge anapekkhatāya
tika-vin07t:1141_1: paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahatīti adhippāyo. Evaṃ aññesupi kālikesu anajjhoharitukāmatāya suddhacittena
tika-vin07t:1141_2: bāhiraparibhogatthāya niyamepi paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahatīti idampi visuṃ ekaṃ paṭiggahaṇavijahanakāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1142_0: 625. Sace dvinnaṃ…pe… na vaṭṭatīti ettha pāṭho gaḷito, evaṃ panettha pāṭho veditabbo
tika-vin07t:1142_1: “sace dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti, sattāhātikkame dvinnampi
tika-vin07t:1142_2: anāpatti, paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatī”ti. Aññathā hi saddappayogopi na saṅgahaṃ
tika-vin07t:1142_3: gacchati. “Gaṇṭhipadepi ca ayameva pāṭho dassito”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Dvinnampi
tika-vin07t:1142_4: anāpattīti avibhattattā vuttaṃ. “Paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ “sattāhaparamaṃ
tika-vin07t:1142_5: sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabba”nti vacanato vuttaṃ. “Yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tena vissajjitattā”ti
tika-vin07t:1142_6: iminā upasampannassa dānampi sandhāya “vissajjetī”ti idaṃ vuttanti dasseti. Upasampannassa
tika-vin07t:1142_7: nirapekkhadinnavatthumhi paṭiggahaṇassa avigatattepi sakasantakatā vigatāva hoti,
tika-vin07t:1142_8: tena nissaggiyaṃ na hoti. Attanāva paṭiggahitattaṃ, sakasantakattañcāti imehi dvīhi
tika-vin07t:1142_9: kāraṇehi nissaggiyaṃ hoti, na ekena. Anupasampannassa nirapekkhadāne pana tadubhayampi
tika-vin07t:1142_10: vijahati, paribhogopettha vaṭṭati, na sāpekkhadāne dānalakkhaṇābhāvato. “Vissajjetī”ti
tika-vin07t:1142_11: etasmiñca pāḷipade kassaci adatvā anapekkhatāya chaḍḍanampi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1142_13: hi vijahite puna paṭiggahetvā paribhogo sayameva vaṭṭissati, tabbijahanañca vatthuno
tika-vin07t:1142_14: sakasantakatāpariccāgena hotīti, etena ca vatthumhi ajjhoharaṇāpekkhāya sati paṭiggahaṇavissajjanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1142_15: nāma visuṃ na labbhatīti sijjhati. Itarathā hi “paṭiggahaṇe anapekkhova paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1142_16: vissajjetvā puna paṭiggahetvā bhuñjatī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā. “Appaṭiggahitattā”ti iminā
tika-vin07t:1142_17: ekassa santakaṃ aññena paṭiggahitampi nissaggiyaṃ hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1143_0: Evanti “puna gahessāmī”ti apekkhaṃ akatvā suddhacittena pariccattataṃ parāmasati.
tika-vin07t:1143_2: adhippāyo. Paribhoge anāpattidassanatthanti ettha pana nissaṭṭhapaṭiladdhassa kāyikaparibhogādīsu
tika-vin07t:1143_3: yā dukkaṭāpatti vuttā, tāya anāpattidassanatthanti adhippāyo. Sappiādīnaṃ paṭiggahitabhāvo,
tika-vin07t:1143_4: attano santakatā, sattāhātikkamoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1146_1: vuttaṃ. Taṃ “katvā nivāsetabba”nti imassa purimaddhamāse vā pacchimaddhamāse vā katvā
tika-vin07t:1146_2: pacchimamāseva nivāsetabbanti evamatthaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ nivāsaneyeva āpattiyā vuttattāti.
tika-vin07t:1146_3: Yaṃ pana mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “gimhānaṃ pacchimo māso pariyesanakkhettaṃ, pacchimo
tika-vin07t:1146_4: addhamāso karaṇanivāsanakkhettampī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ tasmiṃyeva addhamāse katvā nivāsetabbanti
tika-vin07t:1146_5: evamatthaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Idha vuttanayeneva atthe gahite virodho natthi.
tika-vin07t:1147_0: “Vattabhede dukkaṭa”nti idaṃ vassikasāṭikaadinnapubbe sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha “ye
tika-vin07t:1147_1: manussā”tiādi. Pakatiyā vassikasāṭikadāyakā nāma saṅghaṃ vā attānaṃ vā appavāretvāva
tika-vin07t:1148_0: 630. “Cha māse parihāraṃ labhatī”ti etena antovassepi yāva vassānassa pacchimadivasā
tika-vin07t:1148_1: akatā parihāraṃ labhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti. Ekamāsanti hemantassa pacchimuposathena saha
tika-vin07t:1148_2: gaṇetvā vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ uposathadivase eva hi taṃ mūlacīvaraṃ kātabbaṃ, itarathā hi
tika-vin07t:1148_3: nissaggiyato. Ekāhadvīhādivasena…pe… laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cāti ettha ekāhānāgatāya
tika-vin07t:1148_4: vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca dvīhānāgatāya…pe… dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya
tika-vin07t:1148_5: laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca, antovasse vā laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t:1148_6: Tattha āsaḷhīmāsassa juṇhapakkhapuṇṇamiyaṃ laddhā, tadaheva rajanakappapariyosānehi
tika-vin07t:1148_7: niṭṭhitā ca vassikasāṭikā “ekāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā”ti
tika-vin07t:1148_8: vuccati. Eteneva nayena juṇhapakkhassa chaṭṭhiyaṃ laddhā, niṭṭhitā ca “dasāhānāgatāya
tika-vin07t:1148_9: vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā”ti vuccati. Yāva paṭhamakattikatemāsipuṇṇamā,
tika-vin07t:1148_10: tāva laddhā, niṭṭhitā ca “antovasse laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā”ti vuccati. Paṭhamakattikatemāsipuṇṇamito
tika-vin07t:1148_11: paraṃ laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca yāva cīvarakālo nātikkamati, tāva anadhiṭṭhahitvāpi
tika-vin07t:1149_0: Ettha ca “tasmiṃyeva antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbā”ti avisesena vuttepi vassānato pubbe
tika-vin07t:1149_1: ekāhadvīhādivasena anāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā tehi divasehi dasāhaṃ anatikkamantena
tika-vin07t:1149_2: vassūpanāyikadivasato paṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhānakkhettaṃ sampattā eva adhiṭṭhātabbā, tato
tika-vin07t:1149_3: pana pubbe dasāhātikkamena niṭṭhitāpi na adhiṭṭhātabbā adhiṭṭhānassa akhettattā.
tika-vin07t:1149_4: Tādisā pana vassūpanāyikadivase eva adhiṭṭhātabbā, anadhiṭṭhahato aruṇuggamanena
tika-vin07t:1149_5: nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Yadi evaṃ “dasāhānāgatāyā”ti iminā kiṃ payojananti ce? Vassānato
tika-vin07t:1149_6: pubbe eva dasāhe atikkante niṭṭhitā vassūpanāyikadivase eva adhiṭṭhātabbāti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:1150_0: Dasāhe appahonte cīvarakālaṃ nātikkametabbāti temāsabbhantare dasāhe appahonte navāhānāgatāya
tika-vin07t:1150_1: kattikatemāsipuṇṇamāya sattamito paṭṭhāya laddhā, niṭṭhitā ca cīvarakālaṃ nātikkametabbāti
tika-vin07t:1150_2: attho. Tathā hi “māso seso gimhānanti bhikkhunā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabba”nti
tika-vin07t:1150_3: pariyesanakkhettaṃ vatvā “vassikasāṭikaṃ vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti vuttattā
tika-vin07t:1150_4: katāyapi akatāyapi māsamattaṃ anadhiṭṭhātabbatā siddhā. Yasmā ca akatā vassikasāṭikasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1150_5: na gacchati, akaraṇañca kenaci vekallena, na anādarena, tasmā cātumāsaṃ akatattā
tika-vin07t:1150_6: eva parihāraṃ labhati, katā pana adhiṭṭhānakkhette, akatā ca cīvarakāle dasāhaparamasikkhāpadeneva
tika-vin07t:1150_7: parihāraṃ labhatīti ayamattho labbhati. Kasmāti attano matiyā kāraṇapucchā. Tasmāti
tika-vin07t:1150_9: panettha sesacīvarānaṃ evaṃ kālaniyamābhāvaṃ sādhetuṃ uddhaṭaṃ. Na hi tenettha aññaṃ payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-vin07t:1151: Kadā adhiṭṭhātabbātiādikurundivacanenāpi “yadā vā tadā vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dasāhabbhantare eva katāya adhiṭṭhātabbataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1152_1: asamaye pariyesananivāsanāpattiyā eva anāpatti vuttā. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “acchinnacīvarassa
tika-vin07t:1152_2: vā naṭṭhacīvarassa vā anivatthaṃ corā harantīti evaṃ āpadāsu vā nivāsayato ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin07t:1152_3: anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ, idha pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ ayaṃ nissaggiyā anāpatti pāḷito
tika-vin07t:1152_4: sayameva sijjhatīti imaṃ adassetvā asijjhamānaṃ naggassa nhāyato dukkaṭāpattiyā eva
tika-vin07t:1152_5: anāpattiṃ dassetuṃ “acchinnacīvarassā”tiādi vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Na hi esā anāpatti
tika-vin07t:1152_6: avutte sijjhatīti. Vassikasāṭikāya attuddesikatā, asamaye pariyesanatā, tāya ca paṭilābhoti
tika-vin07t:1152_7: imāni tāva pariyesanāpattiyā tīṇi aṅgāni. Nivāsanāpattiyā pana sacīvaratā, āpadābhāvo,
tika-vin07t:1152_8: vassikasāṭikāya sakabhāvo, asamaye nivāsananti cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1155: 631. Pañcame yampi…pe… acchindīti ettha yaṃ te ahaṃ cīvaraṃ adāsiṃ, taṃ “mayā saddhiṃ pakkamissatī”ti saññāya adāsiṃ, na aññathāti kupito acchindīti evaṃ ajjhāharitvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1156_0: 633. Ekaṃ dukkaṭanti yadi āṇatto avassaṃ acchindati, āṇattikkhaṇe pācittiyameva.
tika-vin07t:1156_1: Yadi na acchindati, tadā eva dukkaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekavācāya sambahulā āpattiyoti
tika-vin07t:1156_2: yadi āṇatto anantarāyena acchindati, āṇattikkhaṇeyeva vatthugaṇanāya pācittiyaāpattiyo
tika-vin07t:1156_3: payogakaraṇakkhaṇeyeva āpattiyā āpajjitabbato, cīvaraṃ pana acchinneyeva nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1156_4: hoti. Yadi so na acchindati, āṇattikkhaṇe ekameva dukkaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ aññatthāpi
tika-vin07t:1157_0: 635. Upajjhaṃ gaṇhissatīti sāmaṇerassa dānaṃ dīpeti, tena ca sāmaṇerakāle datvā upasampannakāle
tika-vin07t:1157_1: acchindatopi pācittiyaṃ dīpeti. “Bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā”ti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena
tika-vin07t:1157_2: vuttaṃ. Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatīti kamme akate bhatisadisattā vuttaṃ. Vikappanupagapacchimacīvaratā,
tika-vin07t:1157_3: sāmaṃ dinnatā, sakasaññitā, upasampannatā, kodhavasena acchindanaṃ vā acchindāpanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1160_0: 636. Chaṭṭhe vītavītaṭṭhānaṃ yasmiṃ caturassadārumhi paliveṭhenti, tassa turīti nāmaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1160_1: Vāyantā tiriyaṃ suttaṃ pavesetvā yena ākoṭentā vatthe ghanabhāvaṃ āpādenti, taṃ “vema”nti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1161: “Itarasmiṃ tatheva dukkaṭa”nti iminā vāyituṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya yathāvuttaparicchedaniṭṭhiteyeva dukkaṭampi hoti, na tato pubbe vāyanapayogesūti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1162_0: Tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbanti ettha ekavāraṃ adhiṭṭhite pacchā vītaṃ adhiṭṭhitagatikameva
tika-vin07t:1162_1: hoti, puna adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi. Sace pana antarantarā dasā ṭhapetvā visuṃ visuṃ
tika-vin07t:1162_2: saparicchedaṃ vītaṃ hoti, paccekaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca kappiyasuttaṃ
tika-vin07t:1162_4: vāyāpentassa anāpatti. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vāyāpeyyā”ti padassa “cīvaraṃ me,
tika-vin07t:1162_5: āvuso, vāyathāti akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpeyyā”ti attho vutto, evaṃ vadanto akappiyatantavāyena
tika-vin07t:1163_0: 640. Anāpatti cīvaraṃ sibbetuntiādīsu iminā sikkhāpadeneva anāpatti, akataviññattipaccayā
tika-vin07t:1163_1: pana dukkaṭamevāti vadanti. Akappiyasuttatā, attuddesikatā, akappiyatantavāyena akappiyaviññattiyā
tika-vin07t:1166_0: 642. Sattame “kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyyā”ti idaṃ payogabhedadassanaṃ, dānaṃ panettha
tika-vin07t:1166_1: aṅgaṃ na hoti. Teneva tassa vibhaṅge “antamaso dhammampi bhaṇatī”ti vuttaṃ. Sesamettha
tika-vin07t:1166_2: uttānameva. Aññātakaappavāritānaṃ tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā vikappamāpajjanatā, cīvarassa
tika-vin07t:1166_3: attuddesikatā, tassa vacanena suttavaḍḍhanaṃ, cīvarapaṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1169_0: 646. Aṭṭhame chaṭṭhiyaṃ uppannacīvarassa ekādasamāruṇo cīvarakāle uṭṭhātīti āha “chaṭṭhito
tika-vin07t:1169_1: paṭṭhāyā”tiādi, tena ca “dasāhānāgata”nti vuttattā pañcamito paṭṭhāya puṇṇamito pubbe
tika-vin07t:1169_2: dasasu aruṇesu uṭṭhitesupi cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ na hoti. Puṇṇamiyā saha ekādasa divasā
tika-vin07t:1169_3: labbhantīti ettakameva iminā sikkhāpadena laddhaṃ, chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya uppannaṃ sabbacīvaraṃ
tika-vin07t:1169_4: paṭhamakathinasikkhāpadavaseneva yāva cīvarakālaṃ nissaggiyaṃ na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1170_0: 650. Idāni paṭhamakathinādisikkhāpadehi tassa tassa cīvarassa labbhamānaṃ parihāraṃ
tika-vin07t:1170_2: ekādasadivasādhiko māso, atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañca māsā”ti ayameva
