tika-vin07t:1170_3: pāṭho pāḷiyā sameti. Keci pana “dasadivasādhiko māso, dasadivasādhikā pañca māsāti
tika-vin07t:1170_4: pāṭhena bhavitabba”nti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ, aññathā “navāhānāgata”nti vattabbato.
tika-vin07t:1170_6: imināva siddho, aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapita”nti
tika-vin07t:1170_7: likhanti, taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ “pavāraṇamāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāya uppannassa
tika-vin07t:1170_8: cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito hotī”ti vuttattā. Imameva ca pamādalikhitaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin07t:1170_9: bhadantabuddhadattācariyena ca “parihārekamāsova, dasāhaparamo mato”tiādi vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1171_0: Accekacīvarasadise aññasminti pubbe adhiṭṭhite uppannakālākārādi sādisena accekacīvarasadise
tika-vin07t:1171_1: aññasmiṃ cīvare accekacīvarasaññāya cīvarakālaṃ atikkametīti attho. Tenevettha dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1171_2: anāpatti ca vuttā, itarathā tīsupi padesu pācittiyasseva vattabbato. Anaccekacīvarampi
tika-vin07t:1171_3: hi cīvarakālaṃ atikkamayato pācittiyameva accekacīvarattike viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vikappanupagapacchimappamāṇassa
tika-vin07t:1171_4: accekacīvarassa attano santakatā, dasāhānāgatāya kattikatemāsipuṇṇamāya uppannabhāvo,
tika-vin07t:1174_0: 652-3. Navame antarantarā gharametthāti antaragharanti gāmo vuttoti āha “antogāme”ti.
tika-vin07t:1174_1: “Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti imassa vibhaṅge “upasampajja”nti sānusāraṃ
tika-vin07t:1174_3: vibhaṅgapadassapi. Vutthavassānanti ca niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ, etena ca purimasikkhāpade
tika-vin07t:1174_4: anatthatakathinānaṃ kathinamāsepi asamādānacāro na labbhatīti siddhaṃ hoti, itarathā
tika-vin07t:1175_0: Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānatoti ettha gāmapariyante ṭhitagharūpacārato paṭṭhāya eko leḍḍupāto
tika-vin07t:1175_2: vuttaṃ. Tanti taṃ paṭhamasenāsanādiṃ. Majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vihārassapi
tika-vin07t:1175_3: gāmasseva upacāraṃ nīharitvā ubhinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antarā minitabbanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1176_0: “Kosambiyaṃ aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hotī”ti āgatattā “kosambakasammuti anuññātā”ti
tika-vin07t:1176_1: vuttaṃ. “Ayañca pacchimadisaṃ gato hotī”ti iminā antaraghare cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin07t:1176_2: tasmiṃ vihāre vasantassa sakalampi cīvaramāsaṃ vippavasituṃ vaṭṭati, tato aññattha
tika-vin07t:1176_3: gamanakicce sati vihārato bahi chārattaṃ vippavāso anuññātoti dīpeti. Tenāha “senāsanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1176_4: āgantvā sattamaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetu”ntiādi. Vasitvāti aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā. Tatthevāti
tika-vin07t:1176_5: tasmiññeva gataṭṭhāne. Aṅgāni panettha aṭṭhakathāyameva vuttāni.
tika-vin07t:1179_0: 660. Dasame ropitamālavacchatoti kenaci niyametvā ropitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anocitaṃ
tika-vin07t:1179_1: milāyamānaṃ ocinitvā yattha katthaci pūjetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ṭhitaṃ disvāti sesakaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin07t:1179_2: ṭhitaṃ disvā. Yattha icchatha, tattha dethāti ettha niyametvā “asukassa dehī”ti vuttepi
tika-vin07t:1179_3: doso natthi “tumhākaṃ ruciyā”ti vuttattā. Saṅghe pariṇatabhāvo, taṃ ñatvā attano
tika-vin07t:1191_1: vadanti. Tatthāti tesu vaggesu, khuddakesu vā. “Jānitabbato”ti hetuno vipakkhepi
tika-vin07t:1191_2: nibbāne vattanato anekantikatte parehi vutte “na mayā ayaṃ hetu vutto”ti taṃ kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1191_3: paṭicchādetuṃ puna “jātidhammatoti mayā vutta”ntiādīni vadati. “Sampajāna”nti vattabbe
tika-vin07t:1192_0: 2. Sampajānamusāvādeti attanā vuccamānassa atthassa vitathabhāvaṃ pubbepi jānitvā,
tika-vin07t:1192_1: vacanakkhaṇe ca jānantassa musāvādabhaṇane. Tenāha “jānitvā”tiādi. Musāvādeti ca
tika-vin07t:1192_2: nimittatthe bhummaṃ, tasmā musābhaṇananimittaṃ pācittiyanti evamettha, ito paresupi
tika-vin07t:1193: 3. Vadanti etāyāti vācāti āha “micchā”tiādi. “Dhanunā vijjhatī”tiādīsu viya “cakkhunā diṭṭha”nti pākaṭavasena vuttanti āha “oḷārikenā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1194_0: 11. Gato bhavissatīti etthāpi sanniṭṭhānato vuttattā musāvādo jāto. Āpattinti pācittiyāpattiṃ,
tika-vin07t:1194_1: na dubbhāsitaṃ. Jātiādīhi dasahi akkosavatthūhi paraṃ davā vadantassa hi taṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:1194_2: Cāresunti upanesuṃ. Vatthuviparītatā, visaṃvādanapurekkhāratā, yamatthaṃ vatthukāmo,
tika-vin07t:1194_3: tassa puggalassa viññāpanapayogo cāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Vatthuviparītatāya hi
tika-vin07t:1194_4: asati visaṃvādanapurekkhāratāya viññāpitepi musāvādo na hoti, dukkaṭamattameva hoti.
tika-vin07t:1194_5: Tasmā sāpi aṅgamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Uttarimanussadhammārocanatthaṃ musā bhaṇantassa
tika-vin07t:1194_6: pārājikaṃ, pariyāyena thullaccayaṃ, amūlakena pārājikena anuddhaṃsanatthaṃ saṅghādiseso,
tika-vin07t:1194_8: davā akkosantassa dubbhāsitaṃ, kevalaṃ musā bhaṇantassa idha pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1197: 13. Dutiye pubbe patiṭṭhitārappadesaṃ puna are patteti paṭhamaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitanemippadese parivattetvā puna bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhiteti attho.
tika-vin07t:1198_0: 15. Pubbeti aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ. Pupphachaḍḍakā nāma gabbhamalādihārakā. Tacchakakammanti
tika-vin07t:1198_2: nāma ekaṭṭhānadasaṭṭhānādīsu sāriyo ṭhapetvā anukkamena gaṇanā. Ādi-saddena saṅkalanapaṭauppādanavoklanabhāgahārādivasena
tika-vin07t:1198_3: pavattā piṇḍagaṇanā gahitā. Yassa sā paguṇā, so rukkhampi disvā “ettakāni ettha paṇṇānī”ti
tika-vin07t:1199: 16. Na purimenāti musāvādasikkhāpadena. Sopi āpattiyāti upasaggādivisiṭṭhehipi vadanto pācittiyāpattiyāva kāretabbo.
tika-vin07t:1200_0: 26. Dubbhāsitanti sāmaññato vuttattā pāḷiyaṃ anāgatehipi parammukhā vadantassapi
tika-vin07t:1200_1: dubbhāsitamevāti ācariyā vadanti tato lāmakāpattiyā abhāvā, anāpattiyāpettha bhavituṃ
tika-vin07t:1200_2: ayuttattā. Sabbasattāti ettha vacanatthavidūhi tiracchānādayopi gahitā.
tika-vin07t:1201_0: 35. Anusāsanīpurekkhāratāya vā pāpagarahitāya vā vadantānaṃ cittassa lahuparivattibhāvato
tika-vin07t:1201_1: antarantarā kope uppannepi anāpatti. Kāyavikāramattenapi omasanasambhavato “tisamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1201_2: kāyakamma”nti ca vuttaṃ. Parivāre pana “catutthena āpattisamuṭṭhānena…pe… dubbhāsitaṃ
tika-vin07t:1201_3: āpajjeyyāti. Na hīti vattabba”ntiādinā itarāni samuṭṭhānāni paṭikkhipitvā pañcamasseva
tika-vin07t:1201_4: vuttattā āha “dubbhāsitāpatti panettha vācācittato samuṭṭhātī”ti. Davakamyatāya hi
tika-vin07t:1201_5: kāyavācācittehi omasantassapi vācācittameva āpattiyā aṅgaṃ hoti, na pana kāyo vijjamānopi
tika-vin07t:1201_6: dhammadesanāpatti viya kevalaṃ kāyavikāreneva. Omasantassa pana kiñcāpi idha dubbhāsitāpattiyā
tika-vin07t:1201_7: anāpatti, atha kho kāyakīḷāpaṭikkhepasikkhāpadena dukkaṭamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Upasampannaṃ
tika-vin07t:1201_8: jātiādīhi anaññāpadesena akkosanaṃ, tassa jānanaṃ, atthapurekkhāratādīnaṃ abhāvoti
tika-vin07t:1204_0: 36. Tatiye bhaṇḍanaṃ jātaṃ etesanti bhaṇḍanajātā. Pisatīti pisuṇā, vācā, samagge
tika-vin07t:1204_1: bhinne karotīti attho. Tāya vācāya samannāgato pisuṇo, tassa kammaṃ pesuññanti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:1205_0: Idhāpi jātiādīhi dasahi vatthūhi pesuññaṃ upasaṃharantasseva pācittiyaṃ, itarehi
tika-vin07t:1205_1: akkosavatthūhi dukkaṭaṃ. Anakkosavatthūhi pana upasaṃharantassa dukkaṭamevāti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1205_2: Jātiādīhi anaññāpadesena akkosantassa bhikkhuno sutvā bhikkhussa upasaṃharaṇaṃ, piyakamyatābhedādhippāyesu
tika-vin07t:1205_3: aññataratā, tassa vijānanāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1208_0: 45. Catutthe purimabyañjanena sadisanti “rūpaṃ anicca”nti ettha anicca-saddena sadisaṃ
tika-vin07t:1208_1: “vedanā aniccā”ti ettha anicca-saddaṃ vadati. Akkharasamūhoti avibhattiko vutto.
tika-vin07t:1209_0: Ekaṃ padanti gāthāpadameva sandhāya vadati. Padagaṇanāyāti gāthāpadagaṇanāya. Apāpuṇitvāti
tika-vin07t:1209_1: saddhiṃ akathetvā. Etena gāthāya pacchimapāde vuccamāne sāmaṇero paṭhamapādādiṃ vadati,
tika-vin07t:1209_2: āpattiyeva, tasmiṃ nissadde eva itarena vattabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1210_0: Aṭṭhakathānissitoti saṅgītittayāruḷhaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathaṃ sandhāya vadati. Idānipi
tika-vin07t:1210_1: “yathāpi dīpiko nāma, nilīyitvā gaṇhate mige”ti evamādikaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ attheva,
tika-vin07t:1210_2: buddhaghosācariyādīhi porāṇaṭṭhakathānayena vuttampi idha saṅgahetabbanti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1211: 46. Pāḷiyaṃ akkharāyātiādi liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, akkharenātiādinā attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1212_0: 48. Upacāraṃ muñcitvāti parisāya dvādasahatthaṃ muñcitvā ekato ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa
tika-vin07t:1212_1: vā anupasampannassa akathetvā aññe uddissa bhaṇantassāpi anāpatti. Sace pana dūre
tika-vin07t:1212_2: nisinnampi uddissa bhaṇati, āpatti eva. Opātetīti saddhiṃ katheti. Anupasampannatā,
tika-vin07t:1212_3: vuttalakkhaṇadhammaṃ padaso vācanatā, ekato bhaṇanañcāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1215_0: 50-51. Pañcame tatridaṃ nidassananti seso. Dirattatirattanti ettha dirattaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1215_1: vacanālaṅkāratthaṃ, nirantaraṃ tissova rattiyo vasitvā catutthadivasādīsu sayantasseva
tika-vin07t:1215_2: āpatti, na ekantarikādivasena sayantassāti dassanatthampīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dirattavisiṭṭhañhi
tika-vin07t:1215_3: tirattaṃ vuccamānaṃ, tena anantarikameva tirattaṃ dīpetīti. Pañcahi chadanehīti iṭṭhakasilāsudhātiṇapaṇṇehi.
tika-vin07t:1215_5: Ekūpacāro ekena maggena pavisitvā abbhokāsaṃ anukkamitvā sabbattha anuparigamanayoggo,
tika-vin07t:1215_6: etaṃ bahudvārampi ekūpacārova. Tattha pana kuṭṭādīhi rundhitvā visuṃ dvāraṃ yojenti,
tika-vin07t:1215_7: nānūpacāro hoti. Sace pana rundhati eva, visuṃ dvāraṃ na yojenti, “etampi ekūpacārameva
tika-vin07t:1215_8: mattikādīhi pihitadvāro viya gabbho”ti gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā gabbhe pavisitvā pamukhādīsu
tika-vin07t:1215_9: nipannānupasampannehi sahaseyyāparimuttiyā gabbhadvāraṃ mattikādīhi pidahāpetvā uṭṭhite
tika-vin07t:1216_0: Tesaṃ payoge payoge bhikkhussa āpattīti ettha keci “anuṭṭhahanena akiriyasamuṭṭhānā
tika-vin07t:1216_1: āpatti vuttā tasmiṃ khaṇe sayantassa kiriyābhāvā. Idañhi sikkhāpadaṃ siyā kiriyāya
tika-vin07t:1216_2: samuṭṭhāti, siyā akiriyāya samuṭṭhāti. Kiriyāsamuṭṭhānatā cassa tabbahulavasena vuttāti
tika-vin07t:1216_3: vadati. Yathā cetaṃ, evaṃ divāsayanampi. Anuṭṭhahanena, hi dvārāsaṃvaraṇena cetaṃ
tika-vin07t:1216_4: akiriyasamauṭṭhānampi hotī”ti vadanti. Idañca yuttaṃ viya dissati, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1217_1: natthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Uparimatale sayitassa saṅkā eva natthīti “heṭṭhāpāsāde”tiādi
tika-vin07t:1218_0: Sabhāsaṅkhepenāti sabhākārena. “Aḍḍhakuṭṭake”ti iminā saṇṭhānaṃ dasseti. Yattha tīsu
tika-vin07t:1218_1: dvīsu vā passesu bhittiyo baddhā, chadanaṃ vā asampattā aḍḍhabhitti, idaṃ aḍḍhakuṭṭakaṃ
tika-vin07t:1218_2: nāma. Vāḷasaṅghāṭo nāma parikkhepassa anto thambhādīnaṃ upari vāḷarūpehi katasaṅghāṭo.
tika-vin07t:1218_3: Parikkhepassa bahigateti ettha yasmiṃ passe parikkhepo natthi, tattha sace bhūmito
tika-vin07t:1218_4: vatthu uccaṃ hoti, ubhato uccavatthuto heṭṭhā bhūmiyaṃ nibbakosabbhantarepi anāpatti
tika-vin07t:1218_5: eva tattha senāsanavohārābhāvato. Atha vatthu nīcaṃ bhūmisamameva senāsanassa heṭṭhimatale
tika-vin07t:1218_6: tiṭṭhati, tattha parikkheparahitadisāya nibbakosabbhantare sabbattha āpatti hoti,
tika-vin07t:1218_7: paricchedābhāvato parikkhepassa bahi eva anāpattīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Parimaṇḍalaṃ vātiādi
tika-vin07t:1218_8: majjhe udakapatanatthāya ākāsaṅgaṇavantaṃ senāsanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha aparicchinnagabbhūpacāreti
tika-vin07t:1218_9: ekekagabbhassa dvīsu passesu pamukhena gamanaṃ paricchinditvā diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhato
tika-vin07t:1218_10: anūnaṃ kuṭṭaṃ katvā ākāsaṅgaṇena pavesaṃ karonti, evaṃ akatoti attho. Gabbhaparikkhepoti
tika-vin07t:1219_0: Pāṭekkasannivesāti ekekadisāya gabbhapāḷiyo itaradisāsu gabbhapāḷīnaṃ abhāvena, bhāvepi
tika-vin07t:1219_1: vā aññamaññabhitticchadanehi asambandhatāya pāṭekkasannivesā nāma vuccati. Taṃ…pe…
tika-vin07t:1219_2: sandhāya vuttanti tattha pācittiyena anāpattīti vuttaṃ, na dukkaṭena. Tādisāya hi
tika-vin07t:1219_3: gabbhapāḷiyā pamukhaṃ tīsu disāsu bhittīnaṃ abhāvena ekadisāya gabbhabhittimattena
tika-vin07t:1219_4: sabbacchannaṃ cūḷaparicchannaṃ nāma hoti. Tasmā dukkaṭameva. Yadi pana tassa pamukhassa
tika-vin07t:1219_5: itaradisāsupi ekissaṃ, sabbāsu vā bhittiṃ karonti, tadā sabbacchannaupaḍḍhaparicchannādibhāvato
tika-vin07t:1219_6: pācittiyameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhūmiyaṃ vinā jagatiyā pamukhaṃ sandhāyāti ettha
tika-vin07t:1219_7: uccavatthuṃ akatvā bhūmiyaṃ katagehassa pamukhaṃ sandhāya aparikkhitte pācittiyena
tika-vin07t:1219_8: anāpattīti idaṃ kathitaṃ. Uccavatthukaṃ ce pamukhaṃ hoti, tena vatthunā parikkhittasaṅkhyameva
tika-vin07t:1219_9: pamukhaṃ gacchatīti adhippāyo. Tatthāti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Jagatiyā pamāṇaṃ vatvāti
tika-vin07t:1219_10: pakatibhūmiyā nipanno yathā jagatiyā upari sayitaṃ na passati, evaṃ uccātiuccavatthussa
tika-vin07t:1219_11: ubbedhappamāṇaṃ vatvā. Ekadisāya ujukameva dīghaṃ katvā sannivesito pāsādo ekasālasanniveso.
tika-vin07t:1219_12: Dvīsu, tīsu vā catūsupi vā disāsu siṅghāṭakasaṇṭhānādivasena katā dvisālādisannivesā
tika-vin07t:1219_13: veditabbā. Sālappabhedadīpanameva cettha purimato visesoti. Parikkhepo viddhastoti
tika-vin07t:1220_0: 53. Upaḍḍhacchannaupaḍḍhaparicchannaṃ senāsanaṃ dukkaṭassa ādiṃ vatvā pāḷiyaṃ dassitattā
tika-vin07t:1220_1: tato adhikaṃ sabbacchannaupaḍḍhaparicchannādikampi sabbaṃ pāḷiyaṃ avuttampi pācittiyasseva
tika-vin07t:1220_2: vatthubhāvena dassitaṃ sikkhāpadassa paṇṇattivajjattā, garuke ṭhātabbato cāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1220_3: Satta pācittiyānīti pāḷiyaṃ vuttapācittiyadvayaṃ sāmaññato ekattena gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1221_0: 54. Pāḷiyaṃ “tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasatī”ti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena
tika-vin07t:1221_1: vuttaṃ, anikkhamitvā pana purāruṇā uṭṭhahitvā antochadane nisinnassāpi punadivase
tika-vin07t:1221_2: sahaseyyena anāpatti eva. Senambamaṇḍapavaṇṇaṃ hotīti sīhaḷadīpe kira uccavatthuko
tika-vin07t:1221_3: sabbacchanno sabbaaparicchanno evaṃnāmako sannipātamaṇḍapo atthi, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ
tika-vin07t:1221_4: vuttaṃ. Ettha catutthabhāgo cūḷakaṃ, dve bhāgā upaḍḍhaṃ, tīsu bhāgesu dve bhāgā yebhuyyanti
tika-vin07t:1221_6: tattha anupasampannena saha nipajjanaṃ, catutthadivase sūriyatthaṅgamananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1224_0: 55. Chaṭṭhe mātugāmena saddhiṃ catutthadivase sayantassāpi iminā sikkhāpadena ekāva
tika-vin07t:1224_1: āpatti. Keci pana purimasikkhāpadenāpīti dve āpattiyo vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ “anupasampannenā”ti
tika-vin07t:1224_2: anitthiliṅgena vuttattā napuṃsakena pana catutthadivase sayantassa sadukkaṭapācittiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1224_3: vattuṃ yuttaṃ. Kiñcāpettha pāḷiyaṃ paṇḍakavaseneva dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, tadanulomikā
tika-vin07t:1224_4: pana purisaubhatobyañjanakena saha sayantassa iminā dukkaṭaṃ, purimena catutthadivase
tika-vin07t:1224_5: sadukkaṭapācittiyaṃ. Itthiubhatobyañjanako itthigatikovāti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khanti. Matitthiyā
tika-vin07t:1224_6: anāpattīti vadanti. Pācittiyavatthukasenāsanaṃ, tattha mātugāmena saddhiṃ nipajjanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1227_0: 60. Sattame na yakkhenātiādīnaṃ “aññatra viññunā”ti iminā sambandho. Aññatra viññunā
tika-vin07t:1227_1: purisaviggahena, na yakkhādināpīti evamattho gahetabboti adhippāyo. Tādisenapi hi
tika-vin07t:1227_2: saha ṭhitāya desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Taṃtaṃdesabhāsāya atthaṃ yathāruci vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1228_0: Iriyāpathāparivattanaṃ, purisaṃ vā dvādasahatthūpacāre apakkosāpanaṃ ettha akiriyā.
tika-vin07t:1228_1: Vuttalakkhaṇassa dhammassa channaṃ vācānaṃ upari desanā, vuttalakkhaṇo mātugāmo,
tika-vin07t:1228_2: iriyāpathapaavattanābhāvo, viññūpurisābhāvo, apañhavissajjanāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1231_0: 77. Aṭṭhame antarāti parinibbānakālato pubbepi. Atikaḍḍhiyamānenāti “vadatha, bhante,
tika-vin07t:1231_1: kiṃ tumhehi adhigata”nti evaṃ nippīḷiyamānena atibaddhiyamānena. Tathārūpe paccaye
tika-vin07t:1231_2: sati vattabbameva. Sutapariyattisīlaguṇanti ettha atthakusalatā sutaguṇo, pāḷipāṭhakusalatā
tika-vin07t:1231_3: pariyattiguṇoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Cittakkhepassa vā abhāvā”ti iminā khittacittavedanāṭṭatāpi
tika-vin07t:1232_0: Pubbe avuttehīti catutthapārājike avuttehi. Idañca sikkhāpadaṃ paṇṇattiajaānanavasena
tika-vin07t:1232_1: ekantato acittakasamuṭṭhānameva hoti ariyānaṃ paṇṇattivītikkamābhāvā. Jhānalābhīnañca
tika-vin07t:1232_2: satthu āṇāvītikkamapaṭighacittassa jhānaparihānato bhūtārocanaṃ na sambhavati. Uttarimanussadhammassa
tika-vin07t:1232_3: bhūtatā, anupasampannassa ārocanaṃ, taṅkhaṇavijānanā, anaññāpadesoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1235: 78. Navame tattha bhaveyyāti tattha kassaci mati evaṃ bhaveyya. Aṭṭhakathāvacanameva upapattito daḷhaṃ katvā patiṭṭhapento “imināpi ceta”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin07t:1236_0: 82. Ādito pañca sikkhāpadānīti pāṇātipātādīni pañca. Sesānīti vikālabhojanādīni.
tika-vin07t:1236_1: Sukkavissaṭṭhiādi ajjhācārova. Antimavatthuṃ anajjhāpannassa bhikkhuno savatthuko
tika-vin07t:1236_2: saṅghādiseso, anupasampannassa ārocanaṃ, bhikkhusammutiyā abhāvoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1239_0: 86. Dasame appapaṃsumattikāya pathaviyā anāpattivatthubhāvena vuttattā upaḍḍhapaṃsumattikāyapi
tika-vin07t:1239_1: pācittiyamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Na hetaṃ dukkaṭavatthūti sakkā vattuṃ jātājātavinimuttāya
tika-vin07t:1240_0: Vaṭṭatīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāti okāsassa aniyamitattā vaṭṭati. Imaṃ valliṃ
tika-vin07t:1240_1: khaṇāti pathavīkhaṇanaṃ sandhāya vuttattā imināva sikkhāpadena āpatti, na bhūtagāmasikkhāpadena.
tika-vin07t:1240_2: Ubhayampi sandhāya vutte pana dvepi pācittiyā honti. Udakapappaṭakoti udake antobhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1240_3: paviṭṭhe tassa uparibhāgaṃ chādetvā tanukapaṃsu vā mattikā vā paṭalaṃ hutvā patamānā
tika-vin07t:1240_4: tiṭṭhati, tasmiṃ udake sukkhepi taṃ paṭalaṃ vātena calamānā tiṭṭhati, taṃ udakapappaṭako nāma.
tika-vin07t:1241_0: Akatapabbhāreti avaḷañjanaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tādise eva hi vammikassa sambhavoti.
tika-vin07t:1241_1: Mūsikukkaraṃ nāma mūsikāhi khanitvā bahi katapaṃsurāsi. Acchadanantiādivuttattā ujukaṃ
tika-vin07t:1241_2: ākāsato patitavassodakena ovaṭṭhameva jātapathavī hoti, na chadanādīsu patitvā tato
tika-vin07t:1241_3: pavattaudakena tintanti veditabbaṃ. Maṇḍapatthambhanti sākhāmaṇḍapatthambhaṃ. Uccāletvāti
tika-vin07t:1242: 88. Mahāmattikanti bhittilepanaṃ. Jātapathavitā, tathāsaññitā, khaṇanakhaṇāpanānaṃ aññataranti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1247_0: 89. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame niggahetuṃ asakkontoti sākhaṭṭhakavimāne sākhāya chijjamānāya
tika-vin07t:1247_1: chijjante tattha achedanatthāya devatāya upanītaṃ puttaṃ disvāpi kuṭhārinikkhepavegaṃ
tika-vin07t:1247_2: nivattetuṃ asakkontoti attho. Rukkhadhammeti rukkhassa pavattiyaṃ. Rukkhānaṃ viya
tika-vin07t:1248_0: Uppatitanti uppannaṃ. Bhantanti dhāvantaṃ. Vārayeti niggaṇheyya. Itaroti uppannaṃ
tika-vin07t:1248_1: kodhaṃ aniggaṇhanto rājauparājādīnaṃ rasmimattaggāhakajano viya na uttamasārathīti
tika-vin07t:1248_2: attho. Visaṭaṃ sappavisanti sarīre dāṭhāvaṇānusārena vitthiṇṇaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ kaṇhasappavisaṃ
tika-vin07t:1248_3: viya. Jahāti orapāranti pañcorambhāgiyasaññojanāni tatiyamaggena jahāti. “Orapāra”nti
tika-vin07t:1248_4: hi orimatīraṃ vuccati. Atha vā soti tatiyamaggena kodhaṃ vinetvā ṭhito bhikkhu arahattamaggena
tika-vin07t:1248_5: orapāraṃ jahātīti attho. Tattha oraṃ nāma sakattabhāvo, ajjhattikāni vā āyatanāni.
tika-vin07t:1248_6: Pāraṃ nāma paraattabhāvo, bāhirāni vā āyatanāni. Tadubhaye pana chandarāgaṃ jahanto
tika-vin07t:1249_0: 90. Bhavantīti vaḍḍhanti. Ahuvuntīti babhūvu. Tenāha “jātā vaḍḍhitā”ti. Bhūtānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1249_1: gāmoti mahābhūtānaṃ haritatiṇādibhāvena samaggānaṃ samūho. Tabbinimuttassa gāmassa
tika-vin07t:1249_2: abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “bhūtā eva vā gāmo”ti vuttaṃ. Pātabya-saddassa pā pāneti dhātvatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:1249_3: sandhāyāha “paribhuñjitabbatā”ti. Sā ca pātabyatā chedanādi eva hotīti āha “tassā…pe…
tika-vin07t:1250: 91. Jāta-saddo ettha vijātapariyāyoti “puttaṃ vijātā itthī”tiādīsu viya pasūtavacanoti āha “pasūtānī”ti, nibbattapaṇṇamūlānīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1251: Tāni dassentoti tāni bījāni dassento. Kāriyadassanamukheneva kāraṇañca gahitanti āha “bījato nibbattena bījaṃ dassita”nti.
tika-vin07t:1252_0: 92. “Bījato sambhūto bhūtagāmo bīja”nti iminā uttarapadalopena “padumagacchato nibbattaṃ
tika-vin07t:1252_1: pupphaṃ paduma”ntiādīsu viyāyaṃ vohāroti dasseti. Yaṃ bījaṃ bhūtagāmo nāma hotīti
tika-vin07t:1253_0: “Sañciccā”ti vuttattā sarīre laggabhāvaṃ ñatvāpi uṭṭhahati, “taṃ uddharissāmī”tisaññāya
tika-vin07t:1253_1: abhāvato vaṭṭati. Anantaka-ggahaṇena sāsapamattikā gahitā, nāmañhetaṃ tassā sevālajātiyā.
tika-vin07t:1253_2: Mūlapaṇṇānaṃ abhāvena “asampuṇṇabhūtagāmo nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. So bījagāmena saṅgahitoti.
tika-vin07t:1253_3: Avaḍḍhamānepi bhūtagāmamūlakattā vuttaṃ “amūlakabhūtagāme saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti. Nāḷikerassa
tika-vin07t:1254_0: Seleyyakaṃ nāma silāya sambhūtā ekā gandhajāti. Pupphitakālato paṭṭhāyāti vikasitakālato
tika-vin07t:1254_1: pabhuti. Chattakaṃ gaṇhantoti vikasitaṃ gaṇhanto. Makuḷaṃ pana rukkhattacaṃ akopentenapi
tika-vin07t:1254_2: gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati, phullaṃ vaṭṭati. Hatthakukkuccenāti hatthacāpallena.
tika-vin07t:1255_0: “Pānīyaṃ na vāsetabba”nti idaṃ attano pivanapānīyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, aññesaṃ pana
tika-vin07t:1255_1: vaṭṭati anuggahitattā. Tenāha “attanā khāditukāmenā”ti. Yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ sākhā ruhatīti
tika-vin07t:1255_2: mūlaṃ anotāretvā paṇṇamattaniggamanamattenapi vaḍḍhati. Tattha kappiyampi akaronto
tika-vin07t:1256: “Caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ dassessāmī”ti vuttattā kevalaṃ caṅkamanādhippāyena vā maggagamanādhippāyena vā akkamantassa, tiṇānaṃ upari nisīdanādhippāyena nisīdantassa ca doso natthi.
tika-vin07t:1257_1: vuttāni. Abījaṃ nāma taruṇaambaphalādīni. Nibbaṭṭetabbaṃ viyojetabbaṃ bījaṃ yasmiṃ,
tika-vin07t:1257_2: taṃ panasādi nibbaṭṭabījaṃ nāma. Kappiyanti vatvāvāti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vuttepi
tika-vin07t:1257_3: vacanakkhaṇeva aggisatthādinā bījagāme vaṇaṃ kātabbanti vacanato pana pubbe kātuṃ
tika-vin07t:1257_4: na vaṭṭati, tañca dvidhā akatvā chedanabhedanameva dassetabbaṃ. Karontena ca bhikkhunā
tika-vin07t:1257_5: “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vutteyeva kātabbaṃ. Bījagāmaparimocanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:1257_6: puna kappiyaṃ kāretabbanti kārāpanassa paṭhamameva adhikatattā. “Kaṭāhepi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin07t:1257_7: vuttattā kaṭāhato nīhatāya miñjāya vā bīje vā yattha katthaci vijjhituṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin07t:1257_8: Bhūtagāmo, bhūtagāmasaññitā, vikopanaṃ vā vikopāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1260: 94. Dutiye aññaṃ vacananti yaṃ dosavibhāvanatthaṃ parehi vuttavacanaṃ taṃ tassa ananucchavikena aññena vacanena paṭicarati.
tika-vin07t:1261_0: 98. Yadetaṃ aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇavasena pavattavacanaṃ, tadeva pucchitamatthaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin07t:1261_1: aññaṃ vadati pakāsetīti aññavādakanti āha “aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇassetaṃ nāma”nti.
tika-vin07t:1261_2: Tuṇhībhūtassetaṃ nāmanti tuṇhībhāvassetaṃ nāmaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Aññavādakaṃ āropetunti
tika-vin07t:1263_1: yujjati, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayena pana musāvādena aññenaññaṃ paṭicarantassa pācittiyena
tika-vin07t:1263_2: saddhiṃ dukkaṭaṃ, āropite imināva pācittiyaṃ. Keci pana “musāvādapācittiyena saddhiṃ
tika-vin07t:1263_3: pācittiyadvaya”nti vadanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Ādikammikassapi musāvāde imināva anāpattīti
tika-vin07t:1263_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dhammakammena āropitatā, āpattiyā vā vatthunā vā anuyuñjiyamānatā, chādetukāmatāya
tika-vin07t:1263_5: aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ, tuṇhībhāvo cāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1266: 103. Tatiye cintāyanatthassa jhe-dhātussa anekatthatāya olokanatthasambhavato vuttaṃ “olokāpentī”ti. Chandāyāti liṅgavipallāsoti āha “chandenā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1267_0: 105. Bhikkhuṃ lāmakato cintāpanatthaṃ aññesaṃ taṃ avaṇṇakathanaṃ ujjhāpanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin07t:1267_1: Aññesaṃ pana avatvā aññamaññaṃ samullapanavasena bhikkhuno dosappakāsanaṃ khiyyanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1268_0: 106. Aññaṃ anupasampannaṃ ujjhāpetīti aññena anupasampannena ujjhāpeti. Tassa vā
tika-vin07t:1268_1: taṃ santiketi tassa anupasampannassa santike taṃ saṅghena sammataṃ upasampannaṃ khiyyati.
tika-vin07t:1268_2: Idhāpi musāvādena ujjhāpanādīnaṃ sambhavato dukkaṭaṭṭhānāni ca ādikammikassa anāpatti
tika-vin07t:1268_3: ca iminā eva sikkhāpadena vuttāti veditabbaṃ sabbattha musāvādapācittiyassa anivattito.
tika-vin07t:1268_4: Dhammakammena sammatatā, upasampannatā, agatigamanābhāvo, tassa avaṇṇakāmatā, yassa
tika-vin07t:1268_5: santike vadati. Tassa upasampannatā, ujjhāpanaṃ vā khiyyanaṃ vāti imānettha cha aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1271_0: 110. Catutthe apaññāteti appasiddhe. Imaṃ pana aṭṭha māse maṇḍapādīsu ṭhapanasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin07t:1271_1: atthavisesaṃ gahetvā bhagavatā paṭhamameva sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti adhippāyaṃ “anujānāmi,
tika-vin07t:1271_2: bhikkhave, aṭṭhamāse”tiādivacanena anupaññattisadisena pakāsetvā visuṃ anupaññatti
tika-vin07t:1271_3: na vuttā. Parivāre panetaṃ anujānanavacanaṃ anupaññattiṭṭhānanti “ekā anupaññattī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1272_0: Navavāyimoti adhunā suttena vītakacchena paliveṭhitamañco. Onaddhoti kappiyacammena
tika-vin07t:1272_1: onaddho. Te hi vassena sīghaṃ na nassanti. “Ukkaṭṭhaabbhokāsiko”ti idaṃ tassa sukhapaṭipattidassanamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1272_2: ukkaṭṭhassāpi pana cīvarakuṭi vaṭṭateva. Kāyānugatikattāti bhikkhuno tattheva nisīdanabhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:1272_3: dīpeti, tena ca vassabhayena sayaṃ aññattha gacchantassa āpattīti dasseti. Abbhokāsikānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1272_4: temanatthāya niyametvā dāyakehi dinnampi attānaṃ rakkhantena rakkhitabbameva.
tika-vin07t:1273_0: “Valāhakānaṃ anuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā”ti iminā gimhānepi meghe uṭṭhite abbhokāse
tika-vin07t:1273_1: nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Tatra tatrāti cetiyaṅgaṇādike tasmiṃ tasmiṃ abbhokāse
tika-vin07t:1273_2: niyametvā nikkhittā. Majjhato paṭṭhāya pādaṭṭhānābhimukhāti yattha samantato sammajjitvā
tika-vin07t:1273_3: aṅgaṇamajjhe sabbadā kacavarassa saṅkaḍḍhanena majjhe vālikā sañcitā hoti. Tattha
tika-vin07t:1273_4: kattabbavidhidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Uccavatthupādaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ vā vālikā haritabbā.
tika-vin07t:1273_5: Yattha vā pana koṇesu vālikā sañcitā, tattha tato paṭṭhāya aparadisābhimukhā haritabbāti
tika-vin07t:1273_6: keci atthaṃ vadanti. Keci pana “sammaṭṭhaṭṭhānassa padavaḷañjena avikopanatthāya
tika-vin07t:1273_7: sayaṃ asammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano pādābhimukhaṃ vālikā haritabbāti vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1273_8: tattha “majjhato paṭṭhāyā”ti vacanassa payojanaṃ na dissati.
tika-vin07t:1274: 111. Vaṅkapādatāmattena kuḷīrapādakassa sesehi viseso, na aṭanīsu pādappavesanavisesenāti dassetuṃ “yo vā pana kocī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassāti upasampannasseva.
tika-vin07t:1275_0: Nisīditvā…pe… pācittiyanti ettha meghuṭṭhānābhāvaṃ ñatvā “pacchā āgantvā uddharissāmī”ti
tika-vin07t:1275_1: ābhogena gacchantassa anāpatti, tena punāgantabbameva. Kappaṃ labhitvāti “gaccha,
tika-vin07t:1276_0: Āvāsikānaṃyeva palibodhoti āgantukesu kiñci avatvā nisīditvā “āvāsikā eva uddharissantī”ti
tika-vin07t:1276_1: gatesupi āvāsikānameva palibodho. Mahāpaccarivāde pana “idaṃ amhāka”nti avatvāpi
tika-vin07t:1276_2: nisinnānamevāti adhippāyo. “Santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā”ti vuttattā anāṇattiyā
tika-vin07t:1276_3: paññāpitattāpi dukkaṭe kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Ussārakoti sarabhāṇako. So hi uddhaṃ uddhaṃ
tika-vin07t:1277_0: 112. Vaṇṇānurakkhaṇatthaṃ katāti paṭakhaṇḍādīhi sibbitvā katā. Bhūmiyaṃ attharitabbāti
tika-vin07t:1277_1: cimilikāya sati tassā upari, asati suddhabhūmiyaṃ attharitabbā. “Sīhacammādīnaṃ pariharaṇeyeva
tika-vin07t:1277_2: paṭikkhepo”ti iminā mañcapīṭhādīsu attharitvā puna saṃharitvā ṭhapanādivasena attano
tika-vin07t:1277_3: atthāya pariharaṇameva na vaṭṭati, bhūmattharaṇādivasena paribhogo pana attano pariharaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1277_4: na hotīti dasseti. Khandhake hi “antopi mañce paññattāni honti, bahipi mañce paññattāni
tika-vin07t:1277_5: hontī”ti evaṃ attano attano atthāya mañcādīsu paññapetvā pariharaṇavatthusmiṃ –
tika-vin07t:1278: “Na, bhikkhave, mahācammāni dhāretabbāni sīhacammaṃ byagghacammaṃ dīpicammaṃ. Yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti –
tika-vin07t:1279: Paṭikkhepo kato. Tasmā vuttanayenevettha adhippāyo daṭṭhabbo. Dārumayapīṭhanti phalakamayapīṭhameva. Pādakathalikanti adhotapādaṃ yasmiṃ ghaṃsantā dhovanti, taṃ dāruphalakādi.
tika-vin07t:1280_0: 113. “Āgantvā uddharissāmīti gacchatī”ti vuttattā aññenapi kāraṇena anotāpentassapi
tika-vin07t:1280_1: āgamane sāpekkhassa anāpatti. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “mañcādīnaṃ saṅghikatā, vuttalakkhaṇe
tika-vin07t:1280_2: dese santharaṇaṃ vā santharāpanaṃ vā, apalibuddhatā, āpadāya abhāvo, nirapekkhatā,
tika-vin07t:1280_3: leḍḍupātātikkamo”ti evamettha nirapekkhatāya saddhiṃ cha aṅgāni vuttāni.
tika-vin07t:1283: 116. Pañcame pāvāro kojavoti paccattharaṇatthāyeva ṭhapitā uggatalomā attharaṇavisesā. Ettakameva vuttanti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Senāsanatoti sabbapacchimasenāsanato.
tika-vin07t:1284: 117. Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttamevatthaṃ savisesaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “kiñcāpi vutto”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Vattabbaṃ natthīti rukkhamūlassa pākaṭattā vuttaṃ. Palujjatīti vinassati.
tika-vin07t:1285_0: 118. Yena mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā vīnanti, taṃ mañcapīṭhakavānaṃ. Siluccayaleṇanti pabbataguhā.
tika-vin07t:1285_1: “Āpucchanaṃ pana vatta”nti iminā āpatti natthīti dasseti. Vuttalakkhaṇaseyyā, tassā
tika-vin07t:1285_2: saṅghikatā, vuttalakkhaṇe vihāre santharaṇaṃ vā santharāpanaṃ vā, apalibuddhatā,
tika-vin07t:1285_3: āpadāya abhāvo, anapekkhassa disāpakkamanaṃ, upacārasīmātikkamoti imānettha satta aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1289_0: 122. Upacāraṃ ṭhapetvāti diyaḍḍhahatthūpacāraṃ ṭhapetvā. Saṅghikavihāratā, anuṭṭhāpanīyabhāvajānanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1289_1: sambādhetukāmatā, upacāre nisīdanaṃ vā nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1293_0: 128. “Sakalasaṅghārāmato nikkaḍḍhituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ ananurūpato vuttaṃ. Pāpagarahitāya
tika-vin07t:1293_1: hi akupitacittena nikkaḍḍhāpentassa iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti natthi “kupito anattamano”ti
tika-vin07t:1293_2: vuttattā. Aññāpekkhā āpatti na dissati. Pāḷiyaṃ “alajjiṃ nikkaḍḍhatī”tiādīsu cittassa
tika-vin07t:1293_3: lahuparivattitāya antarantarā kope uppannepi anāpatti alajjitādipaccayeneva nikkaḍḍhanassa
tika-vin07t:1293_5: nikkaḍḍhanaṃ vā nikkaḍḍhāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1296: 129. Aṭṭhamaṃ uttānameva. Saṅghiko vihāro, asīsaghaṭṭavehāsakuṭi, heṭṭhāparibhogatā, apaṭāṇidinne āhaccapādake nisīdanaṃ vā nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1299_0: 135. Navame “mahallako nāma vihāro sassāmiko”ti vuttattā saññācikāya kuṭiyā anāpattīti
tika-vin07t:1299_1: vadanti. Yassāti vihārassa. Sā aparipūrūpacārāpi hotīti vivariyamānaṃ kavāṭaṃ yaṃ
tika-vin07t:1299_2: bhittiṃ āhanati, sā sāmantā kavāṭavitthārappamāṇā upacārarahitāpi hotīti attho. Ālokaṃ
tika-vin07t:1299_3: vātapānaṃ sandheti ghaṭayatīti ālokasandhīti kavāṭaṃ vuccati. Dvāravātapānūpacārato
tika-vin07t:1299_4: aññattha punappunaṃ limpanādiṃ karontassa piṇḍagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1300_0: Keci pana “pāḷiyaṃ pācittiyassa avuttattā dukkaṭa”nti vadanti. Adhiṭṭhātabbanti saṃvidhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1300_1: Harite ṭhito adhiṭṭhāti. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti haritayutte khette ṭhatvā chādentassa
tika-vin07t:1300_2: dukkaṭanti attho. Keci pana “tādise khette vihāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭa”nti vadanti,
tika-vin07t:1301_0: 136. Ujukameva chādananti chādanamukhavaṭṭito paṭṭhāya yāva piṭṭhivaṃsakūṭāgārakaṇṇikādi,
tika-vin07t:1301_1: tāva iṭṭhakādīhi ujukaṃ chādanaṃ. Iminā pana yena sabbasmiṃ vihāre ekavāraṃ chādite
tika-vin07t:1301_2: taṃ chādanaṃ ekamagganti gahetvā pāḷiyaṃ “dve magge”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pariyāyena chādanampi
tika-vin07t:1301_3: imināva nayena yojetabbanti vadanti, taṃ “punappunaṃ chādāpesī”ti imāya pāḷiyā ca
tika-vin07t:1301_4: “sabbampi cetaṃ chadanaṃ chadanūpari veditabba”nti iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena ca sameti.
tika-vin07t:1302_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “maggena chādentassa pariyāyena chādentassā”ti idañca iṭṭhakādīhi, tiṇapaṇṇehi
tika-vin07t:1302_1: ca chādanappakārabhedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Keci pana “pantiyā chāditassa chadanassa
tika-vin07t:1302_2: upari chadanamukhavaṭṭito paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ ujukameva ekavāraṃ chādanaṃ ekamagganti
tika-vin07t:1302_3: gahetvā ‘dve magge’tiādi vuttaṃ, na pana sakalavihārachādanaṃ. Esa nayo pariyāyena
tika-vin07t:1302_4: chādanepī”ti vadanti, taṃ pāḷiaṭṭhakathāhi na sameti.
tika-vin07t:1303_0: Tatiyāya magganti ettha tatiyāyāti upayogatthe sampadānavacanaṃ, tatiyaṃ magganti
tika-vin07t:1303_1: attho. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Tiṇapaṇṇehi labbhatīti tiṇapaṇṇehi chādetvā upari ullittāvalittakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1303_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kevalaṃ tiṇakuṭiyā hi anāpatti vuttā. Tiṇṇaṃ maggānanti maggavasena
tika-vin07t:1303_3: chāditānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ chadanānaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ pariyāyānanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Mahallakavihāratā,
tika-vin07t:1303_4: attano vāsāgāratā, uttari adhiṭṭhānanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1306_0: 140. Dasame mātikāyaṃ sappāṇakaudakaṃ tiṇena vā mattikāya vā siñceyya, chaḍḍeyyāti
tika-vin07t:1306_1: attho. Atha vā udakaṃ gahetvā bahi siñceyya, tasmiñca udake tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā
tika-vin07t:1306_2: āharitvā pakkhipeyyāti ajjhāharitvā attho veditabbo. Tenāha “sakaṭabhāramattañcepī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1306_3: Idanti tiṇamattikapakkhipanavidhānaṃ. Vuttanti mātikāyaṃ “tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā”ti
tika-vin07t:1307_0: Idañca sikkhāpadaṃ bāhiraparibhogaṃ sandhāya vatthuvasena vuttaṃ abbhantaraparibhogassa
tika-vin07t:1307_1: visuṃ vakkhamānattā. Tadubhayampi “sappāṇaka”nti katvā vadhakacittaṃ vināva siñcane
tika-vin07t:1307_2: paññattattā “paṇṇattivajja”nti vuttaṃ. Vadhakacitte pana sati sikkhāpadantareneva
tika-vin07t:1307_3: pācittiyaṃ, na imināti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Udakassa sappāṇakatā, “siñcanena pāṇakā marissantī”ti
tika-vin07t:1307_4: jānanaṃ, tādisameva ca udakaṃ vinā vadhakacetanāya kenacideva karaṇīyena tiṇādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1313: 144. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame tiracchānabhūtanti tirokaraṇabhūtaṃ, bāhirabhūtanti attho. Samiddhoti paripuṇṇo. Sahitattho atthayutto. Atthagambhīratādinā gambhīro.
tika-vin07t:1314: 145-147. Paratoti uttari. Karontovāti paribāhire karonto. Vibhaṅgeti jhānavibhaṅge. Caraṇanti nibbānagamanāya pādaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1315_0: Yadassāti yaṃ assa. Dhāretīti avinassamānaṃ dhāreti. Parikathanatthanti pakiṇṇakakathāvasena
tika-vin07t:1315_3: tirokuṭṭādi -anumodanāti imā tisso anumodanā. Kammākammavinicchayoti parivārāvasāne
tika-vin07t:1315_5: vāti diṭṭhivisuddhiādikāya sukkhavipassanāya vasena. Attano sīlarakkhaṇatthaṃ aparānapekkhatāya
tika-vin07t:1315_6: yena kāmaṃ gantuṃ catasso disā arahati, assa vā santi, tāsu vā sādhūti cātuddiso.
tika-vin07t:1316_0: Abhivinayeti pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṅkhāte saṃvaravinaye, tappakāsake vā vinayapiṭake.
tika-vin07t:1316_1: Vinetunti sikkhāpetuṃ pakāsetuṃ. Paguṇā vācuggatāti pāṭhato ca atthato ca paguṇā
tika-vin07t:1316_2: mukhe sannidhāpanavasena vācuggatā kātabbā. Atthamattavasenapettha yojanaṃ karonti.
tika-vin07t:1316_3: Abhidhammeti lakkhaṇarasādivasena paricchinne nāmarūpadhamme. Pubbe kira mahātherā
tika-vin07t:1316_5: “tumhe etaṃ pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca pariharatha, sakkontā uttaripi uggaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin07t:1316_6: evaṃ sakaladhammaṃ ganthavasena niyyātenti, tattha te ca bhikkhū ganthanāmena dīghabhāṇakā
tika-vin07t:1316_7: majjhimabhāṇakāti voharīyanti, te ca attano bhārabhūtaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ pariccajitvā aññaṃ
tika-vin07t:1316_8: uggahetuṃ na labhanti. Taṃ sandhāyāha “sace majjhimabhāṇako hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1317_0: Tattha heṭṭhimā vā tayo vaggāti mahāvaggato heṭṭhimā sagāthakavaggo, nidānavaggo,
tika-vin07t:1317_1: khandhavaggoti ime tayo vaggā. Tikanipātato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhāti ekakanipātadukanipāte
tika-vin07t:1317_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dhammapadampi saha vatthunā jātakabhāṇakena attano jātakena saddhiṃ
tika-vin07t:1317_3: uggahetabbaṃ. Tato oraṃ na vaṭṭatīti mahāpaccarivādassa adhippāyo. Tato tatoti dīghanikāyādito.
tika-vin07t:1317_4: Uccinitvā uggahitaṃ saddhammassa ṭhitiyā, bhikkhunopi pubbāparānusandhiādikusalatāya
tika-vin07t:1317_5: ca na hotīti “taṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhittaṃ. Abhidhamme kiñci uggahetabbanti na
tika-vin07t:1317_6: vuttanti ettha yasmā vinaye kusalattikādivibhāgo, suttantesu samathavipassanāmaggo
tika-vin07t:1317_7: ca abhidhammapāṭhaṃ vinā na viññāyati, andhakāre paviṭṭhakālo viya hoti, tasmā suttavinayānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1317_8: gahaṇavasena abhidhammaggahaṇaṃ vuttamevāti visuṃ na vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Yathā “bhojanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1317_9: bhuñjitabba”nti vutte “byañjanaṃ khāditabba”nti avuttampi vuttameva hoti tadavinābhāvato,
tika-vin07t:1318_1: yassaṃ, tāya. Purassa esāti porī, nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho. Anelagaḷāyāti ettha
tika-vin07t:1318_2: elāti kheḷaṃ taggaḷanavirahitāya. Kalyāṇavākkaraṇoti ettha vācā eva vākkaraṇaṃ, udāharaṇaghoso.
tika-vin07t:1318_3: Kalyāṇaṃ madhuraṃ vākkaraṇamassāti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo. Upasampannāya methuneneva abhabbo
tika-vin07t:1318_4: hoti, na sikkhamānāsāmaṇerīsūti āha “bhikkhuniyā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1319_0: 148. Garukehīti garukabhaṇḍehi. Ekatoupasampannāyāti upayogatthe bhummavacanaṃ. Bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1319_1: santike upasampannā nāma parivattaliṅgā vā pañcasatasākiyāniyo vā. Etā pana ekatoupasampannā
tika-vin07t:1320_0: 149. Na nimantitā hutvā gantukāmāti nimantitā hutvā bhojanapariyosāne gantukāmā na
tika-vin07t:1320_1: honti, tattheva vasitukāmā hontīti attho. Yatoti bhikkhunupassayato. Yācitvāti “tumhehi
tika-vin07t:1320_2: ānītaovādeneva mayampi vasissāmā”ti yācitvā. Tatthāti tasmiṃ bhikkhunupassaye. Abhikkhukāvāse
tika-vin07t:1321_0: Imāsu katarāpatti pariharitabbāti codanaṃ pariharanto āha “sā rakkhitabbā”ti. Sā
tika-vin07t:1321_1: vassānugamanamūlikā āpatti rakkhitabbā, itarāya anāpattikāraṇaṃ atthīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1322_0: Ovādatthāyāti ovāde yācanatthāya. Dve tissoti dvīhi tīhi, karaṇatthe cetaṃ paccattavacanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1322_1: Pāsādikenāti pasādajanakena kāyakammādinā. Sampādetūti tividhaṃ sikkhaṃ sampādetu.
tika-vin07t:1325_0: 153. Dutiye kokanadanti padumavisesaṃ, taṃ kira bahupattaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ. Ayañhettha
tika-vin07t:1325_1: attho – yathā kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ padumaṃ, evaṃ phullamukhapadumaṃ avītaguṇagandhaṃ
tika-vin07t:1325_2: nimmale antalikkhe ādiccaṃ viya ca attano tejasā tapantaṃ tato eva virocamānaṃ aṅgehi
tika-vin07t:1325_3: niccharaṇakajutiyā aṅgīrasaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ passāti. Rajoharaṇanti sarīre rajaṃ
tika-vin07t:1325_4: puñchatīti rajoharaṇanti puñchanacoḷassa nāmaṃ. Obhāsavissajjanapubbakā bhāsitagāthā
tika-vin07t:1325_5: obhāsagāthā nāma. Visuddhimaggādīsu pana “rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccatī”tiādi
tika-vin07t:1325_6: obhāsagāthā vuttā, na panesā “adhicetaso”ti gāthā. Ayañca cūḷapanthakattherassa udānagāthāti
tika-vin07t:1325_7: udānapāḷiyaṃ natthi, ekudāniyattherassa nāyaṃ udānagāthāti tattha vuttaṃ. Idha pana
tika-vin07t:1325_8: pāḷiyā eva vuttattā therassāpi udānagāthāti gahetabbaṃ. Idha ca agarudhammenāpi ovadato
tika-vin07t:1325_9: pācittiyameva. Atthaṅgatasūriyatā, paripuṇṇūpasampannatā, ovadananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1328: 162. Tatiyaṃ uttānameva. Upassayūpagamanaṃ, paripuṇṇūpasampannatā, samayābhāvo, garudhammehi ovadananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1331_0: 164. Catutthe āmisanirapekkhampi āmisahetu ovadatītisaññāya bhaṇantassapi anāpatti
tika-vin07t:1331_1: sacittakattā sikkhāpadassa. Sesamettha uttānameva. Upasampannatā, dhammena laddhasammutitā,
tika-vin07t:1331_2: anāmisantaratā, avaṇṇakāmatāya evaṃ bhaṇananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1335_0: 176. Chaṭṭhe kathinavattanti kathinamāse cīvaraṃ karontānaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1335_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vañcetvāti “tava ñātikāyā”ti avatvā “ekissā bhikkhuniyā”ti ettakameva
tika-vin07t:1335_2: vatvā “ekissā bhikkhuniyā”ti sutvā te aññātikasaññino ahesunti āha “akappiye niyojitattā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1335_3: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā santakatā, nivāsanapārupanūpagatā, vuttanayena sibbanaṃ vā
tika-vin07t:1338_0: 183. Sattame pāḷiyaṃ gacchāma bhagini gacchāmāyyāti bhikkhupubbakaṃ saṃvidhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1338_1: itaraṃ bhikkhunipubbakaṃ. Ekaddhānamagganti ekato addhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ. Hiyyoti
tika-vin07t:1339_0: Dvidhā vuttappakāroti pādagamane pakkhagamaneti dvidhā vuttappakāro. Upacāro na labbhatīti
tika-vin07t:1339_1: yo parikkhittādigāmassa ekaleḍḍupātādiupacāro vutto, so idha na labbhati āsannattā.
tika-vin07t:1339_2: Etena ca antaraghareyevettha gāmoti adhippeto, na sakalaṃ gāmakhettaṃ. Tatthāpi yattha
tika-vin07t:1339_3: upacāro labbhati, tattha upacārokkamane eva āpattīti dasseti. Tenāha “ratanamattantaro”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1339_4: Upacārokkamanañcettha upacārabbhantare pavisanameva hoti. Tattha appavisitvāpi upacārato
tika-vin07t:1339_5: bahi addhayojanabbhantaragatena maggena gacchantopi maggassa dvīsu passesu addhayojanabbhantaragataṃ
tika-vin07t:1339_6: gāmūpacāraṃ sabbaṃ okkamitvā gacchaticceva vuccati. Addhayojanato bahi gatena maggena
tika-vin07t:1339_7: gacchanto na gāmūpacāragaṇanāya kāretabbo, addhayojanagaṇanāyeva kāretabbo. Evañca
tika-vin07t:1339_8: sati anantarasikkhāpade nāvāyeva gāmatīrapassena gacchantassa gāmūpacāragaṇanāya
tika-vin07t:1339_9: āpatti samatthitā hoti. Na hi sakkā nāvāya gāmūpacārabbhantare pavisituṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1339_10: maggānaṃ sambandhaṭṭhānaṃ siṅghāṭakaṃ. Etthantare saṃvidahiteti ettha na kevalaṃ
tika-vin07t:1339_11: yathāvuttarathikādīsu eva saṃvidahane dukkaṭaṃ, antarāmaggepīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1340_0: Addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassāti asati gāme addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassa. Yasmiñhi gāmakhettabhūtepi
tika-vin07t:1340_1: araññe addhayojanabbhantare gāmo na hoti, tampi idha agāmakaṃ araññanti adhippetaṃ, na viñjhāṭavādayo.
tika-vin07t:1341_1: vā samāruḷhā. Dvinnampi saṃvidahitvā maggappaṭipatti, avisaṅketaṃ, samayābhāvo, anāpadā,
tika-vin07t:1341_2: gāmantarokkamanaṃ vā addhayojanātikkamo vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Ekatoupasampannādīhi
tika-vin07t:1341_3: saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya gacchantassa pana mātugāmasikkhāpadena āpatti.
tika-vin07t:1344_0: 189. Aṭṭhame ekaṃ tīraṃ…pe… nirantaranti nadito addhayojanabbhantare padese niviṭṭhagāmehi
tika-vin07t:1344_1: nirantaratā vuttā. Ekaṃ agāmakaṃ araññanti tathā niviṭṭhagāmābhāvena vuttaṃ. Agāmakatīrapassenātiādi
tika-vin07t:1344_2: pana atirekaaddhayojanavitthataṃ nadiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tato ūnavitthārāya hi nadiyā
tika-vin07t:1344_3: majjhenāpi gamane tīradvayassāpi addhayojanabbhantare gatattā gāmantaragaṇanāya,
tika-vin07t:1344_4: addhayojanagaṇanāya ca āpattiyo paricchinditabbā. Teneva “yojanavitthatā…pe… addhayojanagaṇanāya
tika-vin07t:1344_5: pācittiyānī”ti vuttaṃ. Teneva hi yojanato ūnāya nadiyā addhayojanabbhantaragatatīravaseneva
tika-vin07t:1344_7: Tattha kiñcāpi samuddataḷākādīsu pācittiyaṃ na vuttaṃ, tathāpi kīḷāpurekkhārassa
tika-vin07t:1344_8: tattha dukkaṭamevāti gahetabbaṃ, paṭhamaṃ kīḷāpurekkhārassāpi pacchā nāvāya niddupagatassa,
tika-vin07t:1344_9: yoniso vā manasi karontassa gāmantarokkamanādīsupi āpattisambhavato paṇṇattivajjatā,
tika-vin07t:1344_10: ticittatā cassa sikkhāpadassa vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin07t:1347_0: 197. Navame pāḷiyaṃ “sikkhamānā…pe… pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattī”ti
tika-vin07t:1347_1: idaṃ iminā sikkhāpadena anāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pañcahi sahadhammikehi kataviññattiparikathādīhi
tika-vin07t:1347_2: uppannaṃ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭameva. Bhikkhuniyā paripācitatā, tathā jānanaṃ, gihisamārambhābhāvo,
tika-vin07t:1347_3: bhojanatā, tassa ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1350_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ, taṃ pana acelakavagge pañcamampi upanandaṃ ārabbha paññattesu catutthattā
tika-vin07t:1355: 206. Catutthavaggassa paṭhame imesaṃyevāti imesaṃ pāsaṇḍānaṃyeva. Ettakānanti imasmiṃ pāsaṇḍe ettakānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1356_0: 208. “Gacchanto vā āgacchanto vā”ti idaṃ addhayojanavasena gahetabbaṃ. Aññe uddissa
tika-vin07t:1356_1: paññattañca bhikkhūsu appasannehi titthiyehi sāmaññatopi paññattampi bhikkhūnaṃ na
tika-vin07t:1356_2: vaṭṭati eva. Āvasathapiṇḍatā, agilānatā, anuvasitvā bhojananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1359_0: 209. Dutiye abhimāreti abhibhavitvā bhagavantaṃ māraṇatthāya payojite dhanudhare.
tika-vin07t:1359_1: Nanu “rājānampi mārāpesī”ti vacanato idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ ajātasattuno kāle paññattanti
tika-vin07t:1359_2: siddhaṃ, evañca sati pāḷiyaṃ “tena kho pana samayena rañño māgadhassa…pe… ñātisālohito
tika-vin07t:1359_3: ājīvakesu pabbajito hoti…pe… bimbisāraṃ etadavocā”tiādi virujjhatīti? Na virujjhati.
tika-vin07t:1359_4: So kira ājīvako bimbisārakālato pabhuti antarantarā bhikkhū nimantetvā dānaṃ dento
tika-vin07t:1359_5: ajātasattukālepi sikkhāpade paññattepi bhikkhūnaṃ santike dūtaṃ pāhesi, bhikkhū ca
tika-vin07t:1359_6: kukkuccāyantā nivāresuṃ. Tasmā ādito paṭṭhāya taṃ vatthu dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1360: 215. Aññamaññaṃ visadisaṃ rajjaṃ virajjaṃ, virajjato āgatā verajjakā. Te ca yasmā jātigottādito nānāvidhā, tasmā nānāverajjaketipi attho.
tika-vin07t:1361_0: 217-8. Imassa sikkhāpadassa vatthuvaseneva viññattito gaṇabhojanatthatā siddhāti
tika-vin07t:1361_1: taṃ avatvā padabhājane asiddhameva nimantanato gaṇabhojanaṃ dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1361_3: gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti. Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ addhānagamanādivatthūsu “idheva bhuñjathā”ti
tika-vin07t:1361_4: vuttavacanassa kukkuccāyanaṃ, tampi odanādināmaṃ gahetvā vuttattā eva katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1361_5: Ekato gaṇhantīti aññamaññassa dvādasahatthaṃ amuñcitvā ekato ṭhatvā gaṇhanti.
tika-vin07t:1362_0: “Amhākaṃ catunnampi bhattaṃ dehī”ti vuttattā pāḷi (vaṇṇanā) yaṃ “tvaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin07t:1362_1: bhattaṃ dehī”tiādino vuttattā ca bhojananāmena viññattameva gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti, tañca
tika-vin07t:1362_2: aññena viññattampi ekato gaṇhantānaṃ sabbesampi hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Visuṃ gahitaṃ
tika-vin07t:1362_3: pana viññattaṃ bhuñjato paṇītabhojanādisikkhāpadehi āpatti eva.
tika-vin07t:1363_0: Āgantukapaṭṭanti acchinditvā anvādhiṃ āropetvā karaṇacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ṭhapetīti
tika-vin07t:1363_1: ekaṃ antaṃ cīvare bandhanavasena ṭhapeti. Paccāgataṃ sibbatīti tasseva dutiyaantaṃ
tika-vin07t:1363_2: parivattitvā āhataṃ sibbati. Āgantukapaṭṭaṃ bandhatīti cīvarena laggaṃ karonto punappunaṃ
tika-vin07t:1363_3: tattha tattha suttena bandhati. Ghaṭṭetīti pamāṇena gahetvā daṇḍādīhi ghaṭṭeti. Suttaṃ
tika-vin07t:1363_4: karotīti guṇādibhāvena vaṭṭeti. Valetīti anekaguṇasuttaṃ hatthena vā cakkadaṇḍena
tika-vin07t:1363_5: vā vaṭṭeti ekattaṃ karoti. Parivattanaṃ karotīti parivattanadaṇḍayantakaṃ karoti,
tika-vin07t:1363_6: yasmiṃ suttaguḷaṃ pavesetvā veḷunāḷikādīsu ṭhapetvā paribbhamāpetvā suttakoṭito paṭṭhāya ākaḍḍhanti.
tika-vin07t:1364_0: 220. Animantitacatutthanti animantito catuttho yassa bhikkhucatukkassa, taṃ animantitacatutthaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1364_1: Evaṃ sesesupi. Tenāha “pañcannaṃ catukkāna”nti. Sampavesetvāti tehi yojetvā. Gaṇo
tika-vin07t:1365_0: Adhivāsetvā gatesūti ettha akappiyanimantanādhivāsanakkhaṇe pubbapayoge dukkaṭampi
tika-vin07t:1365_1: natthi, viññattito pasavane pana viññattikkhaṇe itarasikkhāpadehi dukkaṭaṃ hotīti
tika-vin07t:1365_2: gahetabbaṃ. Nimantanaṃ sādiyathāti nimantanabhattaṃ paṭiggaṇhatha. Tāni cāti kummāsādīni
tika-vin07t:1365_3: ca tehi bhikkhūhi ekena pacchā gahitattā ekato na gahitāni.
tika-vin07t:1366_0: “Bhattuddesakena paṇḍitena bhavitabbaṃ…pe… mocetabbā”ti etena bhattuddesakena akappiyanimantane
tika-vin07t:1366_1: sādite sabbesampi sāditaṃ hoti. Ekato gaṇhantānaṃ gaṇabhojanāpatti ca hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1366_2: Dūtassa dvāre āgantvā puna “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vacanabhayena “gāmadvāre aṭṭhatvā”ti
tika-vin07t:1366_3: vuttaṃ. Gaṇabhojanatā, samayābhāvo, ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1369_0: 221. Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ bhattapaṭipāṭi aṭṭhitāti kulapaṭipāṭiyā dātabbā bhattapaṭipāṭi
tika-vin07t:1369_1: aṭṭhitā na ṭhitā, abbocchinnā nirantarappavattāti attho. Badaraphalāni pakkhipitvā
tika-vin07t:1370_0: Pāḷiyaṃ paramparabhojaneti yena paṭhamaṃ nimantito, tassa bhojanato parassa bhojanassa
tika-vin07t:1370_1: bhuñjane. Vikappanāva idha anupaññattivasena mātikāyaṃ anāropitāpi parivāre “catasso
tika-vin07t:1370_2: anupaññattiyo”ti anupaññattiyaṃ gaṇitā. Tattha kiñcāpi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ mahāpaccarivādassa
tika-vin07t:1370_3: pacchā kathanena parammukhāvikappanā patiṭṭhapitā, tathāpi sammukhāvikappanāpi gahetabbāva.
tika-vin07t:1370_4: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi “yo bhikkhu pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa ‘mayhaṃ
tika-vin07t:1370_5: bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ sammukhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1371: 229. Khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vāti pañcabhojanāmisaṃ bhattato upari ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tañhi abhojanattā uppaṭipāṭiyā pivatopi anāpatti. Tenāha “bhuñjantenā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1372: Vikappanāya akaraṇato akiriyāvasena idaṃ vācāyapi samuṭṭhitanti āha “vacīkamma”nti. Paramparabhojanatā, samayābhāvo, ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1375_0: 231. Catutthe pāḷiyaṃ paṭiyālokanti pacchimadisaṃ, pacchādisanti attho. Apātheyyādiatthāya
tika-vin07t:1375_1: paṭiyāditantisaññāya gaṇhantassāpi āpatti eva acittakattā sikkhāpadassa. Attano atthāya
tika-vin07t:1375_2: “imassa hatthe dehī”ti vacanenāpi āpajjanato “vacīkamma”nti vuttaṃ. Vuttalakkhaṇapūvamanthatā,
tika-vin07t:1375_3: asesakatā, appaṭippassaddhagamanatā, aññātakāditā, atirekapaṭiggahaṇanti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1378_0: 237. Pañcame “ti-kāraṃ avatvā”ti iminā kātabbasaddasāmatthiyā laddhaṃ iti-padaṃ katakāle
tika-vin07t:1378_1: na vattabbanti dasseti. Idha pana ajānantehi iti-sadde payuttepi atirittaṃ katameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1379_1: Bhuttāvī-padassa niratthakabhāvameva sādhetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tāhīti
tika-vin07t:1379_2: puthukāhi. Sattumodakoti sattuṃ temetvā kato apakko. Sattuṃ pana pisitvā piṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin07t:1379_3: katvā temetvā pūvaṃ katvā pacanti, taṃ na pavāreti. “Paṭikkhipitabbaṭṭhāne ṭhitameva
tika-vin07t:1379_4: paṭikkhipati nāmā”ti vuttattā yaṃ yaṃ alajjisantakaṃ vā attano apāpuṇakasaṅghikādiṃ
tika-vin07t:1379_5: vā paṭikkhepato pavāraṇā na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1380: Āsannataraṃ aṅganti hatthapāsato bahi ṭhatvā onamitvā dentassa sīsaṃ āsannataraṃ hoti, tassa orimantena paricchinditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1381_0: Apanāmetvāti abhimukhaṃ haritvā. “Imaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadatīti kiñci anāmetvā vadati.
tika-vin07t:1381_1: Kevalaṃ vācābhihārassa anadhippetattā gaṇhathāti gahetuṃ āraddhaṃ kaṭacchunā anukkhittampi
tika-vin07t:1381_2: pubbepi evaṃ abhihaṭattā pavāraṇā hotīti “abhihaṭāva hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Uddhaṭamatteti
tika-vin07t:1381_3: bhājanato viyojitamatte. Dvinnaṃ samabhārepīti parivesakassa ca aññassa ca bhattapacchibhājanavahane samakepīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1382_0: Rasaṃ gaṇhathāti ettha kevalaṃ maṃsarasassa apavāraṇājanakassa nāmena vuttattā paṭikkhipato
tika-vin07t:1382_1: pavāraṇā na hoti. Maccharasantiādīsu maccho ca rasañcāti atthassa sambhavato vatthunopi
tika-vin07t:1382_2: tādisattā pavāraṇā hoti, “idaṃ gaṇhathā”tipi avatvā tuṇhībhāvena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipatopi
tika-vin07t:1382_3: hoti eva. Karambakoti missakādhivacanametaṃ. Yañhi bahūhi missetvā karonti, so “karambako”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1383_0: “Uddissa kata”nti maññamānoti ettha vatthuno kappiyattā “pavāritova hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1383_1: Tañce uddissa katameva hoti, paṭikkhepo natthi. Ayamettha adhippāyoti “yenāpucchito”tiādinā
tika-vin07t:1383_2: vuttamevatthaṃ sandhāya vadati. Kāraṇaṃ panettha duddasanti bhattassa bahutarabhāvena
tika-vin07t:1383_3: pavāraṇāsambhavakāraṇaṃ duddasaṃ, aññathā karambakepi macchādibahubhāve pavāraṇā
tika-vin07t:1383_4: bhaveyyāti adhippāyo. Yathā cettha kāraṇaṃ duddasaṃ, evaṃ parato “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin07t:1383_5: etthāpi kāraṇaṃ duddasamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yañca “idaṃ pana bhattamissakamevā”tiādi
tika-vin07t:1383_6: kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi “appataraṃ na pavāretī”ti vacanena na sameti. Visuṃ katvā detīti
tika-vin07t:1383_7: “rasaṃ gaṇhathā”tiādinā vācāya visuṃ katvā detīti attho gahetabbo. Na pana kāyena
tika-vin07t:1383_8: rasādiṃ viyojetvāti. Tathā aviyojitepi paṭikkhipato pavāraṇāya asambhavato appavāraṇāpahoṇakassa
tika-vin07t:1383_9: nāmena vuttattā bhattamissakayāguṃ āharitvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttaṭṭhānādīsu viya,
tika-vin07t:1383_10: aññathā vā ettha yathā pubbāparaṃ na virujjhati, tathā adhippāyo gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1384_0: Nāvā vā setu vātiādimhi nāvādiabhiruhanādikkhaṇe kiñci ṭhatvāpi abhiruhanādikātabbattepi
tika-vin07t:1384_1: gamanatapparatāya ṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti, janasammaddena pana anokāsādibhāvena kātuṃ
tika-vin07t:1384_2: na vaṭṭati. Acāletvāti vuttaṭṭhānato aññasmimpi padese vā uddhaṃ vā apesetvā tasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:1384_3: eva pana ṭhāne parivattetuṃ labhati. Tenāha “yena passenā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1385_0: Akappiyabhojanaṃ vāti kuladūsanādinā uppannaṃ, taṃ “akappiya”nti iminā tena missaṃ
tika-vin07t:1385_1: odanādi atirittaṃ hoti evāti dasseti. Tasmā yaṃ tattha akappakataṃ kandaphalādi,
tika-vin07t:1386_0: So puna kātuṃ na labhatīti tasmiññeva bhājane kariyamānaṃ paṭhamakatena saddhiṃ kataṃ
tika-vin07t:1386_1: hotīti puna so eva kātuṃ na labhati, añño labhati. Aññena hi katato añño puna kātuṃ
tika-vin07t:1386_2: labhati. Aññasmiṃ pana bhājane tena vā aññena vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tenāha “yena akataṃ,
tika-vin07t:1386_3: tena kātabbaṃ, yañca akataṃ, taṃ kātabba”nti. Evaṃ katanti aññasmiṃ bhājane kataṃ.
tika-vin07t:1386_4: Sace pana āmisasaṃsaṭṭhānīti ettha mukhādīsu laggampi āmisaṃ sodhetvāva atirittaṃ
tika-vin07t:1387: 241. Vācāya āṇāpetvā atirittaṃ akārāpanato akiriyasamuṭṭhānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pavāritabhāvo, āmisassa anatirittatā, kāle ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1390_0: 243. Chaṭṭhe “bhuttasmi”nti mātikāyaṃ vuttattā bhojanapariyosāne pācittiyaṃ. Pavāritatā,
tika-vin07t:1394_1: kātabbaṃ jighacchāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ neva pharanti na nipphādenti.
tika-vin07t:1394_2: Ekasmiṃ dese āhārakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ vā aññasmiṃ dese uṭṭhitabhūmirasādibhedena āhārakiccaṃ
tika-vin07t:1394_3: asādhentampi vā sambhaveyyāti āha “tesu tesu janapadesū”tiādi. Keci pana “ekasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:1394_4: janapade āhārakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ sesajanapadesupi vikāle na kappati evāti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:1394_5: idaṃ vutta”ntipi vadanti. Pakatiāhāravasenāti aññehi yāvakālikehi ayojitaṃ attano
tika-vin07t:1394_6: pakatiyāva āhārakiccakaraṇavasena. Sammohoyeva hotīti anekatthānaṃ nāmānaṃ, appasiddhānañca
tika-vin07t:1394_7: sambhavato sammoho eva siyā. Tenevettha mayampi mūlakamūlādīnaṃ pariyāyantaradassanena
tika-vin07t:1395_0: Yanti vaṭṭakandaṃ. Muḷālanti thūlataruṇamūlameva, rukkhavalliādīnaṃ matthakoti heṭṭhā
tika-vin07t:1395_1: vuttameva sampiṇḍetvā vuttaṃ. Acchivādīnaṃ aparipakkāneva phalāni yāvajīvikānīti
tika-vin07t:1395_2: dassetuṃ “aparipakkānī”ti vuttaṃ. Harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīnīti ettha miñjaṃ yāvakālikanti
tika-vin07t:1395_3: keci vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1396_0: Hiṅgurukkhato paggharitaniyyāso hiṅgu nāma. Hiṅgujatuādayo ca hiṅguvikatiyova. Tattha
tika-vin07t:1396_1: hiṅgujatu nāma hiṅgurukkhassa daṇḍapattāni pacitvā kataniyyāso. Hiṅgusipāṭikā nāma
tika-vin07t:1396_2: hiṅgupattāni pacitvā kataniyyāso. Aññena missetvā katotipi vadanti. Takanti aggakoṭiyā
tika-vin07t:1396_3: nikkhantasileso. Takapattinti pattato nikkhantasileso. Takapaṇṇinti palāse bhajjitvā
tika-vin07t:1396_4: katasileso. Daṇḍato nikkhantasilesotipi vadanti. Vikālatā, yāvakālikatā, ajjhoharaṇanti
tika-vin07t:1399_0: 252-3. Aṭṭhame tādisanti asūpabyañjanaṃ. Yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā…pe… pācittiyanti
tika-vin07t:1399_1: ettha kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyapadehi yāvakālikameva saṅgahitaṃ, na yāmakālikaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1399_2: Tathāpi “anāpatti yāmakālikaṃ yāme nidahitvā bhuñjatī”ti idha ceva –
tika-vin07t:1400: “Yāmakālikena, bhikkhave, sattāhakālikaṃ…pe… yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ yāme kappati, yāmātikkante na kappatī”ti –
tika-vin07t:1401_0: Aññattha ca vuttattā, “yāmakālika”nti vacanasāmatthiyato ca bhagavato adhippāyaññūhi
tika-vin07t:1401_1: aṭṭhakathācariyehi yāmakālikaṃ sannidhikārakakataṃ pācittiyavatthumeva vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1401_2: Yanti pattaṃ, ghaṃsanakiriyāpekkhāya cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Aṅgulilekhā paññāyatīti
tika-vin07t:1401_3: sinehābhāvepi pattassa succhavitāya paññāyati. Yanti yāvakālikaṃ, yāmakālikañca.
tika-vin07t:1401_4: Apariccattamevāti nirapekkhatāya anupasampannassa adinnaṃ, apariccattañca yāvakālikādivatthumeva
tika-vin07t:1401_5: sandhāya vadati, na pana taggatapaṭiggahaṇaṃ. Na hi vatthuṃ apariccajitvā tatthagatapaṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1401_6: pariccajituṃ sakkā, na ca tādisaṃ vacanamatthi. Yadi bhaveyya, “sace patto duddhoto
tika-vin07t:1401_7: hoti…pe… bhuñjantassa pācittiya”nti vacanaṃ virujjheyya. Na hi dhovanena āmisaṃ apanetuṃ
tika-vin07t:1401_8: vāyamantassa paṭiggahaṇe apekkhā vattati. Yena punadivase bhuñjato pācittiyaṃ janeyya,
tika-vin07t:1401_9: patte pana vattamānā apekkhā taggatike āmisepi vattati evanāmāti āmise anapekkhatā
tika-vin07t:1401_10: ettha na labbhati, tato āmise avijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ punadivase pācittiyaṃ janetīti
tika-vin07t:1401_11: idaṃ vuttaṃ. Atha mataṃ “yadaggenettha āmisānapekkhatā na labbhati. Tadaggena paṭiggahaṇānapekkhāpi
tika-vin07t:1401_12: na labbhatī”ti. Tathā sati yattha āmisāpekkhā atthi, tattha paṭiggahaṇāpekkhāpi na
tika-vin07t:1401_13: vigacchatīti āpannaṃ, evañca paṭiggahaṇe anapekkhavissajjanaṃ visuṃ na vattabbaṃ
tika-vin07t:1401_14: siyā. Aṭṭhakathāyañcetampi paṭiggahaṇavijahanakāraṇattena abhimataṃ siyā, idaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ
tika-vin07t:1401_15: katvā visuṃ vattabbaṃ cīvarāpekkhāya vattamānāyapi paccuddhārena adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1401_16: viya. Etasmiñca upāye sati gaṇṭhikāhatapattesu avaṭṭanatā nāma na siyāti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-vin07t:1401_17: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “yaṃ parassa pariccajitvā adinnampi sace paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin07t:1401_18: nirapekkhanissajjanena vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ hoti, tampi dutiyadivase vaṭṭatī”tiādi,
tika-vin07t:1402_0: Pakatiāmiseti odanādikappiyayāvakālike. Dveti purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ yāmakālikaṃ
tika-vin07t:1402_1: purebhattaṃ sāmisena mukhena bhuñjato sannidhipaccayā ekaṃ, yāmakālikasaṃsaṭṭhatāya
tika-vin07t:1402_2: yāvakālikattabhajanena anatirittapaccayā ekanti dve pācittiyāni. Vikappadvayeti sāmisanirāmisapakkhadvaye.
tika-vin07t:1402_3: Thullaccayañca dukkaṭañcāti manussamaṃse thullaccayaṃ, sesesu dukkaṭaṃ. Yāvakālikayāmakālikatā,
tika-vin07t:1402_4: sannidhibhāvo, tassa ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1405_0: 259. Navame paṇītasaṃsaṭṭhāni bhojanāni paṇītabhojanānīti pāḷiyaṃ pana bhojanāni
tika-vin07t:1405_1: pubbe vuttattā pākaṭānīti adassitāni, tādisehi paṇītehi missattā paṇītabhojanāni
tika-vin07t:1405_2: nāma honti. Tesaṃ pabhedadassanatthaṃ “seyyathidaṃ sappi navanīta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1405_3: Sappibhattanti ettha kiñcāpi sappinā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ bhattaṃ, sappi ca bhattañcātipi attho
tika-vin07t:1405_4: viññāyati, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sālibhattaṃ viya sappibhattaṃ nāma natthī”tiādinā
tika-vin07t:1405_5: vuttattā na sakkā aññaṃ vatthuṃ. Aṭṭhakathācariyā eva hi īdisesu ṭhānesu pamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1406_0: Mūlanti kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā anāpattīti ettha visaṅketena pācittiyābhāvepi
tika-vin07t:1406_1: sūpodanadukkaṭā na muccatīti vadanti. “Kappiyasappinā, akappiyasappinā”ti ca idaṃ
tika-vin07t:1407_0: 261. Mahānāmasikkhāpadaṃ nāma upari cātumāsapaccayapavāraṇāsikkhāpadaṃ. Agilāno hi
tika-vin07t:1407_1: appavāritaṭṭhāne viññāpentopi kālaparicchedaṃ, bhesajjaparicchedaṃ vā katvā saṅghavasena
tika-vin07t:1407_2: pavāritaṭṭhānato taduttari viññāpentena, paricchedabbhantarepi na bhesajjakaraṇīyena
tika-vin07t:1407_3: rogena bhesajjaṃ viññāpentena ca samo hotīti “mahānāmasikkhāpadena kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1407_4: Paṇītabhojanatā, agilānatā, akataviññattiyā paṭilābho, ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1410: 263. Dasame ghanabaddhoti ghanamaṃsena sambaddho, kathinasaṃhatasarīroti attho.
tika-vin07t:1411_0: 264. Mukhadvāranti mukhato heṭṭhā dvāraṃ mukhadvāraṃ, galanāḷikanti attho. Evañca
tika-vin07t:1411_1: nāsikāya paviṭṭhampi mukhadvāraṃ paviṭṭhameva hoti, mukhe pakkhittamattañca appaviṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1411_2: Āhāranti ajjhoharitabbaṃ kālikaṃ adhippetaṃ, na udakaṃ. Tañhi bhesajjasaṅgahitampi
tika-vin07t:1411_3: akālikameva paṭiggahitasseva kālikattā. Udake hi paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhati. Teneva bhikkhunā
tika-vin07t:1411_4: tāpitena udakena cirapaṭiggahitena ca akappiyakuṭiyaṃ vutthena ca saha āmisaṃ bhuñjantassāpi
tika-vin07t:1411_5: sāmapākādidoso na hoti. Vakkhati hi “bhikkhu yāguatthāya…pe… udakaṃ tāpeti, vaṭṭatī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1411_6: Bhikkhū pana etaṃ adhippāyaṃ tadā na jāniṃsu. Tenāha “sammā atthaṃ asallakkhetvā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1412: 265. Rathareṇumpīti rathe gacchante uṭṭhahanareṇusadisareṇuṃ. Tena tato sukhumaṃ ākāse paribbhamanakaṃ dissamānampi abbohārikanti dasseti. Akallakoti gilāno.
tika-vin07t:1413_0: “Gahetuṃ vā…pe… tassa orimantenā”ti iminā ākāse ujuṃ ṭhatvā parena ukkhittaṃ gaṇhantassāpi
tika-vin07t:1413_1: āsannaṅgabhūtapādatalato paṭṭhāya hatthapāso paricchinditabbo, na pana sīsantato
tika-vin07t:1413_2: paṭṭhāyāti dasseti. Tattha “orimantenā”ti imassa heṭṭhimantenāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1414_0: Ettha ca pavāraṇāsikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace bhikkhu nisinno hoti, āsanassa pacchimantato
tika-vin07t:1414_1: paṭṭhāyā”tiādinā paṭiggāhakānaṃ āsannaṅgassa pārimantato paṭṭhāya paricchedassa dassitattā
tika-vin07t:1414_2: idhāpi ākāse ṭhitassa paṭiggāhakassa āsannaṅgabhūtapādaṅgulassa pārimantabhūtato
tika-vin07t:1414_3: paṇhipariyantassa heṭṭhimatalato paṭṭhāya, dāyakassa pana orimantabhūtato pādaṅgulassa
tika-vin07t:1414_4: heṭṭhimatalato paṭṭhāya hatthapāso paricchinditabboti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imināva nayena
tika-vin07t:1414_5: bhūmiyaṃ nipajjitvā ussīse nisinnassa hatthato paṭiggaṇhantassapi āsannasīsaṅgassa
tika-vin07t:1414_6: pārimantabhūtato gīvantato paṭṭhāyeva hatthapāso minitabbo, na pādatalato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin07t:1414_7: Evaṃ nipajjitvā dānepi yathānurūpaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅga”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1415_1: vācāya vattabbakiccaṃ natthīti dasseti. Katthaci aṭṭhakathāsu, padesesu vā. Asaṃhārime
tika-vin07t:1415_2: phalaketi thāmamajjhimena purisena asaṃhāriye. Puñchitvā paṭiggahetvāti puñchitepi
tika-vin07t:1415_3: rajanacuṇṇasaṅkāya sati paṭiggahaṇatthāya vuttaṃ, nāsati. Taṃ panāti patitarajaṃ
tika-vin07t:1415_4: appaṭiggahetvā upari gahitapiṇḍapātaṃ. Anāpattīti durupaciṇṇādidoso natthi. “Anupasampannassa
tika-vin07t:1415_5: dassāmī”tiādipi vinayadukkaṭaparihārāya vuttaṃ. Tathā akatvā gahitepi paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin07t:1415_6: paribhuñjato anāpatti eva. “Anupasampannassa datvā”ti idampi purimābhogānuguṇatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1416_0: Carukenāti khuddakabhājanena. Abhihaṭattāti diyyamānakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Datvā
tika-vin07t:1416_1: apanayanakāle pana chārikā vā bindūni vā patanti, puna paṭiggahetabbaṃ abhihārassa
tika-vin07t:1416_2: vigatattāti vadanti. Taṃ yathā na patati, tathā apanessāmīti pariharante yujjati.
tika-vin07t:1416_3: Pakatisaññāya apanente abhihāro na chijjati, taṃ paṭiggahitameva hoti. Mukhavaṭṭiyāpi
tika-vin07t:1416_4: gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti abhihariyamānassa pattassa mukhavaṭṭiyā uparibhāge hatthaṃ pasāretvā phusituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1417_0: Pādena pelletvāti “pādena paṭiggahessāmī”tisaññāya akkamitvā. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino.
tika-vin07t:1417_2: hoti. Tasmā tesaṃ vacanaṃ na gahetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1418_0: Tena āharāpetunti yassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gataṃ, taṃ idha ānehīti āṇāpetvā tena
tika-vin07t:1418_1: āharāpetuṃ itarassa vaṭṭatīti attho. Na tato paranti tadaheva sāmaṃ appaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin07t:1418_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tadaheva paṭiggahitaṃ pana punadivasādīsu appaṭiggahetvāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1419_0: Khiyyantīti khayaṃ gacchanti, tesaṃ cuṇṇehi thullaccayaappaṭiggahaṇāpattiyo na hontīti
tika-vin07t:1419_1: adhippāyo. “Navasamuṭṭhita”nti eteneva ucchuādīsu abhinavalaggattā abbohārikaṃ na
tika-vin07t:1419_2: hotīti dasseti. Eseva nayoti sannidhidosādiṃ sandhāya vadati. Tenāha “na hī”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1419_3: Tena ca paṭiggahaṇaṅgesu pañcasupi samiddhesu ajjhoharitukāmatāya gahitameva paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin07t:1419_4: nāma hoti ajjhoharitabbesu eva paṭiggahaṇassa anuññātattāti dasseti. Tathā bāhiraparibhogatthāya
tika-vin07t:1419_5: gahetvā ṭhapitatelādiṃ ajjhoharitukāmatāya sati paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1420_0: Kesañcītiādīsu anupasampannānaṃ atthāya katthaci ṭhapiyamānampi hatthato muttamatte
tika-vin07t:1420_1: eva paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati, atha kho bhājane patitameva paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati.
tika-vin07t:1420_2: Bhājanañca bhikkhunā punadivasatthāya apekkhitamevāti taggatampi āmisaṃ duddhotapattagataṃ
tika-vin07t:1420_3: viya paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahatīti āsaṅkāya “sāmaṇerassa hatthe pakkhipitabba”nti vuttanti
tika-vin07t:1420_4: veditabbaṃ. Īdisesu hi yutti na gavesitabbā, vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ. “Pattagatā
tika-vin07t:1420_5: yāgū”ti iminā pattamukhavaṭṭiyā phuṭṭhepi kūṭe yāgu paṭiggahitā, uggahitā vā na hoti
tika-vin07t:1420_6: bhikkhuno anicchāya phuṭṭhattāti dasseti. Āropetīti hatthaṃ phusāpeti. Paṭiggahaṇūpagaṃ
tika-vin07t:1420_7: bhāraṃ nāma majjhimassa purisassa ukkhepārahaṃ. Na pidahitabbanti hatthato muttaṃ
tika-vin07t:1420_8: sandhāya vuttaṃ, hatthagataṃ pana itarena hatthena pidahato, hatthato muttampi vā
tika-vin07t:1421_0: Paṭiggaṇhātīti chāyatthāya upari dhārayamānā mahāsākhā yena kenaci chijjeyya, tattha
tika-vin07t:1421_1: laggarajaṃ mukhe pāteyya cāti kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paṭiggaṇhāti. Kuṇḍaketi mahāghaṭe.
tika-vin07t:1421_2: Tasmimpīti cāṭighaṭepi. Gāhāpetvāti appaṭiggahitaṃ kālikaṃ gāhāpetvā.
tika-vin07t:1422_0: Dutiyattherassāti “therassa pattaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”ti tena attano pariccajāpetvā dutiyattherassa
tika-vin07t:1422_1: deti. Ettha panāti pattaparivattane. Kāraṇanti ettha yathā “sāmaṇerā ito amhākampi
tika-vin07t:1422_2: dentī”ti vitakko uppajjati, na tathāti kāraṇaṃ vadanti, tañca yuttaṃ. Yassa pana
tika-vin07t:1422_3: tādiso vitakko natthi, tena aparivattetvāpi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1423_0: Niccāletunti cāletvā pāsāṇasakkharādiapanayaṃ kātuṃ. Uddhanaṃ āropetabbanti anaggikaṃ
tika-vin07t:1423_1: uddhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Uddhane paccamānassa āluḷane upari apakkataṇḍulā heṭṭhā
tika-vin07t:1424_0: Ādhārake patto ṭhapitoti appaṭiggahitāmiso patto puna paṭiggahaṇatthāya ṭhapito.
tika-vin07t:1424_1: Ekaggahaṇenevāti sāmaṇerānaṃ gahitassa puna acchaḍḍanavasena gahaṇena. Bhuñjituṃ
tika-vin07t:1424_2: vaṭṭatīti dhūmavaṭṭiyā tadahupaṭiggahitattā vuttaṃ. Bhattuggārotiādi abbohārikappasaṅgena
tika-vin07t:1424_4: kadāci vassodakena saha patanakā pāsāṇalekhā viya ghanībhūtaudakavisesā, tesu paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ
tika-vin07t:1424_5: natthi. Tenāha “udakagatikā evā”ti. Purebhattameva vaṭṭatīti appaṭiggahitāpattīhi
tika-vin07t:1425_0: Laggatīti mukhe ca hatthe ca mattikāvaṇṇaṃ dasseti. Bahalanti hatthamukhesu alagganakampi
tika-vin07t:1425_1: paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Vāsamattanti reṇukhīrābhāvaṃ dasseti. Ākirati paṭiggahetabbanti
tika-vin07t:1426_0: Mahābhūtesūti pāṇasarīrasannissitesu pathavīādimahābhūtesu. Sabbaṃ vaṭṭatīti attano,
tika-vin07t:1426_1: paresañca sarīranissitaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Akappiyamaṃsānulomatāya thullaccayādiṃ na
tika-vin07t:1426_2: janetīti adhippāyo. Patatīti attano sarīrato vicchinditvā patati. “Rukkhato chinditvā”ti
tika-vin07t:1426_3: vuttattā mattikatthāya pathaviṃ khaṇituṃ, aññampi yaṃkiñci mūlapaṇṇādivisabhesajjaṃ
tika-vin07t:1426_4: chinditvā chārikaṃ akatvāpi appaṭiggahitampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1426_5: Appaṭiggahitatā, ananuññātatā, dhūmādiabbohārikatābhāvo, ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1431_0: 273. Pañcamavaggassa paṭhame mayhaṃ nāmāti bhikkhunā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā dinnampi sandhāya
tika-vin07t:1431_1: vadati. Aññatitthiyatā, ananuññātatā, ajjhoharaṇīyatā, ajjhoharaṇatthāya sahatthā
tika-vin07t:1434: 274. Dutiye anācāraṃ ācaritukāmatā, tadatthameva upasampannassa uyyojanā, tassa upacārātikkamoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1437_0: 281. Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ khuddake ghareti ettha khuddakaṃ gharaṃ nāma pañcahatthato ūnakavitthāraṃ
tika-vin07t:1437_1: adhippetaṃ. Tattha ca piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato hatthapāse avijahitepi piṭṭhivaṃsātikkamo
tika-vin07t:1437_2: hotīti āha “piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā”ti. Yathā tathā vā katassāti piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ āropetvā
tika-vin07t:1438_0: 283. Pāḷiyaṃ vītarāgāti apariyuṭṭhitarāgānaṃ, anāgāmīnañca saṅgaho. Sacittakanti
tika-vin07t:1438_2: sayanigharatā, dutiyassa bhikkhuno abhāvo, anupakhajja nisīdananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1442_0: 298. Chaṭṭhe “pariyesitvā ārocanakiccaṃ nāma natthī”ti vuttattā yo apariyesitabbo
tika-vin07t:1442_1: upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhāne dissati, so sacepi pakativacanassa savanūpacāraṃ atikkamma
tika-vin07t:1442_2: ṭhito upagantvā āpucchitabbo. Tenāha “api ca…pe… yaṃ passati, so āpucchitabbo”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:1443: 302. Anāpattivāre cettha antarārāmādīnaññeva vuttattā vihārato gāmavīthiṃ anuññātakāraṇaṃ vinā atikkamantassāpi āpatti hoti, na pana gharūpacāraṃ atikkamantasseva.
tika-vin07t:1444_0: Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “aññassa gharūpacāraṃ okkamantassa…pe… paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ ummāraṃ atikkāmetī”tiādi
tika-vin07t:1444_1: vuttaṃ. Taṃ gāme paviṭṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tathāpi aññassa gharūpacāraṃ anokkamitvā
tika-vin07t:1444_2: vīthimajjheneva gantvā icchiticchitagharadvārābhimukhe ṭhatvā manusse oloketvā gacchantassāpi
tika-vin07t:1444_3: pācittiyameva. Tattha keci “vīthiyaṃ atikkamantassa gharūpacāragaṇanāya āpattiyo”ti
tika-vin07t:1444_4: vadanti. Aññe pana “yāni kulāni uddissa gato, tesaṃ gaṇanāyā”ti. Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1444_5: aññatarena nimantanasādiyanaṃ, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchanā, bhattiyagharato aññagharūpasaṅkamanaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1444_6: majjhanhikānatikkamo, samayāpadānaṃ abhāvoti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1447: 303. Sattame mahānāmoti sukkodanassa putto anuruddhattherassa, satthu ca jeṭṭhabhātā. Ānandatthero amitodanassa putto, nandatthero pana suddhodanasseva.
tika-vin07t:1448_0: 305. Pāḷiyaṃ kālaṃ āharissathāti ajjatanaṃ kālaṃ vītināmessatha, sve bhesajjaṃ harissathāti
tika-vin07t:1448_1: vā attho. “Atthi pavāraṇā bhesajjapariyantā ca rattipariyantā cā”ti tatiyakoṭṭhāse
tika-vin07t:1448_2: niyamitameva bhesajjaṃ niyamitakālantareyeva gahetabbaṃ, na tato bahi. Itarathā visuṃ
tika-vin07t:1448_3: payojanaṃ natthīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sapariyantā saṅghapavāraṇā, taduttari bhesajjaviññatti,
tika-vin07t:1451_0: 315. Aṭṭhame ekamekanti ettha duvaṅginīpi tivaṅginīpi senā saṅgayhati. Uyyuttacaturaṅgasenādassanāya
tika-vin07t:1451_1: tathārūpapaccayādiṃ vinā gamanaṃ, ananuññātokāse dassananti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1454: 319. Navame senāya catuttho sūriyatthaṅgamo, agilānatāti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1457: 322. Dasame pāḷiyaṃ kati te lakkhāni laddhānīti kittakā tayā laddhāti attho. Uyyodhikādidassanāya tathārūpapaccayaṃ vinā gamanaṃ, ananuññātokāse dassananti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1462_0: 328. Chaṭṭhavaggassa paṭhame pāḷiyaṃ kiṇṇapakkhittāti piṭṭhapūvādiṃ apakkhipitvā
tika-vin07t:1462_1: kiṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ dhaññaṅkurādisurābījaṃ pakkhipitvā katā. Sambhārasaṃyuttāti sāsapādianekasambhārehi saññuttā.
tika-vin07t:1463_0: Madhukatālanāḷikerādipupphādiraso ciraparivāsito pupphāsavo nāma. Tathā panasādi
tika-vin07t:1463_1: phalāsavo. Muddikaraso madhvāsavo. Ucchuraso guḷāsavo. Tiphalatikaṭukādinānāsambhārānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1463_2: raso ciraparivāsito sambhārasaṃyutto. Bījato paṭṭhāyāti yathāvuttānaṃ piṭṭhādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1464_0: 329. Loṇasovīrakaṃ suttañca anekehi dabbasambhārehi abhisaṅkhato bhesajjaviseso.
tika-vin07t:1464_1: Uyyuttasikkhāpadānaṃ acittakalokavajjesu lokavajjatā pubbe vuttanayāvāti tattha kiñcipi
tika-vin07t:1464_2: avatvā idha tehi asādhāraṇavatthuvisesasiddhāya acittakapakkhepi akusalacittatāya
tika-vin07t:1464_3: taṃ lokavajjatādivisesaṃ dassetumeva “vatthuajānanatāya cetthā”tiādinā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1464_4: Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vitthārato sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1464_5: viraddhaṭṭhānavisodhanavasena vuttanti tattheva gahetabbaṃ. Majjabhāvo, tassa pānañcāti
tika-vin07t:1467: 330. Dutiye hasādhippāyatā, upasampannassa kāyena kāyāmasananti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1470_0: 338. Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ hasadhamme hasadhammasaññītiādīsu uplavādimattaṃ kiṃ hasadhammo
tika-vin07t:1470_1: hotīti gahaṇavasena sati karaṇīye kariyamānaṃ hasadhammaṃ hasadhammoti gahaṇavasena
tika-vin07t:1470_2: attho veditabbo. Ussārentoti udake ṭhitaṃ nāvaṃ tīre āropento.
tika-vin07t:1471_0: Patanuppatanavāresūti udakassa uparitale maṇḍūkagatiyā patanuppatanavasena gamanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:1471_1: khittāya ekissā kathalāya vasena vuttaṃ. Udakassa uparigopphakatā, hasādhippāyena
tika-vin07t:1474: 344. Catutthe suttānulomanti mahāpadesā. Aṭṭhakathātipi vadanti. Upasampannassa paññattena vacanaṃ, anādariyakaraṇanti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1477: 345. Pañcame upasampannatā, tassa dassanasavanavisaye bhiṃsāpetukāmatāya vāyamananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1480_0: 354. Chaṭṭhe alātaṃ patitanti aggikapālato bahi patitaṃ. Vijjhātanti vijjhātaṃ alātaṃ
tika-vin07t:1480_1: kapālaggimhi pakkhipitvā jālentassa pācittiyaṃ, tathā kevalaṃ indhanaṃ pātentassapi
tika-vin07t:1480_2: vijjhātaṃ kapālaggiṃ mukhavātādinā ujjālentassapi. Gilānatādikāraṇābhāvo, visibbetukāmatā,
tika-vin07t:1483_0: 357. Sattame pāḷiyaṃ nagare thakiteti ettha raññā ciraṃ nahāyitukāmena “ahaṃ bahi
tika-vin07t:1483_1: uyyāne katārakkho vasissāmi, nagaraṃ thaketvā gopethā”ti anuññātā, te thakiṃsūti
tika-vin07t:1483_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asambhinnenāti anaṭṭhena, taṃ divasaṃ puna aggahitālaṅkārena pabuddhamattenāti
tika-vin07t:1483_3: adhippāyo. Majjhimadese ūnakaddhamāsanahānaṃ, samayādīnaṃ abhāvoti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1486: 368. Aṭṭhame paṭiladdhanavacīvarenāti ettha pubbe akatakappaṃ katipāhaṃ nivāsanatthāya tāvakālikavasena laddhampi saṅgayhatīti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1487_0: 369. “Navaṃ nāma akatakappa”nti sāmaññato vuttattā aññena bhikkhunā kappabinduṃ datvā
tika-vin07t:1487_1: paribhuttaṃ cīvaraṃ, tena vā, tato labhitvā aññena vā kenaci dinnampi katakappameva
tika-vin07t:1487_2: navaṃ nāma na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ vā”ti vuttattā aṃsabaddhakāsāvampi
tika-vin07t:1487_3: pārupitabbato kappaṃ kātabbanti vadanti. Cammakāranīlaṃ nāma cammaṃ nīlavaṇṇaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin07t:1487_4: yojiyamānaṃ nīlaṃ. Pakatinīlamevāti keci. Yathāvuttacīvarassa akatakappatā, anaṭṭhacīvarāditā,
tika-vin07t:1490: 374. Navame yenāti yena saddhiṃ, yassa santiketi attho. Sāmaṃ vikappitassa apaccuddhāro, vikappanupagacīvaratā, avissāsena paribhogoti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1493_0: 378. Dasame pāḷiyaṃ antamaso hasāpekkhopīti api-saddena atheyyacittaṃ kodhena dukkhāpetukāmaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1493_1: avaṇṇaṃ pakāsetukāmañca saṅgayhati. Teneva “tivedana”nti vuttaṃ. Upasampannassa pattādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1498_0: 382. Sattamassa paṭhame usuṃ saraṃ asati khipatīti issāso. Na hettha kiñci jīvitaṃ
tika-vin07t:1498_1: nāma visuṃ tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. Tattha pāṇeti satte. Appamattena vattaṃ kātabbanti
tika-vin07t:1498_2: yathā pāṇakānaṃ vihesāpi na hoti, evaṃ sallakkhetvā otāpanasammajjanādivattaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1501: 387. Dutiye udakasaṇṭhānakappadeseti kaddamapāsāṇādibhūmiyaṃ. Tatthāti āsitte kappiyaudake. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-vin07t:1504: 392. Tatiye “tassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantvā”ti vuttattā yassa adhikaraṇaṃ saṅghakammena nihataṃ, tassa sammukhe eva ukkoṭentassa pācittiyaṃ. Parammukhe pana dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin07t:1505_1: viya ukkoṭanaṃ sayaṃ akusalaṃ na hoti, dhammakammasaññāya, pana vimatiyā ca ukkoṭaneneva
tika-vin07t:1505_2: akusalaṃ hoti. Yathādhammaṃ nihatatā, jānanā, ukkoṭanāti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1508_0: 399. Catutthe āpattiṃ āpajjatiyevāti dhuranikkhepapakkhe vuttaṃ. Vatthupuggaloti
tika-vin07t:1508_1: āpannapuggalo. Chādetukāmatāya hi sati eva avassaṃ aññassa ārocanaṃ vuttaṃ, vatthupuggalassa
tika-vin07t:1508_2: ca ārocanā nāma na hotīti paṭicchādanamevāti adhippāyo. Koṭi chinnā hotīti chādessāmīti
tika-vin07t:1508_3: dhuranikkhepe satipi puggalaparamparāya gacchantī āpattikoṭi chijjati.
tika-vin07t:1509_0: 400. “Anupasampannassa sukkavissaṭṭhi ca kāyasaṃsaggo cāti ayaṃ duṭṭhullaajjhācāro
tika-vin07t:1509_2: sikkhāpadāni duṭṭhullo nāma ajjhācāro, sesāni aduṭṭhullo. Sukkavissaṭṭhikāyasaṃsaggaduṭṭhullaattakāmā
tika-vin07t:1509_3: panassa ajjhācāro nāmā”ti iminā vacanena virujjhatīti vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Puggalapemena
tika-vin07t:1509_4: chādayato cettha “aññe garahissantī”ti bhayavasena chādanakkhaṇe paṭighova uppajjatīti
tika-vin07t:1512: 402. Pañcame rūpasippanti heraññikasippaṃ. Gabbhe sayitakālena saddhiṃ vīsatimaṃ vassaṃ paripuṇṇamassāti gabbhavīso.
tika-vin07t:1513_1: Pāṭipadadivaseti pacchimikāya vassūpanāyikāya. Dvādasa māse mātu kucchismiṃ vasitvā
tika-vin07t:1513_2: mahāpavāraṇāya jātaṃ upasampādentīti attho. “Tiṃsa rattindivo māso, dvādasamāsiko
tika-vin07t:1513_3: saṃvaccharo”ti vacanato “cattāro māsā parihāyantī”ti vuttaṃ. Vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhantīti
tika-vin07t:1513_4: vassaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhanti, “ekamāsaṃ adhikamāso”ti chaḍḍetvā vassaṃ upagacchantīti
tika-vin07t:1513_5: attho. Tasmā tatiyo tatiyo saṃvaccharo terasamāsiko hoti. Te dve māse gahetvāti nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsato
tika-vin07t:1513_6: yāva jātadivasabhūtā mahāpavāraṇā. Tāva ye dve māsā anāgatā, tesaṃ atthāya adhikamāsato
tika-vin07t:1513_7: laddhe dve māse gahetvā. Tenāha “yo pavāretvā vīsativasso bhavissatī”tiādi. “Nikkaṅkhā
tika-vin07t:1513_8: hutvā”ti idaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ vassānaṃ ekaadhikamāse gahetvā tato vīsatiyā vassesupi
tika-vin07t:1513_9: cātuddasīatthāya catunnaṃ māsānaṃ parihāpanena sabbadā paripuṇṇavīsativassataṃ sandhāya
tika-vin07t:1513_10: vuttaṃ. Pavāretvā vīsativasso bhavissatīti mahāpavāraṇādivase atikkante gabbhavassena
tika-vin07t:1513_11: saha vīsativasso bhavissatīti attho. Tasmāti yasmā gabbhamāsāpi gaṇanūpagā honti,
tika-vin07t:1513_12: tasmā. Ekavīsativassoti jātiyā vīsativassaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1514: 406. Aññaṃ upasampādetīti upajjhāyo, ācariyo vā hutvā upasampādeti. Sopīti upasampādentopi anupasampanno. Ūnavīsativassatā, taṃ ñatvā upajjhāyena hutvā upasampādananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1517: 409. Chaṭṭhe theyyasatthabhāvo, ñatvā saṃvidhānaṃ, avisaṅketena gamananti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1521_0: 417. Aṭṭhame antarāyanti antarā vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti antarāyo, diṭṭhadhammikādianattho.
tika-vin07t:1521_1: Ānantariyadhammāti anantare bhave phalanibbattane niyuttā cetanādidhammāti attho.
tika-vin07t:1521_2: “Na saggassā”ti idaṃ bhikkhunidūsanakammassa ānantariyattābhāvato vuttaṃ. Ariyasāvikāsu,
tika-vin07t:1521_3: pana kalyāṇaputhujjanabhūtāya ca balakkārena dūsentassa ānantariyasaasameva. Mokkhantarāyikatā
tika-vin07t:1521_4: pana lolāyapi pakatattabhikkhuniyā dūsakassa tasmiṃ attabhāve magguppattiyā abhāvato vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1522_1: Paṇḍakādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ nidassanamattaṃ. Sabbāpi duhetukāhetukapaṭisandhiyo vipākantarāyikāva
tika-vin07t:1523: Ayanti ariṭṭho. Rasena rasanti anavajjena paccayaparibhuñjanarasena pañcakāmaguṇapaabhogarasaṃ samānetvā. Upanento viyāti ghaṭento viya, so eva vā pāṭho.
tika-vin07t:1524_0: Aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamāti ettha aṭṭhi eva nimmaṃsatāya kaṅkalanti ca vuccati. Palibhañjanaṭṭhenāti
tika-vin07t:1524_1: avassaṃ patanaṭṭhena. Adhikuṭṭanaṭṭhenāti ati viya kuṭṭanaṭṭhena. Pāḷiyaṃ “tathāhaṃ
tika-vin07t:1524_2: bhagavatā…pe… nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti idaṃ vatthuanurūpato vuttaṃ. Evaṃ pana aggahetvā
tika-vin07t:1524_3: aññenapi ākārena yaṃ kiñci bhagavatā vuttaṃ viparītato gahetvā parehi vuttepi amuñcitvā
tika-vin07t:1524_4: voharantassāpi vuttanayānusārena tadanuguṇaṃ samanubhāsanakammavācaṃ yojetvā āpattiyā
tika-vin07t:1524_5: āropetuṃ, āpattiyā adassanādīsu tīsu yaṃ kiñci abhirucitaṃ nimittaṃ katvā ukkhepanīyakammaṃ
tika-vin07t:1524_6: kātuñca labbhati. Samanubhāsanaṃ akatvāpi “māyasmā evaṃ avacā”ti bhikkhūhi vuttamatte
tika-vin07t:1524_7: laddhiyā appaṭinissajjanapaccayāya dukkaṭāpattiyāpi ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kātumpi vaṭṭatevāti
tika-vin07t:1524_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dhammakammatā, samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1527: 424. Navame “ukkhitto anosārito”ti vuttattā ariṭṭhassa ukkhepanīyakammaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1528_0: 425. Pāḷiyaṃ “ekacchanne”ti sāmaññato vuttattā nānūpacārepi ekacchanne nipajjane
tika-vin07t:1528_1: paṇṇattiṃ ajānantassa arahatopi ukkhittānuvattakānampi pācittiyameva. Akatānudhammatā,
tika-vin07t:1531: 428. Dasame pireti sambodhanatthe nipātapadaṃ. Sesaṃ anantarasikkhāpadadvaye vuttanayameva.
tika-vin07t:1536: 434. Aṭṭhamavaggassa paṭhame upasampannassa paññattena vacanaṃ, asikkhitukāmassa lesena evaṃ vacananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1539_0: 438. Dutiye alajjitāti alajjitāya. Evaṃ sesesupi. Sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjatītiādi
tika-vin07t:1539_1: bhikkhubhikkhunīnaññeva vuttaṃ alajjilakkhaṇaṃ, sāmaṇerādīnaṃ, pana gahaṭṭhānañca
tika-vin07t:1539_3: eseva nayo. Kiñcāpi kukkucce uppannepi madditvā karonto, kappiye akappiyasaññitāya
tika-vin07t:1539_4: karontopi taṅkhaṇikāya alajjitāya evaṃ karonti. Tathāpi kukkuccādibhede visuṃ gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1540_1: paṭijānantānaṃ kuhakānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ disvā “mārakāyikā devatā asuciṃ upasaṃharantī”tigāhino
