tika-vin07t:1540_2: parūpahāravādā nāma. Arahato sabbesaṃ itthipurisādīnaṃ nāmādiajānane aññāṇaṃ, tattha
tika-vin07t:1540_3: sanniṭṭhānabhāvena kaṅkhā, parato sutvā nāmādijānanena paravitāraṇo atthītivādino
tika-vin07t:1540_4: aññāṇavādā, kaṅkhāvādā, paravitāraṇavādā ca tesaṃ, mahāsaṅghikādīnañca vibhāgo kathāvatthuppakaraṇe vutto.
tika-vin07t:1541_0: Cattāro maggā ca phalāni cāti ettha ca-kārena abhiññāpaṭisambhidāpi saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1541_1: Kecīti pariyattidharā dhammakathikā. Puna kecīti paṭipattidharā paṃsukūlikattherā.
tika-vin07t:1541_2: Itare panātiādīsu ayaṃ adhippāyo – dhammakathikattherā pana paṃsukūlikattherehi ābhataṃ suttaṃ sutvā –
tika-vin07t:1543: Tāva dakkhanti ālokaṃ, sūriye abbhuṭṭhite yathā.
tika-vin07t:1545: Tamo bhavissati loke, sūriye atthaṅgate yathā.
tika-vin07t:1547: Paṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito dhīro, yogakkhemā na dhaṃsatī”ti. –
tika-vin07t:1548_0: Idaṃ suttaṃ āharitvā attanova vādaṃ patiṭṭhapentā pārājikānāpajjanavasena ṭhitā paṭipattisaṅgahitā
tika-vin07t:1548_1: pariyattiyeva mūlanti āhaṃsūti. Tenāha “sace pañca bhikkhū cattāri pārājikāni rakkhaṇakā…pe…
tika-vin07t:1548_2: sāsanaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ viruḷhiṃ gamayissantī”ti. Etena ca parikkhīṇe kāle lajjigaṇaṃ alabhantena
tika-vin07t:1548_3: vinayadharena alajjinopi pakatatte saṅgahetvā tehi saha dhammāmisasambhogaṃ saṃvāsaṃ
tika-vin07t:1548_4: karontena bahū kulaputte upasampādetvā sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti idaṃ sijjhatīti
tika-vin07t:1548_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Garahitukāmatā, upasampannassa santike sikkhāpadavivaṇṇananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1551_0: 444. Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ ko pana vādo bhiyyoti tehi aññehi bhikkhūhi diṭṭhadvattivārato
tika-vin07t:1551_1: bhiyyo pana vitthārena uddisiyamāne pātimokkhe nisinnapubbatā atthi ce, tattha kimeva
tika-vin07t:1551_2: vattabbaṃ, āpattimokkho natthi evāti adhippāyo. Tañca yathādhammo kāretabboti tanti
tika-vin07t:1551_3: kāraṇatthe upayogavacanaṃ, tāyāti attho. Yathā dhammo ca vinayo ca ṭhito, tathā tāya
tika-vin07t:1551_4: āpattiyā kāretabboti vuttaṃ hoti. Mohāropanaṃ, tikkhattuṃ sutabhāvo, mohetukāmassa
tika-vin07t:1554: 451. Catutthe pāḷiyaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhena vāti ettha pāsāṇādinissaggiyapahāropi saṅgahito.
tika-vin07t:1555_0: 452. Rattacittoti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena vuttaṃ. Methunarāgena pana pahārato purisādīsu
tika-vin07t:1555_1: dukkaṭameva. Mokkhādhippāyena daṇḍakoṭiyā sappādiṃ ghaṭṭetvā maṇḍūkādiṃ mocentassapi
tika-vin07t:1555_2: anāpatti eva. Kupitatā, upasampannassa na mokkhādhippāyena pahāroti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1558_0: 457. Pañcame na paharitukāmatāya dinnattā dukkaṭanti ettha kimidaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, pahārapaccayā,
tika-vin07t:1558_1: udāhu uggiraṇapaccayāti? Uggiraṇapaccayāva, na pahārapaccayā. Na hi paharitukāmatāya
tika-vin07t:1558_2: asati tappaccayā kāci āpatti yuttā, uggiraṇassa pana attano sabhāvena asaṇṭhitattā
tika-vin07t:1558_3: tappaccayā pācittiyaṃ na jātaṃ, asuddhacittena katapayogattā ca ettha anāpatti na
tika-vin07t:1562_0: 459. Chaṭṭhe “attaparittāṇaṃ karontā”ti idaṃ na ca veramūlikā anuddhaṃsanāti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:1562_1: vuttaṃ. Anuddhaṃsanakkhaṇe pana kopacittameva uppajjati. Teneva “dukkhavedana”nti
tika-vin07t:1565: 464. Sattame upasampannassa aphāsukāmatā, kukkuccuppādananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1568_0: 471. Aṭṭhame suyyatīti suti, vacanaṃ. Tassā samīpaṃ upassuti. Suyyati etthāti sutīti
tika-vin07t:1568_1: evañhi atthe gayhamāne savanaṭṭhānasamīpe aññasmiṃ assavanaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti āpajjati.
tika-vin07t:1568_2: Aṭṭhakathāyañca upassuti-saddasseva atthaṃ dassetuṃ “yattha ṭhatvā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1569: 473. Ekaparicchedānīti kadāci akiriyato, kadāci kiriyato samuṭṭhānasāmaññena vuttaṃ. Upasampannena codanādhippāyo, savananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1572: 474. Navame dhammakammatā, jānanaṃ, chandaṃ datvā khiyyananti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1575: 481. Dasame vinicchayakathāya dhammikatā, taṃ ñatvā kammato paṭṭhāya ekasīmaṭṭhassa samānasaṃvāsikassa hatthapāsavijahananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1578: 484. Ekādasame upasampannassa dhammena laddhasammutitā, saṅghena saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ datvā khiyyitukāmatāya khiyyananti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1584_0: 499. Navamavaggassa paṭhame pāḷiyaṃ saṃsuddhagahaṇikoti ettha gahaṇīti gabbhāsayasaññito
tika-vin07t:1584_2: ubhinnampi sayanigharato anikkhantatā, appaṭisaṃviditassa indakhīlātikkamoti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1587_0: 506. Dutiye āvasathassāti ettha antoārāme vā hotu aññattha vā, yattha katthaci attano
tika-vin07t:1587_1: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āvasatho nāma. Chandenapi bhayenapīti vaḍḍhakiādīsu chandena, rājavallabhesu
tika-vin07t:1587_2: bhayena. Ākiṇṇamanussepi jāte…pe… āsaṅkantīti tasmiṃ nimmanussaṭṭhāne pacchā ākiṇṇamanusse
tika-vin07t:1587_3: jātepi visaritvā gamanakāle aññassa adiṭṭhattā tameva bhikkhuṃ āsaṅkanti. Patirūpaṃ
tika-vin07t:1587_4: nāma kappiyabhaṇḍe sayaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ gahetvā akappiyabhaṇḍe patirūpānaṃ upāsakādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1587_5: dassetvā cetiyādipuññe niyojanaṃ vā dāpetvā nirapekkhagamanaṃ vā. Samādapetvāti yācitvā.
tika-vin07t:1587_6: Parasantakatā, vissāsaggāhapaṃsukūlasaññānaṃ abhāvo, ananuññātakāraṇā uggahaṇādi cāti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1590_0: 508. Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ bhayakathanti rājacorādibhayaṃ vā rogāmanussadubbhikkhakantārādibhayaṃ
tika-vin07t:1590_1: vā ārabbha pavattaṃ. Visikhākathanti suniviṭṭhādivīthikathaṃ. Kumbhaṭṭhānakathanti
tika-vin07t:1590_2: udakatitthakathaṃ, kumbhadāsīkathaṃ vā. Pubbapetakathanti atītañātikathaṃ. Nānattakathanti
tika-vin07t:1590_3: vuttāhi, vakkhamānāhi ca vimuttaṃ nānāsabhāvaṃ niratthakakathaṃ. Lokakkhāyikanti
tika-vin07t:1590_4: “ayaṃ loko kena nimmito”tiādinā lokasabhāvakkhānavasena pavattanakathā. Evaṃ samuddakkhāyikā
tika-vin07t:1590_5: veditabbā. Iti bhavo iti abhavoti yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ vatvā pavattitakathā
tika-vin07t:1590_6: itibhavābhavakathā. Ettha ca bhavo sassataṃ, vuḍḍhi, kāmasukhañcāti tividho, abhavo
tika-vin07t:1590_7: tabbiparītavasena. Iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ dvattiṃsatiracchānakathā
tika-vin07t:1590_8: nāma honti. Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi araññapabbatanadīdīpakathā iti-saddena
tika-vin07t:1590_9: saṅgahetvā dvattiṃsatiracchānakathāti vuccanti. Iti vāti ettha iti-saddo pakāratthe.
tika-vin07t:1590_10: Vā-saddo vikappatthe. Tasmā evaṃ pakāraṃ ito aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ niratthakakathaṃ kathetīti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1591_0: 512. Ussāhaṃ paṭippassambhetvā vihāraṃ gacchantāti ettha gāmūpacārato bahi nikkhante
tika-vin07t:1591_1: antarārāmādīnamupacāraṃ paviṭṭhe sandhāya vuttaṃ. Gāmūpacārabbhantare pana paṭipassaddhussāhānampi
tika-vin07t:1591_2: puna tameva vā aññaṃ vā gāmaṃ pavisitukāmatāya sati āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi. “Kulaghare
tika-vin07t:1591_3: vā…pe… gantabba”nti idaṃ pana purebhattaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ vikāle sañjāte vikāle gāmappavesassa
tika-vin07t:1591_4: āpucchitabbatāya vuttaṃ. Adinnādāne vuttanayenāti dutiyaleḍḍupātaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1592_0: 515. Antarārāmantiādīsūti ettha ussavadivasādīsu manussehi gāme padakkhiṇaṃ kārentaṃ
tika-vin07t:1592_1: jinabimbādiṃ pūjetukāmehi vā rogavūpasamādiyatthaṃ manussehi yācitehi vā bhikkhūhi
tika-vin07t:1592_2: suppaṭicchannādividhiṃ akatvāpi vīthimajjheneva gāmaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin07t:1592_3: vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ anāpattivāre avuttattā, “maggā anokkamitvā…pe… pācittiya”nti
tika-vin07t:1592_4: paṭikkhittattā ca. Vesāliṃ anupariyāyitvā parittaṃ karontenāpi ānandattherena suppaṭicchannatādiṃ
tika-vin07t:1592_5: akopenteneva, apaññatte vā sikkhāpade katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Keci pana “antarārāmādigāmantare
tika-vin07t:1592_6: ṭhitehi garuṭṭhānīyānaṃ paccuggamanānuggamanādivasena gāmavīthiṃ otarituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin07t:1592_7: vadanti, tampi antaragharaṃ pavisantaṃ pati kātuṃ na vaṭṭati eva. Antarārāmādikappiyabhūmiṃ
tika-vin07t:1592_8: pana uddissa gacchantaṃ pati kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti khāyati, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin07t:1592_9: anāpucchanā, ananuññātakāraṇā vikāle gāmappavesoti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1595: 520. Catutthe pāḷiyaṃ vāsijaṭeti vāsidaṇḍake. Aṭṭhimayādisūcigharatā, karaṇakārāpanādivasena attano paṭilābhoti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1598_0: 521. Pañcame pāḷiyaṃ āsayato, bhikkhave, moghapuriso veditabboti hīnajjhāsayavasena
tika-vin07t:1598_1: ayaṃ tucchapurisoti ñātabbo, hīnāya paccaye lolatāya puggalassa tucchatā ñātabbāti
tika-vin07t:1598_2: adhippāyo. Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade, ito paresu ca pañcasu attanā kārāpitassa paṭilābhe
tika-vin07t:1598_3: eva pācittiyaṃ. Paribhoge panassa, aññesañca dukkaṭameva. Pamāṇātikkantamañcapīṭhatā,
tika-vin07t:1601: 526. Chaṭṭhe poṭakitūlanti tiṇagacchajātikānaṃ tūlaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-vin07t:1604: 531-536. Sattame nisīdanassa pamāṇātikkantatā, attano karaṇādinā paṭilābhoti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1606: 537-547. Iminā nayena aṭṭhamanavamadasamesupi aṅgāni veditabbāni. Sesaṃ sabbattha suviññeyyamevāti.
tika-vin07t:1611_0: 553. Pāṭidesanīyesu paṭhame paṭidesetabbākāradassananti evaṃ āpattiṃ navakassa santike
tika-vin07t:1611_1: desetabbākāradassanaṃ. Iminā lakkhaṇena sambahulānaṃ āpattīnampi vuḍḍhassa santike
tika-vin07t:1611_2: ca desetabbākāro sakkā viññātunti. Tatrāyaṃ nayo – “gārayhe, āvuso, dhamme āpajjiṃ
tika-vin07t:1611_3: asappāye pāṭidesanīye”ti evaṃ sambahulāsu. Vuḍḍhassa pana santike “gārayhaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin07t:1611_4: dhammaṃ…pe… gārayhe, bhante, dhamme”ti yojanā veditabbā. Tattha asappāyanti saggamokkhantarāyakaranti
tika-vin07t:1611_5: attho. Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaraghare ṭhitāya hatthato sahatthā yāvakālikaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1613: 558. Dutiye paripuṇṇūpasampannāya ananuññātākārena vosāsanā, anivāretvā bhojanajjhohāroti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1614: 563. Tatiye sekkhasammatatā, gharūpacāre animantitatā, gilānassa aniccabhattādiṃ gahetvā bhuñjananti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1615: 570. Catutthe sāsaṅkāraññasenāsanatā, ananuññātaṃ yāvakālikaṃ appaṭisaṃviditaṃ ajjhārāme paṭiggahetvā agilānassa ajjhoharaṇanti dve aṅgāni. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
tika-vin07t:1619_0: 576. Sekhiyesu yasmā vattakkhandhake vuttavattānipi sikkhitabbattā sekhiyāneva, tasmā
tika-vin07t:1619_1: pārājikādīsu viyettha pāḷiyaṃ paricchedo na kato. Cārittanayadassanatthañca “yo pana
tika-vin07t:1619_2: bhikkhu olambento nivāseyya, dukkaṭa”nti avatvā “sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti sabbattha pāḷi
tika-vin07t:1619_3: āropitā. Padabhājane pana “āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā sabbattha anādariyakaraṇe
tika-vin07t:1620_0: Aṭṭhaṅgulamattanti matta-saddena tato kiñci adhikaṃ, ūnampi saṅgaṇhāti. Teneva nisinnassa
tika-vin07t:1620_1: caturaṅgulamattampi vuttaṃ. Na hi nisinnassa caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ, ṭhitassa aṭṭhaṅgulamevāti
tika-vin07t:1620_2: sakkā niyametuṃ ūnādhikattasambhavato. Tasmā yathā sāruppaṃ hoti evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgulānusārena
tika-vin07t:1620_3: nivāsanaññeva adhippetanti gahetabbaṃ. Teneva vakkhati “yo pana bhikkhu sukkhajaṅgho
tika-vin07t:1620_4: vā”tiādi. Kurundiyaṃ “ajānantassa anāpattī”ti ādaraṃ katvā uggaṇhantassāpi ajānanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1620_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāpi nirantaraṃ nivāsanapārupanavattaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ, asikkhito
tika-vin07t:1620_6: anādariyameva. Parimaṇḍalaggahaṇena ukkhipitvā nivāsanampi paṭikkhittanti āha “ukkhipitvā vā otāretvā vā”ti.
tika-vin07t:1621_0: Sacittakanti vatthuvijānanacittena sacittakaṃ. Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana upatissattheravādanayena
tika-vin07t:1621_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha ca vatthuvijānanaṃ visuṃ na vattabbaṃ. Paṇṇattivijānanena tassāpi
tika-vin07t:1621_3: antogadhabhāvato idaṃ vatthuṃ evaṃ vītikkamantassa āpattīti vijānanto hi paṇṇattiṃ
tika-vin07t:1621_4: vijānātīti vuccati. Upatissattheravāde cettha paṇṇattiṃ ajānitvā aparimaṇḍalanivāsanādivatthumeva
tika-vin07t:1621_5: jānantassa paṇṇattivītikkamānādariyābhāvā sabbasekhiyesu anāpatti eva abhimatā, tañca
tika-vin07t:1621_6: na yuttaṃ kosambakkhandhake vaccakuṭiyaṃ udakāvasesaṃ ṭhapentassa paṇṇattivijānanābhāvepi
tika-vin07t:1621_7: āpattiyā vuttattā. Vuttañhi tattha “tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu āpattiṃ
tika-vin07t:1621_8: āpanno hoti …pe… so aparena samayena tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi hotī”tiādi. Aṭṭhakathāyañcassa
tika-vin07t:1621_9: “tvaṃ ettha āpattibhāvaṃ na jānāsīti, āma na jānāmīti. Hotu āvuso, ettha āpattīti,
tika-vin07t:1621_10: sace hoti, desessāmīti. Sace pana te, āvuso, asañcicca asatiyā kataṃ, natthi āpattīti.
tika-vin07t:1621_11: So tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosī”ti vuttaṃ, tathā “adhammavādīti ukkhittānuvattakesu
tika-vin07t:1621_12: aññataro”ti ca vuttaṃ. Khandhakavattānañhi sekhiyattā tattha vutto nayo imesaṃ, idha
tika-vin07t:1621_13: vutto ca tesaṃ sādhāraṇova hotīti. Teneva “asañcicca asatiyā kataṃ, natthi āpattī”ti
tika-vin07t:1621_14: evaṃ idha vutto āpattinayo tatthāpi dassito. Tasmā phussadevattheravāde eva ṭhatvā
tika-vin07t:1621_16: dve sikkhāpadāni lokavajjāni akusalacittāni, sesāni paṇṇattivajjāni, ticittāni, tivedanāni
tika-vin07t:1621_17: cāti gahaṇameva yuttataraṃ dissati. Tenevettha “asañciccāti purato vā pacchato vā
tika-vin07t:1621_18: olambetvā nivāsessāmīti evaṃ asañciccā”tiādinā vatthuajānanavaseneva anāpattivaṇṇanā
tika-vin07t:1622_0: Apica “yassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, taṃ lokavajja”nti iminā lakkhaṇavacanenāpi
tika-vin07t:1622_1: cetaṃ sijjhati. Vatthuvijānanacittavaseneva hettha “sacittakapakkhe”ti vuttaṃ. Itarathā
tika-vin07t:1622_3: lokavajjattappasaṅgato paṇṇattivajjameva na siyā, idañca vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā
tika-vin07t:1622_4: iminā vacanena nivattetabbassa sikkhāpadassa abhāvā. Na ca sekhiyesu vatthuvijānanacittena
tika-vin07t:1622_5: sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ pāṇātipātādīsu viya akusalamevāti niyamo atthi, yenettha lokavajjatā
tika-vin07t:1622_6: pasajjeyya, “anādariyaṃ paṭiccā”ti cetaṃ pāḷivacanaṃ vatthuṃ jānitvā tīhi cittehi
tika-vin07t:1622_7: vītikkamameva anādariyaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, na paṇṇattiṃ jānitvā akusalacitteneva vītikkamanti
tika-vin07t:1622_8: gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā khandhakapāḷiyā, aṭṭhakathāyañca pubbāparañca virujjhanatoti
tika-vin07t:1622_9: amhākaṃ khanti. Yathā vā na virujjhati, tathā ettha adhippāyo gavesitabbo. Anādariyaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1622_10: anāpattikāraṇābhāvo, aparimaṇḍalanivāsananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Yathā cettha,
tika-vin07t:1622_11: evaṃ sabbattha. Kevalaṃ tattha tattha vuttapaṭipakkhakaraṇavasena tatiyaṅgayojanameva viseso.
tika-vin07t:1623: 577. Dutiyādīsu gihipārutanti setapaṭapārutādi. Vihārepīti saṅghasannipātabuddhupaṭṭhānādikālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1624_1: vuttattā sañcicca gīvaṃ, maṇibandhanañca appaṭicchādentassa āpatti. Etthāpi parimaṇḍalasikkhāpadassa
tika-vin07t:1624_2: sādhāraṇattā jāṇumaṇḍalato heṭṭhā caturaṅgulamattaṃ otāretvā anolambetvā parimaṇḍalameva pārupitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1625_0: 579. Vivaritvā nisīdatoti vihāre viya ekaṃsapārupanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Vāsatthāya
tika-vin07t:1625_1: upagatassā”ti vuttattā vāsādhippāyaṃ vinā dhammadesanaparittabhaṇanādiatthāya sucirampi
tika-vin07t:1625_2: nisīdantena sabbaṃ antaragharavattaṃ pūrenteneva nisīditabbaṃ. Nisīdanapaṭisaṃyuttesu
tika-vin07t:1625_3: eva ca sikkhāpadesu “vāsūpagatassā”ti anāpattiyā vuttattā vāsatthāya antaragharaṃ
tika-vin07t:1625_5: hi vuttaṃ, na pana upagacchamānassāti. Keci pana “ekekasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ gantvā vāsapariggahe
tika-vin07t:1625_6: kate tato aññehi yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Apare pana “gehassāmikehi
tika-vin07t:1625_7: ‘yāva tumhe nivasissatha, tāva tumhākaṃ imaṃ gehaṃ demī’ti dinne aññehi avāsādhippāyehi
tika-vin07t:1625_8: antarārāme viya yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ, nisīdituñca vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ sabbaṃ na
tika-vin07t:1625_10: ca. “Yāva nisīdissatha, tāva tumhākaṃ imaṃ gehaṃ demī”ti dentopi hi tāvakālikameva
tika-vin07t:1627_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ piṇḍāya carato pattaggahaṇādimattassa anuññātattā. Teneva “nisinnakāle
tika-vin07t:1627_2: pana dhamakaraṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Nisinnakāle hi khandhe laggapattatthavikādito dhamakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1627_3: nīharantassa kaṭito uddhampi dissati, tathā adassetvā nīharitabbanti adhippāyo. Āsane
tika-vin07t:1627_4: nisīdantassāpi ca pārupitacīvaraṃ kiñci ukkhipitvā saṅghāṭiṃ jaṅghapiṇḍehi anukkhipitvāva
tika-vin07t:1627_5: nisīditabbaṃ. Imasmiññeva pana sikkhāpade “vāsūpagatassā”ti vuttattā nisīdanapaṭisaṃyuttesu
tika-vin07t:1627_6: chaṭṭhaaṭṭhamesu avuttattā vāsūpagatenāpi susaṃvutena okkhittacakkhunāva nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1627_7: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi tesaṃ visesaṃ avatvā idheva “vāsūpagatassa pana anāpattī”ti vuttā.
tika-vin07t:1630_1: na vuttā, kāyappacālakādīsu eva pana vuttā. Pāḷipotthakesu panetaṃ kesuci peyyālena
tika-vin07t:1630_2: byāmohitattā na suṭṭhu viññāyati. Yattha ca antaraghare dhammaṃ vā desentassa, pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin07t:1630_3: vā uddisantassa mahāsaddena yāvaparisasāvanepi anāpatti evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ tathā ānandattheramahindattherādīhi ācaritattā.
tika-vin07t:1633: 603. Patte gahaṇasaññā assa atthīti pattasaññīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “patte saññaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1634: 604. Oloṇīti ekā byañjanavikati. Kañjikatakkādirasoti keci. Maṃsarasādīnīti ādi-saddena avasesā sabbāpi byañjanavikati saṅgahitā.
tika-vin07t:1635_0: 605. Samabharitanti racitaṃ. Heṭṭhā orohatīti samantā okāsasambhavato hatthena samaṃ
tika-vin07t:1635_1: kariyamānaṃ heṭṭhā bhassati. Pattamatthake ṭhapitāni pūvāni eva vaṭaṃsakākārena ṭhapitattā
tika-vin07t:1635_2: “pūvavaṭaṃsaka”nti vuttāni. Keci pana “pattaṃ gahetvā thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ racitvā
tika-vin07t:1635_3: diyyamānameva gaṇhato āpatti, hatthagate eva pana patte diyyamāne thūpīkatampi gahetuṃ
tika-vin07t:1635_4: vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbameva “samatittika”nti bhāvanapuṃsakavasena sāmaññato vuttattā.
tika-vin07t:1638_0: 608. Catutthavaggādīsu sapadānanti ettha dānaṃ vuccati avakhaṇḍanaṃ, apetaṃ dānato
tika-vin07t:1638_1: apadānaṃ, saha apadānena sapadānaṃ, avakhaṇḍanavirahitaṃ anupaṭipāṭiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin07t:1639_1: iminā pāḷiyāva sabbaṃ viññāyatīti dasseti. Tattha pāḷiyaṃ asañciccātiādīsu vatthumattaṃ
tika-vin07t:1639_2: ñatvā bhuñjanena āpattiṃ āpajjantasseva puna paṇṇattiṃ ñatvā mukhagataṃ chaḍḍetukāmassa
tika-vin07t:1639_3: yaṃ aruciyā paviṭṭhaṃ, taṃ asañcicca paviṭṭhaṃ nāma, tattha anāpatti. Tadeva puna
tika-vin07t:1639_4: aññavihitatāya vā aviññattamidantisaññāya vā bhuñjane “asatiyā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1640_0: 613. “Aññassatthāyā”ti idamassa sikkhāpadassa attano atthāya viññāpetvā sayaṃ bhuñjane
tika-vin07t:1640_1: eva paññattattā iminā sikkhāpadena anāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pañcasahadhammikānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1640_2: pana atthāya aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhāne viññāpento viññattikkhaṇe aṭṭhakathāsu suttānulomato
tika-vin07t:1640_3: vuttaakataviññattidukkaṭato na muccati. Sañcicca bhuñjanakkhaṇe sayañca aññe ca micchājīvato
tika-vin07t:1641_0: 615. “Kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ atikhuddaka”nti idaṃ asāruppavasena vuttaṃ, atimahante eva āpattīti
tika-vin07t:1641_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhuñjantena pana corādibhayaṃ paṭicca mahantampi aparimaṇḍalampi katvā
tika-vin07t:1641_2: sīghaṃ bhuñjanavasenettha āpadā. Evamaññesupi yathānurūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1644: 617. Anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāravivaraṇe pana payojanābhāvā “āpadāsū”ti na vuttaṃ. Evamaññesupi īdisesu.
tika-vin07t:1645: 618. Sabbaṃ hatthanti hatthekadesā aṅguliyo vuttā “hatthamuddā”tiādīsu viya, tasmā ekaṅgulimpi mukhe pakkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1648: 627. Pāḷiyaṃ sītīkatoti sītapīḷito. Silakabuddhoti parihāsavacanametaṃ. Silakañhi kiñci disvā “buddho aya”nti voharanti.
tika-vin07t:1649_0: 628. “Aṅguliyo mukhe pavesetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā sabbaṃ hatthaṃ antomukhe
tika-vin07t:1649_2: dasseti. Eseva nayoti ghanayāguādīsu pattaṃ hatthena, oṭṭhañca jivhāya nillehituṃ
tika-vin07t:1649_3: vaṭṭatīti atidisati. Tasmāti yasmā ghanayāguādivirahitaṃ nillehituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1650_0: 634. Vilīvacchattanti veṇupesikāhi kataṃ. Maṇḍalabaddhānīti dīghasalākāsu tiriyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1650_1: valayākārena salākaṃ ṭhapetvā suttehi baddhāni dīghañca tiriyañca ujukameva salākāyo
tika-vin07t:1650_2: ṭhapetvā daḷhabaddhāni ceva tiriyaṃ ṭhapetvā dīghadaṇḍakeheva saṅkocārahaṃ katvā
tika-vin07t:1650_3: sutteheva tiriyaṃ baddhāni. Tatthajātakadaṇḍakena katanti saha daṇḍakena chinnatālapaṇṇādīhi
tika-vin07t:1650_4: kataṃ. Chattapādukāyāti yasmiṃ chattadaṇḍakoṭiṃ pavesetvā chattaṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin07t:1650_5: heṭṭhā chāyāya nisīdanti, tiṭṭhanti vā, tādise chattādhāre.
tika-vin07t:1651: 637. Cāpoti majjhe vaṅkakājadaṇḍasadisā dhanuvikati. Kodaṇḍoti viddhadaṇḍā dhanuvikati.
tika-vin07t:1654_0: 647. Sattamavagge rukkhato patitoti ekaṃ olambanasākhaṃ gahetvā patito. Pāḷiyāti
tika-vin07t:1654_1: attano ācārappakāsakaganthassa. Dhīratthūti dhī atthu, nindā hotūti attho. Vinipātanahetunāti
tika-vin07t:1654_2: vinipātanassa hetubhāvena. Tvanti upayogatthe paccattavacanaṃ, taṃ icceva vā pāṭho. Asmāti pāsāṇo.
tika-vin07t:1655: 649. Na kathetabbanti therena attano kaṅkhāṭṭhānassa pucchitattā vuttaṃ. Daharassa atthakosallaṃ ñātuṃ pucchitena uccāsane nisinnassa ācariyassa anuyogadānanayena vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1656: 652. Kheḷena cettha siṅghāṇikāpi saṅgahitāti ettha udakagaṇḍusakaṃ katvā ucchukacavarādiñca mukheneva harituṃ udakesu chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
tika-vin07t:1666_0: 656. Bhikkhunīvibhaṅge migāramātuyāti migāramātu, visākhāyāti attho. Pāḷiyaṃ “ehi
tika-vin07t:1666_1: bhikkhunīti bhikkhunī, tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannāti bhikkhunī”ti idaṃ bhikkhuvibhaṅgapāḷiyā
tika-vin07t:1666_3: tāya saha nikkhantā bhagavato āṇāya bhikkhūnaññeva santike ekatoupasampannā pañcasatasākiyāniyo
tika-vin07t:1666_4: ca sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tā hi bhagavatā ānandattherassa yācanāya pabbajjaṃ anujānantena
tika-vin07t:1666_5: “etha bhikkhuniyo, mama sāsane tumhepi pavisathā”ti vuttā viya jātā. Sākiyāniyo eva
tika-vin07t:1666_6: saraṇasīlāni datvā kammavācāya upasampāditattā “tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannā”ti
tika-vin07t:1666_7: vuttā. Na hi etāhi aññā ehibhikkhunibhāvādinā upasampannā nāma santi. Yaṃ pana therīgāthāsu
tika-vin07t:1668: ‘Ehi bhadde’ti maṃ avoca, sā me āsūpasampadā”ti. –
tika-vin07t:1672_0: Vuttaṃ. Tampi “ehi tvaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbajjaṃ, upasampadañca gaṇhāhī”ti
tika-vin07t:1672_1: bhagavato āṇā upasampadāya kāraṇattā upasampadā ahosīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1672_2: Tathā hi vuttaṃ therīgāthāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ehi bhadde, bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1672_3: santike pabbajja upasampajjassūti maṃ avaca āṇāpesi, sā satthu āṇā mayhaṃ upasampadāya
tika-vin07t:1673_0: 657. Sādhāraṇapārājikehīti methunādīhi catūhi. Tāni, pana aññāni ca sādhāraṇasikkhāpadāni
tika-vin07t:1673_1: yasmā bhikkhuvibhaṅge vuttanidānavatthādīsu eva sādhāraṇavasena paññattāni, pacchā
tika-vin07t:1673_2: pana tāni bhikkhunīnaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujānantena bhagavatā tāsaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānābhāvena
tika-vin07t:1673_3: “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”tiādinā tadanurūpavasena
tika-vin07t:1673_5: ekato saṅgahitāni. Yasmā ca nesaṃ bhikkhuvibhaṅge vuttanayeneva sabbopi vinicchayo
tika-vin07t:1673_6: sakkā ñātuṃ, tasmā tāni vajjetvā asādhāraṇānaṃ eva idha vibhaṅgo vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1674_1: āpattiyā na kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Tabbahulanayenāti kiriyāsamuṭṭhānasseva bahulabhāvato,
tika-vin07t:1674_2: etena akiriyāsamuṭṭhānāpi ayaṃ āpatti hotīti dasseti. Kiñcāpi dasseti, mayaṃ panettha
tika-vin07t:1674_3: evaṃ takkayāma “kāyasaṃsaggakkhaṇe sādiyantiyā kiriyāya abhāvepi tato pubbe pavattitānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1674_5: parehi magge kariyamānupakkamena niccalassa sādiyato sukkavissaṭṭhi viya pubbapayogābhāvepi
tika-vin07t:1674_6: vā tasmiññeva khaṇe parūpakkamena janiyamānāya attano kāyacalanādisaṅkhātāya kiriyāya,
tika-vin07t:1674_7: sā hi sādiyamānena tassā cittenāpi samuṭṭhitā kiriyā nāma hoti avāyamitvā parūpakkamena
tika-vin07t:1674_8: methunasādiyane viya, bhikkhūnaṃ pana parūpakkamajanitaṃ kiriyaṃ abbohārikaṃ katvā
tika-vin07t:1674_9: attanā kariyamānapayogavaseneva ‘kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyā’ti evaṃ visesetvāva sikkhāpadassa
tika-vin07t:1674_10: paññattattā sādiyamānepi na doso. Itarathā hi tabbahulanayenettha kiriyatte gayhamāne
tika-vin07t:1674_11: aññesampi kiriyākiriyasikkhāpadānaṃ kiriyattaggahaṇappasaṅgo siyā”ti. Tasmā vīmaṃsitvā
tika-vin07t:1674_12: gahetabbaṃ. Sāti kiriyāsamuṭṭhānatā. Tathevāti kāyasaṃsaggarāgī eva.
tika-vin07t:1677_0: 666. Dutiye purimenātiādi sundarīnandāya vajjapaṭicchādane paññattataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1677_2: “Dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte”ti vuttattā paṇṇattiṃ ajānantiyāpi “idaṃ vajjaṃ na pakāsessāmī”ti
tika-vin07t:1677_3: chandena dhuraṃ nikkhepakkhaṇe pārājikanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃ pana paṭicchādanaṃ yasmā
tika-vin07t:1677_4: “pesalā ñatvā garahissantī”ti bhayeneva hoti, bhayañca kodhacittasampayuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin07t:1677_5: idaṃ “dukkhavedana”nti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “kiñcāpi vajjapaṭicchādanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1677_6: pemavasena hoti, tathāpi sikkhāpadavītikkamacittaṃ domanassitameva hotī”ti evaṃ paṇṇattivītikkamacitteneva
tika-vin07t:1677_7: chādanaṃ domanassatte kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ akāraṇaṃ paṇṇattivijānanaṃ vināpi āpajjitabbatova.
tika-vin07t:1681: 675. Catutthe lokassādasaṅkhātaṃ mittehi aññamaññaṃ kātabbaṃ santhavaṃ. Vuttamevatthaṃ pariyāyantarena dassetuṃ “kāyasaṃsaggarāgenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1682_0: Tissitthiyo methunaṃ taṃ na seveti yā tisso itthiyo, tāsu vuttaṃ taṃ methunaṃ na
tika-vin07t:1682_1: seveyya. Anariyapaṇḍaketi tayo anariye, tayo paṇḍake ca upasaṅkamitvā methunaṃ na
tika-vin07t:1682_2: seveti attho. Anariyāti cettha ubhatobyañjanakā adhippetā. Byañjanasminti attano
tika-vin07t:1683_0: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇoti dvīhi sukkavissaṭṭhi vuttā. Gamanuppādananti sañcarittaṃ. “Methunadhammassa
tika-vin07t:1683_1: pubbabhāgattā paccayo hotī”ti iminā kāriyopacārena kāyasaṃsaggo methunadhammoti vuttoti
tika-vin07t:1688: 679. Saṅghādisesakaṇḍe “dutiyassa ārocetī”ti etthāpi dvīsupi aḍḍakārakesu yassa kassaci dutiyassa kathaṃ yo koci ārocetīti evamattho gahetabboti āha “eseva nayo”ti.
tika-vin07t:1689: Gatigatanti cirakālappavattaṃ. Āpattīti āpajjanaṃ. “Nissāraṇīya”nti idaṃ kattuatthe siddhanti āha “nissāretī”ti. Āpannaṃ bhikkhuniṃ saṅghato viyojeti, viyojanahetu hotīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1690_0: Gīvāyevāti āṇattiyā abhāvato. Tesaṃ anatthakāmatāyāti “coro”ti vuttaṃ mama vacanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1690_1: sutvā keci daṇḍissanti jīvitā voropessantīti evaṃ saññāya. Etena kevalaṃ bhayena
tika-vin07t:1690_2: vā parikkhāraggahaṇatthaṃ vā sahasā “coro”ti vutte daṇḍitepi na dosoti dasseti. Rājapurisānañhi
tika-vin07t:1690_3: “coro aya”nti uddissa kathane eva gīvā, bhikkhūnaṃ, pana ārāmikādīnaṃ vā sammukhā
tika-vin07t:1690_4: “asuko coro evamakāsī”ti kenaci vuttavacanaṃ nissāya ārāmikādīsu rājapurisānaṃ vatvā
tika-vin07t:1690_5: daṇḍāpentesupi bhikkhussa na gīvā rājapurisānaṃ avuttattā. Yesañca vuttaṃ, tehi sayaṃ
tika-vin07t:1690_6: corassa adaṇḍitattāti gahetabbaṃ. “Tvaṃ etassa santakaṃ acchindā”ti āṇattopi hi sace
tika-vin07t:1690_7: aññena acchindāpeti, āṇāpakassa anāpatti visaṅketattā. “Attano vacanakara”nti idaṃ
tika-vin07t:1690_8: sāmīcivasena vuttaṃ. Vacanaṃ akarontānaṃ rājapurisānampi “iminā gahitaparikkhāraṃ
tika-vin07t:1690_9: āharāpehi, mā cassa daṇḍaṃ karohī”ti uddissa vadantassāpi daṇḍe gahitepi na gīvā
tika-vin07t:1690_10: eva daṇḍaggahaṇassa paṭikkhittattā, “asukabhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti āṇāpetvā vippaṭisāre
tika-vin07t:1691_0: Dāsādīnaṃ sampaṭicchane viya tadatthāya aḍḍakaraṇe bhikkhūnampi dukkaṭanti āha “akappiyaaḍḍo
tika-vin07t:1691_1: nāma na vaṭṭatī”ti. Kenaci pana bhikkhunā khettādiatthāya vohārikānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā
tika-vin07t:1691_2: aḍḍe katepi taṃ khettādisampaṭicchane viya sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ na hoti pubbe eva saṅghassa
tika-vin07t:1691_3: santakattā, bhikkhusseva pana payogavasena āpattiyo honti. Dāsādīnampi pana atthāya
tika-vin07t:1691_4: rakkhaṃ yācituṃ vohārikena puṭṭhena saṅghassa uppannaṃ kappiyakkamaṃ vattuṃ, ārāmikādīhi
tika-vin07t:1691_5: ca aḍḍaṃ kārāpetuñca vaṭṭati eva. Vihāravatthādikappiyaaḍḍaṃ pana bhikkhuno sayampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1692_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ vuttoti rakkhaṃ yācantīnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vutto uddissaanuddissavasena
tika-vin07t:1692_1: rakkhāyācanavinicchayo, na sabbo sikkhāpadavinicchayo asādhāraṇattā sikkhāpadassa.
tika-vin07t:1692_2: Tenāha “bhikkhunopī”tiādi. Anākaḍḍhitāya aḍḍakaraṇaṃ, aḍḍapariyosānanti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1695_0: 683. Pāḷiyaṃ dutiye mallagaṇabhaṭiputtagaṇādikantiādīsu mallarājūnaṃ gaṇo mallagaṇo.
tika-vin07t:1695_1: Bhaṭiputtā nāma keci gaṇarājāno, tesaṃ gaṇo. Keci pana “nārāyanabhattiko puññakāragaṇo
tika-vin07t:1695_2: mallagaṇo. Tathā kumārabhattiko ca gaṇo bhaṭiputtagaṇo”tipi vadanti. Dhammagaṇoti
tika-vin07t:1695_3: sāsane, loke vā anekappakārapuññakārako gaṇo. Gandhavikatikārako gaṇo gandhikaseṇī.
tika-vin07t:1695_4: Pesakārādigaṇo dussikaseṇī. Kappagatikanti kappiyabhāvagataṃ, pabbajitapubbanti attho.
tika-vin07t:1696_0: 685. Pāḷiyaṃ vuṭṭhāpetīti upasampādeti. Akappagatampi pabbājentiyā dukkaṭanti vadanti.
tika-vin07t:1696_1: Khīṇāsavāyapi āpajjitabbato “ticitta”nti vuttaṃ. Coritā, taṃ ñatvā ananuññātakāraṇā
tika-vin07t:1699_0: 692. Tatiye parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyāti gāmantarassa parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā. “Gāmantaraṃ
tika-vin07t:1699_1: gaccheyyā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Vikālagāmappavesanasikkhāpade viya “aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ
tika-vin07t:1699_2: okkamantiyā”ti avatvā “atikkāmentiyā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā gāmaṃ pavisantiyā gharūpacāre
tika-vin07t:1699_3: ṭhitassa dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhātassa upacārassa atikkamo nāma paṭhamaleḍḍupātaṭṭhānasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin07t:1699_4: parikkhepārahaṭṭhānassa atikkamo evāti āha “parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ ekena pādena atikkamatī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1700: Majjheti gāmamajjhe. Pacchāti aparakāle. “Catugāmasādhāraṇattā”ti iminā vihārato catūsu gāmesu yattha katthaci pavisituṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha kāraṇamāha.
tika-vin07t:1701: Paratīrameva akkamantiyāti nadiṃ anotaritvā orimatīrato laṅghitvā vā ākāsādinā vā paratīrameva atikkāmentiyā. Orimatīrameva āgacchati, āpattīti pāragamanāya otiṇṇattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1702_0: Tādise araññeti indakhīlato bahibhāvalakkhaṇe araññe. “Tenevā”tiādinā dassanūpacāre
tika-vin07t:1702_1: virahite savanūpacārassa vijjamānattepi āpatti hotīti dasseti. Aññaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhātīti
tika-vin07t:1702_2: maggamūḷhattā gaṇhāti, na dutiyikaṃ ohiyituṃ. Tasmā anāpatti. Anantarāyena ekabhāvo,
tika-vin07t:1705: 694. Catutthe kārakagaṇassāti imassa kammaṃ kātabbanti yehi sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ, te sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kammavācakkhaṇe sahaṭhiteti keci. Netthāravatteti nittharaṇahetumhi vatte.
tika-vin07t:1706_0: 698. Pāḷiyaṃ asante kārakasaṅgheti ettha vijjamānaṃ sudūrampi gantvā āpucchitabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1706_1: Antarāye pana sati sammā vattantaṃ osāretuṃ vaṭṭatīti. Dhammakammena ukkhittatā,
tika-vin07t:1709_0: 701. Pañcame tanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ avacanaṃ “anavassutoti jānantī paṭiggaṇhātī”tiādi
tika-vin07t:1709_1: pāḷiyā sameti. Ubhato avassutabhāvo, udakadantaponato aññaṃ sahatthā gahetvā ajjhoharaṇanti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1712_0: 705. Chaṭṭhe paṭiggaho tena na vijjatīti teneva “na detī”ti vuttakāraṇena uyyojitāya
tika-vin07t:1712_1: hatthato itarāya paṭiggahopi natthi. Paribhogapaccayāti uyyojitāya bhojanapariyosānapaccayāti
tika-vin07t:1712_2: attho. Manussapurisassa avassutatā, taṃ ñatvā ananuññātakāraṇā uyyojanā, tena itarissā
tika-vin07t:1719_0: 740. Dutiye ayyāya dammīti evaṃ paṭiladdhanti nissaṭṭhapaṭiladdhaṃ, nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvāpi
tika-vin07t:1719_1: yaṃ uddissa dāyakehi dinnaṃ, tattheva dātabbaṃ. Tenāha “yathādāneyeva upanetabba”nti.
tika-vin07t:1719_2: Akālacīvaratā, taṃ ñatvā kālacīvaranti lesena bhājāpanaṃ, paṭilābhoti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1720: 743. Tatiye metanti mamevetaṃ cīvaraṃ. Upasampannatā, parivattitavikappanupagacīvarassa sakasaññāya acchindanādīti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1721: 748-752. Catutthe āhaṭasappiṃ datvāti attano datvā. Yamakaṃ pacitabbanti sappiñca telañca ekato pacitabbaṃ. Lesena gahetukāmatā, aññassa viññatti, paṭilābhoti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1722_0: 753. Pañcame sāti thullanandā. Ayanti sikkhamānā. Cetāpetvāti jānāpetvāti idha vuttaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1722_1: mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “attano kappiyabhaṇḍena ‘idaṃ nāma āharā’ti aññaṃ parivattāpetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1730: 797. Pācittiyesu lasuṇavaggassa paṭhame badarasāḷavaṃ nāma badaraphalāni sukkhāpetvā tehi kattabbabyañjanavikati. Āmakamāgadhalasuṇañceva, ajjhoharaṇañcāti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1733: 817. Dadhimatthūti dadhimhi pasannodakaṃ. Rasakhīrādīnanti maṃsarasakhīrādīnaṃ. Bhuñjantassa bhikkhuno hatthapāse ṭhānaṃ, pānīyassa vā vidhūpanassa vā gahaṇanti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1734_0: 822. Sattame aviññattiyā laddhanti attano viññattiṃ vinā laddhaṃ. Pubbāparaviruddhanti
tika-vin07t:1734_1: sayaṃ karaṇe pācittiyanti idaṃ kārāpane dukkaṭavacanena virujjhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1734_2: Tenāha “na hī”tiādi, “aviññattiyā laddha”ntiādivacanena vā virujjhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1734_3: Aññāya viññattipi hi imissā aviññattiyā laddhamevāti. Āmakadhaññaviññāpanādi, taṃ
tika-vin07t:1735_0: 824. Aṭṭhame nibbiṭṭhoti laddho. Keṇīti rañño dātabbo āyo, āyuppattiṭṭhānanti attho.
tika-vin07t:1735_1: Tenāha “ekaṃ ṭhānantara”ntiādi. Ṭhānantaranti ca gāmajanapadāṇāyattaṃ. Vaḷañjiyamānatirokuṭṭāditā,
tika-vin07t:1736_1: Tenāha “anikkhittabījesū”tiādi. Yattha ca chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati, tattha harite vaccādiṃ
tika-vin07t:1737_0: 836-7. Dasame tesaṃyevāti yesaṃ niccaṃ passati. Ārāme ṭhatvāti ṭhitanisannaṭṭhāne
tika-vin07t:1737_1: eva ṭhatvā samantato gīvaṃ parivattetvāpi passati, anāpatti. Ṭhitaṭṭhānato gantvā
tika-vin07t:1737_2: passituṃ na vaṭṭati. Keci pana “vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Taṃ pana “dassanāya gaccheyya,
tika-vin07t:1737_3: pācittiya”nti sāmaññato gamanassa paṭikkhittattā, anāpattiyampi gamanāya avuttattā
tika-vin07t:1737_4: ca na gahetabbaṃ. Naccāditā, ananuññātakāraṇā gamanaṃ, dassanādi cāti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1741: 841. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame dāne vāti dānanimittaṃ. Rattandhakāre purisassa hatthapāse ṭhānādi, rahopekkhā, sahāyābhāvoti tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1743_0: 854. Pañcame pallaṅkassa anokāseti ūrubaddhāsanassa appahonake. Purebhattaṃ antaraghare
tika-vin07t:1743_1: pallaṅkappahonakāsane nisajjā, ananuññātakāraṇā anāpucchā vuttaparicchedātikkamoti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1749_0: 893. Tatiye visibbetvāti vijaṭetvā. Dhuraṃ nikkhittamatteti visibbanadivasato pañca
tika-vin07t:1749_1: divase atikkāmetvā dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte. Antopañcāhe pana dhuranikkhepepi anāpatti
tika-vin07t:1749_2: eva “aññatra catūhapañcāhā”ti vuttattā. Upasampannāya cīvaraṃ sibbanatthāya visibbetvā
tika-vin07t:1750: 900. Catutthe pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ aparivattanaṃ, ananuññātakāraṇā pañcāhātikkamoti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1752: 909. Chaṭṭhe vikappanupagassa saṅghe pariṇatatā, vinā ānisaṃsadassanena antarāyakaraṇanti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1754_0: 916. Aṭṭhame kumbhathūṇaṃ nāma kumbhasaddo, tena kīḷantīti kumbhathūṇikā. Tenāha
tika-vin07t:1754_2: Tañhi rukkhasārādimayaṃ antochiddaṃ catūsu passesu cammonaddhaṃ vāditabhaṇḍaṃ, yaṃ
tika-vin07t:1754_3: “bimbisaka”ntipi vuccati, taṃ vādentāpi kumbhathūṇikā. Tenāha “bimbisakavāditakātipi vadantī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1755: 918. Pāḷiyaṃ kappakatanti kappakataṃ nivāsanapārupanūpagaṃ. Samaṇacīvaratā, ananuññātānaṃ dānanti dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin07t:1760: 976. Tuvaṭṭavaggassa dasame cārikāya apakkamanaṃ paṇṇattivajjameva. Paṇṇattivijānanacittena sacittakataṃ sandhāya panettha “lokavajja”nti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
tika-vin07t:1764: 978. Cittāgāravaggassa paṭhame pāṭekkā āpattiyoti gīvāya parivattanappayogagaṇanāya.
tika-vin07t:1765_0: 1015. Navame hatthiādīsu sippa-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo, tathā āthabbaṇādīsu manta-saddo.
tika-vin07t:1765_1: Tattha āthabbaṇamanto nāma āthabbaṇavedavihito parūpaghātakaro manto. Khīlanamanto
tika-vin07t:1765_2: nāma verimāraṇatthāya sāradārumayaṃ khīlaṃ mantetvā pathaviyaṃ ākoṭanamanto. Agadappayogo
tika-vin07t:1765_3: visappayojanaṃ. Nāgamaṇḍalanti sappānaṃ pavesanivāraṇatthaṃ maṇḍalabandhamanto. Sesaṃ
tika-vin07t:1770_0: 1119. Aṭṭhamavaggassa paṭhame sabbapaṭhamā dve mahāsikkhamānāti gabbhinivagge sabbapaṭhamaṃ
tika-vin07t:1770_1: vuttā dve. Sikkhamānā icceva vattabbāti sammutikammādīsu aññathā vutte kammaṃ kuppatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:1771: 1167. Ekādasame pārivāsiyena chandadānenāti parivutthena navikappavutthena vigatena chandadānenāti attho, chandavissajjanamattena vā.
tika-vin07t:1772_0: 1168. “Vuṭṭhitāyā”ti etena “idāni kammaṃ na karissāmā”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā kāyena
tika-vin07t:1772_1: avuṭṭhahitvā nisinnāyapi parisāya kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Tenāha “chandaṃ
tika-vin07t:1772_2: avissajjetvā avuṭṭhitāyā”ti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “anāpatti avuṭṭhitāya parisāyā”ti sāmaññato
tika-vin07t:1772_3: vuttattā, uposathakkhandhake ca “na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikapārisuddhidānena uposatho
tika-vin07t:1772_4: kātabbo aññatra avuṭṭhitāya parisāyā”ti vuttattā, tadaṭṭhakathāyampi “pārivāsiyapārisuddhidānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1772_5: nāma parisāya vuṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya na vaṭṭati, avuṭṭhitāya pana vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin07t:1772_6: ca “kammaṃ na karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā nisinnāyapi kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin07t:1779_1: yasmā vidū vadantīti attho. Yathā niṭṭhitāti sambandho. Sabbāsavapahanti sabbāsavavighātakaṃ
tika-vin07t:1779_2: arahattamaggaṃ. Passantu nibbutinti maggañāṇena nibbānaṃ sacchikarontu, pappontūti
tika-vin07t:1779_3: vā pāṭho. Tattha nibbutinti khandhaparinibbānaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1787_0: Mahāvagge ubhinnaṃ pātimokkhānanti ubhinnaṃ pātimokkhavibhaṅgānaṃ. Yaṃ khandhakaṃ
tika-vin07t:1787_1: saṅgāyiṃsūti sambandho. Khandhānaṃ samūho, khandhānaṃ vā pakāsanato khandhako. Khandhāti
tika-vin07t:1787_3: yesaṃ padānaṃ atthā yehi aṭṭhakathānayehi pakāsitāti yojanā. Atha vā ye atthāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1788_1: parivitakko udapādi, tena samayenā”tiādinā vuttakāraṇaṃ viya visesakāraṇaṃ bhummavacananivattanakakāraṇanti
tika-vin07t:1788_2: attho. Etassāti abhisambodhito paṭṭhāya satthu cariyāvibhāvanassa vinayapaññattiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1788_3: kiṃ payojanaṃ? Yadi visesakāraṇaṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Nidānadassanaṃ payojananti
tika-vin07t:1789_0: Uruvelāyanti ettha uru-saddo mahantavācī. Velā-saddo tīrapariyāyo. Unnatattādinā
tika-vin07t:1789_1: velā viya velā. Uru mahantī velā uruvelā, tassaṃ. Tenāha “mahāvelāya”ntiādi. Mariyādāti
tika-vin07t:1790_1: Paṭhamanti ca bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso. Tasmā abhisambuddho hutvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ bodhirukkhamūle
tika-vin07t:1791_0: Pāḷiyaṃ atha khoti ettha athāti etasmiṃ samayeti attho anekatthattā nipātānaṃ. Sattāhanti
tika-vin07t:1791_1: accantasaṃyoge etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Atha khoti adhikārantaradassane nipāto. Tena
tika-vin07t:1791_3: Paṭiccāti paṭimukhaṃ gantvā, aññamaññaṃ apekkhitvāti attho. Etena kāraṇabahutā dassitā.
tika-vin07t:1791_4: Sahiteti kāriyabahutā. Anulomanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso. Svevāti so eva paccayākāro.
tika-vin07t:1791_5: Purimanayena vā vuttoti “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena vutto paccayākāro.
tika-vin07t:1792_1: saṅkhārā. Lokiyavipākameva viññāṇaṃ. Lokiyavedanādikkhandhattayaṃ nāmaṃ, bhūtupādāyabhedaṃ
tika-vin07t:1792_2: rūpaṃ. Pasādaviññāṇabhedaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ. Vipākabhūto sabbo phasso, vedanā ca. Rāgo
tika-vin07t:1792_3: taṇhā. Balavarāgo, tividhā ca diṭṭhi upādānaṃ. Bhavo pana duvidho kammabhavo, upapattibhavo
tika-vin07t:1792_4: ca. Tattha kammabhavo sāsavakusalākusalacetanāva, upapattibhavo upādinnakakkhandhā.
tika-vin07t:1792_5: Tesaṃ upapatti jāti. Pāko jarā. Bhedo maraṇaṃ. Te eva nissāya socanaṃ soko. Kandanaṃ
tika-vin07t:1792_6: paridevo. Dukkhaṃ kāyikaṃ. Domanassaṃ cetasikaṃ. Ativiya soko upāyāso.
tika-vin07t:1793: Paccekañca sambhavati-saddo yojetabbo. Tenāha “iminā nayenā”tiādi. “Dukkharāsissā”ti iminā na sattassa. Nāpi subhasukhādīnanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1794_0: Haveti byattanti imasmiṃ atthe nipāto. “Anulomapaccayākārapaṭivedhasādhakā bodhipakkhiyadhammā”ti
tika-vin07t:1794_2: āgato, tathāpi “yato pajānāti sahetudhamma”nti anulomapaccayākārapaṭivedhasseva kāraṇattena
tika-vin07t:1794_3: vuttanti. Yathā cettha, evaṃ dutiyavārepi “yato khayaṃ paccayānaṃ avedī”ti gāthāya
tika-vin07t:1794_4: vuttattā “paccayānaṃ khayasaṅkhāta”ntiādi vuttanti veditabbaṃ. No kallo pañhoti ayutto
tika-vin07t:1794_5: na byākātabbo, avijjamānaṃ attānaṃ siddhaṃ katvā “ko phusatī”ti tassa kiriyāya puṭṭhattā
tika-vin07t:1794_6: “ko vañjhāputto phusatī”tiādi viyāti adhippāyo. Soḷasa kaṅkhāti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhānaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1794_7: nanu kho ahosiṃ, kiṃ nu kho ahosiṃ, kathaṃ nu kho ahosiṃ, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu
tika-vin07t:1794_8: kho ahamatītamaddhānaṃ, bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, nanu kho bhavissāmi,
tika-vin07t:1794_9: kiṃ nu kho bhavissāmi, kathaṃ nu kho bhavissāmi, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho
tika-vin07t:1794_10: ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, ahaṃ nu khosmi, no nu khosmi, kiṃ nu khosmi, kathaṃ nu khosmi,
tika-vin07t:1794_11: ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato, so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatī”ti evaṃ āgatā atīte pañca,
tika-vin07t:1794_12: anāgate pañca, paccuppanne chāti soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā.
tika-vin07t:1795_0: Tattha kiṃ nu khoti manussadevādīsu, khattiyādīsu vā aññataraṃ nissāya kaṅkhati.
tika-vin07t:1795_1: Kathaṃ nu khoti pana saṇṭhānākārādīsu issarādijanakaṃ, kāraṇaṃ vā nissāya. Kiṃ hutvā
tika-vin07t:1795_2: kiṃ ahosinti ca manussādīsu paṭhamaṃ kiṃ hutvā pacchā kiṃ ahosinti kaṅkhati. Ahaṃ
tika-vin07t:1795_3: nu khosmītiādi idāni attano vijjamānāvijjamānataṃ, sarūpapakārādikañca kaṅkhati.
tika-vin07t:1796_0: 3. Tassa vasenāti tassa paccayākārapajānanassa, paccayakkhayādhigamassa ca vasena.
tika-vin07t:1796_1: Ekekameva koṭṭhāsanti anulomapaṭilomato ekekameva koṭṭhāsaṃ. Pāṭipadarattiyā evaṃ
tika-vin07t:1796_2: manasākāsīti rattiyā tīsupi yāmesu evaṃ idha khandhakapāḷiyā āgatanayena anulomapaṭilomaṃyeva manasākāsi.
tika-vin07t:1798_0: 4. Tassa sattāhassa accayenāti pallaṅkasattāhassa apagamanena. Tamhā samādhimhāti
tika-vin07t:1798_1: arahattaphalasamāpattisamādhimhā. Antarantarā eva hi paccayākāramanasikāro. Avasesakālaṃ
tika-vin07t:1798_2: pana sabbaṃ bhagavā phalasamāpattiyāpi vītināmesi. Taṃ sandhāya “tamhā samādhimhā”ti
tika-vin07t:1798_3: vuttaṃ. Ratanacaṅkameti bhagavato ciraṃ ṭhitassa caṅkamanādhippāyaṃ ñatvā devatāhi
tika-vin07t:1798_4: māpite ratanacaṅkame. Ratanagharanti bhagavato nisīdanādhippāyaṃ ñatvā devatāhi māpitaṃ ratanamayaṃ gehaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1799_0: Tatrāpīti na kevalaṃ ratanaghareyeva. Tatrāpi ajapālanigrodhamūlepi abhidhammaṃ vicinanto
tika-vin07t:1799_1: eva antarantarā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentoti attho. Tatthāpi hi anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1799_2: sammasato sammāsambuddhassa pītisamuṭṭhitā chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo ratanaghare viya
tika-vin07t:1799_3: nicchariṃsu eva. “Huṃhu”nti karontoti “sabbe hīnajātikā maṃ mā upagacchantū”ti mānavasena,
tika-vin07t:1799_4: samīpaṃ upagatesu kodhavasena ca “apethā”ti adhippāyanicchāritaṃ huṃhuṃkāraṃ karonto.
tika-vin07t:1800: Brahmaññanti brāhmaṇattaṃ. Antanti nibbānaṃ. Devānaṃ vā antanti maggañāṇānaṃ vā antabhūtaṃ arahattaphalaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1802_0: 5. Mucalindamūleti ettha ca mucalindo vuccati nīparukkho, yo “niculo”tipi vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1802_1: Uppannameghoti sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūretvā uppanno mahāmegho. Vaddalikāti vuṭṭhiyā
tika-vin07t:1802_2: eva itthiliṅgavasena nāmaṃ. Yā ca sattāhaṃ pavattattā sattāhavaddalikāti vuttāti
tika-vin07t:1802_3: āha “sattāhaṃ avicchinnavuṭṭhikā ahosī”ti. Sītavātena dūsitaṃ dinametissā vaddalikāyāti
tika-vin07t:1802_5: upaṭṭhānanti āha “meghavigamena dūrībhūta”nti. Indanīlamaṇi viya dibbati jotetīti devo, ākāso.
tika-vin07t:1803: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti vivekassa sukhabhāvaṃ viditvā. Sabbaso asantuṭṭhisamucchedakattā maggañāṇānaṃ “catumaggañāṇasantosenā”ti vuttaṃ. Akuppanabhāvoti akujjhanasabhāvo.
tika-vin07t:1805: 6. Paccaggheti abhinave. Ayameva attho pasattho, na purimo. Na hi buddhā mahagghaṃ pattaṃ paribhuñjanti.
tika-vin07t:1807_0: 7. Ālīyanti sevīyantīti ālayā. Pañca kāmaguṇāti āha “sattā…pe… vuccantī”ti. Suṭṭhu
tika-vin07t:1807_1: muditāti ativiya pamuditā. Ṭhānaṃ sandhāyāti ṭhāna-saddaṃ apekkhitvā. Imesanti saṅkhārādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1807_2: phalānaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādīni nibbānavevacanāni. Apissūti sampiṇḍanatthe
tika-vin07t:1807_3: nipāto. Na kevalaṃ etadahosi, imāpi gāthā paṭibhaṃsūti attho.
tika-vin07t:1808_0: Kicchena me adhigatanti pāramipūraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na dukkhāpaṭipadaṃ. Buddhānañhi
tika-vin07t:1808_1: cattāro maggā sukhāpaṭipadāva honti. Ha-iti byattaṃ, ekaṃsanti dvīsu atthesu nipāto,
tika-vin07t:1808_2: byattaṃ, ekaṃsena vā alanti viyojenti. Halanti vā eko nipāto.
tika-vin07t:1809_0: 8. Pāḷiyaṃ sahampatissāti so kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma thero paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin07t:1809_1: brahmapati hutvā nibbatto, tena naṃ “sahampatī”ti sañjāniṃsu. Assavanatāti assavanatāya,
tika-vin07t:1809_2: assavanenāti attho. Savanameva hi savanatā yathā devatāti.
tika-vin07t:1810: Dhammo asuddhoti micchādiṭṭhidhammo. Samalehīti pūraṇakassapādīhi chahi satthārehi. Apāpurāti desanāhatthena vivara. Dvāranti ariyamaggaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:1811_0: Seleti ghanasilāmaye. Tathūpamanti ettha tathā-saddo taṃ-saddatthe daṭṭhabbo. Tena
tika-vin07t:1811_1: so selapabbato upamā yassa. Taṃ tathūpamanti attho. Tena vā pabbatādinā pakārena
tika-vin07t:1811_2: upamā assātipi attho. Dhammamayanti lokuttaradhammabhūtaṃ. Uṭṭhāhīti dhammadesanatthāya
tika-vin07t:1811_3: cārikacaraṇatthaṃ imamhā āsanā kāyena, appossukkabhāvato vā cittena uṭṭhehi, ayameva
tika-vin07t:1811_4: vā pāṭho. Teneva “vicara, desassū”ti duvidhepi kāyacittapayoge niyojesi. Vīrātiādi
tika-vin07t:1812_0: 9. Buddhacakkhunāti indriyaparopariyattañāṇena, āsayānusayañāṇena ca. Imesañhi dvinnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1812_1: “buddhacakkhū”ti nāmaṃ. Svākārāti saddhindriyādayova ākārā sundarā yesaṃ, te svākārā,
tika-vin07t:1812_2: suviññāpayā, paralokañca vajjañca bhayato dassanasīlā cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uppalāni ettha
tika-vin07t:1812_3: santīti uppalinīti gacchalatāpi pokkharaṇīpi vuccati. Idha pana pokkharaṇī. Evamitaresupi.
tika-vin07t:1812_4: Udakānuggatānīti udakato anuggatāni. Anto nimuggāneva hutvā pusanti vaḍḍhanti, tāni
tika-vin07t:1813_0: Apārutāti vivaṭā. Tesanti saupanissayānaṃ sattānaṃ. Dvārāti ariyamaggadvārāni. Idañca
tika-vin07t:1813_1: attano sayambhuñāṇena saupanissayānaṃ tesaṃ magguppattidiṭṭhataṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:1813_2: Vihiṃsasaññītiādīsu evamattho daṭṭhabbo – “ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattitampi
tika-vin07t:1813_3: imaṃ paṇītaṃ dhammaṃ ajānantesu manujesu desanāya vihiṃsā kāyavācākilamatho hotī”ti
tika-vin07t:1813_4: evaṃ vihiṃsasaññī hutvā na bhāsiṃ bhāsituṃ na icchiṃ. Idāni pana hetusampannā attano
tika-vin07t:1815_0: 10. Āḷāroti nāmaṃ. Kālāmoti gottaṃ. Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādīti kiṃ idāneva udapādi,
tika-vin07t:1815_1: nanu bodhimūle tekālikā, kālavinimuttā ca sabbe dhammā sabbākārato diṭṭhāti? Saccaṃ
tika-vin07t:1815_2: diṭṭhā, tathāpi nāmādivasena avikappitā ekacittakkhaṇikattā sabbaññutaññāṇassa. Na
tika-vin07t:1815_3: hi ekena cittena sabbadhammānaṃ nāmajātiādikaṃ paccekaṃ anantaṃ vibhāgaṃ vikappetuṃ
tika-vin07t:1815_4: sakkā vikappānaṃ viruddhānaṃ sahānuppattito, sabbavikappārahadhammadassanameva panānena
tika-vin07t:1815_5: sakkā kātuṃ. Yathā diṭṭhesu pana yathicchitākāraṃ ārabbha vikappo uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇena
tika-vin07t:1815_6: diṭṭhe cittapaṭe viya. Idhāpi āḷāraṃ nissāya āvajjanānantarameva sabbākārañāṇaṃ udapādi.
tika-vin07t:1815_7: Na kevalañca taṃ, atha kho pañcavaggiyā eva paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ jānissanti, tappamukhā
tika-vin07t:1815_8: ca devatā, āḷāro kālaṃ katvā ākiñcaññāyatane, udako ca nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nibbattoti
tika-vin07t:1815_9: evamādikaṃ sabbampi nissāya ñāṇaṃ uppajjati eva. Taṃ pana khaṇasampattiyā dullabhabhāvaṃ
tika-vin07t:1815_10: dassetuṃ kamena oloketvā devatāya vutte ñāṇaṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ. Saddagatiyā hi bandhattā
tika-vin07t:1815_11: ekena ñāṇena ñātampi vuccamānaṃ kamena ñātaṃ viya paṭibhāti, devatāpi ca bhagavatā
tika-vin07t:1815_12: ñātamevatthaṃ ārocesi. Teneva “bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1815_13: Evamaññatthāpi īdisesu “lokaṃ volokento asukaṃ addasa, tattha mayi gate kiṃ bhavissatī”ti
tika-vin07t:1815_14: evamādinā satthu hitesitāsandassanavasappavattesu. Sabbattha vacanagatiyaṃ kamavuttite
tika-vin07t:1815_15: paññāyamānepi ekeneva ñāṇena sakalāvabodho veditabbo. Bahukārā kho me pañcavaggiyāti
tika-vin07t:1815_16: upakārassāpi vijjamānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana dhammadesanāya kāraṇattena anupakārānampi desanato.
tika-vin07t:1816: 11. Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhinti gayāya, bodhissa ca antare tigāvute ṭhāne.
tika-vin07t:1817_0: Sabbābhibhūti sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhito. Anūpalittoti kilesalepena
tika-vin07t:1817_1: alitto. Tato eva sabbañjaho. Taṇhakkhaye vimuttoti taṇhakkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇakaraṇavasaena
tika-vin07t:1817_2: vimutto. Evaṃ sayaṃ sabbadhamme attanāva jānitvā. Kamuddiseyyanti kaṃ aññaṃ “ayaṃ
tika-vin07t:1818: Kāsinaṃ puranti bārāṇasiṃ. Āhañchanti āhanissāmi. Amatādhigamāya ugghosanato amatadundubhinti satthu dhammadesanā vuttā, “amatabheriṃ paharissāmī”ti gacchāmīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1819_0: Arahasi anantajinoti anantajinopi bhavituṃ yuttoti attho. Anantañāṇatāya ananto jino
tika-vin07t:1819_1: ca, anantena vā ñāṇena, anantaṃ vā dosaṃ jitavā, uppādavayantarahitatāya vā anantaṃ
tika-vin07t:1819_2: nibbānaṃ ajini kilesārayo madditvā gaṇhītipi anantajino.
tika-vin07t:1820_0: Hupeyyāpīti evampi bhaveyya, evaṃvidhe rūpakāyaratane īdisena ñāṇena bhavitabbanti
tika-vin07t:1820_1: adhippāyo. Evaṃ nāma kathanañhissa upanissayasampannassa aparakāle dukkhappattassa
tika-vin07t:1820_2: bhagavantaṃ upagamma pabbajitvā maggaphalapaṭivedhāya paccayo jāto. Tathāhesa bhagavā
tika-vin07t:1821_0: 12. Bāhullikoti paccayabāhulliko. Padhānavibbhantoti padhānato dukkaracaraṇato parihīno.
tika-vin07t:1821_1: Natthi ettha agāriyaṃ, agārassa hitaṃ kasigorakkhādikammanti anagāriyā, pabbajjā,
tika-vin07t:1821_2: taṃ anagāriyaṃ. Pabbajantīti upagacchanti. Tadanuttaranti taṃ anuttaraṃ. Brahmacariyapariyosānanti
tika-vin07t:1821_3: maggabrahmacariyassa pariyosānaṃ, arahattaphalanti attho. Tassa hi atthāya kulaputtā
tika-vin07t:1821_4: pabbajanti. Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃ paccakkhe attabhāve. Sayanti aparappaccayā.
tika-vin07t:1821_5: Abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanova ñāṇena paccakkhaṃ katvā. Upasampajjāti pāpuṇitvā.
tika-vin07t:1822_1: upari ariyaṃ kātuṃ alaṃ samattho alamariyo. Ñāṇadassanavisesoti sabbaññutaññāṇassa
tika-vin07t:1822_2: pubbabhāgaṃ adhippetaṃ. Noti nu. Bhāsitametanti evarūpametaṃ vākyabhedanti attho.
tika-vin07t:1822_3: Te ca “yadi esa padhānakāle ‘ahaṃ arahā’ti vadeyya, mayañca saddahāma, na cānena
tika-vin07t:1822_4: tadā vuttaṃ. Idāni pana vijjamānameva guṇaṃ vadatī”ti ekapadena satiṃ labhitvā “buddho
tika-vin07t:1822_5: jāto”ti uppannagāravā āvusovādaṃ pahāya “no hetaṃ, bhante”ti āhaṃsu. Aññā cittanti
tika-vin07t:1823_0: 13. Antāti koṭṭhāsā dve bhāgā. Kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogoti vatthukāmesu kilesakāmasukhassa
tika-vin07t:1823_1: anubhavo. Kilesakāmā eva vā āmisasukhena allīyanato kāmasukhallikāti vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin07t:1823_2: Gammoti gāmavāsīnaṃ santako. Attakilamathānuyogoti attano kilamathassa kaṇṭakaseyyādidukkhassa
tika-vin07t:1823_3: anuyogo. Ubho anteti yathāvutte lobho vā sassato vā eko anto, doso vā ucchedo vā ekoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:1824_0: Cakkhukaraṇītiādīsu attanā sampayuttañāṇacakkhuṃ karotīti cakkhukaraṇī. Dutiyaṃ tasseva
tika-vin07t:1824_1: vevacanaṃ. Upasamoti kilesupasamo. Abhiññā, sambodho ca catusaccapaṭivedhova. Nibbānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1824_2: asaṅkhatadhātu. Etesampi atthāya saṃvattatīti paṭipadaṃ thometi. Sammādiṭṭhīti ñāṇaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1825_0: 14. Evaṃ cattāropi magge ekato dassetvā idāni tehi maggehi paṭivijjhitabbāni cattāri
tika-vin07t:1825_1: ariyasaccāni dassetuṃ “idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Jātipi dukkhātiādīsu tattha
tika-vin07t:1825_2: tattha bhave nibbattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ rūpārūpadhammappavatti idha jāti
tika-vin07t:1825_3: nāma, sā ca tattha tattha bhavesu upalabbhamānānaṃ dukkhādīnaṃ vatthubhāvato dukkhā,
tika-vin07t:1825_4: evaṃ jarādīsu dukkhavatthukatāya dukkhatā veditabbā. Pañcupādānakkhandhā pana dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhavasena
tika-vin07t:1825_5: dukkhā eva. Ponobhavikāti punabbhavakaraṇaṃ punabbhavo uttarapadalopena, punabbhavo
tika-vin07t:1825_6: sīlametissāti ponobhavikā. Nandirāgasahagatāti ettha rūpādīsu nandati piyāyatīti
tika-vin07t:1825_7: nandī, sā eva rāgoti nandirāgoti bhāvappadhānoyaṃ niddeso, nandirāgattanti attho.
tika-vin07t:1825_8: Tena sahagatāni nandirāgasahagatā. Tatra tatrāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave. Rūpādīsu chasu
tika-vin07t:1825_9: ārammaṇesu kāmassādanavasena pavattā kāmataṇhā nāma. Sassatadiṭṭhiyā saha pavattā
tika-vin07t:1825_10: bhavataṇhā. Ucchedadiṭṭhiyā saha pavattā vibhavataṇhā. Asesavirāganirodhotiādinā
tika-vin07t:1825_11: nibbānameva vuccati. Tattha virajjanaṃ vigamanaṃ virāgo. Nirujjhanaṃ nirodho. Ubhayenāpi
tika-vin07t:1825_12: suṭṭhu vigamova vuccati. Asesāyapi taṇhāya virāgo, nirodho ca yena hoti, so asesavirāganirodho,
tika-vin07t:1825_13: nibbānameva. Yasmā ca taṃ āgamma taṇhaṃ, vaṭṭañca cajanti paṭinissajjanti vimuccanti
tika-vin07t:1825_14: na allīyanti, tasmā cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayoti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1827_0: 16. Yāvakīvañcāti yattakaṃ kālaṃ. Tiparivaṭṭanti saccañāṇa, kiccañāṇa, katañāṇasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1827_1: tiṇṇaṃ parivaṭṭānaṃ vasena tiparivaṭṭaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ. Ettha ca “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1827_2: idaṃ dukkhasamudaya”nti evaṃ catūsu saccesu yathābhūtañāṇaṃ saccañāṇaṃ nāma. Tesu
tika-vin07t:1827_3: eva “pariññeyyaṃ pahātabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ bhāvetabba”nti evaṃ kattabbakiccajānanañāṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1827_4: kiccañāṇaṃ nāma. “Pariññātaṃ pahīnaṃ sacchikataṃ bhāvita”nti tassa kiccassa katabhāvajānanañāṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1827_5: katañāṇaṃ nāma. Dvādasākāranti tesameva ekekasmiṃ sacce tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena dvādasākāraṃ.
tika-vin07t:1828_0: Abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsinti abhisambuddho arahattaṃ pattoti evaṃ na paṭijāniṃ.
tika-vin07t:1828_1: Yato ca khoti yato bodhimūle nisinnakālato paṭṭhāya. Athāhanti tato paraṃ ahaṃ. Ñāṇañca
tika-vin07t:1828_2: pana meti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sandhāya vadati. Akuppā metiādi tassa pavattiākāradassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1828_3: Tattha akuppā me vimuttīti arahattaphalaṃ tassa maggasaṅkhātakāraṇato ca ārammaṇato
tika-vin07t:1829_0: Imasmiṃ pana veyyākaraṇasminti niggāthasutte. Bhaññamāneti bhaṇiyamāne. Dhammacakkhunti
tika-vin07t:1829_1: idha catusaccadhammesu cakkhukiccakaraṇato sotāpattimaggo adhippeto. Yaṃ kiñcītiādi
tika-vin07t:1831_0: 18. Diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo etenāti diṭṭhadhammo. Esa nayo sesesupi. Attano paccakkhato
tika-vin07t:1831_1: adhigatattā na paraṃ pacceti, parassa saddhāya ettha na pavattatīti aparappaccayo.
tika-vin07t:1831_2: Ehi bhikkhūti ettake vuttamatte pabbajjā, upasampadā ca sijjhati, teneva tattha iti-saddena
tika-vin07t:1831_3: paricchedo dassitoti vadanti. Keci pana “sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyāti vacanapariyosāne
tika-vin07t:1831_4: eva upasampadā sijjhati, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘ehi bhikkhūti bhagavato vacanenā’ti
tika-vin07t:1831_6: viyā”ti vadanti, tadetaṃ paṭhamapārājikaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “bhagavā hi…pe… ehi bhikkhu,
tika-vin07t:1831_7: cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti iminā vacanena sameti. Yattakañhi
tika-vin07t:1831_8: bhagavatā niyamena vuccati, tattakaṃ sabbampi aṅgameva. Sekkhaputhujjanānañhi etaṃ
tika-vin07t:1831_9: paripuṇṇaṃ vuccati, asekkhānaṃ pana “cara brahmacariya”nti pariyosānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ
tika-vin07t:1831_10: sikkhattayasamiddhito. Lokiyasampadāhi uparibhūtā seṭṭhabhūtā sampadāti upasampadā.
tika-vin07t:1832: 19-21. Nīhārabhattoti bhikkhūhi gāmato nīharitvā dinnabhatto. Kallaṃ nūti yuttaṃ nu. Etaṃ mamātiādi yathākkamaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhigāhānaṃ dassanaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1833_0: 22-23. Tasmā tihāti ettha tihāti nipātamattaṃ, tasmāti attho. Nibbindatīti vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāvasena
tika-vin07t:1833_1: ukkaṇṭhati. Virajjatīti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ vasena na rajjati. Vimuccatīti phalavasena
tika-vin07t:1833_3: Karaṇīyaṃ catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi paccekaṃ kattabbaṃ pariññādivasena soḷasavidhaṃ
tika-vin07t:1833_4: kiccaṃ. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti itthabhāvāya soḷasakiccabhāvāya, kilesakkhayāya vā aparaṃ
tika-vin07t:1833_5: puna maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti pajānāti. Atha vā itthattāyāti itthabhāvato vattamānakkhandhasantānato
tika-vin07t:1833_6: aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ na bhavissatīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1835_0: 15. Āḷambaranti paṇavaṃ. Vikesikanti vippakiṇṇakesaṃ. Vikkheḷikanti vissandamānalālaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1835_1: Susānaṃ maññeti susānaṃ viya addasa sakaṃ parijananti sambandho. Udānaṃ udānesīti
tika-vin07t:1835_2: saṃvegavasappavattaṃ vacanaṃ nicchāresi. Upassaṭṭhanti dukkhena sammissaṃ, dukkhotiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1836_0: 26. Idaṃ kho yasāti bhagavā nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha. Anupubbiṃ kathanti anupaṭipāṭikathaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1836_1: Ādīnavanti dosaṃ. Okāranti nihīnatā nihīnajanasevitattā. Saṃkilesanti tehi sattānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1836_2: saṃkilesanaṃ, saṃkilesavisayanti vā attho. Kallacittanti arogacittaṃ. Sāmaṃ attanāva
tika-vin07t:1836_3: ukkaṃso ukkhipanaṃ etissanti sāmukkaṃsikā, saccadesanā. Tassā sarūpadassanaṃ “dukkha”ntiādi.
tika-vin07t:1837: 27. Assadūteti assaāruḷhe dūte. Iddhābhisaṅkhāranti iddhikiriyaṃ. Abhisaṅkharesi akāsi.
tika-vin07t:1838_0: 28. Yathādiṭṭhanti paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhaṃ catussaccabhūmiṃ sesamaggattayena paccavekkhantassa,
tika-vin07t:1838_1: passantassāti attho. Mātu no jīvitanti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ, mātu jīvitanti attho.
tika-vin07t:1838_2: Yasassa khīṇāsavattā “ehi bhikkhu, svākkhāto dhammo, cara brahmacariya”nti ettakeneva
tika-vin07t:1838_3: bhagavā upasampadaṃ adāsi. Khīṇāsavānañhi ettakeneva upasampadā anuññātā pubbeva
tika-vin07t:1838_4: dukkhassa parikkhīṇattā. Cara brahmacariyanti sāsanabrahmacariyasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhāpadapūraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1839: 30. Seṭṭhānuseṭṭhīnanti seṭṭhino ca anuseṭṭhino ca paveṇīvasena āgatā yesaṃ kulānaṃ santi, tesaṃ seṭṭhānuseṭṭhīnaṃ kulānaṃ. Orakoti lāmako.
tika-vin07t:1840: 32-33. Mā ekena dveti ekena maggena dve bhikkhū mā agamittha. Visuddhe satte, guṇe vā māretīti māro. Pāpe niyutto pāpimā.
tika-vin07t:1841_0: Sabbapāsehīti sabbakilesapāsehi. Ye dibbā ye ca mānusāti ye dibbakāmaguṇanissitā,
tika-vin07t:1841_1: mānusakakāmaguṇanissitā ca kilesapāsā nāma atthi, sabbehi tehi. “Tvaṃ buddho”ti devamanussehi
tika-vin07t:1842: Antalikkhe carante pañcābhiññepi bandhatīti antalikkhacaro, rāgapāso. Māro pana pāsampi antalikkhacaraṃ maññati. Mānasoti manosampayutto.
tika-vin07t:1843: Jānāti manti so kira “mahānubhāvo añño devaputto nivāretīti bhīto nivattissati nu kho”tisaññāya vatvā “nihato tvamasi antakā”ti vutte “jānāti ma”nti dummano palāyi.
tika-vin07t:1844_0: 34. Parivitakko udapādīti yasmā ehibhikkhubhāvāya upanissayarahitānampi pabbajitukāmatā
tika-vin07t:1844_1: uppajjissati, buddhā ca te na pabbājenti, tasmā tesampi pabbajjāvidhiṃ dassento evaṃ
tika-vin07t:1844_2: parivitakkesīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Upanissayasampannā pana bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ehibhikkhubhāveneva
tika-vin07t:1844_3: pabbajanti. Ye paṭikkhittapuggalāti sambandho. Sayaṃ pabbājetabboti ettha “kesamassuṃ
tika-vin07t:1844_5: pacchimadvayaṃ bhikkhūhi eva kātabbaṃ, kāretabbaṃ vā. “Pabbājehī”ti idaṃ tividhampi
tika-vin07t:1844_6: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Khaṇḍasīmaṃ netvāti bhaṇḍukammārocanapariharaṇatthaṃ. Bhikkhūnañhi
tika-vin07t:1844_7: anārocetvā ekasīmāya “etassa kese chindā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpetumpi na vaṭṭati. Pabbājetvāti
tika-vin07t:1844_8: kesādicchedanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ “kāsāyāni acchādetvā”ti visuṃ vuttattā. Pabbājetuṃ
tika-vin07t:1844_9: na labhatīti saraṇadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, anupasampannena bhikkhuāṇattiyā dinnampi saraṇaṃ na ruhati.
tika-vin07t:1845_0: Yasassīti parivārasampanno. Nijjīvanissattabhāvanti “kesā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko
tika-vin07t:1845_1: koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātū”tiādinayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti,
tika-vin07t:1845_2: sabbaṃ visuddhimagge āgatanayena gahetabbaṃ. Pubbeti pubbabuddhuppādesu. Madditasaṅkhāroti
tika-vin07t:1846_0: Kāsāyāni tikkhattuṃ vā…pe… paṭiggāhāpetabboti ettha “sabbadukkhanissaraṇatthāya imaṃ
tika-vin07t:1846_1: kāsāvaṃ gahetvā”ti vā “taṃ kāsāvaṃ datvā”ti vā vatvā “pabbājetha maṃ, bhante, anukampaṃ
tika-vin07t:1846_2: upādāyā”ti evaṃ yācanapubbakaṃ cīvaraṃ paṭicchāpeti. Athāpītiādi tikkhattuṃ paṭiggāhāpanato
tika-vin07t:1846_3: paraṃ kattabbavidhidassanaṃ. Athāpīti tato parampīti attho. Keci pana “cīvaraṃ appaṭiggāhāpetvā
tika-vin07t:1846_4: pabbajanappakārabhedadassanatthaṃ “athāpī”ti vuttaṃ, athāpīti ca atha vāti attho”ti
tika-vin07t:1846_5: vadanti. “Adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti iminā pabbajjā na ruhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1847_0: Pāde vandāpetvāti pādābhimukhaṃ namāpetvā. Dūre vandantopi hi pāde vandatīti vuccati.
tika-vin07t:1847_1: Upajjhāyena vāti ettha yassa santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhāti, ayaṃ upajjhāyo. Ābhisamācārikesu
tika-vin07t:1847_2: vinayanatthaṃ yaṃ ācariyaṃ katvā niyyātenti, ayaṃ ācariyo. Sace pana upajjhāyo sayameva
tika-vin07t:1847_3: sabbaṃ sikkhāpeti, aññasmiṃ na niyyāteti, upajjhāyovassa ācariyopi hoti, yathā upasampadākāle
tika-vin07t:1847_4: sayameva kammavācaṃ vācento upajjhāyova kammavācācariyopi hoti.
tika-vin07t:1848: Anunāsikantaṃ katvā dānakāle antarā vicchedo na kātabboti āha “ekasambandhānī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1850: Ca sukkavissaṭṭhiādilokavajjasikkhāpadesu sāmaṇerehi vattitabbaṃ, tattha avattamāno alajjī, daṇḍakammāraho ca hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1853_0: 35. Pāḷiyaṃ anuttaraṃ vimuttiṃ anupāpuṇāthāti “khīṇāsavā mayaṃ, kiṃ amhākaṃ padhānenā”ti
tika-vin07t:1853_1: vāsanādosena vosānaṃ anāpajjitvā pantesu senāsanesu phalasamāpattiyāva vītināmanatthaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1853_2: taṃ disvā aññesampi diṭṭhānugatisamāpajjanatthañca ovadatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1856_0: 36. Idaṃ nesaṃ pubbakammanti tesaṃ tiṃsajanānaṃ ekato abhisamayassa pubbakammaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1856_2: bahuṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ atthevāti gahetabbaṃ. Itarathā hi tadaheva paṭivedho,
tika-vin07t:1859_0: 37-38. Pāḷiyaṃ agarūti bhāriyaṃ na siyāti attho. Ubhinnaṃ sajotibhūtānanti ubhosu
tika-vin07t:1859_1: sajotibhūtesu. Patte pakkhipīti taṃ nāgaṃ nihatatejaṃ dhammadesanāya santappetvā
tika-vin07t:1859_2: saraṇasīlāni datvā sakalarattiṃ bhagavantaṃ payirupāsitvā ṭhitaṃ jaṭilānaṃ dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:1859_3: patte pakkhipi, na ahituṇḍiko viya balakkārenāti veditabbaṃ. Yatra hi nāmāti yo nāma.
tika-vin07t:1860_0: 39. Ajjaṇhoti ajja ekadivasaṃ. Aggisālamhīti agyāgāre. Sumanānaṃ buddhānaṃ manasā
tika-vin07t:1860_1: sadiso mano assāti sumanamanaso. Adhicittoti mahākaruṇādīhi adhicitto. Udicchareti
tika-vin07t:1860_2: ullokesuṃ, parivāresunti attho. Anekavaṇṇā acciyoti chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo vuttā. Ahaṃ
tika-vin07t:1861_0: 40. Abhikkantāya rattiyāti parikkhīṇāya rattiyā, majjharattisamayeti attho. Abhikkantavaṇṇāti
tika-vin07t:1861_1: abhirūpacchavivaṇṇā. Kevalakappanti ettha kevala-saddassa anavasesattho, kappa-saddassa
tika-vin07t:1861_2: samantabhāvo, tasmā anavasesaṃ samantato vanasaṇḍanti attho. Catuddisāti catūsu disāsu.
tika-vin07t:1862_1: titthiyānaṃ, veneyyasattagatadosānañca haraṇato apanayanato pāṭihāriyaṃ, taṃ taṃ
tika-vin07t:1862_2: vā sattahitaṃ paṭicca haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ, tadeva pāṭihāriyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1863_0: 44. Paṃsukūlaṃ uppannaṃ hotīti puṇṇāya dāsiyā sarīraṃ parikkhipitvā chaḍḍitaṃ sāṇamayaṃ
tika-vin07t:1863_1: kimikulākulaṃ pariyesanavasena uppannaṃ hoti, yaṃ bhagavā bhūmiṃ kampento pārupitvā
tika-vin07t:1863_2: pacchā mahākassapattherassa adāsi, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti vadanti. Kattha nu khotiādiparivitakko
tika-vin07t:1863_3: jaṭilānaṃ vividhapāṭihāriyadassanatthaṃ kato. Pāṇinā khaṇanto viya iddhiyā mattikaṃ
tika-vin07t:1864: 46. Phāliyantu, kassapa, kaṭṭhānīti uruvelakassapena nivedite evamavocāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-vin07t:1865_0: 49. Antaraṭṭhakāsu himapātasamayeti ettha māghamāsassa avasāne catasso, phagguṇamāsassa
tika-vin07t:1865_1: ādimhi catassoti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ māsānaṃ antare aṭṭharattiyo antaraṭṭhakā nāma. Tāsu
tika-vin07t:1865_2: antaraṭṭhakāsu rattīsu himapātakāle. Ummujjananimujjanampi sahasā tadubhayakaraṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1866_0: 50. Udakavāhakoti udakogho. Reṇuhatāyāti rajokiṇṇāya, atintāyāti attho. Nāvāyāti
tika-vin07t:1866_1: kullena. Idaṃ nu tvaṃ mahāsamaṇāti idha nu tvaṃ. Dha-kārassa da-kāraṃ, anusārañca
tika-vin07t:1866_2: katvā “idaṃ nū”ti vuttaṃ “ekamidāha”ntiādīsu viya. “Imasmiṃ padese tvaṃ nu kho ṭhitosī”ti
tika-vin07t:1866_3: pucchi. Ayamahamasmīti ayamahaṃ idha ṭhitosmīti attho.
tika-vin07t:1867_0: 51. Cirapaṭikāti cirakālato paṭṭhāya. Kesamissaṃ sabbaṃ parikkhāraṃ udake pavāhetvātipi
tika-vin07t:1867_1: yojetabbaṃ. Araṇikamaṇḍaluādikā tāpasaparikkhārā khārī nāma, taṃharaṇakakājaṃ khārikājaṃ
tika-vin07t:1868: 52-3. Upasaggoti upaddavo. “Aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassānī”ti idaṃ nāgadamanādīni pannarasa pāṭihāriyāni vajjetvā vuttaṃ appakamadhikaṃ gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti.
tika-vin07t:1869: 54. Gayāyanti gayānāmikāya nadiyā adūrabhavattā gāmo itthiliṅgavasena gayā nāma jāto, tassaṃ. Gayāsīseti evaṃnāmake piṭṭhipāsāṇe.
tika-vin07t:1870_1: sesārūpakkhandhānampi ādittataṃ dasseti. Esa nayo sesesupi. Manoti bhavaṅgacittaṃ
tika-vin07t:1873_0: 55. Yaññā abhivadantīti yāgahetu ijjhantīti vadanti. Upadhīsūti ettha dukkhasukhādīnaṃ
tika-vin07t:1873_1: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena cattāro upadhī kāmakhandhakilesaabhisaṅkhārūpadhīnaṃ vasena. Tesu
tika-vin07t:1873_2: khandhūpadhi idhādhippetoti āha “khandhūpadhīsu malanti ñatvā”ti. Yaññāti yaññahetu.
tika-vin07t:1873_3: Yiṭṭheti mahāyāge. Huteti divase divase kattabbe aggiparicaraṇe. Kiṃ vakkhāmīti kathaṃ vakkhāmi.
tika-vin07t:1874_0: 57-8. Āsīsanāti manorathā. Siṅgīsuvaṇṇanikkhenāti siṅgīsuvaṇṇassa rāsinā. Suvaṇṇesu
tika-vin07t:1874_1: hi yuttikataṃ hīnaṃ. Tato rasaviddhaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, tato ākaruppannaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, tato yaṃkiñci
tika-vin07t:1874_2: dibbasuvaṇṇaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, tatrāpi cāmīkaraṃ, tato sātakumbhaṃ, tato jambunadaṃ, tatopi
tika-vin07t:1874_3: siṅgīsuvaṇṇaṃ seṭṭhaṃ. Tassa nikkhaṃ nāma pañcasuvaṇṇaparimāṇaṃ. Aṭṭhasuvaṇṇādibhedaṃ
tika-vin07t:1875_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti chaḷaṅgasamannāgato ekārakkho caturāpasseno
tika-vin07t:1875_1: paṇunnapaccekasacco samavayasaṭṭhesano anāvilasaṅkappo passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro suvimuttacitto suvimuttapañño”ti –
tika-vin07t:1876_0: Evamāgatesu dasasu ariyavāsesu. Tattha pañcaṅgavippahīnoti pañcanīvaraṇehi vippayuttatā
tika-vin07t:1876_1: vuttā. Chaḷaṅgasamannāgatoti iṭṭhādīsu chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitādipaṭipakkhā chaḷaṅgupekkhā
tika-vin07t:1876_2: vuttā. Ekārakkhoti upaṭṭhitasatitā. Saṅkhāyasevanā adhivāsanā parivajjanā vinodanāsaṅkhātāni
tika-vin07t:1876_3: cattāri apassenā nissayā etassāti caturāpasseno, etena ca te nissayā dassitā. Paṇunnāni
tika-vin07t:1876_4: apanītāni diṭṭhigatikehi paccekaṃ gahitāni diṭṭhisaccāni yassa, so paṇunnapaccekasacco,
tika-vin07t:1876_5: tena lokiyañāṇena diṭṭhippahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Kāmesanā bhavesanābrahmacariyesanāsaṅkhātā
tika-vin07t:1876_6: esanā sammadeva avayā anūnā saṭṭhā nisaṭṭhā anenāti samavayasaṭṭhesano. Etena tiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1876_7: esanānaṃ abhāvo vutto. “Anāvilasaṅkappo”ti iminā kāmavitakkādīhi anāvilacittatā.
tika-vin07t:1876_9: iminā maggo. “Suvimuttapañño”ti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇamukhena phalañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1876_10: Ete hi ariyā vasanti etthāti ariyavāsāti vuccanti. Te pana vāsā vutthā vasitā sampāditā
tika-vin07t:1876_11: yena, so vutthavāso, bhagavā. Dasabaloti dasahi kāyabalehi, ñāṇabalehi ca upeto. Yāni hetāni –
tika-vin07t:1879_0: Evaṃ vuttāni dasahatthikulāni purimapurimato dasabalaguṇopetāni, tesu sabbajeṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1879_1: dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ balāni bhagavato kāyassa dasabalāni nāma. Tañca kāḷāvakasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-vin07t:1879_2: pakatihatthīnaṃ koṭisahassassa, majjhimapurisānaṃ pana dasannaṃ koṭisahassānañca
tika-vin07t:1880_0: Yāni panetāni pāḷiyaṃ “idha, sāriputta, tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato
tika-vin07t:1880_1: yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā vuttāni ṭhānāṭhānañāṇabalaṃ, kammavipākañāṇabalaṃ, sabbatthagāminipaṭipadāñāṇabalaṃ,
tika-vin07t:1880_4: dibbacakkhuñāṇabalaṃ, āsavakkhayañāṇabalanti dasabalañāṇāni, imāni bhagavato dasabalāni
tika-vin07t:1880_5: nāma. Dasahi asekkhehi aṅgehīti arahattaphalasampayuttehi pāḷiyaṃ “asekkhā sammādiṭṭhi…pe…
tika-vin07t:1880_6: asekkho sammāsamādhi, asekkhaṃ sammāñāṇaṃ, asekkhā sammāvimuttī”ti evaṃ vuttehi dasahi
tika-vin07t:1880_7: asekkhadhammehi samannāgato. Ettha ca dassanaṭṭhena vuttā sammādiṭṭhi eva jānanaṭṭhena
tika-vin07t:1880_8: sammāñāṇantipi vuttā, vuttāvasesā pana phalacittasampayuttā sabbe phassādidhammā
tika-vin07t:1883_0: 60. Sārībrāhmaṇiyā putto sāriputto. Moggalībrāhmaṇiyā putto moggallāno. Channaparibbājakassāti
tika-vin07t:1883_1: setavatthena hirikopīnaṃ chādetvā vicaraṇakaparibbājakassa, tena “nāyaṃ naggaparibbājako”ti
tika-vin07t:1883_2: dasseti. “Upaññāta”nti imassa vivaraṇaṃ ñāto cevāti. “Magga”nti imassa vivaraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1883_3: upagato ca maggoti. Tena ca upaññātanti ettha ñāta-saddo ñāṇapariyāyo. Magganti liṅgavipallāsena
tika-vin07t:1883_4: maggova vutto. Upasaddo ca upagamanattho maggasaddenapi sambandhitabboti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1883_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhanaṃ nāma atthikehi upaññātaṃ
tika-vin07t:1883_6: upagatañāṇañceva hoti, tehi upagato paṭipanno maggo ca, tasmā yaṃnūnāhaṃ anubandheyyanti.
tika-vin07t:1883_7: Upaññātaṃ nibbānanti upapattiyā anumānena ñātaṃ nibbānaṃ. “Magga”nti imassa vivaraṇaṃ
tika-vin07t:1883_8: maggantoti, anumānena ñātaṃ paccakkhato dassanatthāya gavesantoti attho.
tika-vin07t:1884: Nirodho ca nirodhūpāyo ca ekasesena nirodhoti vuttoti dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha. Paṭipādentoti nigamento.
tika-vin07t:1885: Ito uttarīti ito mayā laddhasotāpattito uttari itaramaggattayaṃ yadipi natthi, tathāpi eso eva mayā gavesito nibbānadhammoti attho.
tika-vin07t:1886_1: saparisānaṃ tesaṃ dvinnaṃ parisānaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ
tika-vin07t:1886_2: pāpuṇi, aggasāvakā pana attano ñāṇakiccassa mahantatāya katipāhaccayena. Tenāha “eva”ntiādi.
tika-vin07t:1889_0: 64. Vajjāvajjanti khuddakaṃ, mahantañca vajjaṃ. Uttiṭṭhapattanti ettha uttiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin07t:1889_1: nāma piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ vuccati “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”tiādīsu viya. Uttiṭṭhatthāya
tika-vin07t:1889_2: gahitaṃ pattaṃ uttiṭṭhapattaṃ, tenāha “piṇḍāya caraṇakapatta”nti. Tassa upanāme ko
tika-vin07t:1889_3: dosoti āha “tasmiṃ hī”tiādi. Tasmāti yasmā manussā etasmiṃyeva ete bhuñjantīti uttiṭṭhapatte
tika-vin07t:1889_4: ucchiṭṭhasaññino, tasmā uttiṭṭhapattanti vuttaṃ uttiṭṭha-saddeneva manussānaṃ saññāya
tika-vin07t:1889_5: ucchiṭṭhatāpi gammatīti. Keci pana “ucchiṭṭhasaddena samānattho uttiṭṭhasaddo”ti
tika-vin07t:1889_6: vadanti. “Uttiṭṭhā”ti tvāpaccayantopi hotīti āha “uṭṭhahitvā”ti. Upajjhāyaṃ gahetunti
tika-vin07t:1889_7: upajjhāyattaṃ manasā gahetuṃ, yācanavacanena tassa anumatiṃ gahetunti vā attho.
tika-vin07t:1890_0: 65. Patissayanaṃ patisso, garuṃ nissāya vattanabhāvo, yaṃkiñci gāravanti attho. Saha
tika-vin07t:1890_1: patissena sappatisso, paraṃ jeṭṭhaṃ katvā tassovāde vattanatāti attho. Tenāha “jeṭṭhakabhāvañca
tika-vin07t:1890_2: upaṭṭhapetvā”ti. Sāhūti sādhu sundaraṃ. Lahūti agaru, subharatāti attho. Opāyikanti
tika-vin07t:1890_3: upāyapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ, evaṃ paṭipajjanaṃ nittharaṇūpāyoti attho. Patirūpanti sāmīcikammamidanti
tika-vin07t:1890_4: attho. Pāsādikenāti pasādāvahena kāyavacīpayogena sampādehīti attho. Kāyenāti etadatthaviññāpakaṃ
tika-vin07t:1890_5: hatthamuddādiṃ dassento kāyena viññāpeti. Sādhūti sampaṭicchanaṃ sandhāyāti upajjhāyena
tika-vin07t:1890_8: paṭhamaṃ āyācanamattena, tato upajjhāyassa ca “sāhū”tiādinā vacanamattenāti attho.
tika-vin07t:1891_0: 66. Assāti saddhivihārikassa. Dve cīvarānīti uttarāsaṅgaṃ, saṅghāṭiñca sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin07t:1891_1: Ito paṭṭhāyāti “na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassā”ti ettha na-kārato paṭṭhāya, tena “nātidūre”tiādīsu
tika-vin07t:1891_2: na-kārapaṭisiddhesu āpatti natthīti dasseti. Sabbattha dukkaṭāpattīti āpadāummattakhittacittavedanaṭṭatādīhi
tika-vin07t:1891_3: vinā paṇṇattiṃ ajānitvāpi vadantassa gilānassapi dukkaṭameva. Āpadāsu hi antarantarā
tika-vin07t:1891_4: kathā vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Evamaññesupi na-kārapaṭisiddhesu īdisesu, itaresu pana gilānopi
tika-vin07t:1891_5: na muccati. Pāḷiyaṃ “heṭṭhāpīṭhaṃ vā parāmasitvā”ti idaṃ pubbe tattha ṭhapitapattādinā
tika-vin07t:1891_6: asaṅghaṭṭanatthāya vuttaṃ, cakkhunā oloketvāpi aññesaṃ abhāvaṃ ñatvāpi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati
tika-vin07t:1892_0: Gāmeti antogāme tādise maṇḍapādimhi. Antaraghareti antogehe. Paṭikkamaneti āsanasālāyaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1892_1: Dhotavālikāyāti udakena gataṭṭhāne nirajāya parisuddhavālikāya. Niddhūmeti jantāghare
tika-vin07t:1892_2: jaliyamānaaggidhūmarahite. Jantāgharañhi nāma himapātabahulesu desesu tappaccayarogapīḷādinivāraṇatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:1892_3: sarīrasedāpanaṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha kira andhakārapaṭicchannatāya bahūpi ekato pavisitvā
tika-vin07t:1892_4: cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā aggitāpaparihārāya mattikāya mukhaṃ limpitvā sarīraṃ yāvadatthaṃ
tika-vin07t:1892_5: sedetvā cuṇṇādīhi ubbaṭṭetvā nahāyanti. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “cuṇṇaṃ sannetabba”ntiādi
tika-vin07t:1892_6: vuttaṃ. Ullokanti uddhaṃ olokanaṭṭhānaṃ. Uparibhāganti attho.
tika-vin07t:1893_0: Aññattha netabboti yattha viharato sāsane anabhirati uppannā, tato aññattha kalyāṇamittādisampattiyuttaṭṭhāne
tika-vin07t:1893_1: netabbo. Visabhāgapuggalānanti lajjino vā alajjino vā upajjhāyassa avaḍḍhikāme sandhāya
tika-vin07t:1893_2: vuttaṃ. Sace pana upajjhāyo alajjī ovādampi na gaṇhāti, lajjino ca etassa visabhāgā
tika-vin07t:1893_3: honti, tattha upajjhāyaṃ vihāya lajjīheva saddhiṃ āmisādiparibhogo kātabbo. Upajjhāyādibhāvo
tika-vin07t:1893_4: hettha na pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pariveṇaṃ gantvāti upajjhāyassa pariveṇaṃ gantvā.
tika-vin07t:1893_5: “Na susāna”nti idaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ, upacārasīmato bahi gantukāmena anāpucchā gantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:1896_1: dhammāmisehi asaṅgaṇhantānaṃ ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ vattabhedattā. Teneva parivārepi
tika-vin07t:1899_1: ñatvā mānakosajjādivasena vā upajjhāyādīsu anādarena vā “akātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti ajānanatāya
tika-vin07t:1899_2: vā na kareyya, dukkaṭameva. Asañcicca asatiyātiādīhi ca akarontassa pana anāpatti.
tika-vin07t:1899_3: Sabbāni hi vattāni sekhiyāneva, tasmā sekhiyesu vuttanayenevettha sabbopi vinicchayo
tika-vin07t:1900_0: Sādiyanaṃ vā asādiyanaṃ vā na jānātīti “mayi sādiyante akarontānaṃ āpatti hoti, paṭikkhipitvā
tika-vin07t:1900_1: asādiyante āpatti na hotī”ti evaṃ na jānātīti attho. “Tesu eko vattasampanno bhikkhu…pe…
tika-vin07t:1900_2: tesaṃ anāpattī”ti vacanato sace koci “tumhākaṃ saddhivihārike, antevāsike vā gilāne
tika-vin07t:1900_3: upaṭṭhahissāmi, ovādānusāsaniādikaṃ sabbaṃ kattabbaṃ karissāmī”ti vadati, te vā saddhivihārikādayo
tika-vin07t:1900_4: “appossukkā hothā”ti vadanti, vattaṃ vā na sādiyanti, ācariyupajjhāyānampi anāpatti.
tika-vin07t:1903_1: Paṇḍuvaṇṇassa sakalasarīre byāpitabhāvadassanatthañhi vicchāvacanaṃ kataṃ. Adhikāranti
tika-vin07t:1903_2: upakāraṃ. Katavedinoti attano kataṃ upakāraṃ paṭikiriyāya ñāpakā. Upasampadākammavācāya
tika-vin07t:1903_3: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ pariyosāne vakkhāma. Parimaṇḍalehīti paripuṇṇehi.
tika-vin07t:1904_1: caritvā ālopālopavasena pariyiṭṭhabhojanaṃ. Atirekalābhoti bhikkhāhārato adhikalābho.
tika-vin07t:1904_2: Saṅghabhattādīnaṃ vibhāgo senāsanakkhandhake āvi bhavissati. Vihāroti tiṇakuṭikādisahito
tika-vin07t:1904_3: pākāraparicchinno sakalo saṅghārāmo. Aḍḍhayogoti ekasālo dīghapāsādo. Hatthipiṭṭhigaruḷasaṇṭhāno
tika-vin07t:1904_4: dīghapāsādotipi vadanti. Pāsādoti caturasso ucco anekabhūmakapāsādo. Hammiyanti muṇḍacchadano
tika-vin07t:1904_5: candikaṅgaṇayutto nātiucco pāsādo. Guhāti pabbataguhā. Pūtimuttanti gomuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:1907_1: Vādaṃ āropetvāti “olambitvā nivāsanādīsu ko doso? Yadi doso bhaveyya, parimaṇḍalanivāsanādīsupi
tika-vin07t:1907_2: doso siyā”tiādinā niggahaṃ āropetvā. Taṃyeva titthāyatananti diṭṭhisaṅkhātatitthameva
tika-vin07t:1907_3: āyatanaṃ dukkhuppattiṭṭhānanti titthāyatanaṃ. Āyasmato nissāya vacchāmīti āyasmantaṃ
tika-vin07t:1910_0: 80. Yaṃ pubbe lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti na veditabbāti
tika-vin07t:1910_1: sambandhayojanā daṭṭhabbā. Potthakesu pana “na teneva lakkhaṇenā”ti ettha na-kāraṃ
tika-vin07t:1910_2: chaḍḍetvā “teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti veditabbā”ti likhanti, taṃ
tika-vin07t:1910_3: pamādalikhitaṃ. Tathā hi teneva lakkhaṇena āpattibhāve gayhamāne nissayamuttakassāpi
tika-vin07t:1910_4: amuttakassāpi āpatti evāti vuttalakkhaṇena āpattiṃ āpajjeyya. Tathā ca “nissayantevāsikena
tika-vin07t:1910_5: hi yāva ācariyaṃ nissāya vasati, tāva sabbaṃ ācariyavattaṃ kātabba”nti iminā anantaravacanena
tika-vin07t:1911: “Nissayācariya, uddesācariya, nissayantevāsika, uddesantevāsika, samānācariyakā pana yāva nissayauddesā anupacchinnā. Tāva paṭijaggitabbā”ti –
tika-vin07t:1912: Vuttaṃ. Tasmā vuttanayena idha parigaḷitaṃ na-kāraṃ ānetvā teneva saddhivihārikassa vutteneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti na veditabbāti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1915_0: 83. Nissayapaṭippassaddhikathāyaṃ “yo vā ekasambhogaparibhogo, tassa santike nissayo
tika-vin07t:1915_1: gahetabbo”ti iminā lajjīsu eva nissayaggahaṇaṃ niyojeti alajjīsu paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t:1915_2: Ettha ca paribhogasaddena ekakammādiko saṃvāso gahito paccayaparibhogassa sambhoga-saddena
tika-vin07t:1915_3: gahitattā, etena ca sambhogasaṃvāsānaṃ alajjīhi saddhiṃ na kattabbataṃ dasseti. Parihāro
tika-vin07t:1915_4: natthīti āpattiparihāro natthi. Tādisoti yattha nissayo gahitapubbo, yo ca ekasambhogaparibhogo,
tika-vin07t:1915_5: tādiso. Tathā vuttanti “lahuṃ āgamissāmī”ti vuttañceti attho. “Cattāri pañca divasānī”ti
tika-vin07t:1915_6: idaṃ upalakkhaṇamattaṃ. Yadi ekāhadvīhena sabhāgatā paññāyati, ñātadivasena gahetabbova.
tika-vin07t:1915_7: Athāpi catupañcāhenāpi na paññāyati, yattakehi divasehi paññāyati, tattakāni atikkametabbāni.
tika-vin07t:1915_8: Sabhāgataṃ olokemīti pana leso na kātabbo.
tika-vin07t:1916: Daharā suṇantīti ettha asutvāpi āgamissati, kenaci antarāyena cirāyatīti saññāya sati labbhateva parihāro. Tenāha “idhevāhaṃ vasissāmīti pahiṇati, parihāro natthī”ti.
tika-vin07t:1917: Ekadivasampi parihāro natthīti gamane nirussāhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Saussāhassa pana senāsanapaṭisāmanādivasena katipāhe gatepi na doso.
tika-vin07t:1918_0: Tatreva vasitabbanti tatra sabhāgaṭṭhāne eva nissayaṃ gahetvā vasitabbaṃ. “Taṃyeva
tika-vin07t:1918_1: vihāraṃ…pe… vasituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā upajjhāye saṅgaṇhanteyeva taṃsamodhāne nissayapaṭippassaddhi
tika-vin07t:1918_2: vuttā, tasmiṃ pana kodhena vā gaṇanirapekkhatāya vā asaṅgaṇhante aññesu gahito nissayo
tika-vin07t:1919: Ācariyamhā nissayapaṭippassaddhiyaṃ vutto “koci ācariyo”tiādiko nayo upajjhāyapakkamanādīsupi netvā tattha ca vutto idhāpi netvā yathārahaṃ yojetabbo.
tika-vin07t:1920_0: Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma aññasmiṃ vihāre vasantīti upacārasīmato bahi aññasmiṃ vihāre
tika-vin07t:1920_1: antevāsikānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma vasanti. Tena bahiupacārepi
tika-vin07t:1920_2: antevāsikādīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antare āsannapadese vasati, nissayo
tika-vin07t:1920_3: na paṭippassambhatīti dasseti. Antoupacārasīmāyaṃ pana dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā
tika-vin07t:1923: 84. Upajjhācariyalakkhaṇakathāyaṃ na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabboti upajjhāyena hutvā na pabbājetabbo. Asekkhassa ayanti asekkho, lokiyalokuttaro sīlakkhandho.
tika-vin07t:1924_0: Antaggāhikāyāti sassatucchedakoṭṭhāsaggāhikāya. Pacchimāni dveti appassuto hoti,
tika-vin07t:1924_1: duppañño hotīti imāni dve aṅgāni. Pacchimāni tīṇīti na paṭibalo uppannaṃ kukkuccaṃ
tika-vin07t:1924_2: dhammato vinodetuṃ, āpattiṃ na jānāti, āpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ na jānātīti imāni tīṇi.
tika-vin07t:1924_3: Kukkuccassa hi pāḷiaṭṭhakathānayasaṅkhātadhammato vinodetuṃ apaṭibalatā nāma abyattatā
tika-vin07t:1925_0: Abhivisiṭṭho uttamo samācāro ābhisamācāro, vattapaṭivattasīlaṃ. Taṃ ārabbha paññattā
tika-vin07t:1925_1: khandhakasikkhāpadasaṅkhātā sikkhā ābhisamācārikā. Sikkhāpadampi hi taṃ tattha paṭipūraṇatthikehi
tika-vin07t:1925_5: ābhisamācārika”nti vuttaṃ. Tasmā sekkhapaṇṇattiya”nti ettha sikkhitabbato sekkhā,
tika-vin07t:1925_6: bhagavatā paññattattā paṇṇatti. Sabbāpi ubhatovibhaṅgapariyāpannā sikkhāpadapaṇṇatti
tika-vin07t:1925_9: sanibbānaṃ nāmaṃ, bhūtupādāyabhedaṃ rūpañca paricchinditvā jānanapaññā, tappakāsako
tika-vin07t:1925_10: ca gantho nāmarūpaparicchedo nāma. Iminā abhidhammatthakusalena bhavitabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t:1928_0: 86. Titthiyaparivāsakathāyaṃ ājīvakassa vātiādīsu akiriyavādī ājīvako nāma, kiriyavādino
tika-vin07t:1928_1: pana nigaṇṭhāpi aññepi naggatitthikā acelakapade saṅgahitā. Sabbathā naggasseva titthiyaparivāso
tika-vin07t:1928_2: vihito. So ca teneva naggavesena bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ āgatassa, na paṭicchādetvā āgatassāti
tika-vin07t:1928_3: dassetuṃ “sace sopī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sopīti ājīvako.
tika-vin07t:1929_0: Āmisakiñcikkhasampadānaṃ nāma appamattakassa deyyadhammassa anuppadānaṃ. Rūpūpajīvikāti

tika-vin07t:1980_3: gahitānīti saraṇaggahaṇena saha tadahevassa vassūpagamanampi dasseti. Pacchimikāya
