tika-vin07t:3088_4: vā “tisso”ti vattabbe “tiso”ti vā “yācatī”ti vattabbe “yācantī”ti vā evaṃ ananurūpaṭṭhānesu
tika-vin07t:3088_5: vattuṃ. Sambandhaṃ, pana vavatthānañca sabbathāpi vaṭṭatīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:3090_0: 488. Catuvaggakaraṇeti catuvaggena saṅghena kattabbe. Anissāritāti uposathaṭṭhapanādinā
tika-vin07t:3090_1: vā laddhinānāsaṃvāsakabhāvena vā na bahikatā. Aṭṭhakathāyañhi “apakatattassāti ukkhittakassa
tika-vin07t:3090_2: vā, yassa vā uposathapavāraṇā ṭhapitā hontī”ti vuttattā ṭhapitauposathapavāraṇo bhikkhu
tika-vin07t:3090_3: apakatatto evāti gahetabbaṃ. Parisuddhasīlāti pārājikaṃ anāpannā adhippetā. Parivāsādikammesu
tika-vin07t:3090_4: pana garukaṭṭhāpi apakatattā evāti gahetabbaṃ. Avasesā…pe… chandārahāva hontīti saṅghato
tika-vin07t:3090_5: hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhite sandhāya vuttaṃ. Avijahitvā ṭhitā pana chandārahā na
tika-vin07t:3090_6: honti, tepi catuvaggādito adhikā hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvāva chandārahā honti. Tasmā
tika-vin07t:3090_7: saṅghato hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhiteneva chando vā pārisuddhi vā dātabbā.
tika-vin07t:3093_0: 496. Etarahi sacepi sāmaṇerotiādīsu buddhādīnaṃ avaṇṇabhāsanampi akappiyādiṃ kappiyādibhāvena
tika-vin07t:3093_1: dīpanampi diṭṭhivipattiyaññeva pavisati. Teneva vakkhati “taṃ laddhiṃ nissajjāpetabbo”ti.
tika-vin07t:3093_2: Bhikkhūnampi eseva nayo. Micchādiṭṭhikoti buddhavacanādhippāyaṃ viparītato gaṇhanto,
tika-vin07t:3093_3: so eva antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgatoti ca vutto. Keci pana “sassatucchedānaṃ
tika-vin07t:3093_4: aññataradiṭṭhiyā samannāgato”ti vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ, sassatucchedaggāhassa sāmaṇerānaṃ
tika-vin07t:3093_5: liṅganāsanāya kāraṇattena heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyameva vuttattā, idha ca daṇḍakammanāsanāya eva adhippetattā.
tika-vin07t:3094_0: Tassāpi dātabboti vijjamānaṃ mukharādibhāvaṃ nissāya appaṭipucchitvāpi paṭiññaṃ aggahetvāpi
tika-vin07t:3094_1: āpattiṃ anāropetvāpi desitāyapi āpattiyā khuṃsanādito anoramantassa dātabbova. Oramantassa
tika-vin07t:3095_0: Brahmadaṇḍassa dānanti kharadaṇḍassa ukkaṭṭhadaṇḍassa dānaṃ. Tajjanīyādikamme hi
tika-vin07t:3095_1: kate ovādānusāsanippadānapaṭikkhepo natthi. Dinnabrahmadaṇḍe pana tasmiṃ saddhiṃ
tika-vin07t:3095_2: tajjanīyādikammakatehi paṭikkhittampi kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, “neva vattabbo”tiādinā ālāpasallāpādimattassāpi
tika-vin07t:3095_3: nakārena paṭikkhittattā. Tañhi disvā bhikkhū gīvaṃ parivattetvā olokanamattampi na
tika-vin07t:3095_4: karonti, evaṃ vivajjetabbaṃ nimmadanakaraṇatthameva tassa daṇḍassa anuññātattā. Teneva
tika-vin07t:3095_6: sabbathā vivajjito”ti mucchito papati. Yo pana brahmadaṇḍakatena saddhiṃ ñatvā saṃsaṭṭho
tika-vin07t:3095_7: avivajjetvā viharati, tassa dukkaṭamevāti gahetabbaṃ aññathā brahmadaṇḍavidhānassa
tika-vin07t:3095_8: niratthakatāpasaṅgato. Tenāti brahmadaṇḍakatena. Yathā tajjanīyādikammakatehi, evameva
tika-vin07t:3095_9: tato adhikampi saṅghaṃārādhentena sammāvattitabbaṃ. Tañca “sorato nivātavuttī”tiādinā
tika-vin07t:3095_10: sarūpato dassitameva. Tenāha “sammāvattitvā khamāpentassa brahmadaṇḍo paṭippassambhetabbo”ti.
tika-vin07t:3096_0: Yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā avandiyakammaṃ anuññātanti sambandho. “Tassa bhikkhuno daṇḍakammaṃ
tika-vin07t:3096_1: kātu”nti sāmaññato anuññātappakāraṃ dassetvā puna visesato anuññātappakāraṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin07t:3096_2: “atha kho”tiādipāḷi uddhaṭāti veditabbaṃ. Imassa apalokanakammassa ṭhānaṃ hotīti
tika-vin07t:3096_3: apalokanakammassa sāmaññassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ hotīti. Visesabyatirekena avijjamānampi
tika-vin07t:3096_4: tadaññattha appavattiṃ dassetuṃ visesanissitaṃ viya voharīyati. “Kammaññeva lakkhaṇa”nti
tika-vin07t:3096_5: iminā osāraṇādivasena gahitāvasesānaṃ sabbesaṃ apalokanakammassa sāmaññalakkhaṇavasena
tika-vin07t:3096_6: gahitattā kammaññeva lakkhaṇamassāti kammalakkhaṇanti nibbacanaṃ dasseti. Idañca
tika-vin07t:3096_7: vuttāvasesānaṃ kammānaṃ niṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ, saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanāni viya vuttāvasesakhandhāyatanānanti
tika-vin07t:3096_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Teneva vakkhati “ayaṃ panettha pāḷimuttakopi kammalakkhaṇavinicchayo”tiādi.
tika-vin07t:3096_9: Yathā cettha, evaṃ upari ñattikammādīsupi kammalakkhaṇaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tassa
tika-vin07t:3097: “Na vanditabbo”ti iminā vandantiyā dukkaṭanti dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saṅghena kataṃ katikaṃ ñatvā maddanaṃ viya hi saṅghasammutiṃ anādarena atikkamantassa āpatti eva hoti.
tika-vin07t:3098: Bhikkhusaṅghassāpi panetaṃ labbhatiyevāti avandiyakammassa upalakkhaṇamattena gahitattā bhikkhusaṅghassāpi kammalakkhaṇaṃ labbhati eva.
tika-vin07t:3099_0: Salākadānaṭṭhānaṃ salākaggaṃ nāma. Yāgubhattānaṃ bhājanaṭṭhānāni yāgaggabhattaggāni
tika-vin07t:3099_1: nāma. Etesupi hi ṭhānesu sabbo saṅgho uposathe viya sannipatito, kammañca vaggakammaṃ
tika-vin07t:3099_2: na hoti, “mayametaṃ na jānimhā”ti pacchā khiyyantāpi na honti. Khaṇḍasīmāya pana
tika-vin07t:3099_3: kate khiyyanti. Saṅghikapaccayañhi acchinnacīvarādīnaṃ dātuṃ apalokentehi upacārasīmaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin07t:3099_4: sabbesaṃ anumatiṃ gahetvāva kātabbaṃ. Yo pana visabhāgapuggalo dhammikaṃ apalokanaṃ
tika-vin07t:3099_5: paṭibāhati, taṃ upāyena bahiupacārasīmāgataṃ vā katvā khaṇḍasīmaṃ vā pavisitvā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:3100_0: Yaṃ sandhāya “apalokanakammaṃ karotī”ti sāmaññato dasseti, taṃ apalokanakammaṃ sarūpato
tika-vin07t:3100_1: dassetumāha “acchinnacīvaraṃ”iccādi. Yadi apaloketvāva cīvaraṃ dātabbaṃ, kiṃ pana
tika-vin07t:3100_3: vā upaḍḍhanāḷi vāti divase divase apaloketvā dātabbassa pamāṇadassanaṃ. Tena yāpanamattameva
tika-vin07t:3100_4: apaloketabbaṃ, na adhikanti dasseti. Ekadivasaṃyeva vātiādi dasavīsatidivasānaṃ ekasmiṃ
tika-vin07t:3100_5: divaseyeva dātabbaparicchedadassanaṃ, tena yāva jīvanti vā yāva rogā vuṭṭhahatīti
tika-vin07t:3100_6: vā evaṃ apaloketuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Iṇapalibodhanti iṇavatthuṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin07t:3100_7: sambandho. Tañca iṇāyikehi palibuddhassa lajjipesalassa sāsanupakārakassa pamāṇayuttameva
tika-vin07t:3100_8: kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ niyametvā apaloketvā dātabbaṃ, na pana sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā
tika-vin07t:3100_9: mahāiṇaṃ. Tādisañhi bhikkhācariyavattena sabbehi bhikkhūhi tādisassa bhikkhuno pariyesitvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:3101_0: Upanikkhepatoti cetiyapaṭijagganatthāya vaḍḍhiyā payojetvā kappiyakārakehi ṭhapitavatthuto.
tika-vin07t:3101_1: Saṅghikenapīti na kevalañca tatruppādato paccayadāyakehi catupaccayatthāya saṅghassa
tika-vin07t:3102: Saṅghabhattaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti mahādānaṃ dentehipi kariyamānaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ viya kāretuṃ na vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:3103_0: “Yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ ruccatī”ti vuttattā attano paribhogappahonakaṃ appaṃ vā
tika-vin07t:3103_1: bahuṃ vā gahetabbaṃ, adhikaṃ pana gahetuṃ na labhati. Uposathadivaseti nidassanamattaṃ,
tika-vin07t:3103_2: yasmiṃ kismiñci divasepi kataṃ sukatameva hoti. Karontena “yaṃ imasmiṃ vihāre antosīmāya
tika-vin07t:3103_3: saṅghasantakaṃ…pe… yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti evaṃ katikā kātabbā,
tika-vin07t:3103_4: tathā dvīhi tīhipi “āyasmantānaṃ ruccatī”ti vacanameva hettha viseso. Tesampīti rukkhānaṃ.
tika-vin07t:3103_5: Sā eva katikāti visuṃ katikā na kātabbāti attho.
tika-vin07t:3104_0: Tesanti rukkhānaṃ. Saṅgho sāmīti sambandho. Purimavihāreti purime yathāsukhaṃ paribhogatthāya
tika-vin07t:3104_1: katakatike vihāre. Pariveṇāni katvā jaggantīti yattha arakkhiyamāne phalāphalāni,
tika-vin07t:3104_2: rukkhā ca vinassanti, tādisaṃ ṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tattha saṅghassa katikā na
tika-vin07t:3104_3: pavattīti adhippāyo. Ye pana rukkhā bījāni ropetvā ādito paṭṭhāya paṭijaggitā, tepi
tika-vin07t:3104_4: dasamabhāgaṃ datvā ropakeheva paribhuñjitabbā. Tehīti jaggakehi.
tika-vin07t:3105_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ vihāre. Mūleti ādikāle, pubbeti attho. Dīghā katikāti aparicchinnakālā
tika-vin07t:3105_1: yathāsukhaṃ paribhogatthāya katikā. Nikkukkuccenāti “abhājitamida”nti kukkuccaṃ akatvāti
tika-vin07t:3105_2: attho. Khiyyanamattamevetanti tena khiyyanena bahuṃ khādantānaṃ doso natthi attano
tika-vin07t:3105_3: paribhogappamāṇasseva gahitattā, khiyyantepi attano pahonakaṃ gahetvā khāditabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t:3106_0: Gaṇhathāti na vattabbāti tathāvutte teneva bhikkhunā dinnaṃ viya maññeyyuṃ, taṃ nissāya
tika-vin07t:3106_1: micchājīvasambhavo hotīti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “anuvicaritvā”tiādi. Upaḍḍhabhāgoti ekabhikkhuno
tika-vin07t:3106_2: paṭivīsato upaḍḍhabhāgo. Dentena ca “ettakaṃ dātuṃ saṅgho anuññāsī”ti evaṃ attānaṃ
tika-vin07t:3106_3: parimocetvā yathā te saṅghe eva pasīdanti, evaṃ vatvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin07t:3107_0: Apaccāsīsantenāti gilānagamikissarādīnaṃ anuññātapuggalānampi attano santakaṃ dentena
tika-vin07t:3107_1: apaccāsīsanteneva dātabbaṃ, ananuññātapuggalānaṃ pana apaccāsīsantenāpi dātuṃ na
tika-vin07t:3107_2: vaṭṭatīti. Saṅghikameva yathākatitāya dāpetabbaṃ. Attano santakampi paccayadāyakādī
tika-vin07t:3107_3: sayameva vissāsena gaṇhanti, na vāretabbā, laddhakappiyanti tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ. Pubbe
tika-vin07t:3107_4: vuttamevāti “kuddho hi so rukkhepi chindeyyā”tiādinā tuṇhībhāve kāraṇaṃ pubbe vuttameva.
tika-vin07t:3107_5: Tehi kataanatthābhāvepi kāruññena tuṇhī bhavituṃ vaṭṭati, “gaṇhathā”tiādi pana vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin07t:3108_0: Garubhaṇḍattā…pe… na dātabbanti jīvarukkhānaṃ ārāmaṭṭhānīyattā, dārūnañca gehasambhārānupagatattā
tika-vin07t:3108_1: “sabbaṃ tvameva gaṇhā”ti dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Akatāvāsaṃ vā katvāti pubbe avijjamānaṃ
tika-vin07t:3111_2: akusalānaṃ verehi saha ekato saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ “dasaakusalakammapathappabhedāna”nti puna vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:3112_0: 499-500. Taṃ kammanti tajjanīyādikammameva, sattā āpattikkhandhā paññattaṃ nāmāti
tika-vin07t:3112_1: sambandho. Antarā kenaci apaññatte sikkhāpadeti imasmiṃ kappe ādito paṭṭhāya yāva
tika-vin07t:3112_2: amhākaṃ bhagavato abhisambodhi, tāva antarākāle kakusandhādiṃ ṭhapetvā kenaci apaññatte
tika-vin07t:3112_3: sikkhāpadeti attho. Vinītakathā sikkhāpadanti vinītavatthūni eva. Tāni hi taṃtaṃsikkhākoṭṭhāsānaṃ
tika-vin07t:3112_4: pakāsanato “sikkhāpada”nti ca āpattianāpattīnaṃ anupaññāpanato “anupaññatta”nti ca vuccanti.
tika-vin07t:3115: Iti mahāvaggo, paññattivaggo, saṅgahavaggoti tīhi mahāvaggehi paṭimaṇḍito parivāroti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t:3120_0: Satthu mahābodhīti dakkhiṇasākhaṃ sandhāya vadati. Yaṃ padhānagharaṃ nāma pariveṇaṃ,
tika-vin07t:3120_1: tattha cārupākārena sañcitaṃ parikkhittaṃ yaṃ pāsādaṃ kārayi, tatra tasmiṃ mahānigamasāmino
tika-vin07t:3121: Buddhasiriṃ uddisitvā nissāya, tassa vā ajjhesanampi paṭicca yā iddhā paripuṇṇavinicchayatāya samiddhā vinayasaṃvaṇṇanā āraddhāti yojanā.
tika-vin07t:3122_0: Sirinivāsassāti siriyā nivāsanaṭṭhānabhūtassa siripālanāmakassa rañño. Jayasaṃvacchareti
tika-vin07t:3122_1: vijayayutte saṃvacchare. Āraddhakāladassanatthaṃ puna “jayasaṃvacchare ayaṃ āraddhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin07t:3123: Kāle vassanti yuttakāle vassanasīlo. Devoti megho.
tika-vin07t:3131: Yaṃ taṃ niṭṭhaṃ tathā sabbe, pāṇino samanorathā.
tika-vin07t:3135: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tena, patvā sambodhimuttamaṃ.
tika-vin07t:3140: Lokiyehi ca bhogehi, guṇehi nikhilā pajā;
